2.2: DHELIKEL-KITABU LA RAJBE FIHI HUDAN LILMUTTAKIN
2.3: EL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-GAJBI WE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
2.4: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE WE BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
2.6: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SEWE’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘E ‘ANDHARTAHUM ‘EM LEM TUNDHIRHUM LA JU’UMINUN
2.7: KHATAMAL-LAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE ‘ALA SEM’IHIM WE ‘ALA ‘EB'SARIHIM GISHAWETUN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIM
2.8: WE MINE NASI MEN JAKULU ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MA HUM BIMU’UMININ
2.9: JUHADI’UNA-LLAHE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE MA JEHDA’UNE ‘IL-LA ‘ANFUSAHUM WE MA JESH’URUN
2.10: FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN FEZADAHUMU LLAHU MARADAN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ALIMUN BIMA KENU JEKDHIBUN
2.11: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ËRDI KALU ‘INNAMA NAHNU MUSLIHUN
2.13: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM ‘AMINU KAMA ‘AMANA NASU KALU ‘ENU’UMINU KAMA ‘AMANA SUFEHA’U ‘ALA ‘INNAHUM HUMU SUFEHA’U WE LAKIN LA JA’LEMUN
2.14: WE ‘IDHA LAKUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KALU ‘AMANNA WE ‘IDHA KHALAW ‘ILA SHAJATINIHIM KALU ‘INNA ME’AKUM ‘INNAMA NAHNU MUSTEHZI’UN
2.15: ALLAHU JESTEHZI’U BIHIM WE JAMUDDUHUM FI TUG'JANIHIM JA’MEHUN
2.16: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE ASHTARAW DALELETE BIL-HUDA FEMA RABIHAT TIJARATUHUM WE MA KENU MUHTADIN
2.17: METHELUHUM KEMETHELIL-LEDHI ASTAWKADA NËRAN FELAMMA ‘EDA’ET MA HAWLAHU DHAHABE-LLAHU BINURIHIM WE TARAKAHUM FI DHULUMATIN LA JUBSIRUN
2.19: ‘EW KESEJJIBIN MINE SEMA’I FIHI DHULUMATUN WE RA’DUN WE BERKUN JEXH’ALUNE ‘ESABI’AHUM FI ‘ADHANIHIM MINE SEWE’IKI HEDHERAL-MEWTI WA-LLAHU MUHITUN BIL-KEFIRIN
2.20: JEKEDUL-BERKU JEHTEFU ‘EBSARAHUM KUL-LEMA ‘EDA’E LEHUM MESHEW FIHI WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHLEME ‘ALEJHIM KAMU WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LEDHEHEBE BISEM’IHIM WE ‘EB'SARIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIR
2.21: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU A’BUDU RABBEKUMUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.22: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDA FIRASHËN WE SEMA’E BINA’EN WE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHE BIHI MINE THEMERATI RIZKËN LEKUM FELA TEXH’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.23: WE ‘IN KUNTUM FI RAJBIN MIMMA NEZZELNA ‘ALA ‘ABDINA FE’TU BISURATIN MIN MITHLIHI WE ED’U SHUHEDA’EKUM MIN DUNI LEHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.24: FE’IN LEM TEF’ALU WE LEN TEF’ALU FE ETTEKU NARAL-LETI WEKUDUHA NASU WEL-HIXHARATU ‘U’IDDET LILKEFIRIN
2.25: WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU KUL-LEMA RUZIKU MINHA MIN THEMERATIN RIZKËN KALU HADHEL-LEDHI RUZIKNA MIN KABLU WE ‘UTU BIHI MUTES'HABIHËN WE LEHUM FIHË ‘EZWEXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.26: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JESTEHJI ‘EN JEDRIBE METHELËN MA BE’UDETEN FEMA FEWKAHA FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FEJA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEJAKULUNE MADHA ‘ERADAL-LAHU BIHEDHA METHELËN JUDIL-LU BIHI KETHIRAN WE JEHDI BIHI KETHIRAN WE MA JUDIL-LU BIHI ‘IL-LAL-FESIKIN
2.27: EL-LEDHINE JENKUDUNE ‘AHDALLAHI MIN BE’DI MITHAKIHI WE JEKTA’UNE MA ‘EMER-ALLAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ËRDI ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
2.28: KEJFE TEKFURUNE BIL-LAHI WE KUNTUM ‘EMWETËN FE’EHJAKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JUHJIKUM THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
2.29: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA LEKUM MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ILA SEMA’I FESEWWEHUNNE SEB’A SEMAWETIN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.30: WE ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELE’IKETI ‘INNI XHA’ILUN FIL-’ËRDI HALIFETEN KALU ‘ETEXH’ALU FIHË MEN JUFSIDU FIHË WE JESFIKU DIMA’E WE NAHNU NUSEBBIHU BIHEMDIKE WE NUKADDISU LEKE KALE ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.31: WE ‘AL-LEME ‘ADEMAL-’ESMA’E KUL-LEHA THUMME ‘ARADEHUM ‘ALEL-MELE’IKETI FEKALE ‘ENBI’UNI BI’ESMA’I HA’UULË’ ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.33: KALE JA ‘ADEMU ‘ENBI’HUM BI’ESMA’IHIM FELAMMA ‘ENBE’EHUM BI’ESMA’IHIM KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKUM ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU GAJBE SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘A’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA KUNTUM TEKTUMUN
2.34: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELE’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE ‘EBE WE ESTEKBERA WE KANE MINEL-KEFIRIN
2.35: WE KULNA JA ‘ADEMU ESKUN ‘ENTE WE ZEWXHUKAL-XHENNETE WE KULË MINHA RAGADËN HEJTHU SHI’TUMA WE LA TEKRABE HEDHIHI SHEXHERATE FETEKUNA MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
2.36: FE’EZAL-LEHUMA SHEJTANU ‘ANHA FE’EHRAXHEHUMA MIMMA KANA FIHI WE KULNA EHBITU BE’DUKUM LIBE’DIN ‘ADUWUN WE LEKUM FIL-’ËRDI MUSTAKARRUN WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
2.37: FETELEKKA ‘ADEMU MIN RABBIHI KELIMATIN FETABE ‘ALEJHI ‘INNEHU HUWET-TEWWEBU RAHIM
2.38: KULNA EHBITU MINHA XHEMI’ËN FE’IMMA JE’TIJENNEKUM MINNI HUDAN FEMEN TEBI’A HUDAJE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.40: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJAL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘EWFU BI’AHDI ‘UFI BI’AHDIKUM WE ‘IJAJE FERHEBUN
2.41: WE ‘AMINU BIMA ‘ENZELTU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AKUM WE LA TEKUNU ‘EWWELE KEFIRIN BIHI WE LA TESHTERU BI’AJATI THEMENËN KALILËN WE ‘IJAJE FE ETTEKUN
2.42: WE LA TELBISUL-HAKKA BIL-BETILI WE TEKTUMUL-HAKKA WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.43: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ERKA’U ME’A RAKI’IN
2.44: ‘ETE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BIRRI WE TENSEWNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE ‘ENTUM TETLUNAL-KITABE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
2.45: WE ESTA’INU BIS-SEBRI WE SELËTI WE ‘INNEHA LEKEBIRATUN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEL-HASHI’IN
2.46: EL-LEDHINE JEDHUNNUNE ‘ENNEHUM MULËKU RABBIHIM WE ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJHI RAXHI’UN
2.47: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJAL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘ENNI FEDDELTUKUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.48: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN LA TEXHZI NEFSUN ‘AN NEFSIN SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUKBELU MINHA SHEFE’ATUN WE LA JU’UHADHU MINHA ‘ADLUN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.49: WE ‘IDH NEXHXHEJNAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’AL-’ADHABI JUDHEBBIHUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
2.50: WE ‘IDH FERAKNA BIKUMUL-BEHRA FE’ENXHEJNAKUM WE ‘EGRAKNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
2.51: WE ‘IDH WE’ADNA MUSA ‘ERBE’INE LEJLETEN THUMME ETTEHADHTUMUL-’IXHLE MIN BE’DIHI WE ‘ENTUM DHALIMUN
2.52: THUMME ‘AFEWNA ‘ANKUM MIN BE’DI DHALIKE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.54: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI ‘INNEKUM DHELEMTUM ‘ENFUSEKUM BIATTIHADHIKUMUL-’IXHLE FETUBU ‘ILA BERI’IKUM FEKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘INDE BERI’IKUM FETABE ‘ALEJKUM ‘INNEHU HUWET-TEWWEBU RAHIM
2.55: WE ‘IDH KULTUM JA MUSA LEN NU’UMINE LEKE HATTE NERA LLAHE XHEHRATEN FE’EHADHETKUMU SA’IKATU WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
2.56: THUMME BE’ATHNAKUM MIN BE’DI MEWTIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.57: WE DHAL-LELNA ‘ALEJKUMUL-GAMAME WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKUMUL-MENNE WE SELWE KULU MIN TEJJIBETI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE MA DHELEMUNA WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
2.58: WE ‘IDH KULNA EDHULU HEDHIHIL-KARJETE FEKULU MINHA HEJTHU SHI’TUM RAGADËN WE EDHULUL-BEBE SUXHXHEDËN WE KULU HITTETUN NEGFIR LEKUM HATAJAKUM WE SENEZIDUL-MUHSININ
2.59: FEBEDDALEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU KAWLËN GAJREL-LEDHI KILA LEHUM FE’ENZELNA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KENU JEFSUKUN
2.60: WE ‘IDH ESTESKA MUSA LIKAWMIHI FEKULNA EDRIB BI’ASAKAL-HEXHERA FENFEXHERAT MINHU ETHNETA ‘ASHRATE ‘AJNËN KAD ‘ALIME KUL-LU ‘UNASIN MESHRABEHUM KULU WE ESHRABU MIN RIZKI LEHI WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ËRDI MUFSIDIN
2.61: WE ‘IDHI KULTUM JA MUSA LEN NESBIRA ‘ALA TA’AMIN WEHIDIN FED’U LENA RABBEKE JUHRIXH LENA MIMMA TUNBITUL-’ERDU MIN BEKLIHA WE KITHTHA’IHA WE FUMIHA WE ‘ADESIHA WE BESELIHA KALE ‘ETESTEBDILUNEL-LEDHI HUWE ‘EDNA BIEL-LEDHI HUWE HAJRUN EHBITU MISRAN FE’INNE LEKUM MA SE’ELTUM WE DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMU EDH-DHIL-LETU WEL-MESKENETU WE BE’U BIGADEBIN MINELLAHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KENU JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE JEKTULUNE NEBIJINE BIGAJRIL-HEKKI DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KENU JA’TEDUN
2.62: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE NESARA WE SABI’INE MEN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.63: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM WE RAFE’NA FEWKAKUMUT-TURA HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE EDHKURU MA FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.64: THUMME TEWEL-LEJTUM MIN BE’DI DHALIKE FELEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU LEKUNTUM MINEL-HASIRIN
2.65: WE LEKAD ‘ALIMTUMUL-LEDHINE A’TEDEW MINKUM FI SEBTI FEKULNA LEHUM KUNU KIRADETEN HASI’IN
2.66: FEXHE’ALNAHA NEKALËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHA WE MA HALFEHA WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTAKIN
2.67: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURUKUM ‘EN TEDHBEHU BEKARATEN KALU ‘ETETTEHIDHUNA HUZUEN KALE ‘A’UDHU BIL-LAHI ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-XHAHILI
2.68: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA HIJE KALE ‘INNEHU JAKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN LA FERIDUN WE LA BIKRUN ‘AWENUN BEJNE DHALIKE FEF’ALU MA TU’UMERUN
2.69: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA LEWNUHA KALE ‘INNEHU JAKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN SEFRA’U FEKI’UN LEWNUHA TESURRU NADHIRIN
2.70: KALU ED’U LENA RABBEKE JUBEJJIN LENA MA HIJE ‘INNAL-BEKARA TESHABEHE ‘ALEJNA WE ‘INNA ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU LEMUHTEDUN
2.71: KALE ‘INNEHU JAKULU ‘INNEHA BEKARATUN LA DHELULUN TUTHIRUL-’ERDA WE LA TESKIL-HERTHE MUSAL-LEMETUN LA SHIJETE FIHË KALUL-’ANE XHI’TE BIL-HAKKI FEDHEBEHUHA WE MA KADU JEF’ALUN
2.72: WE ‘IDH KATELTUM NEFSËN FE EDDARA’TUM FIHË WA-LLAHU MUHRIXHUN MA KUNTUM TEKTUMUN
2.73: FEKULNA EDRIBUHU BIBE’DIHA KEDHALIKE JUHJI ALLAHUL-MEWTA WE JURIKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
2.74: THUMME KASET KULUBUKUM MIN BE’DI DHALIKE FEHIJE KALHIXHARATI ‘EW ‘ESHEDDU KASWETEN WE ‘INNE MINEL-HIXHARATI LEMA JETEFEXHXHERU MINHUL-’ENHARU WE ‘INNE MINHA LEMA JESHSHAKKAKU FEJEHRUXHU MINHUL-MA’U WE ‘INNE MINHA LEMA JEHBITU MIN HASHJETI LEHI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.75: ‘EFETETMA’UNE ‘EN JU’UMINU LEKUM WE KAD KANE FERIKUN MINHUM JESMA’UNE KALAMALLAHI THUMME JUHERRIFUNEHU MIN BE’DI MA ‘AKALUHU WE HUM JA’LEMUN
2.76: WE ‘IDHA LAKUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KALU ‘AMANNA WE ‘IDHA HALA BE’DUHUM ‘ILA BE’DIN KALU ‘ETUHEDDITHUNEHUM BIMA FETEHAL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM LIJUHAXHXHUKUM BIHI ‘INDE RABBIKUM ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
2.77: ‘EWELA JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUN
2.78: WE MINHUM ‘UMMIJUNE LA JA’LEMUNAL-KITABE ‘IL-LA ‘EMANIJE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEDHUNNUN
2.79: FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE JEKTUBUNAL-KITABE BI’EJDIHIM THUMME JAKULUNE HADHA MIN ‘INDI LEHI LIJESHTERU BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN FEWEJLUN LEHUM MIMMA KETEBET ‘EJDIHIM WE WEJLUN LEHUM MIMMA JEKSIBUN
2.80: WE KALU LEN TEMESSENA NARU ‘IL-LA ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDETEN KUL ‘ATTEHADHTUM ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘AHDËN FELEN JUHLIFEL-LAHU ‘AHDEHU ‘EM TEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.81: BELA MEN KESEBE SEJJI’ETEN WE ‘EHATET BIHI HATI’ETUHU FE’ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.82: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.83: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE LA TA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LALLAHE WE BIL-WELIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE DHIL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE KULU LILNNASI HUSNËN WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE THUMME TEWEL-LEJTUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINKUM WE ‘ENTUM MU’RIDUN
2.84: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM LA TESFIKUNE DIMA’EKUM WE LA TUHRIXHUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM MIN DIJARIKUM THUMME ‘EKRARTUM WE ‘ENTUM TESH/HEDUN
2.85: THUMME ‘ENTUM HA’UULË’ TEKTULUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE TUHRIXHUNE FERIKËN MINKUM MIN DIJARIHIM TEDHAHERUNE ‘ALEJHIM BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWENI WE ‘IN JE’TUKUM ‘USARA TUFEDUHUM WE HUWE MUHERRAMUN ‘ALEJKUM ‘IHRAXHUHUM ‘E FETU’UMINUNE BIBE’DIL-KITABI WE TEKFURUNE BIBE’DIN FEMA XHEZA’U MEN JEF’ALU DHALIKE MINKUM ‘IL-LA HIZJUN FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ESHEDDIL-’ADHABI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.86: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE ASHTARAWL-HEJËTE DUN'JA BIL-’AHIRATI FELA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.87: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE KAFFEJNA MIN BE’DIHI BIR-RUSULI WE ‘ATEJNA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEMAL-BEJJINETI WE ‘EJJEDNAHU BIRUHIL-KUDUSI ‘EFEKUL-LEMA XHA’EKUM RASULUN BIMA LA TEHWE ‘ENFUSUKUM ESTEKBERTUM FEFERIKËN KEDHDHEBTUM WE FERIKËN TEKTULU
2.88: WE KALU KULUBUNA GULFUN BEL LE’ANEHUMU LLAHU BIKUFRIHIM FEKALILËN MA JU’UMINUN
2.89: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUM KITABUN MIN ‘INDI LEHI MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AHUM WE KENU MIN KABLU JESTEFTIHUNE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FELAMMA XHA’EHUM MA ‘ARAFU KEFERU BIHI FELA’NETU LLAHI ‘ALEL-KEFIRIN
2.90: BI’SE MA ASHTARAW BIHI ‘ANFUSAHUM ‘EN JEKFURU BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU BEG'JËN ‘EN JUNEZZILAL-LAHU MIN FEDLIH ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI FEBE’U BIGADEBIN ‘ALA GADEBIN WE LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
2.91: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM ‘AMINU BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU KALU NU’UMINU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNA WE JEKFURUNE BIMA WERA’EHU WE HUWEL-HEKKU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AHUM KUL FELIME TEKTULUNE ‘ENBIJA’ALLAHI MIN KABLU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.92: WE LEKAD XHA’EKUM MUSA BIL-BEJJINETI THUMME ETTEHADHTUMUL-’IXHLE MIN BE’DIHI WE ‘ENTUM DHALIMUN
2.93: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAKUM WE RAFE’NA FEWKAKUMUT-TURA HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE ESMA’U KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ASEJNA WE ‘USHRIBU FI KULUBIHIMUL-’IXHLE BIKUFRIHIM KUL BI’SEMA JE’MURUKUM BIHI ‘IMANUKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.94: KUL ‘IN KANET LEKUMU DARUL-’AHIRATU ‘IND-ALLAHI HALISETEN MIN DUNI NASI FETEMENNEWL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
2.95: WE LEN JETEMENNEWHU ‘EBEDËN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
2.96: WE LETEXHIDENNEHUM ‘EHRASE NASI ‘ALA HEJËTIN WE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU JEWEDDU ‘EHEDUHUM LEW JU’AMMERU ‘ELFE SENETIN WE MA HUWE BIMUZEHZIHIHI MINEL-’ADHABI ‘EN JU’AMMERA WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
2.97: KUL MEN KANE ‘ADUWËN LIXHIBRILE FE’INNEHU NEZZELEHU ‘ALA KALBIKE BI’IDHNI LEHI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI WE HUDAN WE BUSHRA LILMU’UMININ
2.98: MEN KANE ‘ADUWËN LIL-LAHI WE MELE’IKETIHI WE RUSULIHI WE XHIBRILE WE MIKALE FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘ADUWUN LILKEFIRIN
2.99: WE LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN WE MA JEKFURU BIHA ‘IL-LAL-FESIKUN
2.100: ‘EWEKUL-LEMA ‘AHEDU ‘AHDËN NEBEDHEHU FERIKUN MINHUM BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JU’UMINUN
2.101: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUM RASULUN MIN ‘INDI LEHI MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AHUM NEBEDHE FERIKUN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE KITABEL-LAHI WERA’E DHUHURIHIM KE’ENNEHUM LA JA’LEMUN
2.102: WE ETTEBE’U MA TETLU SHEJATINU ‘ALA MULKI SULEJMANE WE MA KEFERA SULEJMANU WE LAKINNE SHEJATINE KEFERU JU’ALLIMUNE NASE SIHRA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEL-MELEKEJNI BIBEBILE HARUTE WE MARUTE WE MA JU’ALLIMANI MIN ‘EHEDIN HATTE JEKULË ‘INNAMA NAHNU FITNETUN FELA TEKFUR FEJETE’ALLEMUNE MINHUMA MA JUFERRIKUNE BIHI BEJNAL-MER’I WE ZEWXHIHI WE MA HUM BIDARRINE BIHI MIN ‘EHEDIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE JETE’ALLEMUNE MA JEDURRUHUM WE LA JENFE’UHUM WE LEKAD ‘ALIMU LEMENI ESHTERAHU MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN HALAKIN WE LEBI’SE MA SHERAW BIHI ‘ANFUSAHUM LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
2.103: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEMETHUBETUN MIN ‘INDI LEHI HAJRUN LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
2.104: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKULU RA’INA WE KULU ENDHURNA WE ESMA’U WE LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.105: MA JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI WE LAL-MUSHRIKINE ‘EN JUNEZZELE ‘ALEJKUM MIN HAJRIN MIN RABBIKUM WA-LLAHU JEHTESSU BIRAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
2.106: MA NENSEH MIN ‘AJETIN ‘EW NUNSIHA NE’TI BIHAJRIN MINHA ‘EW MITHLIHA ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIR
2.107: ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNA-LLAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
2.108: ‘EM TURIDUNE ‘EN TES’ELU RASULEKUM KAMA SU’ILE MUSA MIN KABLU WE MEN JETEBEDDELIL-KUFRA BIL-’IMANI FEKAD DAL-LE SEWE’E SEBIL
2.109: WEDDE KETHIRUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEW JERUDDUNEKUM MIN BE’DI ‘IMANIKUM KUFFERAN HESEDËN MIN ‘INDI ‘ENFUSIHIM MIN BE’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HEKKU FE’FU WE ESFEHU HATTE JE’TIJAL-LAHU BI’EMRIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.110: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE MA TUKADDIMU LI’NFUSIKUM MIN HAJRIN TEXHIDUHU ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.111: WE KALU LEN JEDHULËL-XHENNETE ‘IL-LA MEN KANE HUDËN ‘EW NESARA TILKE ‘EMANIJUHUM KUL HATU BURHANEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKI
2.112: BELA MEN ‘ESLEME WEXHHEHU LIL-LAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN FELEHU ‘EXHRUHU ‘INDE RABBIHI WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.113: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU LEJSETI NESARA ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE KALETI NESARA LEJSETIL-JEHUDU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE HUM JETLUNAL-KITABE KEDHALIKE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE MITHLE KAWLIHIM FE-ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
2.114: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN MENE’A MESAXHIDALLAHI ‘EN JUDHKERA FIHË ESMUHU WE SA’A FI HARABIHA ‘ULË’IKE MA KANE LEHUM ‘EN JEDHULUHA ‘ILA HA’IFINE LEHUM FI DUN'JA HIZJUN WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
2.115: WE LIL-LEHIL-MESHRIKU WEL-MEGRIBU FE’EJNEMA TUWELLU FETHEMME WEXHHU LLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.116: WE KALU ETTEHADHE-LLAHU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU BEL LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KUL-LUN LEHU KANITUN
2.117: BEDI’U SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘IDHA KADA ‘EMRAN FE’INNAMA JAKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
2.118: WE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE LEWLA JUKELLIMUNALLAHU ‘EW TE’TINA ‘AJETUN KEDHALIKE KALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM MITHLE KAWLIHIM TESHABEHET KULUBUHUM KAD BEJJENNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
2.119: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE BIL-HAKKI BESHIRAN WE NEDHIRAN WE LA TUS’ELU ‘AN ‘ES'HABIL-XHEHIM
2.120: WE LEN TERDA ‘ANKAL-JEHUDU WE LA NESARA HATTE TETTEBI’A MIL-LETEHUM KUL ‘INNE HUDA ALLAHI HUWEL-HUDA WE LE’INI ETTEBE’TE ‘EHWE’EHUM BE’DEL-LEDHI XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI MA LEKE MINELLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
2.121: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JETLUNEHU HAKKA TILAWETIHI ‘ULË’IKE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MEN JEKFUR BIHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
2.122: JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE EDHKURU NI’METIJAL-LETI ‘EN’AMTU ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘ENNI FEDDELTUKUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.123: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN LA TEXHZI NEFSUN ‘AN NEFSIN SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUKBELU MINHA ‘ADLUN WE LA TENFE’UHA SHEFE’ATUN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
2.124: WE ‘IDH EBTALA ‘IBRAHIME RABBUHU BIKELIMATIN FE’ETEMMEHUNNE KALE ‘INNI XHA’ILUKE LILNNASI ‘IMAMËN KALE WE MIN DHURRIJETI KALE LA JENALU ‘AHDI EDH-DHALIMIN
2.125: WE ‘IDH XHE’ALNAL-BEJTE METHABETEN LILNNASI WE ‘EMNËN WE ETTEHIDHU MIN MEKAMI ‘IBRAHIME MUSELLEN WE ‘AHIDNA ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE ‘EN TEHHIRA BEJTIJE LILTTA’IFINE WEL-’AKIFINE WE RUKKA’I SUXHUD
2.126: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI EXH’AL HADHA BELEDËN ‘AMINËN WE ERZUK ‘EHLEHU MINE THEMERATI MEN ‘AMANA MINHUM BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI KALE WE MEN KEFERA FE’UMETTI’UHU KALILËN THUMME ‘EDTERRUHU ‘ILA ‘ADHABI NARI WE BI’SAL-MESIR
2.127: WE ‘IDH JERFE’U ‘IBRAHIMUL-KAWE’IDE MINEL-BEJTI WE ‘ISMA’ILU RABBENA TEKABBEL MINNA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
2.128: RABBENA WE EXH’ALNA MUSLIMEJNI LEKE WE MIN DHURRIJETINA ‘UMMETEN MUSLIMETEN LEKE WE ‘ERINA MENASIKENA WE TUB ‘ALEJNA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTET-TEWWEBU RAHIM
2.129: RABBENA WE EB’ATH FIHIM RASULËN MINHUM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIKE WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE JUZEKKIHIM ‘INNEKE ‘ENTAL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
2.130: WE MEN JERGABU ‘AN MIL-LETI ‘IBRAHIME ‘IL-LA MEN SEFIHE NEFSEHU WE LEKADI ESTEFEJNAHU FI DUN'JA WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHIN
2.132: WE WESSA BIHA ‘IBRAHIMU BENIHI WE JA’KUBU JA BENIJE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFE LEKUMU DIJNE FELA TEMUTUNNE ‘IL-LA WE ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
2.133: ‘EM KUNTUM SHUHEDA’E ‘IDH HEDERA JA’KUBEL-MEWTU ‘IDH KALE LIBENIHI MA TA’BUDUNE MIN BE’DI KALU NA’BUDU ‘ILEHEKE WE ‘ILEHE ‘ABE’IKE ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA ‘ILEHËN WEHIDËN WE NAHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
2.134: TILKE ‘UMMETUN KAD HALET LEHA MA KESEBET WE LEKUM MA KESEBTUM WE LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA KENU JA’MELUN
2.135: WE KALU KUNU HUDËN ‘EW NESARA TEHTEDU KUL BEL MIL-LETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
2.136: KULU ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBETI WE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA WE ‘ISA WE MA ‘UTIJE NEBIJUNE MIN RABBIHIM LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM WE NAHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
2.137: FE’IN ‘AMENU BIMITHLI MA ‘AMENTUM BIHI FEKADI EHTEDEW WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNAMA HUM FI SHIKAKIN FESEJEKFIKEHUMU LLAHU WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
2.138: SIBGATALLAHI WE MEN ‘EHSENU MINELLAHI SIBGATEN WE NAHNU LEHU ‘ABIDUN
2.139: KUL ‘ETUHAXHXHUNENA FI LEHI WE HUWE RABBUNA WE RABBUKUM WE LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM WE NAHNU LEHU MUHLISUN
2.140: ‘EM TEKULUNE ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBETE KENU HUDËN ‘EW NESARA KUL ‘E’ENTUM ‘A’LEMU ‘EMI ALLAHU WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KETEME SHEHADETEN ‘INDEHU MINELLAHI WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.141: TILKE ‘UMMETUN KAD HALET LEHA MA KESEBET WE LEKUM MA KESEBTUM WE LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA KENU JA’MELUN
2.142: SEJAKULU SUFEHA’U MINE NASI MA WE LLAHUM ‘AN KIBLETIHIMU AL-LETI KENU ‘ALEJHA KUL LIL-LAHIL-MESHRIKU WEL-MEGRIBU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
2.143: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNAKUM ‘UMMETEN WESETËN LITEKUNU SHUHEDA’E ‘ALA NASI WE JEKUNE RASULU ‘ALEJKUM SHEHIDËN WE MA XHE’ALNAL-KIBLETAL-LETI KUNTE ‘ALEJHA ‘IL-LA LINA’LEME MEN JETTEBI’U RASULE MIMMEN JENKALIBU ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI WE ‘IN KANET LEKEBIRATEN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HEDALLAHU WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJUDI’A ‘IMANEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIN-NASI LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
2.144: KAD NERA TEKALLUBE WEXHHIKE FI SEMA’I FELENUWELLIJENNEKE KIBLETEN TERDAHA FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE HEJTHU MA KUNTUM FEWELLU WUXHUHEKUM SHETRAHU WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE LEJA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA JA’MELUN
2.145: WE LE’IN ‘ETEJTEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE BIKUL-LI ‘AJETIN MA TEBI’U KIBLETEKE WE MA ‘ENTE BITABI’IN KIBLETEHUM WE MA BE’DUHUM BITABI’IN KIBLETE BE’DIN WE LE’INI ETTEBE’TE ‘EHWE’EHUM MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI ‘INNEKE ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
2.146: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’RIFUNEHU KAMA JA’RIFUNE ‘EBNA’EHUM WE ‘INNE FERIKËN MINHUM LEJEKTUMUNAL-HAKKA WE HUM JA’LEMUN
2.147: AL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
2.148: WE LIKUL-LIN WIXHHETUN HUWE MUWELLIHA FESTEBIKUL-HAJRATI ‘EJNE MA TEKUNU JE’TI BIKUMU LLAHU XHEMI’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIR
2.149: WE MIN HEJTHU HARAXHTE FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE ‘INNEHU LELHEKKU MIN RABBIKE WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
2.150: WE MIN HEJTHU HARAXHTE FEWELLI WEXHHEKE SHETRAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE HEJTHU MA KUNTUM FEWELLU WUXHUHEKUM SHETRAHU LI’AL-LA JEKUNE LILNNASI ‘ALEJKUM HUXHXHETUN ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM FELA TEHSHEWHUM WE EHSHEWNI WE LI’ETIMME NI’METI ‘ALEJKUM WE LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
2.151: KAMA ‘ERSELNA FIKUM RASULËN MINKUM JETLU ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATINA WE JUZEKKIKUM WE JU’ALLIMUKUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE JU’ALLIMUKUM MA LEM TEKUNU TA’LEMUN
2.152: FEDHKURUNI ‘EDHKURKUM WE ESHKURU LI WE LA TEKFURUN
2.153: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESTA’INU BIS-SEBRI WE SELËTI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’A SABIRIN
2.154: WE LA TEKULU LIMEN JUKTELU FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘EMWETUN BEL ‘EHJA’UN WE LAKIN LA TESH’URUN
2.155: WE LENEBLUWENNEKUM BISHEJ’IN MINEL-HAWFI WEL-XHU’I WE NEKSIN MINEL-’EMWLI WEL-’ENFUSI WE THEMERATI WE BESHSHIRI SABIRIN
2.156: EL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA ‘ESABET/HUM MUSIBETUN KALU ‘INNA LIL-LAHI WE ‘INNA ‘ILEJHI RAXHI’UN
2.157: ‘ULË’IKE ‘ALEJHIM SELEWETUN MIN RABBIHIM WE RAHMETUN WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUHTEDUN
2.158: ‘INNE SEFE WEL-MERWETE MIN SHA’A’IRI LEHI FEMEN HEXHXHAL-BEJTE ‘EW A’TEMERA FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHI ‘EN JETTEWWEFE BIHIMA WE MEN TETEWWE’A HAJRAN FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHAKIRUN ‘ALIMU
2.159: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ENZELNA MINEL-BEJJINETI WEL-HUDA MIN BE’DI MA BEJJENNAHU LILNNASI FIL-KITABI ‘ULË’IKE JEL’ANUHUMU LLAHU WE JEL’ANUHUMUL-LA’INUN
2.160: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE TABU WE ‘ESLEHU WE BEJJENU FE’ULË’IKE ‘ETUBU ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ENAT-TEWWEBU RAHIM
2.161: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE MATU WE HUM KUFFERUN ‘ULË’IKE ‘ALEJHIM LA’NETU LLAHI WEL-MELE’IKETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
2.162: HALIDINE FIHË LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
2.163: WE ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE RAHMANU RAHIM
2.164: ‘INNE FI HALKI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WEL-FULKI AL-LETI TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BIMA JENFE’U NASE WE MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU MINE SEMA’I MIN MA’IN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA WE BETHTHE FIHË MIN KUL-LI DABBETIN WE TESRIFI RIJAHI WE SEHABIL-MUSEHHARI BEJNE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
2.165: WE MINE NASI MEN JETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI LEHI ‘ENDADËN JUHIBBUNEHUM KEHUBBI LEHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ESHEDDU HUBBËN LIL-LAHI WE LEW JEREL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘IDH JERAWNAL-’ADHABE ‘ENNAL-KUWETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’ADHAB
2.166: ‘IDH TEBERRA’EL-LEDHINE ETTUBI’U MINEL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’U WE RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE TEKATTE’AT BIHIMUL-’ESBEB
2.167: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’U LEW ‘ENNE LENA KERRATEN FENETEBERRA’E MINHUM KAMA TEBERRA’U MINNA KEDHALIKE JURIHIMU LLAHU ‘A’MALEHUM HESERATIN ‘ALEJHIM WE MA HUM BIHARIXHINE MINE NAR
2.168: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KULU MIMMA FIL-’ËRDI HALELËN TEJJIBËN WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWETI SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBI
2.169: ‘INNAMA JE’MURUKUM BIS-SU’I WEL-FEHSHA’I WE ‘EN TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
2.170: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM ETTEBI’U MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU KALU BEL NETTEBI’U MA ‘ELFEJNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABE’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE ‘ABE’UUHUM LA JA’KILUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEHTEDUN
2.171: WE METHELUL-LEDHINE KEFERU KEMETHELIL-LEDHI JEN’IKU BIMA LA JESMA’U ‘IL-LA DU’A’EN WE NIDA’EN SUMMUN BUKMUN ‘UMJUN FEHUM LA JA’KILUN
2.172: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KULU MIN TEJJIBETI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE ESHKURU LIL-LAHI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
2.173: ‘INNAMA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETE WE DEME WE LEHMAL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE BIHI LIGAJRI LEHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BEGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.174: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU MINEL-KITABI WE JESHTERUNE BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULË’IKE MA JE’KULUNE FI BUTUNIHIM ‘IL-LA NARA WE LA JUKELLIMUHUMU LLAHU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE LA JUZEKKIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.175: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE ASHTARAW DALELETE BIL-HUDA WEL-’ADHABE BIL-MEGFIRATI FEMA ‘ESBERAHUM ‘ALA NAR
2.176: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE NEZZALEL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIL-KITABI LEFI SHIKAKIN BE’IDI
2.177: LEJSAL-BIRRA ‘EN TUWELLU WUXHUHEKUM KIBELAL-MESHRIKI WEL-MEGRIBI WE LAKINNAL-BIRRA MEN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WEL-MELE’IKETI WEL-KITABI WE NEBIJINE WE ‘ATAL-MALE ‘ALA HUBBIHI DHEWIL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINE WE EBNE SEBILI WE SA’ILINE WE FI RIKABI WE ‘EKAME SELËTE WE ‘ATA EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-MUFUNE BI’AHDIHIM ‘IDHA ‘AHEDU WE SABIRINE FIL-BE’SA’I WE DERRA’I WE HINAL-BE’SI ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUTTEKUN
2.178: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KISASU FIL-KATLAL-HURRU BIL-HURRI WEL-’ABDU BIL-’ABDI WEL-’UNTHA BIL-’UNTHA FEMEN ‘UFIJE LEHU MIN ‘EHIHI SHEJ’UN FE ETTIBE’UN BIL-MA’RUFI WE ‘EDA’UN ‘ILEJHI BI’IHSANIN DHALIKE TEHFIFUN MIN RABBIKUM WE RAHMETUN FEMENI A’TEDA BE’DE DHALIKE FELEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
2.179: WE LEKUM FIL-KISASI HEJËTUN JA ‘ULIL-’ELBEBI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.180: KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU ‘IN TERAKE HAJRANL-WESIJETU LILWELIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE BIL-MA’RUFI HEKKËN ‘ALEL-MUTTEKIN
2.181: FEMEN BEDDELEHU BE’DEMA SEMI’AHU FE’INNAMA ‘ITHMUHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JUBEDDILUNEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.182: FEMEN HAFE MIN MUSIN XHENEFËN ‘EW ‘ITHMËN FE’ESLEHE BEJNEHUM FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.183: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMU SIJAMU KAMA KUTIBE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
2.184: ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDATIN FEMEN KANE MINKUM MERIDËN ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN FE’IDDETUN MIN ‘EJJAMIN ‘UHARA WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JUTIKUNEHU FIDJETUN TA’AMU MISKININ FEMEN TETEWWE’A HAJRAN FEHUWE HAJRUN LEHU WE ‘EN TESUMU HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
2.185: SHEHRU RAMEDANEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE FIHIL-KUR’ANU HUDAN LILNNASI WE BEJJINETIN MINEL-HUDA WEL-FURKANI FEMEN SHEHIDE MINKUMU SHEHRA FELJESUMHU WE MEN KANE MERIDËN ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN FE’IDDETUN MIN ‘EJJAMIN ‘UHARA JURIDU ALLAHU BIKUMUL-JUSRA WE LA JURIDU BIKUMUL-’USRA WE LITUKMILUL-’IDDETE WE LITUKEBBIRU LLAHE ‘ALA MA HEDAKUM WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
2.186: WE ‘IDHA SE’ELEKE ‘IBEDI ‘ANNI FE’INNI KARIBUN ‘UXHIBU DA’WETE DA’I ‘IDHA DA’ANI FELJESTEXHIBU LI WE LIU’UMINU BI LE’AL-LEHUM JERSHUDUN
2.187: ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM LEJLETE SIJAMI RAFETHU ‘ILA NISA’IKUM HUNNE LIBESUN LEKUM WE ‘ENTUM LIBESUN LEHUNNE ‘ALIM ALLAHU ‘ENNEKUM KUNTUM TEHTANUNE ‘ENFUSEKUM FETABE ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘AFE ‘ANKUM FEL’ANE BESHIRUHUNNE WE EBTEGU MA KETEBEL-LAHU LEKUM WE KULU WE ESHRABU HATTE JETEBEJJENE LEKUMUL-HAJTUL-’EBJEDU MINEL-HAJTIL-’ESWEDI MINEL-FEXHRI THUMME ‘ETIMMU SIJAME ‘ILAL-LEJLI WE LA TUBESHIRUHUNNE WE ‘ENTUM ‘AKIFUNE FIL-MESAXHIDI TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI FELA TEKRABUHA KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU ‘AJATIHI LILNNASI LE’AL-LEHUM JETTEKUN
2.188: WE LA TE’KULU ‘EMWELEKUM BEJNEKUM BIL-BETILI WE TUDLU BIHA ‘ILAL-HUKKAMI LITE’KULU FERIKËN MIN ‘EMWELI NASI BIL-’ITHMI WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
2.189: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-’EHIL-LETI KUL HIJE MEWEKITU LILNNASI WEL-HEXHXHI WE LEJSAL-BIRRU BI’EN TE’TUL-BUJUTE MIN DHUHURIHA WE LAKINNAL-BIRRA MENI ETTEKA WE ‘TUL-BUJUTE MIN ‘EBWEBIHA WE ETTEKU LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
2.190: WE KATILU FI SEBILI -LEHIL-LEDHINE JUKATILUNEKUM WE LA TA’TEDU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
2.191: WEKTULUHUM HEJTHU THEKIFTUMUHUM WE ‘EHRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU ‘EHRAXHUKUM WEL-FITNETU ‘ESHEDDU MINEL-KATLI WE LA TUKATILUHUM ‘INDAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI HATTE JUKATILUKUM FIHI FE’IN KATELUKUM FEKTULUHUM KEDHALIKE XHEZA’UL-KEFIRIN
2.193: WE KATILUHUM HATTE LA TEKUNE FITNETUN WE JEKUNE DINU LIL-LAHI FE’INI ENTEHEW FELA ‘UDWENE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
2.194: SHEHRUL-HERAMU BISH-SHEHRIL-HARAMI WEL-HURUMATU KISASUN FEMENI A’TEDA ‘ALEJKUM FE’TEDU ‘ALEJHI BIMITHLI MA A’TEDA ‘ALEJKUM WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
2.195: WE ‘ENFIKU FI SEBILI -LEHI WE LA TULKU BI’EJDIKUM ‘ILAT-TEHLUKETI WE ‘EHSINU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
2.196: WE ‘ETIMMUL-HEXHXHE WEL-’UMRATE LIL-LAHI FE’IN ‘UHSIRTUM FEMA ESTEJSERA MINEL-HEDJI WE LA TEHLIKU RU’USEKUM HATTE JEBLUGAL-HEDJU MEHIL-LEHU FEMEN KANE MINKUM MERIDËN ‘EW BIHI ‘EDHEN MIN RA’SIHI FEFIDJETUN MIN SIJAMIN ‘EW SEDEKATIN ‘EW NUSUKIN FE’IDHA ‘EMINTUM FEMEN TEMETTE’A BIL-’UMRATI ‘ILAL-HEXHXHI FEMA ESTEJSERA MINEL-HEDJI FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU THALATHETI ‘EJJAMIN FIL-HEXHXHI WE SEB’ATIN ‘IDHA RAXHA’TUM TILKE ‘ASHERATUN KAMILETUN DHALIKE LIMEN LEM JEKUN ‘EHLUHU HADIRIL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
2.197: AL-HEXHXHU ‘ESH/HURUN MA’LUMATUN FEMEN FERADE FIHINNAL-HEXHXHE FELA RAFETHE WE LA FUSUKA WE LA XHIDALE FIL-HEXHXHI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN JA’LEMHU ALLAHU WE TEZEWWEDU FE’INNE HAJRA EZ-ZADIT-TEKWE WE ETTEKUNI JA ‘ULIL-’ELBEB
2.198: LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEBTEGU FEDLËN MIN RABBIKUM FE’IDHA ‘EFEDTUM MIN ‘ARAFETIN FEDHKURU LLAHE ‘INDAL-MESH’ARIL-HARAMI WE EDHKURUHU KAMA HEDAKUM WE ‘IN KUNTUM MIN KABLIHI LEMINE DAL-LIN
2.199: THUMME ‘EFIDU MIN HEJTHU ‘EFEDE NASU WE ESTEGFIRU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.200: FE’IDHA KADEJTUM MENASIKEKUM FEDHKURU LLAHE KEDHIKRIKUM ‘ABE’EKUM ‘EW ‘ESHEDDE DHIKRAN FEMINE NASI MEN JAKULU RABBENA ‘ATINA FI DUN'JA WE MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN HALAKI
2.201: WE MINHUM MEN JAKULU RABBENA ‘ATINA FI DUN'JA HESENETEN WE FIL-’AHIRATI HESENETEN WE KINA ‘ADHABE NAR
2.202: ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM NESIBUN MIMMA KESEBU WA-LLAHU SERI’UL-HISAB
2.203: WE EDHKURU LLAHE FI ‘EJJAMIN MA’DUDATIN FEMEN TE’AXHXHELE FI JEWMEJNI FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI WE MEN TE’EHHARA FELA ‘ITHME ‘ALEJHI LIMENI ETTEKA WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
2.204: WE MINE NASI MEN JU’XHIBUKE KAWLUHU FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE JUSH/HIDU LLAHE ‘ALA MA FI KALBIHI WE HUWE ‘ELEDDUL-HISAM
2.205: WE ‘IDHA TEWELLA SA’A FIL-’ËRDI LIJUFSIDE FIHË WE JUHLIKAL-HERTHE WE NESLE WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBUL-FESAD
2.206: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHU ETTEKI LLAHE ‘EHADHET/HUL-’IZZETU BIL-’ITHMI FEHESBUHU XHEHENNEMU WE LEBI’SAL-MIHAD
2.207: WE MINE NASI MEN JESHRI NEFSEHU EBTIGA’E MERDËTI LEHI WA-LLAHU RA’UFUN BIL-’IBED
2.208: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHULU FI SILMI KAFFETEN WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWETI SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
2.209: FE’IN ZELELTUM MIN BE’DI MA XHA’ETKUMUL-BEJJINATU FE’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.210: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUMU LLAHU FI DHULELIN MINEL-GAMAMI WEL-MELE’IKETU WE KUDIJAL-’EMRU WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
2.211: SEL BENI ‘ISRA’ILE KEM ‘ATEJNAHUM MIN ‘AJETIN BEJJINETIN WE MEN JUBEDDIL NI’METALLAHI MIN BE’DI MA XHA’ET/HU FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
2.212: ZUJJINE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERUL-HEJËTU DUN'JA WE JESHARUNE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW FEWKAHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WA-LLAHU JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
2.213: KANE NASU ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN FEBE’ATHAL-LAHU NEBIJINE MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE WE ‘ENZELE ME’AHUMUL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI LIJEHKUME BEJNE NASI FIMA EHTELEFU FIHI WE MA EHTELEFE FIHI ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUHU MIN BE’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU BEG'JËN BEJNEHUM FEHEDALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LIMA EHTELEFU FIHI MINEL-HEKKI BI’IDHNIHI WA-LLAHU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
2.214: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TEDHULUL-XHENNETE WE LEMMA JE’TIKUM METHELUL-LEDHINE KHALAW MIN KABLIKUM MESSET/HUMUL-BE’SA’U WE DERRA’U WE ZULZILU HATTE JEKULE RASULU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU META NESRU LLAHI ‘ALA ‘INNE NESRALLAHI KARIBU
2.215: JES’ELUNEKE MADHA JUNFIKUNE KUL MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN HAJRIN FELILWELIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
2.216: KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KITALU WE HUWE KURHUN LEKUM WE ‘ASA ‘EN TEKRAHU SHEJ’ËN WE HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘ASA ‘EN TUHIBBU SHEJ’ËN WE HUWE SHERRUN LEKUM WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
2.217: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI SHEHRIL-HARAMI KITALIN FIHI KUL KITALUN FIHI KEBIRUN WE SEDDUN ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE KUFRUN BIHI WEL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE ‘IHRAXHU ‘EHLIHI MINHU ‘EKBERU ‘IND-ALLAHI WEL-FITNETU ‘EKBERU MINEL-KATLI WE LA JEZALUNE JUKATILUNEKUM HATTE JERUDDUKUM ‘AN DINIKUM ‘INI ESTETA’U WE MEN JERTEDID MINKUM ‘AN DINIHI FEJEMUT WE HUWE KAFIRUN FE’ULË’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.218: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘ULË’IKE JERXHUNE RAHMETALLAHI WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
2.219: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-HAMRI WEL-MEJSIRI KUL FIHIMA ‘ITHMUN KEBIRUN WE MENAFI’U LILNNASI WE ‘ITHMUHUMA ‘EKBERU MIN NEF’IHIMA WE JES’ELUNEKE MADHA JUNFIKUNE KULIL-’AFWE KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TETEFEKKERUN
2.220: FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-JETAMA KUL ‘ISLAHUN LEHUM HAJRUN WE ‘IN TUHALITUHUM FE’IHWENUKUM WA-LLAHU JA’LEMUL-MUFSIDE MINEL-MUSLIHI WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LE’A’NETEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.221: WE LA TENKIHUL-MUSHRIKATI HATTE JU’UMINNE WE LE’EMETUN MU’UMINETUN HAJRUN MIN MUSHRIKETIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBETKUM WE LA TUNKIHUL-MUSHRIKINE HATTE JU’UMINU WE LE’ABDUN MU’UMINUN HAJRUN MIN MUSHRIKIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKUM ‘ULË’IKE JED’UNE ‘ILA NARI WA-LLAHU JED’U ‘ILAL-XHENNETI WEL-MEGFIRATI BI’IDHNIHI WE JUBEJJINU ‘AJATIHI LILNNASI LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
2.222: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-MEHIDI KUL HUWE ‘EDHEN FE’TEZILU NISA’ FIL-MEHIDI WE LA TEKRABUHUNNE HATTE JETHURNE FE’IDHA TETEHHERNE FE’TUHUNNE MIN HEJTHU ‘EMERAKUMU LLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUT-TEWWEBINE WE JUHIBBUL-MUTETEHHIRIN
2.223: NISA’UUKUM HERTHUN LEKUM FE’TU HERTHEKUM ‘ENNA SHI’TUM WE KADDIMU LI’NFUSIKUM WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM MULËKUHU WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
2.224: WE LA TEXH’ALU LLAHE ‘URDETEN LI’JMANIKUM ‘EN TEBERRU WE TETTEKU WE TUSLIHU BEJNE NASI WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.225: LA JU’UAHIDHUKUMU LLAHU BIL-LEGWI FI ‘EJMANIKUM WE LAKIN JU’UAHIDHUKUM BIMA KESEBET KULUBUKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN HELIM
2.226: LIL-LEDHINE JU’ULUNE MIN NISA’IHIM TERABBUSU ‘ERBE’ATI ‘ESH/HURIN FE’IN FE’U FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIM
2.228: WEL-MUTELLEKATU JETERABBESNE BI’ENFUSIHINNE THALATHETE KURU’IN WE LA JEHIL-LU LEHUNNE ‘EN JEKTUMNE MA HALEKEL-LEHU FI ‘ERHAMIHINNE ‘IN KUNNE JU’UMINNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE BU’ULETUHUNNE ‘EHEKKU BIRADDIHINNE FI DHALIKE ‘IN ‘ERADU ‘ISLAHËN WE LEHUNNE MITHLUL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHINNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE LILRRIXHALI ‘ALEJHINNE DERAXHETUN WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.229: ET-TALAKU MERRATANI FE’IMSAKUN BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW TESRIHUN BI’IHSANIN WE LA JEHIL-LU LEKUM ‘EN TE’HUDHU MIMMA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JEHAFE ‘ELLA JUKIMA HUDUDALLAHI FE’IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA JUKIMA HUDUDALLAHI FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA FIMA EFTEDET BIHI TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI FELA TA’TEDUHA WE MEN JETE’ADDE HUDUDALLAHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
2.230: FE’IN TELLEKAHA FELA TEHILLU LEHU MIN BE’DU HATTE TENKIHE ZEWXHËN GAJRAHU FE’IN TELLEKAHA FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA ‘EN JETERAXHA’A ‘IN DHENNA ‘EN JUKIMA HUDUDALLAHI WE TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI JUBEJJINUHA LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
2.231: WE ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FEBELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FE’EMSIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW SERRIHUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN WE LA TUMSIKUHUNNE DIRARAN LITA’TEDU WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FEKAD DHELEME NEFSEHU WE LA TETTEHIDHU ‘AJATI LEHI HUZUEN WE EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE MA ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKUM MINEL-KITABI WEL-HIKMETI JA’IDHUKUM BIHI WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.232: WE ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FEBELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FELA TA’DULUHUNNE ‘EN JENKIHNE ‘EZWEXHEHUNNE ‘IDHA TERADEW BEJNEHUM BIL-MA’RUFI DHALIKE JU’ADHU BIHI MEN KANE MINKUM JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI DHALIKUM ‘EZKA LEKUM WE ‘ETHERU WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
2.233: WEL-WELIDATU JURDI’NE ‘EWLADEHUNNE HEWLEJNI KAMILEJNI LIMEN ‘ERADE ‘EN JUTIMME RADA’ATE WE ‘ALEL-MEWLUDI LEHU RIZKUHUNNE WE KISWETUHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI LA TUKELLEFU NEFSUN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA LA TUDARRA WE E-DETUN BIWELEDIHA WE LA MEWLUDUN LEHU BIWELEDIHI WE ‘ALEL-WERITHI MITHLU DHALIKE FE’IN ‘ERADA FISALËN ‘AN TERADIN MINHUMA WE TESHAWURIN FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA WE ‘IN ‘ERADTUM ‘EN TESTARDI’U ‘EWLADEKUM FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDHA SELLEMTUM MA ‘ATEJTUM BIL-MA’RUFI WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.234: WEL-LEDHINE JUTEWEFFEWNE MINKUM WE JEDHERUNE ‘EZWEXHËN JETERABBESNE BI’ENFUSIHINNE ‘ERBE’ATE ‘ESH/HURIN WE ‘ASHRAN FE’IDHA BELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA FE’ALNE FI ‘ENFUSIHINNE BIL-MA’RUFI WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
2.235: WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA ‘ARRADTUM BIHI MIN HITBETI NISA’ ‘EW ‘EKNENTUM FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘ALIM ALLAHU ‘ENNEKUM SETEDHKURUNEHUNNE WE LAKIN LA TUWE’IDUHUNNE SIRRAN ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKULU KAWLËN MA’RUFËN WE LA TA’ZIMU ‘UKDETE NIKAHI HATTE JEBLUGAL-KITABU ‘EXHELEHU WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM FEHDHERUHU WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE GAFURUN HELIMU
2.236: LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IN TELLEKTUMU NISA’ MA LEM TEMESSUHUNNE ‘EW TEFRIDU LEHUNNE FERIDETEN WE METTI’UHUNNE ‘ALEL-MUSI’I KADERUHU WE ‘ALEL-MUKTIRI KADERUHU META’ËN BIL-MA’RUFI HEKKËN ‘ALEL-MUHSININ
2.237: WE ‘IN TELLEKTUMUHUNNE MIN KABLI ‘EN TEMESSUHUNNE WE KAD FERADTUM LEHUNNE FERIDETEN FENISFU MA FERADTUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN JA’FUNE ‘EW JA’FUWEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHI ‘UKDETU NIKAHI WE ‘EN TA’FU ‘EKRABU LILTTEKWE WE LA TENSEWL-FEDLE BEJNEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.238: HAFIDHU ‘ALA SELEWETI WE SELËTIL-WUSTA WE KUMU LIL-LAHI KANITIN
2.239: FE’IN HIFTUM FERIXHALËN ‘EW RUKBENËN FE’IDHA ‘EMINTUM FEDHKURU LLAHE KAMA ‘AL-LEMEKUM MA LEM TEKUNU TA’LEMUN
2.240: WEL-LEDHINE JUTEWEFFEWNE MINKUM WE JEDHERUNE ‘EZWEXHËN WESIJETEN LI’ZWEXHIHIM META’ËN ‘ILAL-HEWLI GAJRA ‘IHRAXHIN FE’IN HARAXHNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FI MA FE’ALNE FI ‘ENFUSIHINNE MIN MA’RUFIN WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.242: KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
2.243: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE HARAXHU MIN DIJARIHIM WE HUM ‘ULUFUN HEDHERAL-MEWTI FEKALE LEHUMU LLAHU MUTU THUMME ‘EHJAHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
2.244: WE KATILU FI SEBILI -LEHI WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.245: MEN DHEL-LEDHI JUKRIDU LLAHE KARDËN HESENËN FEJUDA’IFEHU LEHU ‘ED’AFËN KETHIRATEN WA-LLAHU JEKBIDU WE JEBSUTU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
2.246: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILAL-MELE’I MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE MIN BE’DI MUSA ‘IDH KALU LINEBIJIN LEHUM EB’ATH LENA MELIKËN NUKATIL FI SEBILI -LEHI KALE HEL ‘ASEJTUM ‘IN KUTIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-KITALU ‘ELLA TUKATILU KALU WE MA LENA ‘ELLA NUKATILE FI SEBILI -LEHI WE KAD ‘UHRIXHNA MIN DIJARINA WE ‘EBNA’INA FELAMMA KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KITALU TEWEL-LEW ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
2.247: WE KALE LEHUM NEBIJUHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAD BE’ATHE LEKUM TALUTE MELIKËN KALU ‘ENNA JEKUNU LEHUL-MULKU ‘ALEJNA WE NAHNU ‘EHEKKU BIL-MULKI MINHU WE LEM JU’UTE SE’ATEN MINEL-MALI KALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFEHU ‘ALEJKUM WE ZADEHU BESTETEN FIL-’ILMI WEL-XHISMI WA-LLAHU JU’UTI MULKEHU MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.248: WE KALE LEHUM NEBIJUHUM ‘INNE ‘AJETE MULKIHI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUT-TABUTU FIHI SEKINETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE BEKIJETUN MIMMA TERAKE ‘ALU MUSA WE ‘ALU HARUNE TEHMILUHUL-MELE’IKETU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.249: FELAMMA FESELE TALUTU BIL-XHUNUDI KALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE MUBTELIKUM BINEHERIN FEMEN SHERIBE MINHU FELEJSE MINNI WE MEN LEM JET’AMHU FE’INNEHU MINNI ‘IL-LA MENI EGTERAFE GURFETEN BIJEDIHI FESHERIBU MINHU ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM FELAMMA XHAWEZEHU HUWE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU KALU LA TAKATE LENAL-JEWME BIXHALUTE WE XHUNUDIHI KALEL-LEDHINE JEDHUNNUNE ‘ENNEHUM MULËKU LLAHI KEM MIN FI’ETIN KALILETIN GALEBET FI’ETEN KETHIRATEN BI’IDHNI LEHI WA-LLAHU ME’A SABIRIN
2.250: WE LEMMA BERAZU LIXHALUTE WE XHUNUDIHI KALU RABBENA ‘EFRIG ‘ALEJNA SABRAN WE THEBBIT ‘EKDAMENA WE ENSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KEFIRIN
2.251: FEHEZEMUHUM BI’IDHNI LEHI WE KATELE DAWUDU XHALUTE WE ‘ATAHU ALLAHUL-MULKE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘AL-LEMEHU MIMMA JESHA’U WE LEWLA DEF’U LLAHI NASE BE’DEHUM BIBE’DIN LEFESEDETIL-’ERDU WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE DHU FEDLIN ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
2.252: TILKE ‘AJATU LLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HAKKI WE ‘INNEKE LEMINEL-MURSELIN
2.253: TILKE RUSULU FEDDELNA BE’DEHUM ‘ALA BE’DIN MINHUM MEN KELLEMAL-LAHU WE RAFE’A BE’DEHUM DERAXHATIN WE ‘ATEJNA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEMAL-BEJJINETI WE ‘EJJEDNAHU BIRUHIL-KUDUSI WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA EKTETALEL-LEDHINE MIN BE’DIHIM MIN BE’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU WE LAKINI EHTELEFU FEMINHUM MEN ‘AMANA WE MINHUM MEN KEFERA WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA EKTETELU WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JURID
2.254: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENFIKU MIMMA RAZEKNAKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA BEJ’UN FIHI WE LA HULLETUN WE LA SHEFE’ATUN WEL-KAFIRUNE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
2.255: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-HEJJUL-KAJJUMU LA TE’HUDHUHU SINETUN WE LA NEWMUN LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI MEN DHEL-LEDHI JESHFE’U ‘INDEHU ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE LA JUHITUNE BISHEJ’IN MIN ‘ILMIHI ‘IL-LA BIMA SHA’E WESI’A KURSIJUHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE LA JE’UDUHU HIFDHUHUMA WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-’ADHIM
2.256: LA ‘IKRAHE FI DINI KAD TEBEJJENE RUSHDU MINEL-GAJJI FEMEN JEKFUR BIT-TAGUTI WE JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI FEKADI ESTEMSEKE BIL-’URWETIL-WUTHKA LA ENFISAME LEHA WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.257: ALLAHU WE LIJUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUHRIXHUHUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NUR WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EWLIJA’UUHUMUT-TAGUTU JUHRIXHUNEHUM MINE NUR ‘ILA EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.258: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHI HAXHXHE ‘IBRAHIME FI RABBIHI ‘EN ‘ATAHU ALLAHUL-MULKE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBIL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU KALE ‘ENA ‘UHJI WE ‘UMITU KALE ‘IBRAHIMU FE’INNALL-LLAHE JE’TI BISH-SHEMSI MINEL-MESHRIKI FE’TI BIHA MINEL-MEGRIBI FEBUHITEL-LEDHI KEFERA WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
2.259: ‘EW KEL-LEDHI MERRA ‘ALA KARJETIN WE HIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA KALE ‘ENNA JUHJI HEDHIHI ALLAHU BE’DE MEWTIHA FE’EMATEHU ALLAHU MIA’ETE ‘AMIN THUMME BE’ATHEHU KALE KEM LEBITHTE KALE LEBITHTU JEWMËN ‘EW BE’DE JEWMIN KALE BEL LEBITHTE MIA’ETE ‘AMIN FENDHUR ‘ILA TA’AMIKE WE SHERABIKE LEM JETESENNEH WE ENDHUR ‘ILA HIMARIKE WE LINEXH’ALEKE ‘AJETEN LILNNASI WE ENDHUR ‘ILAL-’IDHAMI KEJFE NUNSHIZUHA THUMME NEKSUHA LEHMËN FELAMMA TEBEJJENE LEHU KALE ‘A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.260: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI ‘ERINI KEJFE TUHJIL-MEWTA KALE ‘EWELEM TU’UMIN KALE BELA WE LAKIN LIJETME’INNE KALBI KALE FEHUDH ‘ERBE’ATEN MINET-TAJRI FESURHUNNE ‘ILEJKE THUMME EXH’AL ‘ALA KUL-LI XHEBELIN MINHUNNE XHUZ’ËN THUMME ED’UHUNNE JE’TINEKE SA’JËN WE A’LEM ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
2.261: METHELUL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUM FI SEBILI -LEHI KEMETHELI HEBBETIN ‘ENBETET SEB’A SENABILE FI KUL-LI SUNBULETIN MIA’ETU HEBBETIN WA-LLAHU JUDA’IFU LIMEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.262: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUM FI SEBILI -LEHI THUMME LA JUTBI’UNE MA ‘ENFEKU MENNËN WE LA ‘EDHEN LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.263: KAWLUN MA’RUFUN WE MEGFIRATUN HAJRUN MIN SEDEKATIN JETBE’UHA ‘EDHEN WA-LLAHU GANIJUN HELIMU
2.264: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUBTILU SEDEKATIKUM BIL-MENNI WEL-’EDHA KEL-LEDHI JUNFIKU MALEHU RI’A’E NASI WE LA JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI FEMETHELUHU KEMETHELI SEFWENIN ‘ALEJHI TURABUN FE’ESABEHU WE EBILUN FETERAKEHU SELDËN LA JEKDIRUNE ‘ALA SHEJ’IN MIMMA KESEBU WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-KEFIRIN
2.265: WE METHELUL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUMU EBTIGA’E MERDËTI LEHI WE TETHBITËN MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM KEMETHELI XHENNETIN BIRABWETIN ‘ESABEHA WE EBILUN FE’ATET ‘UKULEHA DI’FEJNI FE’IN LEM JUSIBHA WE EBILUN FETELLUN WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
2.266: ‘EJEWEDDU ‘EHEDUKUM ‘EN TEKUNE LEHU XHENNETUN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU LEHU FIHË MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI WE ‘ESABEHUL-KIBERU WE LEHU DHURRIJETUN DU’AFE’U FE’ESABEHA ‘I’SARUN FIHI NARUN FEHTERAKAT KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TETEFEKKERUN
2.267: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENFIKU MIN TEJJIBETI MA KESEBTUM WE MIMMA ‘EHRAXHNA LEKUM MINEL-’ARDI WE LA TEJEMMEMUL-HABITHE MINHU TUNFIKUNE WE LESTUM BI’AHIDHIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TUGMIDU FIHI WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE GANIJUN HEMIDU
2.268: SHEJTANU JA’IDUKUMUL-FEKRA WE JE’MURUKUM BIL-FEHSHA’I WA-LLAHU JA’IDUKUM MEGFIRATEN MINHU WE FEDLËN WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
2.269: JU’UTIL-HIKMETE MEN JESHA’U WE MEN JU’UTAL-HIKMETE FEKAD ‘UTIJE HAJRAN KETHIRAN WE MA JEDHDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA ‘ULUL-’ELBEB
2.270: WE MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN NEFEKATIN ‘EW NEDHERTUM MIN NEDHRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMUHU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
2.271: ‘IN TUBDU SEDEKATI FENI’IMMA HIJE WE ‘IN TUHFUHA WE TU’UTUHAL-FUKARA’E FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE JUKEFFIRU ‘ANKUM MIN SEJJI’ATIKUM WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
2.272: LEJSE ‘ALEJKE HUDAHUM WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN FELI’ENFUSIKUM WE MA TUNFIKUNE ‘IL-LA EBTIGA’E WEXHHI LEHI WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN JUWEFFE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TUDHLEMUN
2.273: LILFUKARA’IL-LEDHINE ‘UHSIRU FI SEBILI -LEHI LA JESTETI’UNE DERBËN FIL-’ËRDI JEHSEBUHUMUL-XHAHILU ‘EGNIJA’E MINET-TE’AFFUFI TA’RIFUHUM BISIMAHUM LA JES’ELUNE NASE ‘ILHAFËN WE MA TUNFIKU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
2.274: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI SIRRAN WE ‘ALANIJETEN FELEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.275: EL-LEDHINE JE’KULUNE RIBE LA JEKUMUNE ‘IL-LA KAMA JEKUMUL-LEDHI JETEHABBETUHU SHEJTANU MINEL-MESSI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU ‘INNAMAL-BEJ’U MITHLU RIBE WE ‘EHELLAL-LAHUL-BEJ’A WE HERRAME RIBE FEMEN XHA’EHU MEW’IDHETUN MIN RABBIHI FENTEHA FELEHU MA SELEFE WE ‘EMRUHU ‘ILA LLAHI WE MEN ‘ADE FE’ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
2.276: JEMHEKU ALLAHU RIBE WE JURBI SEDEKATI WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE KEFFERIN ‘ETHIMI
2.277: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
2.278: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE DHERU MA BEKIJE MINE RIBE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
2.279: FE’IN LEM TEF’ALU FE’DHENU BIHERBIN MINELLAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘IN TUBTUM FELEKUM RU’USU ‘EMWELIKUM LA TEDHLIMUNE WE LA TUDHLEMUN
2.280: WE ‘IN KANE DHU ‘USRATIN FENEDHIRATUN ‘ILA MEJSERATIN WE ‘EN TESEDDEKU HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
2.281: WE ETTEKU JEWMËN TURXHA’UNE FIHI ‘ILA LLAHI THUMME TUWEFFE KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
2.282: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA TEDAJENTUM BIDEJNIN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FEKTUBUHU WE LIEKTUB BEJNEKUM KATIBUN BIL-’ADLI WE LA JE’BE KATIBUN ‘EN JEKTUBE KAMA ‘AL-LEMEHU ALLAHU FELJEKTUB WE LIUMLILIL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHIL-HEKKU WE LIETTEKI LLAHE RABBEHU WE LA JEBHAS MINHU SHEJ’ËN FE’IN KANEL-LEDHI ‘ALEJHIL-HEKKU SEFIHËN ‘EW DA’IFËN ‘EW LA JESTETI’U ‘EN JUMIL-LE HUWE FELJUMLIL WELIJUHU BIL-’ADLI WE ESTESH/HIDU SHEHIDEJNI MIN RIXHALIKUM FE’IN LEM JEKUNA RAXHULEJNI FERAXHULUN WE EMRA’ETANI MIMMEN TERDAWNE MINE ESH-SHUHEDA’I ‘EN TEDIL-LE ‘IHDAHUMA FETUDHEKKIRA ‘IHDAHUMAL-’UHRA WE LA JE’BE ESH-SHUHEDA’U ‘IDHA MA DU’U WE LA TES’EMU ‘EN TEKTUBUHU SEGIRAN ‘EW KEBIRAN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIHI DHALIKUM ‘EKSETU ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘EKWEMU LILSHSHEHADETI WE ‘EDNA ‘ELLA TERTABU ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE TIXHARATEN HADIRATEN TUDIRUNEHA BEJNEKUM FELEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘ELLA TEKTUBUHA WE ‘ESH/HIDU ‘IDHA TEBEJA’TUM WE LA JUDARRA KATIBUN WE LA SHEHIDUN WE ‘IN TEF’ALU FE’INNEHU FUSUKUN BIKUM WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE JU’ALLIMUKUMU LLAHU WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
2.283: WE ‘IN KUNTUM ‘ALA SEFERIN WE LEM TXHIDU KATIBËN FERIHANUN MEKBUDETUN FE’IN ‘EMINE BE’DUKUM BE’DËN FELJU’UEDDIL-LEDHI E’UTUMINE ‘EMANETEHU WE LIETTEKI LLAHE RABBEHU WE LA TEKTUMU SHEHADETE WE MEN JEKTUMHA FE’INNEHU ‘ATHIMUN KALBUHU WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
2.284: LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘IN TUBDU MA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EW TUHFUHU JUHASIBKUM BIHI ALLAHU FEJEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
2.285: ‘AMANA RASULU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MIN RABBIHI WEL-MU’UMINUNE KUL-LUN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WE MELE’IKETIHI WE KUTUBIHI WE RUSULIHI LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MIN RUSULIHI WE KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA GUFRANEKE RABBENA WE ‘ILEJKAL-MESIR
2.286: LA JUKELLIFU ALLAHU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA LEHA MA KESEBET WE ‘ALEJHA MA EKTESEBET RABBENA LA TU’UAHIDHNA ‘IN NESINA ‘EW ‘EHTE’NA RABBENA WE LA TEHMIL ‘ALEJNA ‘ISRAN KAMA HEMELTEHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLINA RABBENA WE LA TUHEMMILNA MA LA TAKATE LENA BIHI WE A’FU ‘ANNA WE EGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA ‘ENTE MEWLANA FENSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KEFIRIN

3.3: NEZZELE ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI WE ‘ENZELET-TEWRATE WEL-’INXHIL
3.4: MIN KABLU HUDAN LILNNASI WE ‘ENZALEL-FURKANE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI LEHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
3.5: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHFE ‘ALEJHI SHEJ’UN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FI SEMA’
3.6: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSEWWIRUKUM FIL-’ERHAMI KEJFE JESHA’U LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.7: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE MINHU ‘AJATUN MUHKAMATUN HUNNE ‘UMMUL-KITABI WE ‘UHARU MUTES'HABIHATUN FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM ZEJGUN FEJETTEBI’UNE MA TESHABEHE MINHU EBTIGA’AL-FITNETI WE EBTIGA’E TE’WILIHI WE MA JA’LEMU TE’WILEHU ‘IL-LALLAHU WE RASIHUNE FIL-’ILMI JAKULUNE ‘AMANNA BIHI KUL-LUN MIN ‘INDI RABBINA WE MA JEDHDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA ‘ULUL-’ELBEB
3.8: RABBENA LA TUZIG KULUBENA BE’DE ‘IDH HEDEJTENA WE HEB LENA MIN LEDUNKE RAHMETEN ‘INNEKE ‘ENTAL-WEHHAB
3.9: RABBENA ‘INNEKE XHAMI’U NASI LIJEWMIN LA RAJBE FIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHLIFUL-MI’AD
3.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWELUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘ULË’IKE HUM WE KUDU NAR
3.11: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FE’EHADHEHUMU LLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM WA-LLAHU SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
3.12: KUL LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU SETUGLEBUNE WE TUHSHERUNE ‘ILA XHEHENNEME WE BI’SAL-MIHAD
3.13: KAD KANE LEKUM ‘AJETUN FI FI’ETEJNIT-TEKATA FI’ETUN TUKATILU FI SEBILI -LEHI WE ‘UHRA KAFIRATUN JERAWNEHUM MITHLEJHIM RA’JAL-’AJNI WA-LLAHU JU’UEJJIDU BINESRIHI MEN JESHA’U ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LA’IBRATEN LI’WLIL-’EBSAR
3.14: ZUJJINE LILNNASI HUBBU SHEHEWETI MINE NISA’ WEL-BENINE WEL-KANATIRIL-MUKANTERATI MINE EDH-DHEHEBI WEL-FIDDETI WEL-HAJLIL-MUSEWWEMETI WEL-’EN’AMI WEL-HERTHI DHALIKE META’UL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WA-LLAHU ‘INDEHU HUSNUL-ME’AB
3.15: KUL ‘E’UUNEBBI’UKUM BIHAJRIN MIN DHALIKUM LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘INDE RABBIHIM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE ‘EZWEXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE RIDWENUN MINELLAHI WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIL-’IBED
3.16: EL-LEDHINE JAKULUNE RABBENA ‘INNENA ‘AMANNA FEGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE KINA ‘ADHABE NAR
3.17: SABIRINE WE SADIKINE WEL-KANITINE WEL-MUNFIKINE WEL-MUSTEGFIRINE BIL-’ESHAR
3.18: SHEHIDAL-LAHU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WEL-MELE’IKETU WE ‘ULUL-’ILMI KA’IMËN BIL-KISTI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.19: ‘INNE DIJNE ‘IND-ALLAHIL-’ISLAMU WE MA EHTELEFEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEG'JËN BEJNEHUM WE MEN JEKFUR BI’AJATI LEHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
3.20: FE’IN HAXHXHUKE FEKUL ‘ESLEMTU WEXHHIJE LIL-LAHI WE MENI ETTEBE’ANI WE KUL LIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE WEL-’UMMIJINE ‘E’ESLEMTUM FE’IN ‘ESLEMU FEKADI EHTEDEW WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNAMA ‘ALEJKAL-BELAGU WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIL-’IBED
3.21: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE JEKTULUNE NEBIJINE BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE JEKTULUNEL-LEDHINE JE’MURUNE BIL-KISTI MINE NASI FEBESHSHIRHUM BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
3.22: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.23: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JUD’AWNE ‘ILA KITABI LEHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM THUMME JETEWELLA FERIKUN MINHUM WE HUM MU’RIDUN
3.24: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LEN TEMESSENA NARU ‘IL-LA ‘EJJAMËN MA’DUDATIN WE GARRAHUM FI DINIHIM MA KENU JEFTERUN
3.25: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA XHEMA’NAHUM LIJEWMIN LA RAJBE FIHI WE WUFFIJET KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
3.26: KULIL-LEHUMME MALIKAL-MULKI TU’UTIL-MULKE MEN TESHA’U WE TENZI’UL-MULKE MIMMEN TESHA’U WE TU’IZZU MEN TESHA’U WE TUDHILLU MEN TESHA’U BIJEDIKAL-HAJRU ‘INNEKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.27: TULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE TULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE TUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE TUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE TERZUKU MEN TESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
3.28: LA JETTEHIDHIL-MU’UMINUNAL-KEFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FELEJSE MINELLAHI FI SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA ‘EN TETTEKU MINHUM TUKËTEN WE JUHEDHDHIRUKUMU LLAHU NEFSEHU WE ‘ILA LLAHIL-MESIR
3.29: KUL ‘IN TUHFU MA FI SUDURIKUM ‘EW TUBDUHU JA’LEMHU ALLAHU WE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.30: JEWME TEXHIDU KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET MIN HAJRIN MUHDERAN WE MA ‘AMILET MIN SU’IN TEWEDDU LEW ‘ENNE BEJNEHA WE BEJNEHU ‘EMEDËN BE’IDËN WE JUHEDHDHIRUKUMU LLAHU NEFSEHU WA-LLAHU RA’UFUN BIL-’IBED
3.31: KUL ‘IN KUNTUM TUHIBBUNA-LLAHE FE ETTEBI’UNI JUHBIBKUMU LLAHU WE JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.32: KUL ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-KEFIRIN
3.34: DHURRIJETEN BE’DUHA MIN BE’DIN WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.35: ‘IDH KALETI EMRA’ETU ‘IMRANE RABBI ‘INNI NEDHERTU LEKE MA FI BETNI MUHERRARAN FETEKABBEL MINNI ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
3.36: FELAMMA WEDE’AT/HA KALET RABBI ‘INNI WEDA’TUHA ‘UNTHA WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA WEDE’AT WE LEJSE EDH-DHEKERU KAL’UNTHA WE ‘INNI SEMMEJTUHA MERJEME WE ‘INNI ‘U’IDHUHA BIKE WE DHURRIJETEHA MINE SHEJTANI RAXHIM
3.37: FETEKABBELEHA RABBUHA BIKABULIN HESENIN WE ‘ENBETEHA NEBETËN HESENËN WE KEFFELEHA ZEKERIJA KUL-LEMA DEHALE ‘ALEJHA ZEKERIJAL-MIHRABE WEXHEDE ‘INDEHA RIZKËN KALE JA MERJEMU ‘ENNA LEKI HADHA KALET HUWE MIN ‘INDI LEHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
3.38: HUNALIKE DA’A ZEKERIJA RABBEHU KALE RABBI HEB LI MIN LEDUNKE DHURRIJETEN TEJJIBETEN ‘INNEKE SEMI’U DU’A’
3.39: FENADET/HUL-MELE’IKETU WE HUWE KA’IMUN JUSELLI FIL-MIHRABI ‘ENNA-LLAHE JUBESHSHIRUKE BIJEHJA MUSEDDIKËN BIKELIMETIN MINELLAHI WE SEJJIDËN WE HESURAN WE NEBIJËN MINE SALIHIN
3.40: KALE RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI GULËMUN WE KAD BELEGANIJAL-KIBERU WE EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRUN KALE KEDHELIKEL-LAHU JEF’ALU MA JESHA’
3.41: KALE RABBI EXH’AL LI ‘AJETEN KALE ‘AJETUKE ‘ELLA TUKELLIME NASE THALATHETE ‘EJJAMIN ‘IL-LA RAMZËN WE EDHKUR RABBEKE KETHIRAN WE SEBBIH BIL-’ASHIJI WEL-’IBKAR
3.42: WE ‘IDH KALETIL-MELE’IKETU JA MERJEMU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESTEFEKI WE TEHHERAKI WE ESTEFEKI ‘ALA NISA’IL-’ALEMIN
3.43: JA MERJEMU EKNUTI LIRABBIKI WE ESXHUDI WE ERKA’I ME’A RAKI’IN
3.44: DHALIKE MIN ‘NBE’IL-GAJBI NUHIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH JULKUNE ‘EKLAMEHUM ‘EJJUHUM JEKFULU MERJEME WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH JEHTESIMUN
3.45: ‘IDH KALETIL-MELE’IKETU JA MERJEMU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUBESHSHIRUKI BIKELIMETIN MINHU ESMUHUL-MESIHU ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME WEXHIHËN FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MINEL-MUKARRABIN
3.46: WE JUKELLIMU NASE FIL-MEHDI WE KEHLËN WE MINE SALIHIN
3.47: KALET RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI WELEDUN WE LEM JEMSESNI BESHERUN KALE KEDHALIKI ALLAHU JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U ‘IDHA KADA ‘EMRAN FE’INNAMA JAKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
3.49: WE RASULËN ‘ILA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ENNI KAD XHI’TUKUM BI’AJETIN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ENNI ‘EHLUKU LEKUM MINET-TINI KEHEJ’ETIT-TAJRI FE’ENFUHU FIHI FEJEKUNU TEJRAN BI’IDHNI LEHI WE ‘UBRI’UL-’EKMEHE WEL-’EBRASE WE ‘UHJIL-MEWTA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA TE’KULUNE WE MA TEDDEHIRUNE FI BUJUTIKUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMINJN
3.50: WE MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJJE MINET-TEWRATI WE LI’UHIL-LE LEKUM BE’DEL-LEDHI HURRIME ‘ALEJKUM WE XHI’TUKUM BI’AJETIN MIN RABBIKUM FE ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘ETI’UN
3.51: ‘INNALL-LLAHE RABBI WE RABBUKUM FE’BUDUHU HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
3.52: FELAMMA ‘EHESSE ‘ISA MINHUMUL-KUFRA KALE MEN ‘ENSARI ‘ILA LLAHI KALEL-HEWERIJUNE NAHNU ‘ENSARU LLAHI ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE ESH/HED BI’ENNA MUSLIMUN
3.53: RABBENA ‘AMANNA BIMA ‘ENZELTE WE ETTEBE’NA RASULE FEKTUBNA ME’A ESH-SHAHIDIN
3.54: WE MEKERU WE MEKERAL-LAHU WA-LLAHU HAJRUL-MAKIRIN
3.55: ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA ‘INNI MUTEWEFFIKE WE RAFI’UKE ‘ILEJJE WE MUTEHHIRUKE MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE XHA’ILUL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’UKE FEWKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJA METI THUMME ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’EHKUMU BEJNEKUM FIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
3.56: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FE’U’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.57: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUWEFFIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
3.59: ‘INNE METHELE ‘ISA ‘IND-ALLAHI KEMETHELI ‘ADEME HALEKAHU MIN TURABIN THUMME KALE LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
3.60: AL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUN MINEL-MUMTERIN
3.61: FEMEN HAXHXHEKE FIHI MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI FEKUL TA’ALEW NED’U ‘EBNA’ENA WE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE NISA’ENA WE NISA’EKUM WE ‘ENFUSENA WE ‘ENFUSEKUM THUMME NEBTEHIL FENEXH’AL LA’NETALLAHI ‘ALEL-KADHIBIN
3.62: ‘INNE HADHA LEHUWEL-KASESUL-HEKKU WE MA MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IL-LALLAHU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
3.64: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI TA’ALEW ‘ILA KELIMETIN SEWE’IN BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUM ‘ELLA NA’BUDE ‘IL-LALLAHE WE LA NUSHRIKE BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JETTEHIDHE BE’DUNA BE’DËN ‘ERBEBËN MIN DUNI LEHI FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKULU ESH/HEDU BI’ENNA MUSLIMUN
3.65: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LIME TUHAXHXHUNE FI ‘IBRAHIME WE MA ‘UNZILETIT-TEWRATU WEL-’INXHILU ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DIHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
3.66: HA’ENTUM HA’UULË’ HAXHEXHTUM FIMA LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN FELIME TUHAXHXHUNE FIMA LEJSE LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
3.67: MA KANE ‘IBRAHIMU JEHUDIJËN WE LA NESRANIJËN WE LAKIN KANE HENIFËN MUSLIMËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
3.68: ‘INNE ‘EWLA NASI BI’IBRAHIME LELLEDHINE ETTEBE’UHU WE HEDHA NEBIJU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WA-LLAHU WE LIJUL-MU’UMININ
3.69: WEDDET TA’IFETUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEW JUDIL-LUNEKUM WE MA JUDIL-LUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ANFUSAHUM WE MA JESH’URU
3.70: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LIME TEKFURUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE ‘ENTUM TESH/HEDUN
3.71: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LIME TELBISUNAL-HAKKA BIL-BETILI WE TEKTUMUNAL-HAKKA WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
3.72: WE KALET TA’IFETUN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘AMINU BIEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEXHHE NEHARI WE EKFURU ‘AHIRAHU LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
3.73: WE LA TU’UMINU ‘IL-LA LIMEN TEBI’A DINEKUM KUL ‘INNAL-HUDA HUDA ALLAHI ‘EN JU’UTA ‘EHEDUN MITHLE MA ‘UTITUM ‘EW JUHAXHXHUKUM ‘INDE RABBIKUM KUL ‘INNAL-FEDLE BIJEDI LEHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.74: JEHTESSU BIRAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
3.75: WE MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MEN ‘IN TE’MENHU BIKINTARIN JU’UEDDIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MINHUM MEN ‘IN TE’MENHU BIDINARIN LA JU’UEDDIHI ‘ILEJKE ‘IL-LA MA DUMTE ‘ALEJHI KA’IMËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LEJSE ‘ALEJNA FIL-’UMMIJINE SEBILUN WE JAKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.76: BELA MEN ‘EWFE BI’AHDIHI WE ETTEKA FE’INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
3.77: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESHTERUNE BI’AHDI LEHI WE ‘EJMANIHIM THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULË’IKE LA HALAKA LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI WE LA JUKELLIMUHUMU LLAHU WE LA JENDHURU ‘ILEJHIM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE LA JUZEKKIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.78: WE ‘INNE MINHUM LEFERIKËN JELWUNE ‘ELSINETEHUM BIL-KITABI LITEHSEBUHU MINEL-KITABI WE MA HUWE MINEL-KITABI WE JAKULUNE HUWE MIN ‘INDI LEHI WE MA HUWE MIN ‘INDI LEHI WE JAKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.79: MA KANE LIBESHERIN ‘EN JU’UTIJEHU ALLAHUL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE THUMME JEKULE LILNNASI KUNU ‘IBEDËN LI MIN DUNI LEHI WE LAKIN KUNU RABBENIJINE BIMA KUNTUM TU’ALLIMUNAL-KITABE WE BIMA KUNTUM TEDRUSUN
3.80: WE LA JE’MURAKUM ‘EN TETTEHIDHUL-MELE’IKETE WE NEBIJINE ‘ERBEBËN ‘EJE’MURUKUM BIL-KUFRI BE’DE ‘IDH ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
3.81: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHE-LLAHU MITHAKA NEBIJINE LEMA ‘ATEJTUKUM MIN KITABIN WE HIKMETIN THUMME XHA’EKUM RASULUN MUSEDDIKUN LIMA ME’AKUM LETU’UMINUNNE BIHI WE LETENSURUNNEHU KALE ‘E’EKRARTUM WE ‘EHADHTUM ‘ALA DHALIKUM ‘ISRI KALU ‘EKRARNA KALE FESH/HEDU WE ‘ENA ME’AKUM MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
3.82: FEMEN TEWELLA BE’DE DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-FESIKUN
3.83: ‘EFEGAJRA DINI LEHI JEBGUNE WE LEHU ‘ESLEME MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI TEW’ËN WE KERHËN WE ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UN
3.84: KUL ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ALA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBETI WE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA WE ‘ISA WE NEBIJUNE MIN RABBIHIM LA NUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM WE NAHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
3.85: WE MEN JEBTEGI GAJRAL-’ISLAMI DINËN FELEN JUKBELE MINHU WE HUWE FIL-’AHIRATI MINEL-HASIRIN
3.86: KEJFE JEHDI ALLAHU KAWMËN KEFERU BE’DE ‘IMANIHIM WE SHEHIDU ‘ENNE RASULE HEKKUN WE XHA’EHUMUL-BEJJINATU WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
3.88: HALIDINE FIHË LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
3.89: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE TABU MIN BE’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.90: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BE’DE ‘IMANIHIM THUMME EZDADU KUFRAN LEN TUKBELE TEWBETUHUM WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMU DALLUN
3.91: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE MATU WE HUM KUFFERUN FELEN JUKBELE MIN ‘EHEDIHIM MIL’UL-’ARDI DHEHEBËN WE LEW EFTEDA BIHI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ALIMUN WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
3.92: LEN TENALUL-BIRRA HATTE TUNFIKU MIMMA TUHIBBUNE WE MA TUNFIKU MIN SHEJ’IN FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIHI ‘ALIMU
3.93: KUL-LUT-TA’AMI KANE HILLËN LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘IL-LA MA HERRAME ‘ISRA’ILU ‘ALA NEFSIHI MIN KABLI ‘EN TUNEZZELET-TEWRATU KUL FE’TU BIT-TEWRATI FETLUHA ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.94: FEMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE MIN BE’DI DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
3.95: KUL SEDEKEL-LEHU FE ETTEBI’U MIL-LETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
3.96: ‘INNE ‘EWWELE BEJTIN WUDI’A LILNNASI LELLEDHI BIBEKKETE MUBERAKËN WE HUDAN LIL’ALEMIN
3.97: FIHI ‘AJATUN BEJJINATUN MEKAMU ‘IBRAHIME WE MEN DEHALEHU KANE ‘AMINËN WE LIL-LEHI ‘ALA NASI HIXHXHUL-BEJTI MENI ESTETA’A ‘ILEJHI SEBILËN WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN ‘ANIL-’ALEMIN
3.98: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LIME TEKFURUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WA-LLAHU SHEHIDUN ‘ALA MA TA’MELUN
3.99: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LIME TESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI MEN ‘AMANA TEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE ‘ENTUM SHUHEDA’U WE MALLAHU BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
3.100: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TUTI’U FERIKËN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE JERUDDUKUM BE’DE ‘IMANIKUM KEFIRIN
3.101: WE KEJFE TEKFURUNE WE ‘ENTUM TUTLA ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATU LLAHI WE FIKUM RASULUHU WE MEN JA’TESIM BIL-LAHI FEKAD HUDIJE ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
3.102: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE HAKKA TUKATIHI WE LA TEMUTUNNE ‘IL-LA WE ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
3.103: WE A’TESIMU BIHEBLI LEHI XHEMI’ËN WE LA TEFERRAKU WE EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH KUNTUM ‘A’DA’EN FE’ELLEFE BEJNE KULUBIKUM FE’ESBEHTUM BINI’METIHI ‘IHWENËN WE KUNTUM ‘ALA SHEFE HUFRATIN MINE NARI FE’ENKADHEKUM MINHA KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
3.104: WE LTEKUN MINKUM ‘UMMETUN JED’UNE ‘ILAL-HAJRI WE JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
3.105: WE LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE TEFERRAKU WE EHTELEFU MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-BEJJINATU WE ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
3.106: JEWME TEBJEDDU WUXHUHUN WE TESWEDDU WUXHUHUN FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ESWEDDET WUXHUHUHUM ‘EKEFERTUM BE’DE ‘IMANIKUM FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
3.107: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE EBJEDDET WUXHUHUHUM FEFI RAHMETI LEHI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
3.108: TILKE ‘AJATU LLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HAKKI WE MALLAHU JURIDU DHULMËN LIL’ALEMIN
3.109: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
3.110: KUNTUM HAJRA ‘UMMETIN ‘UHRIXHET LILNNASI TE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE TENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LEW ‘AMANA ‘EHLUL-KITABI LEKANE HAJRAN LEHUM MINHUMUL-MU’UMINUNE WE ‘EKTHERUHUMUL-FESIKUN
3.111: LEN JEDURRUKUM ‘IL-LA ‘EDHEN WE ‘IN JUKATILUKUM JUWELLUKUMUL-’EDBERA THUMME LA JUNSERUN
3.112: DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMU EDH-DHIL-LETU ‘EJNE MA THUKIFU ‘IL-LA BIHEBLIN MINELLAHI WE HEBLIN MINE NASI WE BE’U BIGADEBIN MINELLAHI WE DURIBET ‘ALEJHIMUL-MESKENETU DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KENU JEKFURUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE JEKTULUNAL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KENU JA’TEDUN
3.113: LEJSU SEWE’EN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘UMMETUN KA’IMETUN JETLUNE ‘AJATI LEHI ‘ANA’AL-LEJLI WE HUM JESXHUDUN
3.114: JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE ‘ULË’IKE MINE SALIHIN
3.115: WE MA JEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FELEN JUKFERUHU WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIL-MUTTEKIN
3.116: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWELUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
3.117: METHELU MA JUNFIKUNE FI HEDHIHIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA KEMETHELI RIHIN FIHË SIRRUN ‘ESABET HERTHE KAWMIN DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM FE’EHLEKET/HU WE MA DHELEMEHUMU LLAHU WE LAKIN ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
3.118: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU BITANETEN MIN DUNIKUM LA JE’LUNEKUM HABELËN WE DDU MA ‘ANITTUM KAD BEDETIL-BEGDA’U MIN ‘EFWEHIHIM WE MA TUHFI SUDURUHUM ‘EKBERU KAD BEJJENNA LEKUMUL-’AJATI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’KILUN
3.119: HA’ENTUM ‘ULË’I TUHIBBUNEHUM WE LA JUHIBBUNEKUM WE TU’UMINUNE BIL-KITABI KUL-LIHI WE ‘IDHA LEKUKUM KALU ‘AMANNA WE ‘IDHA KHALAW ‘ADDU ‘ALEJKUMUL-’ENAMILE MINEL-GAJDHI KUL MUTU BIGAJDHIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
3.120: ‘IN TEMSESKUM HESENETUN TESU’UHUM WE ‘IN TUSIBKUM SEJJI’ETUN JEFRAHU BIHA WE ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU LA JEDURRUKUM KEJDUHUM SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITU
3.121: WE ‘IDH GADEWTE MIN ‘EHLIKE TUBEWWI’UL-MU’UMININE MEKA’IDE LILKITALI WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
3.122: ‘IDH HEMMET TA’IFETANI MINKUM ‘EN TEFSHALA WA-LLAHU WELIJUHUMA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
3.123: WE LEKAD NESERAKUMU LLAHU BIBEDRIN WE ‘ENTUM ‘EDHIL-LETUN FE ETTEKU LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
3.124: ‘IDH TEKULU LILMU’UMININE ‘ELEN JEKFIJEKUM ‘EN JUMIDDEKUM RABBUKUM BITHALATHETI ‘ALAFIN MINEL-MELE’IKETI MUNZELIN
3.125: BELA ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU WE JE’TUKUM MIN FEWRIHIM HADHA JUMDIDKUM RABBUKUM BIHAMSETI ‘ALAFIN MINEL-MELE’IKETI MUSEWWIMIN
3.126: WE MA XHE’ALEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA BUSHRA LEKUM WE LITETME’INNE KULUBUKUM BIHI WE MA NESRU ‘IL-LA MIN ‘INDI LEHIL-’AZIZIL-HEKIM
3.127: LIJEKTE’A TERAFËN MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EW JEKBITEHUM FEJENKALIBU HA’IBIN
3.128: LEJSE LEKE MINEL-’EMRI SHEJ’UN ‘EW JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘EW JU’ADHDHIBEHUM FE’INNAHUM DHALIMUN
3.129: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
3.130: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TE’KULU RIBE ‘ED’AFËN MUDA’AFETEN WE ETTEKU LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
3.132: WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
3.133: WE SARI’U ‘ILA MEGFIRATIN MIN RABBIKUM WE XHENNETIN ‘ARDUHA SEMAWETU WEL-’ERDU ‘U’IDDET LILMUTTAKIN
3.134: EL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE FI SERRA’I WE DERRA’I WEL-KADHIMINEL-GAJDHE WEL-’AFINE ‘ANI NASI WA-LLAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
3.135: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA FE’ALU FEHISHETEN ‘EW DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM DHEKERU LLAHE FESTEGFERU LIDHUNUBIHIM WE MEN JEGFIRU EDH-DHUNUBE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE LEM JUSIRRU ‘ALA MA FE’ALU WE HUM JA’LEMUN
3.136: ‘ULË’IKE XHEZA’UUHUM MEGFIRATUN MIN RABBIHIM WE XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE NI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
3.137: KAD HALET MIN KABLIKUM SUNENUN FESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
3.138: HADHA BEJANUN LILNNASI WE HUDAN WE MEW’IDHETUN LILMUTTAKIN
3.139: WE LA TEHINU WE LA TEHZENU WE ‘ENTUMUL-’A’LEWNE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
3.140: ‘IN JEMSESKUM KARHUN FEKAD MESSAL-KAWME KARHUN MITHLUHU WE TILKAL-’EJJAMU NUDAWILUHA BEJNE NASI WE LIJA’LEMAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE JETTEHIDHE MINKUM SHUHEDA’E WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
3.142: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TEDHULUL-XHENNETE WE LEMMA JA’LEMI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU MINKUM WE JA’LEME SABIRIN
3.143: WE LEKAD KUNTUM TETEMENNEWNL-MEWTE MIN KABLI ‘EN TELKAWHU FEKAD RA’EJTUMUHU WE ‘ENTUM TENDHURUN
3.144: WE MA MUHEMMEDUN ‘IL-LA RASULUN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHI RUSULU ‘EFE’IN MATE ‘EW KUTILE ENKALEBTUM ‘ALA ‘A’KABIKUM WE MEN JENKALIB ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI FELEN JEDURRA-LLAHE SHEJ’ËN WE SEJEXHZI ALLAHU ESH-SHAKIRIN
3.145: WE MA KANE LINEFSIN ‘EN TEMUTE ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI KITABËN MU’UEXHXHELËN WE MEN JURID THEWEBE DUN'JA NU’UTIHI MINHA WE MEN JURID THEWEBEL-’AHIRATI NU’UTIHI MINHA WE SENEXHZI ESH-SHAKIRIN
3.146: WE KE’EJJIN MIN NEBIJIN KATELE ME’AHU RIBBIJUNE KETHIRUN FEMA WEHENU LIMA ‘ESABEHUM FI SEBILI -LEHI WE MA DA’UFU WE MA ESTEKENU WA-LLAHU JUHIBBU SABIRIN
3.147: WE MA KANE KAWLEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU RABBENA EGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE ‘ISRAFENA FI ‘EMRINA WE THEBBIT ‘EKDAMENA WE ENSURNA ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KEFIRIN
3.148: FE’ATAHUMU LLAHU THEWEBE DUN'JA WE HUSNE THEWEBIL-’AHIRATI WA-LLAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
3.149: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TUTI’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU JERUDDUKUM ‘ALA ‘A’KABIKUM FETENKALIBU HASIRIN
3.150: BELI ALLAHU MEWLAKUM WE HUWE HAJRU NASIRIN
3.151: SENULKI FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE KEFERU RU’BE BIMA ‘ESHRAKU BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE ME’WEHUMU NARU WE BI’SE METHWE EDH-DHALIMIN
3.152: WE LEKAD SEDEKAKUMU LLAHU WE’DEHU ‘IDH TEHUSSUNEHUM BI’IDHNIHI HATTE ‘IDHA FESHILTUM WE TENAZA’TUM FIL-’EMRI WE ‘ASEJTUM MIN BE’DI MA ‘ERAKUM MA TUHIBBUNE MINKUM MEN JURIDU DUN'JA WE MINKUM MEN JURIDUL-’AHIRATE THUMME SERAFEKUM ‘ANHUM LIJEBTELIJEKUM WE LEKAD ‘AFE ‘ANKUM WA-LLAHU DHU FEDLIN ‘ALEL-MU’UMININ
3.153: ‘IDH TUS’IDUNE WE LA TELWUNE ‘ALA ‘EHEDIN WE RASULU JED’UKUM FI ‘UHRAKUM FE’ETHABEKUM GAMMËN BIGAMMIN LIKEJLA TEHZENU ‘ALA MA FETEKUM WE LA MA ‘ESABEKUM WA-LLAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
3.154: THUMME ‘ENZELE ‘ALEJKUM MIN BE’DIL-GAMMI ‘EMENETEN NU’ASËN JEGSHA TA’IFETEN MINKUM WE TA’IFETUN KAD ‘EHEMMET/HUM ‘ENFUSUHUM JEDHUNNUNE BIL-LAHI GAJRAL-HEKKI DHENNAL-XHAHILIJETI JAKULUNE HEL LENA MINEL-’EMRI MIN SHEJ’IN KUL ‘INNAL-’EMRA KUL-LEHU LIL-LAHI JUHFUNE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM MA LA JUBDUNE LEKE JAKULUNE LEW KANE LENA MINEL-’EMRI SHEJ’UN MA KUTILNA HAHUNA KUL LEW KUNTUM FI BUJUTIKUM LEBERAZEL-LEDHINE KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KATLU ‘ILA MEDAXHI’IHIM WE LIJEBTELIJAL-LAHU MA FI SUDURIKUM WE LIJUMEHHISE MA FI KULUBIKUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
3.155: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TEWEL-LEW MINKUM JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI ‘INNAMA ESTEZAL-LEHUMU SHEJTANU BIBE’DI MA KESEBU WE LEKAD ‘AFELLAHU ‘ANHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN HELIMU
3.156: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KALU LI’HWENIHIM ‘IDHA DERABU FIL-’ËRDI ‘EW KENU GUZZEN LEW KENU ‘INDENA MA MATU WE MA KUTILU LIJEXH’ALEL-LAHU DHALIKE HESRATEN FI KULUBIHIM WA-LLAHU JUHJI WE JUMITU WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
3.157: WE LE’IN KUTILTUM FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘EW MUTTUM LEMEGFIRATUN MINELLAHI WE RAHMETUN HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
3.158: WE LE’IN MUTTUM ‘EW KUTILTUM LE’ILA LLAHI TUHSHERUN
3.159: FEBIMA RAHMETIN MINELLAHI LINTE LEHUM WE LEW KUNTE FEDHDHËN GALIDHAL-KALBI LANFEDDU MIN HEWLIKE FE’FU ‘ANHUM WE ESTEGFIR LEHUM WE SHAWIRHUM FIL-’EMRI FE’IDHA ‘AZEMTE FETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTEWEKKILIN
3.160: ‘IN JENSURKUMU LLAHU FELA GALIBE LEKUM WE ‘IN JEHDHULKUM FEMEN DHEL-LEDHI JENSURUKUM MIN BE’DIHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
3.161: WE MA KANE LINEBIJIN ‘EN JEGUL-LE WE MEN JEGLUL JE’TI BIMA GAL-LE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI THUMME TUWEFFE KUL-LU NEFSIN MA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
3.162: ‘EFEMENI ETTEBE’A RIDWENALLAHI KEMEN BE’E BISEHATIN MINELLAHI WE ME’WEHU XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MESIR
3.163: HUM DERAXHATUN ‘IND-ALLAHI WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
3.164: LEKAD MENNAL-LAHU ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE ‘IDH BE’ATHE FIHIM RASULËN MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIHI WE JUZEKKIHIM WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘IN KENU MIN KABLU LEFI DALELIN MUBINI
3.165: ‘EWELEMMA ‘ESABETKUM MUSIBETUN KAD ‘ESEBTUM MITHLEJHA KULTUM ‘ENNA HADHA KUL HUWE MIN ‘INDI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.166: WE MA ‘ESABEKUM JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI FEBI’IDHNI LEHI WE LIJA’LEMAL-MU’UMININ
3.167: WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE NAFEKU WE KILA LEHUM TA’ALEW KATILU FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘EW EDFE’U KALU LEW NA’LEMU KITALËN LATTEBE’NAKUM HUM LILKUFRI JEWME’IDHIN ‘EKRABU MINHUM LIL’IMANI JAKULUNE BI’EFWHIHIM MA LEJSE FI KULUBIHIM WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JEKTUMUN
3.168: EL-LEDHINE KALU LI’HWENIHIM WE KA’ADU LEW ‘ETA’UNA MA KUTILU KUL FEDRA’U ‘AN ‘ENFUSIKUMUL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.169: WE LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KUTILU FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘EMWETËN BEL ‘EHJA’UN ‘INDE RABBIHIM JURZEKUN
3.170: FERIHINE BIMA ‘ATAHUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE JESTEBSHIRUNE BIEL-LEDHINE LEM JELHEKU BIHIM MIN HALFIHIM ‘ELLA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
3.171: JESTEBSHIRUNE BINI’METIN MINELLAHI WE FEDLIN WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MU’UMININ
3.172: EL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIL-LAHI WE RASULI MIN BE’DI MA ‘ESABEHUMUL-KARHU LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU MINHUM WE ETTEKAW ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
3.173: EL-LEDHINE KALE LEHUMU NASU ‘INNE NASE KAD XHEMA’U LEKUM FEHSHEWHUM FEZADEHUM ‘IMANËN WE KALU HESBUNALLAHU WE NI’MAL-WEKIL
3.174: FENKALEBU BINI’METIN MINELLAHI WE FEDLIN LEM JEMSES/HUM SU’UN WE ETTEBE’U RIDWENALLAHI WA-LLAHU DHU FEDLIN ‘ADHIMI
3.175: ‘INNAMA DHELIKUMU SHEJTANU JUHAWWIFU ‘EWLIJA’EHU FELA TEHAFUHUM WE HAFUNI ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
3.176: WE LA JEHZUNKEL-LEDHINE JUSARI’UNE FIL-KUFRI ‘INNAHUM LEN JEDURRU LLAHE SHEJ’ËN JURIDU ALLAHU ‘ELLA JEXH’ALE LEHUM HEDHDHËN FIL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
3.177: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ASHTARAWL-KUFRA BIL-’IMANI LEN JEDURRU LLAHE SHEJ’ËN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.178: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEMA NUMLI LEHUM HAJRUN LI’ENFUSIHIM ‘INNAMA NUMLI LEHUM LIJEZDADU ‘ITHMËN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
3.179: MA KANAL-LAHU LIJEDHERAL-MU’UMININE ‘ALA MA ‘ENTUM ‘ALEJHI HATTE JEMIZAL-HABITHE MINET-TEJJIBI WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJUTLI’AKUM ‘ALEL-GAJBI WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JEXHTEBI MIN RUSULIHI MEN JESHA’U FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE ‘IN TU’UMINU WE TETTEKU FELEKUM ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
3.180: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE BIMA ‘ATAHUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI HUWE HAJRAN LEHUM BEL HUWE SHERRUN LEHUM SEJUTEWWEKUNE MA BEHILU BIHI JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE LIL-LEHI MIRATHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
3.181: LEKAD SEMI’ALLAHU KAWLEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE FEKIRUN WE NAHNU ‘EGNIJA’U SENEKTUBU MA KALU WE KATLEHUMUL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE NEKULU DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
3.182: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIKUM WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LEJSE BIDHAL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
3.183: EL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AHIDE ‘ILEJNA ‘ELLA NU’UMINE LIRASULIN HATTE JE’TIJENA BIKURBENIN TE’KULUHU NARU KUL KAD XHA’EKUM RUSULUN MIN KABLI BIL-BEJJINETI WE BIEL-LEDHI KULTUM FELIME KATELTUMUHUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
3.184: FE’IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKAD KUDHDHIBE RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE XHA’U BIL-BEJJINETI WE EZ-ZUBURI WEL-KITABIL-MUNIR
3.185: KUL-LU NEFSIN DHA’IKATUL-MEWTI WE ‘INNAMA TUWEFFEWNE ‘UXHURAKUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FEMEN ZUHZIHE ‘ANI NARI WE ‘UDHILAL-XHENNETE FEKAD FEZE WE MAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA ‘IL-LA META’UL-GURUR
3.186: LETUBLEWUNNE FI ‘EMWELIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM WE LETESMA’UNNE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WE MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘EDHEN KETHIRAN WE ‘IN TESBIRU WE TETTEKU FE’INNE DHALIKE MIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
3.187: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHE-LLAHU MITHAKEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE LETUBEJJINUNNEHU LILNNASI WE LA TEKTUMUNEHU FENEBEDHUHU WERA’E DHUHURIHIM WE ASHTARAW BIHI THEMENËN KALILËN FEBI’SE MA JESHTERUN
3.188: LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE JEFRAHUNE BIMA ‘ETEW WE JUHIBBUNE ‘EN JUHMEDU BIMA LEM JEF’ALU FELA TEHSEBENNEHUM BIMEFEZETIN MINEL-’ADHABI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
3.189: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
3.190: ‘INNE FI HALKI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI LE’AJATIN LI’WLIL-’ELBEB
3.191: EL-LEDHINE JEDHKURUNA-LLAHE KIJAMËN WE KU’UDËN WE ‘ALA XHUNUBIHIM WE JETEFEKKERUNE FI HALKI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI RABBENA MA HALEKTE HADHA BETILËN SUBHANEKE FEKINA ‘ADHABE NAR
3.192: RABBENA ‘INNEKE MEN TUDHILI NARA FEKAD ‘EHZEJTEHU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
3.193: RABBENA ‘INNENA SEMI’NA MUNADIËN JUNADI LIL’IMANI ‘EN ‘AMINU BIRABBIKUM FE’AMANNA RABBENA FEGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA WE KEFFIR ‘ANNA SEJJI’ATINA WE TEWEFFENA ME’AL-’EBRAR
3.194: RABBENA WE ‘ATINA MA WE’ADTENA ‘ALA RUSULIKE WE LA TUHZINA JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘INNEKE LA TUHLIFUL-MI’AD
3.195: FESTEXHABE LEHUM RABBUHUM ‘ENNI LA ‘UDI’U ‘AMELE ‘AMILIN MINKUM MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA BE’DUKUM MIN BE’DIN FE-EL-LEDHINE HAXHERU WE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIJARIHIM WE ‘UDHU FI SEBILI WE KATELU WE KUTILU LE’UKEFFIRANNE ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LE’UDHILENNEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU THEWEBËN MIN ‘INDI LEHI WA-LLAHU ‘INDEHU HUSNU THEWEB
3.197: META’UN KALILUN THUMME ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MIHAD
3.198: LAKINIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM LEHUM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË NUZULËN MIN ‘INDI LEHI WE MA ‘IND-ALLAHI HAJRUN LIL’EBRAR
3.199: WE ‘INNE MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LEMEN JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHIM HASHI’INE LIL-LAHI LA JESHTERUNE BI’AJATI LEHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
3.200: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESBIRU WE SABIRU WE RABITU WE ETTEKU LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN

4.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUMUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WEHIDETIN WE HALEKA MINHA ZEWXHEHA WE BETHTHE MINHUMA RIXHALËN KETHIRAN WE NISA’EN WE ETTEKU LLAHEL-LEDHI TETESA’ELUNE BIHI WEL-’ERHAME ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALEJKUM RAKIBË
4.2: WE ‘ATUL-JETAMA ‘EMWELEHUM WE LA TETEBEDDELUL-HABITHE BIT-TEJJIBI WE LA TE’KULU ‘EMWELEHUM ‘ILA ‘EMWELIKUM ‘INNEHU KANE HUBËN KEBIRA
4.3: WE ‘IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA TUKSITU FIL-JETAMA FENKIHU MA TABE LEKUM MINE NISA’ METHNA WE THULËTHE WE RUBE’A FE’IN HIFTUM ‘ELLA TA’DILU FEWEHIDETEN ‘EW MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘ELLA TA’UL
4.4: WE ‘ATU NISA’ SEDUKATIHINNE NIHLETEN FE’IN TIBNE LEKUM ‘AN SHEJ’IN MINHU NEFSËN FEKULUHU HENI’ËN MERI’Ë
4.5: WE LA TU’UTU SUFEHA’E ‘EMWELEKUMU AL-LETI XHE’ALEL-LAHU LEKUM KIJAMËN WE ERZUKUHUM FIHË WE EKSUHUM WE KULU LEHUM KAWLËN MA’RUFË
4.6: WE EBTELUL-JETAMA HATTE ‘IDHA BELEGU NIKAHE FE’IN ‘ANESTUM MINHUM RUSHDËN FEDFE’U ‘ILEJHIM ‘EMWELEHUM WE LA TE’KULUHA ‘ISRAFËN WE BIDARAN ‘EN JEKBERU WE MEN KANE GANIJËN FELJESTA’FIF WE MEN KANE FEKIRAN FELJE’KUL BIL-MA’RUFI FE’IDHA DEFE’TUM ‘ILEJHIM ‘EMWELEHUM FE’ESH/HIDU ‘ALEJHIM WE KEFE BIL-LAHI HESIBË
4.7: LILRRIXHALI NESIBUN MIMMA TERAKAL-WELIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE WE LILNNISA’I NESIBUN MIMMA TERAKAL-WELIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE MIMMA KAL-LE MINHU ‘EW KETHURA NESIBËN MEFRUDË
4.8: WE ‘IDHA HEDERAL-KISMETE ‘ULUL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINU FERZUKUHUM MINHU WE KULU LEHUM KAWLËN MA’RUFË
4.9: WE LIEHSHEL-LEDHINE LEW TERAKU MIN HALFIHIM DHURRIJETEN DI’AFËN HAFU ‘ALEJHIM FELJETTEKU LLAHE WE LIEKULU KAWLËN SEDIDË
4.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JE’KULUNE ‘EMWELAL-JETAMA DHULMËN ‘INNAMA JE’KULUNE FI BUTUNIHIM NËRAN WE SEJESLEWNE SA’IRA
4.11: JUSIKUMU LLAHU FI ‘EWLADIKUM LILDHDHEKERI MITHLU HEDHDHIL-’UNTHEJEJNI FE’IN KUNNE NISA’EN FEWKA ETHNETEJNI FELEHUNNE THULUTHA MA TERAKE WE ‘IN KANET WEHIDETEN FELEHA NISFU WE LI’EBEWEJHI LIKUL-LI WEHIDIN MINHUMA SUDUSU MIMMA TERAKE ‘IN KANE LEHU WELEDUN FE’IN LEM JEKUN LEHU WELEDUN WE WERITHEHU ‘EBEWEHU FELI’EMMIHI THULUTHU FE’IN KANE LEHU ‘IHWETUN FELI’EMMIHI SUDUSU MIN BE’DI WESIJETIN JUSI BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN ‘ABE’UUKUM WE ‘EBNA’UUKUM LA TEDRUNE ‘EJJUHUM ‘EKRABU LEKUM NEF’ËN FERIDETEN MINELLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.12: WE LEKUM NISFU MA TERAKE ‘EZWEXHUKUM ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEHUNNE WELEDUN FE’IN KANE LEHUNNE WELEDUN FELEKUMU RUBU’U MIMMA TERAKNE MIN BE’DI WESIJETIN JUSINE BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN WE LEHUNNE RUBU’U MIMMA TERAKTUM ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEKUM WELEDUN FE’IN KANE LEKUM WELEDUN FELEHUNNE THUMUNU MIMMA TERAKTUM MIN BE’DI WESIJETIN TUSUNE BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN WE ‘IN KANE RAXHULUN JURATHU KALELETEN ‘EW EMRA’ETUN WE LEHU ‘EHUN ‘EW ‘UHTUN FELIKUL-LI WEHIDIN MINHUMA SUDUSU FE’IN KENU ‘EKTHERA MIN DHALIKE FEHUM SHURAKA’U FI THULUTHI MIN BE’DI WESIJETIN JUSA BIHA ‘EW DEJNIN GAJRA MUDARRIN WESIJETEN MINELLAHI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HELIMU
4.13: TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI WE MEN JUTI’I LLAHE WE RASULEHU JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE DHELIKAL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
4.14: WE MEN JA’SI LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE JETE’ADDE HUDUDEHU JUDHILHU NËRAN HALIDËN FIHË WE LEHU ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
4.15: WEL-LATI JE’TINAL-FEHISHETE MIN NISA’IKUM FESTESH/HIDU ‘ALEJHINNE ‘ERBE’ATEN MINKUM FE’IN SHEHIDU FE’EMSIKUHUNNE FIL-BUJUTI HATTE JETEWEFFEHUNNAL-MEWTU ‘EW JEXH’ALEL-LAHU LEHUNNE SEBILË
4.16: WEL-LEDHANI JE’TIJANIHA MINKUM FE’ADHUHUMA FE’IN TABE WE ‘ESLEHA FE’A’RIDU ‘ANHUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE TEWWEBËN RAHIMË
