4.17: ‘INNAMAT-TEWBETU ‘ALA ALLAHI LIL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SU’E BIXHEHALETIN THUMME JETUBUNE MIN KARIBIN FE’ULË’IKE JETUBU ALLAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.18: WE LEJSETIT-TEWBETU LIL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI HATTE ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEHUMUL-MEWTU KALE ‘INNI TUBTUL-’ANE WE LEL-LEDHINE JEMUTUNE WE HUM KUFFERUN ‘ULË’IKE ‘A’TEDNA LEHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
4.19: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA JEHIL-LU LEKUM ‘EN TERITHU NISA’ KERHËN WE LA TA’DULUHUNNE LITEDH/HEBU BIBE’DI MA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TINE BIFEHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN WE ‘ASHIRUHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI FE’IN KERIHTUMUHUNNE FE’ASA ‘EN TEKRAHU SHEJ’ËN WE JEXH’ALEL-LAHU FIHI HAJRAN KETHIRA
4.20: WE ‘IN ‘ERADTUMU ESTIBDALE ZEWXHIN MEKANE ZEWXHIN WE ‘ATEJTUM ‘IHDAHUNNE KINTARAN FELA TE’HUDHU MINHU SHEJ’ËN ‘ETE’HUDHUNEHU BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.21: WE KEJFE TE’HUDHUNEHU WE KAD ‘EFDA BE’DUKUM ‘ILA BE’DIN WE ‘EHADHNE MINKUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
4.22: WE LA TENKIHU MA NEKEHE ‘ABE’UUKUM MINE NISA’ ‘IL-LA MA KAD SELEFE ‘INNEHU KANE FEHISHETEN WE MEKTËN WE SA’E SEBILË
4.23: HURRIMET ‘ALEJKUM ‘UMMEHATUKUM WE BENATUKUM WE ‘EHAWETUKUM WE ‘AMMATUKUM WE HALATUKUM WE BENATUL-’EHI WE BENATUL-’UHTI WE ‘UMMEHATUKUMUL-LATI ‘ERDA’NEKUM WE ‘EHAWETUKUM MINE RADA’ATI WE ‘UMMEHATU NISA’IKUM WE RABE’IBUKUMUL-LATI FI HUXHURIKUM MIN NISA’IKUMUL-LATI DEHALTUM BIHINNE FE’IN LEM TEKUNU DEHALTUM BIHINNE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM WE HALA’ILU ‘EBNA’IKUMUL-LEDHINE MIN ‘ESLABIKUM WE ‘EN TEXHMA’U BEJNAL-’UHTEJNI ‘IL-LA MA KAD SELEFE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.24: WEL-MUHSENATU MINE NISA’ ‘IL-LA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM KITABEL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM MA WERA’E DHALIKUM ‘EN TEBTEGU BI’EMWELIKUM MUHSININE GAJRA MUSAFIHINE FEMA ESTEMTA’TUM BIHI MINHUNNE FE’ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE FERIDETEN WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM FIMA TERADEJTUM BIHI MIN BE’DIL-FERIDETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.25: WE MEN LEM JESTETI’ MINKUM TEWLËN ‘EN JENKIHAL-MUHSENATIL-MU’UMINATI FEMIN MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM MIN FETEJATIKUMUL-MU’UMINATI WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’IMANIKUM BE’DUKUM MIN BE’DIN FENKIHUHUNNE BI’IDHNI ‘EHLIHINNE WE ‘ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE BIL-MA’RUFI MUHSENATIN GAJRA MUSAFIHËTIN WE LA MUTTEHIDHATI ‘EHDANIN FE’IDHA ‘UHSINNE FE’IN ‘ETEJNE BIFEHISHETIN FE’ALEJHINNE NISFU MA ‘ALEL-MUHSENATI MINEL-’ADHABI DHALIKE LIMEN HASHIJAL-’ANETE MINKUM WE ‘EN TESBIRU HAJRUN LEKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
4.26: JURIDU ALLAHU LIJUBEJJINE LEKUM WE JEHDIJEKUM SUNENEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM WE JETUBE ‘ALEJKUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
4.27: WA-LLAHU JURIDU ‘EN JETUBE ‘ALEJKUM WE JURIDUL-LEDHINE JETTEBI’UNE SHEHEWETI ‘EN TEMILU MEJLËN ‘ADHIMË
4.28: JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUHAFFIFE ‘ANKUM WE HULIKAL-’INSANU DA’IFË
4.29: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TE’KULU ‘EMWELEKUM BEJNEKUM BIL-BETILI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE TIXHARATEN ‘AN TERADIN MINKUM WE LA TEKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUM RAHIMË
4.30: WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE ‘UDWENËN WE DHULMËN FESEWFE NUSLIHI NËRAN WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRA
4.31: ‘IN TEXHTENIBU KEBE’IRA MA TUNHEWNE ‘ANHU NUKEFFIR ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE NUDHILKUM MUDHALËN KERIMË
4.32: WE LA TETEMENNEW MA FEDDALEL-LAHU BIHI BE’DEKUM ‘ALA BE’DIN LILRRIXHALI NESIBUN MIMMA EKTESEBU WE LILNNISA’I NESIBUN MIMMA EKTESEBNE WE ES’ELU LLAHE MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
4.33: WE LIKUL-LIN XHE’ALNA MEWELIJE MIMMA TERAKAL-WELIDANI WEL-’EKRABUNE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AKADET ‘EJMANUKUM FE’ATUHUM NESIBEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDË
4.34: RIXHALU KAWWEMUNE ‘ALA NISA’ BIMA FEDDALEL-LAHU BE’DEHUM ‘ALA BE’DIN WE BIMA ‘ENFEKU MIN ‘EMWELIHIM FELSSALIHATU KANITATUN HAFIDHATUN LILGAJBI BIMA HEFIDHE-LLAHU WEL-LATI TEHAFUNE NUSHUZEHUNNE FE’IDHUHUNNE WE EHXHURUHUNNE FIL-MEDAXHI’I WE EDRIBUHUNNE FE’IN ‘ETA’NEKUM FELA TEBGU ‘ALEJHINNE SEBILËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIJËN KEBIRA
4.35: WE ‘IN HIFTUM SHIKAKA BEJNIHIMA FEB’ATHU HEKEMËN MIN ‘EHLIHI WE HEKEMËN MIN ‘EHLIHA ‘IN JURIDA ‘ISLAHËN JUWEFFIKI ALLAHU BEJNEHUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HABIRA
4.36: WE A’BUDU LLAHE WE LA TUSHRIKU BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE BIL-WELIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE BIDHIL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WEL-XHARI DHIL-KURBE WEL-XHARIL-XHUNUBI WE SAHIBI BIL-XHENBI WE EBNI SEBILI WE MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU MEN KANE MUHTALËN FEHURA
4.37: EL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE WE JE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BUHLI WE JEKTUMUNE MA ‘ATAHUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE ‘A’TEDNA LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
4.38: WEL-LEDHINE JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUM RI’A’E NASI WE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LA BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MEN JEKUNI SHEJTANU LEHU KARINËN FESA’E KARINË
4.39: WE MADHA ‘ALEJHIM LEW ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKAHUMU LLAHU WE KANAL-LAHU BIHIM ‘ALIMË
4.40: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEDHLIMU MITHKALE DHERRATIN WE ‘IN TEKU HESENETEN JUDA’IFHA WE JU’UTI MIN LEDUNHU ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.41: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA XHI’NA MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN BISHEHIDIN WE XHI’NA BIKE ‘ALA HA’UULË’ SHEHIDË
4.42: JEWME’IDHIN JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE ‘ASEW RASULE LEW TUSEWWE BIHIMUL-’ERDU WE LA JEKTUMUNA-LLAHE HEDITHË
4.43: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKRABU SELËTE WE ‘ENTUM SUKARA HATTE TA’LEMU MA TEKULUNE WE LA XHUNUBËN ‘IL-LA ‘ABIRI SEBILIN HATTE TEGTESILU WE ‘IN KUNTUM MERDA ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN ‘EW XHA’E ‘EHEDUN MINKUM MINEL-GA’ITI ‘EW LAMESTUMU NISA’ FELEM TEXHIDU MA’EN FETEJEMMEMU SA’IDËN TEJJIBËN FEMSEHU BIWUXHUHIKUM WE ‘EJDIKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AFUWËN GAFURA
4.44: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JESHTERUNE DALELETE WE JURIDUNE ‘EN TEDIL-LU SEBIL
4.45: WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’A’DA’IKUM WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WELIJËN WE KEFE BIL-LAHI NESIRA
4.46: MINEL-LEDHINE HADU JUHERRIFUNAL-KELIME ‘AN MEWEDI’IHI WE JAKULUNE SEMI’NA WE ‘ASEJNA WE ESMA’ GAJRA MUSMA’IN WE RA’INA LEJJËN BI’ELSINETIHIM WE TA’NËN FI DINI WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM KALU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ESMA’ WE ENDHURNA LEKANE HAJRAN LEHUM WE ‘EKWEME WE LAKIN LE’ANEHUMU LLAHU BIKUFRIHIM FELA JU’UMINUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.47: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE ‘AMINU BIMA NEZZELNA MUSEDDIKËN LIMA ME’AKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN NETMISE WUXHUHËN FENERUDDEHA ‘ALA ‘EDBERIHA ‘EW NEL’ANEHUM KAMA LE’ANNA ‘ESHABE SEBTI WE KANE ‘EMRU LLAHI MEF’ULË
4.48: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEGFIRU ‘EN JUSHRAKE BIHI WE JEGFIRU MA DUNE DHALIKE LIMEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKADI EFTERA ‘ITHMËN ‘ADHIMË
4.49: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE JUZEKKUNE ‘ANFUSAHUM BELI ALLAHU JUZEKKI MEN JESHA’U WE LA JUDHLEMUNE FETILË
4.50: ENDHUR KEJFE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE KEFE BIHI ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.51: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE ‘UTU NESIBËN MINEL-KITABI JU’UMINUNE BIL-XHIBTI WET-TAGUTI WE JAKULUNE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU HA’UULË’ ‘EHDA MINEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SEBILË
4.52: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE LE’ANEHUMU LLAHU WE MEN JEL’ANI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU NESIRA
4.53: ‘EM LEHUM NESIBUN MINEL-MULKI FE’IDHËN LA JU’UTUNE NASE NEKIRA
4.54: ‘EM JEHSUDUNE NASE ‘ALA MA ‘ATAHUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI FEKAD ‘ATEJNA ‘ALE ‘IBRAHIMAL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘ATEJNAHUM MULKËN ‘ADHIMË
4.55: FEMINHUM MEN ‘AMANA BIHI WE MINHUM MEN SEDDE ‘ANHU WE KEFE BIXHEHENNEME SA’IRA
4.56: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATINA SEWFE NUSLIHIM NËRAN KUL-LEMA NEDIXHET XHULUDUHUM BEDDELNAHUM XHULUDËN GAJRAHA LIJEDHUKUL-’ADHABE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.57: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SENUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN LEHUM FIHË ‘EZWEXHUN MUTEHHERATUN WE NUDHILUHUM DHIL-LA DHELILË
4.58: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURUKUM ‘EN TU’UEDDUL-’EMANATI ‘ILA ‘EHLIHA WE ‘IDHA HEKEMTUM BEJNE NASI ‘EN TEHKUMU BIL-’ADLI ‘INNALL-LLAHE NI’IMMA JA’IDHUKUM BIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE SEMI’ËN BESIRA
4.59: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE ‘ULIL-’EMRI MINKUM FE’IN TENAZA’TUM FI SHEJ’IN FERUDDUHU ‘ILA LLAHI WE RASULI ‘IN KUNTUM TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI DHALIKE HAJRUN WE ‘EHSENU TE’WILË
4.60: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE JEZ’UMUNE ‘ENNEHUM ‘AMENU BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE JURIDUNE ‘EN JETEHAKEMU ‘ILAT-TAGUTI WE KAD ‘UMIRU ‘EN JEKFURU BIHI WE JURIDU SHEJTANU ‘EN JUDIL-LEHUM DALELËN BE’IDË
4.61: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM TA’ALEW ‘ILA MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU WE ‘ILA RASULI RA’EJTAL-MUNAFIKINE JESUDDUNE ‘ANKE SUDUDË
4.62: FEKEJFE ‘IDHA ‘ESABET/HUM MUSIBETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM THUMME XHA’UKE JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI ‘IN ‘ERADNA ‘IL-LA ‘IHSANËN WE TEWFIKË
4.63: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE JA’LEMU LLAHU MA FI KULUBIHIM FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM WE ‘IDHHUM WE KUL LEHUM FI ‘ENFUSIHIM KAWLËN BELIGË
4.64: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA LIJUTA’A BI’IDHNI LEHI WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘IDH DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM XHA’UKE FESTEGFERU LLAHE WE ESTEGFERA LEHUMU RASULU LEWEXHEDU LLAHE TEWWEBËN RAHIMË
4.65: FELA WE RABBIKE LA JU’UMINUNE HATTE JUHEKKIMUKE FIMA SHEXHERA BEJNEHUM THUMME LA JEXHIDU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM HERAXHËN MIMMA KADEJTE WE JUSAL-LIMU TESLIMË
4.66: WE LEW ‘ENNA KETEBNA ‘ALEJHIM ‘ENI EKTULU ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘EW EHRUXHU MIN DIJARIKUM MA FE’ALUHU ‘IL-LA KALILUN MINHUM WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM FE’ALU MA JU’ADHUNE BIHI LEKANE HAJRAN LEHUM WE ‘ESHEDDE TETHBITË
4.69: WE MEN JUTI’I LLAHE WE RASULE FE’ULË’IKE ME’EL-LEDHINE ‘EN’AMAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MINE NEBIJINE WE SIDDIKINE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’I WE SALIHINE WE HESUNE ‘ULË’IKE RAFIKË
4.71: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU HUDHU HIDHRAKUM FENFIRU THUBETIN ‘EW ENFIRU XHEMI’Ë
4.72: WE ‘INNE MINKUM LEMEN LEJUBETTI’ENNE FE’IN ‘ESABETKUM MUSIBETUN KALE KAD ‘EN’AMAL-LAHU ‘ALEJJE ‘IDH LEM ‘EKUN ME’AHUM SHEHIDË
4.73: WE LE’IN ‘ESABEKUM FEDLUN MINELLAHI LEJEKULENNE KE’EN LEM TEKUN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHU MEWEDDETUN JA LEJTENI KUNTU ME’AHUM FE’EFUZE FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
4.74: FELJUKATIL FI SEBILI -LEHIL-LEDHINE JESHRUNAL-HEJËTE DUN'JA BIL-’AHIRATI WE MEN JUKATIL FI SEBILI -LEHI FEJUKTEL ‘EW JEGLIB FESEWFE NU’UTIHI ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.75: WE MA LEKUM LA TUKATILUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI WEL-MUSTED’AFINE MINE RIXHALI WE NISA’ WEL-WILDANIL-LEDHINE JAKULUNE RABBENA ‘EHRIXHNA MIN HEDHIHIL-KARJETI EDH-DHALIMI ‘EHLUHA WE EXH’AL LENA MIN LEDUNKE WELIJËN WE EXH’AL LENA MIN LEDUNKE NESIRA
4.76: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUKATILUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUKATILUNE FI SEBILIT-TAGUTI FEKATILU ‘EWLIJA’E SHEJTANI ‘INNE KEJDE SHEJTANI KANE DA’IFË
4.77: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE KILA LEHUM KUFFU ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE FELAMMA KUTIBE ‘ALEJHIMUL-KITALU ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM JEHSHEWNE NASE KEHASHJETI LEHI ‘EW ‘ESHEDDE HASHJETEN WE KALU RABBENA LIME KETEBTE ‘ALEJNAL-KITALE LEWLA ‘EHHARTENA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN KUL META’U DUN'JA KALILUN WEL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIMENI ETTEKA WE LA TUDHLEMUNE FETILË
4.78: ‘EJNEMA TEKUNU JUDRIKKUMUL-MEWTU WE LEW KUNTUM FI BURUXHIN MUSHEJJEDETIN WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM HESENETUN JAKULU HEDHIHI MIN ‘INDI LEHI WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN JAKULU HEDHIHI MIN ‘INDIKE KUL KUL-LUN MIN ‘INDI LEHI FEMALI HA’UULË’L-KAWMI LA JEKADUNE JEFKAHUNE HEDITHË
4.79: MA ‘ESABEKE MIN HESENETIN FEMINELLAHI WE MA ‘ESABEKE MIN SEJJI’ETIN FEMIN NEFSIKE WE ‘ERSELNAKE LILNNASI RASULËN WE KEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
4.80: MEN JUTI’I RASULE FEKAD ‘ETA’A LLAHE WE MEN TEWELLA FEMA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHË
4.81: WE JAKULUNE TA’ATUN FE’IDHA BERAZU MIN ‘INDIKE BEJJETE TA’IFETUN MINHUM GAJREL-LEDHI TEKULU WA-LLAHU JEKTUBU MA JUBEJJITUNE FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.82: ‘EFELA JETEDEBBERUNAL-KUR’ANE WE LEW KANE MIN ‘INDI GAJRI LEHI LEWEXHEDU FIHI EHTILAFËN KETHIRA
4.83: WE ‘IDHË XHË’EHUM ‘EMRUN MINEL-’EMNI ‘EWIL-HAWFI ‘EDHA’U BIHI WE LEW RADDUHU ‘ILA RASULI WE ‘ILA ‘ULIL-’EMRI MINHUM LE’ALIMEHUL-LEDHINE JESTENBITUNEHU MINHUM WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU LATTEBE’TUMU SHEJTANE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.84: FEKATIL FI SEBILI -LEHI LA TUKELLEFU ‘IL-LA NEFSEKE WE HERRIDIL-MU’UMININE ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JEKUFFE BE’SEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WA-LLAHU ‘ESHEDDU BE’SËN WE ‘ESHEDDU TENKILË
4.85: MEN JESHFE’ SHEFE’ATEN HESENETEN JEKUN LEHU NESIBUN MINHA WE MEN JESHFE’ SHEFE’ATEN SEJJI’ETEN JEKUN LEHU KIFLUN MINHA WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUKITË
4.86: WE ‘IDHA HUJJITUM BITEHIJETIN FEHEJJU BI’EHSENE MINHA ‘EW RUDDUHA ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HESIBË
4.87: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE LEJEXHME’ANNEKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHI WE MEN ‘ESDEKU MINELLAHI HEDITHË
4.88: FEMA LEKUM FIL-MUNAFIKINE FI’ETEJNI WA-LLAHU ‘ERKESEHUM BIMA KESEBU ‘ETURIDUNE ‘EN TEHDU MEN ‘EDAL-LAL-LAHU WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU SEBILË
4.89: WE DDU LEW TEKFURUNE KAMA KEFERU FETEKUNUNE SEWE’EN FELA TETTEHIDHU MINHUM ‘EWLIJA’E HATTE JUHAXHIRU FI SEBILI -LEHI FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEHUDHUHUM WEKTULUHUM HEJTHU WEXHEDTUMUHUM WE LA TETTEHIDHU MINHUM WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
4.90: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE JESILUNE ‘ILA KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN ‘EW XHA’UKUM HESIRAT SUDURUHUM ‘EN JUKATILUKUM ‘EW JUKATILU KAWMEHUM WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LESELLETEHUM ‘ALEJKUM FELEKATELUKUM FE’INI A’TEZELUKUM FELEM JUKATILUKUM WE ‘ELKAW ‘ILEJKUMU SELEME FEMA XHE’ALEL-LAHU LEKUM ‘ALEJHIM SEBILË
4.91: SETEXHIDUNE ‘AHARINE JURIDUNE ‘EN JE’MENUKUM WE JE’MENU KAWMEHUM KUL-LE MA RUDDU ‘ILAL-FITNETI ‘URKISU FIHË FE’IN LEM JA’TEZILUKUM WE JULKU ‘ILEJKUMU SELEME WE JEKUFFU ‘EJDIJEHUM FEHUDHUHUM WEKTULUHUM HEJTHU THEKIFTUMUHUM WE ‘ULE’IKUM XHE’ALNA LEKUM ‘ALEJHIM SULTANËN MUBINË
4.92: WE MA KANE LIMU’UMININ ‘EN JEKTULE MU’UMINËN ‘IL-LA HATE’EN WE MEN KATELE MU’UMINËN HATE’EN FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN WE DIJETUN MUSAL-LEMETUN ‘ILA ‘EHLIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESSEDDEKU FE’IN KANE MIN KAWMIN ‘ADUWIN LEKUM WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN WE ‘IN KANE MIN KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN FEDIJETUN MUSAL-LEMETUN ‘ILA ‘EHLIHI WE TEHRIRU RAKABETIN MU’UMINETIN FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU SHEHRAJNI MUTETABI’AJNI TEWBETEN MINELLAHI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.93: WE MEN JEKTUL MU’UMINËN MUTE’AMMIDËN FEXHEZA’UUHU XHEHENNEMU HALIDËN FIHË WE GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI WE LE’ANEHU WE ‘E’ADDE LEHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ADHIMË
4.94: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA DERABTUM FI SEBILI -LEHI FETEBEJJENU WE LA TEKULU LIMEN ‘ELKA ‘ILEJKUMU SALAME LESTE MU’UMINËN TEBTEGUNE ‘ARADAL-HEJËTI DUN'JA FE’IND-ALLAHI MEGANIMU KETHIRATUN KEDHALIKE KUNTUM MIN KABLU FEMENNAL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM FETEBEJJENU ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRA
4.95: LA JESTEWIL-KA’IDUNE MINEL-MU’UMININE GAJRU ‘ULI DERARI WEL-MUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FEDDALEL-LAHUL-MUXHAHIDINE BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ALEL-KA’IDINE DERAXHETEN WE KULLËN WE’ADAL-LAHUL-HUSNA WE FEDDALEL-LAHUL-MUXHAHIDINE ‘ALEL-KA’IDINE ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.96: DERAXHATIN MINHU WE MEGFIRATEN WE RAHMETEN WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.97: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TEWEFFEHUMUL-MELE’IKETU DHALIMI ‘ENFUSIHIM KALU FIME KUNTUM KALU KUNNA MUSTED’AFINE FIL-’ËRDI KALU ‘ELEM TEKUN ‘ERDU LLAHI WESI’ATEN FETUHAXHIRU FIHË FE’ULË’IKE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE SA’ET MESIRA
4.98: ‘IL-LAL-MUSTED’AFINE MINE RIXHALI WE NISA’ WEL-WILDANI LA JESTETI’UNE HILETEN WE LA JEHTEDUNE SEBILË
4.100: WE MEN JUHAXHIR FI SEBILI -LEHI JEXHID FIL-’ËRDI MURAGAMËN KETHIRAN WE SE’ATEN WE MEN JEHRUXH MIN BEJTIHI MUHAXHIRAN ‘ILA LLAHI WE RASULIHI THUMME JUDRIK/HUL-MEWTU FEKAD WEKA’A ‘EXHRUHU ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.101: WE ‘IDHA DERABTUM FIL-’ËRDI FELEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEKSURU MINE SELËTI ‘IN HIFTUM ‘EN JEFTINEKUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘INNAL-KEFIRINE KENU LEKUM ‘ADUWËN MUBINË
4.102: WE ‘IDHA KUNTE FIHIM FE’EKAMTE LEHUMU SELËTE FELTEKUM TA’IFETUN MINHUM ME’AKE WE LIE’HUDHU ‘ESLIHETEHUM FE’IDHA SEXHEDU FELJEKUNU MIN WERA’IKUM WE LTE’TI TA’IFETUN ‘UHRA LEM JUSELLU FELJUSELLU ME’AKE WE LIE’HUDHU HIDHRAHUM WE ‘ESLIHETEHUM WEDDEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW TEGFULUNE ‘AN ‘ESLIHETIKUM WE ‘EMTI’ATIKUM FEJEMILUNE ‘ALEJKUM MEJLETEN WEHIDETEN WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘IN KANE BIKUM ‘EDHEN MIN METERIN ‘EW KUNTUM MERDA ‘EN TEDA’U ‘ESLIHETEKUM WE HUDHU HIDHRAKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘E’ADDE LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
4.103: FE’IDHA KADEJTUMU SELËTE FEDHKURU LLAHE KIJAMËN WE KU’UDËN WE ‘ALA XHUNUBIKUM FE’IDHA ETME’NENTUM FE’EKIMU SELËTE ‘INNE SELËTE KANET ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE KITABËN MEWKUTË
4.104: WE LA TEHINU FI EBTIGA’IL-KAWMI ‘IN TEKUNU TE’LEMUNE FE’INNAHUM JE’LEMUNE KAMA TE’LEMUNE WE TERXHUNE MINELLAHI MA LA JERXHUNE WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.105: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKAL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI LITEHKUME BEJNE NASI BIMA ‘ERAKEL-LEHU WE LA TEKUN LILHA’ININE HASIMË
4.106: WE ESTEGFIRI LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.107: WE LA TUXHADIL ‘ANIL-LEDHINE JEHTANUNE ‘ANFUSAHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU MEN KANE HAWWENËN ‘ETHIMË
4.108: JESTEHFUNE MINE NASI WE LA JESTEHFUNE MINELLAHI WE HUWE ME’AHUM ‘IDH JUBEJJITUNE MA LA JERDA MINEL-KAWLI WE KANAL-LAHU BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITË
4.109: HA’ENTUM HA’UULË’ XHADELTUM ‘ANHUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA FEMEN JUXHADILU LLAHE ‘ANHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘EM MEN JEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM WE KILË
4.110: WE MEN JA’MEL SU’ËN ‘EW JEDHLIM NEFSEHU THUMME JESTEGFIRI LLAHE JEXHIDI LLAHE GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.111: WE MEN JEKSIB ‘ITHMËN FE’INNAMA JEKSIBUHU ‘ALA NEFSIHI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.112: WE MEN JEKSIB HATI’ETEN ‘EW ‘ITHMËN THUMME JERMI BIHI BERI’ËN FEKADI EHTEMELE BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
4.113: WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKE WE RAHMETUHU LEHEMMET TA’IFETUN MINHUM ‘EN JUDIL-LUKE WE MA JUDIL-LUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ANFUSAHUM WE MA JEDURRUNEKE MIN SHEJ’IN WE ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘AL-LEMEKE MA LEM TEKUN TA’LEMU WE KANE FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKE ‘ADHIMË
4.114: LA HAJRA FI KETHIRIN MIN NEXHWEHUM ‘IL-LA MEN ‘EMERA BISEDEKATIN ‘EW MA’RUFIN ‘EW ‘ISLAHIN BEJNE NASI WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE EBTIGA’E MERDËTI LEHI FESEWFE NU’UTIHI ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.115: WE MEN JUSHAKIKI RASULE MIN BE’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUL-HUDA WE JETTEBI’ GAJRA SEBILIL-MU’UMININE NUWELLIHI MA TEWELLA WE NUSLIHI XHEHENNEME WE SA’ET MESIRA
4.116: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEGFIRU ‘EN JUSHRAKE BIHI WE JEGFIRU MA DUNE DHALIKE LIMEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKAD DAL-LE DALELËN BE’IDË
4.117: ‘IN JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI ‘IL-LA ‘INATHËN WE ‘IN JED’UNE ‘IL-LA SHEJTANËN MERIDË
4.118: LE’ANEHU ALLAHU WE KALE LE’ETTEHIDHENNE MIN ‘IBEDIKE NESIBËN MEFRUDË
4.119: WE LE’UDIL-LENNEHUM WE LE’UMENNIJENNEHUM WE LE’AMURANNEHUM FELEJUBETTIKUNNE ‘ADHANAL-’EN’AM WE LE’AMURANNEHUM FELEJUGAJJIRUNNE HALKEL-LEHI WE MEN JETTEHIDHI SHEJTANE WELIJËN MIN DUNI LEHI FEKAD HASIRA HUSRANËN MUBINË
4.120: JA’IDUHUM WE JUMENNIHIM WE MA JA’IDUHUMU SHEJTANU ‘IL-LA GURURA
4.121: ‘ULË’IKE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE LA JEXHIDUNE ‘ANHA MEHISË
4.122: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SENUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN WE’DALLAHI HEKKËN WE MEN ‘ESDEKU MINELLAHI KILË
4.123: LEJSE BI’EMANIJIKUM WE LA ‘EMANIJI ‘EHLIL-KITABI MEN JA’MEL SU’ËN JUXHZE BIHI WE LA JEXHID LEHU MIN DUNI LEHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
4.124: WE MEN JA’MEL MINE SALIHATI MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULË’IKE JEDHULUNAL-XHENNETE WE LA JUDHLEMUNE NEKIRA
4.125: WE MEN ‘EHSENU DINËN MIMMEN ‘ESLEME WEXHHEHU LIL-LAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN WE ETTEBE’A MIL-LETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE ETTEHADHE-LLAHU ‘IBRAHIME HALILË
4.126: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE KANAL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUHITË
4.127: WE JESTEFTUNEKE FI NISA’ KULI ALLAHU JUFTIKUM FIHINNE WE MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FIL-KITABI FI JETAMA NISA’L-LATI LA TU’UTUNEHUNNE MA KUTIBE LEHUNNE WE TERGABUNE ‘EN TENKIHUHUNNE WEL-MUSTED’AFINE MINEL-WILDANI WE ‘EN TEKUMU LILJETAMA BIL-KISTI WE MA TEF’ALU MIN HAJRIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIHI ‘ALIMË
4.128: WE ‘INI EMRA’ETUN HAFET MIN BE’LIHA NUSHUZËN ‘EW ‘I’RADËN FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHIMA ‘EN JUSLIHA BEJNEHUMA SULHËN WE SULHU HAJRUN WE ‘UHDIRATIL-’ENFUSU ESH-SHUHHE WE ‘IN TUHSINU WE TETTEKU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRA
4.129: WE LEN TESTETI’U ‘EN TA’DILU BEJNE NISA’ WE LEW HERASTUM FELA TEMILU KUL-LAL-MEJLI FETEDHERUHA KALMU’ALLEKATI WE ‘IN TUSLIHU WE TETTEKU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.130: WE ‘IN JETEFERRAKA JUGNI ALLAHU KULLA MIN SE’ATIHI WE KANAL-LAHU WESI’ËN HEKIMË
4.131: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE LEKAD WESSEJNEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WE ‘IJJAKUM ‘ENI ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE KANAL-LAHU GANIJËN HEMIDË
4.132: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.133: ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM ‘EJJUHA NASU WE JE’TI BI’AHARINE WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA DHALIKE KADIRA
4.134: MEN KANE JURIDU THEWEBE DUN'JA FE’IND-ALLAHI THEWEBU DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE KANAL-LAHU SEMI’ËN BESIRA
4.135: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUNU KAWWEMINE BIL-KISTI SHUHEDA’E LIL-LAHI WE LEW ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EWIL-WELIDEJNI WEL-’EKRABINE ‘IN JEKUN GANIJËN ‘EW FEKIRAN FE-ALLAHU ‘EWLA BIHIMA FELA TETTEBI’UL-HEWE ‘EN TA’DILU WE ‘IN TELWU ‘EW TU’RIDU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRA
4.136: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WEL-KITABIL-LEDHI NEZZELE ‘ALA RASULIHI WEL-KITABIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MIN KABLU WE MEN JEKFUR BIL-LAHI WE MELE’IKETIHI WE KUTUBIHI WE RUSULIHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI FEKAD DAL-LE DALELËN BE’IDË
4.137: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU THUMME ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU THUMME EZDADU KUFRAN LEM JEKUNI ALLAHU LIJEGFIRA LEHUM WE LA LIJEHDIJEHUM SEBILË
4.139: EL-LEDHINE JETTEHIDHUNAL-KEFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE ‘EJEBTEGUNE ‘INDEHUMUL-’IZZETE FE’INNAL-’IZZETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’Ë
4.140: WE KAD NEZZELE ‘ALEJKUM FIL-KITABI ‘EN ‘IDHA SEMI’TUM ‘AJATI LEHI JUKFERU BIHA WE JUSTEHZE’U BIHA FELA TEK’UDU ME’AHUM HATTE JEHUDU FI HEDITHIN GAJRIHI ‘INNEKUM ‘IDHËN MITHLUHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE XHAMI’UL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-KEFIRINE FI XHEHENNEME XHEMI’Ë
4.141: EL-LEDHINE JETERABBESUNE BIKUM FE’IN KANE LEKUM FETHUN MINELLAHI KALU ‘ELEM NEKUN ME’AKUM WE ‘IN KANE LILKEFIRINE NESIBUN KALU ‘ELEM NESTEHWIDH ‘ALEJKUM WE NEMNA’KUM MINEL-MU’UMININE FE-ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE LEN JEXH’ALEL-LAHU LILKEFIRINE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE SEBILË
4.142: ‘INNAL-MUNAFIKINE JUHADI’UNA-LLAHE WE HUWE HADI’UHUM WE ‘IDHA KAMU ‘ILA SELËTI KAMU KUSALA JURA’UNE NASE WE LA JEDHKURUNA-LLAHE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.143: MUDHEBDHEBINE BEJNE DHALIKE LA ‘ILA HA’UULË’ WE LA ‘ILA HA’UULË’ WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU SEBILË
4.144: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-KEFIRINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE ‘ETURIDUNE ‘EN TEXH’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ALEJKUM SULTANËN MUBINË
4.145: ‘INNAL-MUNAFIKINE FI DERKIL-’ESFELI MINE NARI WE LEN TEXHIDE LEHUM NESIRA
4.146: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE TABU WE ‘ESLEHU WE A’TESEMU BIL-LAHI WE ‘EHLESU DINEHUM LIL-LAHI FE’ULË’IKE ME’AL-MU’UMININE WE SEWFE JU’UTI ALLAHUL-MU’UMININE ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.147: MA JEF’ALU ALLAHU BI’ADHABIKUM ‘IN SHEKERTUM WE ‘AMENTUM WE KANAL-LAHU SHAKIRAN ‘ALIMË
4.148: LA JUHIBBU ALLAHUL-XHEHRA BIS-SU’I MINEL-KAWLI ‘IL-LA MEN DHULIME WE KANAL-LAHU SEMI’ËN ‘ALIMË
4.149: ‘IN TUBDU HAJRAN ‘EW TUHFUHU ‘EW TA’FU ‘AN SU’IN FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘AFUWËN KADIRA
4.150: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKFURUNE BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE JURIDUNE ‘EN JUFERRIKU BEJNALLAHI WE RUSULIHI WE JAKULUNE NU’UMINU BIBE’DIN WE NEKFURU BIBE’DIN WE JURIDUNE ‘EN JETTEHIDHU BEJNE DHALIKE SEBILË
4.152: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE LEM JUFERRIKU BEJNE ‘EHEDIN MINHUM ‘ULË’IKE SEWFE JU’UTIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
4.153: JES’ELUKE ‘EHLUL-KITABI ‘EN TUNEZZILE ‘ALEJHIM KITABËN MINE SEMA’I FEKAD SE’ELU MUSA ‘EKBERA MIN DHALIKE FEKALU ‘ERINA LLAHE XHEHRATEN FE’EHADHET/HUMU SA’IKATU BIDHULMIHIM THUMME ETTEHADHUL-’IXHLE MIN BE’DI MA XHA’ET/HUMUL-BEJJINATU FE’AFEWNA ‘AN DHALIKE WE ‘ATEJNA MUSA SULTANËN MUBINË
4.154: WE RAFE’NA FEWKAHUMUT-TURA BIMITHAKIHIM WE KULNA LEHUM EDHULUL-BEBE SUXHXHEDËN WE KULNA LEHUMU LA TA’DU FI SEBTI WE ‘EHADHNA MINHUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
4.155: FEBIMA NEKDIHIM MITHAKAHUM WE KUFRIHIM BI’AJATI LEHI WE KATLIHIMUL-’ENBIJA’E BIGAJRI HEKKIN WE KAWLIHIM KULUBUNA GULFUN BEL TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALEJHA BIKUFRIHIM FELA JU’UMINUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
4.156: WE BIKUFRIHIM WE KAWLIHIM ‘ALA MERJEME BUHTANËN ‘ADHIMË
4.157: WE KAWLIHIM ‘INNA KATELNAL-MESIHE ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME RASULËL-LAHI WE MA KATELUHU WE MA SELEBUHU WE LAKIN SHUBBIHE LEHUM WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIHI LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IL-LA ETTIBE’A EDH-DHENNI WE MA KATELUHU JEKINË
4.158: BEL RAFE’AHU ALLAHU ‘ILEJHI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.159: WE ‘IN MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI ‘IL-LA LEJU’UMINENNE BIHI KABLE MEWTIHI WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM SHEHIDË
4.160: FEBIDHULMIN MINEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIM TEJJIBETIN ‘UHIL-LET LEHUM WE BISEDDIHIM ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI KETHIRA
4.161: WE ‘EHDHIHIMU RIBE WE KAD NUHU ‘ANHU WE ‘EKLIHIM ‘EMWELE NASI BIL-BETILI WE ‘A’TEDNA LILKEFIRINE MINHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
4.162: LAKINI RASIHUNE FIL-’ILMI MINHUM WEL-MU’UMINUNE JU’UMINUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLIKE WEL-MUKIMINE SELËTE WEL-MU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-MU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI ‘ULË’IKE SENU’UTIHIM ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
4.163: ‘INNA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE KAMA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA NUHIN WE NEBIJINE MIN BE’DIHI WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WEL-’ESBETI WE ‘ISA WE ‘EJJUBE WE JUNUS WE HARUNE WE SULEJMANE WE ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE ZEBURA
4.164: WE RUSULËN KAD KASESNAHUM ‘ALEJKE MIN KABLU WE RUSULËN LEM NEKSUSHUM ‘ALEJKE WE KELLEMAL-LAHU MUSA TEKLIMË
4.165: RUSULËN MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE LI’LLA JEKUNE LILNNASI ‘ALA ALLAHI HUXHXHETUN BE’DE RUSULI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
4.166: LAKINI ALLAHU JESH/HEDU BIMA ‘ENZELE ‘ILEJKE ‘ENZELEHU BI’ILMIHI WEL-MELE’IKETU JESH/HEDUNE WE KEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
4.167: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI KAD DELLU DALELËN BE’IDË
4.168: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE DHELEMU LEM JEKUNI ALLAHU LIJEGFIRA LEHUM WE LA LIJEHDIJEHUM TERIKË
4.169: ‘IL-LA TERIKA XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRA
4.170: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUMU RASULU BIL-HAKKI MIN RABBIKUM FE’AMINU HAJRAN LEKUM WE ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
4.171: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LA TEGLU FI DINIKUM WE LA TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HAKKA ‘INNAMAL-MESIHU ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME RASULU LLAHI WE KELIMETUHU ‘ELKAHA ‘ILA MERJEME WE RUHUN MINHU FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI WE LA TEKULU THALATHETUN ENTEHU HAJRAN LEKUM ‘INNAMALLAHU ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN SUBHANEHU ‘EN JEKUNE LEHU WELEDUN LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WE KILË
4.172: LEN JESTENKIFEL-MESIHU ‘EN JEKUNE ‘ABDËN LIL-LAHI WE LAL-MELE’IKETUL-MUKARRABUNE WE MEN JESTENKIF ‘AN ‘IBEDETIHI WE JESTEKBIR FESEJEHSHURUHUM ‘ILEJHI XHEMI’Ë
4.173: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUWEFFIHIM ‘UXHURAHUM WE JEZIDUHUM MIN FEDLIHI WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE ESTENKEFU WE ESTEKBERU FEJU’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN WE LA JEXHIDUNE LEHUM MIN DUNI LEHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
4.174: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUM BURHANUN MIN RABBIKUM WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKUM NURAN MUBINË
4.175: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE A’TESEMU BIHI FESEJUDHILUHUM FI RAHMETIN MINHU WE FEDLIN WE JEHDIHIM ‘ILEJHI SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
4.176: JESTEFTUNEKE KULI ALLAHU JUFTIKUM FIL-KALELETI ‘INI EMRU’UUN HELEKE LEJSE LEHU WELEDUN WE LEHU ‘UHTUN FELEHA NISFU MA TERAKE WE HUWE JERITHUHA ‘IN LEM JEKUN LEHA WELEDUN FE’IN KANETA ETHNETEJNI FELEHUMA THULUTHANI MIMMA TERAKE WE ‘IN KENU ‘IHWETEN RIXHALËN WE NISA’EN FELILDHDHEKERI MITHLU HEDHDHIL-’UNTHEJEJNI JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘EN TEDIL-LU WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

5.1: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EWFU BIL-’UKUDI ‘UHIL-LET LEKUM BEHIMETUL-’EN’AMI ‘IL-LA MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM GAJRA MUHILLI SEJDI WE ‘ENTUM HURUMUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEHKUMU MA JURID
5.2: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUHILLU SHA’A’IRALLAHI WE LA SHEHRAL-HERAME WE LAL-HEDJE WE LAL-KALA’IDE WE LA ‘AMMINEL-BEJTAL-HERAME JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MIN RABBIHIM WE RIDWENËN WE ‘IDHA HELELTUM FESTADU WE LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHENE’ANU KAWMIN ‘EN SEDDUKUM ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI ‘EN TA’TEDU WE TA’AWENU ‘ALEL-BIRRI WET-TEKWE WE LA TA’AWENU ‘ALEL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWENI WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
5.3: HURRIMET ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETU WE DEMU WE LEHMUL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI LEHI BIHI WEL-MUNHANIKATU WEL-MEWKUDHETU WEL-MUTERADDIJETU WE NETIHETU WE MA ‘EKELE SEBU’U ‘IL-LA MA DHEKKEJTUM WE MA DHUBIHE ‘ALA NUSUBI WE ‘EN TESTEKSIMU BIL-’EZLAMI DHALIKUM FISKUNL-JEWME JE’ISEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN DINIKUM FELA TEHSHEWHUM WE EHSHEWNIL-JEWME ‘EKMELTU LEKUM DINEKUM WE ‘ETMEMTU ‘ALEJKUM NI’METI WE RADITU LEKUMUL-’ISLAME DINËN FEMENI EDTURRA FI MEHMESETIN GAJRA MUTEXHANIFIN L’ITHMIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.4: JES’ELUNEKE MADHA ‘UHIL-LE LEHUM KUL ‘UHIL-LE LEKUMUT-TEJJIBETU WE MA ‘ALLEMTUM MINEL-XHEWERIHI MUKELLIBINE TU’ALLIMUNEHUNNE MIMMA ‘AL-LEMEKUMU LLAHU FEKULU MIMMA ‘EMSEKNE ‘ALEJKUM WE EDHKURU ESMALLAHI ‘ALEJHI WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
5.5: AL-JEWME ‘UHIL-LE LEKUMUT-TEJJIBETU WE TA’AMUL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE HILLUN LEKUM WE TA’AMUKUM HILLUN LEHUM WEL-MUHSENATU MINEL-MU’UMINATI WEL-MUHSENATU MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM ‘IDHA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE MUHSININE GAJRA MUSAFIHINE WE LA MUTTEHIDHI ‘EHDANIN WE MEN JEKFUR BIL-’IMANI FEKAD HEBITE ‘AMELUHU WE HUWE FIL-’AHIRATI MINEL-HASIRIN
5.6: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA KUMTUM ‘ILA SELËTI FEGSILU WUXHUHEKUM WE ‘EJDIJEKUM ‘ILAL-MERAFIKI WE EMSEHU BIRU’USIKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM ‘ILAL-KA’BEJNI WE ‘IN KUNTUM XHUNUBËN FE ETTEHHERU WE ‘IN KUNTUM MERDA ‘EW ‘ALA SEFERIN ‘EW XHA’E ‘EHEDUN MINKUM MINEL-GA’ITI ‘EW LAMESTUMU NISA’ FELEM TEXHIDU MA’EN FETEJEMMEMU SA’IDËN TEJJIBËN FEMSEHU BIWUXHUHIKUM WE ‘EJDIKUM MINHU MA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJEXH’ALE ‘ALEJKUM MIN HERAXHIN WE LAKIN JURIDU LIJUTEHHIRAKUM WELIJUTIMME NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
5.7: WE EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE MITHAKAHUL-LEDHI WE ETHEKAKUM BIHI ‘IDH KULTUM SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
5.8: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KUNU KAWWEMINE LIL-LAHI SHUHEDA’E BIL-KISTI WE LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHENE’ANU KAWMIN ‘ALA ‘ELLA TA’DILU A’DILU HUWE ‘EKRABU LILTTEKWE WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
5.9: WE’ADAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
5.11: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH HEMME KAWMUN ‘EN JEBSUTU ‘ILEJKUM ‘EJDIJEHUM FEKEFFE ‘EJDIJEHUM ‘ANKUM WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
5.12: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHE-LLAHU MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE BE’ATHNA MINHUMU ETHNEJ ‘ASHERA NEKIBËN WE KALEL-LAHU ‘INNI ME’AKUM LE’IN ‘EKAMTUMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEJTUMU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘AMENTUM BIRUSULI WE ‘AZZERTUMUHUM WE ‘EKRADTUMU LLAHE KARDËN HESENËN LE’UKEFFIRANNE ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE LE’UDHILENNEKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU FEMEN KEFERA BE’DE DHALIKE MINKUM FEKAD DAL-LE SEWE’E SEBIL
5.13: FEBIMA NEKDIHIM MITHAKAHUM LE’ANNAHUM WE XHE’ALNA KULUBEHUM KASIJETEN JUHERRIFUNAL-KELIME ‘AN MEWEDI’IHI WE NESU HEDHDHËN MIMMA DHUKKIRU BIHI WE LA TEZALU TETTELI’U ‘ALA HA’INETIN MINHUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN MINHUM FE’FU ‘ANHUM WE ESFEH ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
5.14: WE MINEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNA NESARA ‘EHADHNA MITHAKAHUM FENESU HEDHDHËN MIMMA DHUKKIRU BIHI FE’EGRAJNA BEJNEHUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI WE SEWFE JUNEBBI’UHUMU LLAHU BIMA KENU JESNA’UN
5.15: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI KAD XHA’EKUM RASULUNA JUBEJJINU LEKUM KETHIRAN MIMMA KUNTUM TUHFUNE MINEL-KITABI WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRIN KAD XHA’EKUM MINELLAHI NURUN WE KITABUN MUBINU
5.16: JEHDI BIHI ALLAHU MENI ETTEBE’A RIDWENEHU SUBULE SALAMI WE JUHRIXHUHUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI BI’IDHNIHI WE JEHDIHIM ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
5.17: LEKAD KEFEREL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME KUL FEMEN JEMLIKU MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘IN ‘ERADE ‘EN JUHLIKAL-MESIHE EBNE MERJEME WE ‘UMMEHU WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA JHLUKU MA JESHA’U WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.18: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU WE NESARA NAHNU ‘EBNA’U LLAHI WE ‘EHIBBE’UUHU KUL FELIME JU’ADHDHIBUKUM BIDHUNUBIKUM BEL ‘ENTUM BESHERUN MIMMEN HALEKA JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
5.19: JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI KAD XHA’EKUM RASULUNA JUBEJJINU LEKUM ‘ALA FETRATIN MINE RUSULI ‘EN TEKULU MA XHA’ENA MIN BESHIRIN WE LA NEDHIRIN FEKAD XHA’EKUM BESHIRUN WE NEDHIRUN WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.20: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH XHE’ALE FIKUM ‘ENBIJA’E WE XHE’ALEKUM MULUKËN WE ‘ATAKUM MA LEM JU’UTI ‘EHEDËN MINEL-’ALEMIN
5.21: JA KAWMI EDHULUL-’ERDAL-MUKADDESETAL-LETI KETEBEL-LAHU LEKUM WE LA TERTEDDU ‘ALA ‘EDBERIKUM FETENKALIBU HASIRIN
5.22: KALU JA MUSA ‘INNE FIHË KAWMËN XHEBBERINE WE ‘INNA LEN NEDHULEHA HATTE JEHRUXHU MINHA FE’IN JEHRUXHU MINHA FE’INNA DAHILUN
5.23: KALE RAXHULËNI MINEL-LEDHINE JEHAFUNE ‘EN’AMAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIMA EDHULU ‘ALEJHIMUL-BEBE FE’IDHA DEHALTUMUHU FE’INNEKUM GALIBUNE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FETEWEKKELU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.24: KALU JA MUSA ‘INNA LEN NEDHULEHA ‘EBEDËN MA DAMU FIHË FEDH/HEB ‘ENTE WE RABBUKE FEKATILA ‘INNA HAHUNA KA’IDUN
5.25: KALE RABBI ‘INNI LA ‘EMLIKU ‘IL-LA NEFSI WE ‘EHI FEFRUK BEJNENA WE BEJNAL-KAWMIL-FESIKIN
5.26: KALE FE’INNEHA MUHERRAMETUN ‘ALEJHIM ‘ERBE’INE SENETEN JETIHUNE FIL-’ËRDI FELA TE’SE ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-FESIKIN
5.27: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’E EBNEJ ‘ADEME BIL-HAKKI ‘IDH KARRABE KURBENËN FETUKUBBILE MIN ‘EHEDIHIMA WE LEM JUTEKABBEL MINEL-’AHARI KALE LE’EKTULENNEKE KALE ‘INNAMA JETEKABBELU ALLAHU MINEL-MUTTEKIN
5.28: LE’IN BESETTE ‘ILEJJE JEDEKE LITEKTULENI MA ‘ENA BIBESITIN JEDIJE ‘ILEJKE LI’KTULEKE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU LLAHE RABBEL-’ALEMIN
5.29: ‘INNI ‘URIDU ‘EN TEBU’E BI’ITHMI WE ‘ITHMIKE FETEKUNE MIN ‘ES'HABI NARI WE DHELIKE XHEZA’U EDH-DHALIMIN
5.30: FETEWWE’AT LEHU NEFSUHU KATLE ‘EHIHI FEKATELEHU FE’ESBEHE MINEL-HASIRIN
5.31: FEBE’ATHAL-LAHU GURABËN JEBHETHU FIL-’ËRDI LIJURIJEHU KEJFE JUWERI SEW’ETE ‘EHIHI KALE JA WEJLETA ‘E’AXHEZTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MITHLE HADHAL-GURABI FE’UWERIJE SEW’ETE ‘EHI FE’ESBEHE MINE NADIMIN
5.32: MIN ‘EXHLI DHALIKE KETEBNA ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ENNEHU MEN KATELE NEFSËN BIGAJRI NEFSIN ‘EW FESADIN FIL-’ËRDI FEKE’ENNEMA KATELE NASE XHEMI’ËN WE MEN ‘EHJAHA FEKE’ENNEMA ‘EHJA NASE XHEMI’ËN WE LEKAD XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUNA BIL-BEJJINETI THUMME ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINHUM BE’DE DHALIKE FIL-’ËRDI LEMUSRIFUN
5.33: ‘INNAMA XHEZA’UL-LEDHINE JUHARIBUNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE JES’AWNE FIL-’ËRDI FESADËN ‘EN JUKATTELU ‘EW JUSELLEBU ‘EW TUKATTE’A ‘EJDIHIM WE ‘ERXHULUHUM MIN HILAFIN ‘EW JUNFEW MINEL-’ARDI DHALIKE LEHUM HIZJUN FI DUN'JA WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
5.34: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE TABU MIN KABLI ‘EN TEKDIRU ‘ALEJHIM FE’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.35: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE EBTEGU ‘ILEJHIL-WESILETE WE XHAHIDU FI SEBILIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.36: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW ‘ENNE LEHUM MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LIJEFTEDU BIHI MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MA TUKUBBILE MINHUM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.37: JURIDUNE ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINE NARI WE MA HUM BIHARIXHINE MINHA WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
5.38: WE SARIKU WE SARIKATU FEKTA’U ‘EJDIJEHUMA XHEZA’EN BIMA KESEBE NEKALËN MINELLAHI WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
5.39: FEMEN TABE MIN BE’DI DHULMIHI WE ‘ESLEHE FE’INNALL-LLAHE JETUBU ‘ALEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.40: ‘ELEM TA’LEM ‘ENNA-LLAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
5.41: JA ‘EJJUHA RASULU LA JEHZUNKEL-LEDHINE JUSARI’UNE FIL-KUFRI MINEL-LEDHINE KALU ‘AMANNA BI’EFWEHIHIM WE LEM TU’UMIN KULUBUHUM WE MINEL-LEDHINE HADU SEMMA’UNE LILKEDHIBI SEMMA’UNE LIKAWMIN ‘AHARINE LEM JE’TUKE JUHERRIFUNAL-KELIME MIN BE’DI MEWEDI’IHI JAKULUNE ‘IN ‘UTITUM HADHA FEHUDHUHU WE ‘IN LEM TU’UTEWHU FEHDHERU WE MEN JURIDI ALLAHU FITNETEHU FELEN TEMLIKE LEHU MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE LEM JURIDI ALLAHU ‘EN JUTEHHIRA KULUBEHUM LEHUM FI DUN'JA HIZJUN WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
5.42: SEMMA’UNE LILKEDHIBI ‘EKKALUNE LILSSUHTI FE’IN XHA’UKE FEHKUM BEJNEHUM ‘EW ‘A’RID ‘ANHUM WE ‘IN TU’RID ‘ANHUM FELEN JEDURRUKE SHEJ’ËN WE ‘IN HEKEMTE FEHKUM BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
5.43: WE KEJFE JUHEKKIMUNEKE WE ‘INDEHUMUT-TEWRATU FIHË HUKMU LLAHI THUMME JETEWEL-LEWNE MIN BE’DI DHALIKE WE MA ‘ULË’IKE BIL-MU’UMININ
5.44: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNAT-TEWRATE FIHË HUDAN WE NURUN JEHKUMU BIHA NEBIJUNEL-LEDHINE ‘ESLEMU LIL-LEDHINE HADU WE RABBENIJUNE WEL-’EHBERU BIMA ESTUHFIDHU MIN KITABI LEHI WE KENU ‘ALEJHI SHUHEDA’E FELA TEHSHEW NASE WE EHSHEWNI WE LA TESHTERU BI’AJATI THEMENËN KALILËN WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-KAFIRUN
5.45: WE KETEBNA ‘ALEJHIM FIHË ‘ENNE NEFSE BIN-NEFSI WEL-’AJNE BIL-’AJNI WEL-’ENFE BIL-’ENFI WEL-’UDHUNE BIL-’UDHUNI WE SINNE BIS-SINNI WEL-XHURUHE KISASUN FEMEN TESEDDEKA BIHI FEHUWE KEFFERATUN LEHU WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
5.46: WE KAFFEJNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM BI’ISA EBNI MERJEME MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINET-TEWRATI WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-’INXHILE FIHI HUDAN WE NURUN WE MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINET-TEWRATI WE HUDAN WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTAKIN
5.47: WE LIEHKUM ‘EHLUL-’INXHILI BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU FIHI WE MEN LEM JEHKUM BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-FESIKUN
5.48: WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKAL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI MINEL-KITABI WE MUHEJMINËN ‘ALEJHI FEHKUM BEJNEHUM BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWE’EHUM ‘AMMA XHA’EKE MINEL-HEKKI LIKUL-LIN XHE’ALNA MINKUM SHIR’ATEN WE MINHAXHËN WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LEXHE’ALEKUM ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN WE LAKIN LIJEBLUWEKUM FI MA ‘ATAKUM FESTEBIKUL-HAJRATI ‘ILA LLAHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
5.49: WE ‘ENI EHKUM BEJNEHUM BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWE’EHUM WE EHDHERHUM ‘EN JEFTINUKE ‘AN BE’DI MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU ‘ILEJKE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FE’LEM ‘ENNEMA JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUSIBEHUM BIBE’DI DHUNUBIHIM WE ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINE NASI LEFESIKUN
5.50: ‘EFEHUKMAL-XHAHILIJETI JEBGUNE WE MEN ‘EHSENU MINELLAHI HUKMËN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
5.51: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-JEHUDE WE NESARA ‘EWLIJA’E BE’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BE’DIN WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM MINKUM FE’INNEHU MINHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
5.52: FETEREL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN JUSARI’UNE FIHIM JAKULUNE NEHSHA ‘EN TUSIBENA DA’IRATUN FE’ASALLAHU ‘EN JE’TIJE BIL-FETHI ‘EW ‘EMRIN MIN ‘INDIHI FEJUSBIHU ‘ALA MA ‘ESERRU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM NADIMIN
5.53: WE JAKULUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EHA’UULË’L-LEDHINE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM ‘INNAHUM LEME’AKUM HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FE’ESBEHU HASIRIN
5.54: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MEN JERTEDDE MINKUM ‘AN DINIHI FESEWFE JE’TI ALLAHU BIKAWMIN JUHIBBUHUM WE JUHIBBUNEHU ‘EDHIL-LETIN ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE ‘A’IZZETIN ‘ALEL-KEFIRINE JUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI WE LA JEHAFUNE LEWMETE LA’IMIN DHALIKE FEDLU LLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
5.55: ‘INNAMA WE LIJUKUMU LLAHU WE RASULUHU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM RAKI’UN
5.56: WE MEN JETEWELLA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FE’INNE HIZBEL-LAHI HUMUL-GALIBUN
5.57: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEKUM HUZUEN WE LA’IBËN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLIKUM WEL-KUFFERA ‘EWLIJA’E WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.58: WE ‘IDHA NADEJTUM ‘ILA SELËTI ETTEHADHUHA HUZUEN WE LA’IBËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’KILUN
5.59: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI HEL TENKIMUNE MINNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE MA ‘UNZILE MIN KABLU WE ‘ENNE ‘EKTHERAKUM FESIKUN
5.60: KUL HEL ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BISHERRIN MIN DHALIKE METHUBETEN ‘IND-ALLAHI MEN LE’ANEHU ALLAHU WE GADIBE ‘ALEJHI WE XHE’ALE MINHUMUL-KIRADETE WEL-HANAZIRA WE ‘ABEDET-TAGUTE ‘ULË’IKE SHERRUN MEKANËN WE ‘EDELLU ‘AN SEWE’I SEBIL
5.61: WE ‘IDHË XHË’UKUM KALU ‘AMANNA WE KAD DEHALU BIL-KUFRI WE HUM KAD HARAXHU BIHI WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA KENU JEKTUMUN
5.62: WE TERA KETHIRAN MINHUM JUSARI’UNE FIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWENI WE ‘EKLIHIMU SUHTE LEBI’SE MA KENU JA’MELUN
5.63: LEWLA JENHAHUMU RABBENIJUNE WEL-’EHBERU ‘AN KAWLIHIMUL-’ITHME WE ‘EKLIHIMU SUHTE LEBI’SE MA KENU JESNA’UN
5.64: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU JEDU LLAHI MEGLULETUN GULLET ‘EJDIHIM WE LU’INU BIMA KALU BEL JEDAHU MEBSUTETANI JUNFIKU KEJFE JESHA’U WE LEJEZIDENNE KETHIRAN MINHUM MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE TUGJANËN WE KUFRAN WE ‘ELKAJNA BEJNEHUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI KUL-LEMA ‘EWKADU NËRAN LILHERBI ‘ETFE’EHALLAHU WE JES’AWNE FIL-’ËRDI FESADËN WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUFSIDIN
5.65: WE LEW ‘ENNE ‘EHLAL-KITABI ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEKEFFERNA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LE’EDHALNAHUM XHENNATI NA’IM
5.66: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM ‘EKAMUT-TEWRATE WEL-’INXHILE WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHIM MIN RABBIHIM LE’EKELU MIN FEWKIHIM WE MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIHIM MINHUM ‘UMMETUN MUKTESIDETUN WE KETHIRUN MINHUM SA’E MA JA’MELUN
5.67: JA ‘EJJUHA RASULU BELLIG MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE WE ‘IN LEM TEF’AL FEMA BELLEGTE RISALETEHU WA-LLAHU JA’SIMUKE MINE NASI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-KEFIRIN
5.68: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LESTUM ‘ALA SHEJ’IN HATTE TUKIMUT-TEWRATE WEL-’INXHILE WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM WE LEJEZIDENNE KETHIRAN MINHUM MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE TUGJANËN WE KUFRAN FELA TE’SE ‘ALEL-KAWMIL-KEFIRIN
5.69: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE SABI’UNE WE NESARA MEN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
5.70: LEKAD ‘EHADHNA MITHAKA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIM RUSULËN KUL-LEMA XHA’EHUM RASULUN BIMA LA TEHWE ‘ENFUSUHUM FERIKËN KEDHDHEBU WE FERIKËN JEKTULUN
5.71: WE HESIBU ‘ELLA TEKUNE FITNETUN FE’AMU WE SEMMU THUMME TABEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM THUMME ‘AMU WE SEMMU KETHIRUN MINHUM WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIMA JA’MELUN
5.72: LEKAD KEFEREL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME WE KALEL-MESIHU JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE A’BUDU LLAHE RABBI WE RABBEKUM ‘INNEHU MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKAD HERRAMAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIL-XHENNETE WE ME’WEHU NARU WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN ‘ENSARI
5.73: LEKAD KEFEREL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE THALITHU THALATHETIN WE MA MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IL-LA ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN WE ‘IN LEM JENTEHU ‘AMMA JAKULUNE LEJEMESSENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.74: ‘EFELA JETUBUNE ‘ILA LLAHI WE JESTEGFIRUNEHU WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
5.75: MAL-MESIHU EBNU MERJEME ‘IL-LA RASULUN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHI RUSULU WE ‘UMMUHU SIDDIKATUN KANA JE’KULËNIT-TA’AME ENDHUR KEJFE NUBEJJINU LEHUMUL-’AJATI THUMME ENDHUR ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
5.76: KUL ‘ETA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JEMLIKU LEKUM DERRAN WE LA NEF’ËN WA-LLAHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
5.77: KUL JA ‘EHLAL-KITABI LA TEGLU FI DINIKUM GAJRAL-HEKKI WE LA TETTEBI’U ‘EHWE’E KAWMIN KAD DELLU MIN KABLU WE ‘EDELLU KETHIRAN WE DELLU ‘AN SEWE’I SEBIL
5.78: LU’INEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ALA LISANI DAWUDE WE ‘ISA EBNI MERJEME DHALIKE BIMA ‘ASEW WE KENU JA’TEDUN
5.79: KENU LA JETENAHEWNE ‘AN MUNKERIN FE’ALUHU LEBI’SE MA KENU JEF’ALUN
5.80: TERA KETHIRAN MINHUM JETEWEL-LEWNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEBI’SE MA KADDEMET LEHUM ‘ENFUSUHUM ‘EN SEHITAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE FIL-’ADHABI HUM HALIDUN
5.81: WE LEW KENU JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE NEBIJI WE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MA ETTEHADHUHUM ‘EWLIJA’E WE LAKINNE KETHIRAN MINHUM FESIKUN
5.82: LETEXHIDENNE ‘ESHEDDE NASI ‘ADAWETEN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-JEHUDE WEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU WE LETEXHIDENNE ‘EKRABEHUM MEWEDDETEN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENUL-LEDHINE KALU ‘INNA NESARA DHALIKE BI’ENNE MINHUM KISSISINE WE RUHBENËN WE ‘ENNEHUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
5.83: WE ‘IDHA SEMI’U MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILA RASULI TERA ‘A’JUNEHUM TEFIDU MINE DEM’I MIMMA ‘ARAFU MINEL-HEKKI JAKULUNE RABBENA ‘AMANNA FEKTUBNA ME’A ESH-SHAHIDIN
5.84: WE MA LENA LA NU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE MA XHA’ENA MINEL-HEKKI WE NETMA’U ‘EN JUDHILENA RABBUNA ME’AL-KAWMI SALIHIN
5.85: FE’ETHABEHUMU LLAHU BIMA KALU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE DHELIKE XHEZA’UL-MUHSININ
5.87: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUHERRIMU TEJJIBETI MA ‘EHELLAL-LAHU LEKUM WE LA TA’TEDU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
5.88: WE KULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU LLAHU HALELËN TEJJIBËN WE ETTEKU LLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ENTUM BIHI MU’UMINUN
5.89: LA JU’UAHIDHUKUMU LLAHU BIL-LEGWI FI ‘EJMANIKUM WE LAKIN JU’UAHIDHUKUM BIMA ‘AKKADTUMUL-’IMANE FEKEFFERATUHU ‘IT’AMU ‘ASHERATI MESAKINE MIN ‘EWSETI MA TUT’IMUNE ‘EHLIKUM ‘EW KISWETUHUM ‘EW TEHRIRU RAKABETIN FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU THALATHETI ‘EJJAMIN DHALIKE KEFFERATU ‘EJMANIKUM ‘IDHA HELEFTUM WE EHFEDHU ‘EJMANEKUM KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
5.90: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNAMAL-HAMRU WEL-MEJSIRU WEL-’ENSABU WEL-’EZLAMU RIXHSUN MIN ‘AMELI SHEJTANI FEXHTENIBUHU LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.91: ‘INNAMA JURIDU SHEJTANU ‘EN JUKI’A BEJNEKUMUL-’ADAWETE WEL-BEGDA’E FIL-HAMRI WEL-MEJSIRI WE JESUDDEKUM ‘AN DHIKRI LEHI WE ‘ANI SELËTI FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUNTEHUN
5.92: WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE EHDHERU FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FE’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘ALA RASULINAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
5.93: LEJSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHUNAHUN FIMA TA’IMU ‘IDHA MA ETTEKAW WE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI THUMME ETTEKAW WE ‘AMENU THUMME ETTEKAW WE ‘EHSENU WA-LLAHU JUHIBBUL-MUHSININ
5.94: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEJEBLUWENNEKUMU LLAHU BISHEJ’IN MINE SEJDI TENALUHU ‘EJDIKUM WE RIMAHUKUM LIJA’LEMAL-LAHU MEN JEHAFUHU BIL-GAJBI FEMENI A’TEDA BE’DE DHALIKE FELEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
5.95: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKTULU SEJDE WE ‘ENTUM HURUMUN WE MEN KATELEHU MINKUM MUTE’AMMIDËN FEXHEZA’UN MITHLU MA KATELE MINE NE’AMI JEHKUMU BIHI DHEWE ‘ADLIN MINKUM HEDJËN BELIGAL-KA’BETI ‘EW KEFFERATUN TA’AMU MESAKINE ‘EW ‘ADLU DHALIKE SIJAMËN LIJEDHUKA WEBELE ‘EMRIHI ‘AFELLAHU ‘AMMA SELEFE WE MEN ‘ADE FEJENTEKIMU LLAHU MINHU WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
5.96: ‘UHIL-LE LEKUM SEJDUL-BEHRI WE TA’AMUHU META’ËN LEKUM WE LILSSEJJARATI WE HURRIME ‘ALEJKUM SEJDUL-BERRI MA DUMTUM HURUMËN WE ETTEKU LLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
5.97: XHE’ALEL-LAHUL-KA’BETAL-BEJTAL-HERAME KIJAMËN LILNNASI WE SHEHRAL-HERAME WEL-HEDJE WEL-KALA’IDE DHALIKE LITA’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
5.99: MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGU WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA TEKTUMUN
5.100: KUL LA JESTEWIL-HABITHU WET-TEJJIBU WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKE KETHRATUL-HABITHI FE ETTEKU LLAHE JA ‘ULIL-’ELBEBI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
5.101: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TES’ELU ‘AN ‘ESHJA’E ‘IN TUBDE LEKUM TESU’UKUM WE ‘IN TES’ELU ‘ANHA HINE JUNEZZELUL-KUR’ANU TUBDE LEKUM ‘AFELLAHU ‘ANHA WA-LLAHU GAFURUN HELIMU
5.102: KAD SE’ELEHA KAWMUN MIN KABLIKUM THUMME ‘ESBEHU BIHA KEFIRIN
5.103: MA XHE’ALEL-LAHU MIN BEHIRATIN WE LA SA’IBETIN WE LA WESILETIN WE LA HAMIN WE LAKINNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’KILUN
5.104: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM TA’ALEW ‘ILA MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU WE ‘ILA RASULI KALU HESBUNA MA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABE’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE ‘ABE’UUHUM LA JA’LEMUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEHTEDUN
5.105: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM LA JEDURRUKUM MEN DAL-LE ‘IDHA EHTEDEJTUM ‘ILA LLAHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
5.106: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SHEHADETU BEJNIKUM ‘IDHA HEDERA ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU HINAL-WESIJETI ETHNANI DHEWE ‘ADLIN MINKUM ‘EW ‘AHARANI MIN GAJRIKUM ‘IN ‘ENTUM DERABTUM FIL-’ËRDI FE’ESABETKUM MUSIBETUL-MEWTI TEHBISUNEHUMA MIN BE’DI SELËTI FEJUKSIMANI BIL-LAHI ‘INI ERTEBTUM LA NESHTERI BIHI THEMENËN WE LEW KANE DHA KURBE WE LA NEKTUMU SHEHADETALLAHI ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEMINEL-’ATHIMIN
5.107: FE’IN ‘UTHIRA ‘ALA ‘ENNEHUMA ESTEHAKKA ‘ITHMËN FE’AHARANI JEKUMANI MEKAMEHUMA MINEL-LEDHINE ESTEHAKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-’EWLEJANI FEJUKSIMANI BIL-LAHI LESHEHADETUNA ‘EHEKKU MIN SHEHADETIHIMA WE MA A’TEDEJNA ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
5.108: DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN JE’TU BISH-SHEHADETI ‘ALA WEXHHIHA ‘EW JEHAFU ‘EN TURADDE ‘EJMANUN BE’DE ‘EJMANIHIM WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE ESMA’U WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-FESIKIN
5.109: JEWME JEXHMA’U ALLAHU RUSULE FEJAKULU MADHA ‘UXHIBTUM KALU LA ‘ILME LENA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
5.110: ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME EDHKUR NI’METI ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA WE E-DETIKE ‘IDH ‘EJJEDTTUKE BIRUHIL-KUDUSI TUKELLIMU NASE FIL-MEHDI WE KEHLËN WE ‘IDH ‘ALLEMTUKAL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WET-TEWRATE WEL-’INXHILE WE ‘IDH TEHLUKU MINET-TINI KEHEJ’ETIT-TAJRI BI’IDHNI FETENFUHU FIHË FETEKUNU TEJRAN BI’IDHNI WE TUBRI’UL-’EKMEHE WEL-’EBRASE BI’IDHNI WE ‘IDH TUHRIXHUL-MEWTA BI’IDHNI WE ‘IDH KEFEFTU BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ANKE ‘IDH XHI’TEHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEKALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
5.111: WE ‘IDH ‘EWHEJTU ‘ILAL-HEWERIJINE ‘EN ‘AMINU BI WE BIRASULI KALU ‘AMANNA WE ESH/HED BI’ENNENA MUSLIMUN
5.112: ‘IDH KALEL-HEWERIJUNE JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME HEL JESTETI’U RABBUKE ‘EN JUNEZZILE ‘ALEJNA MA’IDETEN MINE SEMA’I KALE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
5.113: KALU NURIDU ‘EN NE’KULE MINHA WE TETME’INNE KULUBUNA WE NA’LEME ‘EN KAD SEDEKTENA WE NEKUNE ‘ALEJHA MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
5.114: KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEMAL-LEHUMME RABBENA ‘ENZIL ‘ALEJNA MA’IDETEN MINE SEMA’I TEKUNU LENA ‘IDËN LI’WWELINA WE ‘AHIRINA WE ‘AJETEN MINKE WE ERZUKNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRU RAZIKIN
5.115: KALEL-LAHU ‘INNI MUNEZZILUHA ‘ALEJKUM FEMEN JEKFUR BE’DU MINKUM FE’INNI ‘U’ADHDHIBUHU ‘ADHABËN LA ‘U’ADHDHIBUHU ‘EHEDËN MINEL-’ALEMIN
5.116: WE ‘IDH KALEL-LAHU JA ‘ISA EBNE MERJEME ‘E’ENTE KULTE LILNNASI ETTEHIDHUNI WE ‘UMMIJE ‘ILEHEJNI MIN DUNI LEHI KALE SUBHANEKE MA JEKUNU LI ‘EN ‘EKULE MA LEJSE LI BIHEKKIN ‘IN KUNTU KULTUHU FEKAD ‘ALIMTEHU TA’LEMU MA FI NEFSI WE LA ‘A’LEMU MA FI NEFSIKE ‘INNEKE ‘ENTE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
5.117: MA KULTU LEHUM ‘IL-LA MA ‘EMERTENI BIHI ‘ENI A’BUDU LLAHE RABBI WE RABBEKUM WE KUNTU ‘ALEJHIM SHEHIDËN MA DUMTU FIHIM FELAMMA TEWEFFEJTENI KUNTE ‘ENTE RAKIBE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ENTE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
5.118: ‘IN TU’ADHDHIBHUM FE’INNAHUM ‘IBEDUKE WE ‘IN TEGFIR LEHUM FE’INNEKE ‘ENTAL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
5.119: KALEL-LAHU HADHA JEWMU JENFE’U SADIKINE SIDKUHUM LEHUM XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN RADIJAL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
5.120: LIL-LAHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA FIHINNE WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU

6.1: EL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE XHE’ALE EDH-DHULUMATI WE NURA THUMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM JA’DILUN
6.2: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN TININ THUMME KADA ‘EXHELËN WE ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN ‘INDEHU THUMME ‘ENTUM TEMTERUN
6.3: WE HUWA-LLAHU FI SEMAWETI WE FIL-’ËRDI JA’LEMU SIRRAKUM WE XHEHRAKUM WE JA’LEMU MA TEKSIBUN
6.4: WE MA TE’TIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN MIN ‘AJATI RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA KENU ‘ANHA MU’RIDIN
6.5: FEKAD KEDHDHEBU BIL-HAKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM FESEWFE JE’TIHIM ‘ENBE’U MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
6.6: ‘ELEM JERAW KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MIN KARNIN MEKKENNAHUM FIL-’ËRDI MA LEM NUMEKKIN LEKUM WE ‘ERSELNA SEMA’E ‘ALEJHIM MIDRARAN WE XHE’ALNAL-’ENHARA TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIM FE’EHLEKNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE ‘ENSHE’NA MIN BE’DIHIM KARNËN ‘AHARIN
6.7: WE LEW NEZZELNA ‘ALEJKE KITABËN FI KIRTASIN FELEMESUHU BI’EJDIHIM LEKALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
6.8: WE KALU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI MELEKUN WE LEW ‘ENZELNA MELEKËN LEKUDIJAL-’EMRU THUMME LA JUNDHERUN
6.9: WE LEW XHE’ALNAHU MELEKËN LEXHE’ALNAHU RAXHULËN WE LELEBESNA ‘ALEJHIM MA JELBISUN
6.10: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FEHAKA BIEL-LEDHINE SEHIRU MINHUM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
6.11: KUL SIRU FIL-’ËRDI THUMME ENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
6.12: KUL LIMEN MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KUL LIL-LAHI KETEBE ‘ALA NEFSIHI RAHMETE LEJEXHME’ANNEKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHIL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
6.13: WE LEHU MA SEKENE FIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
6.14: KUL ‘EGAJRALLAHI ‘ETTEHIDHU WELIJËN FETIRI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE HUWE JUT’IMU WE LA JUT’AMU KUL ‘INNI ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE ‘EWWELE MEN ‘ESLEME WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.16: MEN JUSRAF ‘ANHU JEWME’IDHIN FEKAD RAHIMEHU WE DHELIKAL-FEWZUL-MUBIN
6.17: WE ‘IN JEMSESKEL-LEHU BIDURRIN FELA KASHIFE LEHU ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘IN JEMSESKE BIHAJRIN FEHUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
6.19: KUL ‘EJJU SHEJ’IN ‘EKBERU SHEHADETEN KULI ALLAHU SHEHIDUN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE HADHAL-KUR’ANU LI’NDHIRAKUM BIHI WE MEN BELEGA ‘E’INNEKUM LETESH/HEDUNE ‘ENNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ALIHETEN ‘UHRA KUL LA ‘ESH/HEDU KUL ‘INNAMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN WE ‘INNENI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
6.20: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’RIFUNEHU KAMA JA’RIFUNE ‘EBNA’EHUMUL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
6.21: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.22: WE JEWME NEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’UUKUMUL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
6.23: THUMME LEM TEKUN FITNETUHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU WEL-LEHI RABBINA MA KUNNA MUSHRIKIN
6.24: ENDHUR KEJFE KEDHEBU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
6.25: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’U ‘ILEJKE WE XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRAN WE ‘IN JERAW KUL-LE ‘AJETIN LA JU’UMINU BIHA HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’UKE JUXHADILUNEKE JAKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
6.26: WE HUM JENHEWNE ‘ANHU WE JEN’EWNE ‘ANHU WE ‘IN JUHLIKUNE ‘IL-LA ‘ANFUSAHUM WE MA JESH’URUN
6.27: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH WUKIFU ‘ALA NARI FEKALU JA LEJTENA NURADDU WE LA NUKEDHDHIBE BI’AJATI RABBINA WE NEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
6.28: BEL BEDA LEHUM MA KENU JUHFUNE MIN KABLU WE LEW RUDDU LA’ADU LIMA NUHU ‘ANHU WE ‘INNAHUM LEKADHIBUN
6.29: WE KALU ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA DUN'JA WE MA NAHNU BIMEB’UTHIN
6.30: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH WUKIFU ‘ALA RABBIHIM KALE ‘ELEJSE HADHA BIL-HAKKI KALU BELA WE RABBINA KALE FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
6.31: KAD HASIREL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’I LEHI HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’ET/HUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN KALU JA HESRATENA ‘ALA MA FERRATNA FIHË WE HUM JEHMILUNE ‘EWZARAHUM ‘ALA DHUHURIHIM ‘ALA SA’E MA JEZIRUN
6.32: WE MAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA ‘IL-LA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE LELDDARUL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
6.33: KAD NA’LEMU ‘INNEHU LEJEHZUNUKEL-LEDHI JAKULUNE FE’INNAHUM LA JUKEDHDHIBUNEKE WE LAKINNE EDH-DHALIMINE BI’AJATI LEHI JEXHHEDUN
6.34: WE LEKAD KUDHDHIBET RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE FESEBERU ‘ALA MA KUDHDHIBU WE ‘UDHU HATTE ‘ETAHUM NESRUNA WE LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATI LEHI WE LEKAD XHA’EKE MIN NEBE’IL-MURSELIN
6.35: WE ‘IN KANE KEBURA ‘ALEJKE ‘I’RADUHUM FE’INI ESTETA’TE ‘EN TEBTEGIJE NEFEKËN FIL-’ËRDI ‘EW SULLEMËN FI SEMA’I FETE’TIJEHUM BI’AJETIN WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LEXHEME’AHUM ‘ALEL-HUDA FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-XHAHILIN
6.36: ‘INNAMA JESTEXHIBUL-LEDHINE JESMA’UNE WEL-MEWTA JEB’ATHUHUMU LLAHU THUMME ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UN
6.37: WE KALU LEWLA NUZZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE KADIRUN ‘ALA ‘EN JUNEZZILE ‘AJETEN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
6.38: WE MA MIN DABBETIN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA TA’IRIN JETIRU BIXHENAHEJHI ‘IL-LA ‘UMEMUN ‘EMTHALUKUM MA FERRATNA FIL-KITABI MIN SHEJ’IN THUMME ‘ILA RABBIHIM JUHSHERUN
6.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA SUMMUN WE BUKMUN FI EDH-DHULUMATI MEN JESHE’I ALLAHU JUDLILHU WE MEN JESHE’ JEXH’ALHU ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
6.40: KUL ‘ERA’EJTEKUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABU LLAHI ‘EW ‘ETETKUMU SA’ATU ‘EGAJRALLAHI TED’UNE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
6.41: BEL ‘IJAHU TED’UNE FEJEKSHIFU MA TED’UNE ‘ILEJHI ‘IN SHA’E WE TENSEWNE MA TUSHRIKUN
6.42: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA ‘UMEMIN MIN KABLIKE FE’EHADHNAHUM BIL-BE’SA’I WE DERRA’I LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDERRA’UN
6.43: FELEWLA ‘IDH XHA’EHUM BE’SUNA TEDERRA’U WE LAKIN KASET KULUBUHUM WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU SHEJTANU MA KENU JA’MELU
6.44: FELAMMA NESU MA DHUKKIRU BIHI FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM ‘EBWEBE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HATTE ‘IDHA FERIHU BIMA ‘UTU ‘EHADHNAHUM BEGTETEN FE’IDHA HUM MUBLISUN
6.45: FEKUTI’A DABIRUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WEL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.46: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘EHADHE-LLAHU SEM’AKUM WE ‘EBSARAKUM WE HATEME ‘ALA KULUBIKUM MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU LLAHI JE’TIKUM BIHI ENDHUR KEJFE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI THUMME HUM JESDIFUN
6.47: KUL ‘ERA’EJTEKUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABU LLAHI BEGTETEN ‘EW XHEHRATEN HEL JUHLEKU ‘IL-LAL-KAWMU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.48: WE MA NURSILUL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE FEMEN ‘AMANA WE ‘ESLEHE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
6.49: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA JEMESSUHUMUL-’ADHABU BIMA KENU JEFSUKUN
6.50: KUL LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INDI HAZA’INU LLAHI WE LA ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE WE LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INNI MELEKUN ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE KUL HEL JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU ‘EFELA TETEFEKKERUN
6.51: WE ‘ENDHIR BIHIL-LEDHINE JEHAFUNE ‘EN JUHSHERU ‘ILA RABBIHIM LEJSE LEHUM MIN DUNIHI WE LIJUN WE LA SHEFI’UN LE’AL-LEHUM JETTEKUN
6.52: WE LA TETRUDIL-LEDHINE JED’UNE RABBEHUM BIL-GADËTI WEL-’ASHIJI JURIDUNE WEXHHEHU MA ‘ALEJKE MIN HISABIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN WE MA MIN HISABIKE ‘ALEJHIM MIN SHEJ’IN FETETRUDEHUM FETEKUNE MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
6.53: WE KEDHELIKE FETENNA BE’DEHUM BIBE’DIN LIJAKULU ‘EHA’UULË’ MENNAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MIN BEJNINA ‘ELEJSAL-LAHU BI’A’LEME BISH-SHAKIRIN
6.54: WE ‘IDHË XHË’EKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATINA FEKUL SALAMUN ‘ALEJKUM KETEBE RABBUKUM ‘ALA NEFSIHI RAHMETE ‘ENNEHU MEN ‘AMILE MINKUM SU’ËN BIXHEHALETIN THUMME TABE MIN BE’DIHI WE ‘ESLEHE FE’ENNEHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
6.55: WE KEDHELIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI WE LITESTEBINE SEBILUL-MUXHRIMIN
6.56: KUL ‘INNI NUHITU ‘EN ‘A’BUDEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI KUL LA ‘ETTEBI’U ‘EHWE’EKUM KAD DELELTU ‘IDHËN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUHTADIN
6.57: KUL ‘INNI ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE KEDHDHEBTUM BIHI MA ‘INDI MA TESTA’XHILUNE BIHI ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI JEKUSSUL-HAKKA WE HUWE HAJRUL-FESILIN
6.58: KUL LEW ‘ENNE ‘INDI MA TESTA’XHILUNE BIHI LEKUDIJAL-’EMRU BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIDH-DHALIMIN
6.59: WE ‘INDEHU MEFETIHUL-GAJBI LA JA’LEMUHA ‘IL-LA HUWE WE JA’LEMU MA FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE MA TESKUTU MIN WERAKATIN ‘IL-LA JA’LEMUHA WE LA HEBBETIN FI DHULUMATIL-’ARDI WE LA RATBIN WE LA JA BISIN ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
6.60: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JETEWEFFEKUM BIL-LEJLI WE JA’LEMU MA XHERAHTUM BIN-NEHARI THUMME JEB’ATHUKUM FIHI LIJUKDA ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN THUMME ‘ILEJHI MERXHI’UKUM THUMME JUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
6.61: WE HUWEL-KAHIRU FEWKA ‘IBEDIHI WE JURSILU ‘ALEJKUM HEFEDHETEN HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’E ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU TEWEFFET/HU RUSULUNA WE HUM LA JUFERRITUN
6.62: THUMME RUDDU ‘ILA LLAHI MEWLAHUMUL-HEKKI ‘ALA LEHUL-HUKMU WE HUWE ‘ESRA’UL-HASIBIN
6.63: KUL MEN JUNEXHXHIKUM MIN DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI TED’UNEHU TEDERRU’ËN WE HUFJETEN LE’IN ‘ENXHANA MIN HEDHIHI LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
6.64: KULI ALLAHU JUNEXHXHIKUM MINHA WE MIN KUL-LI KERBIN THUMME ‘ENTUM TUSHRIKUN
6.65: KUL HUWEL-KADIRU ‘ALA ‘EN JEB’ATHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABËN MIN FEWKIKUM ‘EW MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIKUM ‘EW JELBISEKUM SHIJA’ËN WE JUDHIKA BE’DEKUM BE’SE BE’DIN ENDHUR KEJFE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEHUM JEFKAHUN
6.66: WE KEDHDHEBE BIHI KAWMUKE WE HUWEL-HEKKU KUL LESTU ‘ALEJKUM BIWEKILI
6.67: LIKUL-LI NEBE’IIN MUSTAKARRUN WE SEWFE TA’LEMUN
6.68: WE ‘IDHA RA’EJTEL-LEDHINE JEHUDUNE FI ‘AJATINA FE’A’RID ‘ANHUM HATTE JEHUDU FI HEDITHIN GAJRIHI WE ‘IMMA JUNSIJENNEKE SHEJTANU FELA TEK’UD BE’DE EDH-DHIKRA ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
6.69: WE MA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE MIN HISABIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN WE LAKIN DHIKRA LE’AL-LEHUM JETTEKUN
6.70: WE DHERIL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEHUM LA’IBËN WE LEHWEN WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJËTU DUN'JA WE DHEKKIR BIHI ‘EN TUBSELE NEFSUN BIMA KESEBET LEJSE LEHA MIN DUNI LEHI WE LIJUN WE LA SHEFI’UN WE ‘IN TA’DIL KUL-LE ‘ADLIN LA JU’UHADH MINHA ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE ‘UBSILU BIMA KESEBU LEHUM SHERABUN MIN HEMIMIN WE ‘ADHABUN ‘ALIMUN BIMA KENU JEKFURUN
6.71: KUL ‘ENED’U MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JENFE’UNA WE LA JEDURRUNA WE NURADDU ‘ALA ‘A’KABINA BE’DE ‘IDH HEDANALLAHU KEL-LEDHI ESTEHWET/HU SHEJATINU FIL-’ËRDI HEJRANE LEHU ‘ES'HABUN JED’UNEHU ‘ILAL-HUDA E’TINA KUL ‘INNE HUDA ALLAHI HUWEL-HUDA WE ‘UMIRNA LINUSLIME LIRABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.72: WE ‘EN ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ETTEKUHU WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
6.73: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI WE JEWME JAKULU KUN FEJEKUNU KAWLUHUL-HEKKU WE LEHUL-MULKU JEWME JUNFEHU FI SURI ‘ALIMUL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-HABI
6.74: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU LI’EBIHI ‘AZERA ‘ETETTEHIDHU ‘ESNAMËN ‘ALIHETEN ‘INNI ‘ERAKE WE KAWMEKE FI DALELIN MUBINI
6.75: WE KEDHELIKE NURI ‘IBRAHIME MELEKUTE SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LIJEKUNE MINEL-MUKININ
6.76: FELAMMA XHENNE ‘ALEJHIL-LEJLU RA’A KEWKEBËN KALE HADHA RABBI FELAMMA ‘EFELE KALE LA ‘UHIBBUL-’AFILIN
6.77: FELAMMA RA’AL-KAMERA BEZIGËN KALE HADHA RABBI FELAMMA ‘EFELE KALE LE’IN LEM JEHDINI RABBI LE’EKUNENNE MINEL-KAWMI DAL-LIN
6.78: FELAMMA RA’A SHEMSE BEZIGATEN KALE HADHA RABBI HADHA ‘EKBERU FELAMMA ‘EFELET KALE JA KAWMI ‘INNI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
6.79: ‘INNI WEXHXHEHTU WEXHHIJE LIL-LEDHI FETERA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA HENIFËN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.80: WE HAXHXHEHU KAWMUHU KALE ‘ETUHAXHXHUNI FI LEHI WE KAD HEDANI WE LA ‘EHAFU MA TUSHRIKUNE BIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’E RABBI SHEJ’ËN WESI’A RABBI KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘ILMËN ‘EFELA TETEDHEKKERUN
6.81: WE KEJFE ‘EHAFU MA ‘ESHRAKTUM WE LA TEHAFUNE ‘ENNEKUM ‘ESHRAKTUM BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI ‘ALEJKUM SULTANËN FE’EJJUL-FERIKAJNI ‘EHEKKU BIL-’EMNI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
6.82: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEM JELBISU ‘IMANEHUM BIDHULMIN ‘ULË’IKE LEHUMUL-’EMNU WE HUM MUHTEDUN
6.83: WE TILKE HUXHXHETUNA ‘ATEJNAHA ‘IBRAHIME ‘ALA KAWMIHI NERFE’U DERAXHATIN MEN NESHA’U ‘INNE RABBEKE HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.84: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE KULLËN HEDEJNA WE NUHËN HEDEJNA MIN KABLU WE MIN DHURRIJETIHI DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE WE ‘EJJUBE WE JUSUFE WE MUSA WE HARUNE WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
6.85: WE ZEKERIJA WE JEHJA WE ‘ISA WE ‘ILJASE KUL-LUN MINE SALIHIN
6.86: WE ‘ISMA’ILE WEL-JESE’A WE JUNUS WE LUTËN WE KULLËN FEDDELNA ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
6.87: WE MIN ‘ABE’IHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM WE ‘IHWENIHIM WE EXHTEBEJNAHUM WE HEDEJNAHUM ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
6.88: DHALIKE HUDA ALLAHI JEHDI BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE LEW ‘ESHRAKU LEHEBITE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JA’MELUN
6.89: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE FE’IN JEKFUR BIHA HA’UULË’ FEKAD WE KKELNA BIHA KAWMËN LEJSU BIHA BIKEFIRIN
6.90: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HEDALLAHU FEBIHUDAHUMU EKTEDIHI KUL LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRAN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRA LIL’ALEMIN
6.91: WE MA KADERU LLAHE HAKKA KADRIHI ‘IDH KALU MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU ‘ALA BESHERIN MIN SHEJ’IN KUL MEN ‘ENZALEL-KITABEL-LEDHI XHA’E BIHI MUSA NURAN WE HUDAN LILNNASI TEXH’ALUNEHU KARATISE TUBDUNEHA WE TUHFUNE KETHIRAN WE ‘ULLIMTUM MA LEM TA’LEMU ‘ENTUM WE LA ‘ABE’UUKUM KULI ALLAHU THUMME DHERHUM FI HAWDIHIM JEL’ABUN
6.92: WE HEDHA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU MUBERAKUN MUSEDDIKUL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE LITUNDHIRA ‘UMMAL-KURA WE MEN HEWLEHA WEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE HUM ‘ALA SALATIHIM JUHAFIDHUN
6.93: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KALE ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE WE LEM JUHE ‘ILEJHI SHEJ’UN WE MEN KALE SE’UNZILU MITHLE MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU WE LEW TERA ‘IDHI EDH-DHALIMUNE FI GAMERATIL-MEWTI WEL-MELE’IKETU BESITU ‘EJDIHIM ‘EHRIXHU ‘ENFUSEKUMUL-JEWME TUXHZEWNE ‘ADHABEL-HUNI BIMA KUNTUM TEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI GAJRAL-HEKKI WE KUNTUM ‘AN ‘AJATIHI TESTEKBIRUN
6.94: WE LEKAD XHI’TUMUNA FURADA KAMA HALEKNAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE TERAKTUM MA HAWWELNAKUM WERA’E DHUHURIKUM WE MA NERA ME’AKUM SHUFE’A’EKUMUL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM ‘ENNEHUM FIKUM SHURAKA’U LEKAD TEKATTE’A BEJNEKUM WE DAL-LE ‘ANKUM MA KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
6.95: ‘INNALL-LLAHE FELIKUL-HEBBI WE NEWE JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE MUHRIXHUL-MEJJITI MINEL-HEJJI DHELIKUMU LLAHU FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
6.96: FELIKUL-’ISBEHI WE XHE’ALEL-LEJLE SEKENËN WE SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA HUSBENËN DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
6.97: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMU NUXHUME LITEHTEDU BIHA FI DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
6.98: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EKUM MIN NEFSIN WEHIDETIN FEMUSTAKARRUN WE MUSTEWDA’UN KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JEFKAHU
6.99: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI NEBETE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN FE’EHRAXHNA MINHU HADIRAN NUHRIXHU MINHU HEBBËN MUTERAKIBËN WE MINE NEHLI MIN TEL’IHA KINWENUN DANIJETUN WE XHENNATIN MIN ‘A’NABIN WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE RUMMANE MUSHTEBIHËN WE GAJRA MUTES'HABIHIN ENDHURU ‘ILA THEMERIHI ‘IDHA ‘ETHMERA WE JEN’IHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKUM LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
6.100: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’AL-XHINNE WE HALEKAHUM WE HARAKU LEHU BENINE WE BENATIN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JESIFUN
6.101: BEDI’U SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LEHU WELEDUN WE LEM TEKUN LEHU SAHIBETUN WE HALEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
6.102: DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN FE’BUDUHU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
6.103: LA TUDRIKUHUL-’EBSARU WE HUWE JUDRIKUL-’EBSARA WE HUWEL-LETIFUL-HABI
6.104: KAD XHA’EKUM BESA’IRU MIN RABBIKUM FEMEN ‘EBSERA FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘AMIJE FE’ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIHEFIDHI
6.105: WE KEDHELIKE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI WE LIJAKULU DERASTE WE LINUBEJJINEHU LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
6.106: ETTEBI’ MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘A’RID ‘ANIL-MUSHRIKIN
6.107: WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA ‘ESHRAKU WE MA XHE’ALNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHËN WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
6.108: WE LA TESUBBUL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI FEJESUBBU LLAHE ‘ADWEN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN KEDHALIKE ZEJJENNA LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘AMELEHUM THUMME ‘ILA RABBIHIM MERXHI’UHUM FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
6.109: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN XHA’ET/HUM ‘AJETUN LEJU’UMINUNNE BIHA KUL ‘INNAMAL-’AJATU ‘IND-ALLAHI WE MA JUSH’IRUKUM ‘ENNEHA ‘IDHË XHË’ET LA JU’UMINUN
6.110: WE NUKALLIBU ‘EF’IDETEHUM WE ‘EBSARAHUM KAMA LEM JU’UMINU BIHI ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE NEDHERUHUM FI TUG'JANIHIM JA’MEHUN
6.111: WE LEW ‘ENNENA NEZZELNA ‘ILEJHIMUL-MELE’IKETE WE KELLEMEHUMUL-MEWTA WE HESHERNA ‘ALEJHIM KUL-LE SHEJ’IN KUBULËN MA KENU LIJU’UMINU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’-ALLAHU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM JEXHHELUN
6.112: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA LIKUL-LI NEBIJIN ‘ADUWËN SHEJATINAL-’INSI WEL-XHINNI JUHI BE’DUHUM ‘ILA BE’DIN ZUHRUFEL-KAWLI GURURAN WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE MA FE’ALUHU FEDHERHUM WE MA JEFTERUN
6.113: WE LITESGA ‘ILEJHI ‘EF’IDETUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE LIJERDAWHU WE LIJEKTERIFU MA HUM MUKTERIFUN
6.114: ‘EFEGAJRALLAHI ‘EBTEGI HEKEMËN WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ILEJKUMUL-KITABE MUFESSELËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHU MUNEZZELUN MIN RABBIKE BIL-HAKKI FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
6.115: WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKE SIDKËN WE ‘ADLËN LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATIHI WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
6.116: WE ‘IN TUTI’ ‘EKTHERA MEN FIL-’ËRDI JUDIL-LUKE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
6.117: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU MEN JEDILLU ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTADIN
6.118: FEKULU MIMMA DHUKIRA ESMU LLAHI ‘ALEJHI ‘IN KUNTUM BI’AJATIHI MU’UMININ
6.119: WE MA LEKUM ‘ELLA TE’KULU MIMMA DHUKIRA ESMU LLAHI ‘ALEJHI WE KAD FESSELE LEKUM MA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUM ‘IL-LA MA EDTURIRTUM ‘ILEJHI WE ‘INNE KETHIRAN LEJUDIL-LUNE BI’EHWE’IHIM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MU’TEDIN
6.120: WE DHERU DHAHIRAL-’ITHMI WE BETINEHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEKSIBUNAL-’ITHME SEJUXHZEWNE BIMA KENU JEKTERIFUN
6.121: WE LA TE’KULU MIMMA LEM JUDHKERI ESMU LLAHI ‘ALEJHI WE ‘INNEHU LEFISKUN WE ‘INNE SHEJATINE LEJUHUNE ‘ILA ‘EWLIJA’IHIM LIJUXHADILUKUM WE ‘IN ‘ETA’TUMUHUM ‘INNEKUM LEMUSHRIKUN
6.122: ‘EWEMEN KANE MEJTËN FE’EHJEJNAHU WE XHE’ALNA LEHU NURAN JEMSHI BIHI FI NASI KEMEN METHELUHU FI EDH-DHULUMATI LEJSE BIHARIXHIN MINHA KEDHALIKE ZUJJINE LILKEFIRINE MA KENU JA’MELUN
6.123: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA FI KUL-LI KARJETIN ‘EKABIRA MUXHRIMIHA LIJEMKURU FIHË WE MA JEMKURUNE ‘IL-LA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE MA JESH’URUN
6.124: WE ‘IDHË XHË’ET/HUM ‘AJETUN KALU LEN NU’UMINE HATTE NU’UTA MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE RUSULU LLAHI ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU HEJTHU JEXH’ALU RISALETEHU SEJUSIBUL-LEDHINE ‘EXHRAMU SEGARUN ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN BIMA KENU JEMKURUN
6.125: FEMEN JURIDI ALLAHU ‘EN JEHDIJEHU JESHRAH SEDRAHU LIL’ISLAMI WE MEN JURID ‘EN JUDIL-LEHU JEXH’AL SEDRAHU DEJJIKËN HERAXHËN KE’ENNEMA JESSA’’ADU FI SEMA’I KEDHALIKE JEXH’ALU ALLAHU RIXHSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUN
6.126: WE HEDHA SIRATU RABBIKE MUSTEKIMËN KAD FESSELNAL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JEDHDHEKKERUN
6.127: LEHUM DARU SALAMI ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE HUWE WELIJUHUM BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
6.128: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI KADI ESTEKTHERTUM MINEL-’INSI WE KALE ‘EWLIJA’UUHUM MINEL-’INSI RABBENA ESTEMTE’A BE’DUNA BIBE’DIN WE BELEGNA ‘EXHELENEL-LEDHI ‘EXHXHELTE LENA KALE NARU METHWEKUM HALIDINE FIHË ‘IL-LA MA SHA’-ALLAHU ‘INNE RABBEKE HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.129: WE KEDHELIKE NUWELLI BE’DE EDH-DHALIMINE BE’DËN BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
6.130: JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JEKUSSUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJA TI WE JUNDHIRUNEKUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA KALU SHEHIDNA ‘ALA ‘ENFUSINA WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJA ETU DUN'JA WE SHEHIDU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ENNEHUM KENU KEFIRIN
6.131: DHALIKE ‘EN LEM JEKUN RABBUKE MUHLIKAL-KURA BIDHULMIN WE ‘EHLUHA GAFILUN
6.132: WE LIKUL-LIN DERAXHATUN MIMMA ‘AMILU WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA JA’MELUN
6.133: WE RABBUKAL-GANIJU DHU RAHMETI ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JESTEHLIF MIN BE’DIKUM MA JESHA’U KAMA ‘ENSHE’EKUM MIN DHURRIJETI KAWMIN ‘AHARIN
6.134: ‘INNE MA TU’ADUNE LE’ATIN WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
6.135: KUL JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN FESEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN TEKUNU LEHU ‘AKIBETU DARI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
6.136: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI MIMMA DHERA’E MINEL-HERTHI WEL-’EN’AM NESIBËN FEKALU HADHA LIL-LAHI BIZA’MIHIM WE HEDHA LISHURAKA’INA FEMA KANE LISHURAKA’IHIM FELA JESILU ‘ILA LLAHI WE MA KANE LIL-LAHI FEHUWE JESILU ‘ILA SHURAKA’IHIM SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
6.137: WE KEDHELIKE ZEJJENE LIKETHIRIN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE KATLE ‘EWLADIHIM SHURAKA’UUHUM LIJURDUHUM WE LIJELBISU ‘ALEJHIM DINEHUM WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA FE’ALUHU FEDHERHUM WE MA JEFTERUN
6.138: WE KALU HEDHIHI ‘EN’AMUN WE HERTHUN HIXHRUN LA JET’AMUHA ‘IL-LA MEN NESHA’U BIZA’MIHIM WE ‘EN’AMUN HURRIMET DHUHURUHA WE ‘EN’AMUN LA JEDHKURUNE ESMALLAHI ‘ALEJHA EFTIRA’EN ‘ALEJHI SEJEXHZIHIM BIMA KENU JEFTERUN
6.139: WE KALU MA FI BUTUNI HEDHIHIL-’EN’AMI HALISETUN LIDHUKURINA WE MUHERRAMUN ‘ALA ‘EZWEXHINA WE ‘IN JEKUN MEJTETEN FEHUM FIHI SHURAKA’U SEJEXHZIHIM WESFEHUM ‘INNEHU HEKIMUN ‘ALIMU
6.140: KAD HASIREL-LEDHINE KATELU ‘EWLADEHUM SEFEHËN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE HERRAMU MA RAZEKAHUMU LLAHU EFTIRA’EN ‘ALA ALLAHI KAD DELLU WE MA KENU MUHTADIN
6.141: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’E XHENNATIN MA’RUSHATIN WE GAJRA MA’RUSHATIN WE NEHLE WE EZ-ZER’A MUHTELIFËN ‘UKULUHU WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE RUMMANE MUTES'HABIHËN WE GAJRA MUTES'HABIHIN KULU MIN THEMERIHI ‘IDHA ‘ETHMERA WE ‘ATU HAKKAHU JEWME HESADIHI WE LA TUSRIFU ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSRIFIN
6.142: WE MINEL-’EN’AMI HEMULETEN WE FERSHËN KULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU LLAHU WE LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWETI SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
6.143: THEMANIJETE ‘EZWEXHIN MINE DE’NI ETHNEJNI WE MINEL-MA’ZI ETHNEJNI KUL ‘ALDHDHEKERAJNI HERRAME ‘EMIL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EMMA ESHTEMELET ‘ALEJHI ‘ERHAMUL-’UNTHEJEJNI NEBBI’UNI BI’ILMIN ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
6.144: WE MINEL-’IBILI ETHNEJNI WE MINEL-BEKARI ETHNEJNI KUL ‘ALDHDHEKERAJNI HERRAME ‘EMIL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EMMA ESHTEMELET ‘ALEJHI ‘ERHAMUL-’UNTHEJEJNI ‘EM KUNTUM SHUHEDA’E ‘IDH WESSAKUMU LLAHU BIHEDHA FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN LIJUDIL-LE NASE BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
6.145: KUL LA ‘EXHIDU FI MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE MUHERRAMËN ‘ALA TA’IMIN JET’AMUHU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JEKUNE MEJTETEN ‘EW DEMËN MESFUHËN ‘EW LEHME HINZIRIN FE’INNEHU RIXHSUN ‘EW FISKËN ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI LEHI BIHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BEGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FE’INNE RABBEKE GAFURUN RAHIMU
6.146: WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA KUL-LE DHI DHUFURIN WE MINEL-BEKARI WEL-GANEMI HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIM SHUHUMEHUMA ‘IL-LA MA HEMELET DHUHURUHUMA ‘EWIL-HEWEJA ‘EW MA EHTELETE BI’ADHMIN DHALIKE XHEZEJNAHUM BIBEGJIHIM WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
6.147: FE’IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKUL RABBUKUM DHU RAHMETIN WESI’ATIN WE LA JURADDU BE’SUHU ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-MUXHRIMIN
6.148: SEJAKULUL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA ‘ESHRAKNA WE LA ‘ABE’UUNA WE LA HERRAMNA MIN SHEJ’IN KEDHALIKE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM HATTE DHAKU BE’SENA KUL HEL ‘INDEKUM MIN ‘ILMIN FETUHRIXHUHU LENA ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA TEHRUSUN
6.150: KUL HELUMME SHUHEDA’EKUMUL-LEDHINE JESH/HEDUNE ‘ENNA-LLAHE HERRAME HADHA FE’IN SHEHIDU FELA TESH/HED ME’AHUM WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWE’EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE HUM BIRABBIHIM JA’DILUN
6.151: KUL TA’ALEW ‘ETLU MA HERRAME RABBUKUM ‘ALEJKUM ‘ELLA TUSHRIKU BIHI SHEJ’ËN WE BIL-WELIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN WE LA TEKTULU ‘EWLADEKUM MIN ‘IMLAKIN NAHNU NERZUKUKUM WE ‘IJAHUM WE LA TEKRABUL-FEWEHISHE MA DHEHERA MINHA WE MA BETENE WE LA TEKTULU NEFSAL-LETI HERRAMAL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
6.152: WE LA TEKRABU MELEL-JETIMI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU HATTE JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ‘EWFUL-KEJLE WEL-MIZANE BIL-KISTI LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA WE ‘IDHA KULTUM FE’DILU WE LEW KANE DHA KURBE WE BI’AHDI LEHI ‘EWFU DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
6.153: WE ‘ENNE HADHA SIRATI MUSTEKIMËN FE ETTEBI’UHU WE LA TETTEBI’U SUBULE FETEFERRAKA BIKUM ‘AN SEBILIHI DHALIKUM WESSAKUM BIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
6.154: THUMME ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE TEMAMËN ‘ALEL-LEDHI ‘EHSENE WE TEFSILËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDAN WE RAHMETEN LE’AL-LEHUM BILIKA’I RABBIHIM JU’UMINUN
6.155: WE HEDHA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU MUBERAKUN FE ETTEBI’UHU WE ETTEKU LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
6.156: ‘EN TEKULU ‘INNAMA ‘UNZILAL-KITABU ‘ALA TA’IFETEJNI MIN KABLINA WE ‘IN KUNNA ‘AN DIRASETIHIM LEGAFILIN
6.157: ‘EW TEKULU LEW ‘ENNA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNAL-KITABU LEKUNNA ‘EHDA MINHUM FEKAD XHA’EKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE HUDAN WE RAHMETUN FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATI LEHI WE SEDEFE ‘ANHA SENEXHZIL-LEDHINE JESDIFUNE ‘AN ‘AJATINA SU’AL-’ADHABI BIMA KENU JESDIFUN
6.158: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUMUL-MELE’IKETU ‘EW JE’TIJE RABBUKE ‘EW JE’TIJE BE’DU ‘AJATI RABBIKE JEWME JE’TI BE’DU ‘AJATI RABBIKE LA JENFE’U NEFSËN ‘IMANUHA LEM TEKUN ‘AMANAT MIN KABLU ‘EW KESEBET FI ‘IMANIHA HAJRAN KUL ENTEDHIRU ‘INNA MUNTEDHIRUN
6.159: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE FERRAKU DINEHUM WE KENU SHIJA’ËN LESTE MINHUM FI SHEJ’IN ‘INNAMA ‘EMRUHUM ‘ILA LLAHI THUMME JUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA KENU JEF’ALUN
6.160: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU ‘ASHRU ‘EMTHALIHA WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FELA JUXHZA ‘IL-LA MITHLEHA WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
6.161: KUL ‘INNENI HEDANI RABBI ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMIN DINËN KIJEMËN MIL-LETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
6.162: KUL ‘INNE SALATI WE NUSUKI WE MEHJAJE WE MEMATI LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
6.163: LA SHERIKE LEHU WE BIDHELIKE ‘UMIRTU WE ‘ENA ‘EWWELUL-MUSLIMIN
6.164: KUL ‘EGAJRALLAHI ‘EBGI RABBËN WE HUWE RABBU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE LA TEKSIBU KUL-LU NEFSIN ‘IL-LA ‘ALEJHA WE LA TEZIRU WEZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM MERXHI’UKUM FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
6.165: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEKUM HALA’IFEL-’ARDI WE RAFE’A BE’DEKUM FEWKA BE’DIN DERAXHATIN LIJEBLUWEKUM FI MA ‘ATAKUM ‘INNE RABBEKE SERI’UL-’IKABI WE ‘INNEHU LEGAFURUN RAHIMU

7.2: KITABUN ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE FELA JEKUN FI SEDRIKE HERAXHUN MINHU LITUNDHIRA BIHI WE DHIKRA LILMU’UMININ
7.3: ETTEBI’U MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM WE LA TETTEBI’U MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN
7.4: WE KEM MIN KARJETIN ‘EHLEKNAHA FEXHA’EHA BE’SUNA BEJATËN ‘EW HUM KA’ILUN
7.5: FEMA KANE DA’WEHUM ‘IDH XHA’EHUM BE’SUNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘INNA KUNNA DHALIMIN
7.7: FELENEKUSSENNE ‘ALEJHIM BI’ILMIN WE MA KUNNA GA’IBIN
7.8: WEL-WEZNU JEWME’IDHINL-HEKKU FEMEN THEKULET MEWEZINUHU FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
7.9: WE MEN HAFFET MEWEZINUHU FE’ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM BIMA KENU BI’AJATINA JEDHLIMUN
7.10: WE LEKAD MEKKENNAKUM FIL-’ËRDI WE XHE’ALNA LEKUM FIHË MA’AJISHE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
7.11: WE LEKAD HALEKNAKUM THUMME SEWWERNAKUM THUMME KULNA LILMELE’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE LEM JEKUN MINE SAXHIDIN
7.12: KALE MA MENE’AKE ‘ELLA TESXHUDE ‘IDH ‘EMERTUKE KALE ‘ENA HAJRUN MINHU HALEKTENI MIN NARIN WE HALEKTEHU MIN TINI
7.13: KALE FEHBIT MINHA FEMA JEKUNU LEKE ‘EN TETEKEBBERA FIHË FEHRUXH ‘INNEKE MINE SAGIRIN
7.17: THUMME LE’ATIJENNEHUM MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM WE MIN HALFIHIM WE ‘AN ‘EJMANIHIM WE ‘AN SHEMA’ILIHIM WE LA TEXHIDU ‘EKTHERAHUM SHAKIRIN
7.18: KALE EHRUXH MINHA MEDH’UMËN MEDHURAN LEMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
7.19: WE JA’ADEMU ESKUN ‘ENTE WE ZEWXHUKAL-XHENNETE FEKULË MIN HEJTHU SHI’TUMA WE LA TEKRABE HEDHIHI SHEXHERATE FETEKUNA MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
7.20: FEWESWESE LEHUMA SHEJTANU LIJUBDIJE LEHUMA MA WURIJE ‘ANHUMA MIN SEW’ATIHIMA WE KALE MA NEHAKUMA RABBUKUMA ‘AN HEDHIHI SHEXHERATI ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNA MELEKEJNI ‘EW TEKUNA MINEL-HALIDIN
7.22: FEDALLAHUMA BIGURURIN FELAMMA DHAKA SHEXHERATE BEDET LEHUMA SEW’ATUHUMA WE TEFIKA JEHSIFENI ‘ALEJHIMA MIN WERAKIL-XHENNETI WE NADAHUMA RABBUHUMA ‘ELEM ‘ENHEKUMA ‘AN TILKUMA SHEXHERATI WE ‘EKUL LEKUMA ‘INNE SHEJTANE LEKUMA ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
7.23: KALA RABBENA DHELEMNA ‘ENFUSENA WE ‘IN LEM TEGFIR LENA WE TERHEMNA LENEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
7.24: KALE EHBITU BE’DUKUM LIBE’DIN ‘ADUWUN WE LEKUM FIL-’ËRDI MUSTAKARRUN WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
7.25: KALE FIHË TEHJEWNE WE FIHË TEMUTUNE WE MINHA TUHRAXHUN
7.26: JA BENI ‘ADEME KAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKUM LIBESËN JUWERI SEW’’ATIKUM WE RISHËN WE LIBESUT-TEKWE DHALIKE HAJRUN DHALIKE MIN ‘AJA TI LEHI LE’AL-LEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
7.27: JA BENI ‘ADEME LA JEFTINENNEKUMU SHEJTANU KAMA ‘EHRAXHE ‘EBEWEJKUM MINEL-XHENNETI JENZI’U ‘ANHUMA LIBESEHUMA LIJURIJEHUMA SEW’’ATIHIMA ‘INNEHU JERAKUM HUWE WE KABILUHU MIN HEJTHU LA TERAWNEHUM ‘INNA XHE’ALNA SHEJA TINE ‘EWLIJA ‘E LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUN
7.28: WE ‘IDHA FE’ALU FEHISHETEN KALU WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHA ‘ABE’ENA WA-LLAHU ‘EMERANA BIHA KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JE’MURU BIL-FEHSHA’I ‘ETEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.29: KUL ‘EMERA RABBI BIL-KISTI WE ‘EKIMU WUXHUHEKUM ‘INDE KUL-LI MESXHIDIN WE ED’UHU MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNE KAMA BEDE’EKUM TA’UDUN
7.30: FERIKËN HEDA WE FERIKËN HAKKA ‘ALEJHIMU DALELETU ‘INNAHUMU ETTEHADHU SHEJATINE ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNI LEHI WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM MUHTEDUN
7.31: JA BENI ‘ADEME HUDHU ZINETEKUM ‘INDE KUL-LI MESXHIDIN WE KULU WE ESHRABU WE LA TUSRIFU ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSRIFIN
7.32: KUL MEN HERRAME ZINETALLAHI AL-LETI ‘EHRAXHE LI’IBEDIHI WET-TEJJIBETI MINE RIZKI KUL HIJE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA HALISETEN JEWMAL-KIJAMETI KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
7.33: KUL ‘INNAMA HERRAME RABBIJAL-FEWEHISHE MA DHEHERA MINHA WE MA BETENE WEL-’ITHME WEL-BEGJE BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE ‘EN TUSHRIKU BIL-LAHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE ‘EN TEKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.34: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELUN FE’IDHË XHË’E ‘EXHELUHUM LA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
7.35: JA BENI ‘ADEME ‘IMMA JE’TIJENNEKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JEKUSSUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJA TI FEMENI ETTEKA WE ‘ESLEHE FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
7.36: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ESTEKBERU ‘ANHA ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
7.37: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘ULË’IKE JENALUHUM NESIBUHUM MINEL-KITABI HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’ET/HUM RUSULUNA JETEWEFFEWNEHUM KALU ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI KALU DELLU ‘ANNA WE SHEHIDU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ENNEHUM KENU KEFIRIN
7.38: KALE EDHULU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIKUM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI FI NARI KUL-LEMA DEHALET ‘UMMETUN LE’ANET ‘UHTEHA HATTE ‘IDHA EDDARAKU FIHË XHEMI’ËN KALET ‘UHRAHUM LI’WLAHUM RABBENA HA’UULË’ ‘EDELLUNA FE’ATIHIM ‘ADHABËN DI’FËN MINE NARI KALE LIKUL-LIN DI’FUN WE LAKIN LA TA’LEMUN
7.39: WE KALET ‘ULËHUM LI’HRAHUM FEMA KANE LEKUM ‘ALEJNA MIN FEDLIN FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
7.40: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ESTEKBERU ‘ANHA LA TUFETTEHU LEHUM ‘EBWEBU SEMA’I WE LA JEDHULUNAL-XHENNETE HATTE JELIXHAL-XHEMELU FI SEMMIL-HIJATI WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUXHRIMIN
7.41: LEHUM MIN XHEHENNEME MIHADUN WE MIN FEWKIHIM GAWESHIN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.42: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
7.43: WE NEZA’NA MA FI SUDURIHIM MIN GILLIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU WE KALUL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HEDANA LIHEDHA WE MA KUNNA LINEHTEDIJE LEWLA ‘EN HEDANALLAHU LEKAD XHA’ET RUSULU RABBINA BIL-HAKKI WE NUDU ‘EN TILKUMUL-XHENNETU ‘URITHTUMUHA BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
7.44: WE NADA ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI ‘ESHABE NARI ‘EN KAD WEXHEDNA MA WE’ADENA RABBUNA HEKKËN FEHEL WEXHEDTUM MA WE’ADE RABBUKUM HEKKËN KALU NE’AM FE’EDHDHENE MU’UEDHDHINUN BEJNEHUM ‘EN LA’NETU LLAHI ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
7.45: EL-LEDHINE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI KAFIRUN
7.46: WE BEJNEHUMA HIXHABUN WE ‘ALEL-’A’RAFI RIXHALUN JA’RIFUNE KULLËN BISIMAHUM WE NADEW ‘ESHABEL-XHENNETI ‘EN SALAMUN ‘ALEJKUM LEM JEDHULUHA WE HUM JETMA’UN
7.47: WE ‘IDHA SURIFET ‘EBSARUHUM TILKA’E ‘ES'HABI NARI KALU RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.48: WE NADA ‘ES'HABUL-’A’RAFI RIXHALËN JA’RIFUNEHUM BISIMAHUM KALU MA ‘EGNA ‘ANKUM XHEM’UKUM WE MA KUNTUM TESTEKBIRUN
7.49: ‘EHA’UULË’L-LEDHINE ‘EKSEMTUM LA JENALUHUMU LLAHU BIRAHMETIN EDHULUL-XHENNETE LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘ENTUM TEHZENUN
7.50: WE NADA ‘ES'HABU NARI ‘ESHABEL-XHENNETI ‘EN ‘EFIDU ‘ALEJNA MINEL-MA’I ‘EW MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU LLAHU KALU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HERRAMEHUMA ‘ALEL-KEFIRIN
7.51: EL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU DINEHUM LEHWEN WE LA’IBËN WE GARRAT/HUMUL-HEJËTU DUN'JA FELJEWME NENSAHUM KAMA NESU LIKA’E JEWMIHIM HADHA WE MA KENU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
7.52: WE LEKAD XHI’NAHUM BIKITABIN FESSELNAHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN HUDAN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
