7.53: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA TE’WILEHU JEWME JE’TI TE’WILUHU JAKULUL-LEDHINE NESUHU MIN KABLU KAD XHA’ET RUSULU RABBINA BIL-HAKKI FEHEL LENA MIN SHUFE’A’E FEJESHFE’U LENA ‘EW NURADDU FENA’MELE GAJREL-LEDHI KUNNA NA’MELU KAD HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
7.54: ‘INNE RABBEKUMU LLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JUGSHIL-LEJLE NEHARA JETLUBUHU HETHITHËN WE SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA WE NUXHUME MUSEHHARATIN BI’EMRIHI ‘ALA LEHUL-HALKU WEL-’EMRU TEBERAKEL-LEHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
7.55: ED’U RABBEKUM TEDERRU’ËN WE HUFJETEN ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MU’TEDIN
7.56: WE LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ËRDI BE’DE ‘ISLAHIHA WE ED’UHU HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN ‘INNE RAHMETALLAHI KARIBUN MINEL-MUHSININ
7.57: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JURSILU RIJAHE BUSHRAN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI HATTE ‘IDHA ‘EKAL-LET SEHABËN THIKALËN SUKNAHU LIBELEDIN MEJJITIN FE’ENZELNA BIHIL-MA’E FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI KEDHALIKE NUHRIXHUL-MEWTA LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
7.58: WEL-BELEDUT-TEJJIBU JEHRUXHU NEBETUHU BI’IDHNI RABBIHI WEL-LEDHI HABUTHE LA JEHRUXHU ‘IL-LA NEKIDËN KEDHALIKE NUSERRIFUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JESHKURUN
7.59: LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
7.60: KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMIHI ‘INNA LENERAKE FI DALELIN MUBINI
7.61: KALE JA KAWMI LEJSE BI DALELETUN WE LAKINNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.62: ‘UBELLIGUKUM RISALATI RABBI WE ‘ENSEHU LEKUM WE ‘A’LEMU MINELLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
7.63: ‘EWE’AXHIBTUM ‘EN XHA’EKUM DHIKRUN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINKUM LIJUNDHIRAKUM WE LITETTEKU WE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
7.64: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’ENXHEJNAHU WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU FIL-FULKI WE ‘EGRAKNEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWMËN ‘AMIN
7.65: WE ‘ILA ‘ADIN ‘EHAHUM HUDËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
7.66: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI ‘INNA LENERAKE FI SEFEHETIN WE ‘INNA LENEDHUNNUKE MINEL-KADHIBIN
7.67: KALE JA KAWMI LEJSE BI SEFEHETUN WE LAKINNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.69: ‘EWE’AXHIBTUM ‘EN XHA’EKUM DHIKRUN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINKUM LIJUNDHIRAKUM WE EDHKURU ‘IDH XHE’ALEKUM HULEFE’E MIN BE’DI KAWMI NUHIN WE ZADEKUM FIL-HALKI BESTETEN FEDHKURU ‘ALA’ALLAHI LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
7.70: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LINA’BUDA-LLAHE WEHDEHU WE NEDHERA MA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUNA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
7.71: KALE KAD WEKA’A ‘ALEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM RIXHSUN WE GADEBUN ‘ETUXHADILUNENI FI ‘ESMA’IN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABE’UUKUM MA NEZZALEL-LAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN FENTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
7.72: FE’ENXHEJNAHU WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE KATA’NA DABIREL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE MA KENU MU’UMININ
7.73: WE ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU KAD XHA’ETKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM HEDHIHI NAKATU LLAHI LEKUM ‘AJETEN FEDHERUHA TE’KUL FI ‘ARDI LEHI WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
7.74: WE EDHKURU ‘IDH XHE’ALEKUM HULEFE’E MIN BE’DI ‘ADIN WE BEWWE’EKUM FIL-’ËRDI TETTEHIDHUNE MIN SUHULIHA KUSURAN WE TENHITUNAL-XHIBELE BUJUTËN FEDHKURU ‘ALA’ALLAHI WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ËRDI MUFSIDIN
7.75: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU MIN KAWMIHI LIL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIMEN ‘AMANA MINHUM ‘ETA’LEMUNE ‘ENNE SALIHËN MURSELUN MIN RABBIHI KALU ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILE BIHI MU’UMINUN
7.77: FE’AKARU NAKATE WE ‘ATEW ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHIM WE KALU JA SALIHU E’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINEL-MURSELIN
7.78: FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
7.79: FETEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA KAWMI LEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM RISALETE RABBI WE NESEHTU LEKUM WE LAKIN LA TUHIBBUNE NASIHIN
7.80: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘ETE’TUNAL-FEHISHETE MA SEBEKAKUM BIHA MIN ‘EHEDIN MINEL-’ALEMIN
7.81: ‘INNEKUM LETE’TUNE RIXHALE SHEHWETEN MIN DUNI NISA’ BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN MUSRIFUN
7.82: WE MA KANE XHEWEBE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EHRIXHUHUM MIN KARJETIKUM ‘INNAHUM ‘UNASUN JETETEHHERU
7.85: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU KAD XHA’ETKUM BEJJINETUN MIN RABBIKUM FE’EWFUL-KEJLE WEL-MIZANE WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA ‘EHUM WE LA TUFSIDU FIL-’ËRDI BE’DE ‘ISLAHIHA DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
7.86: WE LA TEK’UDU BIKUL-LI SIRATIN TU’IDUNE WE TESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI MEN ‘AMANA BIHI WE TEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE EDHKURU ‘IDH KUNTUM KALILËN FEKETHTHERAKUM WE ENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
7.87: WE ‘IN KANE TA’IFETUN MINKUM ‘AMENU BIEL-LEDHI ‘URSILTU BIHI WE TA’IFETUN LEM JU’UMINU FESBIRU HATTE JEHKUMAL-LAHU BEJNENA WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN
7.88: KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU MIN KAWMIHI LENUHRIXHENNEKE JA SHU’AJBU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AKE MIN KARJETINA ‘EW LETA’UDUNNE FI MIL-LETINA KALE ‘EWELEW KUNNA KARIHIN
7.89: KADI EFTERAJNA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘IN ‘UDNA FI MIL-LETIKUM BE’DE ‘IDH NEXHXHANALLAHU MINHA WE MA JEKUNU LENA ‘EN NA’UDE FIHË ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’-ALLAHU RABBUNA WESI’A RABBUNA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘ILMËN ‘ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELNA RABBENA EFTEH BEJNENA WE BEJNE KAWMINA BIL-HAKKI WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-FETIHIN
7.90: WE KALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI LE’INI ETTEBE’TUM SHU’AJBËN ‘INNEKUM ‘IDHËN LEHASIRUN
7.91: FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
7.92: EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU SHU’AJBËN KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU SHU’AJBËN KENU HUMUL-HASIRIN
7.93: FETEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA KAWMI LEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM RISALATI RABBI WE NESEHTU LEKUM FEKEJFE ‘ASA ‘ALA KAWMIN KEFIRIN
7.94: WE MA ‘ERSELNA FI KARJETIN MIN NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA ‘EHADHNA ‘EHLEHA BIL-BE’SA’I WE DERRA’I LE’AL-LEHUM JEDDERRA’UN
7.95: THUMME BEDDELNA MEKANE SEJJI’ETIL-HESENETE HATTE ‘AFEW WE KALU KAD MESSE ‘ABE’ENA DERRA’U WE SERRA’U FE’EHADHNAHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
7.96: WE LEW ‘ENNE ‘EHLAL-KURA ‘AMENU WE ETTEKAW LEFETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BERAKATIN MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI WE LAKIN KEDHDHEBU FE’EHADHNAHUM BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
7.97: ‘EFE’EMINE ‘EHLUL-KURA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM BE’SUNA BEJATËN WE HUM NA’IMUN
7.98: ‘EWE ‘EMINE ‘EHLUL-KURA ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM BE’SUNA DUHEN WE HUM JEL’ABUN
7.100: ‘EWELEM JEHDI LIL-LEDHINE JERITHUNAL-’ERDA MIN BE’DI ‘EHLIHA ‘EN LEW NESHA’U ‘ESEBNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE NETBE’U ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JESMA’UN
7.101: TILKAL-KURA NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE MIN ‘ENBE’IHA WE LEKAD XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEMA KENU LIJU’UMINU BIMA KEDHDHEBU MIN KABLU KEDHALIKE JETBE’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIL-KEFIRIN
7.102: WE MA WEXHEDNA LI’KTHERIHIM MIN ‘AHDIN WE ‘IN WEXHEDNA ‘EKTHERAHUM LEFESIKIN
7.103: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BE’DIHIM MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FEDHELEMU BIHA FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
7.104: WE KALE MUSA JA FIR’AWNU ‘INNI RASULUN MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
7.105: HEKIKUN ‘ALA ‘EN LA ‘EKULE ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HAKKA KAD XHI’TUKUM BIBEJJINETIN MIN RABBIKUM FE’ERSIL MA’I BENI ‘ISRA’IL
7.106: KALE ‘IN KUNTE XHI’TE BI’AJETIN FE’TI BIHA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
7.108: WE NEZE’A JEDEHU FE’IDHA HIJE BEJDA’U LILNNADHIRIN
7.109: KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMI FIR’AWNE ‘INNE HADHA LESAHIRUN ‘ALIMU
7.113: WE XHA’E SEHERATU FIR’AWNE KALU ‘INNE LENA LE’EXHRAN ‘IN KUNNA NAHNUL-GALIBIN
7.115: KALU JA MUSA ‘IMMA ‘EN TULKIJE WE ‘IMMA ‘EN NEKUNE NAHNUL-MULKIN
7.116: KALE ‘ELKU FELAMMA ‘ELKAW SEHERU ‘A’JUNE NASI WE ESTERHEBUHUM WE XHA’U BISIHRIN ‘ADHIMI
7.117: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘EN ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FE’IDHA HIJE TELKAFU MA JE’FIKUN
7.118: FEWEKA’AL-HEKKU WE BETELE MA KENU JA’MELUN
7.123: KALE FIR’AWNU ‘AMENTUM BIHI KABLE ‘EN ‘ADHENE LEKUM ‘INNE HADHA LEMEKRUN MEKERTUMUHU FIL-MEDINETI LITUHRIXHU MINHA ‘EHLEHA FESEWFE TA’LEMUN
7.124: LE’UKATTI’ANNE ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM MIN HILAFIN THUMME LE’USELLIBENNEKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
7.126: WE MA TENKIMU MINNA ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘AMANNA BI’AJATI RABBINA LEMMA XHA’ETNA RABBENA ‘EFRIG ‘ALEJNA SABRAN WE TEWEFFENA MUSLIMIN
7.127: WE KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMI FIR’AWNE ‘ETEDHERU MUSA WE KAWMEHU LIJUFSIDU FIL-’ËRDI WE JEDHERAKE WE ‘ALIHETEKE KALE SENUKATTILU ‘EBNA’EHUM WE NESTEHJI NISA’EHUM WE ‘INNA FEWKAHUM KAHIRUN
7.128: KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI ESTA’INU BIL-LAHI WE ESBIRU ‘INNAL-’ERDA LIL-LAHI JURITHUHA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WEL-’AKIBETU LILMUTTAKIN
7.129: KALU ‘UDHINA MIN KABLI ‘EN TE’TIJENA WE MIN BE’DI MA XHI’TENA KALE ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JUHLIKE ‘ADUWEKUM WE JESTEHLIFEKUM FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURA KEJFE TA’MELUN
7.130: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE BIS-SININE WE NEKSIN MINE THEMERATI LE’AL-LEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
7.131: FE’IDHË XHË’ET/HUMUL-HESENETU KALU LENA HEDHIHI WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN JETTEJJERU BIMUSA WE MEN ME’AHU ‘ALA ‘INNAMA TA’IRUHUM ‘IND-ALLAHI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
7.132: WE KALU MEHMA TE’TINA BIHI MIN ‘AJETIN LITESHERANA BIHA FEMA NAHNU LEKE BIMU’UMININ
7.133: FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIMUT-TUFENE WEL-XHERADE WEL-KUMMELE WE DEFEDI’A WE DEME ‘AJATIN MUFESSALATIN FESTEKBERU WE KENU KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
7.134: WE LEMMA WEKA’A ‘ALEJHIMU RIXHZU KALU JA MUSA ED’U LENA RABBEKE BIMA ‘AHIDE ‘INDEKE LE’IN KESHEFTE ‘ANNA RIXHZE LENU’UMINENNE LEKE WE LENURSILENNE ME’AKE BENI ‘ISRA’IL
7.135: FELAMMA KESHEFNA ‘ANHUMU RIXHZE ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN HUM BELIGUHU ‘IDHA HUM JENKUTHUN
7.136: FENTEKAMNA MINHUM FE’EGRAKNAHUM FIL-JEMMI BI’ENNEHUM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE KENU ‘ANHA GAFILIN
7.137: WE ‘EWRATHNAL-KAWMEL-LEDHINE KENU JUSTED’AFUNE MESHARIKAL-’ARDI WE MEGARIBEHA AL-LETI BERAKNA FIHË WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKAL-HUSNA ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE BIMA SEBERU WE DEMMERNA MA KANE JESNA’U FIR’AWNU WE KAWMUHU WE MA KENU JA’RISHUN
7.138: WE XHAWEZNA BIBENI ‘ISRA’ILAL-BEHRA FE’ETEW ‘ALA KAWMIN JA’KUFUNE ‘ALA ‘ESNAMIN LEHUM KALU JA MUSA EXH’AL LENA ‘ILEHËN KAMA LEHUM ‘ALIHETUN KALE ‘INNEKUM KAWMUN TEXHHELUN
7.139: ‘INNE HA’UULË’ MUTEBBERUN MA HUM FIHI WE BETILUN MA KENU JA’MELUN
7.141: WE ‘IDH ‘ENXHEJNAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’AL-’ADHABI JUKATTILUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
7.142: WE WE’ADNA MUSA THALATHINE LEJLETEN WE ‘ETMEMNAHA BI’ASHRIN FETEMME MIKATU RABBIHI ‘ERBE’INE LEJLETEN WE KALE MUSA LI’HIHI HARUNE EHLUFNI FI KAWMI WE ‘ESLIH WE LA TETTEBI’ SEBILAL-MUFSIDIN
7.143: WE LEMMA XHA’E MUSA LIMIKATINA WE KELLEMEHU RABBUHU KALE RABBI ‘ERINI ‘ENDHUR ‘ILEJKE KALE LEN TERANI WE LAKINI ENDHUR ‘ILAL-XHEBELI FE’INI ESTEKARRA MEKANEHU FESEWFE TERANI FELAMMA TEXHELLA RABBUHU LILXHEBELI XHE’ALEHU DEKKËN WE HARRA MUSA SA’IKËN FELAMMA ‘EFEKA KALE SUBHANEKE TUBTU ‘ILEJKE WE ‘ENA ‘EWWELUL-MU’UMININ
7.144: KALE JA MUSA ‘INNI ESTEFEJTUKE ‘ALA NASI BIRISALATI WE BIKALAMI FEHUDH MA ‘ATEJTUKE WE KUN MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
7.145: WE KETEBNA LEHU FIL-’ELWEHI MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MEW’IDHETEN WE TEFSILËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN FEHUDH/HA BIKUWETIN WE ‘MUR KAWMEKE JE’HUDHU BI’EHSENIHA SE’URIKUM DARAL-FESIKIN
7.146: SE’ESRIFU ‘AN ‘AJATIJEL-LEDHINE JETEKEBBERUNE FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE ‘IN JERAW KUL-LE ‘AJETIN LA JU’UMINU BIHA WE ‘IN JERAW SEBILE RUSHDI LA JETTEHIDHUHU SEBILËN WE ‘IN JERAW SEBILAL-GAJJI JETTEHIDHUHU SEBILËN DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE KENU ‘ANHA GAFILIN
7.147: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE LIKA’IL-’AHIRATI HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM HEL JUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KENU JA’MELUN
7.148: WE ETTEHADHE KAWMU MUSA MIN BE’DIHI MIN HULIJIHIM ‘IXHLËN XHESEDËN LEHU HUWERUN ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ENNEHU LA JUKELLIMUHUM WE LA JEHDIHIM SEBILËN ETTEHADHUHU WE KENU DHALIMIN
7.149: WE LEMMA SUKITE FI ‘EJDIHIM WE RA’EW ‘ENNEHUM KAD DELLU KALU LE’IN LEM JERHEMNA RABBUNA WE JEGFIR LENA LENEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
7.150: WE LEMMA RAXHE’A MUSA ‘ILA KAWMIHI GADBENE ‘ESIFËN KALE BI’SEMA HALEFTUMUNI MIN BE’DI ‘E’AXHILTUM ‘EMRA RABBIKUM WE ‘ELKAL-’ELWEHE WE ‘EHADHE BIRA’SI ‘EHIHI JEXHURRUHU ‘ILEJHI KALE EBNE ‘UMME ‘INNAL-KAWME ESTED’AFUNI WE KADU JEKTULUNENI FELA TUSHMIT BIJAL-’A’DA’E WE LA TEXH’ALNI ME’AL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
7.151: KALE RABBI EGFIR LI WE LI’EHI WE ‘EDHILNA FI RAHMETIKE WE ‘ENTE ‘ERHEMU RAHIMIN
7.152: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHUL-’IXHLE SEJENALUHUM GADEBUN MIN RABBIHIM WE DHIL-LETUN FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUFTERIN
7.153: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SEJJI’ATI THUMME TABU MIN BE’DIHA WE ‘AMENU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BE’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
7.154: WE LEMMA SEKETE ‘AN MUSAL-GADEBU ‘EHADHAL-’ELWEHE WE FI NUSHATIHA HUDAN WE RAHMETUN LIL-LEDHINE HUM LIRABBIHIM JERHEBUN
7.155: WE EHTARA MUSA KAWMEHU SEB’INE RAXHULËN LIMIKATINA FELAMMA ‘EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU KALE RABBI LEW SHI’TE ‘EHLEKTEHUM MIN KABLU WE ‘IJAJE ‘ETUHLIKUNA BIMA FE’ALE SUFEHA’U MINNA ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA FITNETUKE TUDILLU BIHA MEN TESHA’U WE TEHDI MEN TESHA’U ‘ENTE WELIJUNA FEGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-GAFIRIN
7.156: WE EKTUB LENA FI HEDHIHI DUN'JA HESENETEN WE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘INNA HUDNA ‘ILEJKE KALE ‘ADHABI ‘USIBU BIHI MEN ‘ESHA’U WE RAHMETI WESI’AT KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FESE’EKTUBUHA LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WEL-LEDHINE HUM BI’AJATINA JU’UMINUN
7.157: EL-LEDHINE JETTEBI’UNE RASULE NEBIJAL-’UMMIJEL-LEDHI JEXHIDUNEHU MEKTUBËN ‘INDEHUM FIT-TEWRATI WEL-’INXHILI JE’MURUHUM BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHAHUM ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUHILLU LEHUMUT-TEJJIBETI WE JUHERRIMU ‘ALEJHIMUL-HABE’ITHE WE JEDA’U ‘ANHUM ‘ISRAHUM WEL-’EGLALEL-LETI KANET ‘ALEJHIM FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIHI WE ‘AZZERUHU WE NESERUHU WE ETTEBE’U NUREL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ME’AHU ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
7.158: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNI RASULU LLAHI ‘ILEJKUM XHEMI’ËNL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI NEBIJIL-’UMMIJIL-LEDHI JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE KELIMATIHI WE ETTEBI’UHU LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
7.159: WE MIN KAWMI MUSA ‘UMMETUN JEHDUNE BIL-HAKKI WE BIHI JA’DILUN
7.160: WE KATTA’NAHUMU ETHNETEJ ‘ASHRATE ‘ESBETËN ‘UMEMËN WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘IDH ESTESKAHU KAWMUHU ‘ENI EDRIB BI’ASAKAL-HEXHERA FENBEXHESET MINHU ETHNETA ‘ASHRATE ‘AJNËN KAD ‘ALIME KUL-LU ‘UNASIN MESHRABEHUM WE DHAL-LELNA ‘ALEJHIMUL-GAMAME WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHIMUL-MENNE WE SELWE KULU MIN TEJJIBETI MA RAZEKNAKUM WE MA DHELEMUNA WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
7.161: WE ‘IDH KILA LEHUMU ESKUNU HEDHIHIL-KARJETE WE KULU MINHA HEJTHU SHI’TUM WE KULU HITTETUN WE EDHULUL-BEBE SUXHXHEDËN NEGFIR LEKUM HATI’ATIKUM SENEZIDUL-MUHSININ
7.162: FEBEDDALEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM KAWLËN GAJREL-LEDHI KILA LEHUM FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KENU JEDHLIMUN
7.163: WE ES’ELHUM ‘ANIL-KARJETI AL-LETI KANET HADIRATAL-BEHRI ‘IDH JA’DUNE FI SEBTI ‘IDH TE’TIHIM HITANUHUM JEWME SEBTIHIM SHURRA’ËN WE JEWME LA JESBITUNE LA TE’TIHIM KEDHALIKE NEBLUHUM BIMA KENU JEFSUKUN
7.164: WE ‘IDH KALET ‘UMMETUN MINHUM LIME TA’IDHUNE KAWMËN ALLAHU MUHLIKUHUM ‘EW MU’ADHDHIBUHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN KALU MA’DHIRATEN ‘ILA RABBIKUM WE LE’AL-LEHUM JETTEKUN
7.165: FELAMMA NESU MA DHUKKIRU BIHI ‘ENXHEJNEL-LEDHINE JENHEWNE ‘ANI SU’I WE ‘EHADHNEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU BI’ADHABIN BE’ISIN BIMA KENU JEFSUKUN
7.166: FELAMMA ‘ATEW ‘AN MA NUHU ‘ANHU KULNA LEHUM KUNU KIRADETEN HASI’IN
7.167: WE ‘IDH TE’EDHDHENE RABBUKE LEJEB’ATHENNE ‘ALEJHIM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN JESUMUHUM SU’AL-’ADHABI ‘INNE RABBEKE LESERI’UL-’IKABI WE ‘INNEHU LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
7.168: WE KATTA’NAHUM FIL-’ËRDI ‘UMEMËN MINHUMU SALIHUNE WE MINHUM DUNE DHALIKE WE BELEWNAHUM BIL-HESENATI WE SEJJI’ATI LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
7.169: FEHALEFE MIN BE’DIHIM HALFUN WERITHUL-KITABE JE’HUDHUNE ‘ARADE HADHAL-’EDNA WE JAKULUNE SEJUGFERU LENA WE ‘IN JE’TIHIM ‘ARADUN MITHLUHU JE’HUDHUHU ‘ELEM JU’UHADH ‘ALEJHIM MITHAKUL-KITABI ‘EN LA JAKULU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘IL-LAL-HAKKA WE DERASU MA FIHI WE DARUL-’AHIRATU HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JETTEKUNE ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
7.170: WEL-LEDHINE JUMESSIKUNE BIL-KITABI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE ‘INNA LA NUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUSLIHIN
7.171: WE ‘IDH NETEKNAL-XHEBELE FEWKAHUM KE’ENNEHU DHULLETUN WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHU WEKI’UN BIHIM HUDHU MA ‘ATEJNAKUM BIKUWETIN WE EDHKURU MA FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TETTEKUN
7.172: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHE RABBUKE MIN BENI ‘ADEME MIN DHUHURIHIM DHURRIJETEHUM WE ‘ESH/HEDEHUM ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘ELESTU BIRABBIKUM KALU BELA SHEHIDNA ‘EN TEKULU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘INNA KUNNA ‘AN HADHA GAFILIN
7.173: ‘EW TEKULU ‘INNAMA ‘ESHRAKE ‘ABE’UUNA MIN KABLU WE KUNNA DHURRIJETEN MIN BE’DIHIM ‘EFETUHLIKUNA BIMA FE’ALEL-MUBTILUN
7.174: WE KEDHELIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI WE LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
7.175: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’EL-LEDHI ‘ATEJNAHU ‘AJATINA FENSELEHA MINHA FE’ETBE’AHU SHEJTANU FEKANE MINEL-GAWIN
7.176: WE LEW SHI’NA LERAFE’NAHU BIHA WE LAKINNEHU ‘EHLEDE ‘ILAL-’ARDI WE ETTEBE’A HEWEHU FEMETHELUHU KEMETHELIL-KELBI ‘IN TEHMIL ‘ALEJHI JELHETH ‘EW TETRUK/HU JELHETH DHALIKE METHELUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FEKSUSIL-KASESE LE’AL-LEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
7.177: SA’E METHELËNL-KAWMUL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE ‘ANFUSAHUM KENU JEDHLIMUN
7.178: MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
7.179: WE LEKAD DHERA’NA LIXHEHENNEME KETHIRAN MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI LEHUM KULUBUN LA JEFKAHUNE BIHA WE LEHUM ‘A’JUNUN LA JUBSIRUNE BIHA WE LEHUM ‘ADHANUN LA JESMA’UNE BIHA ‘ULË’IKE KAL’EN’AMI BEL HUM ‘EDELLU ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-GAFILUN
7.180: WE LIL-LEHIL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA FED’UHU BIHA WE DHERUL-LEDHINE JULHIDUNE FI ‘ESMA’IHI SEJUXHZEWNE MA KENU JA’MELUN
7.181: WE MIMMEN HALEKNA ‘UMMETUN JEHDUNE BIL-HAKKI WE BIHI JA’DILUN
7.182: WEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA SENESTEDRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU LA JA’LEMUN
7.184: ‘EWELEM JETEFEKKERU MA BISAHIBIHIM MIN XHINNETIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
7.185: ‘EWELEM JENDHURU FI MELEKUTI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA HALEKEL-LEHU MIN SHEJ’IN WE ‘EN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE KADI EKTERABE ‘EXHELUHUM FEBI’EJJI HEDITHIN BE’DEHU JU’UMINUN
7.186: MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FELA HADIJE LEHU WE JEDHERUHUM FI TUG'JANIHIM JA’MEHUN
7.187: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI SA’ATI ‘EJJANE MURSAHA KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ILMUHA ‘INDE RABBI LA JUXHELLIHA LIWEKTIHA ‘IL-LA HUWE THEKULET FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI LA TE’TIKUM ‘IL-LA BEGTETEN JES’ELUNEKE KE’ENNEKE HEFIJUN ‘ANHA KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ILMUHA ‘IND-ALLAHI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
7.188: KUL LA ‘EMLIKU LINEFSI NEF’ËN WE LA DERRAN ‘IL-LA MA SHA’-ALLAHU WE LEW KUNTU ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE LASTEKTHERTU MINEL-HAJRI WE MA MESSENIJE SU’U ‘IN ‘ENA ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN WE BESHIRUN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
7.189: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WEHIDETIN WE XHE’ALE MINHA ZEWXHEHA LIJESKUNE ‘ILEJHA FELAMMA TEGASHSHAHA HEMELET HEMLËN HAFIFËN FEMERRAT BIHI FELAMMA ‘ETHKALET DE’AWE LLAHE RABBEHUMA LE’IN ‘ATEJTENA SALIHËN LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
7.190: FELAMMA ‘ATAHUMA SALIHËN XHE’ALA LEHU SHURAKA’E FIMA ‘ATAHUMA FETA’ALELLAHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
7.191: ‘EJUSHRIKUNE MA LA JEHLUKU SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUN
7.192: WE LA JESTETI’UNE LEHUM NESRAN WE LA ‘ANFUSAHUM JENSURUN
7.193: WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA LA JETTEBI’UKUM SEWE’UN ‘ALEJKUM ‘EDE’AWTUMUHUM ‘EM ‘ENTUM SAMITUN
7.194: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘IBEDUN ‘EMTHALUKUM FED’UHUM FELJESTEXHIBU LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
7.195: ‘ELEHUM ‘ERXHULUN JEMSHUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘EJDIN JEBTISHUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘A’JUNUN JUBSIRUNE BIHA ‘EM LEHUM ‘ADHANUN JESMA’UNE BIHA KULI ED’U SHURAKA’EKUM THUMME KIDUNI FELA TUNDHIRUN
7.196: ‘INNE WELIJIJAL-LAHUL-LEDHI NEZZALEL-KITABE WE HUWE JETEWELLA SALIHIN
7.197: WEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JESTETI’UNE NESRAKUM WE LA ‘ANFUSAHUM JENSURUN
7.198: WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA LA JESMA’U WE TERAHUM JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE WE HUM LA JUBSIRUN
7.200: WE ‘IMMA JENZEGANNEKE MINE SHEJTANI NEZGUN FESTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
7.201: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘IDHA MESSEHUM TA’IFUN MINE SHEJTANI TEDHEKKERU FE’IDHA HUM MUBSIRUN
7.202: WE ‘IHWENUHUM JEMUDDUNEHUM FIL-GAJJI THUMME LA JUKSIRUN
7.203: WE ‘IDHA LEM TE’TIHIM BI’AJETIN KALU LEWLA EXHTEBEJTEHA KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ETTEBI’U MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE MIN RABBI HADHA BESA’IRU MIN RABBIKUM WE HUDAN WE RAHMETUN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
7.204: WE ‘IDHA KURI’AL-KUR’ANU FESTEMI’U LEHU WE ‘ENSITU LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
7.205: WE EDHKUR RABBEKE FI NEFSIKE TEDERRU’ËN WE HIFETEN WE DUNAL-XHEHRI MINEL-KAWLI BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASALI WE LA TEKUN MINEL-GAFILIN
7.206: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘INDE RABBIKE LA JESTEKBIRUNE ‘AN ‘IBEDETIHI WE JUSEBBIHUNEHU WE LEHU JESXHUDUN

8.1: JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANIL-’ENFEL KULIL-’ENFELI LIL-LAHI WE RASULI FE ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘ESLIHU DHATE BEJNIKUM WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULEHU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
8.2: ‘INNAMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEXHILET KULUBUHUM WE ‘IDHA TULIJET ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUHU ZADET/HUM ‘IMANËN WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
8.3: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
8.4: ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MU’UMINUNE HEKKËN LEHUM DERAXHATUN ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
8.5: KAMA ‘EHRAXHEKE RABBUKE MIN BEJTIKE BIL-HAKKI WE ‘INNE FERIKËN MINEL-MU’UMININE LEKARIHUN
8.6: JUXHADILUNEKE FIL-HEKKI BE’DEMA TEBEJJENE KE’ENNEMA JUSAKUNE ‘ILAL-MEWTI WE HUM JENDHURUN
8.7: WE ‘IDH JA’IDUKUMU LLAHU ‘IHDAT-TA’IFETEJNI ‘ENNEHA LEKUM WE TEWEDDUNE ‘ENNE GAJRA DHATI SHEWKETI TEKUNU LEKUM WE JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JUHIKKAL-HAKKA BIKELIMATIHI WE JEKTE’A DABIRAL-KEFIRIN
8.8: LIJUHIKKAL-HAKKA WE JUBTILAL-BETILE WE LEW KERIHAL-MUXHRIMUN
8.9: ‘IDH TESTEGITHUNE RABBEKUM FESTEXHABE LEKUM ‘ENNI MUMIDDUKUM BI’ELFIN MINEL-MELE’IKETI MURDIFIN
8.10: WE MA XHE’ALEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA BUSHRA WE LITETME’INNE BIHI KULUBUKUM WE MA NESRU ‘IL-LA MIN ‘INDI LEHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.11: ‘IDH JUGASHSHIKUMU NU’ASE ‘EMENETEN MINHU WE JUNEZZILU ‘ALEJKUM MINE SEMA’I MA’EN LIJUTEHHIRAKUM BIHI WE JUDH/HIBE ‘ANKUM RIXHZE SHEJTANI WE LIJERBITE ‘ALA KULUBIKUM WE JUTHEBBITE BIHIL-’EKDAM
8.12: ‘IDH JUHI RABBUKE ‘ILAL-MELE’IKETI ‘ENNI ME’AKUM FETHEBBITUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SE’ULKI FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE KEFERU RU’BE FEDRIBU FEWKAL-’A’NAKI WE EDRIBU MINHUM KUL-LE BENANI
8.13: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM SHAKKU LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE MEN JUSHAKIKI LLAHE WE RASULEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.15: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA LEKITUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ZEHFËN FELA TUWELLUHUMUL-’EDBER
8.16: WE MEN JUWELLIHIM JEWME’IDHIN DUBURAHU ‘IL-LA MUTEHERRIFËN LIKITALIN ‘EW MUTEHEJJIZËN ‘ILA FI’ETIN FEKAD BE’E BIGADEBIN MINELLAHI WE ME’WEHU XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MESIR
8.17: FELEM TEKTULUHUM WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE KATELEHUM WE MA RAMEJTE ‘IDH RAMEJTE WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE RAMA WE LIJUBLIJAL-MU’UMININE MINHU BELA’EN HESENËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.19: ‘IN TESTEFTIHU FEKAD XHA’EKUMUL-FETHU WE ‘IN TENTEHU FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘IN TA’UDU NA’UD WE LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANKUM FI’ETUKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LEW KETHURAT WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE ME’AL-MU’UMININ
8.20: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE LA TEWEL-LEW ‘ANHU WE ‘ENTUM TESMA’UN
8.21: WE LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE KALU SEMI’NA WE HUM LA JESMA’UN
8.23: WE LEW ‘ALIM ALLAHU FIHIM HAJRAN LE’ESME’AHUM WE LEW ‘ESME’AHUM LETEWEL-LEW WE HUM MU’RIDUN
8.24: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ESTEXHIBU LIL-LAHI WE LILRRASULI ‘IDHA DA’AKUM LIMA JUHJIKUM WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JEHULU BEJNAL-MER’I WE KALBIHI WE ‘ENNEHU ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
8.25: WE ETTEKU FITNETEN LA TUSIBENNEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINKUM HASSETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.26: WE EDHKURU ‘IDH ‘ENTUM KALILUN MUSTED’AFUNE FIL-’ËRDI TEHAFUNE ‘EN JETEHATTEFEKUMU NASU FE’AWEKUM WE ‘EJJEDEKUM BINESRIHI WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBETI LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
8.27: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEHUNU LLAHE WE RASULE WE TEHUNU ‘EMANATIKUM WE ‘ENTUM TA’LEMUN
8.29: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TETTEKU LLAHE JEXH’AL LEKUM FURKANËN WE JUKEFFIR ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
8.30: WE ‘IDH JEMKURU BIKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIJUTHBITUKE ‘EW JEKTULUKE ‘EW JUHRIXHUKE WE JEMKURUNE WE JEMKURU ALLAHU WA-LLAHU HAJRUL-MAKIRIN
8.31: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA KALU KAD SEMI’NA LEW NESHA’U LAKULNA MITHLE HADHA ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
8.32: WE ‘IDH KALUL-LEHUMME ‘IN KANE HADHA HUWEL-HAKKA MIN ‘INDIKE FE’EMTIR ‘ALEJNA HIXHARATEN MINE SEMA’I ‘EW E’TINA BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
8.33: WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJU’ADHDHIBEHUM WE ‘ENTE FIHIM WE MA KANAL-LAHU MU’ADHDHIBEHUM WE HUM JESTEGFIRUN
8.34: WE MA LEHUM ‘ELLA JU’ADHDHIBEHUMU LLAHU WE HUM JESUDDUNE ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WE MA KENU ‘EWLIJA’EHU ‘IN ‘EWLIJA’UUHU ‘IL-LAL-MUTTEKUNE WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
8.35: WE MA KANE SALATUHUM ‘INDAL-BEJTI ‘IL-LA MUKA’EN WE TESDIJETEN FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
8.36: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUNFIKUNE ‘EMWELEHUM LIJESUDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI FESEJUNFIKUNEHA THUMME TEKUNU ‘ALEJHIM HESRATEN THUMME JUGLEBUNE WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA XHEHENNEME JUHSHERUN
8.37: LIJEMIZAL-LAHUL-HABITHE MINET-TEJJIBI WE JEXH’ALEL-HABITHE BE’DEHU ‘ALA BE’DIN FEJERKUMEHU XHEMI’ËN FEJEXH’ALEHU FI XHEHENNEME ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
8.38: KUL LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN JENTEHU JUGFER LEHUM MA KAD SELEFE WE ‘IN JA’UDU FEKAD MEDET SUNNETUL-’EWWELIN
8.39: WE KATILUHUM HATTE LA TEKUNE FITNETUN WE JEKUNE DINU KUL-LUHU LIL-LAHI FE’INI ENTEHEW FE’INNALL-LLAHE BIMA JA’MELUNE BESIRU
8.40: WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE MEWLAKUM NI’MAL-MEWLA WE NI’ME NESIR
8.41: WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEMA GANIMTUM MIN SHEJ’IN FE’ENNE LIL-LAHI HUMUSEHU WE LILRRASULI WE LIDHIL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘AMENTUM BIL-LAHI WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALA ‘ABDINA JEWMAL-FURKANI JEWMET-TEKAL-XHEM’ANI WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
8.42: ‘IDH ‘ENTUM BIL-’UDWETI DUN'JA WE HUM BIL-’UDWETIL-KUSWE WE RAKBU ‘ESFELE MINKUM WE LEW TEWE’ADTTUM LAHTELEFTUM FIL-MI’ADI WE LAKIN LIJEKDIJAL-LAHU ‘EMRAN KANE MEF’ULËN LIJEHLIKE MEN HELEKE ‘AN BEJJINETIN WE JEHJA MEN HEJJE ‘AN BEJJINETIN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LESEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.43: ‘IDH JURIKEHUMU LLAHU FI MENAMIKE KALILËN WE LEW ‘ERAKEHUM KETHIRAN LEFESHILTUM WE LETENAZA’TUM FIL-’EMRI WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE SELLEME ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
8.44: WE ‘IDH JURIKUMUHUM ‘IDHIT-TEKAJTUM FI ‘A’JUNIKUM KALILËN WE JUKALLILUKUM FI ‘A’JUNIHIM LIJEKDIJAL-LAHU ‘EMRAN KANE MEF’ULËN WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
8.45: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA LEKITUM FI’ETEN FETHBUTU WE EDHKURU LLAHE KETHIRAN LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
8.46: WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE LA TENAZA’U FETEFSHELU WE TEDH/HEBE RIHUKUM WE ESBIRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’A SABIRIN
8.47: WE LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE HARAXHU MIN DIJARIHIM BETERAN WE RI’A’E NASI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WA-LLAHU BIMA JA’MELUNE MUHITU
8.48: WE ‘IDH ZEJJENE LEHUMU SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM WE KALE LA GALIBE LEKUMUL-JEWME MINE NASI WE ‘INNI XHARUN LEKUM FELAMMA TERA’ETIL-FI’ETANI NEKESE ‘ALA ‘AKIBEJHI WE KALE ‘INNI BERI’UN MINKUM ‘INNI ‘ERA MA LA TERAWNE ‘INNIJI ‘EHAFU LLAHE WA-LLAHU SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.49: ‘IDH JAKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN GARRA HA’UULË’ DINUHUM WE MEN JETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.50: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH JETEWEFFEL-LEDHINE KEFERUL-MELE’IKETU JEDRIBUNE WUXHUHEHUM WE ‘EDBERAHUM WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
8.51: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIKUM WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LEJSE BIDHAL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
8.52: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEFERU BI’AJATI LEHI FE’EHADHEHUMU LLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAWIJUN SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
8.53: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE LEM JEKU MUGAJJIRAN NI’METEN ‘EN’AMEHA ‘ALA KAWMIN HATTE JUGAJJIRU MA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
8.54: KEDE’BI ‘ALI FIR’AWNE WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM FE’EHLEKNAHUM BIDHUNUBIHIM WE ‘EGRAKNA ‘ALE FIR’AWNE WE KUL-LUN KENU DHALIMIN
8.55: ‘INNE SHERRA DEWEBBI ‘IND-ALLAHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
8.56: EL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTE MINHUM THUMME JENKUDUNE ‘AHDEHUM FI KUL-LI MERRATIN WE HUM LA JETTEKUN
8.57: FE’IMMA TETHKAFENNEHUM FIL-HERBI FESHERRID BIHIM MEN HALFEHUM LE’AL-LEHUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
8.58: WE ‘IMMA TEHAFENNE MIN KAWMIN HIJANETEN FENBIDH ‘ILEJHIM ‘ALA SEWE’IN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-HA’ININ
8.59: WE LA JEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SEBEKU ‘INNAHUM LA JU’XHIZUN
8.60: WE ‘A’IDDU LEHUM MA ESTETA’TUM MIN KUWETIN WE MIN RIBETIL-HAJLI TURHIBUNE BIHI ‘ADUWEL-LAHI WE ‘ADUWEKUM WE ‘AHARINE MIN DUNIHIM LA TA’LEMUNEHUMU LLAHU JA’LEMUHUM WE MA TUNFIKU MIN SHEJ’IN FI SEBILI -LEHI JUWEFFE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TUDHLEMUN
8.61: WE ‘IN XHENEHU LILSSELMI FEXHNEH LEHA WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
8.62: WE ‘IN JURIDU ‘EN JEHDA’UKE FE’INNE HESBEKEL-LEHU HUWEL-LEDHI ‘EJJEDEKE BINESRIHI WE BIL-MU’UMININ
8.63: WE ‘ELLEFE BEJNE KULUBIHIM LEW ‘ENFEKTE MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN MA ‘ELLEFTE BEJNE KULUBIHIM WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE ‘ELLEFE BEJNEHUM ‘INNEHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.64: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU HESBUKEL-LEHU WE MENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-MU’UMININ
8.65: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU HERRIDIL-MU’UMININE ‘ALEL-KITALI ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM ‘ISHRUNE SABIRUNE JEGLIBU MIA’ETEJNI WE ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM MIA’ETUN JEGLIBU ‘ELFËN MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
8.66: AL-’ANE HAFFEFEL-LAHU ‘ANKUM WE ‘ALIME ‘ENNE FIKUM DA’FËN FE’IN JEKUN MINKUM MIA’ETUN SABIRATUN JEGLIBU MIA’ETEJNI WE ‘IN JEKUN MINKUM ‘ELFUN JEGLIBU ‘ELFEJNI BI’IDHNI LEHI WA-LLAHU ME’A SABIRIN
8.67: MA KANE LINEBIJIN ‘EN JEKUNE LEHU ‘ESRA HATTE JUTHHINE FIL-’ËRDI TURIDUNE ‘ARADE DUN'JA WA-LLAHU JURIDUL-’AHIRATE WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
8.68: LEWLA KITABUN MINELLAHI SEBEKA LEMESSEKUM FIMA ‘EHADHTUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
8.69: FEKULU MIMMA GANIMTUM HALELËN TEJJIBËN WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
8.70: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LIMEN FI ‘EJDIKUM MINEL-’ESRA ‘IN JA’LEMI ALLAHU FI KULUBIKUM HAJRAN JU’UTIKUM HAJRAN MIMMA ‘UHIDHE MINKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
8.71: WE ‘IN JURIDU HIJANETEKE FEKAD HANU LLAHE MIN KABLU FE’EMKENE MINHUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
8.72: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI -LEHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AWEW WE NESERU ‘ULË’IKE BE’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BE’DIN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEM JUHAXHERU MA LEKUM MIN WELAJETIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN HATTE JUHAXHIRU WE ‘INI ESTENSERUKUM FI DINI FE’ALEJKUMU NESRU ‘IL-LA ‘ALA KAWMIN BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM MITHAKUN WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
8.73: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BE’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BE’DIN ‘IL-LA TEF’ALUHU TEKUN FITNETUN FIL-’ËRDI WE FESADUN KEBIRU
8.74: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI -LEHI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AWEW WE NESERU ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MU’UMINUNE HEKKËN LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
8.75: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MIN BE’DU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU ME’AKUM FE’ULË’IKE MINKUM WE ‘ULUL-’ERHAMI BE’DUHUM ‘EWLA BIBE’DIN FI KITABI LEHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

9.2: FESIHU FIL-’ËRDI ‘ERBE’ATE ‘ESH/HURIN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM GAJRU MU’XHIZI LEHI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE MUHZIL-KEFIRIN
9.3: WE ‘EDHANUN MINELLAHI WE RASULIHI ‘ILA NASI JEWMAL-HEXHXHIL-’EKBERI ‘ENNA-LLAHE BERI’UN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE WE RASULUHU FE’IN TUBTUM FEHUWE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FE’LEMU ‘ENNEKUM GAJRU MU’XHIZI LEHI WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
9.4: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTTUM MINEL-MUSHRIKINE THUMME LEM JENKUSUKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LEM JUDHAHIRU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EHEDËN FE’ETIMMU ‘ILEJHIM ‘AHDEHUM ‘ILA MUDDETIHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
9.5: FE’IDHA ENSELEHAL-’ESH/HURUL-HURUMU FEKTULUL-MUSHRIKINE HEJTHU WEXHEDTUMUHUM WE HUDHUHUM WE EHSURUHUM WEK’UDU LEHUM KUL-LE MERSEDIN FE’IN TABU WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE FEHALLU SEBILEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.6: WE ‘IN ‘EHEDUN MINEL-MUSHRIKINE ESTEXHARAKE FE’EXHIRHU HATTE JESME’A KALAMALLAHI THUMME ‘EBLIG/HU ME’MENEHU DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’LEMUN
9.7: KEJFE JEKUNU LILMUSHRIKINE ‘AHDUN ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘INDE RASULIHI ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE ‘AHEDTUM ‘INDAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI FEMA ESTEKAMU LEKUM FESTEKIMU LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUTTEKIN
9.8: KEJFE WE ‘IN JEDHHERU ‘ALEJKUM LA JERKUBU FIKUM ‘ILLËN WE LA DHIMMETEN JURDUNEKUM BI’EFWEHIHIM WE TE’BE KULUBUHUM WE ‘EKTHERUHUM FESIKUN
9.9: ASHTARAW BI’AJATI LEHI THEMENËN KALILËN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILIHI ‘INNAHUM SA’E MA KENU JA’MELUN
9.10: LA JERKUBUNE FI MU’UMININ ‘ILLËN WE LA DHIMMETEN WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MU’TEDUN
9.11: FE’IN TABU WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE FE’IHWENUKUM FI DINI WE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
9.12: WE ‘IN NEKETHU ‘EJMANEHUM MIN BE’DI ‘AHDIHIM WE TE’ANU FI DINIKUM FEKATILU ‘E’IMMETAL-KUFRI ‘INNAHUM LA ‘EJMANE LEHUM LE’AL-LEHUM JENTEHUN
9.13: ‘ALA TUKATILUNE KAWMËN NEKETHU ‘EJMANEHUM WE HEMMU BI’IHRAXHI RASULI WE HUM BEDE’UKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN ‘ETEHSHEWNEHUM FE-ALLAHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEHSHEWHU ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
9.14: KATILUHUM JU’ADHDHIBHUMU LLAHU BI’EJDIKUM WE JUHZIHIM WE JENSURKUM ‘ALEJHIM WE JESHFI SUDURA KAWMIN MU’UMININ
9.15: WE JUDH/HIB GAJDHE KULUBIHIM WE JETUBU ALLAHU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.16: ‘EM HESIBTUM ‘EN TUTRAKU WE LEMMA JA’LEMI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU MINKUM WE LEM JETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI LEHI WE LA RASULIHI WE LAL-MU’UMININE WELIXHETEN WA-LLAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
9.17: MA KANE LILMUSHRIKINE ‘EN JA’MURU MESAXHIDALLAHI SHAHIDINE ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM BIL-KUFRI ‘ULË’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM WE FI NARI HUM HALIDUN
9.18: ‘INNAMA JA’MURU MESAXHIDALLAHI MEN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ‘EKAME SELËTE WE ‘ATA EZ-ZEKËTE WE LEM JEHSHE ‘IL-LALLAHE FE’ASA ‘ULË’IKE ‘EN JEKUNU MINEL-MUHTADIN
9.19: ‘EXHE’ALTUM SIKAJETAL-HAXHXHI WE ‘IMARATAL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI KEMEN ‘AMANA BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE XHAHEDE FI SEBILI -LEHI LA JESTEWUNE ‘IND-ALLAHI WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
9.20: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HAXHERU WE XHAHEDU FI SEBILI -LEHI BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘A’DHEMU DERAXHETEN ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-FE’IZUN
9.21: JUBESHSHIRUHUM RABBUHUM BIRAHMETIN MINHU WE RIDWENIN WE XHENNATIN LEHUM FIHË NA’IMUN MUKIMU
9.23: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ABE’EKUM WE ‘IHWENEKUM ‘EWLIJA’E ‘INI ESTEHEBBUL-KUFRA ‘ALEL-’IMANI WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM MINKUM FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
9.24: KUL ‘IN KANE ‘ABE’UUKUM WE ‘EBNA’UUKUM WE ‘IHWENUKUM WE ‘EZWEXHUKUM WE ‘ASHIRATUKUM WE ‘EMWELUN EKTERAFTUMUHA WE TIXHARATUN TEHSHEWNE KESADEHA WE MESAKINU TERDAWNEHA ‘EHEBBE ‘ILEJKUM MINELLAHI WE RASULIHI WE XHIHADIN FI SEBILIHI FETERABBESU HATTE JE’TIJAL-LAHU BI’EMRIHI WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-FESIKIN
9.25: LEKAD NESERAKUMU LLAHU FI MEWETINE KETHIRATIN WE JEWME HUNEJNIN ‘IDH ‘A’XHEBETKUM KETHRATUKUM FELEM TUGNI ‘ANKUM SHEJ’ËN WE DAKAT ‘ALEJKUMUL-’ERDU BIMA RAHUBET THUMME WELLEJTUM MUDBIRIN
9.26: THUMME ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WE ‘ENZELE XHUNUDËN LEM TERAWHA WE ‘ADHDHEBEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE DHELIKE XHEZA’UL-KEFIRIN
9.27: THUMME JETUBU ALLAHU MIN BE’DI DHALIKE ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.28: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNAMAL-MUSHRIKUNE NEXHESUN FELA JEKRABUL-MESXHIDAL-HERAME BE’DE ‘AMIHIM HADHA WE ‘IN HIFTUM ‘AJLETEN FESEWFE JUGNIKUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI ‘IN SHA’E ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.29: KATILUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE LA BIL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE LA JUHERRIMUNE MA HERRAMAL-LAHU WE RASULUHU WE LA JEDINUNE DINAL-HEKKI MINEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE HATTE JU’TUL-XHIZJETE ‘AN JEDIN WE HUM SAGIRUN
9.30: WE KALETIL-JEHUDU ‘UZEJRUN EBNU LLAHI WE KALETI NESARAL-MESIHU EBNU LLAHI DHALIKE KAWLUHUM BI’EFWEHIHIM JUDAHI’UNE KAWLEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KABLU KATELEHUMU LLAHU ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
9.31: ETTEHADHU ‘EHBERAHUM WE RUHBENEHUM ‘ERBEBËN MIN DUNI LEHI WEL-MESIHE EBNE MERJEME WE MA ‘UMIRU ‘IL-LA LIJA’BUDU ‘ILEHËN WEHIDËN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE SUBHANEHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
9.32: JURIDUNE ‘EN JUTFI’U NURALLAHI BI’EFWEHIHIM WE JE’BELLAHU ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUTIMME NURAHU WE LEW KERIHAL-KAFIRUN
9.33: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA DINI KUL-LIHI WE LEW KERIHAL-MUSHRIKUN
9.34: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINEL-’EHBERI WE RUHBENI LEJE’KULUNE ‘EMWELE NASI BIL-BETILI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WEL-LEDHINE JEKNIZUNE EDH-DHEHEBE WEL-FIDDETE WE LA JUNFIKUNEHA FI SEBILI -LEHI FEBESHSHIRHUM BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
9.35: JEWME JUHMA ‘ALEJHA FI NARI XHEHENNEME FETUKWE BIHA XHIBEHUHUM WE XHUNUBUHUM WE DHUHURUHUM HADHA MA KENEZTUM LI’NFUSIKUM FEDHUKU MA KUNTUM TEKNIZUN
9.36: ‘INNE ‘IDDETE ESH-SHUHURI ‘IND-ALLAHI ETHNA ‘ASHERA SHEHRAN FI KITABI LEHI JEWME HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA MINHA ‘ERBE’ATUN HURUMUN DHALIKE DINUL-KAJJIMU FELA TEDHLIMU FIHINNE ‘ENFUSEKUM WE KATILUL-MUSHRIKINE KAFFETEN KAMA JUKATILUNEKUM KAFFETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
9.37: ‘INNAMA NESI’U ZIJADETUN FIL-KUFRI JUDELLU BIHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUHILLUNEHU ‘AMËN WE JUHERRIMUNEHU ‘AMËN LIJUWETI’U ‘IDDETE MA HERRAMAL-LAHU FEJUHILLU MA HERRAMAL-LAHU ZUJJINE LEHUM SU’U ‘A’MALIHIM WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-KEFIRIN
9.38: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MA LEKUM ‘IDHA KILA LEKUM ENFIRU FI SEBILI -LEHI ETHTHAKALTUM ‘ILAL-’ARDI ‘ERADITUM BIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA MINEL-’AHIRATI FEMA META’UL-HEJËTI DUN'JA FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA KALILU
9.39: ‘IL-LA TENFIRU JU’ADHDHIBKUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN WE JESTEBDIL KAWMËN GAJRAKUM WE LA TEDURRUHU SHEJ’ËN WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
9.40: ‘IL-LA TENSURUHU FEKAD NESERAHU ALLAHU ‘IDH ‘EHRAXHEHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU THANIJE ETHNEJNI ‘IDH HUMA FIL-GARI ‘IDH JAKULU LISAHIBIHI LA TEHZEN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ME’ANA FE’ENZEL-ALLAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALEJHI WE ‘EJJEDEHU BIXHUNUDIN LEM TERAWHA WE XHE’ALE KELIMETEL-LEDHINE KEFERU SUFLA WE KELIMETU LLAHI HIJAL-’ULJA WA-LLAHU ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
9.41: ENFIRU HIFEFËN WE THIKALËN WE XHAHIDU BI’EMWELIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM FI SEBILI -LEHI DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
9.42: LEW KANE ‘ARADËN KARIBËN WE SEFERAN KASIDËN LATTEBE’UKE WE LAKIN BE’UDET ‘ALEJHIMU ESH-SHUKKATU WE SEJEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEW ESTETA’NA LEHARAXHNA ME’AKUM JUHLIKUNE ‘ANFUSAHUM WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU ‘INNAHUM LEKADHIBUN
9.43: ‘AFELLAHU ‘ANKE LIME ‘EDHINTE LEHUM HATTE JETEBEJJENE LEKEL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE TA’LEMAL-KADHIBIN
9.44: LA JESTE’DHINUKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI ‘EN JUXHAHIDU BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIL-MUTTEKIN
9.45: ‘INNAMA JESTE’DHINUKEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE ERTABET KULUBUHUM FEHUM FI RAJBIHIM JETERADDEDUN
9.46: WE LEW ‘ERADUL-HURUXHE LE’E’ADDU LEHU ‘UDDETEN WE LAKIN KERIHAL-LAHU ENBI’ATHEHUM FETHEBBETEHUM WE KILA EK’UDU ME’AL-KA’IDIN
9.47: LEW HARAXHU FIKUM MA ZADUKUM ‘IL-LA HABELËN WE LE’EWDA’U HILALEKUM JEBGUNEKUMUL-FITNETE WE FIKUM SEMMA’UNE LEHUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
9.48: LEKADI EBTEGAWL-FITNETE MIN KABLU WE KAL-LEBU LEKAL-’UMURA HATTE XHA’AL-HEKKU WE DHEHERA ‘EMRU LLAHI WE HUM KARIHUN
9.49: WE MINHUM MEN JAKULU E’DHEN LI WE LA TEFTINNI ‘ALA FIL-FITNETI SEKATU WE ‘INNE XHEHENNEME LEMUHITETUN BIL-KEFIRIN
9.50: ‘IN TUSIBKE HESENETUN TESU’UHUM WE ‘IN TUSIBKE MUSIBETUN JAKULU KAD ‘EHADHNA ‘EMRANA MIN KABLU WE JETEWEL-LEW WE HUM FERIHUN
9.51: KUL LEN JUSIBENA ‘IL-LA MA KETEBEL-LAHU LENA HUWE MEWLANA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
9.52: KUL HEL TERABBESUNE BINA ‘IL-LA ‘IHDAL-HUSNEJEJNI WE NAHNU NETERABBESU BIKUM ‘EN JUSIBEKUMU LLAHU BI’ADHABIN MIN ‘INDIHI ‘EW BI’EJDINA FETERABBESU ‘INNA ME’AKUM MUTERABBISUN
9.53: KUL ‘ENFIKU TEW’ËN ‘EW KERHËN LEN JUTEKABBELE MINKUM ‘INNEKUM KUNTUM KAWMËN FESIKIN
9.54: WE MA MENE’AHUM ‘EN TUKBELE MINHUM NEFEKATUHUM ‘IL-LA ‘ENNEHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE BIRASULIHI WE LA JE’TUNE SELËTE ‘IL-LA WE HUM KUSALA WE LA JUNFIKUNE ‘IL-LA WE HUM KARIHUN
9.55: FELA TU’XHIBKE ‘EMWELUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM ‘INNAMA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJU’ADHDHIBEHUM BIHA FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE TEZHEKA ‘ENFUSUHUM WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.56: WE JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI ‘INNAHUM LEMINKUM WE MA HUM MINKUM WE LAKINNAHUM KAWMUN JEFRAKUN
9.57: LEW JEXHIDUNE MELXHE’EN ‘EW MEGARATIN ‘EW MUDDEHALËN LEWELLEW ‘ILEJHI WE HUM JEXHMEHUN
9.58: WE MINHUM MEN JELMIZUKE FI SEDEKATI FE’IN ‘U’TU MINHA RADU WE ‘IN LEM JU’TEW MINHA ‘IDHA HUM JESHATUN
9.59: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM RADU MA ‘ATAHUMU LLAHU WE RASULUHU WE KALU HESBUNALLAHU SEJU’UTINALLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WE RASULUHU ‘INNA ‘ILA LLAHI RAGIBUN
9.60: ‘INNAMA SEDEKATU LILFUKARA’I WEL-MESAKINI WEL-’AMILINE ‘ALEJHA WEL-MU’UELLEFETI KULUBUHUM WE FI RIKABI WEL-GARIMINE WE FI SEBILI -LEHI WE EIBNI SEBILI FERIDETEN MINELLAHI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.61: WE MINHUMUL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNE NEBIJE WE JAKULUNE HUWE ‘UDHUNUN KUL ‘UDHUNU HAJRIN LEKUM JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE JU’UMINU LILMU’UMININE WE RAHMETUN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNE RASULËL-LAHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.62: JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEKUM LIJURDUKUM WA-LLAHU WE RASULUHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN JURDUHU ‘IN KENU MU’UMININ
9.63: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNEHU MEN JUHADIDI LLAHE WE RASULEHU FE’ENNE LEHU NARA XHEHENNEME HALIDËN FIHË DHELIKEL-HIZJUL-’ADHIM
9.64: JEHDHERUL-MUNAFIKUNE ‘EN TUNEZZELE ‘ALEJHIM SURATUN TUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA FI KULUBIHIM KULI ESTEHZI’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE MUHRIXHUN MA TEHDHERUN
9.65: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM LEJAKULUNNE ‘INNAMA KUNNA NEHUDU WE NEL’ABU KUL ‘EBIALLLEHI WE ‘AJATIHI WE RASULIHI KUNTUM TESTEHZI’UN
9.66: LA TA’TEDHIRU KAD KEFERTUM BE’DE ‘IMANIKUM ‘IN NA’FU ‘AN TA’IFETIN MINKUM NU’ADHDHIB TA’IFETEN BI’ENNEHUM KENU MUXHRIMIN
9.67: AL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-MUNAFIKATU BE’DUHUM MIN BE’DIN JE’MURUNE BIL-MUNKERI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MA’RUFI WE JEKBIDUNE ‘EJDIJEHUM NESU LLAHE FENESIJEHUM ‘INNAL-MUNAFIKINE HUMUL-FESIKUN
9.68: WE’ADAL-LAHUL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-KUFFERA NARA XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË HIJE HESBUHUM WE LE’ANEHUMU LLAHU WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
9.69: KEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM KENU ‘ESHEDDE MINKUM KUWETEN WE ‘EKTHERA ‘EMWELËN WE ‘EWLADËN FESTEMTA’U BIHALAKIHIM FESTEMTA’TUM BIHALAKIKUM KAMA ESTEMTE’EL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM BIHALAKIHIM WE HUDTUM KEL-LEDHI HADU ‘ULË’IKE HEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
9.70: ‘ELEM JE’TIHIM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WE KAWMI ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ES'HABI MEDJENE WEL-MU’UTEFIKATI ‘ETET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEMA KANAL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
9.71: WEL-MU’UMINUNE WEL-MU’UMINATU BE’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BE’DIN JE’MURUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE JUTI’UNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU ‘ULË’IKE SEJERHEMUHUMU LLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
9.72: WE’ADAL-LAHUL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE MESAKINE TEJJIBETEN FI XHENNATI ‘ADNIN WE RIDWENUN MINELLAHI ‘EKBERU DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.73: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU XHAHIDIL-KUFFERA WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE EGLUDH ‘ALEJHIM WE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MESIR
9.74: JEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI MA KALU WE LEKAD KALU KELIMETAL-KUFRI WE KEFERU BE’DE ‘ISLAMIHIM WE HEMMU BIMA LEM JENALU WE MA NEKAMU ‘IL-LA ‘EN ‘EGNAHUMU LLAHU WE RASULUHU MIN FEDLIHI FE’IN JETUBU JEKU HAJRAN LEHUM WE ‘IN JETEWEL-LEW JU’ADHDHIBHUMU LLAHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMËN FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE MA LEHUM FIL-’ËRDI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
9.75: WE MINHUM MEN ‘AHEDA-LLAHE LE’IN ‘ATANA MIN FEDLIHI LENESSEDDEKANNE WE LENEKUNENNE MINE SALIHIN
9.76: FELAMMA ‘ATAHUM MIN FEDLIHI BEHILU BIHI WE TEWEL-LEW WE HUM MU’RIDUN
9.77: FE’A’KABEHUM NIFEKËN FI KULUBIHIM ‘ILA JEWMI JELKAWNEHU BIMA ‘EHLEFU LLAHE MA WE’ADUHU WE BIMA KENU JEKDHIBUN
9.78: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU SIRRAHUM WE NEXHWEHUM WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ALLAMUL-GUJUB
9.79: EL-LEDHINE JELMIZUNAL-MUTTEWWI’INE MINEL-MU’UMININE FI SEDEKATI WEL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE ‘IL-LA XHUHDEHUM FEJESHARUNE MINHUM SEHIRAL-LAHU MINHUM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.80: ESTEGFIR LEHUM ‘EW LA TESTEGFIR LEHUM ‘IN TESTEGFIR LEHUM SEB’INE MERRATEN FELEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHUM DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-FESIKIN
9.81: FERIHAL-MUHALLEFUNE BIMEK’ADIHIM HILAFE RASULI LEHI WE KERIHU ‘EN JUXHAHIDU BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI -LEHI WE KALU LA TENFIRU FIL-HERRI KUL NARU XHEHENNEME ‘ESHEDDU HERRAN LEW KENU JEFKAHUN
9.82: FELJEDHEKU KALILËN WE LIEBKU KETHIRAN XHEZA’EN BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
9.83: FE’IN RAXHE’AKEL-LEHU ‘ILA TA’IFETIN MINHUM FESTE’DHENUKE LILHURUXHI FEKUL LEN TEHRUXHU MA’IJE ‘EBEDËN WE LEN TUKATILU MA’IJE ‘ADUWËN ‘INNEKUM RADITUM BIL-KU’UDI ‘EWWELE MERRATIN FEK’UDU ME’AL-HALIFIN
9.84: WE LA TUSELLI ‘ALA ‘EHEDIN MINHUM MATE ‘EBEDËN WE LA TEKUM ‘ALA KABRIHI ‘INNAHUM KEFERU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE MATU WE HUM FESIKUN
9.85: WE LA TU’XHIBKE ‘EMWELUHUM WE ‘EWLADUHUM ‘INNAMA JURIDU ALLAHU ‘EN JU’ADHDHIBEHUM BIHA FI DUN'JA WE TEZHEKA ‘ENFUSUHUM WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.86: WE ‘IDHA ‘UNZILET SURATUN ‘EN ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE XHAHIDU ME’A RASULIHI ESTE’DHENEKE ‘ULUT-TEWLI MINHUM WE KALU DHERNA NEKUN ME’AL-KA’IDIN
9.87: RADU BI’EN JEKUNU ME’AL-HAWELIFI WE TUBI’A ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JEFKAHUN
9.88: LAKINI RASULU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU XHAHEDU BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ULË’IKE LEHUMUL-HAJRATU WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
9.89: ‘E’ADDAL-LAHU LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.90: WE XHA’AL-MU’ADHDHIRUNE MINEL-’A’RABI LIJU’UDHENE LEHUM WE KA’ADEL-LEDHINE KEDHEBU LLAHE WE RASULEHU SEJUSIBUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
9.91: LEJSE ‘ALA DU’AFE’I WE LA ‘ALEL-MERDA WE LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE MA JUNFIKUNE HERAXHUN ‘IDHA NESEHU LIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI MA ‘ALEL-MUHSININE MIN SEBILIN WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.92: WE LA ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA MA ‘ETEWKE LITEHMILEHUM KULTE LA ‘EXHIDU MA ‘EHMILUKUM ‘ALEJHI TEWEL-LEW WE ‘A’JUNUHUM TEFIDU MINE DEM’I HEZENËN ‘ELLA JEXHIDU MA JUNFIKUN
9.93: ‘INNAMA SEBILU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JESTE’DHINUNEKE WE HUM ‘EGNIJA’U RADU BI’EN JEKUNU ME’AL-HAWELIFI WE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JA’LEMUN
9.94: JA’TEDHIRUNE ‘ILEJKUM ‘IDHA RAXHA’TUM ‘ILEJHIM KUL LA TA’TEDHIRU LEN NU’UMINE LEKUM KAD NEBBE’ENALLAHU MIN ‘EHBERIKUM WE SEJERALLAHU ‘AMELEKUM WE RASULUHU THUMME TURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
9.95: SEJEHLIFUNE BIL-LAHI LEKUM ‘IDHA ENKALEBTUM ‘ILEJHIM LITU’RIDU ‘ANHUM FE’A’RIDU ‘ANHUM ‘INNAHUM RIXHSUN WE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU XHEZA’EN BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
9.96: JEHLIFUNE LEKUM LITERDAW ‘ANHUM FE’IN TERDAW ‘ANHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JERDA ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-FESIKIN
9.97: AL-’A’RABU ‘ESHEDDU KUFRAN WE NIFEKËN WE ‘EXHDERU ‘ELLA JA’LEMU HUDUDE MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.98: WE MINEL-’A’RABI MEN JETTEHIDHU MA JUNFIKU MEGRAMËN WE JETERABBESU BIKUMU DEWE’IRA ‘ALEJHIM DA’IRATU SEW’I WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
9.99: WE MINEL-’A’RABI MEN JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE JETTEHIDHU MA JUNFIKU KURUBETIN ‘IND-ALLAHI WE SELEWETI RASULI ‘ALA ‘INNEHA KURBETUN LEHUM SEJUDHILUHUMU LLAHU FI RAHMETIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.100: WE SABIKUNAL-’EWWELUNE MINEL-MUHAXHIRINE WEL-’ENSARI WEL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’UHUM BI’IHSANIN RADIJAL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI TEHTEHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.101: WE MIMMEN HEWLEKUM MINEL-’A’RABI MUNAFIKUNE WE MIN ‘EHLIL-MEDINETI MERADU ‘ALA NIFEKI LA TA’LEMUHUM NAHNU NA’LEMUHUM SENU’ADHDHIBUHUM MERRATEJNI THUMME JURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ADHABIN ‘ADHIMI
9.102: WE ‘AHARUNE A’TERAFU BIDHUNUBIHIM HALETU ‘AMELËN SALIHËN WE ‘AHARA SEJJI’ËN ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
9.103: HUDH MIN ‘EMWELIHIM SEDEKATEN TUTEHHIRUHUM WE TUZEKKIHIM BIHA WE SELLI ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNE SALATEKE SEKENUN LEHUM WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
9.104: ‘ELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE HUWE JEKBELUT-TEWBETE ‘AN ‘IBEDIHI WE JE’HUDHU SEDEKATI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE HUWET-TEWWEBU RAHIM
9.105: WE KULI A’MELU FESEJERALLAHU ‘AMELEKUM WE RASULUHU WEL-MU’UMINUNE WE SETURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
9.106: WE ‘AHARUNE MURXHEWNE LI’EMRI LEHI ‘IMMA JU’ADHDHIBUHUM WE ‘IMMA JETUBU ‘ALEJHIM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.107: WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MESXHIDËN DIRARAN WE KUFRAN WE TEFRIKËN BEJNAL-MU’UMININE WE ‘IRSADËN LIMEN HARABE-LLAHE WE RASULEHU MIN KABLU WE LEJEHLIFUNNE ‘IN ‘ERADNA ‘IL-LAL-HUSNA WA-LLAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNAHUM LEKADHIBUN
9.108: LA TEKUM FIHI ‘EBEDËN LEMESXHIDUN ‘USSISE ‘ALAT-TEKWE MIN ‘EWWELI JEWMIN ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEKUME FIHI FIHI RIXHALUN JUHIBBUNE ‘EN JETETEHHERU WA-LLAHU JUHIBBUL-MUTTEHHIRIN
9.109: ‘EFEMEN ‘ESSESE BUNJANEHU ‘ALA TEKWE MINELLAHI WE RIDWENIN HAJRUN ‘EM MEN ‘ESSESE BUNJANEHU ‘ALA SHEFE XHURUFIN HARIN FENHARA BIHI FI NARI XHEHENNEME WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
9.110: LA JEZALU BUNJANUHUMUL-LEDHI BENEW RIBETEN FI KULUBIHIM ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKATTE’A KULUBUHUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
9.111: ‘INNALL-LLAHE ESHTERA MINEL-MU’UMININE ‘ANFUSAHUM WE ‘EMWELEHUM BI’ENNE LEHUMUL-XHENNETE JUKATILUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI FEJEKTULUNE WE JUKTELUNE WE’DËN ‘ALEJHI HEKKËN FIT-TEWRATI WEL-’INXHILI WEL-KUR’ANI WE MEN ‘EWFE BI’AHDIHI MINELLAHI FESTEBSHIRU BIBEJ’IKUMUL-LEDHI BEJA’TUM BIHI WE DHELIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
9.112: ET-TA’IBUNAL-’ABIDUNAL-HAMIDUNE SA’IHUNE RAKI’UNE SAXHIDUNAL-’AMIRUNE BIL-MA’RUFI WE NAHUNE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WEL-HAFIDHUNE LIHUDUDI LEHI WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
9.113: MA KANE LILNNEBIJI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN JESTEGFIRU LILMUSHRIKINE WE LEW KENU ‘ULI KURBE MIN BE’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUM ‘ENNEHUM ‘ES'HABUL-XHEHIM
9.114: WE MA KANE ESTIGFERU ‘IBRAHIME LI’EBIHI ‘IL-LA ‘AN MEW’IDETIN WE’ADEHA ‘IJAHU FELAMMA TEBEJJENE LEHU ‘ENNEHU ‘ADUWUN LIL-LAHI TEBERRA’E MINHU ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME LE’EWWEHUN HELIMU
9.115: WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJUDIL-LE KAWMËN BE’DE ‘IDH HEDAHUM HATTE JUBEJJINE LEHUM MA JETTEKUNE ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
9.116: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
9.117: LEKAD TABEL-LAHU ‘ALA NEBIJI WEL-MUHAXHIRINE WEL-’ENSARIL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’UHU FI SA’ATIL-’USRATI MIN BE’DI MA KADE JEZIGU KULUBU FERIKIN MINHUM THUMME TABE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNEHU BIHIM RA’UFUN RAHIMU
9.118: WE ‘ALA THALATHETIL-LEDHINE HULLIFU HATTE ‘IDHA DAKAT ‘ALEJHIMUL-’ERDU BIMA RAHUBET WE DAKAT ‘ALEJHIM ‘ENFUSUHUM WE DHENNU ‘EN LA MELXHE’E MINELLAHI ‘IL-LA ‘ILEJHI THUMME TABE ‘ALEJHIM LIJETUBU ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWET-TEWWEBU RAHIM
9.119: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE KUNU ME’A SADIKIN
9.120: MA KANE LI’HLIL-MEDINETI WE MEN HAWLAHUM MINEL-’A’RABI ‘EN JETEHALLEFU ‘AN RASULI LEHI WE LA JERGABU BI’ENFUSIHIM ‘AN NEFSIHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM LA JUSIBUHUM DHEME’UN WE LA NESEBUN WE LA MEHMESETUN FI SEBILI -LEHI WE LA JETE’UNE MEWTI’ËN JEGIDHUL-KUFFERA WE LA JENALUNE MIN ‘ADUWIN NEJLËN ‘IL-LA KUTIBE LEHUM BIHI ‘AMELUN SALIHUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
9.121: WE LA JUNFIKUNE NEFEKATEN SEGIRATEN WE LA KEBIRATEN WE LA JEKTA’UNE WE EDIËN ‘IL-LA KUTIBE LEHUM LIJEXHZIJEHUMU LLAHU ‘EHSENE MA KENU JA’MELUN
9.122: WE MA KANAL-MU’UMINUNE LIJENFIRU KAFFETEN FELEWLA NEFERA MIN KUL-LI FIRKATIN MINHUM TA’IFETUN LIJETEFEKKAHU FI DINI WE LIJUNDHIRU KAWMEHUM ‘IDHA RAXHA’U ‘ILEJHIM LE’AL-LEHUM JEHDHERUN
9.123: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KATILUL-LEDHINE JELUNEKUM MINEL-KUFFERI WE LIEXHIDU FIKUM GILDHETEN WE A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ME’AL-MUTTEKIN
9.124: WE ‘IDHA MA ‘UNZILET SURATUN FEMINHUM MEN JAKULU ‘EJJUKUM ZADET/HU HEDHIHI ‘IMANËN FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FEZADET/HUM ‘IMANËN WE HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
9.125: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN FEZADET/HUM RIXHSËN ‘ILA RIXHSIHIM WE MATU WE HUM KAFIRUN
9.126: ‘EWELA JERAWNE ‘ENNEHUM JUFTENUNE FI KUL-LI ‘AMIN MERRATEN ‘EW MERRATEJNI THUMME LA JETUBUNE WE LA HUM JEDHDHEKKERUN
9.127: WE ‘IDHA MA ‘UNZILET SURATUN NEDHERA BE’DUHUM ‘ILA BE’DIN HEL JERAKUM MIN ‘EHEDIN THUMME ENSERAFU SERAFEL-LAHU KULUBEHUM BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
9.128: LEKAD XHA’EKUM RASULUN MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘AZIZUN ‘ALEJHI MA ‘ANITTUM HERISUN ‘ALEJKUM BIL-MU’UMININE RA’UFUN RAHIMU
9.129: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKUL HESBI ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE HUWE RABBUL-’ARSHIL-’ADHIM

10.2: ‘EKANE LILNNASI ‘AXHEBËN ‘EN ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA RAXHULIN MINHUM ‘EN ‘ENDHIRI NASE WE BESHSHIRIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENNE LEHUM KADEME SIDKIN ‘INDE RABBIHIM KALEL-KAFIRUNE ‘INNE HADHA LESAHIRUN MUBINU
10.3: ‘INNE RABBEKUMU LLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA MA MIN SHEFI’IN ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DI ‘IDHNIHI DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM FE’BUDUHU ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
10.4: ‘ILEJHI MERXHI’UKUM XHEMI’ËN WE’DALLAHI HEKKËN ‘INNEHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI BIL-KISTI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM SHERABUN MIN HEMIMIN WE ‘ADHABUN ‘ALIMUN BIMA KENU JEKFURUN
10.5: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE SHEMSE DIJA’EN WEL-KAMERA NURAN WE KADDERAHU MENAZILE LITA’LEMU ‘ADEDE SININE WEL-HISABE MA HALEKEL-LEHU DHALIKE ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI JUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
10.6: ‘INNE FI EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE MA HALEKEL-LEHU FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETTEKUN
10.7: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA WE RADU BIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE ETME’ENNU BIHA WEL-LEDHINE HUM ‘AN ‘AJATINA GAFILUN
10.9: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI JEHDIHIM RABBUHUM BI’IMANIHIM TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU FI XHENNATI NA’IM
10.10: DA’WEHUM FIHË SUBHANEKAL-LEHUMME WE TEHIJETUHUM FIHË SALAMUN WE ‘AHIRU DA’WEHUM ‘ENIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
10.11: WE LEW JU’AXHXHILU ALLAHU LILNNASI SHERRA ESTI’XHALEHUM BIL-HAJRI LEKUDIJE ‘ILEJHIM ‘EXHELUHUM FENEDHERUL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA FI TUG'JANIHIM JA’MEHUN
10.12: WE ‘IDHA MESSAL-’INSANE DURRU DA’ANA LIXHENBIHI ‘EW KA’IDËN ‘EW KA’IMËN FELAMMA KESHEFNA ‘ANHU DURRAHU MERRA KE’EN LEM JED’UNA ‘ILA DURRIN MESSEHU KEDHALIKE ZUJJINE LILMUSRIFINE MA KENU JA’MELUN
10.13: WE LEKAD ‘EHLEKNAL-KURUNE MIN KABLIKUM LEMMA DHELEMU WE XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI WE MA KENU LIJU’UMINU KEDHALIKE NEXHZIL-KAWMAL-MUXHRIMIN
10.14: THUMME XHE’ALNAKUM HALA’IFE FIL-’ËRDI MIN BE’DIHIM LINENDHURA KEJFE TA’MELUN
10.15: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINETIN KALEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA E’TI BIKUR’ANIN GAJRI HADHA ‘EW BEDDILHU KUL MA JEKUNU LI ‘EN ‘UBEDDILEHU MIN TILKA’I NEFSI ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘IN ‘ASEJTU RABBI ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
10.16: KUL LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA TELEWTUHU ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘EDRAKUM BIHI FEKAD LEBITHTU FIKUM ‘UMURAN MIN KABLIHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
10.17: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BI’AJATIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-MUXHRIMUN
10.18: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JEDURRUHUM WE LA JENFE’UHUM WE JAKULUNE HA’UULË’ SHUFE’A’UUNA ‘IND-ALLAHI KUL ‘ETUNEBBI’UNA-LLAHE BIMA LA JA’LEMU FI SEMAWETI WE LA FIL-’ËRDI SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
10.19: WE MA KANE NASU ‘IL-LA ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN FEHTELEFU WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM FIMA FIHI JEHTELIFUN
10.20: WE JAKULUNE LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI FEKUL ‘INNAMAL-GAJBU LIL-LAHI FENTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
10.21: WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNA NASE RAHMETEN MIN BE’DI DERRA’E MESSET/HUM ‘IDHA LEHUM MEKRUN FI ‘AJATINA KULI ALLAHU ‘ESRA’U MEKRAN ‘INNE RUSULENA JEKTUBUNE MA TEMKURU
10.22: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSEJJIRUKUM FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI HATTE ‘IDHA KUNTUM FIL-FULKI WE XHERAJNE BIHIM BIRIHIN TEJJIBETIN WE FERIHU BIHA XHA’ET/HA RIHUN ‘ASIFUN WE XHA’EHUMUL-MEWXHU MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM ‘UHITE BIHIM DE’AW LLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNE LE’IN ‘ENXHEJTENA MIN HEDHIHI LENEKUNENNE MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
10.23: FELAMMA ‘ENXHAHUM ‘IDHA HUM JEBGUNE FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNAMA BEGJUKUM ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM META’AL-HEJËTI DUN'JA THUMME ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UKUM FENUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
10.24: ‘INNAMA METHELUL-HEJËTI DUN'JA KAMA’IN ‘ENZELNAHU MINE SEMA’I FEHTELETE BIHI NEBETUL-’ARDI MIMMA JE’KULU NASU WEL-’EN’AM HATTE ‘IDHA ‘EHADHETIL-’ERDU ZUHRUFEHA WE EZZEJJENET WE DHENNE ‘EHLUHA ‘ENNEHUM KADIRUNE ‘ALEJHA ‘ETAHA ‘EMRUNA LEJLËN ‘EW NEHARAN FEXHE’ALNAHA HESIDËN KE’EN LEM TEGNE BIL-’EMSI KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
10.25: WA-LLAHU JED’U ‘ILA DARI SALAMI WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
10.26: LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENUL-HUSNA WE ZIJADETUN WE LA JERHEKU WUXHUHEHUM KATERUN WE LA DHIL-LETUN ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
10.27: WEL-LEDHINE KESEBU SEJJI’ATI XHEZA’U SEJJI’ETIN BIMITHLIHA WE TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN MA LEHUM MINELLAHI MIN ‘ASIMIN KE’ENNEMA ‘UGSHIJET WUXHUHUHUM KITA’ËN MINEL-LEJLI MUDHLIMËN ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
10.28: WE JEWME NEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU MEKANEKUM ‘ENTUM WE SHURAKA’UUKUM FEZEJJELNA BEJNEHUM WE KALE SHURAKA’UUHUM MA KUNTUM ‘IJANA TA’BUDUN
10.29: FEKEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUM ‘IN KUNNA ‘AN ‘IBEDETIKUM LEGAFILIN
10.30: HUNALIKE TEBLU KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘ESLEFET WE RUDDU ‘ILA LLAHI MEWLAHUMUL-HEKKI WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
10.31: KUL MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘EMMEN JEMLIKU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WE MEN JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE JUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE MEN JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA FESEJAKULUNAL-LAHU FEKUL ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
10.32: FEDHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUMUL-HEKKU FEMADHA BE’DAL-HEKKI ‘IL-LA DALELU FE’ENNA TUSRAFUN
10.33: KEDHALIKE HAKKAT KELIMETU RABBIKE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE FESEKU ‘ENNEHUM LA JU’UMINUN
10.34: KUL HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU KULI ALLAHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
10.35: KUL HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI KULI ALLAHU JEHDI LILHEKKI ‘EFEMEN JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI ‘EHEKKU ‘EN JUTTEBE’A ‘EMMEN LA JEHIDDI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUHDA FEMA LEKUM KEJFE TEHKUMUN
10.36: WE MA JETTEBI’U ‘EKTHERUHUM ‘IL-LA DHENNËN ‘INNE EDH-DHENNE LA JUGNI MINEL-HEKKI SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA JEF’ALUN
10.37: WE MA KANE HADHAL-KUR’ANU ‘EN JUFTERA MIN DUNI LEHI WE LAKIN TESDIKEL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE TEFSILAL-KITABI LA RAJBE FIHI MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
10.38: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL FE’TU BISURATIN MITHLIHI WE ED’U MENI ESTETA’TUM MIN DUNI LEHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
10.39: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIMA LEM JUHITU BI’ILMIHI WE LEMMA JE’TIHIM TE’WILUHU KEDHALIKE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU EDH-DHALIMIN
10.40: WE MINHUM MEN JU’UMINU BIHI WE MINHUM MEN LA JU’UMINU BIHI WE RABBUKE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUFSIDIN
10.41: WE ‘IN KEDHDHEBUKE FEKUL LI ‘AMELI WE LEKUM ‘AMELUKUM ‘ENTUM BERI’UNE MIMMA ‘A’MELU WE ‘ENA BERI’UN MIMMA TA’MELUN
10.42: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’UNE ‘ILEJKE ‘EFE’ENTE TUSMI’U SUMME WE LEW KENU LA JA’KILUN
10.43: WE MINHUM MEN JENDHURU ‘ILEJKE ‘EFE’ENTE TEHDIL-’UMJE WE LEW KENU LA JUBSIRUN
10.44: ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEDHLIMU NASE SHEJ’ËN WE LAKINNE NASE ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
10.45: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM KE’EN LEM JELBETHU ‘IL-LA SA’ATEN MINE NEHARI JETA’ARAFUNE BEJNEHUM KAD HASIREL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’I LEHI WE MA KENU MUHTADIN
10.46: WE ‘IMMA NURIJENNEKE BE’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM THUMMAL-LAHU SHEHIDUN ‘ALA MA JEF’ALUN
10.47: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN RASULUN FE’IDHË XHË’E RASULUHUM KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
10.48: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
10.49: KUL LA ‘EMLIKU LINEFSI DERRAN WE LA NEF’ËN ‘IL-LA MA SHA’-ALLAHU LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELUN ‘IDHË XHË’E ‘EXHELUHUM FELA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
10.50: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘ETAKUM ‘ADHABUHU BEJATËN ‘EW NEHARAN MADHA JESTA’XHILU MINHUL-MUXHRIMUN
10.51: ‘ETHUMME ‘IDHA MA WEKA’A ‘AMENTUM BIHI ‘AL’ANE WE KAD KUNTUM BIHI TESTA’XHILUN
10.52: THUMME KILA LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HULDI HEL TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA BIMA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
10.53: WE JESTENBI’UNEKE ‘EHEKKUN HUWE KUL ‘I WE RABBI ‘INNEHU LEHEKKUN WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
10.54: WE LEW ‘ENNE LIKUL-LI NEFSIN DHELEMET MA FIL-’ËRDI LAFTEDET BIHI WE ‘ESERRU NEDAMETE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-KISTI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
10.55: ‘ALA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘ALA ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
10.56: HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
10.57: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’ETKUM MEW’IDHETUN MIN RABBIKUM WE SHIFE’UN LIMA FI SUDURI WE HUDAN WE RAHMETUN LILMU’UMININ
10.58: KUL BIFEDLI LEHI WE BIRAHMETIHI FEBIDHALIKE FELJEFRAHU HUWE HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
10.59: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU LEKUM MIN RIZKIN FEXHE’ALTUM MINHU HERAMËN WE HALELËN KUL ‘ALLLEHU ‘EDHINE LEKUM ‘EM ‘ALA ALLAHI TEFTERUN
10.60: WE MA DHENNUL-LEDHINE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JESHKURUN
10.61: WE MA TEKUNU FI SHE’NIN WE MA TETLU MINHU MIN KUR’ANIN WE LA TA’MELUNE MIN ‘AMELIN ‘IL-LA KUNNA ‘ALEJKUM SHUHUDËN ‘IDH TUFIDUNE FIHI WE MA JA’ZUBU ‘AN RABBIKE MIN MITHKALI DHERRATIN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FI SEMA’I WE LA ‘ESGARA MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKBERA ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
10.62: ‘ALA ‘INNE ‘EWLIJA’ALLAHI LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
10.64: LEHUMUL-BUSHRA FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE FIL-’AHIRATI LA TEBDILE LIKELIMATI LEHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
10.65: WE LA JEHZUNKE KAWLUHUM ‘INNAL-’IZZETE LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
10.66: ‘ALA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MEN FI SEMAWETI WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI WE MA JETTEBI’UL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI SHURAKA’E ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
10.67: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LITESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRAN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
10.68: KALU ETTEHADHE-LLAHU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU HUWEL-GANIJU LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI ‘IN ‘INDEKUM MIN SULTANIN BIHEDHA ‘ETEKULUNE ‘ALA ALLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
10.70: META’UN FI DUN'JA THUMME ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM THUMME NUDHIKUHUMUL-’ADHABE SHEDIDE BIMA KENU JEKFURUN
10.71: WE ETLU ‘ALEJHIM NEBE’E NUHIN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI ‘IN KANE KEBURA ‘ALEJKUM MEKAMI WE TEDHKIRI BI’AJA TI LEHI FE’ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELTU FE’EXHMI’U ‘EMRAKUM WE SHURAKA’EKUM THUMME LA JEKUN ‘EMRUKUM ‘ALEJKUM GUMMETEN THUMME EKDU ‘ILEJJE WE LA TUNDHIRUN
10.72: FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FEMA SE’ELTUKUM MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IN ‘EXHRI ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MUSLIMIN
10.73: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FENEXHXHEJNAHU WE MEN ME’AHU FIL-FULKI WE XHE’ALNAHUM HALA’IFE WE ‘EGRAKNEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUNDHERIN
10.74: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BE’DIHI RUSULËN ‘ILA KAWMIHIM FEXHA’UHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEMA KENU LIJU’UMINU BIMA KEDHDHEBU BIHI MIN KABLU KEDHALIKE NETBE’U ‘ALA KULUBIL-MU’TEDIN
10.75: THUMME BE’ATHNA MIN BE’DIHIM MUSA WE HARUNE ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI BI’AJATINA FESTEKBERU WE KENU KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
10.76: FELAMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU MIN ‘INDINA KALU ‘INNE HADHA LESIHRUN MUBINU
10.77: KALE MUSA ‘ETEKULUNE LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EKUM ‘ESIHRUN HADHA WE LA JUFLIHU SAHIRUN
10.78: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LITELFITENA ‘AMMA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABE’ENA WE TEKUNE LEKUMAL-KIBRIJA’U FIL-’ËRDI WE MA NAHNU LEKUMA BIMU’UMININ
10.79: WE KALE FIR’AWNU E’TUNI BIKUL-LI SAHIRIN ‘ALIMI
10.80: FELAMMA XHA’E SEHERATU KALE LEHUM MUSA ‘ELKU MA ‘ENTUM MULKUN
10.81: FELAMMA ‘ELKAW KALE MUSA MA XHI’TUM BIHI SIHRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEJUBTILUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUSLIHU ‘AMELEL-MUFSIDIN
10.82: WE JUHIKKU ALLAHUL-HAKKA BIKELIMATIHI WE LEW KERIHAL-MUXHRIMUN
10.83: FEMA ‘AMANA LIMUSA ‘IL-LA DHURRIJETUN MIN KAWMIHI ‘ALA HAWFIN MIN FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHIM ‘EN JEFTINEHUM WE ‘INNE FIR’AWNE LA’ALIN FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘INNEHU LEMINEL-MUSRIFIN
10.84: WE KALE MUSA JA KAWMI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘AMENTUM BIL-LAHI FE’ALEJHI TEWEKKELU ‘IN KUNTUM MUSLIMIN
10.85: FEKALU ‘ALA ALLAHI TEWEKKELNA RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA FITNETEN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
10.87: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA WE ‘EHIHI ‘EN TEBEWWE’A LIKAWMIKUMA BIMISRA BUJUTËN WE EXH’ALU BUJUTEKUM KIBLETEN WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
10.88: WE KALE MUSA RABBENA ‘INNEKE ‘ATEJTE FIR’AWNE WE MELE’EHU ZINETEN WE ‘EMWELËN FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA RABBENA LIJUDIL-LU ‘AN SEBILIKE RABBENA ETMIS ‘ALA ‘EMWELIHIM WE ESHDUD ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FELA JU’UMINU HATTE JERAWL-’ADHABEL-’ELIM
10.89: KALE KAD ‘UXHIBET DA’WETUKUMA FESTEKIMA WE LA TETTEBI’ANI SEBILEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
10.90: WE XHAWEZNA BIBENI ‘ISRA’ILAL-BEHRA FE’ETBE’AHUM FIR’AWNU WE XHUNUDUHU BEG'JËN WE’ADWEN HATTE ‘IDHA ‘EDRAKEHUL-GARAKU KALE ‘AMENTU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LEL-LEDHI ‘AMANAT BIHI BENU ‘ISRA’ILE WE ‘ENA MINEL-MUSLIMIN
10.91: ‘AL’ANE WE KAD ‘ASEJTE KABLU WE KUNTE MINEL-MUFSIDIN
10.92: FELJEWME NUNEXHXHIKE BIBEDENIKE LITEKUNE LIMEN HALFEKE ‘AJETEN WE ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINE NASI ‘AN ‘AJATINA LEGAFILUN
10.93: WE LEKAD BEWWE’NA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE MUBEWWE’E SIDKIN WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBETI FEMA EHTELEFU HATTE XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
10.94: FE’IN KUNTE FI SHEKKIN MIMMA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE FES’ELIL-LEDHINE JEKRA’UNAL-KITABE MIN KABLIKE LEKAD XHA’EKAL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUMTERIN
10.95: WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI LEHI FETEKUNE MINEL-HASIRIN
10.97: WE LEW XHA’ET/HUM KUL-LU ‘AJETIN HATTE JERAWL-’ADHABEL-’ELIM
10.98: FELEWLA KANET KARJETUN ‘AMANAT FENEFE’AHA ‘IMANUHA ‘IL-LA KAWME JUNIS LEMMA ‘AMENU KESHEFNA ‘ANHUM ‘ADHABEL-HIZJI FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE METTA’NAHUM ‘ILA HINI
10.99: WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE LE’AMANA MEN FIL-’ËRDI KUL-LUHUM XHEMI’ËN ‘EFE’ENTE TUKRIHU NASE HATTE JEKUNU MU’UMININ
10.100: WE MA KANE LINEFSIN ‘EN TU’UMINE ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE JEXH’ALU RIXHSE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE LA JA’KILUN
10.101: KUL ENDHURU MADHA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA TUGNIL-’AJATU WE NUDHURU ‘AN KAWMIN LA JU’UMINUN
10.102: FEHEL JENTEDHIRUNE ‘IL-LA MITHLE ‘EJJAMIL-LEDHINE KHALAW MIN KABLIHIM KUL FENTEDHIRU ‘INNI ME’AKUM MINEL-MUNTEDHIRIN
10.103: THUMME NUNEXHXHI RUSULENA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KEDHALIKE HEKKËN ‘ALEJNA NUNXHIL-MU’UMININ
10.104: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘IN KUNTUM FI SHEKKIN MIN DINI FELA ‘A’BUDUL-LEDHINE TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI WE LAKIN ‘A’BUDU LLAHEL-LEDHI JETEWEFFEKUM WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
10.105: WE ‘EN ‘EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINI HENIFËN WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
10.106: WE LA TED’U MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JENFE’UKE WE LA JEDURRUKE FE’IN FE’ALTE FE’INNEKE ‘IDHËN MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
10.107: WE ‘IN JEMSESKEL-LEHU BIDURRIN FELA KASHIFE LEHU ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘IN JURIDKE BIHAJRIN FELA RADDE LIFEDLIHI JUSIBU BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
10.108: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU KAD XHA’EKUMUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKUM FEMENI EHTEDA FE’INNAMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DAL-LE FE’INNAMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIWEKILI
10.109: WE ETTEBI’ MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE WE ESBIR HATTE JEHKUMAL-LAHU WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN

11.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-RA KITABUN ‘UHKIMET ‘AJATUHU THUMME FUSSILET MIN LEDUN HEKIMIN HABIRI
11.2: ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE ‘INNENI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN WE BESHIRU
11.3: WE ‘ENI ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI JUMETTI’KUM META’ËN HESENËN ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE JU’UTI KUL-LE DHI FEDLIN FEDLEHU WE ‘IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN KEBIRI
11.4: ‘ILA LLAHI MERXHI’UKUM WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
11.5: ‘ALA ‘INNAHUM JETHNUNE SUDURAHUM LIJESTEHFU MINHU ‘ALA HINE JESTEGSHUNE THIJABEHUM JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUNE ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
11.6: WE MA MIN DABBETIN FIL-’ËRDI ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI RIZKUHA WE JA’LEMU MUSTAKARRAHA WE MUSTEWDE’AHA KUL-LUN FI KITABIN MUBINI
11.7: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN WE KANE ‘ARSHUHU ‘ALEL-MA’I LIJEBLUWEKUM ‘EJJUKUM ‘EHSENU ‘AMELËN WE LE’IN KULTE ‘INNEKUM MEB’UTHUNE MIN BE’DIL-MEWTI LEJEKULENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
11.8: WE LE’IN ‘EHHARNA ‘ANHUMUL-’ADHABE ‘ILA ‘UMMETIN MA’DUDETIN LEJAKULUNNE MA JEHBISUHU ‘ALA JEWME JE’TIHIM LEJSE MESRUFËN ‘ANHUM WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
11.9: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAL-’INSANE MINNA RAHMETEN THUMME NEZA’NAHA MINHU ‘INNEHU LEJE’USUN KEFURU
11.10: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAHU NA’MA’E BE’DE DERRA’E MESSET/HU LEJEKULENNE DHEHEBE SEJJI’ATU ‘ANNI ‘INNEHU LEFERIHUN FEHURU
11.11: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE SEBERU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
11.12: FELE’ALLEKE TARIKUN BE’DE MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE WE DA’IKUN BIHI SEDRUKE ‘EN JAKULU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI KENZUN ‘EW XHA’E ME’AHU MELEKUN ‘INNAMA ‘ENTE NEDHIRUN WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
11.13: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL FE’TU BI’ASHRI SUWERIN MITHLIHI MUFTERAJATIN WE ED’U MENI ESTETA’TUM MIN DUNI LEHI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
11.14: FE’IL-LEM JESTEXHIBU LEKUM FE’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘UNZILE BI’ILMI LEHI WE ‘EN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUSLIMUN
11.15: MEN KANE JURIDUL-HEJËTE DUN'JA WE ZINETEHA NUWEFFI ‘ILEJHIM ‘A’MALEHUM FIHË WE HUM FIHË LA JUBHASUN
11.16: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE LEJSE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA NARU WE HEBITE MA SENA’U FIHË WE BETILUN MA KENU JA’MELUN
11.17: ‘EFEMEN KANE ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBIHI WE JETLUHU SHAHIDUN MINHU WE MIN KABLIHI KITABU MUSA ‘IMAMËN WE RAHMETEN ‘ULË’IKE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MEN JEKFUR BIHI MINEL-’EHZABI FELNNARU MEW’IDUHU FELA TEKUN FI MIRJETIN MINHU ‘INNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
11.18: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘ULË’IKE JU’RADUNE ‘ALA RABBIHIM WE JAKULUL-’ESH/HADU HA’UULË’L-LEDHINE KEDHEBU ‘ALA RABBIHIM ‘ALA LA’NETU LLAHI ‘ALA EDH-DHALIMIN
11.19: EL-LEDHINE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
11.20: ‘ULË’IKE LEM JEKUNU MU’XHIZINE FIL-’ËRDI WE MA KANE LEHUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN ‘EWLIJA’E JUDA’AFU LEHUMUL-’ADHABU MA KENU JESTETI’UNE SEM’A WE MA KENU JUBSIRUN
11.21: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
11.23: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘EHBETU ‘ILA RABBIHIM ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
11.24: METHELUL-FERIKAJNI KAL’A’MA WEL-’ESEMMI WEL-BESIRI WE SEMI’I HEL JESTEWIJANI METHELËN ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
11.25: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI ‘INNI LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
11.27: FEKALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI MA NERAKE ‘IL-LA BESHERAN MITHLENA WE MA NERAKE ETTEBE’AKE ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE HUM ‘ERADHILUNA BEDIJE RA’JI WE MA NERA LEKUM ‘ALEJNA MIN FEDLIN BEL NEDHUNNUKUM KADHIBIN
11.28: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE ‘ATANI RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDIHI FE’UMMIJET ‘ALEJKUM ‘ENULZIMUKUMUHA WE ‘ENTUM LEHA KARIHUN
11.29: WE JAKAWMI LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MALËN ‘IN ‘EXHRIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE MA ‘ENA BITARIDIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNAHUM MULËKU RABBIHIM WE LAKINNI ‘ERAKUM KAWMËN TEXHHELUN
11.30: WE JAKAWMI MEN JENSURUNI MINELLAHI ‘IN TERADTUHUM ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
11.31: WE LA ‘EKULU LEKUM ‘INDI HAZA’INU LLAHI WE LA ‘A’LEMUL-GAJBE WE LA ‘EKULU ‘INNI MELEKUN WE LA ‘EKULU LIL-LEDHINE TEZDERI ‘A’JUNUKUM LEN JU’UTIJEHUMU LLAHU HAJRAN ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA FI ‘ENFUSIHIM ‘INNI ‘IDHËN LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
11.32: KALU JA NUHU KAD XHADELTENA FE’EKTHERTE XHIDALENA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
11.33: KALE ‘INNAMA JE’TIKUM BIHI ALLAHU ‘IN SHA’E WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZIN
11.34: WE LA JENFE’UKUM NUSHI ‘IN ‘ERADTU ‘EN ‘ENSEHE LEKUM ‘IN KANAL-LAHU JURIDU ‘EN JUGWIJEKUM HUWE RABBUKUM WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
11.35: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL ‘INI EFTERAJTUHU FE’ALEJJE ‘IXHRAMI WE ‘ENA BERI’UN MIMMA TUXHRIMUN
11.36: WE ‘UHIJE ‘ILA NUHIN ‘ENNEHU LEN JU’UMINE MIN KAWMIKE ‘IL-LA MEN KAD ‘AMANA FELA TEBTE’IS BIMA KENU JEF’ALUN
11.37: WE ESNA’IL-FULKE BI’A’JUNINA WE WEHJINA WE LA TUHATIBNI FIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘INNAHUM MUGRAKUN
11.38: WE JESNA’UL-FULKE WE KUL-LEMA MERRA ‘ALEJHI MELE’UN MIN KAWMIHI SEHIRU MINHU KALE ‘IN TESHARU MINNA FE’INNA NESHARU MINKUM KAMA TESHARUN
11.39: FESEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE JEHIL-LU ‘ALEJHI ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
11.40: HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’E ‘EMRUNA WE FERAT-TENNURU KULNA EHMIL FIHË MIN KUL-LIN ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA MEN SEBEKA ‘ALEJHIL-KAWLU WE MEN ‘AMANA WE MA ‘AMANA ME’AHU ‘IL-LA KALILU
11.41: WE KALE ERKEBU FIHË BISMI LEHI MEXHRAHA WE MURSAHA ‘INNE RABBI LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
11.42: WE HIJE TEXHRI BIHIM FI MEWXHIN KALXHIBELI WE NADA NUHUN EBNEHU WE KANE FI MA’ZILIN JA BUNEJJE ERKEB ME’ANA WE LA TEKUN ME’AL-KEFIRIN
11.43: KALE SE’AWI ‘ILA XHEBELIN JA’SIMUNI MINEL-MA’I KALE LA ‘ASIMAL-JEWME MIN ‘EMRI LEHI ‘IL-LA MEN RAHIME WE HALE BEJNEHUMAL-MEWXHU FEKANE MINEL-MUGRAKIN
11.44: WE KILA JA ‘ERDU EBLA’I MA’EKI WE JA SEMA’U ‘EKLI’I WE GIDAL-MA’U WE KUDIJAL-’EMRU WE ESTEWET ‘ALEL-XHUDIJI WE KILA BU’DËN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
11.45: WE NADA NUHUN RABBEHU FEKALE RABBI ‘INNE EBNI MIN ‘EHLI WE ‘INNE WE’DEKAL-HEKKU WE ‘ENTE ‘EHKEMUL-HAKIMIN
11.46: KALE JA NUHU ‘INNEHU LEJSE MIN ‘EHLIKE ‘INNEHU ‘AMELUN GAJRU SALIHIN FELA TES’ELNI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN ‘INNI ‘A’IDHUKE ‘EN TEKUNE MINEL-XHAHILIN
11.47: KALE RABBI ‘INNI ‘A’UDHU BIKE ‘EN ‘ES’ELEKE MA LEJSE LI BIHI ‘ILMUN WE ‘IL-LA TEGFIR LI WE TERHEMNI ‘EKUN MINEL-HASIRIN
11.48: KILA JA NUHU EHBIT BISALAMIN MINNA WE BERAKATIN ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA ‘UMEMIN MIMMEN ME’AKE WE ‘UMEMUN SENUMETTI’UHUM THUMME JEMESSUHUM MINNA ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
11.49: TILKE MIN ‘ENBE’IL-GAJBI NUHIHA ‘ILEJKE MA KUNTE TA’LEMUHA ‘ENTE WE LA KAWMUKE MIN KABLI HADHA FESBIR ‘INNAL-’AKIBETE LILMUTTAKIN
11.50: WE ‘ILA ‘ADIN ‘EHAHUM HUDËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA MUFTERUN
11.52: WE JA KAWMI ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI JURSILI SEMA’E ‘ALEJKUM MIDRARAN WE JEZIDKUM KUWETEN ‘ILA KUWETIKUM WE LA TETEWEL-LEW MUXHRIMIN
11.53: KALU JA HUDU MA XHI’TENA BIBEJJINETIN WE MA NAHNU BITARIKI ‘ALIHETINA ‘AN KAWLIKE WE MA NAHNU LEKE BIMU’UMININ
11.54: ‘IN NEKULU ‘IL-LA A’TERAKE BE’DU ‘ALIHETINA BISU’IN KALE ‘INNI ‘USH/HIDU LLAHE WE ESH/HEDU ‘ENNI BERI’UN MIMMA TUSHRIKUN
11.55: MIN DUNIHI FEKIDUNI XHEMI’ËN THUMME LA TUNDHIRUN
11.56: ‘INNI TEWEKKELTU ‘ALA ALLAHI RABBI WE RABBIKUM MA MIN DABBETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘AHIDHUN BINASIJETIHA ‘INNE RABBI ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
11.57: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKAD ‘EBLEGTUKUM MA ‘URSILTU BIHI ‘ILEJKUM WE JESTEHLIFU RABBI KAWMËN GAJRAKUM WE LA TEDURRUNEHU SHEJ’ËN ‘INNE RABBI ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HEFIDHU
11.58: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA HUDËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE NEXHXHEJNAHUM MIN ‘ADHABIN GALIDHI
11.59: WE TILKE ‘ADUN XHEHEDU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM WE ‘ASEW RUSULEHU WE ETTEBE’U ‘EMRA KUL-LI XHEBBERIN ‘ANIDI
11.60: WE ‘UTBI’U FI HEDHIHI DUN'JA LA’NETEN WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘ALA ‘INNE ‘ADËN KEFERU RABBEHUM ‘ALA BU’DËN LI’ADIN KAWMI HUDI
11.61: WE ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU HUWE ‘ENSHE’EKUM MINEL-’ARDI WE ESTA’MERAKUM FIHË FESTEGFIRUHU THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI ‘INNE RABBI KARIBUN MUXHIBU
11.62: KALU JA SALIHU KAD KUNTE FINA MERXHUWËN KABLE HADHA ‘ETENHANA ‘EN NA’BUDE MA JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUNA WE ‘INNENA LEFI SHEKKIN MIMMA TED’UNA ‘ILEJHI MURIBI
11.63: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE ‘ATANI MINHU RAHMETEN FEMEN JENSURUNI MINELLAHI ‘IN ‘ASEJTUHU FEMA TEZIDUNENI GAJRA TEHSIRI
11.64: WE JA KAWMI HEDHIHI NAKATU LLAHI LEKUM ‘AJETEN FEDHERUHA TE’KUL FI ‘ARDI LEHI WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABUN KARIBU
11.65: FE’AKARUHA FEKALE TEMETTA’U FI DARIKUM THALATHETE ‘EJJAMIN DHALIKE WE’DUN GAJRU MEKDHUBI
11.66: FELAMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA SALIHËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE MIN HIZJI JEWMI’IDHIN ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWEL-KAWIJUL-’AZIZ
11.67: WE ‘EHADHEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU SEJHETU FE’ESBEHU FI DIJARIHIM XHATHIMIN
11.68: KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHË ‘ALA ‘INNE THEMUDE KEFERU RABBEHUM ‘ALA BU’DËN LITHEMUD
11.69: WE LEKAD XHA’ET RUSULUNA ‘IBRAHIME BIL-BUSHRA KALU SALAMËN KALE SALAMUN FEMA LEBITHE ‘EN XHA’E BI’IXHLIN HENIDHI
11.70: FELAMMA RA’A ‘EJDIJEHUM LA TESILU ‘ILEJHI NEKIRAHUM WE ‘EWXHESE MINHUM HIFETEN KALU LA TEHAF ‘INNA ‘URSILNA ‘ILA KAWMI LUTI
11.71: WE EMRA’ETUHU KA’IMETUN FEDEHIKET FEBESHSHERNAHA BI’ISHAKA WE MIN WERA’I ‘ISHAKA JA’KUB
11.72: KALET JA WEJLETA ‘E’ELIDU WE ‘ENA ‘AXHUZUN WE HEDHA BE’LI SHEJHËN ‘INNE HADHA LESHEJ’UN ‘AXHIBU
11.73: KALU ‘ETA’XHEBINE MIN ‘EMRI LEHI RAHMETU LLAHI WE BERAKATUHU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EHLAL-BEJTI ‘INNEHU HEMIDUN MEXHIDU
11.74: FELAMMA DHEHEBE ‘AN ‘IBRAHIME RAW’U WE XHA’ET/HUL-BUSHRA JUXHADILUNA FI KAWMI LUTI
11.76: JA ‘IBRAHIMU ‘A’RID ‘AN HADHA ‘INNEHU KAD XHA’E ‘EMRU RABBIKE WE ‘INNAHUM ‘ATIHIM ‘ADHABUN GAJRU MERDUDI
11.77: WE LEMMA XHA’ET RUSULUNA LUTËN SI’E BIHIM WE DAKA BIHIM DHER’ËN WE KALE HADHA JEWMUN ‘ASIBU
11.78: WE XHA’EHU KAWMUHU JUHRA’UNE ‘ILEJHI WE MIN KABLU KENU JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI KALE JA KAWMI HA’UULË’ BENATI HUNNE ‘ETHERU LEKUM FE ETTEKU LLAHE WE LA TUHZUNI FI DEJFI ‘ELEJSE MINKUM RAXHULUN RASHIDU
11.79: KALU LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA LENA FI BENATIKE MIN HEKKIN WE ‘INNEKE LETA’LEMU MA NURID
11.80: KALE LEW ‘ENNE LI BIKUM KUWETEN ‘EW ‘AWI ‘ILA RUKNIN SHEDIDI
11.81: KALU JA LUTU ‘INNA RUSULU RABBIKE LEN JESILU ‘ILEJKE FE’ESRI BI’EHLIKE BIKIT’IN MINEL-LEJLI WE LA JELTEFIT MINKUM ‘EHEDUN ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEKE ‘INNEHU MUSIBUHA MA ‘ESABEHUM ‘INNE MEW’IDEHUMU SUBHU ‘ELEJSE SUBHU BIKARIBI
11.82: FELAMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA XHE’ALNA ‘ALIJEHA SAFILEHA WE ‘EMTERNA ‘ALEJHA HIXHARATEN MIN SIXHXHILIN MENDUDI
11.83: MUSEWWEMETEN ‘INDE RABBIKE WE MA HIJE MINE EDH-DHALIMINE BIBE’IDI
11.84: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN KALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU WE LA TENKUSUL-MIKJA LE WEL-MIZANE ‘INNI ‘ERAKUM BIHAJRIN WE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN MUHITI
11.85: WE JA KAWMI ‘EWFUL-MIKJALE WEL-MIZANE BIL-KISTI WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA’EHUM WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ËRDI MUFSIDIN
11.86: BEKIJETU LLAHI HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININE WE MA ‘ENA ‘ALEJKUM BIHEFIDHI
11.87: KALU JA SHU’AJBU ‘ESALATUKE TE’MURUKE ‘EN NETRUKE MA JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUNA ‘EW ‘EN NEF’ALE FI ‘EMWELINA MA NESHA’U ‘INNEKE LE’ENTAL-HELIMU RASHID
11.88: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KUNTU ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBI WE RAZEKANI MINHU RIZKËN HESENËN WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘UHALIFEKUM ‘ILA MA ‘ENHAKUM ‘ANHU ‘IN ‘URIDU ‘IL-LAL-’ISLAHE MA ESTETA’TU WE MA TEWFIKI ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI ‘UNIB
11.89: WE JA KAWMI LA JEXHRIMENNEKUM SHIKAKI ‘EN JUSIBEKUM MITHLU MA ‘ESABE KAWME NUHIN ‘EW KAWME HUDIN ‘EW KAWME SALIHIN WE MA KAWMU LUTIN MINKUM BIBE’IDI
11.90: WE ESTEGFIRU RABBEKUM THUMME TUBU ‘ILEJHI ‘INNE RABBI RAHIMUN WEDUDU
11.91: KALU JA SHU’AJBU MA NEFKAHU KETHIRAN MIMMA TEKULU WE ‘INNA LENERAKE FINA DA’IFËN WE LEWLA RAHTUKE LERAXHEMNAKE WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJNA BI’AZIZI
11.92: KALE JA KAWMI ‘ERAHTI ‘E’AZZU ‘ALEJKUM MINELLAHI WE ETTEHADHTUMUHU WERA’EKUM DHIHRIJËN ‘INNE RABBI BIMA TA’MELUNE MUHITU
11.93: WE JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN SEWFE TA’LEMUNE MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE MEN HUWE KADHIBUN WE ERTEKIBU ‘INNI ME’AKUM RAKIBU
11.94: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRUNA NEXHXHEJNA SHU’AJBËN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU BIRAHMETIN MINNA WE ‘EHADHETIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU SEJHETU FE’ESBEHU FI DIJARIHIM XHATHIMIN
11.95: KE’EN LEM JEGNEW FIHË ‘ALA BU’DËN LIMEDJENE KAMA BE’IDET THEMUD
11.96: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
11.97: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FE ETTEBE’U ‘EMRA FIR’AWNE WE MA ‘EMRU FIR’AWNE BIRASHIDI
11.98: JEKDUMU KAWMEHU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FE’EWRADEHUMU NARA WE BI’SAL-WIRDUL-MEWRUD
11.99: WE ‘UTBI’U FI HEDHIHI LA’NETEN WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI BI’SE RIFDUL-MERFUD
11.100: DHALIKE MIN ‘ENBE’IL-KURA NEKUSSUHU ‘ALEJKE MINHA KA’IMUN WE HESIDU
11.101: WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LAKIN DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM FEMA ‘EGNET ‘ANHUM ‘ALIHETUHUMU AL-LETI JED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI MIN SHEJ’IN LEMMA XHA’E ‘EMRU RABBIKE WE MA ZADUHUM GAJRA TETBIBI
11.102: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EHDHU RABBIKE ‘IDHA ‘EHADHAL-KURA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN ‘INNE ‘EHDHEHU ‘ALIMUN SHEDIDU
11.103: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIMEN HAFE ‘ADHABEL-’AHIRATI DHALIKE JEWMUN MEXHMU’UN LEHU NASU WE DHELIKE JEWMUN MESH/HUDU
11.105: JEWME JE’TI LA TEKELLEMU NEFSUN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI FEMINHUM SHEKIJUN WE SA’IDU
11.106: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE SHEKU FEFI NARI LEHUM FIHË ZEFIRUN WE SHEHIKU
11.107: HALIDINE FIHË MA DAMETI SEMAWETU WEL-’ERDU ‘IL-LA MA SHA’E RABBUKE ‘INNE RABBEKE FE’’ALUN LIMA JURID
11.108: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE SU’IDU FEFIL-XHENNETI HALIDINE FIHË MA DAMETI SEMAWETU WEL-’ERDU ‘IL-LA MA SHA’E RABBUKE ‘ATA’EN GAJRA MEXHDHUDHI
11.109: FELA TEKU FI MIRJETIN MIMMA JA’BUDU HA’UULË’ MA JA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LA KAMA JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUHUM MIN KABLU WE ‘INNA LEMUWEFFUHUM NESIBEHUM GAJRA MENKUSI
11.110: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FEHTULIFE FIHI WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNAHUM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
11.111: WE ‘INNE KULLA LEMMA LEJUWEFFIJENNEHUM RABBUKE ‘A’MALEHUM ‘INNEHU BIMA JA’MELUNE HABIRU
11.112: FESTEKIM KAMA ‘UMIRTE WE MEN TABE ME’AKE WE LA TETGAW ‘INNEHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
11.113: WE LA TERKENU ‘ILEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU FETEMESSEKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN ‘EWLIJA’E THUMME LA TUNSERUN
11.114: WE ‘EKIMI SELËTE TERAFEJI NEHARI WE ZULEFËN MINEL-LEJLI ‘INNAL-HESENATI JUDH/HIBNE SEJJI’ATI DHALIKE DHIKRA LILDHDHAKIRIN
11.116: FELEWLA KANE MINEL-KURUNI MIN KABLIKUM ‘ULU BEKIJETIN JENHEWNE ‘ANIL-FESADI FIL-’ËRDI ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMEN ‘ENXHEJNA MINHUM WE ETTEBE’EL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA ‘UTRIFU FIHI WE KENU MUXHRIMIN
11.117: WE MA KANE RABBUKE LIJUHLIKAL-KURA BIDHULMIN WE ‘EHLUHA MUSLIHUN
11.118: WE LEW SHA’E RABBUKE LEXHE’ALE NASE ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN WE LA JEZALUNE MUHTELIFIN
11.119: ‘IL-LA MEN RAHIME RABBUKE WE LIDHELIKE HALEKAHUM WE TEMMET KELIMETU RABBIKE LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINEL-XHINNETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
11.120: WE KULLËN NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE MIN ‘ENBE’I RUSULI MA NUTHEBBITU BIHI FU’UADEKE WE XHA’EKE FI HEDHIHIL-HEKKU WE MEW’IDHETUN WE DHIKRA LILMU’UMININ
11.121: WE KUL LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNA ‘AMILUN
11.123: WE LIL-LEHI GAJBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘ILEJHI JURXHA’UL-’EMRU KUL-LUHU FE’BUD/HU WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALEJHI WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN

12.3: NAHNU NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE ‘EHSENAL-KASESI BIMA ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE HADHAL-KUR’ANE WE ‘IN KUNTE MIN KABLIHI LEMINEL-GAFILIN
12.4: ‘IDH KALE JUSUFU LI’EBIHI JA ‘EBETI ‘INNI RA’EJTU ‘EHEDE ‘ASHERA KEWKEBËN WE SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA RA’EJTUHUM LI SAXHIDIN
12.5: KALE JA BUNEJJE LA TEKSUS RU’UJA KE ‘ALA ‘IHWETIKE FEJEKIDU LEKE KEJDËN ‘INNE SHEJTANE LIL’INSANI ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
12.6: WE KEDHELIKE JEXHTEBIKE RABBUKE WE JU’ALLIMUKE MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI WE JUTIMMU NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKE WE ‘ALA ‘ALI JA’KUBE KAMA ‘ETEMMEHA ‘ALA ‘EBEWEJKE MIN KABLU ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA ‘INNE RABBEKE ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
12.7: LEKAD KANE FI JUSUFE WE ‘IHWETIHI ‘AJATUN LILSSA’ILIN
12.8: ‘IDH KALU LEJUSUFU WE ‘EHUHU ‘EHEBBU ‘ILA ‘EBINA MINNA WE NAHNU ‘USBETUN ‘INNE ‘EBENA LEFI DALELIN MUBINI
