12.9: EKTULU JUSUFE ‘EWI ETRAHUHU ‘ERDËN JEHLU LEKUM WEXHHU ‘EBIKUM WE TEKUNU MIN BE’DIHI KAWMËN SALIHIN
12.10: KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM LA TEKTULU JUSUFE WE ‘ELKUHU FI GAJABETIL-XHUBBI JELTEKITHU BE’DU SEJJARATI ‘IN KUNTUM FE’ILIN
12.11: KALU JA ‘EBENA MA LEKE LA TE’MENNA ‘ALA JUSUFE WE ‘INNA LEHU LENASIHUN
12.12: ‘ERSILHU ME’ANA GADËN JERTA’ WE JEL’AB WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
12.13: KALE ‘INNI LEJEHZUNUNI ‘EN TEDH/HEBU BIHI WE ‘EHAFU ‘EN JE’KULEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE ‘ENTUM ‘ANHU GAFILUN
12.14: KALU LE’IN ‘EKELEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE NAHNU ‘USBETUN ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEHASIRUN
12.15: FELAMMA DHEHEBU BIHI WE ‘EXHMA’U ‘EN JEXH’ALUHU FI GAJABETIL-XHUBBI WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHI LETUNEBBI’ENNEHUM BI’EMRIHIM HADHA WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
12.17: KALU JA ‘EBENA ‘INNA DHEHEBNA NESTEBIKU WE TERAKNA JUSUFE ‘INDE META’INA FE’EKELEHU EDH-DHI’BU WE MA ‘ENTE BIMU’UMININ LENA WE LEW KUNNA SADIKIN
12.18: WE XHA’U ‘ALA KAMISIHI BIDEMIN KEDHIBIN KALE BEL SEWWELET LEKUM ‘ENFUSUKUM ‘EMRAN FESEBRUN XHEMILUN WA-LLAHUL-MUSTA’ANU ‘ALA MA TESIFUN
12.19: WE XHA’ET SEJJARATUN FE’ERSELU WE ERIDEHUM FE’EDLA DELWEHU KALE JA BUSHRA HADHA GULËMUN WE ‘ESERRUHU BIDA’ATEN WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIMA JA’MELUN
12.20: WE SHERAWHU BITHEMENIN BEHSIN DERAHIME MA’DUDETIN WE KENU FIHI MINE EZ-ZAHIDIN
12.21: WE KALEL-LEDHI ESHTERAHU MIN MISRA LI’IMRA’ETIHI ‘EKRIMI METHWEHU ‘ASA ‘EN JENFE’ANA ‘EW NETTEHIDHEHU WELEDËN WE KEDHELIKE MEKKENNA LIJUSUFE FIL-’ËRDI WE LINU’ALLIMEHU MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI WA-LLAHU GALIBUN ‘ALA ‘EMRIHI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.22: WE LEMMA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
12.23: WE RAWEDET/HU AL-LETI HUWE FI BEJTIHA ‘AN NEFSIHI WE GAL-LEKATIL-’EBWEBE WE KALET HEJTE LEKE KALE MA’ADHALLAHI ‘INNEHU RABBI ‘EHSENE METHWEJE ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
12.24: WE LEKAD HEMMET BIHI WE HEMME BIHA LEWLA ‘EN RA’A BURHANE RABBIHI KEDHALIKE LINESRIFE ‘ANHU SU’E WEL-FEHSHA’E ‘INNEHU MIN ‘IBEDINAL-MUHLESIN
12.25: WE ESTEBEKAL-BEBE WE KADDET KAMISEHU MIN DUBURIN WE ‘ELFEJA SEJJIDEHA LEDAL-BEBI KALET MA XHEZA’U MEN ‘ERADE BI’EHLIKE SU’ËN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUSXHENE ‘EW ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
12.26: KALE HIJE RAWEDETNI ‘AN NEFSI WE SHEHIDE SHAHIDUN MIN ‘EHLIHA ‘IN KANE KAMISUHU KUDDE MIN KUBULIN FESEDEKAT WE HUWE MINEL-KADHIBIN
12.27: WE ‘IN KANE KAMISUHU KUDDE MIN DUBURIN FEKEDHEBET WE HUWE MINE SADIKIN
12.28: FELAMMA RA’A KAMISEHU KUDDE MIN DUBURIN KALE ‘INNEHU MIN KEJDIKUNNE ‘INNE KEJDEKUNNE ‘ADHIMU
12.29: JUSUFU ‘A’RID ‘AN HADHA WE ESTEGFIRI LIDHENBIKI ‘INNEKI KUNTI MINEL-HATI’IN
12.30: WE KALE NISWETUN FIL-MEDINETI EMRA’ETUL-’AZIZI TURAWIDU FETAHA ‘AN NEFSIHI KAD SHEGAFEHA HUBBËN ‘INNA LENERAHA FI DALELIN MUBINI
12.31: FELAMMA SEMI’AT BIMEKRIHINNE ‘ERSELET ‘ILEJHINNE WE ‘A’TEDET LEHUNNE MUTTEKE’EN WE ‘ATET KUL-LE WEHIDETIN MINHUNNE SIKKINËN WE KALETI EHRUXH ‘ALEJHINNE FELAMMA RA’EJNEHU ‘EKBERNEHU WE KATTA’NE ‘EJDIJEHUNNE WE KULNE HASHE LIL-LAHI MA HADHA BESHERAN ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA MELEKUN KERIMU
12.32: KALET FEDHALIKUNNEL-LEDHI LUMTUNNENI FIHI WE LEKAD RAWEDTTUHU ‘AN NEFSIHI FESTA’SEME WE LE’IN LEM JEF’AL MA ‘AMURUHU LEJUSXHENENNE WE LEJEKUNËN MINE SAGIRIN
12.33: KALE RABBI SIXHNU ‘EHEBBU ‘ILEJJE MIMMA JED’UNENI ‘ILEJHI WE ‘IL-LA TESRIF ‘ANNI KEJDEHUNNE ‘ESBU ‘ILEJHINNE WE ‘EKUN MINEL-XHAHILIN
12.34: FESTEXHABE LEHU RABBUHU FESERAFE ‘ANHU KEJDEHUNNE ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
12.35: THUMME BEDA LEHUM MIN BE’DI MA RA’EWL-’AJATI LEJESXHUNUNNEHU HATTE HINI
12.36: WE DEHALE ME’AHU SIXHNE FETEJANI KALE ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘INNI ‘ERANI ‘A’SIRU HAMRAN WE KALEL-’AHARU ‘INNI ‘ERANI ‘EHMILU FEWKA RA’SI HUBZËN TE’KULUT-TEJRU MINHU NEBBI’NA BITE’WILIHI ‘INNA NERAKE MINEL-MUHSININ
12.37: KALE LA JE’TIKUMA TA’AMUN TURZEKANIHI ‘IL-LA NEBBE’TUKUMA BITE’WILIHI KABLE ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMA DHALIKUMA MIMMA ‘AL-LEMENI RABBI ‘INNI TERAKTU MIL-LETE KAWMIN LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
12.38: WE ETTEBE’TU MIL-LETE ‘ABE’I ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE MA KANE LENA ‘EN NUSHRIKE BIL-LAHI MIN SHEJ’IN DHALIKE MIN FEDLI LEHI ‘ALEJNA WE ‘ALA NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
12.39: JA SAHIBEJI SIXHNI ‘E’ERBEBUN MUTEFERRIKUNE HAJRUN ‘EMI ALLAHUL-WEHIDUL-KAHHAR
12.40: MA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNIHI ‘IL-LA ‘ESMA’EN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABE’UUKUM MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI ‘EMERA ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU DHALIKE DINUL-KAJJIMU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.41: JA SAHIBEJI SIXHNI ‘EMMA ‘EHEDUKUMA FEJESKI RABBEHU HAMRAN WE ‘EMMAL-’AHARU FEJUSLEBU FETE’KULUT-TEJRU MIN RA’SIHI KUDIJAL-’EMRUL-LEDHI FIHI TESTEFTIJAN
12.42: WE KALE LIL-LEDHI DHENNE ‘ENNEHU NAXHIN MINHUMA EDHKURNI ‘INDE RABBIKE FE’ENSAHU SHEJTANU DHIKRA RABBIHI FELEBITHE FI SIXHNI BID’A SININ
12.43: WE KALEL-MELIKU ‘INNI ‘ERA SEB’A BEKARATIN SIMANIN JE’KULUHUNNE SEB’UN ‘IXHAFUN WE SEB’A SUNBULËTIN HUDRIN WE ‘UHARA JA BISATIN JA ‘EJJUHEL-MELE’U ‘EFTUNI FI RU’UJA JE ‘IN KUNTUM LILRRU’UJA TA’BURUN
12.44: KALU ‘EDGATHU ‘EHLAMIN WE MA NAHNU BITE’WILIL-’EHLAMI BI’ALIMIN
12.45: WE KALEL-LEDHI NEXHA MINHUMA WE EIDDEKERA BE’DE ‘UMMETIN ‘ENA ‘UNEBBI’UKUM BITE’WILIHI FE’ERSILUN
12.46: JUSUFU ‘EJJUHA SIDDIKU ‘EFTINA FI SEB’I BEKARATIN SIMANIN JE’KULUHUNNE SEB’UN ‘IXHAFUN WE SEB’I SUNBULËTIN HUDRIN WE ‘UHARA JA BISATIN LE’ALLI ‘ERXHI’U ‘ILA NASI LE’AL-LEHUM JA’LEMUN
12.47: KALE TEZRA’UNE SEB’A SININE DE’EBËN FEMA HESEDTUM FEDHERUHU FI SUNBULIHI ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMA TE’KULUN
12.48: THUMME JE’TI MIN BE’DI DHALIKE SEB’UN SHIDADUN JE’KULNE MA KADDEMTUM LEHUNNE ‘IL-LA KALILËN MIMMA TUHSINUN
12.49: THUMME JE’TI MIN BE’DI DHALIKE ‘AMUN FIHI JUGATHU NASU WE FIHI JA’SIRUN
12.50: WE KALEL-MELIKU E’TUNI BIHI FELAMMA XHA’EHU RASULU KALE ERXHI’ ‘ILA RABBIKE FES’ELHU MA BELU NISWETIL-LATI KATTA’NE ‘EJDIJEHUNNE ‘INNE RABBI BIKEJDIHINNE ‘ALIMU
12.51: KALE MA HATBUKUNNE ‘IDH RAWEDTTUNNE JUSUFE ‘AN NEFSIHI KULNE HASHE LIL-LAHI MA ‘ALIMNA ‘ALEJHI MIN SU’IN KALETI EMRA’ETUL-’AZIZIL-’ANE HESHESAL-HEKKU ‘ENA RAWEDTTUHU ‘AN NEFSIHI WE ‘INNEHU LEMINE SADIKIN
12.52: DHALIKE LIJA’LEME ‘ENNI LEM ‘EHUNHU BIL-GAJBI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LA JEHDI KEJDAL-HA’ININ
12.53: WE MA ‘UBERRI’U NEFSI ‘INNE NEFSE LE’EMMARATUN BIS-SU’I ‘IL-LA MA RAHIME RABBI ‘INNE RABBI GAFURUN RAHIMU
12.54: WE KALEL-MELIKU E’TUNI BIHI ‘ESTEHLISHU LINEFSI FELAMMA KELLEMEHU KALE ‘INNEKAL-JEWME LEDEJNA MEKINUN ‘EMINU
12.56: WE KEDHELIKE MEKKENNA LIJUSUFE FIL-’ËRDI JETEBEWWE’U MINHA HEJTHU JESHA’U NUSIBU BIRAHMETINA MEN NESHA’U WE LA NUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
12.57: WE LE’EXHRUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE KENU JETTEKUN
12.58: WE XHA’E ‘IHWETU JUSUFE FEDEHALU ‘ALEJHI FE’ARAFEHUM WE HUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
12.59: WE LEMMA XHEHHEZEHUM BIXHEHAZIHIM KALE E’TUNI BI’EHIN LEKUM MIN ‘EBIKUM ‘ALA TERAWNE ‘ENNI ‘UFIL-KEJLE WE ‘ENA HAJRUL-MUNZILIN
12.60: FE’IN LEM TE’TUNI BIHI FELA KEJLE LEKUM ‘INDI WE LA TEKRABUN
12.62: WE KALE LIFITJANIHI EXH’ALU BIDA’ATEHUM FI RIHALIHIM LE’AL-LEHUM JA’RIFUNEHA ‘IDHA ENKALEBU ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
12.63: FELAMMA RAXHA’U ‘ILA ‘EBIHIM KALU JA ‘EBENA MUNI’A MINNEL-KEJLU FE’ERSIL ME’ANA ‘EHANA NEKTEL WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
12.64: KALE HEL ‘AMENUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘IL-LA KAMA ‘EMINTUKUM ‘ALA ‘EHIHI MIN KABLU FE-ALLAHU HAJRUN HAFIDHËN WE HUWE ‘ERHEMU RAHIMIN
12.65: WE LEMMA FETEHU META’AHUM WE XHEDU BIDA’ATEHUM RUDDET ‘ILEJHIM KALU JA ‘EBENA MA NEBGI HEDHIHI BIDA’ATUNA RUDDET ‘ILEJNA WE NEMIRU ‘EHLENA WE NEHFEDHU ‘EHANA WE NEZDADU KEJLE BE’IRIN DHALIKE KEJLUN JESIRU
12.66: KALE LEN ‘URSILEHU ME’AKUM HATTE TU’UTUNI MEWTHIKËN MINELLAHI LETE’TUNENI BIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JUHATE BIKUM FELAMMA ‘ATEWHU MEWTHIKAHUM KALEL-LAHU ‘ALA MA NEKULU WE KILU
12.67: WE KALE JA BENIJE LA TEDHULU MIN BEBIN WEHIDIN WE EDHULU MIN ‘EBWEBIN MUTEFERRIKATIN WE MA ‘UGNI ‘ANKUM MINELLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN ‘INIL-HUKMU ‘IL-LA LIL-LAHI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ALEJHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MUTEWEKKILUN
12.68: WE LEMMA DEHALU MIN HEJTHU ‘EMERAHUM ‘EBUHUM MMA KANE JUGNI ‘ANHUM MMINELLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA HAXHETEN FI NEFSI JA’KUBE KADAHA WE ‘INNEHU LEDHU ‘ILMIN LIMA ‘ALLEMNAHU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
12.69: WE LEMMA DEHALU ‘ALA JUSUFE ‘AWE ‘ILEJHI ‘EHAHU KALE ‘INNI ‘ENA ‘EHUKE FELA TEBTE’IS BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
12.70: FELAMMA XHEHHEZEHUM BIXHEHAZIHIM XHE’ALE SIKAJETE FI RAHLI ‘EHIHI THUMME ‘EDHDHENE MU’UEDHDHINUN ‘EJJETUHAL-’IRU ‘INNEKUM LESARIKUN
12.72: KALU NEFKIDU SUWE’AL-MELIKI WE LIMEN XHA’E BIHI HIMLU BE’IRIN WE ‘ENA BIHI ZA’IMU
12.73: KALU TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ALIMTUM MA XHI’NA LINUFSIDE FIL-’ËRDI WE MA KUNNA SARIKIN
12.75: KALU XHEZA’UUHU MEN WUXHIDE FI RAHLIHI FEHUWE XHEZA’UUHU KEDHALIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
12.76: FEBEDE’E BI’EW’IJETIHIM KABLE WI’A’I ‘EHIHI THUMME ESTEHRAXHEHA MIN WI’A’I ‘EHIHI KEDHALIKE KIDNA LIJUSUFE MA KANE LIJE’HUDHE ‘EHAHU FI DINIL-MELIKI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’-ALLAHU NERFE’U DERAXHATIN MEN NESHA’U WE FEWKA KUL-LI DHI ‘ILMIN ‘ALIMU
12.77: KALU ‘IN JESRIK FEKAD SERAKA ‘EHUN LEHU MIN KABLU FE’ESERRAHA JUSUFU FI NEFSIHI WE LEM JUBDIHA LEHUM KALE ‘ENTUM SHERRUN MEKANËN WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA TESIFUN
12.78: KALU JA ‘EJJUHEL-’AZIZU ‘INNE LEHU ‘EBËN SHEJHËN KEBIRAN FEHUDH ‘EHEDENA MEKANEHU ‘INNA NERAKE MINEL-MUHSININ
12.79: KALE MA’ADHALLAHI ‘EN NE’HUDHE ‘IL-LA MEN WEXHEDNA META’ANA ‘INDEHU ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEDHALIMUN
12.80: FELAMMA ESTEJ’ESU MINHU HALESU NEXHIJËN KALE KEBIRUHUM ‘ELEM TA’LEMU ‘ENNE ‘EBEKUM KAD ‘EHADHE ‘ALEJKUM MEWTHIKËN MINELLAHI WE MIN KABLU MA FERRATTUM FI JUSUFE FELEN ‘EBRAHAL-’ERDA HATTE JE’DHENE LI ‘EBI ‘EW JEHKUMAL-LAHU LI WE HUWE HAJRUL-HAKIMIN
12.81: ERXHI’U ‘ILA ‘EBIKUM FEKULU JA ‘EBENA ‘INNE EBNEKE SERAKA WE MA SHEHIDNA ‘IL-LA BIMA ‘ALIMNA WE MA KUNNA LILGAJBI HAFIDHIN
12.82: WE ES’ELIL-KARJETAL-LETI KUNNA FIHË WEL-’IRAL-LETI ‘EKBELNA FIHË WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
12.83: KALE BEL SEWWELET LEKUM ‘ENFUSUKUM ‘EMRAN FESEBRUN XHEMILUN ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JE’TIJENI BIHIM XHEMI’ËN ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
12.84: WE TEWELLA ‘ANHUM WE KALE JA ‘ESEFE ‘ALA JUSUFE WE EBJEDDET ‘AJNAHU MINEL-HUZNI FEHUWE KEDHIMU
12.85: KALU TE-ALLAHI TEFTE’U TEDHKURU JUSUFE HATTE TEKUNE HERADËN ‘EW TEKUNE MINEL-HALIKIN
12.86: KALE ‘INNAMA ‘ESHKU BETHTHI WE HUZNI ‘ILA LLAHI WE ‘A’LEMU MINELLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
12.87: JA BENIJE EDH/HEBU FETEHESSESU MIN JUSUFE WE ‘EHIHI WE LA TEJ’ESU MIN RAWHI LEHI ‘INNEHU LA JEJ’ESU MIN RAWHI LEHI ‘IL-LAL-KAWMUL-KAFIRUN
12.88: FELAMMA DEHALU ‘ALEJHI KALU JA ‘EJJUHEL-’AZIZU MESSENA WE ‘EHLENA DURRU WE XHI’NA BIBIDA’ATIN MUZXHËTIN FE’EWFI LENAL-KEJLE WE TESEDDEK ‘ALEJNA ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEXHZIL-MUTESEDDIKIN
12.89: KALE HEL ‘ALIMTUM MA FE’ALTUM BIJUSUFE WE ‘EHIHI ‘IDH ‘ENTUM XHAHILUN
12.90: KALU ‘E’INNEKE LE’ENTE JUSUFU KALE ‘ENA JUSUFU WE HEDHA ‘EHI KAD MENNAL-LAHU ‘ALEJNA ‘INNEHU MEN JETTEKI WE JESBIR FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JUDI’U ‘EXHRAL-MUHSININ
12.91: KALU TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ATHERAKEL-LEHU ‘ALEJNA WE ‘IN KUNNA LEHATI’IN
12.92: KALE LA TETHRIBE ‘ALEJKUMUL-JEWME JEGFIRU ALLAHU LEKUM WE HUWE ‘ERHEMU RAHIMIN
12.93: EDH/HEBU BIKAMISI HADHA FE’ELKUHU ‘ALA WEXHHI ‘EBI JE’TI BESIRAN WE ‘TUNI BI’EHLIKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
12.94: WE LEMMA FESELETIL-’IRU KALE ‘EBUHUM ‘INNI LE’EXHIDU RIHE JUSUFE LEWLA ‘EN TUFENNIDUN
12.96: FELAMMA ‘EN XHA’AL-BESHIRU ‘ELKAHU ‘ALA WEXHHIHI FERTEDDE BESIRAN KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKUM ‘INNI ‘A’LEMU MINELLAHI MA LA TA’LEMUN
12.97: KALU JA ‘EBENA ESTEGFIR LENA DHUNUBENA ‘INNA KUNNA HATI’IN
12.98: KALE SEWFE ‘ESTEGFIRU LEKUM RABBI ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
12.99: FELAMMA DEHALU ‘ALA JUSUFE ‘AWE ‘ILEJHI ‘EBEWEJHI WE KALE EDHULU MISRA ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU ‘AMININ
12.100: WE RAFE’A ‘EBEWEJHI ‘ALEL-’ARSHI WE HARRU LEHU SUXHXHEDËN WE KALE JA ‘EBETI HADHA TE’WILU RU’UJA J MIN KABLU KAD XHE’ALEHA RABBI HEKKËN WE KAD ‘EHSENE BI ‘IDH ‘EHRAXHENI MINE SIXHNI WE XHA’E BIKUM MINEL-BEDWI MIN BE’DI ‘EN NEZEGA SHEJTANU BEJNI WE BEJNE ‘IHWETI ‘INNE RABBI LETIFUN LIMA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
12.101: RABBI KAD ‘ATEJTENI MINEL-MULKI WE ‘ALLEMTENI MIN TE’WILIL-’EHADITHI FETIRA SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘ENTE WE LIJI FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI TEWEFFENI MUSLIMËN WE ‘ELHIKNI BIS-SALIHIN
12.102: DHALIKE MIN ‘ENBE’IL-GAJBI NUHIHI ‘ILEJKE WE MA KUNTE LEDEJHIM ‘IDH ‘EXHMA’U ‘EMRAHUM WE HUM JEMKURUN
12.103: WE MA ‘EKTHERU NASI WE LEW HERASTE BIMU’UMININ
12.104: WE MA TES’ELUHUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRUN LIL’ALEMIN
12.105: WE KE’EJJIN MIN ‘AJETIN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JEMURRUNE ‘ALEJHA WE HUM ‘ANHA MU’RIDUN
12.106: WE MA JU’UMINU ‘EKTHERUHUM BIL-LAHI ‘IL-LA WE HUM MUSHRIKUN
12.107: ‘EFE’EMINU ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM GASHIJETUN MIN ‘ADHABI LEHI ‘EW TE’TIJEHUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
12.108: KUL HEDHIHI SEBILI ‘ED’U ‘ILA LLAHI ‘ALA BESIRATIN ‘ENA WE MENI ETTEBE’ANI WE SUBHANALLAHI WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
12.109: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE ‘IL-LA RIXHALËN NUHI ‘ILEJHIM MIN ‘EHLIL-KURA ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE LEDARUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
12.110: HATTE ‘IDHA ESTEJ’ESE RUSULU WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM KAD KUDHIBU XHA’EHUM NESRUNA FENUXHXHIJE MEN NESHA’U WE LA JURADDU BE’SUNA ‘ANIL-KAWMIL-MUXHRIMIN
12.111: LEKAD KANE FI KASESIHIM ‘IBRATUN LI’WLIL-’ELBEBI MA KANE HEDITHËN JUFTERA WE LAKIN TESDIKEL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE TEFSILE KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDAN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN

13.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-MIM-RA TILKE ‘AJATUL-KITABI WEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKAL-HEKKU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
13.2: ALLAHUL-LEDHI RAFE’A SEMAWETI BIGAJRI ‘AMEDIN TERAWNEHA THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI WE SEHHARA SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA JUFESSILUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM BILIKA’I RABBIKUM TUKINUN
13.3: WE HUWEL-LEDHI MEDDAL-’ERDA WE XHE’ALE FIHË RAWESIJE WE ‘ENHARAN WE MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI XHE’ALE FIHË ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI JUGSHIL-LEJLE NEHARA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
13.4: WE FIL-’ËRDI KITA’UN MUTEXHAWIRATUN WE XHENNATUN MIN ‘A’NABIN WE ZER’UN WE NEHILUN SINWENUN WE GAJRU SINWENIN JUSKA BIMA’IN WEHIDIN WE NUFEDDILU BE’DEHA ‘ALA BE’DIN FIL-’UKULI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
13.5: WE ‘IN TA’XHEB FE’AXHEBUN KAWLUHUM ‘E’IDHA KUNNA TURABËN ‘E’INNA LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDIN ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM WE ‘ULË’IKAL-’EGLALU FI ‘A’NAKIHIM WE ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
13.6: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIS-SEJJI’ETI KABLAL-HESENETI WE KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIMUL-METHULËTU WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU MEGFIRATIN LILNNASI ‘ALA DHULMIHIM WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LESHEDIDUL-’IKAB
13.7: WE JAKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI ‘INNAMA ‘ENTE MUNDHIRUN WE LIKUL-LI KAWMIN HADI
13.8: ALLAHU JA’LEMU MA TEHMILU KUL-LU ‘UNTHA WE MA TEGIDUL-’ERHAMU WE MA TEZDADU WE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN ‘INDEHU BIMIKDARI
13.10: SEWE’UN MINKUM MEN ‘ESERRAL-KAWLE WE MEN XHEHERA BIHI WE MEN HUWE MUSTEHFIN BIL-LEJLI WE SARIBUN BIN-NEHAR
13.11: LEHU MU’AKKIBETUN MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE MIN HALFIHI JEHFEDHUNEHU MIN ‘EMRI LEHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUGAJJIRU MA BIKAWMIN HATTE JUGAJJIRU MA BI’ENFUSIHIM WE ‘IDHA ‘ERADAL-LAHU BIKAWMIN SU’ËN FELA MERADDE LEHU WE MA LEHUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE E
13.12: HUWEL-LEDHI JURIKUMUL-BERKA HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE JUNSHI’U SEHABE THIKAL
13.13: WE JUSEBBIHU RA’DU BIHEMDIHI WEL-MELE’IKETU MIN HIFETIHI WE JURSILU SEWE’IKA FEJUSIBU BIHA MEN JESHA’U WE HUM JUXHADILUNE FI LEHI WE HUWE SHEDIDUL-MIHAL
13.14: LEHU DA’WETUL-HEKKI WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JESTEXHIBUNE LEHUM BISHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA KEBESITI KEFFEJHI ‘ILAL-MA’I LIJEBLUGA FEHU WE MA HUWE BIBELIGIHI WE MA DU’A’UL-KEFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DALELI
13.15: WE LIL-LEHI JESXHUDU MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI TEW’ËN WE KERHËN WE DHILALUHUM BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASAL
13.16: KUL MEN RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KULI ALLAHU KUL ‘EFETTEHADHTUM MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E LA JEMLIKUNE LI’NFUSIHIM NEF’ËN WE LA DERRAN KUL HEL JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU ‘EM HEL TESTEWI EDH-DHULUMATU WE NUR ‘EM XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’E HALEKU KEHALKIHI FETESHABEHAL-HALKU ‘ALEJHIM KULI ALLAHU HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWEL-WEHIDUL-KAHHAR
13.17: ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FESALET ‘EWDIJETUN BIKADERIHA FEHTEMELE SEJLU ZEBEDËN RABIËN WE MIMMA JUKIDUNE ‘ALEJHI FI NARI EBTIGA’E HILJETIN ‘EW META’IN ZEBEDUN MITHLUHU KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-HAKKA WEL-BETILE FE’EMMA EZ-ZEBEDU FEJEDH/HEBU XHUFE’EN WE ‘EMMA MA JENFE’U NASE FEJEMKUTHU FIL-’ËRDI KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHAL
13.18: LIL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIRABBIHIMUL-HUSNA WEL-LEDHINE LEM JESTEXHIBU LEHU LEW ‘ENNE LEHUM MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LAFTEDEW BIHI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM SU’UL-HISABI WE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MIHAD
13.19: ‘EFEMEN JA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKAL-HEKKU KEMEN HUWE ‘A’MA ‘INNAMA JETEDHEKKERU ‘ULUL-’ELBEB
13.20: EL-LEDHINE JUFUNE BI’AHDI LEHI WE LA JENKUDUNAL-MITHAK
13.21: WEL-LEDHINE JESILUNE MA ‘EMER-ALLAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM WE JEHAFUNE SU’AL-HISAB
13.22: WEL-LEDHINE SEBERU EBTIGA’E WEXHHI RABBIHIM WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRAN WE ‘ALANIJETEN WE JEDRA’UNE BIL-HESENETI SEJJI’ETE ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘UKBE DAR
13.23: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA WE MEN SELEHE MIN ‘ABE’IHIM WE ‘EZWEXHIHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM WEL-MELE’IKETU JEDHULUNE ‘ALEJHIM MIN KUL-LI BEBI
13.25: WEL-LEDHINE JENKUDUNE ‘AHDALLAHI MIN BE’DI MITHAKIHI WE JEKTA’UNE MA ‘EMER-ALLAHU BIHI ‘EN JUSELE WE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ËRDI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUMUL-LA’NETU WE LEHUM SU’U DAR
13.26: ALLAHU JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU WE FERIHU BIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE MAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA FIL-’AHIRATI ‘IL-LA META’U
13.27: WE JAKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJETUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI ‘ILEJHI MEN ‘ENAB
13.28: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE TETME’INNU KULUBUHUM BIDHIKRI LEHI ‘ALA BIDHIKRI LEHI TETME’INNUL-KULUB
13.29: EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI TUBE LEHUM WE HUSNU ME’ABI
13.30: KEDHALIKE ‘ERSELNAKE FI ‘UMMETIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHA ‘UMEMUN LITETLUWE ‘ALEJHIMUL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE WE HUM JEKFURUNE BIR-RAHMENI KUL HUWE RABBI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI METAB
13.31: WE LEW ‘ENNE KUR’ANËN SUJJIRAT BIHIL-XHIBELU ‘EW KUTTI’AT BIHIL-’ERDU ‘EW KUL-LIME BIHIL-MEWTA BEL LIL-LAHIL-’EMRU XHEMI’ËN ‘EFELEM JEJ’ESIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU LEHEDA NASE XHEMI’ËN WE LA JEZALUL-LEDHINE KEFERU TUSIBUHUM BIMA SENA’U KARI’ATUN ‘EW TEHULLU KARIBËN MIN DARIHIM HATTE JE’TIJE WE’DU LLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHLIFUL-MI’AD
13.32: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FE’EMLEJTU LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU THUMME ‘EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE ‘IKAB
13.33: ‘EFEMEN HUWE KA’IMUN ‘ALA KUL-LI NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI SHURAKA’E KUL SEMMUHUM ‘EM TUNEBBI’UNEHU BIMA LA JA’LEMU FIL-’ËRDI ‘EM BIDHAHIRIN MINEL-KAWLI BEL ZUJJINE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MEKRUHUM WE SUDDU ‘ANI SEBILI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
13.34: LEHUM ‘ADHABUN FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘ESHEKKU WE MA LEHUM MINELLAHI MIN WEKI
13.35: METHELUL-XHENNETI AL-LETI WU’IDAL-MUTTEKUNE TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU ‘UKULUHA DA’IMUN WE DHILLUHA TILKE ‘UKBEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW WE ‘UKBEL-KEFIRINE NAR
13.36: WEL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JEFRAHUNE BIMA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE WE MINEL-’EHZABI MEN JUNKIRU BE’DEHU KUL ‘INNAMA ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘A’BUDA-LLAHE WE LA ‘USHRIKE BIHI ‘ILEJHI ‘ED’U WE ‘ILEJHI ME’AB
13.37: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNAHU HUKMËN ‘ARABIJËN WE LE’INI ETTEBE’TE ‘EHWE’EHUM BE’DEMA XHA’EKE MINEL-’ILMI MA LEKE MINELLAHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA WEKI
13.38: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULËN MIN KABLIKE WE XHE’ALNA LEHUM ‘EZWEXHËN WE DHURRIJETEN WE MA KANE LIRASULIN ‘EN JE’TIJE BI’AJETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI LIKUL-LI ‘EXHELIN KITABU
13.39: JEMHU ALLAHU MA JESHA’U WE JUTHBITU WE ‘INDEHU ‘UMMUL-KITAB
13.40: WE ‘IN MA NURIJENNEKE BE’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’INNAMA ‘ALEJKAL-BELAGU WE ‘ALEJNAL-HISAB
13.41: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA NE’TIL-’ERDA NENKUSUHA MIN ‘ETRAFIHË WA-LLAHU JEHKUMU LA MU’AKKIBE LIHUKMIHI WE HUWE SERI’UL-HISAB
13.42: WE KAD MEKEREL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FELIL-LAHIL-MEKRU XHEMI’ËN JA’LEMU MA TEKSIBU KUL-LU NEFSIN WE SEJA’LEMUL-KUFFERU LIMEN ‘UKBE DAR
13.43: WE JAKULUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LESTE MURSELËN KUL KEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE MEN ‘INDEHU ‘ILMUL-KITAB

14.1: ‘ELIF-LAM-RA KITABUN ‘ENZELNAHU ‘ILEJKE LITUHRIXHE NASE MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NUR BI’IDHNI RABBIHIM ‘ILA SIRATIL-’AZIZIL-HEMID
14.2: ALLAHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE WEJLUN LILKEFIRINE MIN ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDI
14.3: EL-LEDHINE JESTEHIBBUNAL-HEJËTE DUN'JA ‘ALEL-’AHIRATI WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE JEBGUNEHA ‘IWEXHËN ‘ULË’IKE FI DALELIN BE’IDI
14.4: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA BILISANI KAWMIHI LIJUBEJJINE LEHUM FEJUDIL-LU ALLAHU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
14.5: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘EN ‘EHRIXH KAWMEKE MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE DHEKKIRHUM BI’EJJAMI LEHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBERIN SHEKURI
14.6: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH ‘ENXHAKUM MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JESUMUNEKUM SU’AL-’ADHABI WE JUDHEBBIHUNE ‘EBNA’EKUM WE JESTEHJUNE NISA’EKUM WE FI DHALIKUM BELA’UN MIN RABBIKUM ‘ADHIMU
14.7: WE ‘IDH TE’EDHDHENE RABBUKUM LE’IN SHEKERTUM LE’EZIDENNEKUM WE LE’IN KEFERTUM ‘INNE ‘ADHABI LESHEDIDU
14.8: WE KALE MUSA ‘IN TEKFURU ‘ENTUM WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN FE’INNALL-LLAHE LEGANIJUN HEMIDU
14.9: ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKUM KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WEL-LEDHINE MIN BE’DIHIM LA JA’LEMUHUM ‘IL-LALLAHU XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FERADDU ‘EJDIJEHUM FI ‘EFWEHIHIM WE KALU ‘INNA KEFERNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI WE ‘INNA LEFI SHEKKIN MIMMA TED’UNENA ‘ILEJHI MURIBI
14.10: KALET RUSULUHUM ‘EFI LEHI SHEKKUN FETIRI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JED’UKUM LIJEGFIRA LEKUM MIN DHUNUBIKUM WE JU’UEHHIRAKUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN KALU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA TURIDUNE ‘EN TESUDDUNA ‘AMMA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUNA FE’TUNA BISULTANIN MUBINI
14.11: KALET LEHUM RUSULUHUM ‘IN NAHNU ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JEMUNNU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE MA KANE LENA ‘EN NE’TIJEKUM BISULTANIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
14.12: WE MA LENA ‘ELLA NETEWEKKELE ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KAD HEDANA SUBULENA WE LENESBIRANNE ‘ALA MA ‘ADHEJTUMUNA WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MUTEWEKKILUN
14.13: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIRUSULIHIM LENUHRIXHENNEKUM MIN ‘ARDINA ‘EW LETA’UDUNNE FI MIL-LETINA FE’EWHA ‘ILEJHIM RABBUHUM LENUHLIKENNE EDH-DHALIMIN
14.14: WE LENUSKINENNEKUMUL-’ERDA MIN BE’DIHIM DHALIKE LIMEN HAFE MEKAMI WE HAFE WE’ID
14.15: WE ESTEFTEHU WE HABE KUL-LU XHEBBERIN ‘ANIDI
14.16: MIN WERA’IHI XHEHENNEMU WE JUSKA MIN MA’IN SEDIDI
14.17: JETEXHERRA’UHU WE LA JEKADU JUSIGUHU WE JE’TIHIL-MEWTU MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN WE MA HUWE BIMEJJITIN WE MIN WERA’IHI ‘ADHABUN GALIDHU
14.18: METHELUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM ‘A’MALUHUM KERAMADIN ESHTEDDET BIHI RIHU FI JEWMIN ‘ASIFIN LA JEKDIRUNE MIMMA KESEBU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN DHALIKE HUWE DALELUL-BE’ID
14.19: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JE’TI BIHALKIN XHEDIDI
14.21: WE BERAZU LIL-LAHI XHEMI’ËN FEKALE DU’AFE’U LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUNNA LEKUM TEBE’ËN FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUGNUNE ‘ANNA MIN ‘ADHABI LEHI MIN SHEJ’IN KALU LEW HEDANALLAHU LEHEDEJNAKUM SEWE’UN ‘ALEJNA ‘EXHEZI’NA ‘EM SEBERNA MA LENA MIN MEHISI
14.22: WE KALE SHEJTANU LEMMA KUDIJAL-’EMRU ‘INNALL-LLAHE WE’ADEKUM WE’DAL-HEKKI WE WE’ADTUKUM FE’EHLEFTUKUM WE MA KANE LI ‘ALEJKUM MIN SULTANIN ‘IL-LA ‘EN DE’AWTUKUM FESTEXHEBTUM LI FELA TELUMUNI WE LUMU ‘ENFUSEKUM MA ‘ENA BIMUSRIHIKUM WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMUSRIHIJE ‘INNI KEFERTU BIMA ‘ESHRAKTUMUNI MIN KABLU ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
14.23: WE ‘UDHILEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË BI’IDHNI RABBIHIM TEHIJETUHUM FIHË SALAMU
14.24: ‘ELEM TERA KEJFE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN KELIMETEN TEJJIBETEN KESHEXHERATIN TEJJIBETIN ‘ESLUHA THABITUN WE FER’UHA FI SEMA’
14.25: TU’UTI ‘UKULEHA KUL-LE HININ BI’IDHNI RABBIHA WE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHALE LILNNASI LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
14.26: WE METHELU KELIMETIN HABITHETIN KESHEXHERATIN HABITHETIN EXHTUTHTHET MIN FEWKIL-’ARDI MA LEHA MIN KARARI
14.27: JUTHEBBITU ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-KAWLI THABITI FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE FIL-’AHIRATI WE JUDIL-LU ALLAHU EDH-DHALIMINE WE JEF’ALU ALLAHU MA JESHA’
14.28: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE BEDDELU NI’METALLAHI KUFRAN WE ‘EHELLU KAWMEHUM DARAL-BEWER
14.30: WE XHE’ALU LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN LIJUDIL-LU ‘AN SEBILIHI KUL TEMETTA’U FE’INNE MESIRAKUM ‘ILA NAR
14.31: KUL LI’IBEDIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JUKIMU SELËTE WE JUNFIKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRAN WE ‘ALANIJETEN MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA BEJ’UN FIHI WE LA HILALU
14.32: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHE BIHI MINE THEMERATI RIZKËN LEKUM WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-FULKE LITEXHRIJE FIL-BEHRI BI’EMRIHI WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-’ENHAR
14.33: WE SEHHARA LEKUMU SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA DA’IBEJNI WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHA
14.34: WE ‘ATAKUM MIN KUL-LI MA SE’ELTUMUHU WE ‘IN TA’UDDU NI’METALLAHI LA TUHSUHA ‘INNAL-’INSANE LEDHELUMUN KEFFERU
14.35: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU RABBI EXH’AL HADHAL-BELEDE ‘AMINËN WE EXHNUBNI WE BENIJE ‘EN NA’BUDAL-’ESNAM
14.36: RABBI ‘INNEHUNNE ‘EDLELNE KETHIRAN MINE NASI FEMEN TEBI’ANI FE’INNEHU MINNI WE MEN ‘ASANI FE’INNEKE GAFURUN RAHIMU
14.37: RABBENA ‘INNI ‘ESKENTU MIN DHURRIJETI BIWEDIN GAJRI DHI ZER’IN ‘INDE BEJTIKAL-MUHERRAMI RABBENA LIJUKIMU SELËTE FEXH’AL ‘EF’IDETEN MINE NASI TEHWI ‘ILEJHIM WE ERZUKHUM MINE THEMERATI LE’AL-LEHUM JESHKURUN
14.38: RABBENA ‘INNEKE TA’LEMU MA NUHFI WE MA NU’LINU WE MA JEHFE ‘ALA ALLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FI SEMA’
14.39: EL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI WEHEBE LI ‘ALEL-KIBERI ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘ISHAKA ‘INNE RABBI LESEMI’U DU’A’
14.40: RABBI EXH’ALNI MUKIME SELËTI WE MIN DHURRIJETI RABBENA WE TEKABBEL DU’A’
14.41: RABBENA EGFIR LI WE LIWELIDEJJE WE LILMU’UMININE JEWME JEKUMUL-HISAB
14.42: WE LA TEHSEBENNA-LLAHE GAFILËN ‘AMMA JA’MELU EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘INNAMA JU’UEHHIRUHUM LIJEWMIN TESHHASU FIHIL-’EBSAR
14.43: MUHTI’INE MUKNI’I RU’USIHIM LA JERTEDDU ‘ILEJHIM TERFUHUM WE ‘EF’IDETUHUM HEWE’U
14.44: WE ‘ENDHIRI NASE JEWME JE’TIHIMUL-’ADHABU FEJAKULUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU RABBENA ‘EHHIRNA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN NUXHIB DA’WETEKE WE NETTEBI’I RUSULE ‘EWELEM TEKUNU ‘EKSEMTUM MIN KABLU MA LEKUM MIN ZEWELI
14.45: WE SEKENTUM FI MESAKINIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM WE TEBEJJENE LEKUM KEJFE FE’ALNA BIHIM WE DERABNA LEKUMUL-’EMTHAL
14.46: WE KAD MEKERU MEKRAHUM WE ‘IND-ALLAHI MEKRUHUM WE ‘IN KANE MEKRUHUM LITEZULE MINHUL-XHIBEL
14.47: FELA TEHSEBENNA-LLAHE MUHLIFE WE’DIHI RUSULEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN DHU ENTIKAMI
14.48: JEWME TUBEDDELUL-’ERDU GAJRAL-’ARDI WE SEMAWETU WE BERAZU LIL-LAHIL-WEHIDIL-KAHHAR
14.50: SERABILUHUM MIN KATIRANIN WE TEGSHA WUXHUHEHUMU NAR
14.51: LIJEXHZIJAL-LAHU KUL-LE NEFSIN MA KESEBET ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
14.52: HADHA BELAGUN LILNNASI WE LIJUNDHERU BIHI WE LIJA’LEMU ‘ENNEMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN WE LIJEDHDHEKKERA ‘ULUL-’ELBEB

15.2: RUBEMA JEWEDDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEW KENU MUSLIMIN
15.3: DHERHUM JE’KULU WE JETEMETTA’U WE JULHIHIMUL-’EMELU FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
15.4: WE MA ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA WE LEHA KITABUN MA’LUMU
15.5: MA TESBIKU MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELEHA WE MA JESTE’HIRUN
15.6: WE KALU JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHI NUZZILE ‘ALEJHI EDH-DHIKRU ‘INNEKE LEMEXHNUNU
15.7: LEW MA TE’TINA BIL-MELE’IKETI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
15.8: MA NUNEZZILUL-MELE’IKETE ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE MA KENU ‘IDHËN MUNDHERIN
15.9: ‘INNA NAHNU NEZZELNA EDH-DHIKRA WE ‘INNA LEHU LEHAFIDHUN
15.10: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE FI SHIJA’IL-’EWWELIN
15.11: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’UN
15.13: LA JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE KAD HALET SUNNETUL-’EWWELIN
15.14: WE LEW FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BEBËN MINE SEMA’I FEDHELLU FIHI JA’RUXHUN
15.15: LEKALU ‘INNAMA SUKKIRAT ‘EBSARUNA BEL NAHNU KAWMUN MESHURUN
15.16: WE LEKAD XHE’ALNA FI SEMA’I BURUXHËN WE ZEJJENNAHA LILNNADHIRIN
15.17: WE HEFIDHNAHA MIN KUL-LI SHEJTANIN RAXHIMI
15.18: ‘IL-LA MENI ESTERAKA SEM’A FE’ETBE’AHU SHIHABUN MUBINU
15.19: WEL-’ERDA MEDEDNAHA WE ‘ELKAJNA FIHË RAWESIJE WE ‘ENBETNA FIHË MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MEWZUNI
15.20: WE XHE’ALNA LEKUM FIHË MA’AJISHE WE MEN LESTUM LEHU BIRAZIKIN
15.21: WE ‘IN MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA ‘INDENA HAZA’INUHU WE MA NUNEZZILUHU ‘IL-LA BIKADERIN MA’LUMI
15.22: WE ‘ERSELNA RIJAHE LEWEKIHE FE’ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ESKAJNAKUMUHU WE MA ‘ENTUM LEHU BIHAZININ
15.23: WE ‘INNA LENAHNU NUHJI WE NUMITU WE NAHNUL-WERITHUN
15.26: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.27: WEL-XHANNE HALEKNAHU MIN KABLU MIN NARI SEMUM
15.28: WE ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELE’IKETI ‘INNI HALIKUN BESHERAN MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.29: FE’IDHA SEWWEJTUHU WE NEFEHTU FIHI MIN RUHI FEKA’U LEHU SAXHIDIN
15.32: KALE JA ‘IBLISU MA LEKE ‘ELLA TEKUNE ME’A SAXHIDIN
15.33: KALE LEM ‘EKUN LI’SXHUDE LIBESHERIN HALEKTEHU MIN SELSALIN MIN HEME’IIN MESNUNI
15.39: KALE RABBI BIMA ‘EGWEJTENI LE’UZEJJINENNE LEHUM FIL-’ËRDI WE LE’UGWIJENNEHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
15.42: ‘INNE ‘IBEDI LEJSE LEKE ‘ALEJHIM SULTANUN ‘IL-LA MENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-GAWIN
15.44: LEHA SEB’ATU ‘EBWEBIN LIKUL-LI BEBIN MINHUM XHUZ’UN MEKSUMU
15.47: WE NEZA’NA MA FI SUDURIHIM MIN GILLIN ‘IHWENËN ‘ALA SURURIN MUTEKABILIN
15.48: LA JEMESSUHUM FIHË NESEBUN WE MA HUM MINHA BIMUHRAXHIN
15.52: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALEJHI FEKALU SALAMËN KALE ‘INNA MINKUM WEXHILUN
15.55: KALU BESHSHERNAKE BIL-HAKKI FELA TEKUN MINEL-KANITIN
15.56: KALE WE MEN JEKNETU MIN RAHMETI RABBIHI ‘IL-LA DALLUN
15.63: KALU BEL XHI’NAKE BIMA KENU FIHI JEMTERUN
15.65: FE’ESRI BI’EHLIKE BIKIT’IN MINEL-LEJLI WE ETTEBI’ ‘EDBERAHUM WE LA JELTEFIT MINKUM ‘EHEDUN WE EMDU HEJTHU TU’UMERUN
15.66: WE KADEJNA ‘ILEJHI DHELIKEL-’EMRA ‘ENNE DABIRA HA’UULË’ MEKTU’UN MUSBIHIN
15.69: WE ETTEKU LLAHE WE LA TUHZUN
15.74: FEXHE’ALNA ‘ALIJEHA SAFILEHA WE ‘EMTERNA ‘ALEJHIM HIXHARATEN MIN SIXHXHILI
15.85: WE MA HALEKNA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE ‘INNE SA’ATE LE’ATIJETUN FESFEHI SEFHAL-XHEMIL
15.88: LA TEMUDDENNE ‘AJNEJKE ‘ILA MA METTA’NA BIHI ‘EZWEXHËN MINHUM WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE EHFID XHENAHEKE LILMU’UMININ
15.96: EL-LEDHINE JEXH’ALUNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
15.97: WE LEKAD NA’LEMU ‘ENNEKE JEDIKU SEDRUKE BIMA JAKULUN
15.98: FESEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE WE KUN MINE SAXHIDIN

16.1: ‘ETA ‘EMRU LLAHI FELA TESTA’XHILUHU SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
16.2: JUNEZZILUL-MELE’IKETE BIR-RUHI MIN ‘EMRIHI ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI ‘EN ‘ENDHIRU ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENA FE ETTEKUN
16.3: HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
16.4: HALEKAL-’INSANE MIN NUTFETIN FE’IDHA HUWE HASIMUN MUBINU
16.5: WEL-’EN’AME HALEKAHA LEKUM FIHË DIF’UN WE MENAFI’U WE MINHA TE’KULUN
16.6: WE LEKUM FIHË XHEMALUN HINE TURIHUNE WE HINE TESRAHUN
16.7: WE TEHMILU ‘ETHKALEKUM ‘ILA BELEDIN LEM TEKUNU BELIGIHI ‘IL-LA BISHIKKIL-’ENFUSI ‘INNE RABBEKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
16.8: WEL-HAJLE WEL-BIGALE WEL-HEMIRA LITERKEBUHA WE ZINETEN WE JEHLUKU MA LA TA’LEMUN
16.9: WE ‘ALA ALLAHI KASDU SEBILI WE MINHA XHA’IRUN WE LEW SHA’E LEHEDAKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
16.10: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN LEKUM MINHU SHERABUN WE MINHU SHEXHERUN FIHI TUSIMUN
16.11: JUNBITU LEKUM BIHI EZ-ZER’A WE EZ-ZEJTUNE WE NEHILE WEL-’A’NABE WE MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
16.12: WE SEHHARA LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA WE SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA WE NUXHUMU MUSEHHARATUN BI’EMRIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
16.13: WE MA DHERA’E LEKUM FIL-’ËRDI MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWENUHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JEDHDHEKKERUN
16.14: WE HUWEL-LEDHI SEHHARAL-BEHRA LITE’KULU MINHU LEHMËN TERIJËN WE TESTEHRIXHU MINHU HILJETEN TELBESUNEHA WE TERAL-FULKE MEWEHIRA FIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
16.15: WE ‘ELKA FIL-’ËRDI RAWESIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIKUM WE ‘ENHARAN WE SUBULËN LLE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
16.18: WE ‘IN TA’UDDU NI’METALLAHI LA TUHSUHA ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.19: WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA TUSIRRUNE WE MA TU’LINUN
16.20: WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI LA JEHLUKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUN
16.22: ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN FE-EL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI KULUBUHUM MUNKIRATUN WE HUM MUSTEKBIRUN
16.23: LA XHERAME ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUNE ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-MUSTEKBIRIN
16.24: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM MADHA ‘ENZELE RABBUKUM KALU ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
16.25: LIJEHMILU ‘EWZARAHUM KAMILETEN JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE MIN ‘EWZARIL-LEDHINE JUDIL-LUNEHUM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN ‘ALA SA’E MA JEZIRUN
16.26: KAD MEKEREL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FE’ETALLAHU BUNJANEHUM MINEL-KAWE’IDI FEHARRA ‘ALEJHIMU SEKFU MIN FEWKIHIM WE ‘ETAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
16.27: THUMME JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JUHZIHIM WE JAKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TUSHAKKUNE FIHIM KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME ‘INNAL-HIZJAL-JEWME WE SU’E ‘ALEL-KEFIRIN
16.28: EL-LEDHINE TETEWEFFEHUMUL-MELE’IKETU DHALIMI ‘ENFUSIHIM FE’ELKAW SELEME MA KUNNA NA’MELU MIN SU’IN BELA ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.29: FEDHULU ‘EBWEBE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË FELEBI’SE METHWEL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
16.30: WE KILA LIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW MADHA ‘ENZELE RABBUKUM KALU HAJRAN LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU FI HEDHIHI DUN'JA HESENETUN WE LEDARUL-’AHIRATI HAJRUN WE LENI’ME DARUL-MUTTEKIN
16.31: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU LEHUM FIHË MA JESHA’UNE KEDHALIKE JEXHZI ALLAHUL-MUTTEKIN
16.32: EL-LEDHINE TETEWEFFEHUMUL-MELE’IKETU TEJJIBINE JAKULUNE SALAMUN ‘ALEJKUMU EDHULUL-XHENNETE BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.33: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUMUL-MELE’IKETU ‘EW JE’TIJE ‘EMRU RABBIKE KEDHALIKE FE’ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE MA DHELEMEHUMU LLAHU WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
16.34: FE’ESABEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA ‘AMILU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
16.35: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU LEW SHA’-ALLAHU MA ‘ABEDNA MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN NAHNU WE LA ‘ABE’UUNA WE LA HERRAMNA MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN KEDHALIKE FE’ALEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEHEL ‘ALA RUSULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
16.36: WE LEKAD BE’ATHNA FI KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN RASULËN ‘ENI EU’BUDU LLAHE WE EXHTENIBUT-TAGUTE FEMINHUM MEN HEDALLAHU WE MINHUM MEN HAKKAT ‘ALEJHI DALELETU FESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUKEDHDHIBIN
16.37: ‘IN TEHRIS ‘ALA HUDAHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN JUDIL-LU WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
16.38: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LA JEB’ATHU ALLAHU MEN JEMUTU BELA WE’DËN ‘ALEJHI HEKKËN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
16.39: LIJUBEJJINE LEHUMUL-LEDHI JEHTELIFUNE FIHI WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEHUM KENU KADHIBIN
16.40: ‘INNAMA KAWLUNA LISHEJ’IN ‘IDHA ‘ERADNAHU ‘EN NEKULE LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
16.41: WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU FI LEHI MIN BE’DI MA DHULIMU LENUBEWWI’ENNEHUM FI DUN'JA HESENETEN WE LE’EXHRUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
16.43: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE ‘IL-LA RIXHALËN NUHI ‘ILEJHIM FES’ELU ‘EHLE EDH-DHIKRI ‘IN KUNTUM LA TA’LEMUN
16.44: BIL-BEJJINETI WE EZ-ZUBURI WE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKE EDH-DHIKRA LITUBEJJINE LILNNASI MA NUZZILE ‘ILEJHIM WE LE’AL-LEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
16.45: ‘EFE’EMINEL-LEDHINE MEKERU SEJJI’ATI ‘EN JEHSIFEL-LAHU BIHIMUL-’ERDA ‘EW JE’TIJEHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
16.46: ‘EW JE’HUDHEHUM FI TEKALLUBIHIM FEMA HUM BIMU’XHIZIN
16.47: ‘EW JE’HUDHEHUM ‘ALA TEHAWWUFIN FE’INNE RABBEKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
16.48: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILA MA HALEKEL-LEHU MIN SHEJ’IN JETEFEJJE’U DHILALUHU ‘ANIL-JEMINI WE SHEMA’ILI SUXHXHEDËN LIL-LAHI WE HUM DAHIRUN
16.49: WE LIL-LEHI JESXHUDU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI MIN DABBETIN WEL-MELE’IKETU WE HUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
16.50: JEHAFUNE RABBEHUM MIN FEWKIHIM WE JEF’ALUNE MA JU’UMERUN
16.51: WE KALEL-LAHU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ILEHEJNI ETHNEJNI ‘INNAMA HUWE ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN FE’IJAJE FERHEBUN
16.52: WE LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LEHU DINU WE ESIBËN ‘EFEGAJRALLAHI TETTEKUN
16.53: WE MA BIKUM MIN NI’METIN FEMINELLAHI THUMME ‘IDHA MESSEKUMU DURRU FE’ILEJHI TEXH’ERUN
16.54: THUMME ‘IDHA KESHEFE DURRA ‘ANKUM ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINKUM BIRABBIHIM JUSHRIKUN
16.56: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIMA LA JA’LEMUNE NESIBËN MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM TE-ALLAHI LETUS’ELUNNE ‘AMMA KUNTUM TEFTERUN
16.57: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIL-LAHIL-BENATI SUBHANEHU WE LEHUM MA JESHTEHUN
16.58: WE ‘IDHA BUSHSHIRA ‘EHEDUHUM BIL-’UNTHA DHELLE WEXHHUHU MUSWEDDËN WE HUWE KEDHIMU
16.59: JETEWERA MINEL-KAWMI MIN SU’I MA BUSHSHIRA BIHI ‘EJUMSIKUHU ‘ALA HUNIN ‘EM JEDUSSUHU FIT-TURABI ‘ALA SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
16.60: LIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI METHELU SEW’I WE LIL-LEHIL-METHELUL-’A’LA WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
16.61: WE LEW JU’UAHIDHU ALLAHU NASE BIDHULMIHIM MA TERAKE ‘ALEJHA MIN DABBETIN WE LAKIN JU’UEHHIRUHUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FE’IDHË XHË’E ‘EXHELUHUM LA JESTE’HIRUNE SA’ATEN WE LA JESTEKDIMUN
16.62: WE JEXH’ALUNE LIL-LAHI MA JEKRAHUNE WE TESIFU ‘ELSINETUHUMUL-KEDHIBE ‘ENNE LEHUMUL-HUSNA LA XHERAME ‘ENNE LEHUMU NARA WE ‘ENNEHUM MUFRATUN
16.63: TE-ALLAHI LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA ‘UMEMIN MIN KABLIKE FEZEJJENE LEHUMU SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FEHUWE WELIJUHUMUL-JEWME WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
16.64: WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE ‘IL-LA LITUBEJJINE LEHUMUL-LEDHI EHTELEFU FIHI WE HUDAN WE RAHMETEN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
16.65: WA-LLAHU ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
16.66: WE ‘INNE LEKUM FIL-’EN’AM LA’IBRATEN NUSKIKUM MIMMA FI BUTUNIHI MIN BEJNI FERTHIN WE DEMIN LEBENËN HALISËN SA’IGËN LILSHSHARIBIN
16.67: WE MIN THEMERATI NEHILI WEL-’A’NABI TETTEHIDHUNE MINHU SEKERAN WE RIZKËN HESENËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
16.68: WE ‘EWHA RABBUKE ‘ILA NEHLI ‘ENI ETTEHIDHI MINEL-XHIBELI BUJUTËN WE MINE SHEXHERI WE MIMMA JA’RISHUN
16.69: THUMME KULI MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI FESLUKI SUBULE RABBIKI DHULULËN JEHRUXHU MIN BUTUNIHA SHERABUN MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWENUHU FIHI SHIFE’UN LILNNASI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
16.70: WA-LLAHU HALEKAKUM THUMME JETEWEFFEKUM WE MINKUM MEN JURADDU ‘ILA ‘ERDHELIL-’UMURI LIKEJ LA JA’LEME BE’DE ‘ILMIN SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN KADIRU
16.71: WA-LLAHU FEDDELE BE’DEKUM ‘ALA BE’DIN FI RIZKI FEMEL-LEDHINE FUDDILU BIRADDI RIZKIHIM ‘ALA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUM FEHUM FIHI SEWE’UN ‘EFEBINI’METI LEHI JEXHHEDUN
16.72: WA-LLAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWEXHËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘EZWEXHIKUM BENINE WE HEFEDETEN WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBETI ‘EFEBIALBETILI JU’UMINUNE WE BINI’METI LEHI HUM JEKFURUN
16.73: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JEMLIKU LEHUM RIZKËN MINE SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JESTETI’UN
16.74: FELA TEDRIBU LIL-LAHIL-’EMTHALE ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
16.75: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN ‘ABDËN MEMLUKËN LA JEKDIRU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE MEN RAZEKNAHU MINNA RIZKËN HESENËN FEHUWE JUNFIKU MINHU SIRRAN WE XHEHRAN HEL JESTEWUNEL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
16.76: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN RAXHULEJNI ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘EBKEMU LA JEKDIRU ‘ALA SHEJ’IN WE HUWE KELLUN ‘ALA MEWLAHU ‘EJNEMA JUWEXHXHHHHU LA JE’TI BIHAJRIN HEL JESTEWI HUWE WE MEN JE’MURU BIL-’ADLI WE HUWE ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
16.77: WE LIL-LEHI GAJBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA ‘EMRU SA’ATI ‘IL-LA KELEMHIL-BESERI ‘EW HUWE ‘EKRABU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
16.78: WA-LLAHU ‘EHRAXHEKUM MIN BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM LA TA’LEMUNE SHEJ’ËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
16.79: ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ILAT-TAJRI MUSEHHARATIN FI XHEWWI SEMA’I MA JUMSIKUHUNNE ‘IL-LALLAHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
16.80: WA-LLAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN BUJUTIKUM SEKENËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN XHULUDIL-’EN’AMI BUJUTËN TESTEHIFFUNEHA JEWME DHA’NIKUM WE JEWME ‘IKAMETIKUM WE MIN ‘ESWEFIHË WE ‘EWBERIHA WE ‘ESH’ARIHA ‘ETHATHËN WE META’ËN ‘ILA HINI
16.81: WA-LLAHU XHE’ALE LEKUM MIMMA HALEKA DHILALËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MINEL-XHIBELI ‘EKNANËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM SERABILE TEKIKUMUL-HERRA WE SERABILE TEKIKUM BE’SEKUM KEDHALIKE JUTIMMU NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TUSLIMUN
16.84: WE JEWME NEB’ATHU MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN THUMME LA JU’UDHENU LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
16.85: WE ‘IDHA RA’EL-LEDHINE DHELEMUL-’ADHABE FELA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUM WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
16.86: WE ‘IDHA RA’EL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU SHURAKA’EHUM KALU RABBENA HA’UULË’ SHURAKA’UUNEL-LEDHINE KUNNA NED’U MIN DUNIKE FE’ELKAW ‘ILEJHIMUL-KAWLE ‘INNEKUM LEKADHIBUN
16.87: WE ‘ELKAW ‘ILA LLAHI JEWME’IDHIN SELEME WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
16.88: EL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI ZIDNAHUM ‘ADHABËN FEWKAL-’ADHABI BIMA KENU JUFSIDUN
16.89: WE JEWME NEB’ATHU FI KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN ‘ALEJHIM MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE XHI’NA BIKE SHEHIDËN ‘ALA HA’UULË’ WE NEZZELNA ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE TIBJANËN LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUDAN WE RAHMETEN WE BUSHRA LILMUSLIMIN
16.90: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JE’MURU BIL-’ADLI WEL-’IHSANI WE ‘ITA’I DHIL-KURBE WE JENHA ‘ANIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WEL-BEGJI JA’IDHUKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
16.91: WE ‘EWFU BI’AHDI LEHI ‘IDHA ‘AHEDTUM WE LA TENKUDUL-’EJMANE BE’DE TEWKIDIHA WE KAD XHE’ALTUMU LLAHE ‘ALEJKUM KEFILËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA TEF’ALUN
16.92: WE LA TEKUNU KAL-LETI NEKADET GAZLEHA MIN BE’DI KUWETIN ‘ENKATHËN TETTEHIDHUNE ‘EJMANEKUM DEHALËN BEJNEKUM ‘EN TEKUNE ‘UMMETUN HIJE ‘ERBE MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘INNAMA JEBLUKUMU LLAHU BIHI WE LEJUBEJJINENNE LEKUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI MA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN
16.93: WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LEXHE’ALEKUM ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN WE LAKIN JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE LETUS’ELUNNE ‘AMMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
16.94: WE LA TETTEHIDHU ‘EJMANEKUM DEHALËN BEJNEKUM FETEZIL-LE KADEMUN BE’DE THUBUTIHA WE TEDHUKU SU’E BIMA SEDEDTUM ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE LEKUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
16.95: WE LA TESHTERU BI’AHDI LEHI THEMENËN KALILËN ‘INNAMA ‘IND-ALLAHI HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
16.96: MA ‘INDEKUM JENFEDU WE MA ‘IND-ALLAHI BEKIN WE LENEXHZIJENNEL-LEDHINE SEBERU ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENI MA KENU JA’MELUN
16.97: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FELENUHJIJENNEHU HEJËTEN TEJJIBETEN WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENI MA KENU JA’MELUN
16.98: FE’IDHA KARA’TAL-KUR’ANE FESTA’IDH BIL-LAHI MINE SHEJTANI RAXHIM
16.99: ‘INNEHU LEJSE LEHU SULTANUN ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
16.100: ‘INNAMA SULTANUHU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JETEWEL-LEWNEHU WEL-LEDHINE HUM BIHI MUSHRIKUN
16.101: WE ‘IDHA BEDDELNA ‘AJETEN MEKANE ‘AJETIN WA-LLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JUNEZZILU KALU ‘INNAMA ‘ENTE MUFTERIN BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
16.102: KUL NEZZELEHU RUHUL-KUDUSI MIN RABBIKE BIL-HAKKI LIJUTHEBBITEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE HUDAN WE BUSHRA LILMUSLIMIN
16.103: WE LEKAD NA’LEMU ‘ENNEHUM JAKULUNE ‘INNAMA JU’ALLIMUHU BESHERUN LISANUL-LEDHI JULHIDUNE ‘ILEJHI ‘A’XHEMIJUN WE HEDHA LISANUN ‘ARABIJUN MUBINU
16.104: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATI LEHI LA JEHDIHIMU LLAHU WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
16.105: ‘INNAMA JEFTERIL-KEDHIBEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-KADHIBUN
16.106: MEN KEFERA BIL-LAHI MIN BE’DI ‘IMANIHI ‘IL-LA MEN ‘UKRIHE WE KALBUHU MUTME’INNUN BIL-’IMANI WE LAKIN MEN SHERAHE BIL-KUFRI SEDRAN FE’ALEJHIM GADEBUN MINELLAHI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
16.107: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUMU ESTEHEBBUL-HEJËTE DUN'JA ‘ALEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-KEFIRIN
16.108: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE SEM’IHIM WE ‘EB'SARIHIM WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-GAFILUN
16.110: THUMME ‘INNE RABBEKE LIL-LEDHINE HAXHERU MIN BE’DI MA FUTINU THUMME XHAHEDU WE SEBERU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BE’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.111: JEWME TE’TI KUL-LU NEFSIN TUXHADILU ‘AN NEFSIHA WE TUWEFFE KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
16.112: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN KARJETEN KANET ‘AMINETEN MUTME’INNETEN JE’TIHA RIZKUHA RAGADËN MIN KUL-LI MEKANIN FEKEFERAT BI’EN’UMI LEHI FE’EDHAKAHALLAHU LIBESAL-XHU’I WEL-HAWFI BIMA KENU JESNA’UN
16.113: WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM RASULUN MINHUM FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHEHUMUL-’ADHABU WE HUM DHALIMUN
16.114: FEKULU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU LLAHU HALELËN TEJJIBËN WE ESHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
16.115: ‘INNAMA HERRAME ‘ALEJKUMUL-MEJTETE WE DEME WE LEHMAL-HINZIRI WE MA ‘UHIL-LE LIGAJRI LEHI BIHI FEMENI EDTURRA GAJRA BEGIN WE LA ‘ADIN FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
16.116: WE LA TEKULU LIMA TESIFU ‘ELSINETUKUMUL-KEDHIBE HADHA HALELUN WE HEDHA HERAMUN LITEFTERU ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEFTERUNE ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE LA JUFLIHUN
16.118: WE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE HADU HERRAMNA MA KASESNA ‘ALEJKE MIN KABLU WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
16.119: THUMME ‘INNE RABBEKE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SU’E BIXHEHALETIN THUMME TABU MIN BE’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU ‘INNE RABBEKE MIN BE’DIHA LEGAFURUN RAHIMU
16.120: ‘INNE ‘IBRAHIME KANE ‘UMMETEN KANITËN LIL-LAHI HENIFËN WE LEM JEKU MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
16.121: SHAKIRAN LI’N’UMIHI EXHTEBEHU WE HEDAHU ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKI
16.122: WE ‘ATEJNAHU FI DUN'JA HESENETEN WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHIN
16.123: THUMME ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE ‘ENI ETTEBI’ MIL-LETE ‘IBRAHIME HENIFËN WE MA KANE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
16.124: ‘INNAMA XHU’ILE SEBTU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE EHTELEFU FIHI WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEJEHKUMU BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
16.125: ED’U ‘ILA SEBILI RABBIKE BIL-HIKMETI WEL-MEW’IDHETIL-HESENETI WE XHADILHUM BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DAL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTADIN
16.126: WE ‘IN ‘AKABTUM FE’AKIBU BIMITHLI MA ‘UKIBTUM BIHI WE LE’IN SEBERTUM LEHUWE HAJRUN LILSSABIRIN
16.127: WE ESBIR WE MA SEBRUKE ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA TEKU FI DEJKIN MIMMA JEMKURUN

17.1: SUBHANEL-LEDHI ‘ESRA BI’ABDIHI LEJLËN MINEL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI ‘ILAL-MESXHIDIL-’EKSEL-LEDHI BERAKNA HAWLAHU LINURIJEHU MIN ‘AJATINA ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
17.2: WE ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE XHE’ALNAHU HUDAN LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ELLA TETTEHIDHU MIN DUNI WE KILË
17.3: DHURRIJETE MEN HEMELNA ME’A NUHIN ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ABDËN SHEKURA
17.4: WE KADEJNA ‘ILA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE FIL-KITABI LETUFSIDUNNE FIL-’ËRDI MERRATEJNI WE LETA’LUNNE ‘ULUWËN KEBIRA
17.5: FE’IDHË XHË’E WE’DU ‘ULËHUMA BE’ATHNA ‘ALEJKUM ‘IBEDËN LENA ‘ULI BE’SIN SHEDIDIN FEXHASU HILALE DIJARI WE KANE WE’DËN MEF’ULË
17.6: THUMME RADEDNA LEKUMUL-KERRATE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘EMDEDNAKUM BI’EMWELIN WE BENINE WE XHE’ALNAKUM ‘EKTHERA NEFIRA
17.7: ‘IN ‘EHSENTUM ‘EHSENTUM LI’NFUSIKUM WE ‘IN ‘ESE’TUM FELEHA FE’IDHË XHË’E WE’DUL-’AHIRATI LIJESU’U WUXHUHEKUM WE LIJEDHULUL-MESXHIDE KAMA DEHALUHU ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE LIJUTEBBIRU MA ‘ALEW TETBIRA
17.8: ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JERHEMEKUM WE ‘IN ‘UDTUM ‘UDNA WE XHE’ALNA XHEHENNEME LILKEFIRINE HESIRA
17.9: ‘INNE HADHAL-KUR’ANE JEHDI LIL-LETI HIJE ‘EKWEMU WE JUBESHSHIRUL-MU’UMININEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM ‘EXHRAN KEBIRA
17.11: WE JED’UL-’INSANU BISH-SHERRI DU’A’EHU BIL-HAJRI WE KANAL-’INSANU ‘AXHULË
17.12: WE XHE’ALNAL-LEJLE WE NEHARA ‘AJETEJNI FEMEHEWNA ‘AJETAL-LEJLI WE XHE’ALNA ‘AJETE NEHARI MUBSIRATEN LITEBTEGU FEDLËN MIN RABBIKUM WE LITA’LEMU ‘ADEDE SININE WEL-HISABE WE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FESSELNAHU TEFSILË
17.13: WE KUL-LE ‘INSANIN ‘ELZEMNAHU TA’IRAHU FI ‘UNUKIHI WE NUHRIXHU LEHU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI KITABËN JELKAHU MENSHURA
17.15: MENI EHTEDA FE’INNAMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DAL-LE FE’INNAMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE LA TEZIRU WEZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA WE MA KUNNA MU’ADHDHIBINE HATTE NEB’ATHE RASULË
17.16: WE ‘IDHA ‘ERADNA ‘EN NUHLIKE KARJETEN ‘EMERNA MUTRAFIHË FEFESEKU FIHË FEHAKKA ‘ALEJHAL-KAWLU FEDEMMERNAHA TEDMIRA
17.17: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA MINEL-KURUNI MIN BE’DI NUHIN WE KEFE BIRABBIKE BIDHUNUBI ‘IBEDIHI HABIRAN BESIRA
17.18: MEN KANE JURIDUL-’AXHILETE ‘AXHXHELNA LEHU FIHË MA NESHA’U LIMEN NURIDU THUMME XHE’ALNA LEHU XHEHENNEME JESLAHA MEDHMUMËN MEDHURA
17.19: WE MEN ‘ERADAL-’AHIRATE WE SA’A LEHA SA’JEHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULË’IKE KANE SA’JUHUM MESHKURA
17.20: KULLËN NUMIDDU HA’UULË’ WE HA’UULË’ MIN ‘ATA’I RABBIKE WE MA KANE ‘ATA’U RABBIKE MEHDHURA
17.21: ENDHUR KEJFE FEDDELNA BE’DEHUM ‘ALA BE’DIN WE LEL’AHIRATU ‘EKBERU DERAXHATIN WE ‘EKBERU TEFDILË
17.22: LA TEXH’AL ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETEK’UDE MEDHMUMËN MEHDHULË
17.23: WE KADA RABBUKE ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU WE BIL-WELIDEJNI ‘IHSANËN ‘IMMA JEBLUGANNE ‘INDEKAL-KIBERA ‘EHEDUHUMA ‘EW KILAHUMA FELA TEKUL LEHUMA ‘UFFIN WE LA TENHERHUMA WE KUL LEHUMA KAWLËN KERIMË
17.24: WE EHFID LEHUMA XHENAHE EDH-DHULLI MINE RAHMETI WE KUL RRABBI ERHEMHUMA KAMA RABBEJANI SEGIRA
17.25: RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMA FI NUFUSIKUM ‘IN TEKUNU SALIHINE FE’INNEHU KANE LIL’EWWEBINE GAFURA
17.26: WE ‘ATI DHAL-KURBE HAKKAHU WEL-MISKINE WE EBNE SEBILI WE LA TUBEDHDHIR TEBDHIRA
17.27: ‘INNAL-MUBEDHDHIRINE KENU ‘IHWENE SHEJATINI WE KANE SHEJTANU LIRABBIHI KEFURA
17.28: WE ‘IMMA TU’RIDENNE ‘ANHUMU EBTIGA’E RAHMETIN MIN RABBIKE TERXHUHA FEKUL LEHUM KAWLËN MEJSURA
17.29: WE LA TEXH’AL JEDEKE MEGLULETEN ‘ILA ‘UNUKIKE WE LA TEBSUTHA KUL-LAL-BESTI FETEK’UDE MELUMËN MEHSURA
17.30: ‘INNE RABBEKE JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNEHU KANE BI’IBEDIHI HABIRAN BESIRA
17.31: WE LA TEKTULU ‘EWLADEKUM HASHJETE ‘IMLAKIN NAHNU NERZUKUHUM WE ‘IJJAKUM ‘INNE KATLEHUM KANE HIT’ËN KEBIRA
17.32: WE LA TEKRABU EZ-ZINA ‘INNEHU KANE FEHISHETEN WE SA’E SEBILË
17.33: WE LA TEKTULU NEFSAL-LETI HERRAMAL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE MEN KUTILE MEDHLUMËN FEKAD XHE’ALNA LIWELIJIHI SULTANËN FELA JUSRIF FIL-KATLI ‘INNEHU KANE MENSURA
17.34: WE LA TEKRABU MELEL-JETIMI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU HATTE JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ‘EWFU BIL-’AHDI ‘INNAL-’AHDE KANE MES’ULË
17.35: WE ‘EWFUL-KEJLE ‘IDHA KILTUM WE ZINU BIL-KISTASIL-MUSTEKIMI DHALIKE HAJRUN WE ‘EHSENU TE’WILË
17.36: WE LA TEKFU MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN ‘INNE SEM’A WEL-BESARA WEL-FU’UADE KUL-LU ‘ULË’IKE KANE ‘ANHU MES’ULË
17.37: WE LA TEMSHI FIL-’ËRDI MERAHËN ‘INNEKE LEN TEHRIKAL-’ERDA WE LEN TEBLUGAL-XHIBELE TULË
17.38: KUL-LU DHALIKE KANE SEJJI’UHU ‘INDE RABBIKE MEKRUHË
17.39: DHALIKE MIMMA ‘EWHA ‘ILEJKE RABBUKE MINEL-HIKMETI WE LA TEXH’AL ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETULKA FI XHEHENNEME MELUMËN MEDHURA
17.40: ‘EFE’ESFEKUM RABBUKUM BIL-BENINE WE ETTEHADHE MINEL-MELE’IKETI ‘INATHËN ‘INNEKUM LETEKULUNE KAWLËN ‘ADHIMË
17.41: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LIJEDHDHEKKERU WE MA JEZIDUHUM ‘IL-LA NUFURA
17.42: KUL LEW KANE ME’AHU ‘ALIHETUN KAMA JAKULUNE ‘IDHËN LABTEGAW ‘ILA DHIL-’ARSHI SEBILË
17.44: TUSEBBIHU LEHU SEMAWETU SEB’U WEL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHINNE WE ‘IN MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IL-LA JUSEBBIHU BIHEMDIHI WE LAKIN LA TEFKAHUNE TESBIHEHUM ‘INNEHU KANE HELIMËN GAFURA
17.45: WE ‘IDHA KARA’TAL-KUR’ANE XHE’ALNA BEJNEKE WE BEJNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI HIXHABËN MESTURA
17.46: WE XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRAN WE ‘IDHA DHEKERTE RABBEKE FIL-KUR’ANI WEHDEHU WE LLEW ‘ALA ‘EDBERIHIM NUFURA
17.47: NAHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JESTEMI’UNE BIHI ‘IDH JESTEMI’UNE ‘ILEJKE WE ‘IDH HUM NEXHWE ‘IDH JAKULU EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA RAXHULËN MESHURA
17.48: ENDHUR KEJFE DERABU LEKAL-’EMTHALE FEDELLU FELA JESTETI’UNE SEBILË
17.49: WE KALU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA ‘IDHAMËN WE RUFETËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUNE HALKËN XHEDIDË
17.51: ‘EW HALKËN MIMMA JEKBURU FI SUDURIKUM FESEJAKULUNE MEN JU’IDUNA KULIL-LEDHI FETERAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN FESEJUNGIDUNE ‘ILEJKE RU’USEHUM WE JAKULUNE META HUWE KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE KARIBË
17.52: JEWME JED’UKUM FETESTEXHIBUNE BIHEMDIHI WE TEDHUNNUNE ‘IN LEBITHTUM ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.53: WE KUL LI’IBEDI JAKULU AL-LETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘INNE SHEJTANE JENZEGU BEJNEHUM ‘INNE SHEJTANE KANE LIL’INSANI ‘ADUWËN MUBINË
17.54: RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIKUM ‘IN JESHE’ JERHEMKUM ‘EW ‘IN JESHE’ JU’ADHDHIBKUM WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM WE KILË
17.55: WE RABBUKE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LEKAD FEDDELNA BE’DE NEBIJINE ‘ALA BE’DIN WE ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE ZEBURA
17.56: KULI ED’UL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM MIN DUNIHI FELA JEMLIKUNE KESHFE DURRI ‘ANKUM WE LA TEHWILË
17.57: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE JEBTEGUNE ‘ILA RABBIHIMUL-WESILETE ‘EJJUHUM ‘EKRABU WE JERXHUNE RAHMETEHU WE JEHAFUNE ‘ADHABEHU ‘INNE ‘ADHABE RABBIKE KANE MEHDHURA
17.58: WE ‘IN MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA NAHNU MUHLIKUHA KABLE JEWMIL-KIJAMETI ‘EW MU’ADHDHIBUHA ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN KANE DHALIKE FIL-KITABI MESTURA
17.59: WE MA MENE’ANA ‘EN NURSILE BIL-’AJATI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KEDHDHEBE BIHAL-’EWWELUNE WE ‘ATEJNA THEMUDE NAKATE MUBSIRATEN FEDHELEMU BIHA WE MA NURSILU BIL-’AJATI ‘IL-LA TEHWIFË
17.60: WE ‘IDH KULNA LEKE ‘INNE RABBEKE ‘EHATE BIN-NASI WE MA XHE’ALNA RU’UJA AL-LETI ‘ERAJNAKE ‘IL-LA FITNETEN LILNNASI WE SHEXHERATAL-MEL’UNETE FIL-KUR’ANI WE NUHAWWIFUHUM FEMA JEZIDUHUM ‘IL-LA TUGJANËN KEBIRA
17.61: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELE’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE KALE ‘E’ESXHUDU LIMEN HALEKTE TINË
17.62: KALE ‘ERA’EJTEKE HADHEL-LEDHI KERRAMTE ‘ALEJJE LE’IN ‘EHHARTENI ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LE’EHTENIKENNE DHURRIJETEHU ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.63: KALE EDH/HEB FEMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM FE’INNE XHEHENNEME XHEZA’UUKUM XHEZA’EN MEWFURA
17.64: WE ESTEFZIZ MENI ESTETA’TE MINHUM BISEWTIKE WE ‘EXHLIB ‘ALEJHIM BIHAJLIKE WE RAXHILIKE WE SHARIK/HUM FIL-’EMWLI WEL-’EWLADI WE ‘ID/HUM WE MA JA’IDUHUMU SHEJTANU ‘IL-LA GURURA
17.65: ‘INNE ‘IBEDI LEJSE LEKE ‘ALEJHIM SULTANUN WE KEFE BIRABBIKE WE KILË
17.66: RABBUKUMUL-LEDHI JUZXHI LEKUMUL-FULKE FIL-BEHRI LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU KANE BIKUM RAHIMË
17.67: WE ‘IDHA MESSEKUMU DURRU FIL-BEHRI DAL-LE MEN TED’UNE ‘IL-LA ‘IJAHU FELAMMA NEXHXHAKUM ‘ILAL-BERRI ‘A’RADTUM WE KANAL-’INSANU KEFURA
17.68: ‘EFE’EMINTUM ‘EN JEHSIFE BIKUM XHANIBEL-BERRI ‘EW JURSILE ‘ALEJKUM HASIBËN THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKUM WE KILË
17.69: ‘EM ‘EMINTUM ‘EN JU’IDEKUM FIHI TARATEN ‘UHRA FEJURSILE ‘ALEJKUM KASIFËN MINE RIHI FEJUGRIKAKUM BIMA KEFERTUM THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKUM ‘ALEJNA BIHI TEBI’Ë
17.70: WE LEKAD KERRAMNA BENI ‘ADEME WE HEMELNAHUM FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBETI WE FEDDELNAHUM ‘ALA KETHIRIN MIMMEN HALEKNA TEFDILË
17.71: JEWME NED’U KUL-LE ‘UNASIN BI’IMAMIHIM FEMEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BIJEMINIHI FE’ULË’IKE JEKRA’UNE KITABEHUM WE LA JUDHLEMUNE FETILË
17.72: WE MEN KANE FI HEDHIHI ‘A’MA FEHUWE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘A’MA WE ‘EDELLU SEBILË
17.73: WE ‘IN KADU LEJEFTINUNEKE ‘ANIL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE LITEFTERIJE ‘ALEJNA GAJRAHU WE ‘IDHËN LATTEHADHUKE HALILË
17.74: WE LEWLA ‘EN THEBBETNAKE LEKAD KIDTTE TERKENU ‘ILEJHIM SHEJ’ËN KALILË
17.75: ‘IDHËN LE’EDHEKNAKE DI’FEL-HEJËTI WE DI’FEL-MEMATI THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKE ‘ALEJNA NESIRA
17.76: WE ‘IN KADU LEJESTEFIZZUNEKE MINEL-’ARDI LIJUHRIXHUKE MINHA WE ‘IDHËN LA JELBETHUNE HILAFEKE ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.77: SUNNETE MEN KAD ‘ERSELNA KABLEKE MIN RUSULINA WE LA TEXHIDU LISUNNETINA TEHWILË
17.78: ‘EKIMI SELËTE LIDULUKI SHEMSI ‘ILA GASEKIL-LEJLI WE KUR’ANAL-FEXHRI ‘INNE KUR’ANAL-FEXHRI KANE MESH/HUDË
17.79: WE MINEL-LEJLI FETEHEXHXHED BIHI NAFILETEN LEKE ‘ASA ‘EN JEB’ATHEKE RABBUKE MEKAMËN MEHMUDË
17.80: WE KUL RABBI ‘EDHILNI MUDHALE SIDKIN WE ‘EHRIXHNI MUHRAXHE SIDKIN WE EXH’AL LI MIN LEDUNKE SULTANËN NESIRA
17.81: WE KUL XHA’AL-HEKKU WE ZEHEKAL-BETILU ‘INNAL-BETILE KANE ZEHUKË
17.82: WE NUNEZZILU MINEL-KUR’ANI MA HUWE SHIFE’UN WE RAHMETUN LILMU’UMININE WE LA JEZIDU EDH-DHALIMINE ‘IL-LA HASARA
17.83: WE ‘IDHA ‘EN’AMNA ‘ALEL-’INSANI ‘A’RADE WE NE’A BIXHANIBIHI WE ‘IDHA MESSEHU SHERRU KANE JE’USË
17.84: KUL KUL-LUN JA’MELU ‘ALA SHAKILATIHI FERABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMEN HUWE ‘EHDA SEBILË
17.85: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘ANI RUHI KULI RUHU MIN ‘EMRI RABBI WE MA ‘UTITUM MINEL-’ILMI ‘IL-LA KALILË
17.86: WE LE’IN SHI’NA LENEDH/HEBENNE BIEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE THUMME LA TEXHIDU LEKE BIHI ‘ALEJNA WE KILË
17.87: ‘IL-LA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE ‘INNE FEDLEHU KANE ‘ALEJKE KEBIRA
17.88: KUL LE’INI EXHTEME’ATIL-’INSU WEL-XHINNU ‘ALA ‘EN JE’TU BIMITHLI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LA JE’TUNE BIMITHLIHI WE LEW KANE BE’DUHUM LIBE’DIN DHEHIRA
17.89: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN FE’EBE ‘EKTHERU NASI ‘IL-LA KUFURA
17.90: WE KALU LEN NU’UMINE LEKE HATTE TEFXHURA LENA MINEL-’ARDI JENBU’Ë
17.91: ‘EW TEKUNE LEKE XHENNETUN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘INEBIN FETUFEXHXHIRAL-’ENHARA HILALEHA TEFXHIRA
17.92: ‘EW TUSKITE SEMA’E KAMA ZE’AMTE ‘ALEJNA KISEFËN ‘EW TE’TIJE BIL-LAHI WEL-MELE’IKETI KABILË
17.93: ‘EW JEKUNE LEKE BEJTUN MIN ZUHRUFIN ‘EW TERKA FI SEMA’I WE LEN NU’UMINE LIRUKIJIKE HATTE TUNEZZILE ‘ALEJNA KITABËN NEKRA’UUHU KUL SUBHANE RABBI HEL KUNTU ‘IL-LA BESHERAN RASULË
17.94: WE MA MENE’A NASE ‘EN JU’UMINU ‘IDH XHA’EHUMUL-HUDA ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EBE’ATHAL-LAHU BESHERAN RASULË
17.95: KUL LEW KANE FIL-’ËRDI MELE’IKETUN JEMSHUNE MUTME’INNINE LENEZZELNA ‘ALEJHIM MINE SEMA’I MELEKËN RASULË
17.96: KUL KEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM ‘INNEHU KANE BI’IBEDIHI HABIRAN BESIRA
17.97: WE MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FELEN TEXHIDE LEHUM ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNIHI WE NEHSHURUHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘ALA WEXHUHIHIM ‘UMJËN WE BUKMËN WE SUMMËN ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU KUL-LEMA HABET ZIDNAHUM SA’IRA
17.98: DHALIKE XHEZA’UUHUM BI’ENNEHUM KEFERU BI’AJATINA WE KALU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA ‘IDHAMËN WE RUFETËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUNE HALKËN XHEDIDË
17.99: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA-LLAHEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA KADIRUN ‘ALA ‘EN JEHLUKA MITHLEHUM WE XHE’ALE LEHUM ‘EXHELËN LA RAJBE FIHI FE’EBE EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IL-LA KUFURA
17.100: KUL LEW ‘ENTUM TEMLIKUNE HAZA’INE RAHMETI RABBI ‘IDHËN LE’EMSEKTUM HASHJETAL-’INFEKI WE KANAL-’INSANU KATURA
17.101: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSA TIS’A ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN FES’L BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘IDH XHA’EHUM FEKALE LEHU FIR’AWNU ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUKE JAMUSA MESHURA
17.102: KALE LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA ‘ENZELE HA’UULË’ ‘IL-LA RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI BESA’IRA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUKE JA FIR’AWNU METHBURA
17.103: FE’ERADE ‘EN JESTEFIZZEHUM MINEL-’ARDI FE’EGRAKNAHU WE MEN ME’AHU XHEMI’Ë
17.104: WE KULNA MIN BE’DIHI LIBENI ‘ISRA’ILE ESKUNUL-’ERDA FE’IDHË XHË’E WE’DUL-’AHIRATI XHI’NA BIKUM LEFIFË
17.105: WE BIL-HAKKI ‘ENZELNAHU WE BIL-HAKKI NEZELE WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRAN WE NEDHIRA
17.106: WE KUR’ANËN FERAKNAHU LITEKRA’EHU ‘ALA NASI ‘ALA MUKTHIN WE NEZZELNAHU TENZILË
17.107: KUL ‘AMINU BIHI ‘EW LA TU’UMINU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME MIN KABLIHI ‘IDHA JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM JEHIRRUNE LIL’EDHKANI SUXHXHEDË
17.108: WE JAKULUNE SUBHANE RABBINA ‘IN KANE WE’DU RABBINA LEMEF’ULË
17.109: WE JEHIRRUNE LIL’EDHKANI JEBKUNE WE JEZIDUHUM HUSHU’Ë
17.110: KUL ED’U LLAHE ‘EW ED’U RAHMENE ‘EJJENEN MMA TED’U FELEHUL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA WE LA TEXHHER BISALATIKE WE LA TUHAFIT BIHA WE EBTEGI BEJNE DHALIKE SEBILË
17.111: WE KULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI LEM JETTEHIDH WELEDËN WE LEM JEKUN LEHU SHERIKUN FIL-MULKI WE LEM JEKUN LEHU WE LIJUN MINE EDH-DHULLI WE KEBBIRHU TEKBIRA

18.1: EL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE ‘ALA ‘ABDIHIL-KITABE WE LEM JEXH’AL LLEHU ‘IWEXH
18.2: KAJJIMËN LIJUNDHIRA BE’SËN SHEDIDËN MIN LEDUNHU WE JUBESHSHIRAL-MU’UMININEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SALIHATI ‘ENNE LEHUM ‘EXHRAN HESENË
18.5: MMA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN WE LA LI’ABE’IHIM KEBURAT KELIMETEN TEHRUXHU MIN ‘EFWEHIHIM ‘IN JAKULUNE ‘IL-LA KEDHIBË
18.6: FELE’ALLEKE BEHI’UN NEFSEKE ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM ‘IN LEM JU’UMINU BIHEDHAL-HEDITHI ‘ESEFË
18.10: ‘IDH ‘EWEL-FITJETU ‘ILAL-KEHFI FEKALU RABBENA ‘ATINA MIN LEDUNKE RAHMETEN WE HEJJI’ LENA MIN ‘EMRINA RASHEDË
18.13: NAHNU NEKUSSU ‘ALEJKE NEBE’EHUM BIL-HAKKI ‘INNAHUM FITJETUN ‘AMENU BIRABBIHIM WE ZIDNAHUM HUDE
18.14: WE RABETNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘IDH KAMU FEKALU RABBUNA RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI LEN NED’UWE MIN DUNIHI ‘ILEHËN LEKAD KULNA ‘IDHËN SHETETË
18.15: HA’UULË’ KAWMUNA ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN LEWLA JE’TUNE ‘ALEJHIM BISULTANIN BEJJININ FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBË
18.16: WE ‘IDH A’TEZELTUMUHUM WE MA JA’BUDUNE ‘IL-LALLAHE FE’WU ‘ILAL-KEHFI JENSHUR LEKUM RABBUKUM MIN RAHMETIHI WE JUHEJJI’ LEKUM MIN ‘EMRIKUM MIRFEKË
18.17: WE TERA SHEMSE ‘IDHA TELE’AT TEZAWERU ‘AN KEHFIHIM DHATAL-JEMINI WE ‘IDHA GARABET TEKRIDUHUM DHATE ESH-SHIMALI WE HUM FI FEXHWETIN MINHU DHALIKE MIN ‘AJATI LEHI MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEHUWEL-MUHTEDI WE MEN JUDLIL FELEN TEXHIDE LEHU WELIJËN MURSHIDË
18.18: WE TEHSEBUHUM ‘EJKADHËN WE HUM RUKUDUN WE NUKALLIBUHUM DHATAL-JEMINI WE DHATE ESH-SHIMALI WE KELBUHUM BESITUN DHIRA’AJHI BIL-WESIDI LEWI ETTALA’TE ‘ALEJHIM LEWELLEJTE MINHUM FIRARAN WE LEMULI’TE MINHUM RU’BË
18.19: WE KEDHELIKE BE’ATHNAHUM LIJETESA’ELU BEJNEHUM KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM KEM LEBITHTUM KALU LEBITHNA JEWMËN ‘EW BE’DE JEWMIN KALU RABBUKUM ‘A’LEMU BIMA LEBITHTUM FEB’ATHU ‘EHEDEKUM BIWERIKIKUM HEDHIHI ‘ILAL-MEDINETI FELJENDHUR ‘EJJUHA ‘EZKA TA’AMËN FELJE’TIKUM BIRIZKIN MINHU WE LIETELETTEF WE LA JUSH’IRANNE BIKUM ‘EHEDË
18.20: ‘INNAHUM ‘IN JEDHHERU ‘ALEJKUM JERXHUMUKUM ‘EW JU’IDUKUM FI MIL-LETIHIM WE LEN TUFLIHU ‘IDHËN ‘EBEDË
18.21: WE KEDHELIKE ‘A’THERNA ‘ALEJHIM LIJA’LEMU ‘ENNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE ‘ENNE SA’ATE LA RAJBE FIHË ‘IDH JETENAZA’UNE BEJNEHUM ‘EMRAHUM FEKALU EBNU ‘ALEJHIM BUNJANËN RABBUHUM ‘A’LEMU BIHIM KALEL-LEDHINE GALEBU ‘ALA ‘EMRIHIM LENETTEHIDHENNE ‘ALEJHIM MESXHIDË
18.22: SEJAKULUNE THALATHETUN RABI’UHUM KELBUHUM WE JAKULUNE HAMSETUN SADISUHUM KELBUHUM RAXHMËN BIL-GAJBI WE JAKULUNE SEB’ATUN WE THAMINUHUM KELBUHUM KUL RABBI ‘A’LEMU BI’IDDETIHIM MA JA’LEMUHUM ‘IL-LA KALILUN FELA TUMARI FIHIM ‘IL-LA MIRA’EN DHAHIRAN WE LA TESTEFTI FIHIM MINHUM ‘EHEDË
18.23: WE LA TEKULENNE LISHEJ’IN ‘INNI FE’ILUN DHALIKE GADË
18.24: ‘IL-LA ‘EN JESHA’-ALLAHU WE EDHKUR RABBEKE ‘IDHA NESITE WE KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEHDIJENI RABBI LI’KRABE MIN HADHA RASHEDË
18.25: WE LEBITHU FI KEHFIHIM THALATHE MIA’ETIN SININE WE EZDADU TIS’Ë
18.26: KULI ALLAHU ‘A’LEMU BIMA LEBITHU LEHU GAJBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘EBSIR BIHI WE ‘ESMI’ MA LEHUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA JUSHRIKU FI HUKMIHI ‘EHEDË
18.27: WE ETLU MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MIN KITABI RABBIKE LA MUBEDDILE LIKELIMATIHI WE LEN TEXHIDE MIN DUNIHI MULTEHEDË
18.28: WE ESBIR NEFSEKE ME’EL-LEDHINE JED’UNE RABBEHUM BIL-GADËTI WEL-’ASHIJI JURIDUNE WEXHHEHU WE LA TA’DU ‘AJNAKE ‘ANHUM TURIDU ZINETAL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE LA TUTI’ MEN ‘EGFELNA KALBEHU ‘AN DHIKRINA WE ETTEBE’A HEWEHU WE KANE ‘EMRUHU FURUTË
18.29: WE KULIL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKUM FEMEN SHA’E FELJU’UMIN WE MEN SHA’E FELJEKFUR ‘INNA ‘A’TEDNA LILDHDHALIMINE NËRAN ‘EHATE BIHIM SURADIKUHA WE ‘IN JESTEGITHU JUGATHU BIMA’IN KALMUHLI JESHWIL-WUXHUHE BI’SE SHERABU WE SA’ET MURTEFEKË
18.31: ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM XHENNATU ‘ADNIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHIMUL-’ENHARU JUHELLEWNE FIHË MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE JELBESUNE THIJABËN HUDRAN MIN SUNDUSIN WE ‘ISTEBRAKIN MUTTEKI’INE FIHË ‘ALEL-’ERA’IKI NI’ME THEWEBU WE HESUNET MURTEFEKË
18.32: WE EDRIB LEHUM METHELËN RAXHULEJNI XHE’ALNA LI’HEDIHIMA XHENNETEJNI MIN ‘A’NABIN WE HEFEFNAHUMA BINEHLIN WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUMA ZER’Ë
18.33: KILTAL-XHENNETEJNI ‘ATET ‘UKULEHA WE LEM TEDHLIM MINHU SHEJ’ËN WE FEXHXHERNA HILALEHUMA NEHERA
18.34: WE KANE LEHU THEMERUN FEKALE LISAHIBIHI WE HUWE JUHAWIRUHU ‘ENA ‘EKTHERU MINKE MALËN WE ‘E’AZZU NEFERA
18.35: WE DEHALE XHENNETEHU WE HUWE DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI KALE MA ‘EDHUNNU ‘EN TEBIDE HEDHIHI ‘EBEDË
18.36: WE MA ‘EDHUNNU SA’ATE KA’IMETEN WE LE’IN RUDIDTU ‘ILA RABBI LE’EXHIDENNE HAJRAN MINHA MUNKALEBË
18.37: KALE LEHU SAHIBUHU WE HUWE JUHAWIRUHU ‘EKEFERTE BIEL-LEDHI HALEKAKE MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME SEWWEKE RAXHULË
18.38: LAKINNA HUWA-LLAHU RABBI WE LA ‘USHRIKU BIRABBI ‘EHEDË
18.39: WE LEWLA ‘IDH DEHALTE XHENNETEKE KULTE MA SHA’-ALLAHU LA KUWETE ‘IL-LA BIL-LAHI ‘IN TERANI ‘ENA ‘EKAL-LE MINKE MALËN WE WELEDË
18.40: FE’ASA RABBI ‘EN JU’UTIJENI HAJRAN MIN XHENNETIKE WE JURSILE ‘ALEJHA HUSBENËN MINE SEMA’I FETUSBIHE SA’IDËN ZELEKË
18.41: ‘EW JUSBIHE MA’UUHA GAWRAN FELEN TESTETI’A LEHU TELEBË
18.42: WE ‘UHITE BITHEMERIHI FE’ESBEHE JUKALLIBU KEFFEJHI ‘ALA MA ‘ENFEKA FIHË WE HIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA WE JAKULU JA LEJTENI LEM ‘USHRIK BIRABBI ‘EHEDË
18.43: WE LEM TEKUN LEHU FI’ETUN JENSURUNEHU MIN DUNI LEHI WE MA KANE MUNTESIRA
18.44: HUNALIKAL-WELAJETU LIL-LAHIL-HEKKI HUWE HAJRUN THEWEBËN WE HAJRUN ‘UKBË
18.45: WE EDRIB LEHUM METHALEL-HEJËTI DUN'JA KAMA’IN ‘ENZELNAHU MINE SEMA’I FEHTELETE BIHI NEBETUL-’ARDI FE’ESBEHE HESHIMËN TEDHRUHU RIJAHU WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUKTEDIRA
18.46: AL-MALU WEL-BENUNE ZINETUL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WEL-BEKIJATU SALIHATU HAJRUN ‘INDE RABBIKE THEWEBËN WE HAJRUN ‘EMELË
18.47: WE JEWME NUSEJJIRUL-XHIBELE WE TERAL-’ERDA BERIZETEN WE HESHERNAHUM FELEM NUGADIR MINHUM ‘EHEDË
18.48: WE ‘URIDU ‘ALA RABBIKE SEFFËN LEKAD XHI’TUMUNA KAMA HALEKNAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN BEL ZE’AMTUM ‘ELLEN NEXH’ALE LEKUM MEW’IDË
18.49: WE WUDI’AL-KITABU FETERAL-MUXHRIMINE MUSHFIKINE MIMMA FIHI WE JAKULUNE JA WEJLETENA MALI HADHAL-KITABI LA JUGADIRU SEGIRATEN WE LA KEBIRATEN ‘IL-LA ‘EHSAHA WE WEXHEDU MA ‘AMILU HADIRAN WE LA JEDHLIMU RABBUKE ‘EHEDË
18.50: WE ‘IDH KULNA LILMELE’IKETI ESXHUDU LI’DEME FESEXHEDU ‘IL-LA ‘IBLISE KANE MINEL-XHINNI FEFESEKA ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHI ‘EFETETTEHIDHUNEHU WE DHURRIJETEHU ‘EWLIJA’E MIN DUNI WE HUM LEKUM ‘ADUWUN BI’SE LILDHDHALIMINE BEDELË
18.51: MA ‘ESH/HEDTUHUM HALKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LA HALKA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE MA KUNTU MUTTEHIDHAL-MUDILLINE ‘ADUDË
18.52: WE JEWME JAKULU NADU SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM FEDE’AWHUM FELEM JESTEXHIBU LEHUM WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUM MEWBIKË
18.53: WE RA’AL-MUXHRIMUNE NARA FEDHENNU ‘ENNEHUM MUWEKI’UHA WE LEM JEXHIDU ‘ANHA MESRIFË
18.54: WE LEKAD SERRAFNA FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI LILNNASI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN WE KANAL-’INSANU ‘EKTHERA SHEJ’IN XHEDELË
18.55: WE MA MENE’A NASE ‘EN JU’UMINU ‘IDH XHA’EHUMUL-HUDA WE JESTEGFIRU RABBEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM SUNNETUL-’EWWELINE ‘EW JE’TIJEHUMUL-’ADHABU KUBULË
18.56: WE MA NURSILUL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA MUBESHSHIRINE WE MUNDHIRINE WE JUXHADILUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIL-BETILI LIJUDHIDU BIHIL-HAKKA WE ETTEHADHU ‘AJATI WE MA ‘UNDHIRU HUZUE
18.57: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN DHUKKIRA BI’AJATI RABBIHI FE’A’RADE ‘ANHA WE NESIJE MA KADDEMET JEDAHU ‘INNA XHE’ALNA ‘ALA KULUBIHIM ‘EKINNETEN ‘EN JEFKAHUHU WE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRAN WE ‘IN TED’UHUM ‘ILAL-HUDA FELEN JEHTEDU ‘IDHËN ‘EBEDË
18.58: WE RABBUKAL-GAFURU DHU RAHMETI LEW JU’UAHIDHUHUM BIMA KESEBU LE’AXHXHELE LEHUMUL-’ADHABE BEL LEHUM MEW’IDUN LEN JEXHIDU MIN DUNIHI MEW’ILË
18.59: WE TILKAL-KURA ‘EHLEKNAHUM LEMMA DHELEMU WE XHE’ALNA LIMEHLIKIHIM MEW’IDË
18.60: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIFETAHU LA ‘EBRAHU HATTE ‘EBLUGA MEXHME’AL-BEHRAJNI ‘EW ‘EMDIJE HUKUBË
18.61: FELAMMA BELEGA MEXHME’A BEJNIHIMA NESIJA HUTEHUMA FE ETTEHADHE SEBILEHU FIL-BEHRI SERABË
18.62: FELAMMA XHAWEZA KALE LIFETAHU ‘ATINA GADA’ENA LEKAD LAKINA MIN SEFERINA HADHA NESEBË
18.63: KALE ‘ERA’EJTE ‘IDH ‘EWEJNA ‘ILA SEHRATI FE’INNI NESITUL-HUTE WE MA ‘ENSANIHU ‘IL-LA SHEJTANU ‘EN ‘EDHKURAHU WE ETTEHADHE SEBILEHU FIL-BEHRI ‘AXHEBË
18.64: KALE DHALIKE MA KUNNA NEBGI FERTEDDA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIMA KASESË
18.65: FEWEXHEDA ‘ABDËN MIN ‘IBEDINA ‘ATEJNAHU RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDINA WE ‘ALLEMNAHU MIN LEDUNNA ‘ILMË
18.66: KALE LEHU MUSA HEL ‘ETTEBI’UKE ‘ALA ‘EN TU’ALLIMENI MIMMA ‘ULLIMTE RUSHDË
18.68: WE KEJFE TESBIRU ‘ALA MA LEM TUHIT BIHI HUBRA
18.69: KALE SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU SABIRAN WE LA ‘A’SI LEKE ‘EMRA
18.70: KALE FE’INI ETTEBE’TENI FELA TES’ELNI ‘AN SHEJ’IN HATTE ‘UHDITHE LEKE MINHU DHIKRA
18.71: FENTELEKA HATTE ‘IDHA RAKIBE FI SEFINETI HARAKAHA KALE ‘EHARAKTEHA LITUGRIKA ‘EHLEHA LEKAD XHI’TE SHEJ’ËN ‘IMRA
18.73: KALE LA TU’UAHIDHNI BIMA NESITU WE LA TURHIKNI MIN ‘EMRI ‘USRA
18.74: FENTELEKA HATTE ‘IDHA LEKIJA GULËMËN FEKATELEHU KALE ‘EKATELTE NEFSËN ZEKIJETEN BIGAJRI NEFSIN LEKAD XHI’TE SHEJ’ËN NUKRA
18.75: KALE ‘ELEM ‘EKUL LEKE ‘INNEKE LEN TESTETI’A MA’IJE SEBRA
18.76: KALE ‘IN SE’ELTUKE ‘AN SHEJ’IN BE’DEHA FELA TUSAHIBNI KAD BELEGTE MIN LEDUNNI ‘UDHRA
18.77: FENTELEKA HATTE ‘IDHA ‘ETEJA ‘EHLE KARJETIN ESTET’AMA ‘EHLEHA FE’EBEW ‘EN JUDEJJIFUHUMA FEWEXHEDA FIHË XHIDARAN JURIDU ‘EN JENKADDE FE’EKAMEHU KALE LEW SHI’TE LATTEHADHTE ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRA
18.78: KALE HADHA FIRAKU BEJNI WE BEJNIKE SE’UNEBBI’UKE BITE’WILI MA LEM TESTETI’ ‘ALEJHI SEBRA
18.79: ‘EMMA SEFINETU FEKANET LIMESAKINE JA’MELUNE FIL-BEHRI FE’ERADTU ‘EN ‘A’IBEHA WE KANE WERA’EHUM MELIKUN JE’HUDHU KUL-LE SEFINETIN GASBË
18.80: WE ‘EMMAL-GULËMU FEKANE ‘EBEWEHU MU’UMINEJNI FEHASHINA ‘EN JURHIKAHUMA TUGJANËN WE KUFRA
18.81: FE’ERADNA ‘EN JUBDILEHUMA RABBUHUMA HAJRAN MINHU ZEKËTEN WE ‘EKRABE RUHMË
18.82: WE ‘EMMAL-XHIDARU FEKANE LIGULËMEJNI JETIMEJNI FIL-MEDINETI WE KANE TEHTEHU KENZUN LEHUMA WE KANE ‘EBUHUMA SALIHËN FE’ERADE RABBUKE ‘EN JEBLUGA ‘ESHUDDEHUMA WE JESTEHRIXHA KENZEHUMA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE WE MA FE’ALTUHU ‘AN ‘EMRI DHALIKE TE’WILU MA LEM TESTI’ ‘ALEJHI SEBRA
18.83: WE JES’ELUNEKE ‘AN DHIL-KARNEJNI KUL SE’ETLU ‘ALEJKUM MINHU DHIKRA
18.84: ‘INNA MEKKENNA LEHU FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ATEJNAHU MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SEBEBË
18.86: HATTE ‘IDHA BELEGA MEGRIBE SHEMSI WEXHEDEHA TEGRUBU FI ‘AJNIN HEMI’ETIN WE WEXHEDE ‘INDEHA KAWMËN KULNA JA DHAL-KARNEJNI ‘IMMA ‘EN TU’ADHDHIBE WE ‘IMMA ‘EN TETTEHIDHE FIHIM HUSNË
18.87: KALE ‘EMMA MEN DHELEME FESEWFE NU’ADHDHIBUHU THUMME JURADDU ‘ILA RABBIHI FEJU’ADHDHIBUHU ‘ADHABËN NUKRA
18.88: WE ‘EMMA MEN ‘AMANA WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELEHU XHEZA’ENL-HUSNA WE SENEKULU LEHU MIN ‘EMRINA JUSRA
18.90: HATTE ‘IDHA BELEGA METLI’A SHEMSI WEXHEDEHA TETLU’U ‘ALA KAWMIN LEM NEXH’AL LEHUM MIN DUNIHA SITRA
18.91: KEDHALIKE WE KAD ‘EHETNA BIMA LEDEJHI HUBRA
18.93: HATTE ‘IDHA BELEGA BEJNE SEDDEJNI WEXHEDE MIN DUNIHIMA KAWMËN LA JEKADUNE JEFKAHUNE KAWLË
18.94: KALU JA DHAL-KARNEJNI ‘INNE JE’XHUXHE WE ME’XHUXHE MUFSIDUNA FIL-’ËRDI FEHEL NEXH’ALU LEKE HARXHËN ‘ALA ‘EN TEXH’ALE BEJNENA WE BEJNEHUM SEDDË
18.95: KALE MA MEKKENENI FIHI RABBI HAJRUN FE’A’INUNI BIKUWETIN ‘EXH’AL BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEHUM RADMË
18.96: ‘ATUNI ZUBERAL-HEDIDI HATTE ‘IDHA SAWE BEJNE SEDEFEJNI KALE ENFUHU HATTE ‘IDHA XHE’ALEHU NËRAN KALE ‘ATUNI ‘UFRIG ‘ALEJHI KITRA
18.97: FEMA ESTA’U ‘EN JEDHHERUHU WE MA ESTETA’U LEHU NEKBË
18.98: KALE HADHA RAHMETUN MIN RABBI FE’IDHË XHË’E WE’DU RABBI XHE’ALEHU DEKKA’E WE KANE WE’DU RABBI HEKKË
18.99: WE TERAKNA BE’DEHUM JEWME’IDHIN JEMUXHU FI BE’DIN WE NUFIHË FI SURI FEXHEMA’NAHUM XHEM’Ë
18.101: EL-LEDHINE KANET ‘A’JUNUHUM FI GITA’IN ‘AN DHIKRI WE KENU LA JESTETI’UNE SEM’Ë
18.102: ‘EFEHESIBEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EN JETTEHIDHU ‘IBEDI MIN DUNI ‘EWLIJA’E ‘INNA ‘A’TEDNA XHEHENNEME LILKEFIRINE NUZULË
18.104: EL-LEDHINE DAL-LE SA’JUHUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE HUM JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM JUHSINUNE SUN’Ë
18.105: ‘ULE’IKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM WE LIKA’IHI FEHEBITET ‘A’MALUHUM FELA NUKIMU LEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WEZNË
18.106: DHALIKE XHEZA’UUHUM XHEHENNEMU BIMA KEFERU WE ETTEHADHU ‘AJATI WE RUSULI HUZUE
18.107: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KANET LEHUM XHENNATUL-FIRDEWSI NUZULË
18.109: KUL LEW KANAL-BEHRU MIDADËN LIKELIMATI RABBI LENEFIDAL-BEHRU KABLE ‘EN TENFEDE KELIMATU RABBI WE LEW XHI’NA BIMITHLIHI MEDEDË
18.110: KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ENA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘ENNEMA ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN FEMEN KANE JERXHU LIKA’E RABBIHI FELJA’MEL ‘AMELËN SALIHËN WE LA JUSHRIK BI’IBEDETI RABBIHI ‘EHEDË

19.4: KALE RABBI ‘INNI WEHENAL-’ADHMU MINNI WE ESHTE’ALE RA’SU SHEJBËN WE LEM ‘EKUN BIDU’A’IKE RABBI SHEKIJË
19.5: WE ‘INNI HIFTUL-MEWELIJE MIN WERA’I WE KANETI EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRAN FEHEB LI MIN LEDUNKE WELIJË
19.6: JERITHUNI WE JERITHU MIN ‘ALI JA’KUBE WE EXH’ALHU RABBI RADIJË
19.7: JA ZEKERIJA ‘INNA NUBESHSHIRUKE BIGULËMIN ESMUHU JEHJA LEM NEXH’AL LEHU MIN KABLU SEMIJË
19.8: KALE RABBI ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI GULËMUN WE KANET EMRA’ETI ‘AKIRAN WE KAD BELEGTU MINEL-KIBERI ‘ITIJË
19.9: KALE KEDHALIKE KALE RABBUKE HUWE ‘ALEJJE HEJJINUN WE KAD HALEKTUKE MIN KABLU WE LEM TEKU SHEJ’Ë
19.10: KALE RABBI EXH’AL LI ‘AJETEN KALE ‘AJETUKE ‘ELLA TUKELLIME NASE THALATHE LEJALIN SEWIJË
19.11: FEHARAXHE ‘ALA KAWMIHI MINEL-MIHRABI FE’EWHA ‘ILEJHIM ‘EN SEBBIHU BUKRATEN WE ‘ASHIJË
19.12: JA JEHJA HUDHIL-KITABE BIKUWETIN WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-HUKME SEBIJË
19.13: WE HENANËN MIN LEDUNNA WE ZEKËTEN WE KANE TEKIJË
19.14: WE BERRAN BIWELIDEJHI WE LEM JEKUN XHEBBERAN ‘ASIJË
19.15: WE SALAMUN ‘ALEJHI JEWME WULIDE WE JEWME JEMUTU WE JEWME JUB’ATHU HEJJË
19.16: WE EDHKUR FIL-KITABI MERJEME ‘IDH ENTEBEDHET MIN ‘EHLIHA MEKANËN SHERKIJË
19.17: FETTEHADHET MIN DUNIHIM HIXHABËN FE’ERSELNA ‘ILEJHA RUHENA FETEMETHTHELE LEHA BESHERAN SEWIJË
19.19: KALE ‘INNAMA ‘ENA RASULU RABBIKI LI’HEBE LEKI GULËMËN ZEKIJË
19.20: KALET ‘ENNA JEKUNU LI GULËMUN WE LEM JEMSESNI BESHERUN WE LEM ‘EKU BEGIJË
19.21: KALE KEDHALIKI KALE RABBUKI HUWE ‘ALEJJE HEJJINUN WE LINEXH’ALEHU ‘AJETEN LILNNASI WE RAHMETEN MINNA WE KANE ‘EMRAN MEKDIJË
19.23: FE’EXHA’EHAL-MEHADU ‘ILA XHIDH’I NEHLETI KALET JA LEJTENI MITTU KABLE HADHA WE KUNTU NESJËN MENSIJË
19.24: FENADAHA MIN TEHTIHA ‘ELLA TEHZENI KAD XHE’ALE RABBUKI TEHTEKI SERIJË
19.25: WE HUZZI ‘ILEJKI BIXHIDH’I NEHLETI TUSAKIT ‘ALEJKI RUTEBËN XHENIJË
19.26: FEKULI WE ESHRABI WE KARRI ‘AJNËN FE’IMMA TERAJNNE MINEL-BESHERI ‘EHEDËN FEKULI ‘INNI NEDHERTU LILRRAHMENI SEWMËN FELEN ‘UKELLIMAL-JEWME ‘INSIJË
19.27: FE’ETET BIHI KAWMEHA TEHMILUHU KALU JA MERJEMU LEKAD XHI’TI SHEJ’ËN FERIJË
19.28: JA ‘UHTE HARUNE MA KANE ‘EBUKI EMRA’E SEW’IN WE MA KANET ‘UMMUKI BEGIJË
19.29: FE’ESHARAT ‘ILEJHI KALU KEJFE NUKELLIMU MEN KANE FIL-MEHDI SEBIJË
19.31: WE XHE’ALENI MUBERAKËN ‘EJNE MA KUNTU WE ‘EWSANI BIS-SELËTI WE EZ-ZEKËTI MA DUMTU HEJJË
19.32: WE BERRAN BIWELIDETI WE LEM JEXH’ALNI XHEBBERAN SHEKIJË
19.33: WE SALAMU ‘ALEJJE JEWME WULIDTU WE JEWME ‘EMUTU WE JEWME ‘UB’ATHU HEJJË
19.34: DHALIKE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME KAWLAL-HEKKIL-LEDHI FIHI JEMTERUN
19.35: MA KANE LIL-LAHI ‘EN JETTEHIDHE MIN WELEDIN SUBHANEHU ‘IDHA KADA ‘EMRAN FE’INNAMA JAKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
19.36: WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE RABBI WE RABBUKUM FE’BUDUHU HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
