21.25: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RASUL IN’IL-LA NUHI ‘ILEJHI ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENA FE’BUDUN
21.26: WE KALU ETTEHADHE RAHMANU WELEDËN SUBHANEHU BEL ‘IBEDUN MUKRAMUN
21.27: LA JESBIKUNEHU BIL-KAWLI WE HUM BI’EMRIHI JA’MELUN
21.28: JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE LA JESHFE’UNE ‘IL-LA LIMENI ERTEDA WE HUM MIN HASHJETIHI MUSHFIKUN
21.29: WE MEN JEKUL MINHUM ‘INNI ‘ILEHUN MIN DUNIHI FEDHALIKE NEXHZIHI XHEHENNEME KEDHALIKE NEXHZI EDH-DHALIMIN
21.30: ‘EWELEM JEREL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNE SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA KANETA RATKËN FEFETEKNAHUMA WE XHE’ALNA MINEL-MA’I KUL-LE SHEJ’IN HEJJIN ‘EFELA JU’UMINUN
21.31: WE XHE’ALNA FIL-’ËRDI RAWESIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIHIM WE XHE’ALNA FIHË FIXHAXHËN SUBULËN LE’AL-LEHUM JEHTEDUN
21.32: WE XHE’ALNA SEMA’E SEKFËN MEHFUDHËN WE HUM ‘AN ‘AJATIHA MU’RIDUN
21.33: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-LEJLE WE NEHARA WE SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN FI FELAKIN JESBEHUN
21.34: WE MA XHE’ALNA LIBESHERIN MIN KABLIKAL-HULDE ‘EFE’IN MITTE FEHUMUL-HALIDUN
21.35: KUL-LU NEFSIN DHA’IKATUL-MEWTI WE NEBLUKUM BISH-SHERRI WEL-HAJRI FITNETEN WE ‘ILEJNA TURXHA’UN
21.36: WE ‘IDHA RA’AKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN JETTEHIDHUNEKE ‘IL-LA HUZUEN ‘EHEDHEL-LEDHI JEDHKURU ‘ALIHETEKUM WE HUM BIDHIKRI RAHMANI HUM KAFIRUN
21.38: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
21.39: LEW JA’LEMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU HINE LA JEKUFFUNE ‘AN WUXHUHIHIMU NARA WE LA ‘AN DHUHURIHIM WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
21.40: BEL TE’TIHIM BEGTETEN FETEBHETUHUM FELA JESTETI’UNE RADDEHA WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN
21.41: WE LEKADI ESTUHZI’E BIRUSULIN MIN KABLIKE FEHAKA BIEL-LEDHINE SEHIRU MINHUM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
21.42: KUL MEN JEKLE’UUKUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI MINE RAHMANI BEL HUM ‘AN DHIKRI RABBIHIM MU’RIDUN
21.43: ‘EM LEHUM ‘ALIHETUN TEMNA’UHUM MIN DUNINA LA JESTETI’UNE NESRA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE LA HUM MINNA JUSHEBUN
21.44: BEL METTA’NA HA’UULË’ WE ‘ABE’EHUM HATTE TALE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’UMURU ‘EFELA JERAWNE ‘ENNA NE’TIL-’ERDA NENKUSUHA MIN ‘ETRAFIHË ‘EFEHUMUL-GALIBUN
21.45: KUL ‘INNAMA ‘UNDHIRUKUM BIL-WEHJI WE LA JESMA’U SUMMU DU’A’E ‘IDHA MA JUNDHERUN
21.46: WE LE’IN MESSET/HUM NEFHETUN MIN ‘ADHABI RABBIKE LEJAKULUNNE JA WEJLENA ‘INNA KUNNA DHALIMIN
21.47: WE NEDA’UL-MEWEZINAL-KISTE LIJEWMIL-KIJAMETI FELA TUDHLEMU NEFSUN SHEJ’ËN WE ‘IN KANE MITHKALE HEBBETIN MIN HARDELIN ‘ETEJNA BIHA WE KEFE BINA HASIBIN
21.48: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSA WE HARUNAL-FURKANE WE DIJA’EN WE DHIKRAN LILMUTTAKIN
21.49: EL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI WE HUM MINE SA’ATI MUSHFIKUN
21.50: WE HEDHA DHIKRUN MUBERAKUN ‘ENZELNAHU ‘EFE’ENTUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
21.51: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA ‘IBRAHIME RUSHDEHU MIN KABLU WE KUNNA BIHI ‘ALIMIN
21.52: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MA HEDHIHIT-TEMATHILU AL-LETI ‘ENTUM LEHA ‘AKIFUN
21.54: KALE LEKAD KUNTUM ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABE’UUKUM FI DALELIN MUBINI
21.56: KALE BEL RABBUKUM RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDIL-LEDHI FETERAHUNNE WE ‘ENA ‘ALA DHALIKUM MINE ESH-SHAHIDIN
21.57: WE TALLLEHI LE’EKIDENNE ‘ESNAMEKUM BE’DE ‘EN TUWELLU MUDBIRIN
21.58: FEXHE’ALEHUM XHUDHADHËN ‘IL-LA KEBIRAN LEHUM LE’AL-LEHUM ‘ILEJHI JERXHI’UN
21.59: KALU MEN FE’ALE HADHA BI’ALIHETINA ‘INNEHU LEMINE EDH-DHALIMIN
21.60: KALU SEMI’NA FETEN JEDHKURUHUM JUKALU LEHU ‘IBRAHIM
21.61: KALU FE’TU BIHI ‘ALA ‘A’JUNI NASI LE’AL-LEHUM JESH/HEDUN
21.63: KALE BEL FE’ALEHU KEBIRUHUM HADHA FES’ELUHUM ‘IN KENU JENTIKUN
21.65: THUMME NUKISU ‘ALA RU’USIHIM LEKAD ‘ALIMTE MA HA’UULË’ JENTIKUN
21.66: KALE ‘EFETA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JENFE’UKUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA JEDURRUKU
21.67: ‘UFFIN LEKUM WE LIMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
21.68: KALU HERRIKUHU WE ENSURU ‘ALIHETEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM FE’ILIN
21.69: KULNA JA NARU KUNI BERDËN WE SALAMËN ‘ALA ‘IBRAHIM
21.71: WE NEXHXHEJNAHU WE LUTËN ‘ILAL-’ARDI AL-LETI BERAKNA FIHË LIL’ALEMIN
21.72: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE NAFILETEN WE KULLËN XHE’ALNA SALIHIN
21.73: WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JEHDUNE BI’EMRINA WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHIM FI’LAL-HAJRATI WE ‘IKAME SELËTI WE ‘ITA’E EZ-ZEKËTI WE KENU LENA ‘ABIDIN
21.74: WE LUTËN ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE NEXHXHEJNAHU MINEL-KARJETI AL-LETI KANET TA’MELUL-HABE’ITHE ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWME SEW’IN FESIKIN
21.76: WE NUHËN ‘IDH NADA MIN KABLU FESTEXHEBNA LEHU FENEXHXHEJNAHU WE ‘EHLEHU MINEL-KERBIL-’ADHIM
21.77: WE NESERNAHU MINEL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWME SEW’IN FE’EGRAKNAHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
21.78: WE DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE ‘IDH JEHKUMANI FIL-HERTHI ‘IDH NEFESHET FIHI GANEMUL-KAWMI WE KUNNA LIHUKMIHIM SHAHIDIN
21.79: FEFEHHEMNAHA SULEJMANE WE KULLËN ‘ATEJNA HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE SEHHARNA ME’A DAWUDAL-XHIBELE JUSEBBIHNE WET-TEJRA WE KUNNA FE’ILIN
21.80: WE ‘ALLEMNAHU SEN’ATE LEBUSIN LEKUM LITUHSINEKUM MIN BE’SIKUM FEHEL ‘ENTUM SHAKIRUN
21.81: WE LISULEJMANE RIHE ‘ASIFETEN TEXHRI BI’EMRIHI ‘ILAL-’ARDI AL-LETI BERAKNA FIHË WE KUNNA BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMIN
21.82: WE MINE SHEJATINI MEN JEGUSUNE LEHU WE JA’MELUNE ‘AMELËN DUNE DHALIKE WE KUNNA LEHUM HAFIDHIN
21.83: WE ‘EJJUBE ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU ‘ENNI MESSENI DURRU WE ‘ENTE ‘ERHEMU RAHIMIN
21.84: FESTEXHEBNA LEHU FEKESHEFNA MA BIHI MIN DURRIN WE ‘ATEJNAHU ‘EHLEHU WE MITHLEHUM ME’AHUM RAHMETEN MIN ‘INDINA WE DHIKRA LIL’ABIDIN
21.85: WE ‘ISMA’ILE WE ‘IDRISE WE DHAL-KIFLI KUL-LUN MINE SABIRIN
21.87: WE DHA NUNI ‘IDH DHEHEBE MUGADIBËN FEDHENNE ‘EN LEN NEKDIRA ‘ALEJHI FENADA FI EDH-DHULUMATI ‘EN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA ‘ENTE SUBHANEKE ‘INNI KUNTU MINE EDH-DHALIMIN
21.88: FESTEXHEBNA LEHU WE NEXHXHEJNAHU MINEL-GAMMI WE KEDHELIKE NUNXHIL-MU’UMININ
21.89: WE ZEKERIJA ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU RABBI LA TEDHERNI FERDËN WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-WERITHIN
21.90: FESTEXHEBNA LEHU WE WEHEBNA LEHU JEHJA WE ‘ESLEHNA LEHU ZEWXHEHU ‘INNAHUM KENU JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE JED’UNENA RAGABËN WE RAHEBËN WE KENU LENA HASHI’IN
21.91: WE E-ETI ‘EHSENET FERXHEHA FENEFEHNA FIHË MIN RUHINA WE XHE’ALNAHA WE EBNEHA ‘AJETEN LIL’ALEMIN
21.94: FEMEN JA’MEL MINE SALIHATI WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FELA KUFRANE LISA’JIHI WE ‘INNA LEHU KATIBUN
21.96: HATTE ‘IDHA FUTIHET JE’XHUXHU WE ME’XHUXHU WE HUM MIN KUL-LI HEDEBIN JENSILUN
21.97: WEKTERABEL-WE’DUL-HEKKU FE’IDHA HIJE SHAHISETUN ‘EBSARUL-LEDHINE KEFERU JA WEJLENA KAD KUNNA FI GAFLETIN MIN HADHA BEL KUNNA DHALIMIN
21.98: ‘INNEKUM WE MA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI HESEBU XHEHENNEME ‘ENTUM LEHA WE ERIDUN
21.99: LEW KANE HA’UULË’ ‘ALIHETEN MA WERADUHA WE KUL-LUN FIHË HALIDUN
21.100: LEHUM FIHË ZEFIRUN WE HUM FIHË LA JESMA’UN
21.102: LA JESMA’UNE HESISEHA WE HUM FI MA ESHTEHET ‘ENFUSUHUM HALIDUN
21.103: LA JEHZUNUHUMUL-FEZA’UL-’EKBERU WE TETELEKKAHUMUL-MELE’IKETU HADHA JEWMUKUMUL-LEDHI KUNTUM TU’ADUN
21.104: JEWME NETWI SEMA’E KETEJJI SIXHILLI LILKUTUBI KAMA BEDE’NA ‘EWWELE HALKIN NU’IDUHU WE’DËN ‘ALEJNA ‘INNA KUNNA FE’ILIN
21.105: WE LEKAD KETEBNA FI EZ-ZEBURI MIN BE’DI EDH-DHIKRI ‘ENNAL-’ERDA JERITHUHA ‘IBEDIJE SALIHUN
21.109: FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FEKUL ‘ADHENTUKUM ‘ALA SEWE’IN WE ‘IN ‘EDRI ‘EKARIBUN ‘EM BE’IDUN MA TU’ADUN
21.110: ‘INNEHU JA’LEMUL-XHEHRA MINEL-KAWLI WE JA’LEMU MA TEKTUMUN
21.111: WE ‘IN ‘EDRI LE’AL-LEHU FITNETUN LEKUM WE META’UN ‘ILA HINI
21.112: KALE RABBI EHKUM BIL-HAKKI WE RABBUNA RAHMANUL-MUSTA’ANU ‘ALA MA TESIFUN

22.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUM ‘INNE ZELZELETE SA’ATI SHEJ’UN ‘ADHIMU
22.2: JEWME TERAWNEHA TEDH/HELU KUL-LU MURDI’ATIN ‘AMMA ‘ERDA’AT WE TEDA’U KUL-LU DHATI HEMLIN HEMLEHA WE TERA NASE SUKARA WE MA HUM BISUKARA WE LAKINNE ‘ADHABEL-LAHI SHEDIDU
22.3: WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI LEHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE JETTEBI’U KUL-LE SHEJTANIN MERIDI
22.4: KUTIBE ‘ALEJHI ‘ENNEHU MEN TEWELLAHU FE’ENNEHU JUDIL-LUHU WE JEHDIHI ‘ILA ‘ADHABI SA’IR
22.5: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘IN KUNTUM FI RAJBIN MINEL-BE’THI FE’INNA HALEKNAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME MIN ‘ALEKATIN THUMME MIN MUDGATIN MUHALLEKATIN WE GAJRI MUHALLEKATIN LINUBEJJINE LEKUM WE NUKIRRU FIL-’ERHAMI MA NESHA’U ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN THUMME NUHRIXHUKUM TIFLËN THUMME LITEBLUGU ‘ESHUDDEKUM WE MINKUM MEN JUTEWEFFE WE MINKUM MEN JURADDU ‘ILA ‘ERDHELIL-’UMURI LIKEJLA JA’LEME MIN BE’DI ‘ILMIN SHEJ’ËN WE TERAL-’ERDA HAMIDETEN FE’IDHA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHAL-MA’E EHTEZZET WE RABET WE ‘ENBETET MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN BEHIXHI
22.6: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNEHU JUHJIL-MEWTA WE ‘ENNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
22.7: WE ‘ENNE SA’ATE ‘ATIJETUN LA RAJBE FIHË WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE JEB’ATHU MEN FIL-KUBUR
22.8: WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI LEHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE LA HUDAN WE LA KITABIN MUNIRI
22.9: THANIJE ‘ITFIHI LIJUDIL-LE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI LEHU FI DUN'JA HIZJUN WE NUDHIKUHU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
22.10: DHALIKE BIMA KADDEMET JEDAKE WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE LEJSE BIDHAL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
22.11: WE MINE NASI MEN JA’BUDU LLAHE ‘ALA HERFIN FE’IN ‘ESABEHU HAJRUN ETME’ENNE BIHI WE ‘IN ‘ESABET/HU FITNETUN ENKALEBE ‘ALA WEXHHIHI HASIRA DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATE DHALIKE HUWEL-HUSRANUL-MUBIN
22.12: JED’U MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JEDURRUHU WE MA LA JENFE’UHU DHALIKE HUWE DALELUL-BE’ID
22.13: JED’U LEMEN DERRUHU ‘EKRABU MIN NEF’IHI LEBI’SAL-MEWLA WE LEBI’SAL-’ASHIR
22.14: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JURID
22.15: MEN KANE JEDHUNNU ‘EN LEN JENSURAHU ALLAHU FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI FELJEMDUD BISEBEBIN ‘ILA SEMA’I THUMME LIJEKTA’ FELJENDHUR HEL JUDH/HIBENNE KEJDUHU MA JEGIDH
22.16: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNAHU ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE JEHDI MEN JURID
22.17: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WEL-LEDHINE HADU WE SABI’INE WE NESARA WEL-MEXHUSE WEL-LEDHINE ‘ESHRAKU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEFSILU BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
22.18: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE JESXHUDU LEHU MEN FI SEMAWETI WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI WE SHEMSU WEL-KAMERU WE NUXHUMU WEL-XHIBELU WE SHEXHERU WE DEWEBBU WE KETHIRUN MINE NASI WE KETHIRUN HAKKA ‘ALEJHIL-’ADHABU WE MEN JUHINI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN MUKRIMIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEF’ALU MA JESHA’
22.19: HEDHANI HASMANI EHTESEMU FI RABBIHIM FE-EL-LEDHINE KEFERU KUTTI’AT LEHUM THIJABUN MIN NARIN JUSEBBU MIN FEWKI RU’USIHIMUL-HEMIM
22.20: JUSHERU BIHI MA FI BUTUNIHIM WEL-XHULUD
22.22: KUL-LEMA ‘ERADU ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINHA MIN GAMMIN ‘U’IDU FIHË WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HERIK
22.23: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU JUHELLEWNE FIHË MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE LU’ULU’UËN WE LIBESUHUM FIHË HERIRU
22.24: WE HUDU ‘ILAT-TEJJIBI MINEL-KAWLI WE HUDU ‘ILA SIRATIL-HEMID
22.25: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE JESUDDUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WEL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMIL-LEDHI XHE’ALNAHU LILNNASI SEWE’ENL-’AKIFU FIHI WEL-BEDI WE MEN JURID FIHI BI’ILHADIN BIDHULMIN NUDHIKHU MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
22.26: WE ‘IDH BEWWE’NA LI’IBRAHIME MEKANAL-BEJTI ‘EN LA TUSHRIK BI SHEJ’ËN WE TEHHIR BEJTIJE LILTTA’IFINE WEL-KA’IMINE WE RUKKA’I SUXHUD
22.27: WE ‘EDHDHIN FI NASI BIL-HEXHXHI JE’TUKE RIXHALËN WE ‘ALA KUL-LI DAMIRIN JE’TINE MIN KUL-LI FEXHXHIN ‘AMIKI
22.28: LIJESH/HEDU MENAFI’A LEHUM WE JEDHKURU ESMALLAHI FI ‘EJJAMIN MA’LUMATIN ‘ALA MA RAZEKAHUM MIN BEHIMETIL-’EN’AM FEKULU MINHA WE ‘ET’IMUL-BE’ISAL-FEKIR
22.29: THUMME LIJEKDU TEFETHEHUM WE LIUFU NUDHURAHUM WE LIETTEWWEFU BIL-BEJTIL-’ATIK
22.30: DHALIKE WE MEN JU’ADHDHIM HURUMATI LEHI FEHUWE HAJRUN LEHU ‘INDE RABBIHI WE ‘UHIL-LET LEKUMUL-’EN’AM ‘IL-LA MA JUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FEXHTENIBU RIXHSE MINEL-’EWTHANI WE EXHTENIBU KAWLE EZ-ZUR
22.31: HUNEFE’E LIL-LAHI GAJRA MUSHRIKINE BIHI WE MEN JUSHRIK BIL-LAHI FEKE’ENNEMA HARRA MINE SEMA’I FETEHTEFUHUT-TEJRU ‘EW TEHWI BIHI RIHU FI MEKANIN SEHIKI
22.32: DHALIKE WE MEN JU’ADHDHIM SHA’A’IRALLAHI FE’INNEHA MIN TEKWEL-KULUB
22.33: LEKUM FIHË MENAFI’U ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN THUMME MEHILLUHA ‘ILAL-BEJTIL-’ATIK
22.34: WE LIKUL-LI ‘UMMETIN XHE’ALNA MENSEKËN LIJEDHKURU ESMALLAHI ‘ALA MA RAZEKAHUM MIN BEHIMETIL-’EN’AMI FE’ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN FELEHU ‘ESLIMU WE BESHSHIRIL-MUHBITIN
22.35: EL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEXHILET KULUBUHUM WE SABIRINE ‘ALA MA ‘ESABEHUM WEL-MUKIMI SELËTI WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
22.36: WEL-BUDNE XHE’ALNAHA LEKUM MIN SHA’A’IRI LEHI LEKUM FIHË HAJRUN FEDHKURU ESMALLAHI ‘ALEJHA SEWEFFE FE’IDHA WEXHEBET XHUNUBUHA FEKULU MINHA WE ‘ET’IMUL-KANI’A WEL-MU’TERRA KEDHALIKE SEHHARNAHA LEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
22.37: LEN JENALA-LLAHE LUHUMUHA WE LA DIMA’UUHA WE LAKIN JENALUHUT-TEKWE MINKUM KEDHALIKE SEHHARAHA LEKUM LITUKEBBIRU LLAHE ‘ALA MA HEDAKUM WE BESHSHIRIL-MUHSININ
22.38: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDAFI’U ‘ANIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE HAWWENIN KEFURI
22.39: ‘UDHINE LIL-LEDHINE JUKATELUNE BI’ENNEHUM DHULIMU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA NESRIHIM LEKADIRU
22.40: EL-LEDHINE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIJARIHIM BIGAJRI HEKKIN ‘IL-LA ‘EN JAKULU RABBUNALLAHU WE LEWLA DEF’U LLAHI NASE BE’DEHUM BIBE’DIN LEHUDDIMET SEWEMI’U WE BIJA’UN WE SELEWETUN WE MESAXHIDU JUDHKERU FIHË ESMU LLAHI KETHIRAN WE LEJENSURANNAL-LAHU MEN JENSURUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEKAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
22.41: EL-LEDHINE ‘IN MEKKENNAHUM FIL-’ËRDI ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ATEW EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘EMERU BIL-MA’RUFI WE NEHEW ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE LIL-LEHI ‘AKIBETUL-’UMUR
22.42: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ADUN WE THEMUD
22.44: WE ‘ES'HABU MEDJENE WE KUDHDHIBE MUSA FE’EMLEJTU LILKEFIRINE THUMME ‘EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
22.45: FEKE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘EHLEKNAHA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN FEHIJE HAWIJETUN ‘ALA ‘URUSHIHA WE BI’RIN MU’ATTELETIN WE KASRIN MESHIDI
22.46: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FETEKUNE LEHUM KULUBUN JA’KILUNE BIHA ‘EW ‘ADHANUN JESMA’UNE BIHA FE’INNEHA LA TA’MAL-’EBSARU WE LAKIN TA’MAL-KULUBU AL-LETI FI SUDUR
22.47: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE LEN JUHLIFEL-LAHU WE’DEHU WE ‘INNE JEWMËN ‘INDE RABBIKE KE’ELFI SENETIN MIMMA TA’UDDUN
22.48: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘EMLEJTU LEHA WE HIJE DHALIMETUN THUMME ‘EHADHTUHA WE ‘ILEJJAL-MESIR
22.49: KUL JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNAMA ‘ENA LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
22.50: FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
22.52: WE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RASULIN WE LA NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA ‘IDHA TEMENNA ‘ELKA SHEJTANU FI ‘UMNIJETIHI FEJENSEHU ALLAHU MA JULKI SHEJTANU THUMME JUHKIMU LLAHU ‘AJATIHI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
22.53: LIJEXH’ALE MA JULKI SHEJTANU FITNETEN LIL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN WEL-KASIJETI KULUBUHUM WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEFI SHIKAKIN BE’IDI
22.54: WE LIJA’LEMEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE FEJU’UMINU BIHI FETUHBITE LEHU KULUBUHUM WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHADIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
22.55: WE LA JEZALUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FI MIRJETIN MINHU HATTE TE’TIJEHUMU SA’ATU BEGTETEN ‘EW JE’TIJEHUM ‘ADHABU JEWMIN ‘AKIMI
22.56: AL-MULKU JEWME’IDHIN LIL-LAHI JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FI XHENNATI NA’IM
22.57: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FE’ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
22.58: WEL-LEDHINE HAXHERU FI SEBILI -LEHI THUMME KUTILU ‘EW MATU LEJERZUKANNEHUMU LLAHU RIZKËN HESENËN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWE HAJRU RAZIKIN
22.59: LEJUDHILENNEHUM MUDHALËN JERDAWNEHU WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’ALIMUN HELIMU
22.60: DHALIKE WE MEN ‘AKABE BIMITHLI MA ‘UKIBE BIHI THUMME BUGIJE ‘ALEJHI LEJENSURANNEHU ALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’AFUWUN GAFURU
22.61: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
22.62: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNE MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI HUWEL-BETILU WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
22.63: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FETUSBIHUL-’ERDU MUHDERRATEN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LETIFUN HABIRU
22.64: LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEHUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
22.65: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FIL-’ËRDI WEL-FULKE TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BI’EMRIHI WE JUMSIKU SEMA’E ‘EN TEKA’A ‘ALEL-’ARDI ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIN-NASI LERA’UFUN RAHIMU

22.69: ALLAHU JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KUNTUM FIHI TEHTELIFUN

22.71: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LEM JUNEZZIL BIHI SULTANËN WE MA LEJSE LEHUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN NESIRI

22.73: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU DURIBE METHELUN FESTEMI’U LEHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI LEN JEHLUKU DHUBEBËN WE LEWI EXHTEMA’U LEHU WE ‘IN JESLUBHUMU EDH-DHUBEBU SHEJ’ËN LA JESTENKIDHUHU MINHU DA’UFET-TALIBU WEL-METLUB
22.74: MA KADERU LLAHE HAKKA KADRIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEKAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
22.75: ALLAHU JESTEFI MINEL-MELE’IKETI RUSULËN WE MINE NASI ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
22.76: JA’LEMU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
22.77: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ERKA’U WE ESXHUDU WE A’BUDU RABBEKUM WE EF’ALUL-HAJRA LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
22.78: WE XHAHIDU FI LEHI HAKKA XHIHADIHI HUWE EXHTEBEKUM WE MA XHE’ALE ‘ALEJKUM FI DINI MIN HERAXHIN MIL-LETE ‘EBIKUM ‘IBRAHIME HUWE SEMMAKUMUL-MUSLIMJNE MIN KABLU WE FI HADHA LIJEKUNE RASULU SHEHIDËN ‘ALEJKUM WE TEKUNU SHUHEDA’E ‘ALA NASI FE’EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE A’TESIMU BIL-LAHI HUWE MEWLAKUM FENI’MAL-MEWLA WE NI’ME NESIR

23.7: FEMENI EBTEGA WERA’E DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-’ADUN
23.12: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE MIN SULËLETIN MIN TINI
23.13: THUMME XHE’ALNAHU NUTFETEN FI KARARIN MEKINI
23.14: THUMME HALEKNA NUTFETE ‘ALEKATEN FEHALEKNAL-’ALEKATE MUDGATEN FEHALEKNAL-MUDGATE ‘IDHAMËN FEKESEWNAL-’IDHAME LEHMËN THUMME ‘ENSHE’NAHU HALKËN ‘AHARA FETEBERAKEL-LEHU ‘EHSENUL-HALIKIN
23.17: WE LEKAD HALEKNA FEWKAKUM SEB’A TERA’IKA WE MA KUNNA ‘ANIL-HALKI GAFILIN
23.18: WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN BIKADERIN FE’ESKENNAHU FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘INNA ‘ALA DHEHABIN BIHI LEKADIRUN
23.19: FE’ENSHE’NA LEKUM BIHI XHENNATIN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN LEKUM FIHË FEWEKIHU KETHIRATUN WE MINHA TE’KULUN
23.20: WE SHEXHERATEN TEHRUXHU MIN TURI SEJNA’E TENBUTU BID-DUHNI WE SIBGIN LIL’AKILIN
23.21: WE ‘INNE LEKUM FIL-’EN’AMI LA’IBRATEN NUSKIKUM MIMMA FI BUTUNIHA WE LEKUM FIHË MENAFI’U KETHIRATUN WE MINHA TE’KULUN
23.23: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
23.24: FEKALEL-MELE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KAWMIHI MA HADHA ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JURIDU ‘EN JETEFEDDELE ‘ALEJKUM WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LE’ENZELE MELE’IKETEN MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FI ‘ABE’INAL-’EWWELIN
23.25: ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN BIHI XHINNETUN FETERABBESU BIHI HATTE HINI
23.27: FE’EWHEJNA ‘ILEJHI ‘ENI ESNA’IL-FULKE BI’A’JUNINA WE WEHJINA FE’IDHË XHË’E ‘EMRUNA WE FERAT-TENNURU FESLUK FIHË MIN KUL-LIN ZEWXHEJNI ETHNEJNI WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA MEN SEBEKA ‘ALEJHIL-KAWLU MINHUM WE LA TUHATIBNI FIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘INNAHUM MUGRAKUN
23.28: FE’IDHA ESTEWEJTE ‘ENTE WE MEN ME’AKE ‘ALEL-FULKI FEKULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI NEXHXHANA MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
23.29: WE KUL RABBI ‘ENZILNI MUNZELËN MUBERAKËN WE ‘ENTE HAJRUL-MUNZILIN
23.30: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN WE ‘IN KUNNA LEMUBTELIN
23.32: FE’ERSELNA FIHIM RASULËN MINHUM ‘ENI A’BUDU LLAHE MA LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRUHU ‘EFELA TETTEKUN
23.33: WE KALEL-MELE’U MIN KAWMIHIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BILIKA’IL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ETRAFNAHUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA MA HADHA ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JE’KULU MIMMA TE’KULUNE MINHU WE JESHRABU MIMMA TESHRABUN
23.35: ‘EJA’IDUKUM ‘ENNEKUM ‘IDHA MITTUM WE KUNTUM TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘ENNEKUM MUHRAXHUN
23.37: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA DUN'JA NEMUTU WE NEHJA WE MA NAHNU BIMEB’UTHIN
23.38: ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN WE MA NAHNU LEHU BIMU’UMININ
23.41: FE’EHADHET/HUMU SEJHETU BIL-HAKKI FEXHE’ALNAHUM GUTHA’EN FEBU’DËN LILKAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
23.43: MA TESBIKU MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘EXHELEHA WE MA JESTE’HIRUN
23.44: THUMME ‘ERSELNA RUSULENA TETRA KUL-LE MA XHA’E ‘UMMETEN RASULUHA KEDHDHEBUHU FE’ETBE’NA BE’DEHUM BE’DËN WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘EHADITHE FEBU’DËN LIKAWMIN LA JU’UMINUN
23.45: THUMME ‘ERSELNA MUSA WE ‘EHAHU HARUNE BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
23.46: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FESTEKBERU WE KENU KAWMËN ‘ALIN
23.47: FEKALU ‘ENU’UMINU LIBESHERAJNI MITHLINA WE KAWMUHUMA LENA ‘ABIDUN
23.50: WE XHE’ALNA EBNE MERJEME WE ‘UMMEHU ‘AJETEN WE ‘AWEJNAHUMA ‘ILA RABWETIN DHATI KARARIN WE MA’INI
23.51: JA ‘EJJUHA RUSULU KULU MINET-TEJJIBETI WE A’MELU SALIHËN ‘INNI BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
23.52: WE ‘INNE HEDHIHI ‘UMMETUKUM ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN WE ‘ENA RABBUKUM FE ETTEKUN
23.53: FETEKATTA’U ‘EMRAHUM BEJNEHUM ZUBURAN KUL-LU HIZBIN BIMA LEDEJHIM FERIHUN
23.55: ‘EJEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEMA NUMIDDUHUM BIHI MIN MALIN WE BENIN
23.56: NUSARI’U LEHUM FIL-HAJRATI BEL LA JESH’URUN
23.60: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UTUNE MA ‘ATEW WE KULUBUHUM WE XHILETUN ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILA RABBIHIM RAXHI’UN
23.61: ‘ULË’IKE JUSARI’UNE FIL-HAJRATI WE HUM LEHA SABIKUN
23.62: WE LA NUKELLIFU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA WUS’AHA WE LEDEJNA KITABUN JENTIKU BIL-HAKKI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMU
23.63: BEL KULUBUHUM FI GAMRATIN MIN HADHA WE LEHUM ‘A’MALUN MIN DUNI DHALIKE HUM LEHA ‘AMILUN
23.69: ‘EM LEM JA’RIFU RASULEHUM FEHUM LEHU MUNKIRUN
23.70: ‘EM JAKULUNE BIHI XHINNETUN BEL XHA’EHUM BIL-HAKKI WE ‘EKTHERUHUM LILHEKKI KARIHUN
23.71: WE LEWI ETTEBE’AL-HEKKU ‘EHWE’EHUM LEFESEDETI SEMAWETU WEL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHINNE BEL ‘ETEJNAHUM BIDHIKRIHIM FEHUM ‘AN DHIKRIHIM MU’RIDUN
23.72: ‘EM TES’ELUHUM HARXHËN FEHARAXHU RABBIKE HAJRUN WE HUWE HAJRU RAZIKIN
23.74: WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI ‘ANI SIRATI LENAKIBUN
23.75: WE LEW RAHIMNAHUM WE KESHEFNA MA BIHIM MIN DURRIN LELEXHXHU FI TUG'JANIHIM JA’MEHUN
23.76: WE LEKAD ‘EHADHNAHUM BIL-’ADHABI FEMA ESTEKENU LIRABBIHIM WE MA JETEDERRA’UN
23.77: HATTE ‘IDHA FETEHNA ‘ALEJHIM BEBËN DHA ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDIN ‘IDHA HUM FIHI MUBLISUN
23.78: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’E LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
23.79: WE HUWEL-LEDHI DHERA’EKUM FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
23.80: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE LEHU EHTILAFUL-LEJLI WE NEHARI ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
23.82: KALU ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
23.83: LEKAD WU’IDNA NAHNU WE ‘ABE’UUNA HADHA MIN KABLU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
23.84: KUL LIMENIL-’ERDU WE MEN FIHË ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
23.86: KUL MEN RABBU SEMAWETI SEB’I WE RABBUL-’ARSHIL-’ADHIM
23.88: KUL MEN BIJEDIHI MELEKUTU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWE JUXHIRU WE LA JUXHARU ‘ALEJHI ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMU
23.91: MA ETTEHADHE-LLAHU MIN WELEDIN WE MA KANE ME’AHU MIN ‘ILEHIN ‘IDHËN LEDHEHEBE KUL-LU ‘ILEHIN BIMA HALEKA WE LE’ALA BE’DUHUM ‘ALA BE’DIN SUBHANALLAHI ‘AMMA JESIFUN
23.96: EDFE’ BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU SEJJI’ETE NAHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JESIFUN
23.97: WE KUL RABBI ‘A’UDHU BIKE MIN HEMEZATI SHEJATIN
23.100: LE’ALLI ‘A’MELU SALIHËN FIMA TERAKTU KEL-LE ‘INNEHA KELIMETUN HUWE KA’ILUHA WE MIN WERA’IHIM BERZEHUN ‘ILA JEWMI JUB’ATHUN
23.101: FE’IDHA NUFIHË FI SURI FELA ‘ENSABE BEJNEHUM JEWME’IDHIN WE LA JETESA’ELUN
23.103: WE MEN HAFFET MEWEZINUHU FE’ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM FI XHEHENNEME HALIDUN
23.104: TELFEHU WUXHUHEHUMU NARU WE HUM FIHË KALIHUN
23.106: KALU RABBENA GALEBET ‘ALEJNA SHIKWETUNA WE KUNNA KAWMËN DAL-LIN
23.108: KALE EHSE’U FIHË WE LA TUKELLIMUN
23.109: ‘INNEHU KANE FERIKUN MIN ‘IBEDI JAKULUNE RABBENA ‘AMANNA FEGFIR LENA WE ERHEMNA WE ‘ENTE HAJRU RAHIMIN
23.110: FETTEHADHTUMUHUM SIHRIJËN HATTE ‘ENSEWKUM DHIKRI WE KUNTUM MINHUM TEDHEKUN
23.113: KALU LEBITHNA JEWMËN ‘EW BE’DE JEWMIN FES’ELIL-’ADDIN
23.114: KALE ‘IN LEBITHTUM ‘IL-LA KALILËN LEW ‘ENNEKUM KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
23.117: WE MEN JED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA LA BURHANE LEHU BIHI FE’INNAMA HISABUHU ‘INDE RABBIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-KAFIRUN
23.118: WE KUL RABBI EGFIR WE ERHEM WE ‘ENTE HAJRU RAHIMIN

24.1: SURATUN ‘ENZELNAHA WE FERADNAHA WE ‘ENZELNA FIHË ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
24.2: EZ-ZANIJETU WE EZ-ZANI FEXHLIDU KUL-LE WEHIDIN MINHUMA MIA’ETE XHELDETIN WE LA TE’HUDHKUM BIHIMA RA’FETUN FI DINI LEHI ‘IN KUNTUM TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE LIESH/HED ‘ADHABEHUMA TA’IFETUN MINEL-MU’UMININ
24.3: EZ-ZANI LA JENKIHU ‘IL-LA ZANIJETEN ‘EW MUSHRIKETEN WE EZ-ZANIJETU LA JENKIHUHA ‘IL-LA ZANIN ‘EW MUSHRIKUN WE HURRIME DHALIKE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININ
24.4: WEL-LEDHINE JERMUNAL-MUHSENATI THUMME LEM JE’TU BI’ERBE’ATI SHUHEDA’E FEXHLIDUHUM THEMANINE XHELDETEN WE LA TEKBELU LEHUM SHEHADETEN ‘EBEDËN WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-FESIKUN
24.5: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE TABU MIN BE’DI DHALIKE WE ‘ESLEHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.6: WEL-LEDHINE JERMUNE ‘EZWEXHEHUM WE LEM JEKUN LEHUM SHUHEDA’U ‘IL-LA ‘ENFUSUHUM FESHEHADETU ‘EHEDIHIM ‘ERBE’U SHEHADATIN BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU LEMINE SADIKIN
24.8: WE JEDRA’U ‘ANHAL-’ADHABE ‘EN TESH/HEDE ‘ERBE’A SHEHADATIN BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU LEMINEL-KADHIBIN
24.10: WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE TEWWEBUN HEKIMU
24.11: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE XHA’U BIL-’IFKI ‘USBETUN MINKUM LA TEHSEBUHU SHERRAN LEKUM BEL HUWE HAJRUN LEKUM LIKUL-LI EMRI’IN MINHUM MA EKTESEBE MINEL-’ITHMI WEL-LEDHI TEWELLA KIBRAHU MINHUM LEHU ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.12: LEWLA ‘IDH SEMI’TUMUHU DHENNAL-MU’UMINUNE WEL-MU’UMINATU BI’ENFUSIHIM HAJRAN WE KALU HADHA ‘IFKUN MUBINU
24.13: LEWLA XHA’U ‘ALEJHI BI’ERBE’ATI SHUHEDA’E FE’IDH LEM JE’TU BISH-SHUHEDA’I FE’ULË’IKE ‘IND-ALLAHI HUMUL-KADHIBUN
24.14: WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI LEMESSEKUM FI MA ‘EFEDTUM FIHI ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.15: ‘IDH TELEKKAWNEHU BI’ELSINETIKUM WE TEKULUNE BI’EFWEHIKUM MA LEJSE LEKUM BIHI ‘ILMUN WE TEHSEBUNEHU HEJJINËN WE HUWE ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘ADHIMU
24.16: WE LEWLA ‘IDH SEMI’TUMUHU KULTUM MA JEKUNU LENA ‘EN NETEKELLEME BIHEDHA SUBHANEKE HADHA BUHTANUN ‘ADHIMU
24.17: JA’IDHUKUMU LLAHU ‘EN TA’UDU LIMITHLIHI ‘EBEDËN ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
24.18: WE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.19: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUHIBBUNE ‘EN TESHI’AL-FEHISHETU FIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ALIMUN FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU WE ‘ENTUM LA TA’LEMUN
24.20: WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE RA’UFUN RAHI
24.21: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEBI’U HUTUWETI SHEJTANI WE MEN JETTEBI’ HUTUWETI SHEJTANI FE’INNEHU JE’MURU BIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WE LEWLA FEDLU LLAHI ‘ALEJKUM WE RAHMETUHU MA ZEKA MINKUM MIN ‘EHEDIN ‘EBEDËN WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JUZEKKI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.22: WE LA JE’TELI ‘ULUL-FEDLI MINKUM WE SE’ATI ‘EN JU’UTU ‘ULIL-KURBE WEL-MESAKINE WEL-MUHAXHIRINE FI SEBILI -LEHI WE LIA’FU WE LIESFEHU ‘ALA TUHIBBUNE ‘EN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.23: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JERMUNAL-MUHSENATIL-GAFILATIL-MU’UMINATI LU’INU FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
24.24: JEWME TESH/HEDU ‘ALEJHIM ‘ELSINETUHUM WE ‘EJDIHIM WE ‘ERXHULUHUM BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
24.25: JEWME’IDHIN JUWEFFIHIMU LLAHU DINEHUMUL-HAKKA WE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-HEKKUL-MUBIN
24.26: AL-HABITHATU LILHABITHINE WEL-HABITHUNE LILHABITHATI WET-TEJJIBETU LILTTEJJIBINE WET-TEJJIBUNE LILTTEJJIBETI ‘ULË’IKE MUBERRA’UNE MIMMA JAKULUNE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
24.27: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEDHULU BUJUTËN GAJRA BUJUTIKUM HATTE TESTE’NISU WE TUSELLIMU ‘ALA ‘EHLIHA DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
24.28: FE’IN LEM TEXHIDU FIHË ‘EHEDËN FELA TEDHULUHA HATTE JU’UDHENE LEKUM WE ‘IN KILA LEKUM ERXHI’U FERXHI’U HUWE ‘EZKA LEKUM WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE ‘ALIMU
24.29: LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TEDHULU BUJUTËN GAJRA MESKUNETIN FIHË META’UN LEKUM WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA TUBDUNE WE MA TEKTUMUN
24.30: KUL LILMU’UMININE JEGUDDU MIN ‘EB'SARIHIM WE JEHFEDHU FURUXHEHUM DHALIKE ‘EZKA LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA JESNA’UN
24.31: WE KUL LILMU’UMINATI JEGDUDNE MIN ‘EBSARIHINNE WE JEHFEDHNE FURUXHEHUNNE WE LA JUBDINE ZINETEHUNNE ‘IL-LA MA DHEHERA MINHA WE LIEDRIBNE BIHUMURIHINNE ‘ALA XHUJUBIHINNE WE LA JUBDINE ZINETEHUNNE ‘IL-LA LIBU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘ABE’IHINNE ‘EW ‘ABE’I BU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘EBNA’IHINNE ‘EW ‘EBNA’I BU’ULETIHINNE ‘EW ‘IHWENIHINNE ‘EW BENI ‘IHWENIHINNE ‘EW BENI ‘EHAWETIHINNE ‘EW NISA’IHINNE ‘EW MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUNNE ‘EWIT-TABI’INE GAJRI ‘ULIL-’IRBETI MINE RIXHALI ‘EWIT-TIFLIL-LEDHINE LEM JEDHHERU ‘ALA ‘AWRATI NISA’ WE LA JEDRIBNE BI’ERXHULIHINNE LIJU’LEME MA JUHFINE MIN ZINETIHINNE WE TUBU ‘ILA LLAHI XHEMI’ËN ‘EJJUHEL-MU’UMINUNE LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
24.32: WE ‘ENKIHUL-’EJAMA MINKUM WE SALIHINE MIN ‘IBEDIKUM WE ‘IMA’IKUM ‘IN JEKUNU FUKARA’E JUGNIHIMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WA-LLAHU WESI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.33: WE LIESTA’FIFIL-LEDHINE LA JEXHIDUNE NIKAHËN HATTE JUGNIJEHUMU LLAHU MIN FEDLIHI WEL-LEDHINE JEBTEGUNAL-KITABE MIMMA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM FEKATIBUHUM ‘IN ‘ALIMTUM FIHIM HAJRAN WE ‘ATUHUM MIN MALI LEHIL-LEDHI ‘ATAKUM WE LA TUKRIHU FETEJATIKUM ‘ALEL-BIGA’I ‘IN ‘ERADNE TEHESSUNËN LITEBTEGU ‘ARADAL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE MEN JUKRIHHUNNE FE’INNALL-LLAHE MIN BE’DI ‘IKRAHIHINNE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.34: WE LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKUM ‘AJATIN MUBEJJINETIN WE METHELËN MINEL-LEDHINE KHALAW MIN KABLIKUM WE MEW’IDHETEN LILMUTTAKIN
24.35: ALLAHU NURU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI METHELU NURIHI KEMISHKËTIN FIHË MISBEHUNL-MISBEHU FI ZUXHAXHETIN EZ-ZUXHAXHETU KE’ENNEHA KEWKEBUN DURRIJUN JUKADU MIN SHEXHERATIN MUBERAKETIN ZEJTUNIETIN LA SHERKIJETIN WE LA GARBIJETIN JEKADU ZEJTUHA JUDI’U WE LEW LEM TEMSES/HU NARUN NURUN ‘ALA NURIN JEHDI ALLAHU LINURIHI MEN JESHA’U WE JEDRIBU ALLAHUL-’EMTHALE LILNNASI WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
24.36: FI BUJUTIN ‘EDHINAL-LAHU ‘EN TURFE’A WE JUDHKERA FIHË ESMUHU JUSEBBIHU LEHU FIHË BIL-GUDUWI WEL-’ASAL
24.37: RIXHALUN LA TULHIHIM TIXHARATUN WE LA BEJ’UN ‘AN DHIKRI LEHI WE ‘IKAMI SELËTI WE ‘ITA’I EZ-ZEKËTI JEHAFUNE JEWMËN TETEKAL-LEBU FIHIL-KULUBU WEL-’EBSAR
24.38: LIJEXHZIJEHUMU LLAHU ‘EHSENE MA ‘AMILU WE JEZIDEHUM MIN FEDLIHI WA-LLAHU JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U BIGAJRI HISABI
24.39: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘A’MALUHUM KESERABIN BIKI’ATIN JEHSEBUHU EDH-DHEM’ANU MA’EN HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’EHU LEM JEXHID/HU SHEJ’ËN WE WEXHEDA-LLAHE ‘INDEHU FEWEFFEHU HISABEHU WA-LLAHU SERI’UL-HISAB
24.40: ‘EW KEDHULUMATIN FI BEHRIN LUXHXHIJIN JEGSHAHU MEWXHUN MIN FEWKIHI MEWXHUN MIN FEWKIHI SEHABUN DHULUMATUN BE’DUHA FEWKA BE’DIN ‘IDHA ‘EHRAXHE JEDEHU LEM JEKED JERAHA WE MEN LEM JEXH’ALI ALLAHU LEHU NURAN FEMA LEHU MIN NURI
24.41: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE JUSEBBIHU LEHU MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WET-TEJRU SAFFETIN KUL-LUN KAD ‘ALIME SALATEHU WE TESBIHEHU WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIMA JEF’ALUN
24.42: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘ILA LLAHIL-MESIR
24.43: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE JUZXHI SEHABËN THUMME JU’UELLIFU BEJNEHU THUMME JEXH’ALUHU RUKAMËN FETERAL-WEDKA JEHRUXHU MIN HILALIHI WE JUNEZZILU MINE SEMA’I MIN XHIBELIN FIHË MIN BERADIN FEJUSIBU BIHI MEN JESHA’U WE JESRIFUHU ‘AN MEN JESHA’U JEKADU SENA BERKIHI JEDH/HEBU BIL-’EBSAR
24.44: JUKALLIBU ALLAHUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LA’IBRATEN LI’WLIL-’EBSAR
24.45: WA-LLAHU HALEKA KUL-LE DABBETIN MIN MA’IN FEMINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA BETNIHI WE MINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA RIXHLEJNI WE MINHUM MEN JEMSHI ‘ALA ‘ERBE’IN JEHLUKU ALLAHU MA JESHA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
24.46: LEKAD ‘ENZELNA ‘AJATIN MUBEJJINETIN WA-LLAHU JEHDI MEN JESHA’U ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
24.47: WE JAKULUNE ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WE BIR-RASULI WE ‘ETA’NA THUMME JETEWELLA FERIKUN MINHUM MIN BE’DI DHALIKE WE MA ‘ULË’IKE BIL-MU’UMININ
24.48: WE ‘IDHA DU’U ‘ILA LLAHI WE RASULIHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM MU’RIDUN
24.50: ‘EFI KULUBIHIM MARADUN ‘EM ERTABU ‘EM JEHAFUNE ‘EN JEHIFEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE RASULUHU BEL ‘ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMU
24.51: ‘INNAMA KANE KAWLAL-MU’UMININE ‘IDHA DU’U ‘ILA LLAHI WE RASULIHI LIJEHKUME BEJNEHUM ‘EN JAKULU SEMI’NA WE ‘ETA’NA WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
24.52: WE MEN JUTI’I LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE JEHSHA-LLAHE WE JETTEKHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-FE’IZUN
24.53: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN ‘EMERTEHUM LEJEHRUXHUNNE KUL LA TUKSIMU TA’ATUN MA’RUFETUN ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
24.54: KUL ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEW FE’INNAMA ‘ALEJHI MA HUMMILE WE ‘ALEJKUM MA HUMMILTUM WE ‘IN TUTI’UHU TEHTEDU WE MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
24.55: WE’ADAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEJESTEHLIFENNEHUM FIL-’ËRDI KAMA ESTEHLEFEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE LEJUMEKKINENNE LEHUM DINEHUMUL-LEDHI ERTEDA LEHUM WE LEJUBEDDILENNEHUM MIN BE’DI HAWFIHIM ‘EMNËN JA’BUDUNENI LA JUSHRIKUNE BI SHEJ’ËN WE MEN KEFERA BE’DE DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-FESIKUN
24.56: WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
24.57: LA TEHSEBENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MU’XHIZINE FIL-’ËRDI WE ME’WEHUMU NARU WE LEBI’SAL-MESIR
24.58: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LIJESTE’DHINKUMUL-LEDHINE MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM WEL-LEDHINE LEM JEBLUGUL-HULUME MINKUM THALATHE MERRATIN MIN KABLI SELËTIL-FEXHRI WE HINE TEDA’UNE THIJA BEKUM MINE EDH-DHEHIRATI WE MIN BE’DI SELËTIL-’ISHA’I THALATHU ‘AWRATIN LEKUM LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM WE LA ‘ALEJHIM XHUNAHUN BE’DEHUNNE TEWWEFUNE ‘ALEJKUM BE’DUKUM ‘ALA BE’DIN KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJA TI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.59: WE ‘IDHA BELEGAL-’ETFELU MINKUMUL-HULUME FELJESTE’DHINU KAMA ESTE’DHENEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
24.60: WEL-KAWE’IDU MINE NISA’L-LATI LA JERXHUNE NIKAHËN FELEJSE ‘ALEJHINNE XHUNAHUN ‘EN JEDA’NE THIJABEHUNNE GAJRA MUTEBERRIXHATIN BIZINETIN WE ‘EN JESTA’FIFNE HAJRUN LEHUNNE WA-LLAHU SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
24.61: LEJSE ‘ALEL-’A’MA HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-’A’RAXHI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-MERIDI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EN TE’KULU MIN BUJUTIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘ABE’IKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘UMMEHATIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘IHWENIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘EHAWETIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘A’MAMIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘AMMATIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI ‘EHWELIKUM ‘EW BUJUTI HALATIKUM ‘EW MA MELEKTUM MEFETIHEHU ‘EW SEDIKIKUM LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN ‘EN TE’KULU XHEMI’ËN ‘EW ‘ESHTATËN FE’IDHA DEHALTUM BUJUTËN FESELLIMU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIKUM TEHIJETEN MIN ‘INDI LEHI MUBERAKETEN TEJJIBETEN KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ALLAHU LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
24.62: ‘INNAMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘IDHA KENU ME’AHU ‘ALA ‘EMRIN XHAMI’IN LEM JEDH/HEBU HATTE JESTE’DHINUHU ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESTE’DHINUNEKE ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI FE’IDHA ESTE’DHENUKE LIBE’DI SHE’NIHIM FE’DHEN LIMEN SHI’TE MINHUM WE ESTEGFIR LEHUMU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
24.63: LA TEXH’ALU DU’A’E RASULI BEJNEKUM KEDU’A’I BE’DIKUM BE’DËN KAD JA’LEMU LLAHUL-LEDHINE JETESELLELUNE MINKUM LIWEDHËN FELJEHDHERIL-LEDHINE JUHALIFUNE ‘AN ‘EMRIHI ‘EN TUSIBEHUM FITNETUN ‘EW JUSIBEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
24.64: ‘ALA ‘INNE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KAD JA’LEMU MA ‘ENTUM ‘ALEJHI WE JEWME JURXHA’UNE ‘ILEJHI FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU

25.2: EL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LEM JETTEHIDH WELEDËN WE LEM JEKUN LEHU SHERIKUN FIL-MULKI WE HALEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN FEKADDERAHU TEKDIRA
25.3: WE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN LA JEHLUKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE HUM JUHLEKUNE WE LA JEMLIKUNE LI’NFUSIHIM DERRAN WE LA NEF’ËN WE LA JEMLIKUNE MEWTËN WE LA HEJËTEN WE LA NUSHURA
25.4: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘IFKUN EFTERAHU WE ‘A’ANEHU ‘ALEJHI KAWMUN ‘AHARUNE FEKAD XHA’U DHULMËN WE ZURA
25.5: WE KALU ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELINE EKTETEBEHA FEHIJE TUMLA ‘ALEJHI BUKRATEN WE ‘ESILË
25.6: KUL ‘ENZELEHUL-LEDHI JA’LEMU SIRRA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘INNEHU KANE GAFURAN RAHIMË
25.7: WE KALU MALI HADHA RASULI JE’KULUT-TA’AME WE JEMSHI FIL-’ESWEKI LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJHI MELEKUN FEJEKUNE ME’AHU NEDHIRA
25.8: ‘EW JULKA ‘ILEJHI KENZUN ‘EW TEKUNU LEHU XHENNETUN JE’KULU MINHA WE KALE EDH-DHALIMUNE ‘IN TETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA RAXHULËN MESHURA
25.9: ENDHUR KEJFE DERABU LEKAL-’EMTHALE FEDELLU FELA JESTETI’UNE SEBILË
25.10: TEBERAKEL-LEDHI ‘IN SHA’E XHE’ALE LEKE HAJRAN MIN DHALIKE XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE JEXH’AL LEKE KUSURA
25.11: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIS-SA’ATI WE ‘A’TEDNA LIMEN KEDHDHEBE BIS-SA’ATI SA’IRA
25.12: ‘IDHA RA’ET/HUM MIN MEKANIN BE’IDIN SEMI’U LEHA TEGAJJUDHËN WE ZEFIRA
25.13: WE ‘IDHA ‘ULKU MINHA MEKANËN DEJJIKËN MUKARRANINE DE’AW HUNALIKE THUBURA
25.14: LA TED’UL-JEWME THUBURAN WEHIDËN WE ED’U THUBURAN KETHIRA
25.15: KUL ‘EDHELIKE HAJRUN ‘EM XHENNETUL-HULDI AL-LETI WU’IDAL-MUTTEKUNE KANET LEHUM XHEZA’EN WE MESIRA
25.16: LEHUM FIHË MA JESHA’UNE HALIDINE KANE ‘ALA RABBIKE WE’DËN MES’ULË
25.17: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM WE MA JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI FEJAKULU ‘E’ENTUM ‘EDLELTUM ‘IBEDI HA’UULË’ ‘EM HUM DELLU SEBIL
25.18: KALU SUBHANEKE MA KANE JENBEGI LENA ‘EN NETTEHIDHE MIN DUNIKE MIN ‘EWLIJA’E WE LAKIN METTA’TEHUM WE ‘ABE’EHUM HATTE NESU EDH-DHIKRA WE KENU KAWMËN BURA
25.19: FEKAD KEDHDHEBUKUM BIMA TEKULUNE FEMA TESTETI’UNE SERFËN WE LA NESRAN WE MEN JEDHLIM MINKUM NUDHIKHU ‘ADHABËN KEBIRA
25.20: WE MA ‘ERSELNA KABLEKE MINEL-MURSELINE ‘IL-LA ‘INNAHUM LEJE’KULUNET-TA’AME WE JEMSHUNE FIL-’ESWEKI WE XHE’ALNA BE’DEKUM LIBE’DIN FITNETEN ‘ETESBIRUNE WE KANE RABBUKE BESIRA
25.21: WE KALEL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE LIKA’ENA LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJNAL-MELE’IKETU ‘EW NERA RABBENA LEKADI ESTEKBERU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘ATEW ‘UTUWËN KEBIRA
25.22: JEWME JERAWNAL-MELE’IKETE LA BUSHRA JEWME’IDHIN LILMUXHRIMINE WE JAKULUNE HIXHRAN MEHXHURA
25.23: WE KADIMNA ‘ILA MA ‘AMILU MIN ‘AMELIN FEXHE’ALNAHU HEBE’EN MENTHURA
25.25: WE JEWME TESHAKKAKU SEMA’U BIL-GAMAMI WE NUZZILAL-MELE’IKETU TENZILË
25.26: AL-MULKU JEWME’IDHINL-HEKKU LILRRAHMENI WE KANE JEWMËN ‘ALEL-KEFIRINE ‘ASIRA
25.27: WE JEWME JE’ADDU EDH-DHALIMU ‘ALA JEDEJHI JAKULU JA LEJTENI ETTEHADHTU ME’A RASULI SEBILË
25.28: JA WEJLETI LEJTENI LEM ‘ETTEHIDH FULËNËN HALILË
25.29: LEKAD ‘EDAL-LENI ‘ANI EDH-DHIKRI BE’DE ‘IDH XHA’ENI WE KANE SHEJTANU LIL’INSANI HADHULË
25.30: WE KALE RASULU JA RABBI ‘INNE KAWMI ETTEHADHU HADHAL-KUR’ANE MEHXHURA
25.31: WE KEDHELIKE XHE’ALNA LIKUL-LI NEBIJIN ‘ADUWËN MINEL-MUXHRIMINE WE KEFE BIRABBIKE HADIËN WE NESIRA
25.32: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWLA NUZZILE ‘ALEJHIL-KUR’ANU XHUMLETEN WEHIDETEN KEDHALIKE LINUTHEBBITE BIHI FU’UADEKE WE RATTELNAHU TERTILË
25.33: WE LA JE’TUNEKE BIMETHELIN ‘IL-LA XHI’NAKE BIL-HAKKI WE ‘EHSENE TEFSIRA
25.34: EL-LEDHINE JUHSHERUNE ‘ALA WUXHUHIHIM ‘ILA XHEHENNEME ‘ULË’IKE SHERRUN MEKANËN WE ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.35: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE WE XHE’ALNA ME’AHU ‘EHAHU HARUNE WEZIRA
25.36: FEKULNA EDH/HEBE ‘ILAL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA FEDEMMERNAHUM TEDMIRA
25.37: WE KAWME NUHIN LEMMA KEDHDHEBU RUSULE ‘EGRAKNAHUM WE XHE’ALNAHUM LILNNASI ‘AJETEN WE ‘A’TEDNA LILDHDHALIMINE ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
25.38: WE ‘ADËN WE THEMUDE WE ‘ESHABE RASSI WE KURUNËN BEJNE DHALIKE KETHIRA
25.39: WE KULLËN DERABNA LEHUL-’EMTHALE WE KULLËN TEBBERNA TETBIRA
25.40: WE LEKAD ‘ETEW ‘ALEL-KARJETI AL-LETI ‘UMTIRAT METERA SEW’I ‘EFELEM JEKUNU JERAWNEHA BEL KENU LA JERXHUNE NUSHURA
25.41: WE ‘IDHA R’EWKE ‘IN JETTEHIDHUNEKE ‘IL-LA HUZUEN ‘EHEDHEL-LEDHI BE’ATHAL-LAHU RASULË
25.42: ‘IN KADE LEJUDIL-LUNA ‘AN ‘ALIHETINA LEWLA ‘EN SEBERNA ‘ALEJHA WE SEWFE JA’LEMUNE HINE JERAWNAL-’ADHABE MEN ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.43: ‘ERA’EJTE MENI ETTEHADHE ‘ILEHEHU HEWEHU ‘EFE’ENTE TEKUNU ‘ALEJHI WE KILË
25.44: ‘EM TEHSEBU ‘ENNE ‘EKTHERAHUM JESMA’UNE ‘EW JA’KILUNE ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA KAL’EN’AM BEL HUM ‘EDELLU SEBILË
25.45: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILA RABBIKE KEJFE MEDDE EDH-DHIL-LE WE LEW SHA’E LEXHE’ALEHU SAKINËN THUMME XHE’ALNA SHEMSE ‘ALEJHI DELILË
25.47: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LIBESËN WE NEWME SUBETËN WE XHE’ALE NEHARA NUSHURA
25.48: WE HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RIJAHE BUSHRAN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN TEHURA
25.49: LINUHJIJE BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN WE NUSKIJEHU MIMMA HALEKNA ‘EN’AMËN WE ‘ENASIJE KETHIRA
25.50: WE LEKAD SERRAFNAHU BEJNEHUM LIJEDHDHEKKERU FE’EBE ‘EKTHERU NASI ‘IL-LA KUFURA
25.51: WE LEW SHI’NA LEBE’ATHNA FI KUL-LI KARJETIN NEDHIRA
25.52: FELA TUTI’IL-KEFIRINE WE XHAHID/HUM BIHI XHIHADËN KEBIRA
25.53: WE HUWEL-LEDHI MERAXHAL-BEHRAJNI HADHA ‘ADHBUN FURATUN WE HEDHA MILHUN ‘UXHAXHUN WE XHE’ALE BEJNEHUMA BERZEHËN WE HIXHRAN MEHXHURA
25.54: WE HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA MINEL-MA’I BESHERAN FEXHE’ALEHU NESEBËN WE SIHRAN WE KANE RABBUKE KADIRA
25.55: WE JA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI MA LA JENFE’UHUM WE LA JEDURRUHUM WE KANAL-KAFIRU ‘ALA RABBIHI DHEHIRA
25.57: KUL MA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’E ‘EN JETTEHIDHE ‘ILA RABBIHI SEBILË
25.58: WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALEL-HEJJIL-LEDHI LA JEMUTU WE SEBBIH BIHEMDIHI WE KEFE BIHI BIDHUNUBI ‘IBEDIHI HABIRA
25.59: EL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI RAHMANU FES’EL BIHI HABIRA
25.60: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM ESXHUDU LILRRAHMENI KALU WE MA RAHMANU ‘ENESXHUDU LIMA TE’MURUNA WE ZADEHUM NUFURA
25.61: TEBERAKEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE FI SEMA’I BURUXHËN WE XHE’ALE FIHË SIRAXHËN WE KAMERAN MUNIRA
25.62: WE HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEL-LEJLE WE NEHARA HILFETEN LIMEN ‘ERADE ‘EN JEDHDHEKKERA ‘EW ‘ERADE SHUKURA
25.63: WE ‘IBEDU RAHMANIL-LEDHINE JEMSHUNE ‘ALEL-’ARDI HEWNËN WE ‘IDHA HATEBEHUMUL-XHAHILUNE KALU SALAMË
25.64: WEL-LEDHINE JEBITUNE LIRABBIHIM SUXHXHEDËN WE KIJAMË
25.65: WEL-LEDHINE JAKULUNE RABBENA ESRIF ‘ANNA ‘ADHABE XHEHENNEME ‘INNE ‘ADHABEHA KANE GARAMË
25.67: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA ‘ENFEKU LEM JUSRIFU WE LEM JEKTURU WE KANE BEJNE DHALIKE KAWEMË
25.68: WEL-LEDHINE LA JED’UNE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA WE LA JEKTULUNE NEFSAL-LETI HERRAMAL-LAHU ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE LA JEZNUNE WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE JELKA ‘ETHAMË
25.69: JUDA’AF LEHUL-’ADHABU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE JEHLUD FIHI MUHANË
25.70: ‘IL-LA MEN TABE WE ‘AMANA WE ‘AMILE ‘AMELËN SALIHËN FE’ULË’IKE JUBEDDILU ALLAHU SEJJI’ATIHIM HESENATIN WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
25.71: WE MEN TABE WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’INNEHU JETUBU ‘ILA LLAHI METABË
25.72: WEL-LEDHINE LA JESH/HEDUNE EZ-ZURA WE ‘IDHA MERRU BIL-LEGWI MERRU KIRAMË
25.73: WEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKKIRU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM LEM JEHIRRU ‘ALEJHA SUMMËN WE ‘UMJANË
25.74: WEL-LEDHINE JAKULUNE RABBENA HEB LENA MIN ‘EZWEXHINA WE DHURRIJATINA KURRATE ‘A’JUNIN WE EXH’ALNA LILMUTTEKINE ‘IMAMË
25.75: ‘ULË’IKE JUXHZEWNAL-GURFETE BIMA SEBERU WE JULEKKAWNE FIHË TEHIJETEN WE SALAMË
25.76: HALIDINE FIHË HESUNET MUSTAKARRAN WE MUKAMË
25.77: KUL MA JA’BE’U BIKUM RABBI LEWLA DU’A’UUKUM FEKAD KEDHDHEBTUM FESEWFE JEKUNU LIZAMË

26.4: ‘IN NESHE’ NUNEZZIL ‘ALEJHIM MINE SEMA’I ‘AJETEN FEDHELLET ‘A’NAKUHUM LEHA HADI’IN
26.5: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN DHIKRIN MINE RAHMANI MUHDETHIN ‘IL-LA KENU ‘ANHU MU’RIDIN
26.6: FEKAD KEDHDHEBU FESEJE’TIHIM ‘ENBE’U MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
26.7: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILAL-’ARDI KEM ‘ENBETNA FIHË MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN KERIMI
26.8: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.10: WE ‘IDH NADA RABBUKE MUSA ‘ENI E’TIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
26.13: WE JEDIKU SEDRI WE LA JENTELIKU LISANI FE’ERSIL ‘ILA HARUN
26.15: KALE KEL-LE FEDH/HEBE BI’AJATINA ‘INNA ME’AKUM MUSTEMI’UN
26.18: KALE ‘ELEM NURABBIKE FINA WELIDËN WE LEBITHTE FINA MIN ‘UMURIKE SININ
26.19: WE FE’ALTE FE’LETEKAL-LETI FE’ALTE WE ‘ENTE MINEL-KEFIRIN
26.21: FEFERARTU MINKUM LEMMA HIFTUKUM FEWEHEBE LI RABBI HUKMËN WE XHE’ALENI MINEL-MURSELIN
26.24: KALE RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM MUKININ
26.28: KALE RABBUL-MESHRIKI WEL-MEGRIBI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM TA’KILUN
26.29: KALE LE’INI ETTEHADHTE ‘ILEHËN GAJRI LE’EXH’ALENNEKE MINEL-MESXHUNIN
26.31: KALE FE’TI BIHI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.33: WE NEZE’A JEDEHU FE’IDHA HIJE BEJDA’U LILNNADHIRIN
26.35: JURIDU ‘EN JUHRIXHEKUM MIN ‘ARDIKUM BISIHRIHI FEMADHA TE’MURUN
26.36: KALU ‘ERXHIHI WE ‘EHAHU WE EB’ATH FIL-MEDA’INI HASHIRIN
26.41: FELAMMA XHA’E SEHERATU KALU LIFIR’AWNE ‘E’INNE LENA LE’EXHRAN ‘IN KUNNA NAHNUL-GALIBIN
26.44: FE’ELKAW HIBELEHUM WE ‘ISIJEHUM WE KALU BI’IZZETI FIR’AWNE ‘INNA LENAHNUL-GALIBUN
26.45: FE’ELKA MUSA ‘ASAHU FE’IDHA HIJE TELKAFU MA JE’FIKUN
26.49: KALE ‘AMENTUM LEHU KABLE ‘EN ‘ADHENE LEKUM ‘INNEHU LEKEBIRUKUMUL-LEDHI ‘AL-LEMEKUMU SIHRA FELESEWFE TA’LEMUNE LE’UKATTI’ANNE ‘EJDIJEKUM WE ‘ERXHULEKUM MIN HILAFIN WE LE’USELLIBENNEKUM ‘EXHMA’IN
26.51: ‘INNA NETMA’U ‘EN JEGFIRA LENA RABBUNA HATAJANA ‘EN KUNNA ‘EWWELAL-MU’UMININ
26.63: FE’EWHEJNA ‘ILA MUSA ‘ENI EDRIB BI’ASAKAL-BEHRA FENFELEKA FEKANE KUL-LU FIRKIN KALTTEWDIL-’ADHIM
26.67: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.70: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MA TA’BUDUN
26.82: WEL-LEDHI ‘ETMA’U ‘EN JEGFIRA LI HATI’ETI JEWME DIN
26.83: RABBI HEB LI HUKMËN WE ‘ELHIKNI BIS-SALIHIN
26.84: WE EXH’AL LI LISANE SIDKIN FIL-’AHIRIN
26.85: WE EXH’ALNI MIN WERATHETI XHENNETI NA’IM
26.86: WE EGFIR LI’EBI ‘INNEHU KANE MINE DAL-LIN
26.88: JEWME LA JENFE’U MALUN WE LA BENUN
26.92: WE KILA LEHUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TA’BUDUN
26.93: MIN DUNI LEHI HEL JENSURUNEKUM ‘EW JENTESIRUN
26.103: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.112: KALE WE MA ‘ILMI BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
26.116: KALU LE’IN LEM TENTEHI JA NUHU LETEKUNENNE MINEL-MERXHUMIN
26.118: FEFTEH BEJNI WE BEJNEHUM FETHËN WE NEXHXHINI WE MEN MA’I MINEL-MU’UMININ
26.121: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.139: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHLEKNAHUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.148: WE ZURU’IN WE NEHLIN TEL’UHA HEDIMU
26.152: EL-LEDHINE JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ËRDI WE LA JUSLIHUN
26.154: MA ‘ENTE ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA FE’TI BI’AJETIN ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.155: KALE HEDHIHI NAKATUN LEHA SHIRBUN WE LEKUM SHIRBU JEWMIN MA’LUMI
26.156: WE LA TEMESSUHA BISU’IN FEJE’HUDHEKUM ‘ADHABU JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
26.158: FE’EHADHEHUMUL-’ADHABU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.166: WE TEDHERUNE MA HALEKA LEKUM RABBUKUM MIN ‘EZWEXHIKUM BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN ‘ADUN
26.167: KALU LE’IN LEM TENTEHI JA LUTU LETEKUNENNE MINEL-MUHRAXHIN
26.174: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.183: WE LA TEBHASU NASE ‘ESHJA’EHUM WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ËRDI MUFSIDIN
26.186: WE MA ‘ENTE ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA WE ‘IN NEDHUNNUKE LEMINEL-KADHIBIN
26.187: FE’ESKIT ‘ALEJNA KISEFËN MINE SEMA’I ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
26.189: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHEHUM ‘ADHABU JEWMI EDH-DHULLETI ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
26.190: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN WE MA KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MU’UMININ
26.202: FEJE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
26.208: WE MA ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN ‘IL-LA LEHA MUNDHIRUN
26.211: WE MA JENBEGI LEHUM WE MA JESTETI’UN
26.213: FELA TED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FETEKUNE MINEL-MU’ADHDHEBIN
26.215: WE EHFID XHENAHEKE LIMENI ETTEBE’AKE MINEL-MU’UMININ
26.227: ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE DHEKERU LLAHE KETHIRAN WE ENTESERU MIN BE’DI MA DHULIMU WE SEJA’LEMUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘EJJE MUNKALEBIN JENKALIBUN

27.3: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
27.4: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI ZEJJENNA LEHUM ‘A’MALEHUM FEHUM JA’MEHUN
27.5: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE LEHUM SU’UL-’ADHABI WE HUM FIL-’AHIRATI HUMUL-’EHSERUN
27.7: ‘IDH KALE MUSA LI’HLIHI ‘INNI ‘ANESTU NËRAN SE’ATIKUM MINHA BIHABERIN ‘EW ‘ATIKUM BISHIHABIN KABESIN LE’AL-LEKUM TESTELUN
27.8: FELAMMA XHA’EHA NUDIJE ‘EN BURIKE MEN FI NARI WE MEN HEWLEHA WE SUBHANALLAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
27.10: WE ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FELAMMA RA’AHA TEHTEZZU KE’ENNEHA XHANNUN WELLA MUDBIRAN WE LEM JU’AKKIB JA MUSA LA TEHAF ‘INNI LA JEHAFU LEDEJJAL-MURSELUN
27.11: ‘IL-LA MEN DHELEME THUMME BEDDELE HUSNËN BE’DE SU’IN FE’INNI GAFURUN RAHIMU
27.12: WE ‘EDHIL JEDEKE FI XHEJBIKE TEHRUXH BEJDA’E MIN GAJRI SU’IN FI TIS’I ‘AJATIN ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE KAWMIHI ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWMËN FESIKIN
27.13: FELAMMA XHA’ET/HUM ‘AJATUNA MUBSIRATEN KALU HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
27.14: WE XHEHEDU BIHA WE ESTEJKANET/HA ‘ENFUSUHUM DHULMËN WE ‘ULUWËN FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUFSIDIN
27.15: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE WE SULEJMANE ‘ILMËN WE KALEL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI FEDDELENA ‘ALA KETHIRIN MIN ‘IBEDIHIL-MU’UMININ
27.16: WE WERITHE SULEJMANU DAWUDE WE KALE JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘ULLIMNA MENTIKAT-TAJRI WE ‘UTINA MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘INNE HADHA LEHUWEL-FEDLUL-MUBIN
27.17: WE HUSHIRA LISULEJMANE XHUNUDUHU MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI WET-TAJRI FEHUM JUZA’UN
27.18: HATTE ‘IDHA ‘ETEW ‘ALA WEDI NEMLI KALET NEMLETUN JA ‘EJJUHA NEMLU EDHULU MESAKINEKUM LA JEHTIMENNEKUM SULEJMANU WE XHUNUDUHU WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
27.19: FETEBESSEME DAHIKËN MIN KAWLIHA WE KALE RABBI ‘EWZI’NI ‘EN ‘ESHKURA NI’METEKAL-LETI ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE WE ‘ALA WE E-DEJJE WE ‘EN ‘A’MELE SALIHËN TERDAHU WE ‘EDHILNI BIRAHMETIKE FI ‘IBEDIKE SALIHIN
27.20: WE TEFEKKADET-TEJRA FEKALE MA LI LA ‘ERAL-HUD/HUDE ‘EM KANE MINEL-GA’IBIN
27.21: LE’U’ADHDHIBENNEHU ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN ‘EW LE’EDHBEHENNEHU ‘EW LEJE’TIJENI BISULTANIN MUBINI
27.22: FEMEKETHE GAJRA BE’IDIN FEKALE ‘EHETTU BIMA LEM TUHIT BIHI WE XHI’TUKE MIN SEBE’IIN BINEBE’IIN JEKINI
27.23: ‘INNI WE XHEDTTU EMRA’ETEN TEMLIKUHUM WE ‘UTIJET MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE LEHA ‘ARSHUN ‘ADHIMU
27.24: WE XHEDTUHA WE KAWMEHA JESXHUDUNE LILSHSHEMSI MIN DUNI LEHI WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FESEDDEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI FEHUM LA JEHTEDUN
27.25: ‘ELLA JESXHUDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI JUHRIXHUL-HAB’E FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE JA’LEMU MA TUHFUNE WE MA TU’LINUN
27.28: EDH/HEB BIKITABI HADHA FE’ELKIH ‘ILEJHIM THUMME TEWELLE ‘ANHUM FENDHUR MADHA JERXHI’UN
27.30: ‘INNEHU MIN SULEJMANE WE ‘INNEHU BISMI LEHI AR-RAHMANI-RRAHIM
27.32: KALET JA ‘EJJUHEL-MELE’U ‘EFTUNI FI ‘EMRI MA KUNTU KATI’ATEN ‘EMRAN HATTE TESH/HEDUN
27.33: KALU NAHNU ‘ULU KUWETIN WE ‘ULU BE’SIN SHEDIDIN WEL-’EMRU ‘ILEJKI FENDHURI MADHA TE’MURIN
27.34: KALET ‘INNAL-MULUKE ‘IDHA DEHALU KARJETEN ‘EFSEDUHA WE XHE’ALU ‘A’IZZETE ‘EHLIHA ‘EDHIL-LETEN WE KEDHELIKE JEF’ALUN
27.35: WE ‘INNI MURSILETUN ‘ILEJHIM BIHEDIJETIN FENADHIRATUN BIME JERXHI’UL-MURSELUN
27.36: FELAMMA XHA’E SULEJMANE KALE ‘ETUMIDDUNENI BIMALIN FEMA ‘ATANIJAL-LAHU HAJRUN MIMMA ‘ATAKUM BEL ‘ENTUM BIHEDIJETIKUM TEFRAHUN
27.37: ERXHI’ ‘ILEJHIM FELENE’TIJENNEHUM BIXHUNUDIN LA KIBELE LEHUM BIHA WE LENUHRIXHENNEHUM MINHA ‘EDHIL-LETEN WE HUM SAGIRUN
27.38: KALE JA ‘EJJUHEL-MELE’U ‘EJJUKUM JE’TINI BI’ARSHIHA KABLE ‘EN JE’TUNI MUSLIMIN
27.39: KALE ‘IFRJTUN MINEL-XHINNI ‘ENA ‘ATIKE BIHI KABLE ‘EN TEKUME MIN MEKAMIKE WE ‘INNI ‘ALEJHI LEKAWIJUN ‘EMINU
27.40: KALEL-LEDHI ‘INDEHU ‘ILMUN MINEL-KITABI ‘ENA ‘ATIKE BIHI KABLE ‘EN JERTEDDE ‘ILEJKE TERFUKE FELAMMA RA’AHU MUSTEKIRRAN ‘INDEHU KALE HADHA MIN FEDLI RABBI LIJEBLUWENI ‘E’ESHKURU ‘EM ‘EKFURU WE MEN SHEKERA FE’INNAMA JESHKURU LINEFSIHI WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNE RABBI GANIJUN KERIMU
27.41: KALE NEKKIRU LEHA ‘ARSHEHA NENDHUR ‘ETEHTEDI ‘EM TEKUNU MINEL-LEDHINE LA JEHTEDUN
27.42: FELAMMA XHA’ET KILA ‘EHEKEDHA ‘ARSHUKI KALET KE’ENNEHU HUWE WE ‘UTINAL-’ILME MIN KABLIHA WE KUNNA MUSLIMIN
27.43: WE SEDDEHA MA KANET TA’BUDU MIN DUNI LEHI ‘INNEHA KANET MIN KAWMIN KEFIRIN
27.44: KILA LEHA EDHULI SERHE FELAMMA RA’ET/HU HESIBET/HU LUXHXHETEN WE KESHEFET ‘AN SAKAJHA KALE ‘INNEHU SERHUN MUMERRADUN MIN KAWERIRA KALET RABBI ‘INNI DHELEMTU NEFSI WE ‘ESLEMTU ME’A SULEJMANE LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
27.45: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA ‘ILA THEMUDE ‘EHAHUM SALIHËN ‘ENI A’BUDU LLAHE FE’IDHA HUM FERIKANI JEHTESIMUN
27.46: KALE JA KAWMI LIME TESTA’XHILUNE BIS-SEJJI’ETI KABLAL-HESENETI LEWLA TESTEGFIRUNA-LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
27.47: KALU ETTEJJERNA BIKE WE BIMEN ME’AKE KALE TA’IRUKUM ‘IND-ALLAHI BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN TUFTENUN
27.48: WE KANE FIL-MEDINETI TIS’ATU RAHTIN JUFSIDUNE FIL-’ËRDI WE LA JUSLIHUN
27.49: KALU TEKASEMU BIL-LAHI LENUBEJJITENNEHU WE ‘EHLEHU THUMME LENEKULENNE LIWELIJIHI MA SHEHIDNA MEHLIKE ‘EHLIHI WE ‘INNA LESADIKUN
27.50: WE MEKERU MEKRAN WE MEKERNA MEKRAN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
27.51: FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU MEKRIHIM ‘ENNA DEMMERNAHUM WE KAWMEHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
27.52: FETILKE BUJUTUHUM HAWIJETEN BIMA DHELEMU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKAWMIN JA’LEMUN
27.54: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘ETE’TUNAL-FEHISHETE WE ‘ENTUM TUBSIRUN
27.55: ‘E’INNEKUM LETE’TUNE RIXHALE SHEHWETEN MIN DUNI NISA’ BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN TEXHHELUN
27.56: FEMA KANE XHEWEBE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU ‘EHRIXHU ‘ALE LUTIN MIN KARJETIKUM ‘INNAHUM ‘UNASUN JETETEHHERUN
27.59: KULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI WE SALAMUN ‘ALA ‘IBEDIHIL-LEDHINE ESTEFE ‘AALLLEHU HAJRUN ‘EMMA JUSHRIKUN
27.60: ‘EMMEN HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE ‘ENZELE LEKUM MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ENBETNA BIHI HEDA’IKA DHATE BEHXHETIN MA KANE LEKUM ‘EN TUNBITU SHEXHERAHA ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI BEL HUM KAWMUN JA’DILUN
27.61: ‘EMMEN XHE’ALEL-’ERDA KARARAN WE XHE’ALE HILALEHA ‘ENHARAN WE XHE’ALE LEHA RAWESIJE WE XHE’ALE BEJNAL-BEHRAJNI HAXHIZËN ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
27.62: ‘EMMEN JUXHIBUL-MUDTERRA ‘IDHA DA’AHU WE JEKSHIFU SU’E WE JEXH’ALUKUM HULEFE’AL-’ARDI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN
27.63: ‘EMMEN JEHDIKUM FI DHULUMATIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI WE MEN JURSILU RIJAHE BUSHRAN BEJNE JEDEJ RAHMETIHI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI TA’ALELLAHU ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
27.64: ‘EMMEN JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU WE MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘E’ILEHUN ME’A ALLAHI KUL HATU BURHANEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
27.65: KUL LA JA’LEMU MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDIL-GAJBE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE MA JESH’URUNE ‘EJJANE JUB’ATHUN
27.66: BEL EDDARAKE ‘ILMUHUM FIL-’AHIRATI BEL HUM FI SHEKKIN MINHA BEL HUM MINHA ‘AMUN
27.67: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘E’IDHA KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘ABE’UUNA ‘E’INNA LEMUHRAXHUN
27.68: LEKAD WU’IDNA HADHA NAHNU WE ‘ABE’UUNA MIN KABLU ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
27.69: KUL SIRU FIL-’ËRDI FENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-MUXHRIMIN
27.70: WE LA TEHZEN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA TEKUN FI DEJKIN MIMMA JEMKURUN
27.71: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
27.72: KUL ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNE RADIFE LEKUM BE’DUL-LEDHI TESTA’XHILUN
27.73: WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JESHKURUN
27.74: WE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEJA’LEMU MA TUKINNU SUDURUHUM WE MA JU’LINUN
27.75: WE MA MIN GA’IBETIN FI SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
27.76: ‘INNE HADHAL-KUR’ANE JEKUSSU ‘ALA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘EKTHEREL-LEDHI HUM FIHI JEHTELIFUN
27.78: ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM BIHUKMIHI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-’ALIM
27.80: ‘INNEKE LA TUSMI’UL-MEWTA WE LA TUSMI’U SUMME DU’A’E ‘IDHA WE LLEW MUDBIRIN
27.81: WE MA ‘ENTE BIHADIL-’UMJI ‘AN DALELETIHIM ‘IN TUSMI’U ‘IL-LA MEN JU’UMINU BI’AJATINA FEHUM MUSLIMUN
27.82: WE ‘IDHA WEKA’AL-KAWLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘EHRAXHNA LEHUM DABBETEN MINEL-’ARDI TUKELLIMUHUM ‘ENNE NASE KENU BI’AJATINA LA JUKINUN
27.83: WE JEWME NEHSHURU MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN FEWXHËN MIMMEN JUKEDHDHIBU BI’AJATINA FEHUM JUZA’UN
27.84: HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’U KALE ‘EKEDHDHEBTUM BI’AJATI WE LEM TUHITU BIHA ‘ILMËN ‘EMMADHA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
27.85: WE WEKA’AL-KAWLU ‘ALEJHIM BIMA DHELEMU FEHUM LA JENTIKUN
27.86: ‘ELEM JERAW ‘ENNA XHE’ALNAL-LEJLE LIJESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRAN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
27.87: WE JEWME JUNFEHU FI SURI FEFEZI’A MEN FI SEMAWETI WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’-ALLAHU WE KUL-LUN ‘ETEWHU DAHIRIN
27.88: WE TERAL-XHIBELE TEHSEBUHA XHAMIDETEN WE HIJE TEMURRU MERRA SEHABI SUN’A ALLAHIL-LEDHI ‘ETKANE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘INNEHU HABIRUN BIMA TEF’ALUN
27.89: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU HAJRUN MINHA WE HUM MIN FEZA’IN JEWME’IDHIN ‘AMINUN
27.90: WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FEKUBBET WUXHUHUHUM FI NARI HEL TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
27.91: ‘INNAMA ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘A’BUDE RABBE HEDHIHIL-BELDETIL-LEDHI HERRAMEHA WE LEHU KUL-LU SHEJ’IN WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘EKUNE MINEL-MUSLIMIN
27.92: WE ‘EN ‘ETLUWEL-KUR’ANE FEMENI EHTEDA FE’INNAMA JEHTEDI LINEFSIHI WE MEN DAL-LE FEKUL ‘INNAMA ‘ENA MINEL-MUNDHIRIN
27.93: WE KULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI SEJURIKUM ‘AJATIHI FETA’RIFUNEHA WE MA RABBUKE BIGAFILIN ‘AMMA TA’MELUN

28.3: NETLU ‘ALEJKE MIN NEBE’I MUSA WE FIR’AWNE BIL-HAKKI LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
28.4: ‘INNE FIR’AWNE ‘ALA FIL-’ËRDI WE XHE’ALE ‘EHLEHA SHIJA’ËN JESTED’IFU TA’IFETEN MINHUM JUDHEBBIHU ‘EBNA’EHUM WE JESTEHJI NISA’EHUM ‘INNEHU KANE MINEL-MUFSIDIN
28.5: WE NURIDU ‘EN NEMUNNE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU FIL-’ËRDI WE NEXH’ALEHUM ‘E’IMMETEN WE NEXH’ALEHUMUL-WERITHIN
28.6: WE NUMEKKINE LEHUM FIL-’ËRDI WE NURIJE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE XHUNUDEHUMA MINHUM MA KENU JEHDHERUN
28.7: WE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILA ‘UMMI MUSA ‘EN ‘ARDI’IHI FE’IDHA HIFTI ‘ALEJHI FE’ELKIHI FIL-JEMMI WE LA TEHAFI WE LA TEHZENI ‘INNA RADDUHU ‘ILEJKI WE XHA’ILUHU MINEL-MURSELIN
28.8: FELTEKATEHU ‘ALU FIR’AWNE LIJEKUNE LEHUM ‘ADUWËN WE HEZENËN ‘INNE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE XHUNUDEHUMA KENU HATI’IN
28.9: WE KALET EMRA’ETU FIR’AWNE KURRATU ‘AJNIN LI WE LEKE LA TEKTULUHU ‘ASA ‘EN JENFE’ANA ‘EW NETTEHIDHEHU WELEDËN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
28.10: WE ‘ESBEHE FU’UADU ‘UMMI MUSA FERIGËN ‘IN KADET LETUBDI BIHI LEWLA ‘EN RABETNA ‘ALA KALBIHA LITEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
28.11: WE KALET LI’HTIHI KUSSIHI FEBESURAT BIHI ‘AN XHUNUBIN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
28.12: WE HERRAMNA ‘ALEJHIL-MERADI’A MIN KABLU FEKALET HEL ‘EDULLUKUM ‘ALA ‘EHLI BEJTIN JEKFULUNEHU LEKUM WE HUM LEHU NASIHUN
28.13: FERADEDNAHU ‘ILA ‘UMMIHI KEJ TEKARRA ‘AJNUHA WE LA TEHZENE WE LITA’LEME ‘ENNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
28.14: WE LEMMA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE ESTEWE ‘ATEJNAHU HUKMËN WE ‘ILMËN WE KEDHELIKE NEXHZIL-MUHSININ
28.15: WE DEHALEL-MEDINETE ‘ALA HINI GAFLETIN MIN ‘EHLIHA FEWEXHEDE FIHË RAXHULEJNI JEKTETILANI HADHA MIN SHI’ATIHI WE HEDHA MIN ‘ADUWIHI FESTEGATHEHUL-LEDHI MIN SHI’ATIHI ‘ALEL-LEDHI MIN ‘ADUWIHI FEWEKEZEHU MUSA FEKADA ‘ALEJHI KALE HADHA MIN ‘AMELI SHEJTANI ‘INNEHU ‘ADUWUN MUDILLUN MUBINU
28.16: KALE RABBI ‘INNI DHELEMTU NEFSI FEGFIR LI FEGAFERA LEHU ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
28.17: KALE RABBI BIMA ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE FELEN ‘EKUNE DHEHIRAN LILMUXHRIMIN
28.18: FE’ESBEHE FIL-MEDINETI HA’IFËN JETERAKKABU FE’IDHEL-LEDHI ESTENSERAHU BIL-’EMSI JESTESRIHUHU KALE LEHU MUSA ‘INNEKE LEGAWIJUN MUBINU
28.19: FELAMMA ‘EN ‘ERADE ‘EN JEBTISHE BIEL-LEDHI HUWE ‘ADUWUN LEHUMA KALE JA MUSA ‘ETURIDU ‘EN TEKTULENI KAMA KATELTE NEFSËN BIL-’EMSI ‘IN TURIDU ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEKUNE XHEBBERAN FIL-’ËRDI WE MA TURIDU ‘EN TEKUNE MINEL-MUSLIHIN
28.20: WE XHA’E RAXHULUN MIN ‘EKSAL-MEDINETI JES’A KALE JA MUSA ‘INNAL-MELE’E JE’TEMIRUNE BIKE LIJEKTULUKE FEHRUXH ‘INNI LEKE MINE NASIHIN
28.21: FEHARAXHE MINHA HA’IFËN JETERAKKABU KALE RABBI NEXHXHINI MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
28.22: WE LEMMA TEWEXHXHEHE TILKA’E MEDJENE KALE ‘ASA RABBI ‘EN JEHDIJENI SEWE’E SEBI
28.23: WE LEMMA WERADE MA’E MEDJENE WEXHEDE ‘ALEJHI ‘UMMETEN MINE NASI JESKUNE WE WEXHEDE MIN DUNIHIMU EMRA’TEJNI TEDHUDANI KALE MA HATBUKUMA KALETA LA NESKI HATTE JUSDIRA RI’A’U WE ‘EBUNA SHEJHUN KEBIRU
28.24: FESEKA LEHUMA THUMME TEWELLA ‘ILA EDH-DHILLI FEKALE RABBI ‘INNI LIMA ‘ENZELTE ‘ILEJJE MIN HAJRIN FEKIRU
28.25: FEXHA’ET/HU ‘IHDAHUMA TEMSHI ‘ALA ESTIHJA’IN KALET ‘INNE ‘EBI JED’UKE LIJEXHZIJEKE ‘EXHRA MA SEKAJTE LENA FELAMMA XHA’EHU WE KASSE ‘ALEJHIL-KASESE KALE LA TEHAF NEXHEWTE MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
28.26: KALET ‘IHDAHUMA JA ‘EBETI ESTE’XHIRHU ‘INNE HAJRA MENI ESTE’XHERTAL-KAWIJUL-’EMIN
28.27: KALE ‘INNI ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘UNKIHEKE ‘IHDA EBNETEJJE HATEJNI ‘ALA ‘EN TE’XHURANI THEMANIJETE HIXHEXHIN FE’IN ‘ETMEMTE ‘ASHRAN FEMIN ‘INDIKE WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN ‘ESHUKKA ‘ALEJKE SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU MINE SALIHIN
28.28: KALE DHALIKE BEJNI WE BEJNEKE ‘EJJEMAL-’EXHELEJNI KADEJTU FELA ‘UDWENE ‘ALEJJE WA-LLAHU ‘ALA MA NEKULU WE KILU
28.29: FELAMMA KADA MUSAL-’EXHELE WE SARA BI’EHLIHI ‘ANESE MIN XHANIBIT-TURI NËRAN KALE LI’HLIHI EMKUTHU ‘INNI ‘ANESTU NËRAN LE’ALLI ‘ATIKUM MINHA BIHABERIN ‘EW XHEDHWETIN MINE NARI LE’AL-LEKUM TESTELUN
28.30: FELAMMA ‘ETAHA NUDI MIN SHATI’IL-WEDIL-’EJMENI FIL-BUK’ATIL-MUBERAKETI MINE SHEXHERATI ‘EN JA MUSA ‘INNI ‘ENALLAHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
28.31: WE ‘EN ‘ELKI ‘ASAKE FELAMMA RA’AHA TEHTEZZU KE’ENNEHA XHANNUN WELLA MUDBIRAN WE LEM JU’AKKIB JA MUSA ‘EKBIL WE LA TEHAF ‘INNEKE MINEL-’AMININ
28.32: ESLUK JEDEKE FI XHEJBIKE TEHRUXH BEJDA’E MIN GAJRI SU’IN WE EDMUM ‘ILEJKE XHENAHEKE MINE RAHBI FEDHANIKE BURHANANI MIN RABBIKE ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWMËN FESIKIN
28.33: KALE RABBI ‘INNI KATELTU MINHUM NEFSËN FE’EHAFU ‘EN JEKTULUN
28.34: WE ‘EHI HARUNU HUWE ‘EFSEHU MINNI LISANËN FE’ERSILHU MA’IJE RID’ËN JUSEDDIKUNI ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘EN JUKEDHDHIBUN
28.35: KALE SENESHUDDU ‘ADUDEKE BI’EHIKE WE NEXH’ALU LEKUMA SULTANËN FELA JESILUNE ‘ILEJKUMA BI’AJATINA ‘ENTUMA WE MENI ETTEBE’AKUMAL-GALIBUN
28.36: FELAMMA XHA’EHUM MUSA BI’AJATINA BEJJINETIN KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUFTERAN WE MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FI ‘ABE’INAL-’EWWELIN
28.37: WE KALE MUSA RABBI ‘A’LEMU BIMEN XHA’E BIL-HUDA MIN ‘INDIHI WE MEN TEKUNU LEHU ‘AKIBETU DARI ‘INNEHU LA JUFLIHU EDH-DHALIMUN
28.38: WE KALE FIR’AWNU JA ‘EJJUHEL-MELE’U MA ‘ALIMTU LEKUM MIN ‘ILEHIN GAJRI FE’EWKID LI JA HAMANU ‘ALAT-TINI FEXH’AL LI SERHËN LE’ALLI ‘ETTELI’U ‘ILA ‘ILEHI MUSA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUHU MINEL-KADHIBIN
28.39: WE ESTEKBERA HUWE WE XHUNUDUHU FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJNA LA JURXHA’UN
28.40: FE’EHADHNAHU WE XHUNUDEHU FENEBEDHNAHUM FIL-JEMMI FENDHUR KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETU EDH-DHALIMIN
28.41: WE XHE’ALNAHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JED’UNE ‘ILA NARI WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI LA JUNSERUN
28.42: WE ‘ETBE’NAHUM FI HEDHIHI DUN'JA LA’NETEN WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI HUM MINEL-MEKBUHIN
28.43: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE MIN BE’DI MA ‘EHLEKNAL-KURUNAL-’ULË BESA’IRA LILNNASI WE HUDAN WE RAHMETEN LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.44: WE MA KUNTE BIXHANIBIL-GARBIJI ‘IDH KADEJNA ‘ILA MUSAL-’EMRA WE MA KUNTE MINE ESH-SHAHIDI
28.45: WE LAKINNA ‘ENSHE’NA KURUNËN FETETAWELE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’UMURU WE MA KUNTE THAWIËN FI ‘EHLI MEDJENE TETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATINA WE LAKINNA KUNNA MURSILIN
28.46: WE MA KUNTE BIXHANIBIT-TURI ‘IDH NADEJNA WE LAKIN RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE LITUNDHIRA KAWMËN MA ‘ETAHUM MIN NEDHIRIN MIN KABLIKE LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.47: WE LEWLA ‘EN TUSIBEHUM MUSIBETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM FEJAKULU RABBENA LEWLA ‘ERSELTE ‘ILEJNA RASULËN FENETTEBI’A ‘AJATIKE WE NEKUNE MINEL-MU’UMININ
28.48: FELAMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU MIN ‘INDINA KALU LEWLA ‘UTIJE MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE MUSA ‘EWELEM JEKFURU BIMA ‘UTIJE MUSA MIN KABLU KALU SIHRANI TEDHAHERA WE KALU ‘INNA BIKUL-LIN KAFIRUN
28.49: KUL FE’TU BIKITABIN MIN ‘INDI LEHI HUWE ‘EHDA MINHUMA ‘ETTEBI’HU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
28.50: FE’IN LEM JESTEXHIBU LEKE FE’LEM ‘ENNEMA JETTEBI’UNE ‘EHWE’EHUM WE MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMENI ETTEBE’A HEWEHU BIGAJRI HUDAN MINELLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
28.51: WE LEKAD WESSELNA LEHUMUL-KAWLE LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
28.52: EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE MIN KABLIHI HUM BIHI JU’UMINUN
28.53: WE ‘IDHA JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM KALU ‘AMANNA BIHI ‘INNEHUL-HEKKU MIN RABBINA ‘INNA KUNNA MIN KABLIHI MUSLIMIN
28.54: ‘ULË’IKE JU’UTEWNE ‘EXHRAHUM MERRATEJNI BIMA SEBERU WE JEDRA’UNE BIL-HESENETI SEJJI’ETE WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
28.55: WE ‘IDHA SEMI’UL-LEGWE ‘A’RADU ‘ANHU WE KALU LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM SALAMUN ‘ALEJKUM LA NEBTEGIL-XHAHILIN
28.56: ‘INNEKE LA TEHDI MEN ‘EHBEBTE WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTADIN
28.57: WE KALU ‘IN NETTEBI’IL-HUDA ME’AKE NUTEHATTEF MIN ‘ARDINA ‘EWELEM NUMEKKIN LEHUM HERAMËN ‘AMINËN JUXHBE ‘ILEJHI THEMERATU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN RIZKËN MIN LEDUNNA WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
28.58: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KARJETIN BETIRAT MA’ISHETEHA FETILKE MESAKINUHUM LEM TUSKEN MIN BE’DIHIM ‘IL-LA KALILËN WE KUNNA NAHNUL-WERITHIN
28.59: WE MA KANE RABBUKE MUHLIKAL-KURA HATTE JEB’ATHE FI ‘UMMIHA RASULËN JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATINA WE MA KUNNA MUHLIKIL-KURA ‘IL-LA WE ‘EHLUHA DHALIMUN
28.60: WE MA ‘UTITUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEMETA’UL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE ZINETUHA WE MA ‘IND-ALLAHI HAJRUN WE ‘EBKA ‘EFELA TA’KILUN
28.61: ‘EFEMEN WE’ADNAHU WE’DËN HESENËN FEHUWE LAKIHI KEMEN METTA’NAHU META’AL-HEJËTI DUN'JA THUMME HUWE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI MINEL-MUHDERIN
28.62: WE JEWME JUNADIHIM FEJAKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
28.63: KALEL-LEDHINE HAKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU RABBENA HA’UULË’L-LEDHINE ‘EGWEJNA ‘EGWEJNAHUM KAMA GAWEJNA TEBERRA’NA ‘ILEJKE MA KENU ‘IJANA JA’BUDUN
28.64: WE KILA ED’U SHURAKA’EKUM FEDE’AWHUM FELEM JESTEXHIBU LEHUM WE RA’EWL-’ADHABE LEW ‘ENNEHUM KENU JEHTEDUN
28.67: FE’EMMA MEN TABE WE ‘AMANA WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’ASA ‘EN JEKUNE MINEL-MUFLIHIN
28.68: WE RABBUKE JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U WE JEHTARU MA KANE LEHUMUL-HIJERATU SUBHANALLAHI WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
28.69: WE RABBUKE JA’LEMU MA TUKINNU SUDURUHUM WE MA JU’LINUN
28.70: WE HUWA-LLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE LEHUL-HAMDU FIL-’ULË WEL-’AHIRATI WE LEHUL-HUKMU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
28.71: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN XHE’ALEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUMUL-LEJLE SERMEDËN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU LLAHI JE’TIKUM BIDIJA’IN ‘EFELA TESMA’UN
28.72: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN XHE’ALEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUMU NEHARA SERMEDËN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI MEN ‘ILEHUN GAJRU LLAHI JE’TIKUM BILEJLIN TESKUNUNE FIHI ‘EFELA TUBSIRUN
28.73: WE MIN RAHMETIHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE WE NEHARA LITESKUNU FIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
28.74: WE JEWME JUNADIHIM FEJAKULU ‘EJNE SHURAKA’IJEL-LEDHINE KUNTUM TEZ’UMUN
28.75: WE NEZA’NA MIN KUL-LI ‘UMMETIN SHEHIDËN FEKULNA HATU BURHANEKUM FE’ALIMU ‘ENNAL-HAKKA LIL-LAHI WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEFTERUN
28.76: ‘INNE KARUNE KANE MIN KAWMI MUSA FEBEGA ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ATEJNAHU MINEL-KUNUZI MA ‘INNE MEFETIHEHU LETENU’U BIL-’USBETI ‘ULIL-KUWETI ‘IDH KALE LEHU KAWMUHU LA TEFRAH ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-FERIHIN
28.77: WE EBTEGI FIMA ‘ATAKEL-LEHU DARAL-’AHIRATE WE LA TENSE NESIBEKE MINE DUN'JA WE ‘EHSIN KAMA ‘EHSENAL-LAHU ‘ILEJKE WE LA TEBGIL-FESADE FIL-’ËRDI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBUL-MUFSIDIN
28.78: KALE ‘INNAMA ‘UTITUHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN ‘INDI ‘EWELEM JA’LEM ‘ENNA-LLAHE KAD ‘EHLEKE MIN KABLIHI MINEL-KURUNI MEN HUWE ‘ESHEDDU MINHU KUWETEN WE ‘EKTHERU XHEM’ËN WE LA JUS’ELU ‘AN DHUNUBIHIMUL-MUXHRIMUN
28.79: FEHARAXHE ‘ALA KAWMIHI FI ZINETIHI KALEL-LEDHINE JURIDUNAL-HEJËTE DUN'JA JALEJTE LENA MITHLE MA ‘UTIJE KARUNU ‘INNEHU LEDHU HEDHDHIN ‘ADHIMI
28.80: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WEJLEKUM THEWEBU LLAHI HAJRUN LIMEN ‘AMANA WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN WE LA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LA SABIRUN
28.81: FEHASEFNA BIHI WE BIDARIHIL-’ERDA FEMA KANE LEHU MIN FI’ETIN JENSURUNEHU MIN DUNI LEHI WE MA KANE MINEL-MUNTESIRIN
28.82: WE ‘ESBEHEL-LEDHINE TEMENNEW MEKANEHU BIL-’EMSI JAKULUNE WEJKE’ENNA-LLAHE JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE JEKDIRU LEWLA ‘EN MENNAL-LAHU ‘ALEJNA LEHASEFE BINA WEJKE’ENNEHU LA JUFLIHUL-KAFIRUN
28.83: TILKE DARUL-’AHIRATU NEXH’ALUHA LIL-LEDHINE LA JURIDUNE ‘ULUWËN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FESADËN WEL-’AKIBETU LILMUTTAKIN
28.84: MEN XHA’E BIL-HESENETI FELEHU HAJRUN MINHA WE MEN XHA’E BIS-SEJJI’ETI FELA JUXHZEL-LEDHINE ‘AMILU SEJJI’ATI ‘IL-LA MA KENU JA’MELUN
28.85: ‘INNEL-LEDHI FERADE ‘ALEJKAL-KUR’ANE LERADDUKE ‘ILA MA’ADIN KUL RABBI ‘A’LEMU MEN XHA’E BIL-HUDA WE MEN HUWE FI DALELIN MUBINI
28.86: WE MA KUNTE TERXHU ‘EN JULKA ‘ILEJKAL-KITABU ‘IL-LA RAHMETEN MIN RABBIKE FELA TEKUNENNE DHEHIRAN LILKEFIRIN
28.87: WE LA JESUDDUNNEKE ‘AN ‘AJATI LEHI BE’DE ‘IDH ‘UNZILET ‘ILEJKE WE ED’U ‘ILA RABBIKE WE LA TEKUNENNE MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
28.88: WE LA TED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN HALIKUN ‘IL-LA WEXHHEHU LEHUL-HUKMU WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN

29.2: ‘EHESIBE NASU ‘EN JUTRAKU ‘EN JAKULU ‘AMANNA WE HUM LA JUFTENUN
29.3: WE LEKAD FETENNEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FELEJA’LEMENNAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE SEDEKU WE LEJA’LEMENNAL-KADHIBIN
29.4: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE JA’MELUNE SEJJI’ATI ‘EN JESBIKUNA SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
29.5: MEN KANE JERXHU LIKA’ALLAHI FE’INNE ‘EXHALELLAHI LE’ATIN WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
29.6: WE MEN XHAHEDE FE’INNAMA JUXHAHIDU LINEFSIHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEGANIJUN ‘ANIL-’ALEMIN
29.7: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUKEFFIRANNE ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘EHSENEL-LEDHI KENU JA’MELUN
29.8: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWELIDEJHI HUSNËN WE ‘IN XHAHEDAKE LITUSHRIKE BI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN FELA TUTI’HUMA ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
29.9: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUDHILENNEHUM FI SALIHIN
29.10: WE MINE NASI MEN JAKULU ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI FE’IDHA ‘UDHIJE FI LEHI XHE’ALE FITNETE NASI KE’ADHABI LEHI WE LE’IN XHA’E NESRUN MIN RABBIKE LEJAKULUNNE ‘INNA KUNNA ME’AKUM ‘EWELEJSAL-LAHU BI’A’LEME BIMA FI SUDURIL-’ALEMIN
29.12: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEBI’U SEBILENA WE LNEHMIL HATAJAKUM WE MA HUM BIHAMILINE MIN HATAJAHUM MIN SHEJ’IN ‘INNAHUM LEKADHIBUN
29.13: WE LEJEHMILUNNE ‘ETHKALEHUM WE ‘ETHKALËN ME’A ‘ETHKALIHIM WE LEJUS’ELUNNE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘AMMA KENU JEFTERUN
29.14: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI FELEBITHE FIHIM ‘ELFE SENETIN ‘IL-LA HAMSINE ‘AMËN FE’EHADHEHUMUT-TUFENU WE HUM DHALIMU
29.15: FE’ENXHEJNAHU WE ‘ESHABE SEFINETI WE XHE’ALNAHA ‘AJETEN LIL’ALEMIN
29.16: WE ‘IBRAHIME ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI A’BUDU LLAHE WE ETTEKUHU DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
29.17: ‘INNAMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘EWTHANËN WE TEHLUKUNE ‘IFKËN ‘INNEL-LEDHINE TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI LA JEMLIKUNE LEKUM RIZKËN FEBTEGU ‘IND-ALLAHI RIZKA WE A’BUDUHU WE ESHKURU LEHU ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
29.18: WE ‘IN TUKEDHDHIBU FEKAD KEDHDHEBE ‘UMEMUN MIN KABLIKUM WE MA ‘ALA RASULI ‘IL-LAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
29.19: ‘EWELEM JERAW KEJFE JUBDI’U ALLAHUL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
29.20: KUL SIRU FIL-’ËRDI FENDHURU KEJFE BEDE’AL-HALKA THUMMAL-LAHU JUNSHI’U NESH’ETAL-’AHIRATE ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
29.21: JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE JERHEMU MEN JESHA’U WE ‘ILEJHI TUKLEBUN
29.22: WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZINE FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FI SEMA’I WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
29.23: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI LEHI WE LIKA’IHI ‘ULË’IKE JE’ISU MIN RAHMETI WE ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
29.24: FEMA KANE XHEWEBE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU EKTULUHU ‘EW HERRIKUHU FE’ENXHAHU ALLAHU MINE NARI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
29.25: WE KALE ‘INNAMA ETTEHADHTUM MIN DUNI LEHI ‘EWTHANËN MEWEDDETE BEJNIKUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA THUMME JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JEKFURU BE’DUKUM BIBE’DIN WE JEL’ANU BE’DUKUM BE’DËN WE ME’WEKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN NASIRIN
29.26: FE’AMANA LEHU LUTUN WE KALE ‘INNI MUHAXHIRUN ‘ILA RABBI ‘INNEHU HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
29.27: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE WE XHE’ALNA FI DHURRIJETIHI NUBUWETE WEL-KITABE WE ‘ATEJNAHU ‘EXHRAHU FI DUN'JA WE ‘INNEHU FIL-’AHIRATI LEMINE SALIHI
29.28: WE LUTËN ‘IDH KALE LIKAWMIHI ‘INNEKUM LETE’TUNAL-FEHISHETE MA SEBEKAKUM BIHA MIN ‘EHEDIN MINEL-’ALEMIN
29.29: ‘E’INNEKUM LETE’TUNE RIXHALE WE TEKTA’UNE SEBILE WE TE’TUNE FI NADIKUMUL-MUNKERA FEMA KANE XHEWEBE KAWMIHI ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU E’TINA BI’ADHABI LEHI ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
29.31: WE LEMMA XHA’ET RUSULUNA ‘IBRAHIME BIL-BUSHRA KALU ‘INNA MUHLIKU ‘EHLI HEDHIHIL-KARJETI ‘INNE ‘EHLEHA KENU DHALIMIN
29.32: KALE ‘INNE FIHË LUTËN KALU NAHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMEN FIHË LENUNEXHXHIJENNEHU WE ‘EHLEHU ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEHU KANET MINEL-GABIRI
29.33: WE LEMMA ‘EN XHA’ET RUSULUNA LUTËN SI’E BIHIM WE DAKA BIHIM DHER’ËN WE KALU LA TEHAF WE LA TEHZEN ‘INNA MUNEXHXHUKE WE ‘EHLEKE ‘IL-LA EMRA’ETEKE KANET MINEL-GABIRIN
29.34: ‘INNA MUNZILUNE ‘ALA ‘EHLI HEDHIHIL-KARJETI RIXHZËN MINE SEMA’I BIMA KENU JEFSUKUN
29.35: WE LEKAD TERAKNA MINHA ‘AJETEN BEJJINETEN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
29.36: WE ‘ILA MEDJENE ‘EHAHUM SHU’AJBËN FEKALE JA KAWMI A’BUDU LLAHE WE ERXHUL-JEWMAL-’AHIRA WE LA TA’THEW FIL-’ËRDI MUFSIDI
29.37: FEKEDHDHEBUHU FE’EHADHET/HUMU RAXHFETU FE’ESBEHU FI DARIHIM XHATHIMIN
29.38: WE ‘ADËN WE THEMUDE WE KAD TEBEJJENE LEKUM MIN MESAKINIHIM WE ZEJJENE LEHUMU SHEJTANU ‘A’MALEHUM FESEDDEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI WE KENU MUSTEBSIRIN
29.39: WE KARUNE WE FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MUSA BIL-BEJJINETI FESTEKBERU FIL-’ËRDI WE MA KENU SABIKIN
29.40: FEKULLËN ‘EHADHNA BIDHENBIHI FEMINHUM MEN ‘ERSELNA ‘ALEJHI HASIBËN WE MINHUM MEN ‘EHADHET/HU SEJHETU WE MINHUM MEN HASEFNA BIHIL-’ERDA WE MINHUM MEN ‘EGRAKNA WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
29.41: METHELUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI LEHI ‘EWLIJA’E KEMETHELIL-’ANKEBUTI ETTEHADHET BEJTËN WE ‘INNE ‘EWHENAL-BUJUTI LEBEJTUL-’ANKEBUTI LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
29.42: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI MIN SHEJ’IN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
29.43: WE TILKAL-’EMTHALU NEDRIBUHA LILNNASI WE MA JA’KILUHA ‘IL-LAL-’ALIMUN
29.44: HALEKEL-LEHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LILMU’UMININ
29.45: ETLU MA ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE MINEL-KITABI WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE ‘INNE SELËTE TENHA ‘ANIL-FEHSHA’I WEL-MUNKERI WE LEDHIKRU LLAHI ‘EKBERU WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA TESNA’UN
29.46: WE LA TUXHADILU ‘EHLAL-KITABI ‘IL-LA BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MINHUM WE KULU ‘AMANNA BIEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJNA WE ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM WE ‘ILEHUNA WE ‘ILEHUKUM WEHIDUN WE NAHNU LEHU MUSLIMUN
29.47: WE KEDHELIKE ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKAL-KITABE FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘ATEJNAHUMUL-KITABE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE MIN HA’UULË’ MEN JU’UMINU BIHI WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LAL-KAFIRUN
29.48: WE MA KUNTE TETLU MIN KABLIHI MIN KITABIN WE LA TEHUTTUHU BIJEMINIKE ‘IDHËN LARTABEL-MUBTILUN
29.49: BEL HUWE ‘AJATUN BEJJINATUN FI SUDURIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LA EDH-DHALIMUN
29.50: WE KALU LEWLA ‘UNZILE ‘ALEJHI ‘AJATUN MIN RABBIHI KUL ‘INNAMAL-’AJATU ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘INNAMA ‘ENA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
29.51: ‘EWELEM JEKFIHIM ‘ENNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE JUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LERAHMETEN WE DHIKRA LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
29.52: KUL KEFE BIL-LAHI BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM SHEHIDËN JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-BETILI WE KEFERU BIL-LAHI ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
29.53: WE JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE LEWLA ‘EXHELUN MUSEMMEN LEXHA’EHUMUL-’ADHABU WE LEJE’TIJENNEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
29.54: JESTA’XHILUNEKE BIL-’ADHABI WE ‘INNE XHEHENNEME LEMUHITETUN BIL-KEFIRIN
29.55: JEWME JEGSHAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN FEWKIHIM WE MIN TEHTI ‘ERXHULIHIM WE JAKULU DHUKU MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
29.58: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LENUBEWWI’ENNEHUM MINEL-XHENNETI GURAFËN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË NI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
29.60: WE KE’EJJIN MIN DABBETIN LA TEHMILU RIZKAHALLAHU JERZUKUHA WE ‘IJJAKUM WE HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
29.61: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE SEHHARA SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA LEJAKULUNNAL-LAHU FE’ENNA JU’UFEKUN
29.62: ALLAHU JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE JEKDIRU LEHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
29.63: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN NEZZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDA MIN BE’DI MEWTIHA LEJAKULUNNAL-LAHU KULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’KILUN
29.64: WE MA HEDHIHIL-HEJËTU DUN'JA ‘IL-LA LEHWUN WE LA’IBUN WE ‘INNE DARAL-’AHIRATE LEHIJAL-HEJEWENU LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
29.65: FE’IDHA RAKIBU FIL-FULKI DE’AW LLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNE FELAMMA NEXHXHAHUM ‘ILAL-BERRI ‘IDHA HUM JUSHRIKUN
29.66: LIJEKFURU BIMA ‘ATEJNAHUM WE LIJETEMETTA’U FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
29.67: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA XHE’ALNA HERAMËN ‘AMINËN WE JUTEHATTEFU NASU MIN HEWLIHIM ‘EFEBIALBETILI JU’UMINUNE WE BINI’METI LEHI JEKFURUN
29.68: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EW KEDHDHEBE BIL-HAKKI LEMMA XHA’EHU ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILKEFIRIN
29.69: WEL-LEDHINE XHAHEDU FINA LENEHDIJENNEHUM SUBULENA WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEME’AL-MUHSININ

30.3: FI ‘EDNAL-’ARDI WE HUM MIN BE’DI GALEBIHIM SEJEGLIBUN
30.4: FI BID’I SININE LIL-LAHIL-’EMRU MIN KABLU WE MIN BE’DU WE JEWME’IDHIN JEFRAHUL-MU’UMINUN
30.5: BINESRI LEHI JENSURU MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’AZIZU RAHIM
30.6: WE’DALLAHI LA JUHLIFU ALLAHU WE’DEHU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
30.7: JA’LEMUNE DHAHIRAN MINEL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE HUM ‘ANIL-’AHIRATI HUM GAFILUN
30.8: ‘EWELEM JETEFEKKERU FI ‘ENFUSIHIM MA HALEKEL-LEHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINE NASI BILIKA’I RABBIHIM LEKAFIRUN
30.9: ‘EWELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KENU ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE ‘ETHARUL-’ERDA WE ‘AMERUHA ‘EKTHERA MIMMA ‘AMERUHA WE XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEMA KANAL-LAHU LIJEDHLIMEHUM WE LAKIN KENU ‘ANFUSAHUM JEDHLIMUN
30.10: THUMME KANE ‘AKIBETEL-LEDHINE ‘ESA’U SU’A ‘EN KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI LEHI WE KENU BIHA JESTEHZI’U
30.11: ALLAHU JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
30.13: WE LEM JEKUN LEHUM MIN SHURAKA’IHIM SHUFE’A’U WE KENU BISHURAKA’IHIM KEFIRIN
30.14: WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JEWME’IDHIN JETEFERRAKUN
30.15: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEHUM FI RAWDETIN JUHBERUN
30.16: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA WE LIKA’IL-’AHIRATI FE’ULË’IKE FIL-’ADHABI MUHDERUN
30.17: FESUBHANALLAHI HINE TUMSUNE WE HINE TUSBIHUN
30.18: WE LEHUL-HAMDU FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘ASHIJËN WE HINE TUDHHIRUN
30.19: JUHRIXHUL-HEJJE MINEL-MEJJITI WE JUHRIXHUL-MEJJITE MINEL-HEJJI WE JUHJIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA WE KEDHELIKE TUHRAXHUN
30.20: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME ‘IDHA ‘ENTUM BESHERUN TENTESHIRUN
30.21: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN HALEKA LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWEXHËN LITESKUNU ‘ILEJHA WE XHE’ALE BEJNEKUM MEWEDDETEN WE RAHMETEN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
30.22: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI HALKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE EHTILAFU ‘ELSINETIKUM WE ‘ELWENIKUM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIL’ALIMIN
30.23: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI MENAMUKUM BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE EBTIGA’UUKUM MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JESMA’UN
30.24: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI JURIKUMUL-BERKA HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE JUNEZZILU MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FEJUHJI BIHIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
30.25: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN TEKUME SEMA’U WEL-’ERDU BI’EMRIHI THUMME ‘IDHA DA’AKUM DA’WETEN MINEL-’ARDI ‘IDHA ‘ENTUM TEHRUXHUN
30.26: WE LEHU MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KUL-LUN LEHU KANITUN
30.27: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JEBDE’UL-HALKA THUMME JU’IDUHU WE HUWE ‘EHWENU ‘ALEJHI WE LEHUL-METHELUL-’A’LA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
30.28: DERABE LEKUM METHELËN MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM HEL LEKUM MIN MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUKUM MIN SHURAKA’E FI MA RAZEKNAKUM FE’ENTUM FIHI SEWE’UN TEHAFUNEHUM KEHIFETIKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM KEDHALIKE NUFESSILUL-’AJATI LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
30.29: BEL ETTEBE’EL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘EHWE’EHUM BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN FEMEN JEHDI MEN ‘EDAL-LAL-LAHU WE MA LEHUM MIN NASIRIN
30.30: FE’EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINI HENIFËN FITRATALLAHI AL-LETI FETERA NASE ‘ALEJHA LA TEBDILE LIHALKI LEHI DHALIKE DINUL-KAJJIMU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
30.31: MUNIBINE ‘ILEJHI WE ETTEKUHU WE ‘EKIMU SELËTE WE LA TEKUNU MINEL-MUSHRIKIN
30.32: MINEL-LEDHINE FERRAKU DINEHUM WE KENU SHIJA’ËN KUL-LU HIZBIN BIMA LEDEJHIM FERIHUN
30.33: WE ‘IDHA MESSE NASE DURRUN DE’AW RABBEHUM MUNIBINE ‘ILEJHI THUMME ‘IDHA ‘EDHAKAHUM MINHU RAHMETEN ‘IDHA FERIKUN MINHUM BIRABBIHIM JUSHRIKUN
30.35: ‘EM ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHIM SULTANËN FEHUWE JETEKELLEMU BIMA KENU BIHI JUSHRIKUN
30.36: WE ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNA NASE RAHMETEN FERIHU BIHA WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM ‘IDHA HUM JEKNETUN
30.37: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA-LLAHE JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
30.38: FE’ATI DHAL-KURBE HAKKAHU WEL-MISKINE WE EBNE SEBILI DHALIKE HAJRUN LIL-LEDHINE JURIDUNE WEXHHALLAHI WE ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
30.39: WE MA ‘ATEJTUM MIN RIBËN LIJERBUWE FI ‘EMWELI NASI FELA JERBU ‘IND-ALLAHI WE MA ‘ATEJTUM MIN ZEKËTIN TURIDUNE WEXHHALLAHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUD’IFUN
30.40: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM THUMME RAZEKAKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JUHJIKUM HEL MIN SHURAKA’IKUM MEN JEF’ALU MIN DHALIKUM MIN SHEJ’IN SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
30.41: DHEHERAL-FESADU FIL-BERRI WEL-BEHRI BIMA KESEBET ‘EJDI NASI LIJUDHIKAHUM BE’DEL-LEDHI ‘AMILU LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
30.42: KUL SIRU FIL-’ËRDI FENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLU KANE ‘EKTHERUHUM MUSHRIKIN
30.43: FE’EKIM WEXHHEKE LILDDINIL-KAJJIMI MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA MERADDE LEHU MINELLAHI JEWME’IDHIN JESSEDDA’UN
30.44: MEN KEFERA FE’ALEJHI KUFRUHU WE MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELI’ENFUSIHIM JEMHEDUN
30.45: LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBUL-KEFIRIN
30.46: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘EN JURSILE RIJAHE MUBESHSHIRATIN WE LIJUDHIKAKUM MIN RAHMETIHI WE LITEXHRIJAL-FULKU BI’EMRIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
30.47: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE RUSULËN ‘ILA KAWMIHIM FEXHA’UHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FENTEKAMNA MINEL-LEDHINE ‘EXHRAMU WE KANE HEKKËN ‘ALEJNA NESRUL-MU’UMININ
30.48: ALLAHUL-LEDHI JURSILU RIJAHE FETUTHIRU SEHABËN FEJEBSUTUHU FI SEMA’I KEJFE JESHA’U WE JEXH’ALUHU KISEFËN FETERAL-WEDKA JEHRUXHU MIN HILALIHI FE’IDHA ‘ESABE BIHI MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI ‘IDHA HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
30.49: WE ‘IN KENU MIN KABLI ‘EN JUNEZZELE ‘ALEJHIM MIN KABLIHI LEMUBLISIN
30.50: FENDHUR ‘ILA ‘ATHARI RAHMETI LEHI KEJFE JUHJIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA ‘INNE DHALIKE LEMUHJIL-MEWTA WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
30.51: WE LE’IN ‘ERSELNA RIHËN FERA’EWHU MUSFERRAN LEDHELLU MIN BE’DIHI JEKFURUN
30.52: FE’INNEKE LA TUSMI’UL-MEWTA WE LA TUSMI’U SUMME DU’A’E ‘IDHA WE LLEW MUDBIRIN
30.53: WE MA ‘ENTE BIHADIL-’UMJI ‘AN DALELETIHIM ‘IN TUSMI’U ‘IL-LA MEN JU’UMINU BI’AJATINA FEHUM MUSLIMU
30.54: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN DA’FIN THUMME XHE’ALE MIN BE’DI DA’FIN KUWETEN THUMME XHE’ALE MIN BE’DI KUWETIN DA’FËN WE SHEJBETEN JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U WE HUWEL-’ALIMUL-KADIR
30.55: WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JUKSIMUL-MUXHRIMUNE MA LEBITHU GAJRA SA’ATIN KEDHALIKE KENU JU’UFEKUN
30.56: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME WEL-’IMANE LEKAD LEBITHTUM FI KITABI LEHI ‘ILA JEWMIL-BE’THI FEHEDHA JEWMUL-BE’THI WE LAKINNEKUM KUNTUM LA TA’LEMUN
30.57: FEJEWME’IDHIN LA JENFE’UL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA’DHIRATUHUM WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
30.58: WE LEKAD DERABNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN WE LE’IN XHI’TEHUM BI’AJETIN LEJEKULENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA MUBTILUN
30.59: KEDHALIKE JETBE’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
30.60: FESBIR ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE LA JESTEHIFFENNEKEL-LEDHINE LA JUKINUN

31.4: EL-LEDHINE JUKIMUNE SELËTE WE JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM JUKINUN
31.6: WE MINE NASI MEN JESHTERI LEHWEL-HEDITHI LIJUDIL-LE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE JETTEHIDHEHA HUZUEN ‘ULE’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
31.7: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHI ‘AJATUNA WELLA MUSTEKBIRAN KE’EN LEM JESMA’HA KE’ENNE FI ‘UDHUNEJHI WEKRAN FEBESHSHIRHU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
31.9: HALIDINE FIHË WE’DALLAHI HEKKËN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
