31.10: HALEKA SEMAWETI BIGAJRI ‘AMEDIN TERAWNEHA WE ‘ELKA FIL-’ËRDI RAWESIJE ‘EN TEMIDE BIKUM WE BETHTHE FIHË MIN KUL-LI DABBETIN WE ‘ENZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’ENBETNA FIHË MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN KERIMI
31.11: HADHA HALKU LLAHI FE’ERUNI MADHA HALEKEL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI BELI EDH-DHALIMUNE FI DALELIN MUBINI
31.12: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA LUKMANAL-HIKMETE ‘ENI ESHKUR LIL-LAHI WE MEN JESHKUR FE’INNAMA JESHKURU LINEFSIHI WE MEN KEFERA FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN HEMIDU
31.13: WE ‘IDH KALE LUKMANU LIABNIHI WE HUWE JA’IDHUHU JA BUNEJJE LA TUSHRIK BIL-LAHI ‘INNE ESH-SHIRKE LEDHULMUN ‘ADHIMU
31.14: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWELIDEJHI HEMELET/HU ‘UMMUHU WEHNËN ‘ALA WEHNIN WE FISALUHU FI ‘AMEJNI ‘ENI ESHKUR LI WE LIWELIDEJKE ‘ILEJJAL-MESIR
31.15: WE ‘IN XHAHEDAKE ‘ALA ‘EN TUSHRIKE BI MA LEJSE LEKE BIHI ‘ILMUN FELA TUTI’HUMA WE SAHIBHUMA FI DUN'JA MA’RUFËN WE ETTEBI’ SEBILE MEN ‘ENABE ‘ILEJJE THUMME ‘ILEJJE MERXHI’UKUM FE’UNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
31.16: JA BUNEJJE ‘INNEHA ‘IN TEKUN MITHKALE HEBBETIN MIN HARDELIN FETEKUN FI SEHRATIN ‘EW FI SEMAWETI ‘EW FIL-’ËRDI JE’TI BIHALLAHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE LETIFUN HABIRU
31.17: JA BUNEJJE ‘EKIMI SELËTE WE ‘MUR BIL-MA’RUFI WE ENHE ‘ANIL-MUNKERI WE ESBIR ‘ALA MA ‘ESABEKE ‘INNE DHALIKE MIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
31.18: WE LA TUSA’’IR HADDEKE LILNNASI WE LA TEMSHI FIL-’ËRDI MERAHËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE MUHTALIN FEHURI
31.19: WEKSID FI MESHJIKE WE EGDUD MIN SEWTIKE ‘INNE ‘ENKERAL-’ESWETI LESEWTUL-HEMIR
31.20: ‘ELEM TERAW ‘ENNA-LLAHE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ESBEGA ‘ALEJKUM NI’AMEHU DHAHIRATEN WE BETINETEN WE MINE NASI MEN JUXHADILU FI LEHI BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN WE LA HUDAN WE LA KITABIN MUNIRI
31.21: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUMU ETTEBI’U MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU KALU BEL NETTEBI’U MA WEXHEDNA ‘ALEJHI ‘ABE’ENA ‘EWELEW KANE SHEJTANU JED’UHUM ‘ILA ‘ADHABI SA’IR
31.22: WE MEN JUSLIM WEXHHEHU ‘ILA LLAHI WE HUWE MUHSINUN FEKADI ESTEMSEKE BIL-’URWETIL-WUTHKA WE ‘ILA LLAHI ‘AKIBETUL-’UMUR
31.23: WE MEN KEFERA FELA JEHZUNKE KUFRUHU ‘ILEJNA MERXHI’UHUM FENUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
31.25: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA LEJAKULUNNAL-LAHU KULIL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
31.26: LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
31.27: WE LEW ‘ENNEMA FIL-’ËRDI MIN SHEXHERATIN ‘EKLAMUN WEL-BEHRU JEMUDDUHU MIN BE’DIHI SEB’ATU ‘EBHURIN MA NEFIDET KELIMATU LLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN HEKIMU
31.28: MA HALKUKUM WE LA BE’THUKUM ‘IL-LA KENEFSIN WEHIDETIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
31.29: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
31.30: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-HEKKU WE ‘ENNE MA JED’UNE MIN DUNIHIL-BETILU WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
31.31: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNAL-FULKE TEXHRI FIL-BEHRI BINI’METI LEHI LIJURIJEKUM MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBERIN SHEKURI
31.32: WE ‘IDHA GASHIJEHUM MEWXHUN KALDHDHULELI DE’AW LLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNE FELAMMA NEXHXHAHUM ‘ILAL-BERRI FEMINHUM MUKTESIDUN WE MA JEXHHEDU BI’AJATINA ‘IL-LA KUL-LU HATTARIN KEFURI
31.33: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ETTEKU RABBEKUM WE EHSHEW JEWMËN LA JEXHZI WE E-DUN ‘AN WELEDIHI WE LA MEWLUDUN HUWE XHAZIN ‘AN WE E-DIHI SHEJ’ËN ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN FELA TEGURRANNEKUMUL-HEJA ETU DUN'JA WE LA JEGURRANNEKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
31.34: ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘INDEHU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE JUNEZZILUL-GAJTHE WE JA’LEMU MA FIL-’ERHAMI WE MA TEDRI NEFSUN MADHA TEKSIBU GADËN WE MA TEDRI NEFSUN BI’EJJI ‘ARDIN TEMUTU ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HABIRU

32.2: TENZILUL-KITABI LA RAJBE FIHI MIN RABBIL-’ALEMIN
32.3: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERAHU BEL HUWEL-HEKKU MIN RABBIKE LITUNDHIRA KAWMËN MA ‘ETAHUM MIN NEDHIRIN MIN KABLIKE LE’AL-LEHUM JEHTEDUN
32.4: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI MA LEKUM MIN DUNIHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA SHEFI’IN ‘EFELA TETEDHEKKERUN
32.5: JUDEBBIRUL-’EMRA MINE SEMA’I ‘ILAL-’ARDI THUMME JA’RUXHU ‘ILEJHI FI JEWMIN KANE MIKDARUHU ‘ELFE SENETIN MIMMA TA’UDDUN
32.7: EL-LEDHI ‘EHSENE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN HALEKAHU WE BEDE’E HALKAL-’INSANI MIN TINI
32.8: THUMME XHE’ALE NESLEHU MIN SULËLETIN MIN MA’IN MEHINI
32.9: THUMME SEWWEHU WE NEFEHA FIHI MIN RUHIHI WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
32.10: WE KALU ‘E’IDHA DELELNA FIL-’ËRDI ‘E’INNA LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDIN BEL HUM BILIKA’I RABBIHIM KAFIRUN
32.11: KUL JETEWEFFEKUM MELAKUL-MEWTIL-LEDHI WUKKILA BIKUM THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM TURXHA’UN
32.12: WE LEW TERA ‘IDHIL-MUXHRIMUNE NAKISU RU’USIHIM ‘INDE RABBIHIM RABBENA ‘EBSERNA WE SEMI’NA FERXHI’NA NA’MEL SALIHËN ‘INNA MUKINUN
32.13: WE LEW SHI’NA LE’ATEJNA KUL-LE NEFSIN HUDAHA WE LAKIN HAKKAL-KAWLU MINNI LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINEL-XHINNETI WE NASI ‘EXHMA’IN
32.14: FEDHUKU BIMA NESITUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA ‘INNA NESINAKUM WE DHUKU ‘ADHABEL-HULDI BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
32.15: ‘INNAMA JU’UMINU BI’AJATINEL-LEDHINE ‘IDHA DHUKKIRU BIHA HARRU SUXHXHEDËN WE SEBBEHU BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE HUM LA JESTEKBIRUN
32.16: TETEXHAFE XHUNUBUHUM ‘ANIL-MEDAXHI’I JED’UNE RABBEHUM HAWFËN WE TEMA’ËN WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
32.17: FELA TA’LEMU NEFSUN MA ‘UHFIJE LEHUM MIN KURRATI ‘A’JUNIN XHEZA’EN BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
32.18: ‘EFEMEN KANE MU’UMINËN KEMEN KANE FESIKËN LA JESTEWUN
32.19: ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FELEHUM XHENNATUL-ME’WE NUZULËN BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
32.20: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE FESEKU FEME’WEHUMU NARU KUL-LEMA ‘ERADU ‘EN JEHRUXHU MINHA ‘U’IDU FIHË WE KILA LEHUM DHUKU ‘ADHABE NARIL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TUKEDHDHIBUN
32.21: WE LENUDHIKANNEHUM MINEL-’ADHABIL-’EDNA DUNAL-’ADHABIL-’EKBERI LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
32.22: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN DHUKKIRA BI’AJATI RABBIHI THUMME ‘A’RADE ‘ANHA ‘INNA MINEL-MUXHRIMINE MUNTEKIMUN
32.23: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FELA TEKUN FI MIRJETIN MIN LIKA’IHI WE XHE’ALNAHU HUDAN LIBENI ‘ISRA’IL
32.24: WE XHE’ALNA MINHUM ‘E’IMMETEN JEHDUNE BI’EMRINA LEMMA SEBERU WE KENU BI’AJATINA JUKINUN
32.25: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE JEFSILU BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
32.26: ‘EWELEM JEHDI LEHUM KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-KURUNI JEMSHUNE FI MESAKINIHIM ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN ‘EFELA JESMA’UN
32.27: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA NESUKUL-MA’E ‘ILAL-’ARDIL-XHURUZI FENUHRIXHU BIHI ZER’ËN TE’KULU MINHU ‘EN’AMUHUM WE ‘ENFUSUHUM ‘EFELA JUBSIRUN
32.28: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-FETHU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
32.29: KUL JEWMAL-FETHI LA JENFE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘IMANUHUM WE LA HUM JUNDHERUN

33.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ETTEKI LLAHE WE LA TUTI’IL-KEFIRINE WEL-MUNAFIKINE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
33.2: WE ETTEBI’ MA JUHA ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRA
33.3: WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WE KILË
33.4: MA XHE’ALEL-LAHU LIRAXHULIN MIN KALBEJNI FI XHEWFIHI WE MA XHE’ALE ‘EZWEXHEKUMUL-LA’I TUDHAHIRUNE MINHUNNE ‘UMMEHATIKUM WE MA XHE’ALE ‘ED’IJA’EKUM ‘EBNA’EKUM DHALIKUM KAWLUKUM BI’EFWEHIKUM WA-LLAHU JAKULUL-HAKKA WE HUWE JEHDI SEBIL
33.5: ED’UHUM LI’EBE’IHIM HUWE ‘EKSETU ‘IND-ALLAHI FE’IN LEM TA’LEMU ‘ABE’EHUM FE’IHWENUKUM FI DINI WE MEWELIKUM WE LEJSE ‘ALEJKUM XHUNAHUN FIMA ‘EHTE’TUM BIHI WE LAKIN MA TE’AMMEDET KULUBUKUM WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
33.6: NEBIJU ‘EWLA BIL-MU’UMININE MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE ‘EZWEXHUHU ‘UMMEHATUHUM WE ‘ULUL-’ERHAMI BE’DUHUM ‘EWLA BIBE’DIN FI KITABI LEHI MINEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MUHAXHIRINE ‘IL-LA ‘EN TEF’ALU ‘ILA ‘EWLIJA’IKUM MA’RUFËN KANE DHALIKE FIL-KITABI MESTURA
33.7: WE ‘IDH ‘EHADHNA MINE NEBIJINE MITHAKAHUM WE MINKE WE MIN NUHIN WE ‘IBRAHIME WE MUSA WE ‘ISA EBNI MERJEME WE ‘EHADHNA MINHUM MITHAKËN GALIDHË
33.9: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM ‘IDH XHA’ETKUM XHUNUDUN FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN WE XHUNUDËN LEM TERAWHA WE KANAL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRA
33.10: ‘IDH XHA’UKUM MIN FEWKIKUM WE MIN ‘ESFELE MINKUM WE ‘IDH ZAGATIL-’EBSARU WE BELEGATIL-KULUBUL-HENAXHIRA WE TEDHUNNUNE BIL-LAHI EDH-DHUNUN
33.11: HUNALIKE EBTULIJAL-MU’UMINUNE WE ZULZILU ZILZALËN SHEDIDË
33.12: WE ‘IDH JAKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN MA WE’ADENALLAHU WE RASULUHU ‘IL-LA GURURA
33.13: WE ‘IDH KALET TA’IFETUN MINHUM JA ‘EHLE JETHRIBE LA MUKAME LEKUM FERXHI’U WE JESTE’DHINU FERIKUN MINHUMU NEBIJE JAKULUNE ‘INNE BUJUTENA ‘AWRATUN WE MA HIJE BI’AWRATIN ‘IN JURIDUNE ‘IL-LA FIRARA
33.14: WE LEW DUHILET ‘ALEJHIM MIN ‘EKTARIHA THUMME SU’ILUL-FITNETE LE’ATEWHA WE MA TELEBBETHU BIHA ‘IL-LA JESIRA
33.15: WE LEKAD KENU ‘AHEDU LLAHE MIN KABLU LA JUWELLUNAL-’EDBERA WE KANE ‘AHDU LLAHI MES’ULË
33.16: KUL LEN JENFE’AKUMUL-FIRARU ‘IN FERARTUM MINEL-MEWTI ‘EWIL-KATLI WE ‘IDHËN LA TUMETTA’UNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.17: KUL MEN DHEL-LEDHI JA’SIMUKUM MINELLAHI ‘IN ‘ERADE BIKUM SU’ËN ‘EW ‘ERADE BIKUM RAHMETEN WE LA JEXHIDUNE LEHUM MIN DUNI LEHI WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
33.18: KAD JA’LEMU LLAHUL-MU’AWWIKINE MINKUM WEL-KA’ILINE LI’IHWENIHIM HELUMME ‘ILEJNA WE LA JE’TUNAL-BE’SE ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.19: ‘ESHIHHETEN ‘ALEJKUM FE’IDHË XHË’AL-HAWFU RA’EJTEHUM JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE TEDURU ‘A’JUNUHUM KEL-LEDHI JUGSHA ‘ALEJHI MINEL-MEWTI FE’IDHA DHAHABEL-HAWFU SELEKUKUM BI’ELSINETIN HIDADIN ‘ESHIHHETEN ‘ALEL-HAJRI ‘ULË’IKE LEM JU’UMINU FE’EHBETAL-LAHU ‘A’MALEHUM WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRA
33.20: JEHSEBUNAL-’EHZABE LEM JEDH/HEBU WE ‘IN JE’TIL-’EHZABU JEWEDDU LEW ‘ENNEHUM BEDUNE FIL-’A’RABI JES’ELUNE ‘AN ‘ENBE’IKUM WE LEW KENU FIKUM MA KATELU ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.21: LEKAD KANE LEKUM FI RASULI LEHI ‘USWETUN HESENETUN LIMEN KANE JERXHU LLAHE WEL-JEWMAL-’AHIRA WE DHEKERA-LLAHE KETHIRA
33.22: WE LEMMA RA’AL-MU’UMINUNAL-’EHZABE KALU HADHA MA WE’ADENALLAHU WE RASULUHU WE SEDEKEL-LEHU WE RASULUHU WE MA ZADEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘IMANËN WE TESLIMË
33.23: MINEL-MU’UMININE RIXHALUN SEDEKU MA ‘AHEDU LLAHE ‘ALEJHI FEMINHUM MEN KADA NEHBEHU WE MINHUM MEN JENTEDHIRU WE MA BEDDELU TEBDILË
33.24: LIJEXHZIJAL-LAHU SADIKINE BISIDKIHIM WE JU’ADHDHIBEL-MUNAFIKINE ‘IN SHA’E ‘EW JETUBE ‘ALEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE GAFURAN RAHIMË
33.25: WERADDAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIGAJDHIHIM LEM JENALU HAJRAN WE KEFELLAHUL-MU’UMININAL-KITALE WE KANAL-LAHU KAWIJËN ‘AZIZË
33.26: WE ‘ENZALEL-LEDHINE DHAHERUHUM MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MIN SEJASIHIM WE KADHEFE FI KULUBIHIMU RU’BE FERIKËN TEKTULUNE WE TE’SIRUNE FERIKË
33.27: WE ‘EWRATHEKUM ‘ERDAHUM WE DIJARAHUM WE ‘EMWELEHUM WE ‘ERDËN LEM TETE’UHA WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRA
33.28: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LI’ZWEXHIKE ‘IN KUNTUNNE TURIDNAL-HEJA ETE DUN'JA WE ZINETEHA FETA’ALEJNE ‘UMETTI’KUNNE WE ‘USERRIHKUNNE SERAHËN XHEMILË
33.29: WE ‘IN KUNTUNNE TURIDNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE DARAL-’AHIRATE FE’INNALL-LLAHE ‘E’ADDE LILMUHSINATI MINKUNNE ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
33.30: JA NISA’E NEBIJI MEN JE’TI MINKUNNE BIFEHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN JUDA’AF LEHAL-’ADHABU DI’FEJNI WE KANE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRA
33.31: WE MEN JEKNUT MINKUNNE LIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TA’MEL SALIHËN NU’UTIHA ‘EXHRAHA MERRATEJNI WE ‘A’TEDNA LEHA RIZKËN KERIMË
33.32: JA NISA’E NEBIJI LESTUNNE KE’EHEDIN MINE NISA’ ‘INI ETTEKAJTUNNE FELA TEHDA’NE BIL-KAWLI FEJETME’EL-LEDHI FI KALBIHI MARADUN WE KULNE KAWLËN MA’RUFË
33.33: WE KARNE FI BUJUTIKUNNE WE LA TEBERRAXHNE TEBERRUXHAL-XHAHILIJETIL-’ULË WE ‘EKIMNE SELËTE WE ‘ATINE EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’NA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU ‘INNAMA JURIDU ALLAHU LIJUDH/HIBE ‘ANKUMU RIXHSE ‘EHLAL-BEJTI WE JUTEHHIRAKUM TETHIRA
33.34: WE EDHKURNE MA JUTLA FI BUJUTIKUNNE MIN ‘AJATI LEHI WEL-HIKMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE LETIFËN HABIRA
33.35: ‘INNAL-MUSLIMINE WEL-MUSLIMATI WEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WEL-KANITINE WEL-KANITATI WE SADIKINE WE SADIKATI WE SABIRINE WE SABIRATI WEL-HASHI’INE WEL-HASHI’ATI WEL-MUTESEDDIKINE WEL-MUTESEDDIKATI WE SA’IMINE WE SA’IMATI WEL-HAFIDHINE FURUXHEHUM WEL-HAFIDHATI WE EDH-DHAKIRINA-LLAHE KETHIRAN WE EDH-DHAKIRATI ‘E’ADDAL-LAHU LEHUM MEGFIRATEN WE ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
33.36: WE MA KANE LIMU’UMININ WE LA MU’UMINETIN ‘IDHA KADALLAHU WE RASULUHU ‘EMRAN ‘EN JEKUNE LEHUMUL-HIJERATU MIN ‘EMRIHIM WE MEN JA’SI LLAHE WE RASULEHU FEKAD DAL-LE DALELËN MUBINË
33.37: WE ‘IDH TEKULU LIL-LEDHI ‘EN’AMAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI WE ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJHI ‘EMSIK ‘ALEJKE ZEWXHEKE WE ETTEKI LLAHE WE TUHFI FI NEFSIKE MALLAHU MUBDIHI WE TEHSHA NASE WA-LLAHU ‘EHEKKU ‘EN TEHSHAHU FELAMMA KADA ZEJDUN MINHA WETERAN ZEWWEXHNAKEHA LIKEJ LA JEKUNE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE HERAXHUN FI ‘EZWEXHI ‘ED’IJA’IHIM ‘IDHA KADEW MINHUNNE WETERAN WE KANE ‘EMRU LLAHI MEF’ULË
33.38: MA KANE ‘ALA NEBIJI MIN HERAXHIN FIMA FERADAL-LAHU LEHU SUNNETALLAHI FIL-LEDHINE KHALAW MIN KABLU WE KANE ‘EMRU LLAHI KADERAN MEKDURA
33.39: EL-LEDHINE JUBELLIGUNE RISALATI LEHI WE JEHSHEWNEHU WE LA JEHSHEWNE ‘EHEDËN ‘IL-LALLAHE WE KEFE BIL-LAHI HESIBË
33.40: MA KANE MUHEMMEDUN ‘EBE ‘EHEDIN MIN RIXHALIKUM WE LAKIN RASULËL-LAHI WE HATEME NEBIJINE WE KANAL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
33.43: HUWEL-LEDHI JUSELLI ‘ALEJKUM WE MELE’IKETUHU LIJUHRIXHEKUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE KANE BIL-MU’UMININE RAHIMË
33.44: TEHIJETUHUM JEWME JELKAWNEHU SALAMUN WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM ‘EXHRAN KERIMË
33.45: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE SHAHIDËN WE MUBESHSHIRAN WE NEDHIRA
33.46: WE DA’IËN ‘ILA LLAHI BI’IDHNIHI WE SIRAXHËN MUNIRA
33.47: WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININE BI’ENNE LEHUM MINELLAHI FEDLËN KEBIRA
33.48: WE LA TUTI’IL-KEFIRINE WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE DA’ ‘EDHAHUM WE TEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI WE KILË
33.49: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NEKEHTUMUL-MU’UMINATI THUMME TELLEKTUMUHUNNE MIN KABLI ‘EN TEMESSUHUNNE FEMA LEKUM ‘ALEJHINNE MIN ‘IDDETIN TA’TEDDUNEHA FEMETTI’UHUNNE WE SERRIHUHUNNE SERAHËN XHEMILË
33.50: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘INNA ‘EHLELNA LEKE ‘EZWEXHEKEL-LETI ‘ATEJTE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE MA MELEKET JEMINUKE MIMMA ‘EFE’AL-LAHU ‘ALEJKE WE BENATI ‘AMMIKE WE BENATI ‘AMMATIKE WE BENATI HALIKE WE BENATI HALATIKEL-LETI HAXHERNE ME’AKE WE EMRA’ETEN MU’UMINETEN ‘IN WEHEBET NEFSEHA LILNNEBIJI ‘IN ‘ERADE NEBIJU ‘EN JESTENKIHEHA HALISETEN LEKE MIN DUNIL-MU’UMININE KAD ‘ALIMNA MA FERADNA ‘ALEJHIM FI ‘EZWEXHIHIM WE MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUM LIKEJLA JEKUNE ‘ALEJKE HERAXHUN WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
33.51: TURXHI MEN TESHA’U MINHUNNE WE TU’UWI ‘ILEJKE MEN TESHA’U WE MENI EBTEGAJTE MIMMEN ‘AZELTE FELA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKE DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN TEKARRA ‘A’JUNUHUNNE WE LA JEHZENNE WE JERDAJNE BIMA ‘ATEJTEHUNNE KUL-LUHUNNE WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA FI KULUBIKUM WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HELIMË
33.52: LA JEHIL-LU LEKE NISA’ MIN BE’DU WE LA ‘EN TEBEDDELE BIHINNE MIN ‘EZWEXHIN WE LEW ‘A’XHEBEKE HUSNUHUNNE ‘IL-LA MA MELEKET JEMINUKE WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN RAKIBË
33.53: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEDHULU BUJUTE NEBIJI ‘IL-LA ‘EN JU’UDHENE LEKUM ‘ILA TA’AMIN GAJRA NADHIRINE ‘INAHU WE LAKIN ‘IDHA DU’ITUM FEDHULU FE’IDHA TA’IMTUM FENTESHIRU WE LA MUSTE’NISINE LIHEDITHIN ‘INNE DHALIKUM KANE JU’UDHI NEBIJE FEJESTEHJI MINKUM WA-LLAHU LA JESTEHJI MINEL-HEKKI WE ‘IDHA SE’ELTUMUHUNNE META’ËN FES’ELUHUNNE MIN WERA’I HIXHABIN DHALIKUM ‘ETHERU LIKULUBIKUM WE KULUBIHINNE WE MA KANE LEKUM ‘EN TU’UDHU RASULËL-LAHI WE LA ‘EN TENKIHU ‘EZWEXHEHU MIN BE’DIHI ‘EBEDËN ‘INNE DHALIKUM KANE ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘ADHIMË
33.54: ‘IN TUBDU SHEJ’ËN ‘EW TUHFUHU FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
33.55: LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJHINNE FI ‘ABE’IHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’IHINNE WE LA ‘IHWENIHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’I ‘IHWENIHINNE WE LA ‘EBNA’I ‘EHAWETIHINNE WE LA NISA’IHINNE WE LA MA MELEKET ‘EJMANUHUNNE WE ETTEKINA-LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE KANE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDË
33.56: ‘INNALL-LLAHE WE MELE’IKETEHU JUSELLUNE ‘ALA NEBIJI JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU SELLU ‘ALEJHI WE SELLIMU TESLIMË
33.57: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU LE’ANEHUMU LLAHU FI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATI WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM ‘ADHABËN MUHINË
33.58: WEL-LEDHINE JU’UDHUNAL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI BIGAJRI MA EKTESEBU FEKADI EHTEMELU BUHTANËN WE ‘ITHMËN MUBINË
33.59: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU KUL LI’ZWEXHIKE WE BENATIKE WE NISA’IL-MU’UMININE JUDNINE ‘ALEJHINNE MIN XHALABIBIHINNE DHALIKE ‘EDNA ‘EN JU’RAFNE FELA JU’UDHEJNE WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
33.60: LE’IN LEM JENTEHIL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN WEL-MURXHIFUNE FIL-MEDINETI LENUGRIJENNEKE BIHIM THUMME LA JUXHAWIRUNEKE FIHË ‘IL-LA KALILË
33.62: SUNNETALLAHI FIL-LEDHINE KHALAW MIN KABLU WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI LEHI TEBDILË
33.63: JES’ELUKE NASU ‘ANI SA’ATI KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ILMUHA ‘IND-ALLAHI WE MA JUDRIKE LE’ALLE SA’ATE TEKUNU KARIBË
33.65: HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN LA JEXHIDUNE WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
33.66: JEWME TUKAL-LEBU WUXHUHUHUM FI NARI JAKULUNE JA LEJTENA ‘ETA’NA LLAHE WE ‘ETA’NA RASUL
33.67: WE KALU RABBENA ‘INNA ‘ETA’NA SADETENA WE KUBERA’ENA FE’EDELLUNA SEBIL
33.68: RABBENA ‘ATIHIM DI’FEJNI MINEL-’ADHABI WEL-’ANHUM LA’NËN KEBIRA
33.69: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE ‘ADHEW MUSA FEBERRA’EHU ALLAHU MIMMA KALU WE KANE ‘IND-ALLAHI WEXHIHË
33.70: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE KULU KAWLËN SEDIDË
33.71: JUSLIH LEKUM ‘A’MALEKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WE MEN JUTI’I LLAHE WE RASULEHU FEKAD FEZE FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
33.72: ‘INNA ‘ARADNAL-’EMANETE ‘ALA SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WEL-XHIBELI FE’EBEJNE ‘EN JEHMILNEHA WE ‘ESHFEKNE MINHA WE HEMELEHAL-’INSANU ‘INNEHU KANE DHELUMËN XHEHULË
33.73: LIJU’ADHDHIBEL-LAHUL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-MUSHRIKINE WEL-MUSHRIKATI WE JETUBEL-LAHU ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË

34.1: EL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE LEHUL-HAMDU FIL-’AHIRATI WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-HABIR
34.2: JA’LEMU MA JELIXHU FIL-’ËRDI WE MA JEHRUXHU MINHA WE MA JENZILU MINE SEMA’I WE MA JA’RUXHU FIHË WE HUWE RAHIMUL-GAFUR
34.3: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TE’TINA SA’ATU KUL BELA WE RABBI LETE’TIJENNEKUM ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI LA JA’ZUBU ‘ANHU MITHKALU DHERRATIN FI SEMAWETI WE LA FIL-’ËRDI WE LA ‘ESGARU MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKBERU ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MUBINI
34.4: LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE RIZKUN KERIMU
34.5: WEL-LEDHINE SE’AW FI ‘AJATINA MU’AXHIZINE ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MIN RIXHZIN ‘ELIMU
34.6: WE JEREL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILMEL-LEDHI ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKE MIN RABBIKE HUWEL-HAKKA WE JEHDI ‘ILA SIRATIL-’AZIZIL-HEMID
34.7: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU HEL NEDULLUKUM ‘ALA RAXHULIN JUNEBBI’UKUM ‘IDHA MUZZIKTUM KUL-LE MUMEZZEKIN ‘INNEKUM LEFI HALKIN XHEDIDI
34.8: ‘AFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN ‘EM BIHI XHINNETUN BELIL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI FIL-’ADHABI WE DALELIL-BE’ID
34.9: ‘EFELEM JERAW ‘ILA MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘IN NESHE’ NEHSIF BIHIMUL-’ERDA ‘EW NUSKIT ‘ALEJHIM KISEFËN MINE SEMA’I ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJETEN LIKUL-LI ‘ABDIN MUNIBI
34.10: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA DAWUDE MINNA FEDLËN JA XHIBELU ‘EWWIBI ME’AHU WET-TEJRA WE ‘ELENNA LEHUL-HEDID
34.11: ‘ENI A’MEL SABIGATIN WE KADDIR FI SARDI WE A’MELU SALIHËN ‘INNI BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
34.12: WE LISULEJMANE RIHE GUDUWUHA SHEHRUN WE RAWEHUHA SHEHRUN WE ‘ESELNA LEHU ‘AJNAL-KITRI WE MINEL-XHINNI MEN JA’MELU BEJNE JEDEJHI BI’IDHNI RABBIHI WE MEN JEZIG MINHUM ‘AN ‘EMRINA NUDHIKHU MIN ‘ADHABI SA’IR
34.13: JA’MELUNE LEHU MA JESHA’U MIN MEHARIBE WE TEMATHILE WE XHIFENIN KALXHEWEBI WE KUDURIN RASIJATIN A’MELU ‘ALE DAWUDE SHUKRAN WE KALILUN MIN ‘IBEDIJE SHEKUR
34.14: FELAMMA KADEJNA ‘ALEJHIL-MEWTE MA DAL-LEHUM ‘ALA MEWTIHI ‘IL-LA DABBETUL-’ARDI TE’KULU MINSE’ETEHU FELAMMA HARRA TEBEJJENETIL-XHINNU ‘EN LEW KENU JA’LEMUNAL-GAJBE MA LEBITHU FIL-’ADHABIL-MUHIN
34.15: LEKAD KANE LISEBE’IIN FI MESKENIHIM ‘AJETUN XHENNETANI ‘AN JEMININ WE SHIMALIN KULU MIN RIZKI RABBIKUM WE ESHKURU LEHU BELDETUN TEJJIBETUN WE RABBUN GAFURU
34.16: FE’A’RADU FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM SEJLAL-’ARIMI WE BEDDELNAHUM BIXHENNETEJHIM XHENNETEJNI DHEWETA ‘UKULIN HAMTIN WE ‘ETHLIN WE SHEJ’IN MIN SIDRIN KALILI
34.17: DHALIKE XHEZEJNAHUM BIMA KEFERU WE HEL NUXHAZI ‘IL-LAL-KEFUR
34.18: WE XHE’ALNA BEJNEHUM WE BEJNAL-KURA AL-LETI BERAKNA FIHË KURAN DHAHIRATEN WE KADDERNA FIHË SEJRA SIRU FIHË LEJALIJE WE ‘EJJAMËN ‘AMININ
34.19: FEKALU RABBENA BE’ID BEJNE ‘ESFERINA WE DHELEMU ‘ANFUSAHUM FEXHE’ALNAHUM ‘EHADITHE WE MEZZEKNAHUM KUL-LE MUMEZZEKIN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBERIN SHEKURI
34.20: WE LEKAD SEDDEKA ‘ALEJHIM ‘IBLISU DHENNEHU FE ETTEBE’UHU ‘IL-LA FERIKËN MINEL-MU’UMININ
34.21: WE MA KANE LEHU ‘ALEJHIM MIN SULTANIN ‘IL-LA LINA’LEME MEN JU’UMINU BIL-’AHIRATI MIMMEN HUWE MINHA FI SHEKKIN WE RABBUKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HEFIDHU
34.22: KUL ED’UL-LEDHINE ZE’AMTUM MIN DUNI LEHI LA JEMLIKUNE MITHKALE DHERRATIN FI SEMAWETI WE LA FIL-’ËRDI WE MA LEHUM FIHIMA MIN SHIRKIN WE MA LEHU MINHUM MIN DHEHIRI
34.23: WE LA TENFE’U SHEFE’ATU ‘INDEHU ‘IL-LA LIMEN ‘EDHINE LEHU HATTE ‘IDHA FUZZI’A ‘AN KULUBIHIM KALU MADHA KALE RABBUKUM KALUL-HAKKA WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-KEBIR
34.24: KUL MEN JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KULI ALLAHU WE ‘INNA ‘EW ‘IJJAKUM LE’ALA HUDAN ‘EW FI DALELIN MUBINI
34.25: KUL LA TUS’ELUNE ‘AMMA ‘EXHRAMNA WE LA NUS’ELU ‘AMMA TA’MELUN
34.26: KUL JEXHMA’U BEJNENA RABBUNA THUMME JEFTEHU BEJNENA BIL-HAKKI WE HUWEL-FETTAHUL-’ALIM
34.27: KUL ‘ERUNIJEL-LEDHINE ‘ELHEKTUM BIHI SHURAKA’E KEL-LE BEL HUWA-LLAHUL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
34.28: WE MA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘IL-LA KAFFETEN LILNNASI BESHIRAN WE NEDHIRAN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
34.29: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
34.30: KUL LEKUM MI’ADU JEWMIN LA TESTE’HIRUNE ‘ANHU SA’ATEN WE LA TESTEKDIMUN
34.31: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEN NU’UMINE BIHEDHAL-KUR’ANI WE LA BIEL-LEDHI BEJNE JEDEJHI WE LEW TERA ‘IDHI EDH-DHALIMUNE MEWKUFUNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM JERXHI’U BE’DUHUM ‘ILA BE’DINL-KAWLE JAKULUL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU LEWLA ‘ENTUM LEKUNNA MU’UMININ
34.32: KALEL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU LIL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU ‘ENAHNU SEDEDNAKUM ‘ANIL-HUDA BE’DE ‘IDH XHA’EKUM BEL KUNTUM MUXHRIMIN
34.33: WE KALEL-LEDHINE ESTUD’IFU LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU BEL MEKRUL-LEJLI WE NEHARI ‘IDH TE’MURUNENA ‘EN NEKFURA BIL-LAHI WE NEXH’ALE LEHU ‘ENDADËN WE ‘ESERRU NEDAMETE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE WE XHE’ALNAL-’EGLALE FI ‘A’NAKIL-LEDHINE KEFERU HEL JUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KENU JA’MELUN
34.34: WE MA ‘ERSELNA FI KARJETIN MIN NEDHIRIN ‘IL-LA KALE MUTRAFUHA ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
34.35: WE KALU NAHNU ‘EKTHERU ‘EMWELËN WE ‘EWLADËN WE MA NAHNU BIMU’ADHDHEBIN
34.36: KUL ‘INNE RABBI JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
34.37: WE MA ‘EMWELUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM BI-ETI TUKARRIBUKUM ‘INDENA ZULFE ‘IL-LA MEN ‘AMANA WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN FE’ULË’IKE LEHUM XHEZA’U DI’FI BIMA ‘AMILU WE HUM FIL-GURUFETI ‘AMINUN
34.38: WEL-LEDHINE JES’AWNE FI ‘AJATINA MU’AXHIZINE ‘ULË’IKE FIL-’ADHABI MUHDERUN
34.39: KUL ‘INNE RABBI JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI WE JEKDIRU LEHU WE MA ‘ENFEKTUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEHUWE JUHLIFUHU WE HUWE HAJRU RAZIKIN
34.40: WE JEWME JEHSHURUHUM XHEMI’ËN THUMME JAKULU LILMELE’IKETI ‘EHA’UULË’ ‘IJJAKUM KENU JA’BUDUN
34.41: KALU SUBHANEKE ‘ENTE WELIJUNA MIN DUNIHIM BEL KENU JA’BUDUNAL-XHINNE ‘EKTHERUHUM BIHIM MU’UMINUN
34.42: FELJEWME LA JEMLIKU BE’DUKUM LIBE’DIN NEF’ËN WE LA DERRAN WE NEKULU LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHUKU ‘ADHABE NARI AL-LETI KUNTUM BIHA TUKEDHDHIBU
34.43: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINETIN KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA RAXHULUN JURIDU ‘EN JESUDDEKUM ‘AMMA KANE JA’BUDU ‘ABE’UUKUM WE KALU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘IFKUN MUFTERAN WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA SIHRUN MUBINU
34.44: WE MA ‘ATEJNAHUM MIN KUTUBIN JEDRUSUNEHA WE MA ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIM KABLEKE MIN NEDHIRI
34.45: WE KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE MA BELEGU MI’SHARA MA ‘ATEJNAHUM FEKEDHDHEBU RUSULI FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
34.46: KUL ‘INNAMA ‘A’IDHUKUM BIWEHIDETIN ‘EN TEKUMU LIL-LAHI METHNA WE FURADA THUMME TETEFEKKERU MA BISAHIBIKUM MIN XHINNETIN ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN LEKUM BEJNE JEDEJ ‘ADHABIN SHEDIDI
34.47: KUL MA SE’ELTUKUM MIN ‘EXHRIN FEHUWE LEKUM ‘IN ‘EXHRIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ALA ALLAHI WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
34.49: KUL XHA’AL-HEKKU WE MA JUBDI’UL-BETILU WE MA JU’ID
34.50: KUL ‘IN DELELTU FE’INNAMA ‘EDILLU ‘ALA NEFSI WE ‘INI EHTEDEJTU FEBIMA JUHI ‘ILEJJE RABBI ‘INNEHU SEMI’UN KARIBU
34.51: WE LEW TERA ‘IDH FEZI’U FELA FEWTE WE ‘UHIDHU MIN MEKANIN KARIBI
34.52: WE KALU ‘AMANNA BIHI WE ‘ENNA LEHUMUT-TENAWUSHU MIN MEKANIN BE’IDI
34.53: WE KAD KEFERU BIHI MIN KABLU WE JEKDHIFUNE BIL-GAJBI MIN MEKANIN BE’IDI
34.54: WE HILE BEJNEHUM WE BEJNE MA JESHTEHUNE KAMA FU’ILE BI’ESHJA’IHIM MIN KABLU ‘INNAHUM KENU FI SHEKKIN MURIBI

35.1: EL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI FETIRI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI XHA’ILIL-MELE’IKETI RUSULËN ‘ULI ‘EXHNIHETIN METHNA WE THULËTHE WE RUBE’A JEZIDU FIL-HALKI MA JESHA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
35.2: MA JEFTEHI ALLAHU LILNNASI MIN RAHMETIN FELA MUMSIKE LEHA WE MA JUMSIK FELA MURSILE LEHU MIN BE’DIHI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
35.3: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU EDHKURU NI’METALLAHI ‘ALEJKUM HEL MIN HALIKIN GAJRU LLAHI JERZUKUKUM MINE SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
35.4: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KUDHDHIBET RUSULUN MIN KABLIKE WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
35.5: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN FELA TEGURRANNEKUMUL-HEJA ETU DUN'JA WE LA JEGURRANNEKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
35.6: ‘INNE SHEJTANE LEKUM ‘ADUWUN FE ETTEHIDHUHU ‘ADUWËN ‘INNAMA JED’U HIZBEHU LIJEKUNU MIN ‘ES'HABI SA’IR
35.7: EL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
35.8: ‘EFEMEN ZUJJINE LEHU SU’U ‘AMELIHI FERA’AHU HESENËN FE’INNALL-LLAHE JUDIL-LU MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI MEN JESHA’U FELA TEDH/HEB NEFSUKE ‘ALEJHIM HESERATIN ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN BIMA JESNA’UN
35.9: WA-LLAHUL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RIJAHE FETUTHIRU SEHABËN FESUKNAHU ‘ILA BELEDIN MEJJITIN FE’EHJEJNA BIHIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA KEDHALIKE NUSHUR
35.10: MEN KANE JURIDUL-’IZZETE FELIL-LAHIL-’IZZETU XHEMI’ËN ‘ILEJHI JES’ADUL-KELIMUT-TEJJIBU WEL-’AMELU SALIHU JERFE’UHU WEL-LEDHINE JEMKURUNE SEJJI’ATI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WE MEKRU ‘ULË’IKE HUWE JEBUR
35.11: WA-LLAHU HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME XHE’ALEKUM ‘EZWEXHËN WE MA TEHMILU MIN ‘UNTHA WE LA TEDA’U ‘IL-LA BI’ILMIHI WE MA JU’AMMERU MIN MU’AMMERIN WE LA JUNKASU MIN ‘UMURIHI ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
35.12: WE MA JESTEWIL-BEHRANI HADHA ‘ADHBUN FURATUN SA’IGUN SHERABUHU WE HEDHA MILHUN ‘UXHAXHUN WE MIN KUL-LIN TE’KULUNE LEHMËN TERIJËN WE TESTEHRIXHUNE HILJETEN TELBESUNEHA WE TERAL-FULKE FIHI MEWEHIRA LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
35.13: JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM LEHUL-MULKU WEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNIHI MA JEMLIKUNE MIN KITMIRI
35.14: ‘IN TED’UHUM LA JESMA’U DU’A’EKUM WE LEW SEMI’U MA ESTEXHABU LEKUM WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JEKFURUNE BISHIRKIKUM WE LA JUNEBBI’UKE MITHLU HABIRI
35.16: ‘IN JESHE’ JUDH/HIBKUM WE JE’TI BIHALKIN XHEDIDI
35.18: WE LA TEZIRU WEZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA WE ‘IN TED’U MUTHKALETUN ‘ILA HIMLIHA LA JUHMEL MINHU SHEJ’UN WE LEW KANE DHA KURBE ‘INNAMA TUNDHIRUL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE MEN TEZEKKA FE’INNAMA JETEZEKKA LINEFSIHI WE ‘ILA LLAHIL-MESIR
35.20: WE LA EDH-DHULUMATU WE LA NU
35.22: WE MA JESTEWIL-’EHJA’U WE LAL-’EMWETU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUSMI’U MEN JESHA’U WE MA ‘ENTE BIMUSMI’IN MEN FIL-KUBUR
35.24: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNAKE BIL-HAKKI BESHIRAN WE NEDHIRAN WE ‘IN MIN ‘UMMETIN ‘IL-LA HALA FIHË NEDHIRU
35.25: WE ‘IN JUKEDHDHIBUKE FEKAD KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI WE BIZ-ZUBURI WE BIL-KITABIL-MUNIR
35.27: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FE’EHRAXHNA BIHI THEMERATIN MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWENUHA WE MINEL-XHIBELI XHUDEDUN BIDUN WE HUMRUN MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWENUHA WE GARABIBU SUDU
35.28: WE MINE NASI WE DEWEBBI WEL-’EN’AM MUHTELIFUN ‘ELWENUHU KEDHALIKE ‘INNAMA JEHSHA LLAHE MIN ‘IBEDIHIL-’ULEMA’U ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘AZIZUN GAFURU
35.29: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JETLUNE KITABEL-LAHI WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘ENFEKU MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM SIRRAN WE ‘ALANIJETEN JERXHUNE TIXHARATEN LEN TEBUR
35.30: LIJUWEFFIJEHUM ‘UXHURAHUM WE JEZIDEHUM MIN FEDLIHI ‘INNEHU GAFURUN SHEKURU
35.31: WEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE MINEL-KITABI HUWEL-HEKKU MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BI’IBEDIHI LEHABIRUN BESIRU
35.32: THUMME ‘EWRATHNAL-KITABEL-LEDHINE ESTEFEJNA MIN ‘IBEDINA FEMINHUM DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI WE MINHUM MUKTESIDUN WE MINHUM SABIKUN BIL-HAJRATI BI’IDHNI LEHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEDLUL-KEBIR
35.33: XHENNATU ‘ADNIN JEDHULUNEHA JUHELLEWNE FIHË MIN ‘ESAWIRA MIN DHEHEBIN WE LU’ULU’UËN WE LIBESUHUM FIHË HERIRU
35.34: WE KALUL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI ‘EDH/HEBE ‘ANNAL-HEZENE ‘INNE RABBENA LEGAFURUN SHEKURU
35.35: EL-LEDHI ‘EHELLENA DARAL-MUKAMETI MIN FEDLIHI LA JEMESSUNA FIHË NESEBUN WE LA JEMESSUNA FIHË LUGUBU
35.36: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEHUM NARU XHEHENNEME LA JUKDA ‘ALEJHIM FEJEMUTU WE LA JUHAFFEFU ‘ANHUM MIN ‘ADHABIHA KEDHALIKE NEXHZI KUL-LE KEFURI
35.37: WE HUM JESTERIHUNE FIHË RABBENA ‘EHRIXHNA NA’MEL SALIHËN GAJREL-LEDHI KUNNA NA’MELU ‘EWELEM NU’AMMIRKUM MA JETEDHEKKERU FIHI MEN TEDHEKKERA WE XHA’EKUMU NEDHIRU FEDHUKU FEMA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN NESI
35.39: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALEKUM HALA’IFE FIL-’ËRDI FEMEN KEFERA FE’ALEJHI KUFRUHU WE LA JEZIDUL-KEFIRINE KUFRUHUM ‘INDE RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA MEKTËN WE LA JEZIDUL-KEFIRINE KUFRUHUM ‘IL-LA HASARA
35.40: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM SHURAKA’EKUMUL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘ERUNI MADHA HALEKU MINEL-’ARDI ‘EM LEHUM SHIRKUN FI SEMAWETI ‘EM ‘ATEJNAHUM KITABËN FEHUM ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MINHU BEL ‘IN JA’IDU EDH-DHALIMUNE BE’DUHUM BE’DËN ‘IL-LA GURURA
35.41: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUMSIKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA ‘EN TEZULË WE LE’IN ZALETA ‘IN ‘EMSEKEHUMA MIN ‘EHEDIN MIN BE’DIHI ‘INNEHU KANE HELIMËN GAFURA
35.42: WE ‘EKSEMU BIL-LAHI XHEHDE ‘EJMANIHIM LE’IN XHA’EHUM NEDHIRUN LEJEKUNUNNE ‘EHDA MIN ‘IHDAL-’UMEMI FELAMMA XHA’EHUM NEDHIRUN MA ZADEHUM ‘IL-LA NUFURA
35.43: ESTIKBERAN FIL-’ËRDI WE MEKRA SEJJI’I WE LA JEHIKUL-MEKRU SEJJI’U ‘IL-LA BI’EHLIHI FEHEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SUNNETAL-’EWWELINE FELEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI LEHI TEBDILËN WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI LEHI TEHWILË
35.44: ‘EWELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE KENU ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE MA KANAL-LAHU LIJU’XHIZEHU MIN SHEJ’IN FI SEMAWETI WE LA FIL-’ËRDI ‘INNEHU KANE ‘ALIMËN KADIRA
35.45: WE LEW JU’UAHIDHU ALLAHU NASE BIMA KESEBU MA TERAKE ‘ALA DHEHRIHA MIN DABBETIN WE LAKIN JU’UEHHIRUHUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN FE’IDHË XHË’E ‘EXHELUHUM FE’INNALL-LLAHE KANE BI’IBEDIHI BESIRA

36.9: WE XHE’ALNA MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM SEDDËN WE MIN HALFIHIM SEDDËN FE’EGSHEJNAHUM FEHUM LA JUBSIRUN
36.10: WE SEWE’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘E’ANDHARTAHUM ‘EM LEM TUNDHIRHUM LA JU’UMINUN
36.11: ‘INNAMA TUNDHIRU MENI ETTEBE’A EDH-DHIKRA WE HASHIJE RAHMENE BIL-GAJBI FEBESHSHIRHU BIMEGFIRATIN WE ‘EXHRIN KERIMI
36.12: ‘INNA NAHNU NUHJIL-MEWTA WE NEKTUBU MA KADDEMU WE ‘ATHARAHUM WE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘HSEJNAHU FI ‘IMAMIN MUBINI
36.14: ‘IDH ‘ERSELNA ‘ILEJHIMU ETHNEJNI FEKEDHDHEBUHUMA FE’AZZEZNA BITHALITHIN FEKALU ‘INNA ‘ILEJKUM MURSELUN
36.15: KALU MA ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA BESHERUN MITHLUNA WE MA ‘ENZELE RAHMANU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA TEKDHIBUN
36.18: KALU ‘INNA TETEJJERNA BIKUM LE’IN LEM TENTEHU LENERXHUMENNEKUM WE LEJEMESSENNEKUM MINNA ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
36.19: KALU TA’IRUKUM ME’AKUM ‘E’IN DHUKKIRTUM BEL ‘ENTUM KAWMUN MUSRIFUN
36.20: WE XHA’E MIN ‘EKSAL-MEDINETI RAXHULUN JES’A KALE JA KAWMI ETTEBI’UL-MURSELIN
36.21: ETTEBI’U MEN LA JES’ELUKUM ‘EXHRAN WE HUM MUHTEDUN
36.22: WE MA LIJE LA ‘A’BUDUL-LEDHI FETERANI WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
36.23: ‘E’ETTEHIDHU MIN DUNIHI ‘ALIHETEN ‘IN JURIDNI RAHMANU BIDURRIN LA TUGNI ‘ANNI SHEFE’ATUHUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA JUNKIDHUN
36.26: KILA EDHULIL-XHENNETE KALE JA LEJTE KAWMI JA’LEMUN
36.27: BIMA GAFERA LI RABBI WE XHE’ALENI MINEL-MUKRAMIN
36.28: WE MA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALA KAWMIHI MIN BE’DIHI MIN XHUNDIN MINE SEMA’I WE MA KUNNA MUNZILIN
36.29: ‘IN KANET ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WEHIDETEN FE’IDHA HUM HAMIDUN
36.30: JA HESRATEN ‘ALEL-’IBEDI MA JE’TIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
36.31: ‘ELEM JERAW KEM ‘EHLEKNA KABLEHUM MINEL-KURUNI ‘ENNEHUM ‘ILEJHIM LA JERXHI’UN
36.32: WE ‘IN KUL-LUN LEMMA XHEMI’UN LEDEJNA MUHDERUN
36.33: WE ‘AJETUN LEHUMUL-’ERDUL-MEJTETU ‘EHJEJNAHA WE ‘EHRAXHNA MINHA HEBBËN FEMINHU JE’KULUN
36.34: WE XHE’ALNA FIHË XHENNATIN MIN NEHILIN WE ‘A’NABIN WE FEXHXHERNA FIHË MINEL-’UJUN
36.35: LIJE’KULU MIN THEMERIHI WE MA ‘AMILET/HU ‘EJDIHIM ‘EFELA JESHKURUN
36.36: SUBHANEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’EZWEXHE KUL-LEHA MIMMA TUNBITUL-’ERDU WE MIN ‘ENFUSIHIM WE MIMMA LA JA’LEMUN
36.37: WE ‘AJETUN LEHUMUL-LEJLU NESLEHU MINHU NEHARA FE’IDHA HUM MUDHLIMUN
36.38: WE SHEMSU TEXHRI LIMUSTAKARRIN LEHA DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
36.40: LA SHEMSU JENBEGI LEHA ‘EN TUDRIKAL-KAMERA WE LAL-LEJLU SABIKU NEHARI WE KUL-LUN FI FELAKIN JESBEHUN
36.42: WE HALEKNA LEHUM MIN MITHLIHI MA JERKEBUN
36.43: WE ‘IN NESHE’ NUGRIKHUM FELA SERIHA LEHUM WE LA HUM JUNKADHUN
36.45: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUMU ETTEKU MA BEJNE ‘EJDIKUM WE MA HALFEKUM LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
36.46: WE MA TE’TIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN MIN ‘AJATI RABBIHIM ‘IL-LA KENU ‘ANHA MU’RIDIN
36.47: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM ‘ENFIKU MIMMA RAZEKAKUMU LLAHU KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ENUT’IMU MEN LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU ‘ET’AMEHU ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA FI DALELIN MUBINI
36.48: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
36.49: MA JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WEHIDETEN TE’HUDHUHUM WE HUM JEHISSIMUN
36.50: FELA JESTETI’UNE TEWSIJETEN WE LA ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM JERXHI’UN
36.51: WE NUFIHË FI SURI FE’IDHA HUM MINEL-’EXHDATHI ‘ILA RABBIHIM JENSILUN
36.52: KALU JA WEJLENA MEN BE’ATHENA MIN MERKADINA HADHA MA WE’ADE RAHMANU WE SEDEKAL-MURSELUN
36.53: ‘IN KANET ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WEHIDETEN FE’IDHA HUM XHEMI’UN LEDEJNA MUHDERUN
36.54: FELJEWME LA TUDHLEMU NEFSUN SHEJ’ËN WE LA TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
36.57: LEHUM FIHË FEKIHETUN WE LEHUM MA JEDDA’UN
36.60: ‘ELEM ‘A’HED ‘ILEJKUM JA BENI ‘ADEME ‘EN LA TA’BUDU SHEJTANE ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
36.62: WE LEKAD ‘EDAL-LE MINKUM XHIBILLËN KETHIRAN ‘EFELEM TEKUNU TA’KILUN
36.65: AL-JEWME NEHTIMU ‘ALA ‘EFWEHIHIM WE TUKELLIMUNA ‘EJDIHIM WE TESH/HEDU ‘ERXHULUHUM BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
36.66: WE LEW NESHA’U LETEMESNA ‘ALA ‘A’JUNIHIM FESTEBEKU SIRATE FE’ENNA JUBSIRUN
36.67: WE LEW NESHA’U LEMESEHNAHUM ‘ALA MEKANETIHIM FEMA ESTETA’U MUDIJËN WE LA JERXHI’UN
36.68: WE MEN NU’AMMIRHU NUNEKKIS/HU FIL-HALKI ‘EFELA JA’KILUN
36.69: WE MA ‘ALLEMNAHU ESH-SHI’RA WE MA JENBEGI LEHU ‘IN HUWE ‘IL-LA DHIKRUN WE KUR’ANUN MUBINU
36.70: LIJUNDHIRA MEN KANE HEJJËN WE JEHIKKAL-KAWLU ‘ALEL-KEFIRIN
36.71: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA HALEKNA LEHUM MIMMA ‘AMILET ‘EJDINA ‘EN’AMËN FEHUM LEHA MALIKUN
36.72: WE DHAL-LELNAHA LEHUM FEMINHA RAKUBUHUM WE MINHA JE’KULUN
36.73: WE LEHUM FIHË MENAFI’U WE MESHARIBU ‘EFELA JESHKURUN
36.74: WE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI LEHI ‘ALIHETEN LE’AL-LEHUM JUNSERUN
36.75: LA JESTETI’UNE NESRAHUM WE HUM LEHUM XHUNDUN MUHDERUN
36.76: FELA JEHZUNKE KAWLUHUM ‘INNA NA’LEMU MA JUSIRRUNE WE MA JU’LINUN
36.77: ‘EWELEM JERAL-’INSANU ‘ENNA HALEKNAHU MIN NUTFETIN FE’IDHA HUWE HASIMUN MUBINU
36.78: WE DERABE LENA METHELËN WE NESIJE HALKAHU KALE MEN JUHJIL-’IDHAME WE HIJE RAMIMU
36.79: KUL JUHJIHEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EHA ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE HUWE BIKUL-LI HALKIN ‘ALIMU
36.80: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUM MINE SHEXHERIL-’EHDERI NËRAN FE’IDHA ‘ENTUM MINHU TUKIDUN
36.81: ‘EWELEJSEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIKADIRIN ‘ALA ‘EN JEHLUKA MITHLEHUM BELA WE HUWEL-HALLAKUL-’ALIM
36.83: FESUBHANEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHI MELEKUTU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN

37.5: RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE RABBUL-MESHARIK
37.7: WE HIFDHËN MIN KUL-LI SHEJTANIN MARIDI
37.8: LA JESSEMMA’UNE ‘ILAL-MELE’IL-’A’LA WE JUKDHEFUNE MIN KUL-LI XHANIBI
37.11: FESTEFTIHIM ‘EHUM ‘ESHEDDU HALKËN ‘EM MEN HALEKNA ‘INNA HALEKNAHUM MIN TININ LAZIBI
37.16: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
37.19: FE’INNAMA HIJE ZEXHRATUN WEHIDETUN FE’IDHA HUM JENDHURUN
37.20: WE KALU JA WEJLENA HADHA JEWMU DIN
37.22: EHSHURUL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WE ‘EZWEXHEHUM WE MA KENU JA’BUDUN
37.30: WE MA KANE LENA ‘ALEJKUM MIN SULTANIN BEL KUNTUM KAWMËN TAGIN
37.39: WE MA TUXHZEWNE ‘IL-LA MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
37.47: LA FIHË GAWLUN WE LA HUM ‘ANHA JUNZEFUN
37.51: KALE KA’ILUN MINHUM ‘INNI KANE LI KARINU
37.53: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEDINUN
37.57: WE LEWLA NI’METU RABBI LEKUNTU MINEL-MUHDERIN
37.85: ‘IDH KALE LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI MADHA TA’BUDUN
37.97: KALU EBNU LEHU BUNJANËN FE’ELKUHU FIL-XHEHIM
37.102: FELAMMA BELEGA ME’AHU SA’JE KALE JA BUNEJJE ‘INNI ‘ERA FIL-MENAMI ‘ENNI ‘EDHBEHUKE FENDHUR MADHA TERA KALE JA ‘EBETI EF’AL MA TU’UMERU SETEXHIDUNI ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU MINE SABIRIN
37.112: WE BESHSHERNAHU BI’ISHAKA NEBIJËN MINE SALIHIN
37.113: WE BERAKNA ‘ALEJHI WE ‘ALA ‘ISHAKA WE MIN DHURRIJETIHIMA MUHSINUN WE DHALIMUN LINEFSIHI MUBINU
37.114: WE LEKAD MENENNA ‘ALA MUSA WE HARUN
37.158: WE XHE’ALU BEJNEHU WE BEJNAL-XHINNETI NESEBËN WE LEKAD ‘ALIMETIL-XHINNETU ‘INNAHUM LEMUHDERUN
37.164: WE MA MINNA ‘IL-LA LEHU MEKAMUN MA’LUMU

38.3: KEM ‘EHLEKNA MIN KABLIHIM MIN KARNIN FENADEW WELATE HINE MENASI
38.4: WE ‘AXHIBU ‘EN XHA’EHUM MUNDHIRUN MINHUM WE KALEL-KAFIRUNE HADHA SAHIRUN KEDHDHABU
38.6: WE ENTELEKAL-MELE’U MINHUM ‘ENI EMSHU WE ESBIRU ‘ALA ‘ALIHETIKUM ‘INNE HADHA LESHEJ’UN JURAD
38.7: MA SEMI’NA BIHEDHA FIL-MIL-LETIL-’AHIRATI ‘IN HADHA ‘IL-LA EHTILAKU
38.8: ‘E’UUNZILE ‘ALEJHI EDH-DHIKRU MIN BEJNINA BEL HUM FI SHEKKIN MIN DHIKRI BEL LEMMA JEDHUKU ‘ADHAB
38.10: ‘EM LEHUM MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA FELJERTEKU FIL-’ESBEB
38.12: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ADUN WE FIR’AWNU DHUL-’EWTAD
38.13: WE THEMUDU WE KAWMU LUTIN WE ‘ES'HABUL-’EJKETI ‘ULË’IKAL-’EHZAB
38.15: WE MA JENDHURU HA’UULË’ ‘IL-LA SEJHETEN WEHIDETEN MA LEHA MIN FEWEKI
38.16: WE KALU RABBENA ‘AXHXHIL LENA KITTENA KABLE JEWMIL-HISAB
38.17: ESBIR ‘ALA MA JAKULUNE WE EDHKUR ‘ABDENA DAWUDE DHAL-’EJDI ‘INNEHU ‘EWWEBU
38.20: WE SHEDEDNA MULKEHU WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-HIKMETE WE FESLAL-HITAB
38.22: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALA DAWUDE FEFEZI’A MINHUM KALU LA TEHAF HASMANI BEGA BE’DUNA ‘ALA BE’DIN FEHKUM BEJNENA BIL-HAKKI WE LA TUSHTIT WE IHDINA ‘ILA SEWE’I SIRAT
38.23: ‘INNE HADHA ‘EHI LEHU TIS’UN WE TIS’UNE NA’XHETEN WE LIJE NA’XHETUN WEHIDETUN FEKALE ‘EKFILNIHA WE ‘AZZENI FIL-HITAB
38.24: KALE LEKAD DHELEMEKE BISU’UALI NA’XHETIKE ‘ILA NI’AXHIHI WE ‘INNE KETHIRAN MINEL-HULETA’I LEJEBGI BE’DUHUM ‘ALA BE’DIN ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE KALILUN MA HUM WE DHENNE DAWUDU ‘ENNEMA FETENNAHU FESTEGFERA RABBEHU WE HARRA RAKI’ËN WE ‘ENAB
38.25: FEGAFERNA LEHU DHALIKE WE ‘INNE LEHU ‘INDENA LEZULFE WE HUSNE ME’ABI
38.26: JA DAWUDU ‘INNA XHE’ALNAKE HALIFETEN FIL-’ËRDI FEHKUM BEJNE NASI BIL-HAKKI WE LA TETTEBI’IL-HEWE FEJUDIL-LEKE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEDILLUNE ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN BIMA NESU JEWMAL-HISAB
38.27: WE MA HALEKNA SEMA’E WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA BETILËN DHALIKE DHENNUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINE NAR
38.28: ‘EM NEXH’ALUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KALMUFSIDINE FIL-’ËRDI ‘EM NEXH’ALUL-MUTTEKINE KALFUXHXHAR
38.32: FEKALE ‘INNI ‘EHBEBTU HUBBEL-HAJRI ‘AN DHIKRI RABBI HATTE TEWERAT BIL-HIXHAB
38.34: WE LEKAD FETENNA SULEJMANE WE ‘ELKAJNA ‘ALA KURSIJIHI XHESEDËN THUMME ‘ENAB
38.35: KALE RABBI EGFIR LI WE HEB LI MULKËN LA JENBEGI LI’HEDIN MIN BE’DI ‘INNEKE ‘ENTAL-WEHHAB
38.36: FESEHHARNA LEHU RIHE TEXHRI BI’EMRIHI RUHA’EN HEJTHU ‘ESAB
38.37: WE SHEJATINE KUL-LE BENNA’IN WE GAWWESI
38.40: WE ‘INNE LEHU ‘INDENA LEZULFE WE HUSNE ME’ABI
38.41: WE EDHKUR ‘ABDENA ‘EJJUBE ‘IDH NADA RABBEHU ‘ENNI MESSENI SHEJTANU BINUSBIN WE ‘ADHABI
38.42: ERKUD BIRIXHLIKE HADHA MUGTESELUN BERIDUN WE SHERABU
38.43: WE WEHEBNA LEHU ‘EHLEHU WE MITHLEHUM ME’AHUM RAHMETEN MINNA WE DHIKRA LI’WLIL-’ELBEB
38.44: WE HUDH BIJEDIKE DIGTHËN FEDRIB BIHI WE LA TEHNETH ‘INNA WE XHEDNAHU SABIRAN NI’MAL-’ABDU ‘INNEHU ‘EWWEBU
38.45: WE EDHKUR ‘IBEDENA ‘IBRAHIME WE ‘ISHAKA WE JA’KUBE ‘ULIL-’EJDI WEL-’EBSAR
38.48: WE EDHKUR ‘ISMA’ILE WEL-JESE’A WE DHAL-KIFLI WE KUL-LUN MINEL-’EHJAR
38.49: HADHA DHIKRUN WE ‘INNE LILMUTTEKINE LEHUSNE ME’ABI
38.51: MUTTEKI’INE FIHË JED’UNE FIHË BIFEKIHETIN KETHIRATIN WE SHERABI
38.54: ‘INNE HADHA LERIZKUNA MA LEHU MIN NEFEDI
38.59: HADHA FEWXHUN MUKTEHIMUN ME’AKUM LA MERHEBËN BIHIM ‘INNAHUM SALU NAR
38.60: KALU BEL ‘ENTUM LA MERHEBËN BIKUM ‘ENTUM KADDEMTUMUHU LENA FEBI’SAL-KARAR
38.61: KALU RABBENA MEN KADDEME LENA HADHA FEZID/HU ‘ADHABËN DI’FËN FI NAR
38.62: WE KALU MA LENA LA NERA RIXHALËN KUNNA NA’UDDUHUM MINEL-’ESHRA
38.66: RABBU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMAL-’AZIZUL-GAFFER
38.69: MA KANE LIJE MIN ‘ILMIN BIL-MELE’IL-’A’LA ‘IDH JEHTESIMUN
38.71: ‘IDH KALE RABBUKE LILMELE’IKETI ‘INNI HALIKUN BESHERAN MIN TINI
38.72: FE’IDHA SEWWEJTUHU WE NEFEHTU FIHI MIN RUHI FEKA’U LEHU SAXHIDIN
38.75: KALE JA ‘IBLISU MA MENE’AKE ‘EN TESXHUDE LIMA HALEKTU BIJEDEJJE ‘ASTEKBERTE ‘EM KUNTE MINEL-’ALIN
38.76: KALE ‘ENA HAJRUN MINHU HALEKTENI MIN NARIN WE HALEKTEHU MIN TINI
38.85: LE’EMLE’ENNE XHEHENNEME MINKE WE MIMMEN TEBI’AKE MINHUM ‘EXHMA’IN
38.86: KUL MA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI MIN ‘EXHRIN WE MA ‘ENA MINEL-MUTEKELLIFIN

39.2: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ILEJKAL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI FE’BUDI LLAHE MUHLISËN LEHU DIN
39.3: ‘ALA LIL-LAHI DINUL-HALISU WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E MA NA’BUDUHUM ‘IL-LA LIJUKARRIBUNA ‘ILA LLAHI ZULFE ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEHKUMU BEJNEHUM FI MA HUM FIHI JEHTELIFUNE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN HUWE KADHIBUN KEFFERU
39.4: LEW ‘ERADAL-LAHU ‘EN JETTEHIDHE WELEDËN LASTEFE MIMMA JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U SUBHANEHU HUWA-LLAHUL-WEHIDUL-KAHHAR
39.5: HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI JUKEWWIRUL-LEJLE ‘ALA NEHARI WE JUKEWWIRU NEHARA ‘ALEL-LEJLI WE SEHHARA SHEMSE WEL-KAMERA KUL-LUN JEXHRI LI’XHELIN MUSEMMEN ‘ALA HUWEL-’AZIZUL-GAFFER
39.6: HALEKAKUM MIN NEFSIN WEHIDETIN THUMME XHE’ALE MINHA ZEWXHEHA WE ‘ENZELE LEKUM MINEL-’EN’AM THEMANIJETE ‘EZWEXHIN JEHLUKUKUM FI BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM HALKËN MIN BE’DI HALKIN FI DHULUMATIN THALATHIN DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM LEHUL-MULKU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TUSRAFUN
39.7: ‘IN TEKFURU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GANIJUN ‘ANKUM WE LA JERDA LI’IBEDIHIL-KUFRA WE ‘IN TESHKURU JERDAHU LEKUM WE LA TEZIRU WEZIRATUN WIZRA ‘UHRA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM MERXHI’UKUM FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUNE ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
39.8: WE ‘IDHA MESSAL-’INSANE DURRUN DA’A RABBEHU MUNIBËN ‘ILEJHI THUMME ‘IDHA HAWWELEHU NI’METEN MINHU NESIJE MA KANE JED’U ‘ILEJHI MIN KABLU WE XHE’ALE LIL-LAHI ‘ENDADËN LIJUDIL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI KUL TEMETTA’ BIKUFRIKE KALILËN ‘INNEKE MIN ‘ES'HABI NAR
39.9: ‘EMMEN HUWE KANITUN ‘ANA’AL-LEJLI SAXHIDËN WE KA’IMËN JEHDHERUL-’AHIRATE WE JERXHU RAHMETE RABBIHI KUL HEL JESTEWIL-LEDHINE JA’LEMUNE WEL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUNE ‘INNAMA JETEDHEKKERU ‘ULUL-’ELBEB
39.10: KUL JA ‘IBEDIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU RABBEKUM LIL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU FI HEDHIHI DUN'JA HESENETUN WE ‘ERDU LLAHI WESI’ATUN ‘INNAMA JUWEFFE SABIRUNE ‘EXHRAHUM BIGAJRI HISABI
39.15: FE’BUDU MA SHI’TUM MIN DUNIHI KUL ‘INNAL-HASIRINEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM WE ‘EHLIHIM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘ALA DHALIKE HUWEL-HUSRANUL-MUBIN
39.16: LEHUM MIN FEWKIHIM DHULELUN MINE NARI WE MIN TEHTIHIM DHULELUN DHALIKE JUHAWWIFU ALLAHU BIHI ‘IBEDEHU JA ‘IBEDI FE ETTEKUN
39.17: WEL-LEDHINE EXHTENEBUT-TAGUTE ‘EN JA’BUDUHA WE ‘ENABU ‘ILA LLAHI LEHUMUL-BUSHRA FEBESHSHIR ‘IBED
39.18: EL-LEDHINE JESTEMI’UNAL-KAWLE FEJETTEBI’UNE ‘EHSENEHU ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HEDAHUMU LLAHU WE ‘ULË’IKE HUM ‘ULUL-’ELBEB
39.19: ‘EFEMEN HAKKA ‘ALEJHI KELIMETUL-’ADHABI ‘EFE’ENTE TUNKIDHU MEN FI NAR
39.20: LAKINIL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM LEHUM GURAFUN MIN FEWKIHA GURAFUN MEBNIJETUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE’DALLAHI LA JUHLIFU ALLAHUL-MI’A
39.21: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ENZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN FESELEKEHU JENABI’A FIL-’ËRDI THUMME JUHRIXHU BIHI ZER’ËN MUHTELIFËN ‘ELWENUHU THUMME JEHIXHU FETERAHU MUSFERRAN THUMME JEXH’ALUHU HUTAMËN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LEDHIKRA LI’WLIL-’ELBEB
39.22: ‘EFEMEN SHERAHAL-LAHU SEDRAHU LIL’ISLAMI FEHUWE ‘ALA NURIN MIN RABBIHI FEWEJLUN LILKASIJETI KULUBUHUM MIN DHIKRI LEHI ‘ULË’IKE FI DALELIN MUBINI
39.23: ALLAHU NEZZELE ‘EHSENAL-HEDITHI KITABËN MUTES'HABIHËN METHANIJE TEKSHA’IRRU MINHU XHULUDUL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM THUMME TELINU XHULUDUHUM WE KULUBUHUM ‘ILA DHIKRI LEHI DHALIKE HUDA ALLAHI JEHDI BIHI MEN JESHA’U WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
39.24: ‘EFEMEN JETTEKI BIWEXHHIHI SU’AL-’ADHABI JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE KILA LILDHDHALIMINE DHUKU MA KUNTUM TEKSIBUN
39.25: KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FE’ETAHUMUL-’ADHABU MIN HEJTHU LA JESH’URUN
39.26: FE’EDHAKAHUMU LLAHUL-HIZJE FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
39.27: WE LEKAD DERABNA LILNNASI FI HADHAL-KUR’ANI MIN KUL-LI METHELIN LE’AL-LEHUM JETEDHEKKERUN
39.29: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN RAXHULËN FIHI SHURAKA’U MUTESHAKISUNE WE RAXHULËN SELEMËN LIRAXHULIN HEL JESTEWIJANI METHELËNL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI BEL ‘EKTHERUHUM LA JA’LEMUN
39.32: FEMEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMEN KEDHEBE ‘ALA ALLAHI WE KEDHDHEBE BIS-SIDKI ‘IDH XHA’EHU ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILKEFIRIN
39.33: WEL-LEDHI XHA’E BIS-SIDKI WE SEDDEKA BIHI ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUTTEKUN
39.34: LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM DHALIKE XHEZA’UL-MUHSININ
39.35: LIJUKEFFIRAL-LAHU ‘ANHUM ‘ESWE’EL-LEDHI ‘AMILU WE JEXHZIJEHUM ‘EXHRAHUM BI’EHSENIL-LEDHI KENU JA’MELUN
39.36: ‘ELEJSAL-LAHU BIKAFIN ‘ABDEHU WE JUHAWWIFUNEKE BIEL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
39.37: WE MEN JEHDI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN MUDILLIN ‘ELEJSAL-LAHU BI’AZIZIN DHI ENTIKAMI
39.38: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA LEJAKULUNNAL-LAHU KUL ‘EFERA’EJTUM MA TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘IN ‘ERADENIJAL-LAHU BIDURRIN HEL HUNNE KASHIFETU DURRIHI ‘EW ‘ERADENI BIRAHMETIN HEL HUNNE MUMSIKATU RAHMETIHI KUL HESBIJAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHI JETEWEKKELUL-MUTEWEKKILUN
39.39: KUL JA KAWMI A’MELU ‘ALA MEKANETIKUM ‘INNI ‘AMILUN FESEWFE TA’LEMUN
39.40: MEN JE’TIHI ‘ADHABUN JUHZIHI WE JEHIL-LU ‘ALEJHI ‘ADHABUN MUKIMU
39.41: ‘INNA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJKAL-KITABE LILNNASI BIL-HAKKI FEMENI EHTEDA FELINEFSIHI WE MEN DAL-LE FE’INNAMA JEDILLU ‘ALEJHA WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
39.42: ALLAHU JETEWEFFEL-’ENFUSE HINE MEWTIHA WE E-ETI LEM TEMUT FI MENAMIHA FEJUMSIKU AL-LETI KADA ‘ALEJHAL-MEWTE WE JURSILUL-’UHRA ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
39.43: ‘EMI ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI LEHI SHUFE’A’E KUL ‘EWELEW KENU LA JEMLIKUNE SHEJ’ËN WE LA JA’KILUN
39.44: KUL LIL-LAHI SHEFE’ATU XHEMI’ËN LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI THUMME ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
39.45: WE ‘IDHA DHUKIRAL-LAHU WEHDEHU ESHME’EZZET KULUBUL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIL-’AHIRATI WE ‘IDHA DHUKIREL-LEDHINE MIN DUNIHI ‘IDHA HUM JESTEBSHIRUN
39.46: KULIL-LEHUMME FETIRA SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘ALIMAL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI ‘ENTE TEHKUMU BEJNE ‘IBEDIKE FI MA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
39.47: WE LEW ‘ENNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN WE MITHLEHU ME’AHU LAFTEDEW BIHI MIN SU’IL-’ADHABI JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE BEDA LEHUM MINELLAHI MA LEM JEKUNU JEHTESIBUN
39.48: WE BEDA LEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
39.49: FE’IDHA MESSAL-’INSANE DURRUN DA’ANA THUMME ‘IDHA HAWWELNAHU NI’METEN MINNA KALE ‘INNAMA ‘UTITUHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN BEL HIJE FITNETUN WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
39.50: KAD KALEHEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEKSIBUN
39.51: FE’ESABEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WEL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MIN HA’UULË’ SEJUSIBUHUM SEJJI’ATU MA KESEBU WE MA HUM BIMU’XHIZIN
39.52: ‘EWELEM JA’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JU’UMINUN
39.53: KUL JA ‘IBEDIL-LEDHINE ‘ESRAFU ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM LA TEKNETU MIN RAHMETI LEHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE JEGFIRU EDH-DHUNUBE XHEMI’ËN ‘INNEHU HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
39.54: WE ‘ENIBU ‘ILA RABBIKUM WE ‘ESLIMU LEHU MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUL-’ADHABU THUMME LA TUNSERUN
39.55: WE ETTEBI’U ‘EHSENE MA ‘UNZILE ‘ILEJKUM MIN RABBIKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEKUMUL-’ADHABU BEGTETEN WE ‘ENTUM LA TESH’URUN
39.56: ‘EN TEKULE NEFSUN JA HESRATA ‘ALA MA FERRATTU FI XHENBI LEHI WE ‘IN KUNTU LEMINE SAHIRIN
39.58: ‘EW TEKULE HINE TERAL-’ADHABE LEW ‘ENNE LI KERRATEN FE’EKUNE MINEL-MUHSININ
39.59: BELA KAD XHA’ETKE ‘AJATI FEKEDHDHEBTE BIHA WE ESTEKBERTE WE KUNTE MINEL-KEFIRIN
39.60: WE JEWMAL-KIJAMETI TEREL-LEDHINE KEDHEBU ‘ALA ALLAHI WUXHUHUHUM MUSWEDDETUN ‘ELEJSE FI XHEHENNEME METHWEN LILMUTEKEBBIRIN
39.61: WE JUNEXHXHI ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW BIMEFEZETIHIM LA JEMESSUHUMU SU’U WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
39.62: ALLAHU HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN WE KILU
39.63: LEHU MEKALIDU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI LEHI ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
39.65: WE LEKAD ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJKE WE ‘ILEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIKE LE’IN ‘ESHRAKTE LEJEHBETENNE ‘AMELUKE WE LETEKUNENNE MINEL-HASIRIN
39.66: BELI LLAHE FE’BUD WE KUN MINE ESH-SHAKIRIN
39.67: WE MA KADERU LLAHE HAKKA KADRIHI WEL-’ERDU XHEMI’ËN KABDETUHU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI WE SEMAWETU METWIJATUN BIJEMINIHI SUBHANEHU WE TA’ALA ‘AMMA JUSHRIKUN
39.68: WE NUFIHË FI SURI FESA’IKA MEN FI SEMAWETI WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI ‘IL-LA MEN SHA’-ALLAHU THUMME NUFIHË FIHI ‘UHRA FE’IDHA HUM KIJAMUN JENDHURUN
39.69: WE ‘ESHRAKATIL-’ERDU BINURI RABBIHA WE WUDI’AL-KITABU WE XHI’E BIN-NEBIJINE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’I WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-HAKKI WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
39.70: WE WUFFIJET KUL-LU NEFSIN MA ‘AMILET WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMA JEF’ALUN
39.71: WE SIKEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ILA XHEHENNEME ZUMERAN HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’UHA FUTIHET ‘EBWEBUHA WE KALE LEHUM HAZENETUHA ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM RUSULUN MINKUM JETLUNE ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATI RABBIKUM WE JUNDHIRUNEKUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA KALU BELA WE LAKIN HAKKAT KELIMETUL-’ADHABI ‘ALEL-KEFIRIN
39.72: KILA EDHULU ‘EBWEBE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË FEBI’SE METHWEL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
39.73: WE SIKEL-LEDHINE ETTEKAW RABBEHUM ‘ILAL-XHENNETI ZUMERAN HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’UHA WE FUTIHET ‘EBWEBUHA WE KALE LEHUM HAZENETUHA SALAMUN ‘ALEJKUM TIBTUM FEDHULUHA HALIDIN
39.74: WE KALUL-HAMDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI SEDEKANA WE’DEHU WE ‘EWRATHENAL-’ERDA NETEBEWWE’U MINEL-XHENNETI HEJTHU NESHA’U FENI’ME ‘EXHRUL-’AMILIN
39.75: WE TERAL-MELE’IKETE HAFFINE MIN HEWLIL-’ARSHI JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE KUDIJE BEJNEHUM BIL-HAKKI WE KILEL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN

40.3: GAFIRI EDH-DHENBI WE KABILIT-TEWBI SHEDIDIL-’IKABI DHIT-TEWLI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
40.4: MA JUXHADILU FI ‘AJATI LEHI ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FELA JEGRURKE TEKALLUBUHUM FIL-BILAD
40.5: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WEL-’EHZABU MIN BE’DIHIM WE HEMMET KUL-LU ‘UMMETIN BIRASULIHIM LIJE’HUDHUHU WE XHADELU BIL-BETILI LIJUDHIDU BIHIL-HAKKA FE’EHADHTUHUM FEKEJFE KANE ‘IKAB
40.6: WE KEDHELIKE HAKKAT KELIMETU RABBIKE ‘ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ENNEHUM ‘ES'HABU NAR
40.7: EL-LEDHINE JEHMILUNAL-’ARSHE WE MEN HAWLAHU JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE JU’UMINUNE BIHI WE JESTEGFIRUNE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU RABBENA WESI’TE KUL-LE SHEJ’IN RAHMETEN WE ‘ILMËN FEGFIR LIL-LEDHINE TABU WE ETTEBE’U SEBILEKE WE KIHIM ‘ADHABEL-XHEHIM
40.8: RABBENA WE ‘EDHILHUM XHENNATI ‘ADNIN AL-LETI WE’ADTEHUM WE MEN SELEHE MIN ‘ABE’IHIM WE ‘EZWEXHIHIM WE DHURRIJATIHIM ‘INNEKE ‘ENTAL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
40.9: WE KIHIMU SEJJI’ATI WE MEN TEKI SEJJI’ATI JEWME’IDHIN FEKAD RAHIMTEHU WE DHELIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
40.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JUNADEWNE LEMEKTU LLAHI ‘EKBERU MIN MEKTIKUM ‘ENFUSEKUM ‘IDH TUD’AWNE ‘ILAL-’IMANI FETEKFURUN
40.11: KALU RABBENA ‘EMETTENA ETHNETEJNI WE ‘EHJEJTENA ETHNETEJNI FE’TERAFNA BIDHUNUBINA FEHEL ‘ILA HURUXHIN MIN SEBILI
40.12: DHALIKUM BI’ENNEHU ‘IDHA DU’IJAL-LAHU WEHDEHU KEFERTUM WE ‘IN JUSHRAK BIHI TU’UMINU FELHUKMU LIL-LAHIL-’ALIJIL-KEBIR
40.13: HUWEL-LEDHI JURIKUM ‘AJATIHI WE JUNEZZILU LEKUM MINE SEMA’I RIZKËN WE MA JETEDHEKKERU ‘IL-LA MEN JUNIB
40.14: FED’U LLAHE MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNE WE LEW KERIHAL-KAFIRUN
40.15: RAFI’U DERAXHATI DHUL-’ARSHI JULKI RUHE MIN ‘EMRIHI ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDIHI LIJUNDHIRA JEWMET-TALAK
40.16: JEWME HUM BERIZUNE LA JEHFE ‘ALA ALLAHI MINHUM SHEJ’UN LIMENIL-MULKUL-JEWME LIL-LAHIL-WEHIDIL-KAHHAR
40.17: AL-JEWME TUXHZA KUL-LU NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET LA DHULMAL-JEWME ‘INNALL-LLAHE SERI’UL-HISAB
40.18: WE ‘ENDHIRHUM JEWMAL-’AZIFETI ‘IDHIL-KULUBU LEDAL-HENAXHIRI KADHIMINE MA LILDHDHALIMINE MIN HEMIMIN WE LA SHEFI’IN JUTA’
40.19: JA’LEMU HA’INETAL-’A’JUNI WE MA TUHFI SUDUR
40.20: WA-LLAHU JEKDI BIL-HAKKI WEL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI LA JEKDUNE BISHEJ’IN ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
40.21: ‘EWE LEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE KENU MIN KABLIHIM KENU HUM ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM KUWETEN WE ‘ATHARAN FIL-’ËRDI FE’EHADHEHUMU LLAHU BIDHUNUBIHIM WE MA KANE LEHUM MINI LEHI MIN WEKI
40.22: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KANET TE’TIHIM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEKEFERU FE’EHADHEHUMU LLAHU ‘INNEHU KAWIJUN SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
40.23: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA WE SULTANIN MUBINI
40.24: ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE HAMANE WE KARUNE FEKALU SAHIRUN KEDHDHABU
40.25: FELAMMA XHA’EHUM BIL-HAKKI MIN ‘INDINA KALU EKTULU ‘EBNA’EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU WE ESTEHJU NISA’EHUM WE MA KEJDUL-KEFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DALELI
40.26: WE KALE FIR’AWNU DHERUNI ‘EKTUL MUSA WE LIED’U RABBEHU ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘EN JUBEDDILE DINEKUM ‘EW ‘EN JUDHHIRA FIL-’ËRDIL-FESAD
40.27: WE KALE MUSA ‘INNI ‘UDHTU BIRABBI WE RABBIKUM MIN KUL-LI MUTEKEBBIRIN LA JU’UMINU BIJEWMIL-HISAB
40.28: WE KALE RAXHULUN MU’UMINUN MIN ‘ALI FIR’AWNE JEKTUMU ‘IMANEHU ‘ETEKTULUNE RAXHULËN ‘EN JEKULE RABBIJAL-LAHU WE KAD XHA’EKUM BIL-BEJJINETI MIN RABBIKUM WE ‘IN JEKU KADHIBËN FE’ALEJHI KEDHIBUHU WE ‘IN JEKU SADIKËN JUSIBKUM BE’DUL-LEDHI JA’IDUKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDI MEN HUWE MUSRIFUN KEDHDHABU
40.29: JA KAWMI LEKUMUL-MULKUL-JEWME DHAHIRINE FIL-’ËRDI FEMEN JENSURUNA MIN BE’SI LEHI ‘IN XHA’ENA KALE FIR’AWNU MA ‘URIKUM ‘IL-LA MA ‘ERA WE MA ‘EHDIKUM ‘IL-LA SEBILE RASHAD
40.30: WE KALEL-LEDHI ‘AMANA JA KAWMI ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM MITHLE JEWMIL-’EHZAB
40.31: MITHLE DE’BI KAWMI NUHIN WE ‘ADIN WE THEMUDE WEL-LEDHINE MIN BE’DIHIM WE MALLAHU JURIDU DHULMËN LIL’IBED
40.33: JEWME TUWELLUNE MUDBIRINE MA LEKUM MINELLAHI MIN ‘ASIMIN WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN HADI
40.34: WE LEKAD XHA’EKUM JUSUFU MIN KABLU BIL-BEJJINETI FEMA ZILTUM FI SHEKKIN MIMMA XHA’EKUM BIHI HATTE ‘IDHA HELEKE KULTUM LEN JEB’ATHAL-LAHU MIN BE’DIHI RASULËN KEDHALIKE JUDIL-LU ALLAHU MEN HUWE MUSRIFUN MURTABU
40.35: EL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATI LEHI BIGAJRI SULTANIN ‘ETAHUM KEBURA MEKTËN ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘INDEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KEDHALIKE JETBE’U ALLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI KALBI MUTEKEBBIRIN XHEBBERI
40.36: WE KALE FIR’AWNU JA HAMANU EBNI LI SERHËN LE’ALLI ‘EBLUGUL-’ESBEB
40.37: ‘ESBEBE SEMAWETI FE’ETTELI’A ‘ILA ‘ILEHI MUSA WE ‘INNI LE’EDHUNNUHU KADHIBËN WE KEDHELIKE ZUJJINE LIFIR’AWNE SU’U ‘AMELIHI WE SUDDE ‘ANI SEBILI WE MA KEJDU FIR’AWNE ‘IL-LA FI TEBEBI
40.38: WE KALEL-LEDHI ‘AMANA JA KAWMI ETTEBI’UNI ‘EHDIKUM SEBILE RASHAD
40.39: JA KAWMI ‘INNAMA HEDHIHIL-HEJA ETU DUN'JA META’UN WE ‘INNAL-’AHIRATE HIJE DARUL-KARAR
40.40: MEN ‘AMILE SEJJI’ETEN FELA JUXHZA ‘IL-LA MITHLEHA WE MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN MIN DHEKERIN ‘EW ‘UNTHA WE HUWE MU’UMINUN FE’ULË’IKE JEDHULUNAL-XHENNETE JURZEKUNE FIHË BIGAJRI HISABI
40.41: WE JAKAWMI MA LI ‘ED’UKUM ‘ILA NEXHËTI WE TED’UNENI ‘ILA NAR
40.42: TED’UNENI LI’KFURA BIL-LAHI WE ‘USHRIKE BIHI MA LEJSE LI BIHI ‘ILMUN WE ‘ENA ‘ED’UKUM ‘ILAL-’AZIZIL-GAFFER
40.43: LA XHERAME ‘ENNEMA TED’UNENI ‘ILEJHI LEJSE LEHU DA’WETUN FI DUN'JA WE LA FIL-’AHIRATI WE ‘ENNE MERADDENA ‘ILA LLAHI WE ‘ENNAL-MUSRIFINE HUM ‘ES'HABU NAR
40.44: FESETEDHKURUNE MA ‘EKULU LEKUM WE ‘UFEWWIDU ‘EMRI ‘ILA LLAHI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BESIRUN BIL-’IBED
40.45: FEWEKAHU ALLAHU SEJJI’ATI MA MEKERU WE HAKA BI’ALI FIR’AWNE SU’UL-’ADHAB
40.46: NARU JU’RADUNE ‘ALEJHA GUDUWËN WE ‘ASHIJËN WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU ‘EDHILU ‘ALE FIR’AWNE ‘ESHEDDAL-’ADHAB
40.47: WE ‘IDH JETEHAXHXHUNE FI NARI FEJAKULU DU’AFE’U LIL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUNNA LEKUM TEBE’ËN FEHEL ‘ENTUM MUGNUNE ‘ANNA NESIBËN MINE NAR
40.48: KALEL-LEDHINE ESTEKBERU ‘INNA KUL-LUN FIHË ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAD HEKEME BEJNAL-’IBED
40.49: WE KALEL-LEDHINE FI NARI LIHAZENETI XHEHENNEME ED’U RABBEKUM JUHAFFIF ‘ANNA JEWMËN MINEL-’ADHAB
40.50: KALU ‘EWE LEM TEKU TE’TIKUM RUSULUKUM BIL-BEJJINETI KALU BELA KALU FED’U WE MA DU’A’UL-KEFIRINE ‘IL-LA FI DALELI
40.51: ‘INNA LENENSURU RUSULENA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE JEWME JEKUMUL-’ESH/HAD
40.52: JEWME LA JENFE’U EDH-DHALIMINE MA’DHIRATUHUM WE LEHUMUL-LA’NETU WE LEHUM SU’U DAR
40.55: FESBIR ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE ESTEGFIR LIDHENBIKE WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE BIL-’ASHIJI WEL-’IBKAR
40.56: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATI LEHI BIGAJRI SULTANIN ‘ETAHUM ‘IN FI SUDURIHIM ‘IL-LA KIBRUN MA HUM BIBELIGIHI FESTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
40.57: LEHALKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI ‘EKBERU MIN HALKI NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
40.58: WE MA JESTEWIL-’A’MA WEL-BESIRU WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE LAL-MUSI’U KALILËN MA TETEDHEKKERUN
40.59: ‘INNE SA’ATE LE’ATIJETUN LA RAJBE FIHË WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JU’UMINUN
40.60: WE KALE RABBUKUM ED’UNI ‘ESTEXHIB LEKUM ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JESTEKBIRUNE ‘AN ‘IBEDETI SEJEDHULUNE XHEHENNEME DAHIRIN
40.61: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-LEJLE LITESKUNU FIHI WE NEHARA MUBSIRAN ‘INNALL-LLAHE LEDHU FEDLIN ‘ALA NASI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JESHKURUN
40.62: DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM HALIKU KUL-LI SHEJ’IN LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE’ENNA TU’UFEKUN
40.63: KEDHALIKE JU’UFEKUL-LEDHINE KENU BI’AJATI LEHI JEXHHEDUN
40.64: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDA KARARAN WE SEMA’E BINA’EN WE SEWWERAKUM FE’EHSENE SUWERAKUM WE RAZEKAKUM MINET-TEJJIBETI DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBUKUM FETEBERAKEL-LEHU RABBUL-’ALEMIN
40.65: HUWEL-HEJJU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FED’UHU MUHLISINE LEHU DIJNEL-HAMDU LIL-LAHI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
40.66: KUL ‘INNI NUHITU ‘EN ‘A’BUDEL-LEDHINE TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI LEMMA XHA’ENIJAL-BEJJINATU MIN RABBI WE ‘UMIRTU ‘EN ‘USLIME LIRABBIL-’ALEMIN
40.67: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM MIN TURABIN THUMME MIN NUTFETIN THUMME MIN ‘ALEKATIN THUMME JUHRIXHUKUM TIFLËN THUMME LITEBLUGU ‘ESHUDDEKUM THUMME LITEKUNU SHUJUHËN WE MINKUM MEN JUTEWEFFE MIN KABLU WE LITEBLUGU ‘EXHELËN MUSEMMEN WE LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
40.68: HUWEL-LEDHI JUHJI WE JUMITU FE’IDHA KADA ‘EMRAN FE’INNAMA JAKULU LEHU KUN FEJEKUN
40.70: EL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BIL-KITABI WE BIMA ‘ERSELNA BIHI RUSULENA FESEWFE JA’LEMUN
40.73: THUMME KILA LEHUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM TUSHRIKUN
40.74: MIN DUNI LEHI KALU DELLU ‘ANNA BEL LEM NEKUN NED’U MIN KABLU SHEJ’ËN KEDHALIKE JUDIL-LU ALLAHUL-KEFIRIN
40.75: DHALIKUM BIMA KUNTUM TEFRAHUNE FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE BIMA KUNTUM TEMRAHUN
40.76: EDHULU ‘EBWEBE XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË FEBI’SE METHWEL-MUTEKEBBIRIN
40.77: FESBIR ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN FE’IMMA NURIJENNEKE BE’DEL-LEDHI NA’IDUHUM ‘EW NETEWEFFEJENNEKE FE’ILEJNA JURXHA’UN
40.78: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULËN MIN KABLIKE MINHUM MEN KASESNA ‘ALEJKE WE MINHUM MEN LEM NEKSUS ‘ALEJKE WE MA KANE LIRASULIN ‘EN JE’TIJE BI’AJETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI FE’IDHË XHË’E ‘EMRU LLAHI KUDIJE BIL-HAKKI WE HASIRA HUNALIKAL-MUBTILUN
40.79: ALLAHUL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’EN’AM LITERKEBU MINHA WE MINHA TE’KULUN
40.80: WE LEKUM FIHË MENAFI’U WE LITEBLUGU ‘ALEJHA HAXHETEN FI SUDURIKUM WE ‘ALEJHA WE ‘ALEL-FULKI TUHMELUN
40.82: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KENU ‘EKTHERA MINHUM WE ‘ESHEDDE KUWETEN WE ‘ATHARAN FIL-’ËRDI FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM MA KENU JEKSIBUN
40.83: FELAMMA XHA’ET/HUM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FERIHU BIMA ‘INDEHUM MINEL-’ILMI WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
40.84: FELAMMA RA’EW BE’SENA KALU ‘AMANNA BIL-LAHI WEHDEHU WE KEFERNA BIMA KUNNA BIHI MUSHRIKIN
40.85: FELEM JEKU JENFE’UHUM ‘IMANUHUM LEMMA RA’EW BE’SENA SUNNETALLAHI AL-LETI KAD HALET FI ‘IBEDIHI WE HASIRA HUNALIKAL-KAFIRUN

41.4: BESHIRAN WE NEDHIRAN FE’A’RADE ‘EKTHERUHUM FEHUM LA JESMA’UN
41.5: WE KALU KULUBUNA FI ‘EKINNETIN MIMMA TED’UNA ‘ILEJHI WE FI ‘ADHANINA WEKRUN WE MIN BEJNINA WE BEJNIKE HIXHABUN FE’MEL ‘INNENA ‘AMILUN
41.6: KUL ‘INNAMA ‘ENA BESHERUN MITHLUKUM JUHA ‘ILEJJE ‘ENNEMA ‘ILEHUKUM ‘ILEHUN WEHIDUN FESTEKIMU ‘ILEJHI WE ESTEGFIRUHU WE WEJLUN LILMUSHRIKIN
41.7: EL-LEDHINE LA JU’UTUNE EZ-ZEKËTE WE HUM BIL-’AHIRATI HUM KAFIRUN
41.9: KUL ‘E’INNEKUM LETEKFURUNE BIEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’ERDA FI JEWMEJNI WE TEXH’ALUNE LEHU ‘ENDADËN DHALIKE RABBUL-’ALEMIN
41.10: WE XHE’ALE FIHË RAWESIJE MIN FEWKIHA WE BERAKE FIHË WE KADDERA FIHË ‘EKWETEHA FI ‘ERBE’ATI ‘EJJAMIN SEWE’EN LILSSA’ILIN
41.11: THUMME ESTEWE ‘ILA SEMA’I WE HIJE DUHANUN FEKALE LEHA WE LIL’ARDI EI’TIJA TEW’ËN ‘EW KERHËN KALETA ‘ETEJNA TA’I’IN
41.12: FEKADAHUNNE SEB’A SEMAWETIN FI JEWMEJNI WE ‘EWHA FI KUL-LI SEMA’IN ‘EMRAHA WE ZEJJENNA SEMA’E DUN'JA BIMESABIHE WE HIFDHËN DHALIKE TEKDIRUL-’AZIZIL-’ALIM
41.13: FE’IN ‘A’RADU FEKUL ‘ENDHERTUKUM SA’IKATEN MITHLE SA’IKATI ‘ADIN WE THEMUD
41.14: ‘IDH XHA’ET/HUMU RUSULU MIN BEJNI ‘EJDIHIM WE MIN HALFIHIM ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE KALU LEW SHA’E RABBUNA LE’ENZELE MELE’IKETEN FE’INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
41.15: FE’EMMA ‘ADUN FESTEKBERU FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE KALU MEN ‘ESHEDDU MINNA KUWETEN ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA-LLAHEL-LEDHI HALEKAHUM HUWE ‘ESHEDDU MINHUM KUWETEN WE KENU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
41.16: FE’ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN SERSERAN FI ‘EJJAMIN NEHISATIN LINUDHIKAHUM ‘ADHABEL-HIZJI FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EHZA WE HUM LA JUNSERUN
41.17: WE ‘EMMA THEMUDU FEHEDEJNAHUM FESTEHEBBUL-’AMA ‘ALEL-HUDA FE’EHADHET/HUM SA’IKATUL-’ADHABIL-HUNI BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
41.19: WE JEWME JUHSHERU ‘A’DA’U LLAHI ‘ILA NARI FEHUM JUZA’UN
41.20: HATTE ‘IDHA MA XHA’UHA SHEHIDE ‘ALEJHIM SEM’UHUM WE ‘EBSARUHUM WE XHULUDUHUM BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
41.21: WE KALU LIXHULUDIHIM LIME SHEHIDTUM ‘ALEJNA KALU ‘ENTEKANALLAHUL-LEDHI ‘ENTEKA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN WE HUWE HALEKAKUM ‘EWWELE MERRATIN WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
41.22: WE MA KUNTUM TESTETIRUNE ‘EN JESH/HEDE ‘ALEJKUM SEM’UKUM WE LA ‘EBSARUKUM WE LA XHULUDUKUM WE LAKIN DHENENTUM ‘ENNA-LLAHE LA JA’LEMU KETHIRAN MIMMA TA’MELUN
41.23: WE DHELIKUM DHENNUKUMUL-LEDHI DHENENTUM BIRABBIKUM ‘ERDAKUM FE’ESBEHTUM MINEL-HASIRIN
41.24: FE’IN JESBIRU FELNNARU METHWEN LEHUM WE ‘IN JESTA’TIBU FEMA HUM MINEL-MU’TEBIN
41.25: WE KAJJEDNA LEHUM KURANA’E FEZEJJENU LEHUM MA BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE MA HALFEHUM WE HAKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INNAHUM KENU HASIRIN
41.26: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TESMA’U LIHEDHAL-KUR’ANI WEL-GAW FIHI LE’AL-LEKUM TEGLIBUN
41.27: FELENUDHIKANNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN WE LENEXHZIJENNEHUM ‘ESWE’EL-LEDHI KENU JA’MELUN
41.28: DHALIKE XHEZA’U ‘A’DA’I LEHI NARU LEHUM FIHË DARUL-HULDI XHEZA’EN BIMA KENU BI’AJATINA JEXHHEDUN
41.29: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU RABBENA ‘ERINAL-LEDHEJNI ‘EDELLANA MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI NEXH’ALHUMA TEHTE ‘EKDAMINA LIJEKUNA MINEL-’ESFELIN
41.30: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KALU RABBUNALLAHU THUMME ESTEKAMU TETENEZZELU ‘ALEJHIMUL-MELE’IKETU ‘ELLA TEHAFU WE LA TEHZENU WE ‘EBSHIRU BIL-XHENNETI AL-LETI KUNTUM TU’ADUN
41.31: NAHNU ‘EWLIJA’UUKUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE FIL-’AHIRATI WE LEKUM FIHË MA TESHTEHI ‘ENFUSUKUM WE LEKUM FIHË MA TEDDA’UN
41.33: WE MEN ‘EHSENU KAWLËN MIMMEN DA’A ‘ILA LLAHI WE ‘AMILE SALIHËN WE KALE ‘INNENI MINEL-MUSLIMIN
41.34: WE LA TESTEWIL-HESENETU WE LA SEJJI’ETU EDFE’ BI-ETI HIJE ‘EHSENU FE’IDHEL-LEDHI BEJNEKE WE BEJNEHU ‘ADAWETUN KE’ENNEHU WE LIJUN HEMIMU
41.35: WE MA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LEL-LEDHINE SEBERU WE MA JULEKKAHA ‘IL-LA DHU HEDHDHIN ‘ADHIMI
41.36: WE ‘IMMA JENZEGANNEKE MINE SHEJTANI NEZGUN FESTA’IDH BIL-LAHI ‘INNEHU HUWE SEMI’UL-’ALIM
41.37: WE MIN ‘AJATIHIL-LEJLU WE NEHARU WE SHEMSU WEL-KAMERU LA TESXHUDU LILSHSHEMSI WE LA LILKAMERI WE ESXHUDU LIL-LAHIL-LEDHI HALEKAHUNNE ‘IN KUNTUM ‘IJAHU TA’BUDUN
41.38: FE’INI ESTEKBERU FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘INDE RABBIKE JUSEBBIHUNE LEHU BIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE HUM LA JES’EMUN
41.39: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI ‘ENNEKE TERAL-’ERDA HASHI’ATEN FE’IDHA ‘ENZELNA ‘ALEJHAL-MA’E EHTEZZET WE RABET ‘INNEL-LEDHI ‘EHJAHA LEMUHJIL-MEWTA ‘INNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
41.40: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JULHIDUNE FI ‘AJATINA LA JEHFEWNE ‘ALEJNA ‘EFEMEN JULKA FI NARI HAJRUN ‘EM MEN JE’TI ‘AMINËN JEWMAL-KIJAMETI A’MELU MA SHI’TUM ‘INNEHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
41.41: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIDH-DHIKRI LEMMA XHA’EHUM WE ‘INNEHU LEKITABUN ‘AZIZU
41.42: LA JE’TIHIL-BETILU MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE LA MIN HALFIHI TENZILUN MIN HEKIMIN HEMIDI
41.43: MA JUKALU LEKE ‘IL-LA MA KAD KILA LILRRUSULI MIN KABLIKE ‘INNE RABBEKE LEDHU MEGFIRATIN WE DHU ‘IKABIN ‘ELIMI
41.44: WE LEW XHE’ALNAHU KUR’ANËN ‘A’XHEMIJËN LEKALU LEWLA FUSSILET ‘AJATUHU ‘E’A’XHEMIJUN WE ‘ARABIJUN KUL HUWE LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU HUDAN WE SHIFE’UN WEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE FI ‘ADHANIHIM WEKRUN WE HUWE ‘ALEJHIM ‘AMEN ‘ULË’IKE JUNADEWNE MIN MEKANIN BE’IDI
41.45: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA MUSAL-KITABE FEHTULIFE FIHI WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNAHUM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
41.46: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘ESA’E FE’ALEJHA WE MA RABBUKE BIDHAL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
41.47: ‘ILEJHI JURADDU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE MA TEHRUXHU MIN THEMERATIN MIN ‘EKMAMIHA WE MA TEHMILU MIN ‘UNTHA WE LA TEDA’U ‘IL-LA BI’ILMIHI WE JEWME JUNADIHIM ‘EJNE SHURAKA’I KALU ‘ADHENNAKE MA MINNA MIN SHEHIDI
41.48: WE DAL-LE ‘ANHUM MA KENU JED’UNE MIN KABLU WE DHENNU MA LEHUM MIN MEHISI
41.49: LA JES’EMUL-’INSANU MIN DU’A’IL-HAJRI WE ‘IN MESSEHU SHERRU FEJE’USUN KENUTU
41.50: WE LE’IN ‘EDHEKNAHU RAHMETEN MINNA MIN BE’DI DERRA’E MESSET/HU LEJEKULENNE HADHA LI WE MA ‘EDHUNNU SA’ATE KA’IMETEN WE LE’IN RUXHI’TU ‘ILA RABBI ‘INNE LI ‘INDEHU LELHUSNA FELENUNEBBI’ENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIMA ‘AMILU WE LENUDHIKANNEHUM MIN ‘ADHABIN GALIDHI
41.51: WE ‘IDHA ‘EN’AMNA ‘ALEL-’INSANI ‘A’RADE WE NE’A BIXHANIBIHI WE ‘IDHA MESSEHU SHERRU FEDHU DU’A’IN ‘ARIDI
41.52: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KANE MIN ‘INDI LEHI THUMME KEFERTUM BIHI MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMEN HUWE FI SHIKAKIN BE’IDI
41.53: SENURIHIM ‘AJATINA FIL-’AFEKI WE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM HATTE JETEBEJJENE LEHUM ‘ENNEHUL-HEKKU ‘EWELEM JEKFI BIRABBIKE ‘ENNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
41.54: ‘ALA ‘INNAHUM FI MIRJETIN MIN LIKA’I RABBIHIM ‘ALA ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN MUHITU

42.4: LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE HUWEL-’ALIJUL-’ADHIM
42.5: TEKADU SEMAWETU JETEFETTERNE MIN FEWKIHINNE WEL-MELE’IKETU JUSEBBIHUNE BIHEMDI RABBIHIM WE JESTEGFIRUNE LIMEN FIL-’ËRDI ‘ALA ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
42.6: WEL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’AL-LAHU HEFIDHUN ‘ALEJHIM WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIWEKILI
42.7: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE KUR’ANËN ‘ARABIJËN LITUNDHIRA ‘UMMAL-KURA WE MEN HEWLEHA WE TUNDHIRA JEWMAL-XHEM’I LA RAJBE FIHI FERIKUN FIL-XHENNETI WE FERIKUN FI SA’IR
42.8: WE LEW SHA’-ALLAHU LEXHE’ALEHUM ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN WE LAKIN JUDHILU MEN JESHA’U FI RAHMETIHI WE EDH-DHALIMUNE MA LEHUM MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
42.9: ‘EM ETTEHADHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’E FE-ALLAHU HUWEL-WELIJU WE HUWE JUHJIL-MEWTA WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
42.10: WE MA EHTELEFTUM FIHI MIN SHEJ’IN FEHUKMUHU ‘ILA LLAHI DHELIKUMU LLAHU RABBI ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELTU WE ‘ILEJHI ‘UNIB
42.11: FETIRU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI XHE’ALE LEKUM MIN ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘EZWEXHËN WE MINEL-’EN’AM ‘EZWEXHËN JEDHRA’UUKUM FIHI LEJSE KEMITHLIHI SHEJ’UN WE HUWE SEMI’UL-BESIR
42.12: LEHU MEKALIDU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JEBSUTU RIZKA LIMEN JESHA’U WE JEKDIRU ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
42.13: SHERA’A LEKUM MINE DINI MA WESSA BIHI NUHËN WEL-LEDHI ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE WE MA WESSEJNA BIHI ‘IBRAHIME WE MUSA WE ‘ISA ‘EN ‘EKIMU DIJNE WE LA TETEFERRAKU FIHI KEBURA ‘ALEL-MUSHRIKINE MA TED’UHUM ‘ILEJHI ALLAHU JEXHTEBI ‘ILEJHI MEN JESHA’U WE JEHDI ‘ILEJHI MEN JUNIB
42.14: WE MA TEFERRAKU ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEG'JËN BEJNEHUM WE LEWLA KELIMETUN SEBEKAT MIN RABBIKE ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ‘URITHUL-KITABE MIN BE’DIHIM LEFI SHEKKIN MINHU MURIBI
42.15: FELIDHELIKE FED’U WE ESTEKIM KAMA ‘UMIRTE WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWE’EHUM WE KUL ‘AMENTU BIMA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU MIN KITABIN WE ‘UMIRTU LI’’DILE BEJNEKUMU LLAHU RABBUNA WE RABBUKUM LENA ‘A’MALUNA WE LEKUM ‘A’MALUKUM LA HUXHXHETE BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUMU LLAHU JEXHMA’U BEJNENA WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
42.16: WEL-LEDHINE JUHAXHXHUNE FI LEHI MIN BE’DI MA ESTUXHIBE LEHU HUXHXHETUHUM DAHIDETUN ‘INDE RABBIHIM WE ‘ALEJHIM GADEBUN WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDU
42.17: ALLAHUL-LEDHI ‘ENZALEL-KITABE BIL-HAKKI WEL-MIZANE WE MA JUDRIKE LE’ALLE SA’ATE KARIBU
42.18: JESTA’XHILU BIHEL-LEDHINE LA JU’UMINUNE BIHA WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MUSHFIKUNE MINHA WE JA’LEMUNE ‘ENNEHAL-HEKKU ‘ALA ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUMARUNE FI SA’ATI LEFI DALELIN BE’IDI
42.19: ALLAHU LETIFUN BI’IBEDIHI JERZUKU MEN JESHA’U WE HUWEL-KAWIJUL-’AZIZ
42.20: MEN KANE JURIDU HERTHAL-’AHIRATI NEZID LEHU FI HERTHIHI WE MEN KANE JURIDU HERTHE DUN'JA NU’UTIHI MINHA WE MA LEHU FIL-’AHIRATI MIN NESIBI
42.21: ‘EM LEHUM SHURAKA’U SHERA’U LEHUM MINE DINI MA LEM JE’DHEN BIHI ALLAHU WE LEWLA KELIMETUL-FESLI LEKUDIJE BEJNEHUM WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
42.22: TERA EDH-DHALIMINE MUSHFIKINE MIMMA KESEBU WE HUWE WEKI’UN BIHIM WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FI RAWDATIL-XHENNATI LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE ‘INDE RABBIHIM DHALIKE HUWEL-FEDLUL-KEBIR
42.23: DHALIKEL-LEDHI JUBESHSHIRU ALLAHU ‘IBEDEHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI KUL LA ‘ES’ELUKUM ‘ALEJHI ‘EXHRAN ‘IL-LAL-MEWEDDETE FIL-KURBE WE MEN JEKTERIF HESENETEN NEZID LEHU FIHË HUSNËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN SHEKURU
42.24: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBËN FE’IN JESHE’I ALLAHU JEHTIM ‘ALA KALBIKE WE JEMHU ALLAHUL-BETILE WE JUHIKKUL-HAKKA BIKELIMATIHI ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
42.25: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JEKBELUT-TEWBET ‘AN ‘IBEDIHI WE JA’FU ‘ANI SEJJI’ATI WE JA’LEMU MA TEF’ALUN
42.26: WE JESTEXHIBUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE JEZIDUHUM MIN FEDLIHI WEL-KAFIRUNE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDU
42.27: WE LEW BESETAL-LAHU RIZKA LI’IBEDIHI LEBEGAW FIL-’ËRDI WE LAKIN JUNEZZILU BIKADERIN MA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU BI’IBEDIHI HABIRUN BESIRU
42.28: WE HUWEL-LEDHI JUNEZZILUL-GAJTHE MIN BE’DI MA KANETU WE JENSHURU RAHMETEHU WE HUWEL-WELIJUL-HEMID
42.29: WE MIN ‘AJATIHI HALKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BETHTHE FIHIMA MIN DABBETIN WE HUWE ‘ALA XHEM’IHIM ‘IDHA JESHA’U KADIRU
42.30: WE MA ‘ESABEKUM MIN MUSIBETIN FEBIMA KESEBET ‘EJDIKUM WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRI
42.31: WE MA ‘ENTUM BIMU’XHIZINE FIL-’ËRDI WE MA LEKUM MIN DUNI LEHI MIN WE LIJIN WE LA NESIRI
42.33: ‘IN JESHE’ JUSKINI RIHE FEJEDHLELNE RAWEKIDE ‘ALA DHEHRIHI ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKUL-LI SEBBERIN SHEKURI
42.34: ‘EW JUBIKHUNNE BIMA KESEBU WE JA’FU ‘AN KETHIRI
42.35: WE JA’LEMEL-LEDHINE JUXHADILUNE FI ‘AJATINA MA LEHUM MIN MEHISI
42.36: FEMA ‘UTITUM MIN SHEJ’IN FEMETA’UL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE MA ‘IND-ALLAHI HAJRUN WE ‘EBKA LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ALA RABBIHIM JETEWEKKELUN
42.37: WEL-LEDHINE JEXHTENIBUNE KEBE’IRAL-’ITHMI WEL-FEWEHISHE WE ‘IDHA MA GADIBU HUM JEGFIRUN
42.38: WEL-LEDHINE ESTEXHABU LIRABBIHIM WE ‘EKAMU SELËTE WE ‘EMRUHUM SHURA BEJNEHUM WE MIMMA RAZEKNAHUM JUNFIKUN
42.40: WE XHEZA’U SEJJI’ETIN SEJJI’ETUN MITHLUHA FEMEN ‘AFE WE ‘ESLEHE FE’EXHRUHU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNEHU LA JUHIBBU EDH-DHALIMIN
42.41: WE LEMENI ENTESERA BE’DE DHULMIHI FE’ULË’IKE MA ‘ALEJHIM MIN SEBILI
42.42: ‘INNAMA SEBILU ‘ALEL-LEDHINE JEDHLIMUNE NASE WE JEBGUNE FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
42.43: WE LEMEN SEBERA WE GAFERA ‘INNE DHALIKE LEMIN ‘AZMIL-’UMUR
42.44: WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN WE LIJIN MIN BE’DIHI WE TERA EDH-DHALIMINE LEMMA RA’EWL-’ADHABE JAKULUNE HEL ‘ILA MERADDIN MIN SEBILI
42.45: WE TERAHUM JU’RADUNE ‘ALEJHA HASHI’INE MINE EDH-DHULLI JENDHURUNE MIN TERFIN HAFIJIN WE KALEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNAL-HASIRINEL-LEDHINE HASIRU ‘ANFUSAHUM WE ‘EHLIHIM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘ALA ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE FI ‘ADHABIN MUKIMI
42.46: WE MA KANE LEHUM MIN ‘EWLIJA’E JENSURUNEHUM MIN DUNI LEHI WE MEN JUDLILI ALLAHU FEMA LEHU MIN SEBILI
42.47: ESTEXHIBU LIRABBIKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE JEWMUN LA MERADDE LEHU MINELLAHI MA LEKUM MIN MELXHE’IIN JEWME’IDHIN WE MA LEKUM MIN NEKIRI
42.48: FE’IN ‘A’RADU FEMA ‘ERSELNAKE ‘ALEJHIM HEFIDHËN ‘IN ‘ALEJKE ‘IL-LAL-BELAGU WE ‘INNA ‘IDHA ‘EDHEKNAL-’INSANE MINNA RAHMETEN FERIHE BIHA WE ‘IN TUSIBHUM SEJJI’ETUN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM FE’INNAL-’INSANE KEFURU
42.49: LIL-LAHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JEHLUKU MA JESHA’U JEHEBU LIMEN JESHA’U ‘INATHËN WE JEHEBU LIMEN JESHA’U EDH-DHUKUR
42.50: ‘EW JUZEWWIXHUHUM DHUKRANËN WE ‘INATHËN WE JEXH’ALU MEN JESHA’U ‘AKIMËN ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN KADIRU
42.51: WE MA KANE LIBESHERIN ‘EN JUKELLIMEHU ALLAHU ‘IL-LA WEHJËN ‘EW MIN WERA’I HIXHABIN ‘EW JURSILE RASULËN FEJUHIJE BI’IDHNIHI MA JESHA’U ‘INNEHU ‘ALIJUN HEKIMU
42.52: WE KEDHELIKE ‘EWHEJNA ‘ILEJKE RUHËN MIN ‘EMRINA MA KUNTE TEDRI MAL-KITABU WE LAL-’IMANU WE LAKIN XHE’ALNAHU NURAN NEHDI BIHI MEN NESHA’U MIN ‘IBEDINA WE ‘INNEKE LETEHDI ‘ILA SIRATIN MUSTEKIMI
42.53: SIRATI LEHIL-LEDHI LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI ‘ALA ‘ILA LLAHI TESIRUL-’UMUR

43.7: WE MA JE’TIHIM MIN NEBIJIN ‘IL-LA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
43.8: FE’EHLEKNA ‘ESHEDDE MINHUM BETSHËN WE MEDA METHELUL-’EWWELIN
43.9: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA LEJAKULUNNE HALEKAHUNNAL-’AZIZUL-’ALIM
43.10: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDA MEHDËN WE XHE’ALE LEKUM FIHË SUBULËN LE’AL-LEKUM TEHTEDUN
43.11: WEL-LEDHI NEZZELE MINE SEMA’I MA’EN BIKADERIN FE’ENSHERNA BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN KEDHALIKE TUHRAXHUN
43.12: WEL-LEDHI HALEKAL-’EZWEXHE KUL-LEHA WE XHE’ALE LEKUM MINEL-FULKI WEL-’EN’AM MA TERKEBUN
43.13: LITESTEWU ‘ALA DHUHURIHI THUMME TEDHKURU NI’METE RABBIKUM ‘IDHA ESTEWEJTUM ‘ALEJHI WE TEKULU SUBHANEL-LEDHI SEHHARA LENA HADHA WE MA KUNNA LEHU MUKRININ
43.15: WE XHE’ALU LEHU MIN ‘IBEDIHI XHUZ’ËN ‘INNAL-’INSANE LEKEFURUN MUBINU
43.16: ‘EM ETTEHADHE MIMMA JEHLUKU BENATIN WE ‘ESFEKUM BIL-BENIN
43.17: WE ‘IDHA BUSHSHIRA ‘EHEDUHUM BIMA DERABE LILRRAHMENI METHELËN DHELLE WEXHHUHU MUSWEDDËN WE HUWE KEDHIMU
43.18: ‘EWEMEN JUNESHSHE’U FIL-HILJETI WE HUWE FIL-HISAMI GAJRU MUBINI
43.19: WE XHE’ALUL-MELE’IKETEL-LEDHINE HUM ‘IBEDU RAHMANI ‘INATHËN ‘ESHEHIDU HALKAHUM SETUKTEBU SHEHADETUHUM WE JUS’ELUN
43.20: WE KALU LEW SHA’E RAHMANU MA ‘ABEDNAHUM MA LEHUM BIDHALIKE MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEHRUSUN
43.21: ‘EM ‘ATEJNAHUM KITABËN MIN KABLIHI FEHUM BIHI MUSTEMSIKUN
43.23: WE KEDHELIKE MA ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE FI KARJETIN MIN NEDHIRIN ‘IL-LA KALE MUTRAFUHA ‘INNA WEXHEDNA ‘ABE’ENA ‘ALA ‘UMMETIN WE ‘INNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM MUKTEDUN
43.24: KALE ‘EWELEW XHI’TUKUM BI’EHDA MIMMA WEXHEDTUM ‘ALEJHI ‘ABE’EKUM KALU ‘INNA BIMA ‘URSILTUM BIHI KAFIRUN
43.26: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘IBRAHIMU LI’EBIHI WE KAWMIHI ‘INNENI BERA’UN MIMMA TA’BUDUN
43.28: WE XHE’ALEHA KELIMETEN BEKIJETEN FI ‘AKIBIHI LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
43.29: BEL METTA’TU HA’UULË’ WE ‘ABE’EHUM HATTE XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU WE RASULUN MUBINU
43.30: WE LEMMA XHA’EHUMUL-HEKKU KALU HADHA SIHRUN WE ‘INNA BIHI KAFIRUN
43.31: WE KALU LEWLA NUZZILE HADHAL-KUR’ANU ‘ALA RAXHULIN MINEL-KARJETEJNI ‘ADHIMI
43.32: ‘EHUM JEKSIMUNE RAHMETE RABBIKE NAHNU KASEMNA BEJNEHUM MA’ISHETEHUM FIL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WE RAFE’NA BE’DEHUM FEWKA BE’DIN DERAXHATIN LIJETTEHIDHE BE’DUHUM BE’DËN SUHRIJËN WE RAHMETU RABBIKE HAJRUN MIMMA JEXHMA’UN
43.33: WE LEWLA ‘EN JEKUNE NASU ‘UMMETEN WEHIDETEN LEXHE’ALNA LIMEN JEKFURU BIR-RAHMENI LIBUJUTIHIM SUKUFËN MIN FEDDETIN WE MA’ARIXHE ‘ALEJHA JEDHHERUN
43.35: WE ZUHRUFËN WE ‘IN KUL-LU DHALIKE LEMMA META’UL-HEJËTI DUN'JA WEL-’AHIRATU ‘INDE RABBIKE LILMUTTAKIN
43.36: WE MEN JA’SHU ‘AN DHIKRI RAHMANI NUKAJJID LEHU SHEJTANËN FEHUWE LEHU KARINU
43.37: WE ‘INNAHUM LEJESUDDUNEHUM ‘ANI SEBILI WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM MUHTEDUN
43.38: HATTE ‘IDHË XHË’ENA KALE JA LEJTE BEJNI WE BEJNEKE BU’DAL-MESHRIKAJNI FEBI’SAL-KARIN
43.39: WE LEN JENFE’AKUMUL-JEWME ‘IDH DHELEMTUM ‘ENNEKUM FIL-’ADHABI MUSHTERIKUN
43.40: ‘EFE’ENTE TUSMI’U SUMME ‘EW TEHDIL-’UMJE WE MEN KANE FI DALELIN MUBINI
43.41: FE’IMMA NEDH/HEBENNE BIKE FE’INNA MINHUM MUNTEKIMUN
43.44: WE ‘INNEHU LEDHIKRUN LEKE WE LIKAWMIKE WE SEWFE TUS’ELUN
43.45: WE ES’EL MEN ‘ERSELNA MIN KABLIKE MIN RUSULINA ‘EXHE’ALNA MIN DUNI RAHMANI ‘ALIHETEN JU’BEDUN
43.46: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA MUSA BI’AJATINA ‘ILA FIR’AWNE WE MELE’IHI FEKALE ‘INNI RASULU RABBIL-’ALEMIN
43.47: FELAMMA XHA’EHUM BI’AJATINA ‘IDHA HUM MINHA JEDHEKUN
43.48: WE MA NURIHIM MIN ‘AJETIN ‘IL-LA HIJE ‘EKBERU MIN ‘UHTIHA WE ‘EHADHNAHUM BIL-’ADHABI LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
43.49: WE KALU JA ‘EJJUHA SAHIRU ED’U LENA RABBEKE BIMA ‘AHIDE ‘INDEKE ‘INNENA LEMUHTEDU
43.51: WE NADA FIR’AWNU FI KAWMIHI KALE JA KAWMI ‘ELEJSE LI MULKU MISRA WE HEDHIHIL-’ENHARU TEXHRI MIN TEHTI ‘EFELA TUBSIRUN
43.52: ‘EM ‘ENA HAJRUN MIN HADHEL-LEDHI HUWE MEHINUN WE LA JEKADU JUBIN
43.53: FELEWLA ‘ULKIJE ‘ALEJHI ‘ESWIRATUN MIN DHEHEBIN ‘EW XHA’E ME’AHUL-MELE’IKETU MUKTERININ
43.54: FESTEHAFFE KAWMEHU FE’ETA’UHU ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWMËN FESIKIN
43.57: WE LEMMA DURIBE EBNU MERJEME METHELËN ‘IDHA KAWMUKE MINHU JESIDDUN
43.58: WE KALU ‘E’ALIHETUNA HAJRUN ‘EM HUWE MA DERABUHU LEKE ‘IL-LA XHEDELËN BEL HUM KAWMUN HASIMUN
43.60: WE LEW NESHA’U LEXHE’ALNA MINKUM MELE’IKETEN FIL-’ËRDI JEHLUFUN
43.61: WE ‘INNEHU LA’ILMUN LILSSA’ATI FELA TEMTERUNNE BIHA WE ETTEBI’UNI HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
43.62: WE LA JESUDDENNEKUMU SHEJTANU ‘INNEHU LEKUM ‘ADUWUN MUBINU
43.63: WE LEMMA XHA’E ‘ISA BIL-BEJJINETI KALE KAD XHI’TUKUM BIL-HIKMETI WE LI’EBEJJINE LEKUM BE’DEL-LEDHI TEHTELIFUNE FIHI FE ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘ETI’UN
43.64: ‘INNALL-LLAHE HUWE RABBI WE RABBUKUM FE’BUDUHU HADHA SIRATUN MUSTEKIMU
43.65: FEHTELEFEL-’EHZABU MIN BEJNIHIM FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMIN ‘ELIMI
43.66: HEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SA’ATE ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN WE HUM LA JESH’URUN
43.68: JA ‘IBEDI LA HAWFUN ‘ALEJKUMUL-JEWME WE LA ‘ENTUM TEHZENUN
43.71: JUTAFU ‘ALEJHIM BISIHAFIN MIN DHEHEBIN WE ‘EKWEBIN WE FIHË MA TESHTEHIHIL-’ENFUSU WE TELEDHDHUL-’A’JUNU WE ‘ENTUM FIHË HALIDUN
43.72: WE TILKAL-XHENNETU AL-LETI ‘URITHTUMUHA BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
43.73: LEKUM FIHË FEKIHETUN KETHIRATUN MINHA TE’KULUN
43.75: LA JUFETTERU ‘ANHUM WE HUM FIHI MUBLISUN
43.76: WE MA DHELEMNAHUM WE LAKIN KENU HUMU EDH-DHALIMIN
43.77: WE NADEW JA MALIKU LIJEKDI ‘ALEJNA RABBUKE KALE ‘INNEKUM MAKITHUN
43.78: LEKAD XHI’NAKUM BIL-HAKKI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAKUM LILHEKKI KARIHUN
43.80: ‘EM JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNA LA NESMA’U SIRRAHUM WE NEXHWEHUM BELA WE RUSULUNA LEDEJHIM JEKTUBUN
43.82: SUBHANE RABBI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI RABBIL-’ARSHI ‘AMMA JESIFUN
43.83: FEDHERHUM JEHUDU WE JEL’ABU HATTE JULËKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN
43.84: WE HUWEL-LEDHI FI SEMA’I ‘ILEHUN WE FIL-’ËRDI ‘ILEHUN WE HUWEL-HEKIMUL-’ALIM
43.85: WE TEBERAKEL-LEDHI LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA WE ‘INDEHU ‘ILMU SA’ATI WE ‘ILEJHI TURXHA’UN
43.86: WE LA JEMLIKUL-LEDHINE JED’UNE MIN DUNIHI SHEFE’ATE ‘IL-LA MEN SHEHIDE BIL-HAKKI WE HUM JA’LEMUN
43.87: WE LE’IN SE’ELTEHUM MEN HALEKAHUM LEJAKULUNNAL-LAHU FE’ENNA JU’UFEKUN
43.88: WE KILIHI JA RABBI ‘INNE HA’UULË’ KAWMUN LA JU’UMINUN
43.89: FESFEH ‘ANHUM WE KUL SALAMUN FESEWFE JA’LEMUN

44.7: RABBI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IN KUNTUM MUKININ
44.8: LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE JUHJI WE JUMITU RABBUKUM WE RABBU ‘ABE’IKUMUL-’EWWELIN
44.10: FERTEKIB JEWME TE’TI SEMA’U BIDUHANIN MUBINI
44.13: ‘ENNA LEHUMU EDH-DHIKRA WE KAD XHA’EHUM RASULUN MUBINU
44.14: THUMME TEWEL-LEW ‘ANHU WE KALU MU’ALLEMUN MEXHNUNU
44.17: WE LEKAD FETENNA KABLEHUM KAWME FIR’AWNE WE XHA’EHUM RASULUN KERIMU
44.19: WE ‘EN LA TA’LU ‘ALA ALLAHI ‘INNI ‘ATIKUM BISULTANIN MUBINI
44.29: FEMA BEKET ‘ALEJHIMU SEMA’U WEL-’ERDU WE MA KENU MUNDHERIN
44.33: WE ‘ATEJNAHUM MINEL-’AJATI MA FIHI BELA’UN MUBINU
44.35: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA MEWTETUNAL-’ULË WE MA NAHNU BIMUNSHERIN
44.37: ‘EHUM HAJRUN ‘EM KAWMU TUBBE’IN WEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM ‘EHLEKNAHUM ‘INNAHUM KENU MUXHRIMIN
44.38: WE MA HALEKNA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA LA’IBIN
44.39: MA HALEKNAHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
44.41: JEWME LA JUGNI MEWLEN ‘AN MEWLEN SHEJ’ËN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN

93.3: MA WEDDE’AKE RABBUKE WE MA KAL

96.15: KEL-LE LE’IN LEM JENTEHI LENESFE’A BIN-NASIJET
96.19: KEL-LE LA TUTI’HU WE ESXHUD WEKTERI

45.4: WE FI HALKIKUM WE MA JEBUTHTHU MIN DABBETIN ‘AJATUN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
45.5: WE EHTILAFIL-LEJLI WE NEHARI WE MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU MINE SEMA’I MIN RIZKIN FE’EHJA BIHIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA WE TESRIFI RIJAHI ‘AJATUN LIKAWMIN JA’KILUN
45.6: TILKE ‘AJATU LLAHI NETLUHA ‘ALEJKE BIL-HAKKI FEBI’EJJI HEDITHIN BE’DALLAHI WE ‘AJATIHI JU’UMINUN
45.8: JESMA’U ‘AJATI LEHI TUTLA ‘ALEJHI THUMME JUSIRRU MUSTEKBIRAN KE’EN LEM JESMA’HA FEBESHSHIRHU BI’ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
45.9: WE ‘IDHA ‘ALIME MIN ‘AJATINA SHEJ’ËN ETTEHADHEHA HUZUEN ‘ULË’IKE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
45.10: MIN WERA’IHIM XHEHENNEMU WE LA JUGNI ‘ANHUM MA KESEBU SHEJ’ËN WE LA MA ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI LEHI ‘EWLIJA’E WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ADHIMU
45.11: HADHA HUDAN WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU BI’AJATI RABBIHIM LEHUM ‘ADHABUN MIN RIXHZIN ‘ELIMU
45.12: ALLAHUL-LEDHI SEHHARA LEKUMUL-BEHRA LITEXHRIJAL-FULKU FIHI BI’EMRIHI WE LITEBTEGU MIN FEDLIHI WE LE’AL-LEKUM TESHKURUN
45.13: WE SEHHARA LEKUM MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN MINHU ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LE’AJATIN LIKAWMIN JETEFEKKERUN
45.14: KUL LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU JEGFIRU LIL-LEDHINE LA JERXHUNE ‘EJJAMALLAHI LIJEXHZIJE KAWMËN BIMA KENU JEKSIBUN
45.15: MEN ‘AMILE SALIHËN FELINEFSIHI WE MEN ‘ESA’E FE’ALEJHA THUMME ‘ILA RABBIKUM TURXHA’UN
45.16: WE LEKAD ‘ATEJNA BENI ‘ISRA’ILAL-KITABE WEL-HUKME WE NUBUWETE WE RAZEKNAHUM MINET-TEJJIBETI WE FEDDELNAHUM ‘ALEL-’ALEMIN
45.17: WE ‘ATEJNAHUM BEJJINETIN MINEL-’EMRI FEMA EHTELEFU ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DI MA XHA’EHUMUL-’ILMU BEG'JËN BEJNEHUM ‘INNE RABBEKE JEKDI BEJNEHUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI FIMA KENU FIHI JEHTELIFUN
45.18: THUMME XHE’ALNAKE ‘ALA SHERI’ATIN MINEL-’EMRI FE ETTEBI’HA WE LA TETTEBI’ ‘EHWE’EL-LEDHINE LA JA’LEMUN
