45.19: ‘INNAHUM LEN JUGNU ‘ANKE MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN WE ‘INNE EDH-DHALIMINE BE’DUHUM ‘EWLIJA’U BE’DIN WA-LLAHU WE LIJUL-MUTTEKIN
45.20: HADHA BESA’IRU LILNNASI WE HUDAN WE RAHMETUN LIKAWMIN JUKINUN
45.21: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE EXHTERAHU SEJJI’ATI ‘EN NEXH’ALEHUM KEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI SEWE’EN MEHJAHUM WE MEMATUHUM SA’E MA JEHKUMUN
45.22: WE HALEKEL-LEHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI WE LITUXHZA KUL-LU NEFSIN BIMA KESEBET WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
45.23: ‘EFERA’EJTE MENI ETTEHADHE ‘ILEHEHU HEWEHU WE ‘EDAL-LEHU ALLAHU ‘ALA ‘ILMIN WE HATEME ‘ALA SEM’IHI WE KALBIHI WE XHE’ALE ‘ALA BESERIHI GISHAWETEN FEMEN JEHDIHI MIN BE’DI LEHI ‘EFELA TEDHEKKERUN
45.24: WE KALU MA HIJE ‘IL-LA HEJATUNA DUN'JA NEMUTU WE NEHJA WE MA JUHLIKUNA ‘IL-LA DEHRU WE MA LEHUM BIDHALIKE MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN HUM ‘IL-LA JEDHUNNUN
45.25: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINETIN MA KANE HUXHXHETEHUM ‘IL-LA ‘EN KALU E’TU BI’ABE’INA ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
45.26: KULI ALLAHU JUHJIKUM THUMME JUMITUKUM THUMME JEXHMA’UKUM ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI LA RAJBE FIHI WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERA NASI LA JA’LEMUN
45.27: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE JEWME TEKUMU SA’ATU JEWME’IDHIN JEHSERUL-MUBTILUN
45.28: WE TERA KUL-LE ‘UMMETIN XHATHIJETEN KUL-LU ‘UMMETIN TUD’A ‘ILA KITABIHAL-JEWME TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
45.29: HADHA KITABUNA JENTIKU ‘ALEJKUM BIL-HAKKI ‘INNA KUNNA NESTENSIHU MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
45.30: FE’EMMEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI FEJUDHILUHUM RABBUHUM FI RAHMETIHI DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-MUBIN
45.31: WE ‘EMMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EFELEM TEKUN ‘AJATI TUTLA ‘ALEJKUM FESTEKBERTUM WE KUNTUM KAWMËN MUXHRIMIN
45.32: WE ‘IDHA KILA ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN WE SA’ATU LA RAJBE FIHË KULTUM MA NEDRI MA SA’ATU ‘IN NEDHUNNU ‘IL-LA DHENNËN WE MA NAHNU BIMUSTEJKININ
45.33: WE BEDA LEHUM SEJJI’ATU MA ‘AMILU WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
45.34: WE KILAL-JEWME NENSAKUM KAMA NESITUM LIKA’E JEWMIKUM HADHA WE ME’WEKUMU NARU WE MA LEKUM MIN NASIRIN
45.35: DHALIKUM BI’ENNEKUM ETTEHADHTUM ‘AJATI LEHI HUZUEN WE GARRATKUMUL-HEJËTU DUN'JA FELJEWME LA JUHRAXHUNE MINHA WE LA HUM JUSTA’TEBUN
45.36: FELIL-LAHIL-HAMDU RABBI SEMAWETI WE RABBIL-’ARDI RABBIL-’ALEMIN
45.37: WE LEHUL-KIBRIJA’U FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM

46.3: MA HALEKNA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA ‘IL-LA BIL-HAKKI WE ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘AMMA ‘UNDHIRU MU’RIDUN
46.4: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM MA TED’UNE MIN DUNI LEHI ‘ERUNI MADHA HALEKU MINEL-’ARDI ‘EM LEHUM SHIRKUN FI SEMAWETI EI’TUNI BIKITABIN MIN KABLI HADHA ‘EW ‘ETHARATIN MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
46.5: WE MEN ‘EDELLU MIMMEN JED’U MIN DUNI LEHI MEN LA JESTEXHIBU LEHU ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI WE HUM ‘AN DU’A’IHIM GAFILUN
46.6: WE ‘IDHA HUSHIRA NASU KENU LEHUM ‘A’DA’EN WE KENU BI’IBEDETIHIM KEFIRIN
46.7: WE ‘IDHA TUTLA ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATUNA BEJJINETIN KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LILHEKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
46.8: ‘EM JAKULUNE EFTERAHU KUL ‘INI EFTERAJTUHU FELA TEMLIKUNE LI MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMA TUFIDUNE FIHI KEFE BIHI SHEHIDËN BEJNI WE BEJNEKUM WE HUWEL-GAFURU RAHIM
46.9: KUL MA KUNTU BID’ËN MINE RUSULI WE MA ‘EDRI MA JUF’ALU BI WE LA BIKUM ‘IN ‘ETTEBI’U ‘IL-LA MA JUHA ‘ILEJJE WE MA ‘ENA ‘IL-LA NEDHIRUN MUBINU
46.10: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN KANE MIN ‘INDI LEHI WE KEFERTUM BIHI WE SHEHIDE SHAHIDUN MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘ALA MITHLIHI FE’AMANA WE ESTEKBERTUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
46.11: WE KALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEW KANE HAJRAN MA SEBEKUNA ‘ILEJHI WE ‘IDH LEM JEHTEDU BIHI FESEJAKULUNE HADHA ‘IFKUN KADIMU
46.12: WE MIN KABLIHI KITABU MUSA ‘IMAMËN WE RAHMETEN WE HEDHA KITABUN MUSEDDIKUN LISANËN ‘ARABIJËN LIJUNDHIREL-LEDHINE DHELEMU WE BUSHRA LILMUHSININ
46.13: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KALU RABBUNALLAHU THUMME ESTEKAMU FELA HAWFUN ‘ALEJHIM WE LA HUM JEHZENUN
46.14: ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHENNETI HALIDINE FIHË XHEZA’EN BIMA KENU JA’MELUN
46.15: WE WESSEJNAL-’INSANE BIWELIDEJHI ‘IHSANËN HEMELET/HU ‘UMMUHU KURHËN WE WEDE’AT/HU KURHËN WE HEMLUHU WE FISALUHU THALATHUNE SHEHRAN HATTE ‘IDHA BELEGA ‘ESHUDDEHU WE BELEGA ‘ERBE’INE SENETEN KALE RABBI ‘EWZI’NI ‘EN ‘ESHKURA NI’METEKAL-LETI ‘EN’AMTE ‘ALEJJE WE ‘ALA WE E-DEJJE WE ‘EN ‘A’MELE SALIHËN TERDAHU WE ‘ESLIH LI FI DHURRIJETI ‘INNI TUBTU ‘ILEJKE WE ‘INNI MINEL-MUSLIMIN
46.16: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE NETEKABBELU ‘ANHUM ‘EHSENE MA ‘AMILU WE NETEXHAWEZU ‘AN SEJJI’ATIHIM FI ‘ES'HABIL-XHENNETI WE’DE SIDKIL-LEDHI KENU JU’ADUN
46.17: WEL-LEDHI KALE LIWELIDEJHI ‘UFFIN LEKUMA ‘ETA’IDANINI ‘EN ‘UHRAXHE WE KAD HALETIL-KURUNU MIN KABLI WE HUMA JESTEGITHANI LLAHE WEJLEKE ‘AMIN ‘INNE WE’DALLAHI HEKKUN FEJAKULU MA HADHA ‘IL-LA ‘ESATIRUL-’EWWELIN
46.18: ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE HAKKA ‘ALEJHIMUL-KAWLU FI ‘UMEMIN KAD HALET MIN KABLIHIM MINEL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INNAHUM KENU HASIRIN
46.19: WE LIKUL-LIN DERAXHATUN MIMMA ‘AMILU WE LIJUWEFFIJEHUM ‘A’MALEHUM WE HUM LA JUDHLEMUN
46.20: WE JEWME JU’RADUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ALA NARI ‘EDH/HEBTUM TEJJIBETIKUM FI HEJATIKUMU DUN'JA WE ESTEMTA’TUM BIHA FELJEWME TUXHZEWNE ‘ADHABEL-HUNI BIMA KUNTUM TESTEKBIRUNE FIL-’ËRDI BIGAJRIL-HEKKI WE BIMA KUNTUM TEFSUKUN
46.21: WE EDHKUR ‘EHA ‘ADIN ‘IDH ‘ENDHERA KAWMEHU BIL-’EHKAFI WE KAD HALETI NUDHURU MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE MIN HALFIHI ‘ELLA TA’BUDU ‘IL-LALLAHE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU ‘ALEJKUM ‘ADHABE JEWMIN ‘ADHIMI
46.22: KALU ‘EXHI’TENA LITE’FIKENA ‘AN ‘ALIHETINA FE’TINA BIMA TA’IDUNA ‘IN KUNTE MINE SADIKIN
46.23: KALE ‘INNAMAL-’ILMU ‘IND-ALLAHI WE ‘UBELLIGUKUM MA ‘URSILTU BIHI WE LAKINNI ‘ERAKUM KAWMËN TEXHHELUN
46.24: FELAMMA RA’EWHU ‘ARIDËN MUSTEKBILE ‘EWDIJETIHIM KALU HADHA ‘ARIDUN MUMTIRUNA BEL HUWE MA ESTA’XHELTUM BIHI RIHUN FIHË ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
46.25: TUDEMMIRU KUL-LE SHEJ’IN BI’EMRI RABBIHA FE’ESBEHU LA JURA ‘IL-LA MESAKINUHUM KEDHALIKE NEXHZIL-KAWMAL-MUXHRIMIN
46.26: WE LEKAD MEKKENNAHUM FIMA ‘IN MEKKENNAKUM FIHI WE XHE’ALNA LEHUM SEM’ËN WE ‘EBSARAN WE ‘EF’IDETEN FEMA ‘EGNA ‘ANHUM SEM’UHUM WE LA ‘EBSARUHUM WE LA ‘EF’IDETUHUM MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IDH KENU JEXHHEDUNE BI’AJATI LEHI WE HAKA BIHIM MA KENU BIHI JESTEHZI’U
46.27: WE LEKAD ‘EHLEKNA MA HEWLEKUM MINEL-KURA WE SERRAFNAL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEHUM JERXHI’UN
46.28: FELEWLA NESERAHUMUL-LEDHINE ETTEHADHU MIN DUNI LEHI KURBENËN ‘ALIHETEN BEL DELLU ‘ANHUM WE DHELIKE ‘IFKUHUM WE MA KENU JEFTERUN
46.29: WE ‘IDH SERAFNA ‘ILEJKE NEFERAN MINEL-XHINNI JESTEMI’UNAL-KUR’ANE FELAMMA HEDERUHU KALU ‘ENSITU FELAMMA KUDIJE WE LLEW ‘ILA KAWMIHIM MUNDHIRIN
46.30: KALU JA KAWMENA ‘INNA SEMI’NA KITABËN ‘UNZILE MIN BE’DI MUSA MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJHI JEHDI ‘ILAL-HEKKI WE ‘ILA TERIKIN MUSTEKIMI
46.31: JA KAWMENA ‘EXHIBU DA’IJALLAHI WE ‘AMINU BIHI JEGFIR LEKUM MIN DHUNUBIKUM WE JUXHIRKUM MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIMI
46.32: WE MEN LA JUXHIB DA’IJALLAHI FELEJSE BIMU’XHIZIN FIL-’ËRDI WE LEJSE LEHU MIN DUNIHI ‘EWLIJA’U ‘ULË’IKE FI DALELIN MUBINI
46.33: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ENNA-LLAHEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE LEM JA’JE BIHALKIHINNE BIKADIRIN ‘ALA ‘EN JUHJIJAL-MEWTA BELA ‘INNEHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
46.34: WE JEWME JU’RADUL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘ALA NARI ‘ELEJSE HADHA BIL-HAKKI KALU BELA WE RABBINA KALE FEDHUKUL-’ADHABE BIMA KUNTUM TEKFURUN
46.35: FESBIR KAMA SEBERA ‘ULUL-’AZMI MINE RUSULI WE LA TESTA’XHIL LEHUM KE’ENNEHUM JEWME JERAWNE MA JU’ADUNE LEM JELBETHU ‘IL-LA SA’ATEN MIN NEHARIN BELAGUN FEHEL JUHLEKU ‘IL-LAL-KAWMUL-FESIKUN

47.2: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI WE ‘AMENU BIMA NUZZILE ‘ALA MUHEMMEDIN WE HUWEL-HEKKU MIN RABBIHIM KEFFERA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE ‘ESLEHE BELEHU
47.3: DHALIKE BI’ENNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ETTEBE’UL-BETILE WE ‘ENNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEBE’UL-HAKKA MIN RABBIHIM KEDHALIKE JEDRIBU ALLAHU LILNNASI ‘EMTHALEHU
47.4: FE’IDHA LEKITUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU FEDERBE RIKABI HATTE ‘IDHA ‘ETHHANTUMUHUM FESHUDDUL-WETHAKA FE’IMMA MENNËN BE’DU WE ‘IMMA FIDA’EN HATTE TEDE’AL-HERBU ‘EWZARAHA DHALIKE WE LEW JESHA’U ALLAHU LANTESERA MINHUM WE LAKIN LIJEBLUWE BE’DEKUM BIBE’DIN WEL-LEDHINE KUTILU FI SEBILI -LEHI FELEN JUDIL-LE ‘A’MALEHU
47.7: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN TENSURU LLAHE JENSURKUM WE JUTHEBBIT ‘EKDAMEKU
47.10: ‘EFELEM JESIRU FIL-’ËRDI FEJENDHURU KEJFE KANE ‘AKIBETUL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM DEMMERAL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE LILKEFIRINE ‘EMTHALUH
47.11: DHALIKE BI’ENNA-LLAHE MEWLEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘ENNAL-KEFIRINE LA MEWLA LEHU
47.12: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUDHILUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU JETEMETTA’UNE WE JE’KULUNE KAMA TE’KULUL-’EN’AM WE NARU METHWEN LEHU
47.13: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN HIJE ‘ESHEDDU KUWETEN MIN KARJETIKAL-LETI ‘EHRAXHETKE ‘EHLEKNAHUM FELA NASIRA LEHU
47.14: ‘EFEMEN KANE ‘ALA BEJJINETIN MIN RABBIHI KEMEN ZUJJINE LEHU SU’U ‘AMELIHI WE ETTEBE’U ‘EHWE’EHU
47.15: METHELUL-XHENNETI AL-LETI WU’IDAL-MUTTEKUNE FIHË ‘ENHARUN MIN MA’IN GAJRI ‘ASININ WE ‘ENHARUN MIN LEBENIN LEM JETEGAJJER TA’MUHU WE ‘ENHARUN MIN HAMRIN LEDHDHETIN LILSHSHARIBINE WE ‘ENHARUN MIN ‘ASELIN MUSEFFEN WE LEHUM FIHË MIN KUL-LI THEMERATI WE MEGFIRATUN MIN RABBIHIM KEMEN HUWE HALIDUN FI NARI WE SUKU MA’EN HEMIMËN FEKATTE’A ‘EM’A’EHU
47.16: WE MINHUM MEN JESTEMI’U ‘ILEJKE HATTE ‘IDHA HARAXHU MIN ‘INDIKE KALU LIL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME MADHA KALE ‘ANIFËN ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE TEBE’ALLAHU ‘ALA KULUBIHIM WE ETTEBE’U ‘EHWE’EHU
47.17: WEL-LEDHINE EHTEDEW ZADEHUM HUDAN WE ‘ATAHUM TEKWHU
47.18: FEHEL JENDHURUNE ‘IL-LA SA’ATE ‘EN TE’TIJEHUM BEGTETEN FEKAD XHA’E ‘ESHRATUHA FE’ENNA LEHUM ‘IDHË XHË’ET/HUM DHIKRAHU
47.19: FE’LEM ‘ENNEHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LALLAHU WE ESTEGFIR LIDHENBIKE WE LILMU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MUTEKAL-LEBEKUM WE METHWEKU
47.20: WE JAKULUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LEWLA NUZZILET SURATUN FE’IDHA ‘UNZILET SURATUN MUHKEMETUN WE DHUKIRA FIHËL-KITALU RA’EJTEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN JENDHURUNE ‘ILEJKE NEDHERAL-MEGSHIJI ‘ALEJHI MINEL-MEWTI FE’EWLA LEHU
47.21: TA’ATUN WE KAWLUN MA’RUFUN FE’IDHA ‘AZEMAL-’EMRU FELEW SEDEKU LLAHE LEKANE HAJRAN LEHU
47.22: FEHEL ‘ASEJTUM ‘IN TEWEL-LEJTUM ‘EN TUFSIDU FIL-’ËRDI WE TUKATTI’U ‘ERHAMEKU
47.25: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE ERTEDDU ‘ALA ‘EDBERIHIM MIN BE’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HUDA SHEJTANU SEWWELE LEHUM WE ‘EMLA LEHU
47.26: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KALU LIL-LEDHINE KERIHU MA NEZZALEL-LAHU SENUTI’UKUM FI BE’DIL-’EMRI WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU ‘ISRARAHU
47.28: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUMU ETTEBE’U MA ‘ESHATA-LLAHE WE KERIHU RIDWENEHU FE’EHBETE ‘A’MALEHU
47.29: ‘EM HESIBEL-LEDHINE FI KULUBIHIM MARADUN ‘EN LEN JUHRIXHAL-LAHU ‘EDGANEHU
47.30: WE LEW NESHA’U LE’ERAJNAKEHUM FELE’ARAFTEHUM BISIMAHUM WE LETA’RIFENNEHUM FI LEHNIL-KAWLI WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU ‘A’MALEKU
47.31: WE LENEBLUWENNEKUM HATTE NA’LEMAL-MUXHAHIDINE MINKUM WE SABIRINE WE NEBLUWE ‘EHBERAKU
47.32: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI WE SHAKKU RASULE MIN BE’DI MA TEBEJJENE LEHUMUL-HUDA LEN JEDURRU LLAHE SHEJ’ËN WE SEJUHBITU ‘A’MALEHU
47.33: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE WE LA TUBTILU ‘A’MALEKU
47.34: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI THUMME MATU WE HUM KUFFERUN FELEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHU
47.35: FELA TEHINU WE TED’U ‘ILA SELMI WE ‘ENTUMUL-’A’LEWNE WA-LLAHU ME’AKUM WE LEN JETIRAKUM ‘A’MALEKU
47.36: ‘INNAMAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE ‘IN TU’UMINU WE TETTEKU JU’UTIKUM ‘UXHURAKUM WE LA JES’ELKUM ‘EMWELEKU
47.38: HA’ENTUM HA’UULË’ TUD’AWNE LITUNFIKU FI SEBILI -LEHI FEMINKUM MEN JEBHALU WE MEN JEBHAL FE’INNAMA JEBHALU ‘AN NEFSIHI WA-LLAHUL-GANIJU WE ‘ENTUMUL-FUKARA’U WE ‘IN TETEWEL-LEW JESTEBDIL KAWMËN GAJRAKUM THUMME LA JEKUNU ‘EMTHALEKU

48.2: LIJEGFIRA LEKEL-LEHU MA TEKADDEME MIN DHENBIKE WE MA TE’EHHARA WE JUTIMME NI’METEHU ‘ALEJKE WE JEHDIJEKE SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
48.4: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENZELE SEKINETE FI KULUBIL-MU’UMININE LIJEZDADU ‘IMANËN ME’A ‘IMANIHIM WE LIL-LEHI XHUNUDU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALIMËN HEKIMË
48.5: LIJUDHILAL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË WE JUKEFFIRA ‘ANHUM SEJJI’ATIHIM WE KANE DHALIKE ‘IND-ALLAHI FEWZËN ‘ADHIMË
48.6: WE JU’ADHDHIBEL-MUNAFIKINE WEL-MUNAFIKATI WEL-MUSHRIKINE WEL-MUSHRIKATI EDH-DHANNINE BIL-LAHI DHENNE SEW’I ‘ALEJHIM DA’IRATU SEW’I WE GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM WE LE’ANEHUM WE ‘E’ADDE LEHUM XHEHENNEME WE SA’ET MESIRA
48.7: WE LIL-LEHI XHUNUDU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE KANAL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
48.9: LITU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TU’AZZIRUHU WE TUWEKKIRUHU WE TUSEBBIHUHU BUKRATEN WE ‘ESILË
48.10: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUBEJI’UNEKE ‘INNAMA JUBEJI’UNA-LLAHE JEDU LLAHI FEWKA ‘EJDIHIM FEMEN NEKETHE FE’INNAMA JENKUTHU ‘ALA NEFSIHI WE MEN ‘EWFE BIMA ‘AHEDE ‘ALEJHU LLAHE FESEJU’UTIHI ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË
48.11: SEJAKULU LEKAL-MUHALLEFUNE MINEL-’A’RABI SHEGALETNA ‘EMWELUNA WE ‘EHLUNA FESTEGFIR LENA JAKULUNE BI’ELSINETIHIM MA LEJSE FI KULUBIHIM KUL FEMEN JEMLIKU LEKUM MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘IN ‘ERADE BIKUM DERRAN ‘EW ‘ERADE BIKUM NEF’ËN BEL KANAL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRA
48.12: BEL DHENENTUM ‘EN LEN JENKALIBE RASULU WEL-MU’UMINUNE ‘ILA ‘EHLIHIM ‘EBEDËN WE ZUJJINE DHALIKE FI KULUBIKUM WE DHENENTUM DHENNE SEW’I WE KUNTUM KAWMËN BURA
48.13: WE MEN LEM JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI FE’INNA ‘A’TEDNA LILKEFIRINE SA’IRA
48.14: WE LIL-LEHI MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JEGFIRU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JU’ADHDHIBU MEN JESHA’U WE KANAL-LAHU GAFURAN RAHIMË
48.15: SEJAKULUL-MUHALLEFUNE ‘IDHA ENTELEKTUM ‘ILA MEGANIME LITE’HUDHUHA DHERUNA NETTEBI’KUM JURIDUNE ‘EN JUBEDDILU KALAMALLAHI KUL LEN TETTEBI’UNA KEDHALIKUM KALEL-LAHU MIN KABLU FESEJAKULUNE BEL TEHSUDUNENA BEL KENU LA JEFKAHUNE ‘IL-LA KALILË
48.16: KUL LILMUHALLEFINE MINEL-’A’RABI SETUD’AWNE ‘ILA KAWMIN ‘ULI BE’SIN SHEDIDIN TUKATILUNEHUM ‘EW JUSLIMUNE FE’IN TUTI’U JU’UTIKUMU LLAHU ‘EXHRAN HESENËN WE ‘IN TETEWEL-LEW KAMA TEWEL-LEJTUM MIN KABLU JU’ADHDHIBKUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.17: LEJSE ‘ALEL-’A’MA HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-’A’RAXHI HERAXHUN WE LA ‘ALEL-MERIDI HERAXHUN WE MEN JUTI’I LLAHE WE RASULEHU JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE MEN JETEWELLE JU’ADHDHIBHU ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.18: LEKAD RADIJAL-LAHU ‘ANIL-MU’UMININE ‘IDH JUBEJI’UNEKE TEHTE SHEXHERATI FE’ALIME MA FI KULUBIHIM FE’ENZELE SEKINETE ‘ALEJHIM WE ‘ETHABEHUM FETHËN KARIBË
48.19: WE MEGANIME KETHIRATEN JE’HUDHUNEHA WE KANAL-LAHU ‘AZIZËN HEKIMË
48.20: WE’ADEKUMU LLAHU MEGANIME KETHIRATEN TE’HUDHUNEHA FE’AXHXHELE LEKUM HEDHIHI WE KEFFE ‘EJDIJE NASI ‘ANKUM WE LITEKUNE ‘AJETEN LILMU’UMININE WE JEHDIJEKUM SIRATËN MUSTEKIMË
48.21: WE ‘UHRA LEM TEKDIRU ‘ALEJHA KAD ‘EHATAL-LAHU BIHA WE KANAL-LAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRA
48.22: WE LEW KATELEKUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEWELLEWL-’EDBERA THUMME LA JEXHIDUNE WELIJËN WE LA NESIRA
48.23: SUNNETALLAHI AL-LETI KAD HALET MIN KABLU WE LEN TEXHIDE LISUNNETI LEHI TEBDILË
48.24: WE HUWEL-LEDHI KEFFE ‘EJDIJEHUM ‘ANKUM WE ‘EJDIJEKUM ‘ANHUM BIBETNI MEKKETE MIN BE’DI ‘EN ‘EDHFERAKUM ‘ALEJHIM WE KANAL-LAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRA
48.25: HUMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE SEDDUKUM ‘ANIL-MESXHIDIL-HARAMI WEL-HEDJE MA’KUFËN ‘EN JEBLUGA MEHIL-LEHU WE LEWLA RIXHALUN MU’UMINUNE WE NISA’UN MU’UMINATUN LEM TA’LEMUHUM ‘EN TETE’UHUM FETUSIBEKUM MINHUM ME’ARRATUN BIGAJRI ‘ILMIN LIJUDHILAL-LAHU FI RAHMETIHI MEN JESHA’U LEW TEZEJJELU LE’ADHDHEBNEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MINHUM ‘ADHABËN ‘ELIMË
48.26: ‘IDH XHE’ALEL-LEDHINE KEFERU FI KULUBIHIMUL-HEMIJETE HEMIJETAL-XHAHILIJETI FE’ENZEL-ALLAHU SEKINETEHU ‘ALA RASULIHI WE ‘ALEL-MU’UMININE WE ‘ELZEMEHUM KELIMETET-TEKWE WE KENU ‘EHAKKA BIHA WE ‘EHLEHA WE KANAL-LAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMË
48.27: LEKAD SEDEKEL-LEHU RASULEHU RU’UJA BIL-HAKKI LETEDHULUNNAL-MESXHIDAL-HERAME ‘IN SHA’-ALLAHU ‘AMININE MUHELLIKINE RU’USEKUM WE MUKASSIRINE LA TEHAFUNE FE’ALIME MA LEM TA’LEMU FEXHE’ALE MIN DUNI DHALIKE FETHËN KARIBË
48.28: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA DINI KUL-LIHI WE KEFE BIL-LAHI SHEHIDË
48.29: MUHEMMEDUN RASULU LLAHI WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU ‘ESHIDDA’U ‘ALEL-KUFFERI RUHEMA’U BEJNEHUM TERAHUM RUKKA’ËN SUXHXHEDËN JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MINELLAHI WE RIDWENËN SIMAHUM FI WUXHUHIHIM MIN ‘ETHERI SUXHUDI DHALIKE METHELUHUM FIT-TEWRATI WE METHELUHUM FIL-’INXHILI KEZER’IN ‘EHRAXHE SHET’EHU FE’AZERAHU FESTEGLEDHE FESTEWE ‘ALA SUKIHI JU’XHIBU EZ-ZURRA’A LIJEGIDHE BIHIMUL-KUFFERA WE’ADAL-LAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MINHUM MEGFIRATEN WE ‘EXHRAN ‘ADHIMË

49.1: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TUKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJI LEHI WE RASULIHI WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN ‘ALIMU
49.2: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TERFE’U ‘ESWETEKUM FEWKA SEWTI NEBIJI WE LA TEXHHERU LEHU BIL-KAWLI KEXHEHRI BE’DIKUM LIBE’DIN ‘EN TEHBETE ‘A’MALUKUM WE ‘ENTUM LA TESH’URUN
49.3: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEGUDDUNE ‘ESWETEHUM ‘INDE RASULI LEHI ‘ULË’IKEL-LEDHINE EMTEHENAL-LAHU KULUBEHUM LILTTEKWE LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN ‘ADHIMU
49.5: WE LEW ‘ENNEHUM SEBERU HATTE TEHRUXHE ‘ILEJHIM LEKANE HAJRAN LEHUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
49.6: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IN XHA’EKUM FESIKUN BINEBE’IIN FETEBEJJENU ‘EN TUSIBU KAWMËN BIXHEHALETIN FETUSBIHU ‘ALA MA FE’ALTUM NADIMIN
49.7: WE A’LEMU ‘ENNE FIKUM RASULËL-LAHI LEW JUTI’UKUM FI KETHIRIN MINEL-’EMRI LE’ANITTUM WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE HEBBEBE ‘ILEJKUMUL-’IMANE WE ZEJJENEHU FI KULUBIKUM WE KERRAHE ‘ILEJKUMUL-KUFRA WEL-FUSUKA WEL-’ISJANE ‘ULË’IKE HUMU RASHIDUN
49.8: FEDLËN MINELLAHI WE NI’METEN WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
49.9: WE ‘IN TA’IFETANI MINEL-MU’UMININE EKTETELU FE’ESLIHU BEJNEHUMA FE’IN BEGAT ‘IHDAHUMA ‘ALEL-’UHRA FEKATILU AL-LETI TEBGI HATTE TEFI’E ‘ILA ‘EMRI LEHI FE’IN FE’ET FE’ESLIHU BEJNEHUMA BIL-’ADLI WE ‘EKSITU ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
49.10: ‘INNAMAL-MU’UMINUNE ‘IHWETUN FE’ESLIHU BEJNE ‘EHAWEJKUM WE ETTEKU LLAHE LE’AL-LEKUM TURHEMUN
49.11: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA JESHAR KAWMUN MIN KAWMIN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNU HAJRAN MINHUM WE LA NISA’UN MIN NISA’IN ‘ASA ‘EN JEKUNNE HAJRAN MINHUNNE WE LA TELMIZU ‘ENFUSEKUM WE LA TENABEZU BIL-’ELKABI BI’SAL-EISMUL-FUSUKU BE’DAL-’IMANI WE MEN LEM JETUB FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
49.12: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EXHTENIBU KETHIRAN MINE EDH-DHENNI ‘INNE BE’DE EDH-DHENNI ‘ITHMUN WE LA TEXHESSESU WE LA JEGTEB BE’DUKUM BE’DËN ‘EJUHIBBU ‘EHEDUKUM ‘EN JE’KULE LEHME ‘EHIHI MEJTËN FEKERIHTUMUHU WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE TEWWEBUN RAHIMU
49.13: JA ‘EJJUHA NASU ‘INNA HALEKNAKUM MIN DHEKERIN WE ‘UNTHA WE XHE’ALNAKUM SHU’UBËN WE KABE’ILE LITA’ARAFU ‘INNE ‘EKRAMEKUM ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘ETKAKUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE ‘ALIMUN HABIRU
49.14: KALETIL-’A’RABU ‘AMANNA KUL LEM TU’UMINU WE LAKIN KULU ‘ESLEMNA WE LEMMA JEDHULIL-’IMANU FI KULUBIKUM WE ‘IN TUTI’U LLAHE WE RASULEHU LA JELITKUM MIN ‘A’MALIKUM SHEJ’ËN ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
49.15: ‘INNAMAL-MU’UMINUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI THUMME LEM JERTABU WE XHAHEDU BI’EMWELIHIM WE ‘ENFUSIHIM FI SEBILI -LEHI ‘ULË’IKE HUMU SADIKUN
49.16: KUL ‘ETU’ALLIMUNA-LLAHE BIDINIKUM WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
49.17: JEMUNNUNE ‘ALEJKE ‘EN ‘ESLEMU KUL LA TEMUNNU ‘ALEJJE ‘ISLAMEKUM BELI ALLAHU JEMUNNU ‘ALEJKUM ‘EN HEDAKUM LIL’IMANI ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
49.18: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JA’LEMU GAJBE SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WA-LLAHU BESIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN

50.2: BEL ‘AXHIBU ‘EN XHA’EHUM MUNDHIRUN MINHUM FEKALEL-KAFIRUNE HADHA SHEJ’UN ‘AXHIBU
50.3: ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN DHALIKE RAXH’UN BE’IDU
50.4: KAD ‘ALIMNA MA TENKUSUL-’ERDU MINHUM WE ‘INDENA KITABUN HEFIDHU
50.5: BEL KEDHDHEBU BIL-HAKKI LEMMA XHA’EHUM FEHUM FI ‘EMRIN MERIXHI
50.6: ‘EFELEM JENDHURU ‘ILA SEMA’I FEWKAHUM KEJFE BENEJNAHA WE ZEJJENNAHA WE MA LEHA MIN FURUXHI
50.7: WEL-’ERDA MEDEDNAHA WE ‘ELKAJNA FIHË RAWESIJE WE ‘ENBETNA FIHË MIN KUL-LI ZEWXHIN BEHIXHI
50.9: WE NEZZELNA MINE SEMA’I MA’EN MUBERAKËN FE’ENBETNA BIHI XHENNATIN WE HEBBEL-HESID
50.10: WE NEHLE BESIKATIN LEHA TEL’UN NEDIDU
50.11: RIZKËN LIL’IBEDI WE ‘EHJEJNA BIHI BELDETEN MEJTËN KEDHELIKEL-HURUXH
50.12: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN WE ‘ES'HABU RASSI WE THEMUD
50.14: WE ‘ES'HABUL-’EJKETI WE KAWMU TUBBE’IN KUL-LUN KEDHDHEBE RUSULE FEHAKKA WE’ID
50.15: ‘EFE’AJINA BIL-HALKIL-’EWWELI BEL HUM FI LEBSIN MIN HALKIN XHEDIDI
50.16: WE LEKAD HALEKNAL-’INSANE WE NA’LEMU MA TUWESWISU BIHI NEFSUHU WE NAHNU ‘EKRABU ‘ILEJHI MIN HEBLIL-WERID
50.18: MA JELFIDHU MIN KAWLIN ‘IL-LA LEDEJHI RAKIBUN ‘ATIDU
50.19: WE XHA’ET SEKRATUL-MEWTI BIL-HAKKI DHALIKE MA KUNTE MINHU TEHID
50.20: WE NUFIHË FI SURI DHALIKE JEWMUL-WE’ID
50.21: WE XHA’ET KUL-LU NEFSIN ME’AHA SA’IKUN WE SHEHIDU
50.22: LEKAD KUNTE FI GAFLETIN MIN HADHA FEKESHEFNA ‘ANKE GITA’EKE FEBESARUKAL-JEWME HEDIDU
50.23: WE KALE KARINUHU HADHA MA LEDEJJE ‘ATIDU
50.26: EL-LEDHI XHE’ALE ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA FE’ELKIJAHU FIL-’ADHABI SHEDID
50.27: KALE KARINUHU RABBENA MA ‘ETGAJTUHU WE LAKIN KANE FI DALELIN BE’IDI
50.28: KALE LA TEHTESIMU LEDEJJE WE KAD KADDEMTU ‘ILEJKUM BIL-WE’ID
50.29: MA JUBEDDELUL-KAWLU LEDEJJE WE MA ‘ENA BIDHAL-LAMIN LIL’ABID
50.30: JEWME NEKULU LIXHEHENNEME HEL EMTELE’TI WE TEKULU HEL MIN MEZIDI
50.33: MEN HASHIJE RAHMENE BIL-GAJBI WE XHA’E BIKALBIN MUNIBI
50.35: LEHUM MA JESHA’UNE FIHË WE LEDEJNA MEZIDU
50.36: WE KEM ‘EHLEKNA KABLEHUM MIN KARNIN HUM ‘ESHEDDU MINHUM BETSHËN FENEKKABU FIL-BILADI HEL MIN MEHISI
50.37: ‘INNE FI DHALIKE LEDHIKRA LIMEN KANE LEHU KALBUN ‘EW ‘ELKA SEM’A WE HUWE SHEHIDU
50.38: WE LEKAD HALEKNA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA WE MA BEJNEHUMA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN WE MA MESSENA MIN LUGUBI
50.39: FESBIR ‘ALA MA JAKULUNE WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE KABLE TULU’I SHEMSI WE KABLAL-GURUB
50.41: WE ESTEMI’ JEWME JUNADIL-MUNADI MIN MEKANIN KARIBI
50.42: JEWME JESMA’UNE SEJHETE BIL-HAKKI DHALIKE JEWMUL-HURUXH
50.44: JEWME TESHAKKAKUL-’ERDU ‘ANHUM SIRA’ËN DHALIKE HESHRUN ‘ALEJNA JESIRU
50.45: NAHNU ‘A’LEMU BIMA JAKULUNE WE MA ‘ENTE ‘ALEJHIM BIXHEBBERIN FEDHEKKIR BIL-KUR’ANI MEN JEHAFU WE’ID

51.14: DHUKU FITNETEKUM HADHEL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TESTA’XHILUN
51.16: ‘AHIDHINE MA ‘ATAHUM RABBUHUM ‘INNAHUM KENU KABLE DHALIKE MUHSININ
51.22: WE FI SEMA’I RIZKUKUM WE MA TU’ADUN
51.23: FEWERABBI SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘INNEHU LEHEKKUN MITHLE MA ‘ENNEKUM TENTIKUN
51.25: ‘IDH DEHALU ‘ALEJHI FEKALU SALAMËN KALE SALAMUN KAWMUN MUNKERUN
51.28: FE’EWXHESE MINHUM HIFETEN KALU LA TEHAF WE BESHSHERUHU BIGULËMIN ‘ALIMI
51.29: FE’EKBELETI EMRA’ETUHU FI SERRATIN FESEKKET WEXHHEHA WE KALET ‘AXHUZUN ‘AKIMU
51.36: FEMA WEXHEDNA FIHË GAJRA BEJTIN MINEL-MUSLIMIN
51.38: WE FI MUSA ‘IDH ‘ERSELNAHU ‘ILA FIR’AWNE BISULTANIN MUBINI
51.39: FETEWELLA BIRUKNIHI WE KALE SAHIRUN ‘EW MEXHNUNU
51.40: FE’EHADHNAHU WE XHUNUDEHU FENEBEDHNAHUM FIL-JEMMI WE HUWE MULIMU
51.42: MA TEDHERU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘ETET ‘ALEJHI ‘IL-LA XHE’ALET/HU KALRRAMIM
51.43: WE FI THEMUDE ‘IDH KILA LEHUM TEMETTA’U HATTE HINI
51.44: FE’ATEW ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHIM FE’EHADHET/HUMU SA’IKATU WE HUM JENDHURUN
51.45: FEMA ESTETA’U MIN KIJAMIN WE MA KENU MUNTESIRIN
51.46: WE KAWME NUHIN MIN KABLU ‘INNAHUM KENU KAWMËN FESIKIN
51.47: WE SEMA’E BENEJNAHA BI’EJJDIN WE ‘INNA LEMUSI’UN
51.49: WE MIN KUL-LI SHEJ’IN HALEKNA ZEWXHEJNI LE’AL-LEKUM TEDHEKKERUN
51.50: FEFIRRU ‘ILA LLAHI ‘INNI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN MUBINU
51.51: WE LA TEXH’ALU ME’A ALLAHI ‘ILEHËN ‘AHARA ‘INNI LEKUM MINHU NEDHIRUN MUBINU
51.52: KEDHALIKE MA ‘ETEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM MIN RASULIN ‘IL-LA KALU SAHIRUN ‘EW MEXHNUNU
51.57: MA ‘URIDU MINHUM MIN RIZKIN WE MA ‘URIDU ‘EN JUT’IMUN
51.59: FE’INNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU DHENUBËN MITHLE DHENUBI ‘ES'HABIHIM FELA JESTA’XHILUN
51.60: FEWEJLUN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN JEWMIHIMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN

52.14: HEDHIHI NARU AL-LETI KUNTUM BIHA TUKEDHDHIBUN
52.16: ESLEWHA FESBIRU ‘EW LA TESBIRU SEWE’UN ‘ALEJKUM ‘INNAMA TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
52.18: FEKIHINE BIMA ‘ATAHUM RABBUHUM WE WEKAHUM RABBUHUM ‘ADHABEL-XHEHIM
52.19: KULU WE ESHRABU HENI’ËN BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
52.20: MUTTEKI’INE ‘ALA SURURIN MESFUFETIN WE ZEWWEXHNAHUM BIHURIN ‘INI
52.21: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ETTEBE’AT/HUM DHURRIJETUHUM BI’IMANIN ‘ELHEKNA BIHIM DHURRIJETEHUM WE MA ‘ELETNAHUM MIN ‘AMELIHIM MIN SHEJ’IN KUL-LU EMRI’IN BIMA KESEBE RAHINU
52.22: WE ‘EMDEDNAHUM BIFEKIHETIN WE LEHMIN MIMMA JESHTEHUN
52.23: JETENAZA’UNE FIHË KE’SËN LA LEGWUN FIHË WE LA TE’THIMU
52.24: WE JETUFU ‘ALEJHIM GILMANUN LEHUM KE’ENNEHUM LU’ULU’UUN MEKNUNU
52.28: ‘INNA KUNNA MIN KABLU NED’UHU ‘INNEHU HUWEL-BERRU RAHIM
52.29: FEDHEKKIR FEMA ‘ENTE BINI’METI RABBIKE BIKAHININ WE LA MEXHNUNI
52.36: ‘EM HALEKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BEL LA JUKINUN
52.38: ‘EM LEHUM SULLEMUN JESTEMI’UNE FIHI FELJE’TI MUSTEMI’UHUM BISULTANIN MUBINI
52.44: WE ‘IN JERAW KISFËN MINE SEMA’I SAKITËN JAKULU SEHABUN MERKUMU
52.45: FEDHERHUM HATTE JULËKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI FIHI JUS’AKUN
52.46: JEWME LA JUGNI ‘ANHUM KEJDUHUM SHEJ’ËN WE LA HUM JUNSERUN
52.47: WE ‘INNE LIL-LEDHINE DHELEMU ‘ADHABËN DUNE DHALIKE WE LAKINNE ‘EKTHERAHUM LA JA’LEMUN
52.48: WE ESBIR LIHUKMI RABBIKE FE’INNEKE BI’A’JUNINA WE SEBBIH BIHEMDI RABBIKE HINE TEKUM

53.2: MA DAL-LE SAHIBUKUM WE MA GAW
53.23: ‘IN HIJE ‘IL-LA ‘ESMA’UN SEMMEJTUMUHA ‘ENTUM WE ‘ABE’UUKUM MA ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU BIHA MIN SULTANIN ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE MA TEHWEL-’ENFUSU WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MIN RABBIHIMUL-HUD
53.26: WE KEM MIN MELAKIN FI SEMAWETI LA TUGNI SHEFE’ATUHUM SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA MIN BE’DI ‘EN JE’DHENAL-LAHU LIMEN JESHA’U WE JERD
53.28: WE MA LEHUM BIHI MIN ‘ILMIN ‘IN JETTEBI’UNE ‘IL-LA EDH-DHENNE WE ‘INNE EDH-DHENNE LA JUGNI MINEL-HEKKI SHEJ’Ë
53.29: FE’A’RID ‘AN MEN TEWELLA ‘AN DHIKRINA WE LEM JURID ‘IL-LAL-HEJËTE DUNJ
53.30: DHALIKE MEBLEGUHUM MINEL-’ILMI ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DAL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMENI EHTED
53.31: WE LIL-LEHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI LIJEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘ESA’U BIMA ‘AMILU WE JEXHZIJEL-LEDHINE ‘EHSENU BIL-HUSN
53.32: EL-LEDHINE JEXHTENIBUNE KEBE’IRAL-’ITHMI WEL-FEWEHISHE ‘IL-LAL-LEMEME ‘INNE RABBEKE WESI’UL-MEGFIRATI HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIKUM ‘IDH ‘ENSHE’EKUM MINEL-’ARDI WE ‘IDH ‘ENTUM ‘EXHINNETUN FI BUTUNI ‘UMMEHATIKUM FELA TUZEKKU ‘ENFUSEKUM HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMENI ETTEK
53.36: ‘EM LEM JUNEBBE’ BIMA FI SUHUFI MUS
53.52: WE KAWME NUHIN MIN KABLU ‘INNAHUM KENU HUM ‘EDHLEME WE ‘ETG
53.58: LEJSE LEHA MIN DUNI LEHI KASHIFETU

54.2: WE ‘IN JERAW ‘AJETEN JU’RIDU WE JAKULU SIHRUN MUSTEMIRRU
54.3: WE KEDHDHEBU WE ETTEBE’U ‘EHWE’EHUM WE KUL-LU ‘EMRIN MUSTEKIRRU
54.4: WE LEKAD XHA’EHUM MINEL-’ENBE’I MA FIHI MUZDEXHERU
54.6: FETEWELLE ‘ANHUM JEWME JED’U DA’I ‘ILA SHEJ’IN NUKURI
54.7: HUSHSHA’ËN ‘EBSARUHUM JEHRUXHUNE MINEL-’EXHDATHI KE’ENNEHUM XHERADUN MUNTESHIRU
54.9: KEDHDHEBET KABLEHUM KAWMU NUHIN FEKEDHDHEBU ‘ABDENA WE KALU MEXHNUNUN WE EZDUXHIR
54.14: TEXHRI BI’A’JUNINA XHEZA’EN LIMEN KANE KUFIR
54.15: WE LEKAD TERAKNAHA ‘AJETEN FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.17: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.19: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNA ‘ALEJHIM RIHËN SERSERAN FI JEWMI NEHSIN MUSTEMIRRI
54.22: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.24: FEKALU ‘EBESHERAN MINNA WEHIDËN NETTEBI’UHU ‘INNA ‘IDHËN LEFI DALELIN WE SU’URI
54.25: ‘E’UULKIJE EDH-DHIKRU ‘ALEJHI MIN BEJNINA BEL HUWE KEDHDHABUN ‘ESHIRU
54.27: ‘INNA MURSILU NAKATI FITNETEN LEHUM FERTEKIBHUM WE ESTEBI
54.28: WE NEBBI’HUM ‘ENNAL-MA’E KISMETUN BEJNEHUM KUL-LU SHIRBIN MUHTEDERU
54.32: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.35: NI’METEN MIN ‘INDINA KEDHALIKE NEXHZI MEN SHEKER
54.37: WE LEKAD RAWEDUHU ‘AN DEJFIHI FETEMESNA ‘A’JUNEHUM FEDHUKU ‘ADHABI WE NUDHUR
54.40: WE LEKAD JESSERNAL-KUR’ANE LILDHDHIKRI FEHEL MIN MUDDEKIRI
54.43: ‘EKUFFERUKUM HAJRUN MIN ‘ULE’IKUM ‘EM LEKUM BERA’ETUN FI EZ-ZUBUR
54.46: BELI SA’ATU MEW’IDUHUM WE SA’ATU ‘ED/HA WE ‘EMERR
54.48: JEWME JUSHEBUNE FI NARI ‘ALA WUXHUHIHIM DHUKU MESSE SEKAR
54.52: WE KUL-LU SHEJ’IN FE’ALUHU FI EZ-ZUBUR
54.53: WE KUL-LU SEGIRIN WE KEBIRIN MUSTETERU

55.15: WE HALEKAL-XHANNE MIN MARIXHIN MIN NARI
55.27: WE JEBKA WEXHHU RABBIKE DHUL-XHALELI WEL-’IKRAM
55.29: JES’ELUHU MEN FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI KUL-LE JEWMIN HUWE FI SHE’NI
55.33: JA MA’SHERAL-XHINNI WEL-’INSI ‘INI ESTETA’TUM ‘EN TENFUDHU MIN ‘EKTARI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI FENFUDHU LA TENFUDHUNE ‘IL-LA BISULTANI
55.35: JURSELU ‘ALEJKUMA SHUWEDHUN MIN NARIN WE NUHASUN FELA TENTESIRAN
55.37: FE’IDHA ENSHAKKATI SEMA’U FEKANET WERDATEN KALDDIHAN
55.39: FEJEWME’IDHIN LA JUS’ELU ‘AN DHENBIHI ‘INSUN WE LA XHANNU
55.46: WE LIMEN HAFE MEKAME RABBIHI XHENNETAN
55.54: MUTTEKI’INE ‘ALA FURUSHIN BETA’INUHA MIN ‘ISTEBRAKIN WE XHENAL-XHENNETEJNI DANI
55.56: FIHINNE KASIRATUT-TERFI LEM JETMITHHUNNE ‘INSUN KABLEHUM WE LA XHANNU
55.68: FIHIMA FEKIHETUN WE NEHLUN WE RUMMANU
55.74: LEM JETMITHHUNNE ‘INSUN KABLEHUM WE LA XHANNU

56.18: BI’EKWEBIN WE ‘EBERIKA WE KE’SIN MIN MA’INI
56.25: LA JESMA’UNE FIHË LEGWEN WE LA TE’THIMË
56.47: WE KENU JAKULUNE ‘E’IDHA MITNA WE KUNNA TURABËN WE ‘IDHAMËN ‘E’INNA LEMEB’UTHUN
56.60: NAHNU KADDERNA BEJNEKUMUL-MEWTE WE MA NAHNU BIMESBUKIN
56.61: ‘ALA ‘EN NUBEDDILE ‘EMTHALEKUM WE NUNSHI’EKUM FI MA LA TA’LEMUN
56.65: LEW NESHA’U LEXHE’ALNAHU HUTAMËN FEDHELELTUM TEFEKKEHUN
56.73: NAHNU XHE’ALNAHA TEDHKIRATEN WE META’ËN LILMUKWIN
56.85: WE NAHNU ‘EKRABU ‘ILEJHI MINKUM WE LAKIN LA TUBSIRUN
56.89: FERAWHUN WE RAJHANUN WE XHENNETU NA’IMI

57.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
57.2: LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI JUHJI WE JUMITU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
57.3: HUWEL-’EWWELU WEL-’AHIRU WE EDH-DHAHIRU WEL-BETINU WE HUWE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
57.4: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA FI SITTETI ‘EJJAMIN THUMME ESTEWE ‘ALEL-’ARSHI JA’LEMU MA JELIXHU FIL-’ËRDI WE MA JEHRUXHU MINHA WE MA JENZILU MINE SEMA’I WE MA JA’RUXHU FIHË WE HUWE ME’AKUM ‘EJNE MA KUNTUM WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
57.5: LEHU MULKU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE ‘ILA LLAHI TURXHA’UL-’UMUR
57.6: JULIXHUL-LEJLE FI NEHARI WE JULIXHU NEHARA FIL-LEJLI WE HUWE ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
57.7: ‘AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE ‘ENFIKU MIMMA XHE’ALEKUM MUSTEHLEFINE FIHI FE-EL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WE ‘ENFEKU LEHUM ‘EXHRUN KEBIRU
57.8: WE MA LEKUM LA TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULU JED’UKUM LITU’UMINU BIRABBIKUM WE KAD ‘EHADHE MITHAKAKUM ‘IN KUNTUM MU’UMININ
57.9: HUWEL-LEDHI JUNEZZILU ‘ALA ‘ABDIHI ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN LIJUHRIXHEKUM MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUM LERA’UFUN RAHIMU
57.10: WE MA LEKUM ‘ELLA TUNFIKU FI SEBILI -LEHI WE LIL-LEHI MIRATHU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI LA JESTEWI MINKUM MEN ‘ENFEKA MIN KABLIL-FETHI WE KATELE ‘ULË’IKE ‘A’DHEMU DERAXHETEN MINEL-LEDHINE ‘ENFEKU MIN BE’DU WE KATELU WE KULLËN WE’ADAL-LAHUL-HUSNA WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
57.11: MEN DHEL-LEDHI JUKRIDU LLAHE KARDËN HESENËN FEJUDA’IFEHU LEHU WE LEHU ‘EXHRUN KERIMU
57.12: JEWME TERAL-MU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI JES’A NURUHUM BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE BI’EJMANIHIM BUSHRAKUMUL-JEWME XHENNATUN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË DHALIKE HUWEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
57.13: JEWME JAKULUL-MUNAFIKUNE WEL-MUNAFIKATU LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ENDHURUNA NEKTEBIS MIN NURIKUM KILA ERXHI’U WERA’EKUM FELTEMISU NURAN FEDURIBE BEJNEHUM BISURIN LEHU BEBUN BETINUHU FIHI RAHMETU WE DHAHIRUHU MIN KIBELIHIL-’ADHAB
57.14: JUNADUNEHUM ‘ELEM NEKUN ME’AKUM KALU BELA WE LAKINNEKUM FETENTUM ‘ENFUSEKUM WE TERABBESTUM WE ERTEBTUM WE GARRATKUMUL-’EMANIJU HATTE XHA’E ‘EMRU LLAHI WE GARRAKUM BIL-LAHIL-GARUR
57.15: FELJEWME LA JU’UHADHU MINKUM FIDJETUN WE LA MINEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ME’WEKUMU NARU HIJE MEWLAKUM WE BI’SAL-MESIR
57.16: ‘ELEM JE’NI LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘EN TEHSHE’A KULUBUHUM LIDHIKRI LEHI WE MA NEZELE MINEL-HEKKI WE LA JEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-KITABE MIN KABLU FETALE ‘ALEJHIMUL-’EMEDU FEKASET KULUBUHUM WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FESIKUN
57.17: A’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE JUHJIL-’ERDA BE’DE MEWTIHA KAD BEJJENNA LEKUMUL-’AJATI LE’AL-LEKUM TA’KILUN
57.18: ‘INNAL-MUSSEDDIKINE WEL-MUSSEDDIKATI WE ‘EKRADU LLAHE KARDËN HESENËN JUDA’AFU LEHUM WE LEHUM ‘EXHRUN KERIMU
57.19: WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI ‘ULË’IKE HUMU SIDDIKUNE WE ESH-SHUHEDA’U ‘INDE RABBIHIM LEHUM ‘EXHRUHUM WE NURUHUM WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABUL-XHEHIM
57.20: A’LEMU ‘ENNEMAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA LA’IBUN WE LEHWUN WE ZINETUN WE TEFEHURUN BEJNEKUM WE TEKATHURUN FIL-’EMWLI WEL-’EWLADI KEMETHELI GAJTHIN ‘A’XHEBEL-KUFFERA NEBETUHU THUMME JEHIXHU FETERAHU MUSFERRAN THUMME JEKUNU HUTAMËN WE FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABUN SHEDIDUN WE MEGFIRATUN MINELLAHI WE RIDWENUN WE MAL-HEJËTU DUN'JA ‘IL-LA META’UL-GURUR
57.21: SABIKU ‘ILA MEGFIRATIN MIN RABBIKUM WE XHENNETIN ‘ARDUHA KE’ARDI SEMA’I WEL-’ARDI ‘U’IDDET LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU BIL-LAHI WE RUSULIHI DHALIKE FEDLU LLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
57.22: MA ‘ESABE MIN MUSIBETIN FIL-’ËRDI WE LA FI ‘ENFUSIKUM ‘IL-LA FI KITABIN MIN KABLI ‘EN NEBRA’EHA ‘INNE DHALIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
57.23: LIKEJLA TE’SEW ‘ALA MA FETEKUM WE LA TEFRAHU BIMA ‘ATAKUM WA-LLAHU LA JUHIBBU KUL-LE MUHTALIN FEHURI
57.24: EL-LEDHINE JEBHALUNE WE JE’MURUNE NASE BIL-BUHLI WE MEN JETEWELLE FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
57.25: LEKAD ‘ERSELNA RUSULENA BIL-BEJJINETI WE ‘ENZELNA ME’AHUMUL-KITABE WEL-MIZANE LIJEKUME NASU BIL-KISTI WE ‘ENZELNAL-HEDIDE FIHI BE’SUN SHEDIDUN WE MENAFI’U LILNNASI WE LIJA’LEMAL-LAHU MEN JENSURUHU WE RUSULEHU BIL-GAJBI ‘INNALL-LLAHE KAWIJUN ‘AZIZU
57.26: WE LEKAD ‘ERSELNA NUHËN WE ‘IBRAHIME WE XHE’ALNA FI DHURRIJETIHIMA NUBUWETE WEL-KITABE FEMINHUM MUHTADIN WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FESIKUN
57.27: THUMME KAFFEJNA ‘ALA ‘ATHARIHIM BIRUSULINA WE KAFFEJNA BI’ISA EBNI MERJEME WE ‘ATEJNAHUL-’INXHILE WE XHE’ALNA FI KULUBIL-LEDHINE ETTEBE’UHU RA’FETEN WE RAHMETEN WE RAHBENIJETEN EBTEDA’UHA MA KETEBNAHA ‘ALEJHIM ‘IL-LA EBTIGA’E RIDWENI LEHI FEMA RA’AWHA HAKKA RI’AJETIHA FE’ATEJNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINHUM ‘EXHRAHUM WE KETHIRUN MINHUM FESIKUN
57.28: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE ‘AMINU BIRASULIHI JU’UTIKUM KIFLEJNI MIN RAHMETIHI WE JEXH’AL LEKUM NURAN TEMSHUNE BIHI WE JEGFIR LEKUM WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
57.29: LI’AL-LA JA’LEME ‘EHLUL-KITABI ‘ELLA JEKDIRUNE ‘ALA SHEJ’IN MIN FEDLI LEHI WE ‘ENNAL-FEDLE BIJEDI LEHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM

58.1: KAD SEMI’ALLAHU KAWLAL-LETI TUXHADILUKE FI ZEWXHIHA WE TESHTEKI ‘ILA LLAHI WA-LLAHU JESMA’U TEHAWURAKUMA ‘INNALL-LLAHE SEMI’UN BESIRU
58.2: EL-LEDHINE JUDHAHIRUNE MINKUM MIN NISA’IHIM MA HUNNE ‘UMMEHATIHIM ‘IN ‘UMMEHATUHUM ‘IL-LAL-LA’I WELEDNEHUM WE ‘INNAHUM LEJAKULUNE MUNKERAN MINEL-KAWLI WE ZURAN WE ‘INNALL-LLAHE LE’AFUWUN GAFURU
58.3: WEL-LEDHINE JUDHAHIRUNE MIN NISA’IHIM THUMME JA’UDUNE LIMA KALU FETEHRIRU RAKABETIN MIN KABLI ‘EN JETEMASSA DHALIKUM TU’ADHUNE BIHI WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
58.4: FEMEN LEM JEXHID FESIJAMU SHEHRAJNI MUTETABI’AJNI MIN KABLI ‘EN JETEMASSA FEMEN LEM JESTETI’ FE’IT’AMU SITTINE MISKINËN DHALIKE LITU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI WE LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
58.5: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JUHADDUNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU KUBITU KAMA KUBITEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM WE KAD ‘ENZELNA ‘AJATIN BEJJINETIN WE LILKEFIRINE ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
58.6: JEWME JEB’ATHUHUMU LLAHU XHEMI’ËN FEJUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU ‘EHSAHU ALLAHU WE NESUHU WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN SHEHIDU
58.7: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ENNA-LLAHE JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI MA JEKUNU MIN NEXHWE THALATHETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE RABI’UHUM WE LA HAMSETIN ‘IL-LA HUWE SADISUHUM WE LA ‘EDNA MIN DHALIKE WE LA ‘EKTHERA ‘IL-LA HUWE ME’AHUM ‘EJNE MA KENU THUMME JUNEBBI’UHUM BIMA ‘AMILU JEWMAL-KIJAMETI ‘INNALL-LLAHE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
58.8: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE NUHU ‘ANI NEXHWE THUMME JA’UDUNE LIMA NUHU ‘ANHU WE JETENAXHEWNE BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWENI WE MA’SIJETI RASULI WE ‘IDHË XHË’UKE HEJJEWKE BIMA LEM JUHEJJIKE BIHI ALLAHU WE JAKULUNE FI ‘ENFUSIHIM LEWLA JU’ADHDHIBUNALLAHU BIMA NEKULU HESBUHUM XHEHENNEMU JESLEWNEHA FEBI’SAL-MESIR
58.9: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA TENAXHEJTUM FELA TETENAXHEW BIL-’ITHMI WEL-’UDWENI WE MA’SIJETI RASULI WE TENAXHEW BIL-BIRRI WET-TEKWE WE ETTEKU LLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
58.10: ‘INNAMA NEXHWE MINE SHEJTANI LIJEHZUNEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE LEJSE BIDARRIHIM SHEJ’ËN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
58.11: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA KILA LEKUM TEFESSEHU FIL-MEXHALISI FEFSEHU JEFSEHI ALLAHU LEKUM WE ‘IDHA KILA ENSHUZU FENSHUZU JERFE’I ALLAHUL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU MINKUM WEL-LEDHINE ‘UTUL-’ILME DERAXHATIN WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
58.12: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NAXHEJTUMU RASULE FEKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJ NEXHWEKUM SEDEKATEN DHALIKE HAJRUN LEKUM WE ‘ETHERU FE’IN LEM TEXHIDU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
58.13: ‘E’ESHFEKTUM ‘EN TUKADDIMU BEJNE JEDEJ NEXHWEKUM SEDEKATIN FE’IDH LEM TEF’ALU WE TABEL-LAHU ‘ALEJKUM FE’EKIMU SELËTE WE ‘ATU EZ-ZEKËTE WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE RASULEHU WA-LLAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
58.14: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE TEWEL-LEW KAWMËN GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM MA HUM MINKUM WE LA MINHUM WE JEHLIFUNE ‘ALEL-KEDHIBI WE HUM JA’LEMUN
58.15: ‘E’ADDAL-LAHU LEHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN ‘INNAHUM SA’E MA KENU JA’MELUN
58.16: ETTEHADHU ‘EJMANEHUM XHUNNETEN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI FELEHUM ‘ADHABUN MUHINU
58.17: LEN TUGNIJE ‘ANHUM ‘EMWELUHUM WE LA ‘EWLADUHUM MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HUM FIHË HALIDUN
58.18: JEWME JEB’ATHUHUMU LLAHU XHEMI’ËN FEJEHLIFUNE LEHU KAMA JEHLIFUNE LEKUM WE JEHSEBUNE ‘ENNEHUM ‘ALA SHEJ’IN ‘ALA ‘INNAHUM HUMUL-KADHIBUN
58.19: ESTEHWEDHE ‘ALEJHIMU SHEJTANU FE’ENSAHUM DHIKRALLAHI ‘ULË’IKE HIZBU SHEJTANI ‘ALA ‘INNE HIZBE SHEJTANI HUMUL-HASIRUN
58.22: LA TEXHIDU KAWMËN JU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI JUWEDDUNE MEN HADDA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE LEW KENU ‘ABE’EHUM ‘EW ‘EBNA’EHUM ‘EW ‘IHWENEHUM ‘EW ‘ASHIRATEHUM ‘ULË’IKE KETEBE FI KULUBIHIMUL-’IMANE WE ‘EJJEDEHUM BIRUHIN MINHU WE JUDHILUHUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË RADIJAL-LAHU ‘ANHUM WE RADU ‘ANHU ‘ULË’IKE HIZBU LLAHI ‘ALA ‘INNE HIZBEL-LAHI HUMUL-MUFLIHUN

59.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
59.2: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘EHRAXHEL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI MIN DIJARIHIM LI’WWELIL-HESHRI MA DHENENTUM ‘EN JEHRUXHU WE DHENNU ‘ENNEHUM MANI’ATUHUM HUSUNUHUM MINELLAHI FE’ETAHUMU LLAHU MIN HEJTHU LEM JEHTESIBU WE KADHEFE FI KULUBIHIMU RU’BE JUHRIBUNE BUJUTEHUM BI’EJDIHIM WE ‘EJDIL-MU’UMININE FE’TEBIRU JA ‘ULIL-’EBSAR
59.3: WE LEWLA ‘EN KETEBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIMUL-XHALA’E LE’ADHDHEBEHUM FI DUN'JA WE LEHUM FIL-’AHIRATI ‘ADHABU NAR
59.4: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM SHAKKU LLAHE WE RASULEHU WE MEN JUSHAKKI LLAHE FE’INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
59.5: MA KATA’TUM MIN LINETIN ‘EW TERAKTUMUHA KA’IMETEN ‘ALA ‘USULIHA FEBI’IDHNI LEHI WE LIJUHZIJAL-FESIKIN
59.6: WE MA ‘EFE’AL-LAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI MINHUM FEMA ‘EWXHEFTUM ‘ALEJHI MIN HAJLIN WE LA RIKABIN WE LAKINNALL-LLAHE JUSELLITU RUSULEHU ‘ALA MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
59.7: MA ‘EFE’AL-LAHU ‘ALA RASULIHI MIN ‘EHLIL-KURA FELIL-LAHI WE LILRRASULI WE LIDHIL-KURBE WEL-JETAMA WEL-MESAKINI WE EBNI SEBILI KEJ LA JEKUNE DULETEN BEJNAL-’EGNIJA’I MINKUM WE MA ‘ATAKUMU RASULU FEHUDHUHU WE MA NEHAKUM ‘ANHU FENTEHU WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE SHEDIDUL-’IKAB
59.8: LILFUKARA’IL-MUHAXHIRINEL-LEDHINE ‘UHRIXHU MIN DIARIHIM WE ‘EMWELIHIM JEBTEGUNE FEDLËN MINELLAHI WE RIDWENËN WE JENSURUNA-LLAHE WE RASULEHU ‘ULË’IKE HUMU SADIKUN
59.9: WEL-LEDHINE TEBEWWE’U DARA WEL-’IMANE MIN KABLIHIM JUHIBBUNE MEN HAXHERA ‘ILEJHIM WE LA JEXHIDUNE FI SUDURIHIM HAXHETEN MIMMA ‘UTU WE JU’UTHIRUNE ‘ALA ‘ENFUSIHIM WE LEW KANE BIHIM HASASETUN WE MEN JUKA SHUHHE NEFSIHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
59.10: WEL-LEDHINE XHA’U MIN BE’DIHIM JAKULUNE RABBENA EGFIR LENA WE LI’EHWENINEL-LEDHINE SEBEKUNA BIL-’IMANI WE LA TEXH’AL FI KULUBINA GILLËN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU RABBENA ‘INNEKE RA’UFUN RAHIMU
59.11: ‘ELEM TERA ‘ILEL-LEDHINE NAFEKU JAKULUNE LI’HWENIHIMUL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN ‘EHLIL-KITABI LE’IN ‘UHRIXHTUM LENEHRUXHENNE ME’AKUM WE LA NUTI’U FIKUM ‘EHEDËN ‘EBEDËN WE ‘IN KUTILTUM LENENSURANNEKUM WA-LLAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNAHUM LEKADHIBUN
59.12: LE’IN ‘UHRIXHU LA JEHRUXHUNE ME’AHUM WE LE’IN KUTILU LA JENSURUNEHUM WE LE’IN NESERUHUM LEJUWELLUNNAL-’EDBERA THUMME LA JUNSERUN
59.13: LE’ENTUM ‘ESHEDDU RAHBETEN FI SUDURIHIM MINELLAHI DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JEFKAHUN
59.14: LA JUKATILUNEKUM XHEMI’ËN ‘IL-LA FI KURAN MUHESSENETIN ‘EW MIN WERA’I XHUDURIN BE’SUHUM BEJNEHUM SHEDIDUN TEHSEBUHUM XHEMI’ËN WE KULUBUHUM SHATTE DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM KAWMUN LA JA’KILUN
59.15: KEMETHELIL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KARIBËN DHAKU WEBELE ‘EMRIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
59.16: KEMETHELI SHEJTANI ‘IDH KALE LIL’INSANI EKFUR FELAMMA KEFERA KALE ‘INNI BERI’UN MINKE ‘INNI ‘EHAFU LLAHE RABBEL-’ALEMIN
59.17: FEKANE ‘AKIBETEHUMA ‘ENNEHUMA FI NARI HALIDEJNI FIHË WE DHELIKE XHEZA’U EDH-DHALIMIN
59.18: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ETTEKU LLAHE WE LTENDHUR NEFSUN MA KADDEMET LIGADIN WE ETTEKU LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN
59.19: WE LA TEKUNU KEL-LEDHINE NESU LLAHE FE’ENSAHUM ‘ANFUSAHUM ‘ULË’IKE HUMUL-FESIKUN
59.21: LEW ‘ENZELNA HADHAL-KUR’ANE ‘ALA XHEBELIN LERA’EJTEHU HASHI’ËN MUTESEDDI’ËN MIN HASHJETI LEHI WE TILKAL-’EMTHALU NEDRIBUHA LILNNASI LE’AL-LEHUM JETEFEKKERUN
59.22: HUWA-LLAHUL-LEDHI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE ‘ALIMUL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI HUWE RAHMANU RAHIM
59.24: HUWA-LLAHUL-HALIKUL-BERI’UL-MUSEWWIRU LEHUL-’ESMA’UL-HUSNA JUSEBBIHU LEHU MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM

60.1: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETTEHIDHU ‘ADUWI WE ‘ADUWEKUM ‘EWLIJA’E TULKUNE ‘ILEJHIM BIL-MEWEDDETI WE KAD KEFERU BIMA XHA’EKUM MINEL-HEKKI JUHRIXHUNE RASULE WE ‘IJJAKUM ‘EN TU’UMINU BIL-LAHI RABBIKUM ‘IN KUNTUM HARAXHTUM XHIHADËN FI SEBILI WE EBTIGA’E MERDATI TUSIRRUNE ‘ILEJHIM BIL-MEWEDDETI WE ‘ENA ‘A’LEMU BIMA ‘EHFEJTUM WE MA ‘A’LENTUM WE MEN JEF’ALHU MINKUM FEKAD DAL-LE SEWE’E SEBIL
60.2: ‘IN JETHKAFUKUM JEKUNU LEKUM ‘A’DA’EN WE JEBSUTU ‘ILEJKUM ‘EJDIJEHUM WE ‘ELSINETEHUM BIS-SU’I WE WEDDU LEW TEKFURUN
60.3: LEN TENFE’AKUM ‘ERHAMUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM JEWMAL-KIJAMETI JEFSILU BEJNEKUM WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
60.4: KAD KANET LEKUM ‘USWETUN HESENETUN FI ‘IBRAHIME WEL-LEDHINE ME’AHU ‘IDH KALU LIKAWMIHIM ‘INNA BURA’A’U MINKUM WE MIMMA TA’BUDUNE MIN DUNI LEHI KEFERNA BIKUM WE BEDA BEJNENA WE BEJNEKUMUL-’ADAWETU WEL-BEGDA’U ‘EBEDËN HATTE TU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEHDEHU ‘IL-LA KAWLE ‘IBRAHIME LI’EBIHI LE’ESTEGFIRANNE LEKE WE MA ‘EMLIKU LEKE MINELLAHI MIN SHEJ’IN RABBENA ‘ALEJKE TEWEKKELNA WE ‘ILEJKE ‘ENEBNA WE ‘ILEJKAL-MESIR
60.5: RABBENA LA TEXH’ALNA FITNETEN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE EGFIR LENA RABBENA ‘INNEKE ‘ENTAL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
60.6: LEKAD KANE LEKUM FIHIM ‘USWETUN HESENETUN LIMEN KANE JERXHU LLAHE WEL-JEWMAL-’AHIRA WE MEN JETEWELLE FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWEL-GANIJUL-HEMID
60.7: ‘ASALLAHU ‘EN JEXH’ALE BEJNEKUM WE BEJNEL-LEDHINE ‘ADEJTUM MINHUM MEWEDDETEN WA-LLAHU KADIRUN WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
60.8: LA JENHAKUMU LLAHU ‘ANIL-LEDHINE LEM JUKATILUKUM FI DINI WE LEM JUHRIXHUKUM MIN DIJARIKUM ‘EN TEBERRUHUM WE TUKSITU ‘ILEJHIM ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-MUKSITIN
60.9: ‘INNAMA JENHAKUMU LLAHU ‘ANIL-LEDHINE KATELUKUM FI DINI WE ‘EHRAXHUKUM MIN DIJARIKUM WE DHAHERU ‘ALA ‘IHRAXHIKUM ‘EN TEWEL-LEWHUM WE MEN JETEWELLEHUM FE’ULË’IKE HUMU EDH-DHALIMUN
60.10: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHË XHË’EKUMUL-MU’UMINATU MUHAXHIRATIN FEMTEHINUHUNNAL-LAHU ‘A’LEMU BI’IMANIHINNE FE’IN ‘ALIMTUMUHUNNE MU’UMINATIN FELA TERXHI’UHUNNE ‘ILAL-KUFFERI LA HUNNE HILLUN LEHUM WE LA HUM JEHIL-LUNE LEHUNNE WE ‘ATUHUM MA ‘ENFEKU WE LA XHUNAHE ‘ALEJKUM ‘EN TENKIHUHUNNE ‘IDHA ‘ATEJTUMUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE LA TUMSIKU BI’ISEMIL-KEWEFIRI WE ES’ELU MA ‘ENFEKTUM WE LIES’ELU MA ‘ENFEKU DHALIKUM HUKMU LLAHI JEHKUMU BEJNEKUM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMU
60.11: WE ‘IN FETEKUM SHEJ’UN MIN ‘EZWEXHIKUM ‘ILAL-KUFFERI FE’AKABTUM FE’ATUL-LEDHINE DHEHEBET ‘EZWEXHUHUM MITHLE MA ‘ENFEKU WE ETTEKU LLAHEL-LEDHI ‘ENTUM BIHI MU’UMINUN
60.12: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘IDHË XHË’EKAL-MU’UMINATU JUBEJI’NEKE ‘ALA ‘EN LA JUSHRIKNE BIL-LAHI SHEJ’ËN WE LA JESRIKNE WE LA JEZNINE WE LA JEKTULNE ‘EWLADEHUNNE WE LA JE’TINE BIBUHTANIN JEFTERINEHU BEJNE ‘EJDIHINNE WE ‘ERXHULIHINNE WE LA JA’SINEKE FI MA’RUFIN FEBEJI’HUNNE WE ESTEGFIR LEHUNNA-LLAHE ‘INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
60.13: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TETEWEL-LEW KAWMËN GADIBEL-LAHU ‘ALEJHIM KAD JE’ISU MINEL-’AHIRATI KAMA JE’ISAL-KUFFERU MIN ‘ES'HABIL-KUBUR

61.1: SEBBEHE LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
61.2: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU LIME TEKULUNE MA LA TEF’ALUN
61.3: KEBURA MEKTËN ‘IND-ALLAHI ‘EN TEKULU MA LA TEF’ALUN
61.4: ‘INNALL-LLAHE JUHIBBUL-LEDHINE JUKATILUNE FI SEBILIHI SEFFËN KE’ENNEHUM BUNJANUN MERSUSU
61.5: WE ‘IDH KALE MUSA LIKAWMIHI JA KAWMI LIME TU’UDHUNENI WE KAD TA’LEMUNE ‘ENNI RASULU LLAHI ‘ILEJKUM FELAMMA ZAGU ‘EZAGALLAHU KULUBEHUM WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-FESIKIN
61.6: WE ‘IDH KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME JA BENI ‘ISRA’ILE ‘INNI RASULU LLAHI ‘ILEJKUM MUSEDDIKËN LIMA BEJNE JEDEJJE MINET-TEWRATI WE MUBESHSHIRAN BIRASULIN JE’TI MIN BE’DI ESMUHU ‘EHMEDU FELAMMA XHA’EHUM BIL-BEJJINETI KALU HADHA SIHRUN MUBINU
61.7: WE MEN ‘EDHLEMU MIMMENI EFTERA ‘ALA ALLAHIL-KEDHIBE WE HUWE JUD’A ‘ILAL-’ISLAMI WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
61.8: JURIDUNE LIJUTFI’U NURALLAHI BI’EFWEHIHIM WA-LLAHU MUTIMMU NURIHI WE LEW KERIHAL-KAFIRUN
61.9: HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ERSELE RASULEHU BIL-HUDA WE DINIL-HEKKI LIJUDHHIRAHU ‘ALA DINI KUL-LIHI WE LEW KERIHAL-MUSHRIKUN
61.11: TU’UMINUNE BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE TUXHAHIDUNE FI SEBILI -LEHI BI’EMWELIKUM WE ‘ENFUSIKUM DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
61.12: JEGFIR LEKUM DHUNUBEKUM WE JUDHILKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU WE MESAKINE TEJJIBETEN FI XHENNATI ‘ADNIN DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
61.13: WE ‘UHRA TUHIBBUNEHA NESRUN MINELLAHI WE FETHUN KARIBUN WE BESHSHIRIL-MU’UMININ
61.14: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU KUNW ‘ENSARALLAHI KAMA KALE ‘ISA EBNU MERJEME LILHEWERIJINE MEN ‘ENSARI ‘ILA LLAHI KALEL-HEWERIJUNE NAHNU ‘ENSARU LLAHI FE’ËMENET TA’IFETUN MIN BENI ‘ISRA’ILE WE KEFERAT TA’IFETUN FE’EJJEDNEL-LEDHINE ‘ËMENU ‘ALA ‘ADUWIHIM FE’ESBEHU DHAHIRIN

62.1: JUSEBBIHU LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDIL-MELIKIL-KUDDUSIL-’AZIZIL-HEKIM
62.2: HUWEL-LEDHI BE’ATHE FIL-’UMMIJINE RASULËN MINHUM JETLU ‘ALEJHIM ‘AJATIHI WE JUZEKKIHIM WE JU’AL-LIMUHUMUL-KITABE WEL-HIKMETE WE ‘IN KENU MIN KABLU LEFI DALELIN MUBINI
62.3: WE ‘AHARINE MINHUM LEMMA JELHEKU BIHIM WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-HEKIM
62.4: DHALIKE FEDLU LLAHI JU’UTIHI MEN JESHA’U WA-LLAHU DHUL-FEDLIL-’ADHIM
62.5: METHELUL-LEDHINE HUMMILUT-TEWRATE THUMME LEM JEHMILUHA KEMETHELIL-HIMARI JEHMILU ‘ESFERAN BI’SE METHELUL-KAWMIL-LEDHINE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATI LEHI WA-LLAHU LA JEHDIL-KAWME EDH-DHALIMIN
62.6: KUL JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE HADU ‘IN ZE’AMTUM ‘ENNEKUM ‘EWLIJA ‘U LIL-LAHI MIN DUNI NASI FETEMENNEWL-MEWTE ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
62.7: WE LA JETEMENNEWNEHU ‘EBEDËN BIMA KADDEMET ‘EJDIHIM WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDH-DHALIMIN
62.8: KUL ‘INNAL-MEWTEL-LEDHI TEFIRRUNE MINHU FE’INNEHU MULËKIKUM THUMME TURADDUNE ‘ILA ‘ALIMIL-GAJBI WE SHEHADETI FEJUNEBBI’UKUM BIMA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
62.9: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘IDHA NUDI LILSSELËTI MIN JEWMIL-XHUMU’ATI FES’AW ‘ILA DHIKRI LEHI WE DHERUL-BEJ’A DHALIKUM HAJRUN LEKUM ‘IN KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
62.10: FE’IDHA KUDIJETI SELËTU FENTESHIRU FIL-’ËRDI WE EBTEGU MIN FEDLI LEHI WE EDHKURU LLAHE KETHIRAN LE’AL-LEKUM TUFLIHUN
62.11: WE ‘IDHA RA’EW TIXHARATEN ‘EW LEHWEN ENFEDDU ‘ILEJHA WE TERAKUKE KA’IMËN KUL MA ‘IND-ALLAHI HAJRUN MINEL-LEHWI WE MINET-TIXHARATI WA-LLAHU HAJRU RAZIKIN

63.1: ‘IDHË XHË’EKAL-MUNAFIKUNE KALU NESH/HEDU ‘INNEKE LERASULU LLAHI WA-LLAHU JA’LEMU ‘INNEKE LERASULUHU WA-LLAHU JESH/HEDU ‘INNAL-MUNAFIKINE LEKADHIBUN
63.2: ETTEHADHU ‘EJMANEHUM XHUNNETEN FESEDDU ‘AN SEBILI -LEHI ‘INNAHUM SA’E MA KENU JA’MELUN
63.3: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHUM ‘AMENU THUMME KEFERU FETUBI’A ‘ALA KULUBIHIM FEHUM LA JEFKAHUN
63.4: WE ‘IDHA RA’EJTEHUM TU’XHIBUKE ‘EXHSAMUHUM WE ‘IN JAKULU TESMA’ LIKAWLIHIM KE’ENNEHUM HUSHUBUN MUSENNEDETUN JEHSEBUNE KUL-LE SEJHETIN ‘ALEJHIM HUMUL-’ADUWU FEHDHERHUM KATELEHUMU LLAHU ‘ENNA JU’UFEKUN
63.5: WE ‘IDHA KILA LEHUM TA’ALEW JESTEGFIR LEKUM RASULU LLAHI LEWWEW RU’USEHUM WE RA’EJTEHUM JESUDDUNE WE HUM MUSTEKBIRUN
63.6: SEWE’UN ‘ALEJHIM ‘ASTEGFERTE LEHUM ‘EM LEM TESTEGFIR LEHUM LEN JEGFIRAL-LAHU LEHUM ‘INNALL-LLAHE LA JEHDIL-KAWMAL-FESIKIN
63.7: HUMUL-LEDHINE JAKULUNE LA TUNFIKU ‘ALA MEN ‘INDE RASULI LEHI HATTE JENFEDDU WE LIL-LEHI HAZA’INU SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE LAKINNAL-MUNAFIKINE LA JEFKAHUN
63.8: JAKULUNE LE’IN RAXHA’NA ‘ILAL-MEDINETI LEJUHRIXHENNAL-’E’AZZU MINHAL-’EDHELLE WE LIL-LEHIL-’IZZETU WE LIRASULIHI WE LILMU’UMININE WE LAKINNAL-MUNAFIKINE LA JA’LEMUN
63.9: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU LA TULHIKUM ‘EMWELUKUM WE LA ‘EWLADUKUM ‘AN DHIKRI LEHI WE MEN JEF’AL DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-HASIRUN
63.10: WE ‘ENFIKU MIN MA RAZEKNAKUM MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJE ‘EHEDEKUMUL-MEWTU FEJEKULE RABBI LEWLA ‘EHHARTENI ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN KARIBIN FE’ESSEDDEKA WE ‘EKUN MINE SALIHIN
63.11: WE LEN JU’UEHHIRAL-LAHU NEFSËN ‘IDHË XHË’E ‘EXHELUHA WA-LLAHU HABIRUN BIMA TA’MELUN

64.1: JUSEBBIHU LIL-LAHI MA FI SEMAWETI WE MA FIL-’ËRDI LEHUL-MULKU WE LEHUL-HAMDU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
64.2: HUWEL-LEDHI HALEKAKUM FEMINKUM KAFIRUN WE MINKUM MU’UMINUN WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE BESIRU
64.3: HALEKA SEMAWETI WEL-’ERDA BIL-HAKKI WE SEWWERAKUM FE’EHSENE SUWERAKUM WE ‘ILEJHIL-MESIR
64.4: JA’LEMU MA FI SEMAWETI WEL-’ARDI WE JA’LEMU MA TUSIRRUNE WE MA TU’LINUNE WA-LLAHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
64.5: ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEBE’UL-LEDHINE KEFERU MIN KABLU FEDHAKU WEBELE ‘EMRIHIM WE LEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
64.6: DHALIKE BI’ENNEHU KANET TE’TIHIM RUSULUHUM BIL-BEJJINETI FEKALU ‘EBESHERUN JEHDUNENA FEKEFERU WE TEWEL-LEW WE ESTEGNALLAHU WA-LLAHU GANIJUN HEMIDU
64.7: ZE’AMEL-LEDHINE KEFERU ‘EN LEN JUB’ATHU KUL BELA WE RABBI LETUB’ATHUNNE THUMME LETUNEBBE’UUNNE BIMA ‘AMILTUM WE DHELIKE ‘ALA ALLAHI JESIRU
64.8: FE’AMINU BIL-LAHI WE RASULIHI WE NURIL-LEDHI ‘ENZELNA WA-LLAHU BIMA TA’MELUNE HABIRU
64.9: JEWME JEXHMA’UKUM LIJEWMIL-XHEM’I DHALIKE JEWMUT-TEGABUNI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE JA’MEL SALIHËN JUKEFFIR ‘ANHU SEJJI’ATIHI WE JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN DHELIKEL-FEWZUL-’ADHIM
64.10: WEL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KEDHDHEBU BI’AJATINA ‘ULË’IKE ‘ES'HABU NARI HALIDINE FIHË WE BI’SAL-MESIR
64.11: MA ‘ESABE MIN MUSIBETIN ‘IL-LA BI’IDHNI LEHI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI JEHDI KALBEHU WA-LLAHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ALIMU
64.12: WE ‘ETI’U LLAHE WE ‘ETI’U RASULE FE’IN TEWEL-LEJTUM FE’INNAMA ‘ALA RASULINAL-BELAGUL-MUBIN
64.13: ALLAHU LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE WE ‘ALA ALLAHI FELJETEWEKKELIL-MU’UMINUN
64.14: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ‘INNE MIN ‘EZWEXHIKUM WE ‘EWLADIKUM ‘ADUWËN LEKUM FEHDHERUHUM WE ‘IN TA’FU WE TESFEHU WE TEGFIRU FE’INNALL-LLAHE GAFURUN RAHIMU
64.16: FETTEKU LLAHE MA ESTETA’TUM WE ESMA’U WE ‘ETI’U WE ‘ENFIKU HAJRAN LI’NFUSIKUM WE MEN JUKA SHUHHE NEFSIHI FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-MUFLIHUN
64.17: ‘IN TUKRIDU LLAHE KARDËN HESENËN JUDA’IFHU LEKUM WE JEGFIR LEKUM WA-LLAHU SHEKURUN HELIMU

65.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU ‘IDHA TELLEKTUMU NISA’ FETELLIKUHUNNE LI’IDDETIHINNE WE ‘EHSUL-’IDDETE WE ETTEKU LLAHE RABBEKUM LA TUHRIXHUHUNNE MIN BUJUTIHINNE WE LA JEHRUXHNE ‘IL-LA ‘EN JE’TINE BIFEHISHETIN MUBEJJINETIN WE TILKE HUDUDU LLAHI WE MEN JETE’ADDE HUDUDALLAHI FEKAD DHELEME NEFSEHU LA TEDRI LE’ALLA-LLAHE JUHDITHU BE’DE DHALIKE ‘EMRA
65.2: FE’IDHA BELEGNE ‘EXHELEHUNNE FE’EMSIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN ‘EW FERIKUHUNNE BIMA’RUFIN WE ‘ESH/HIDU DHEWEJ ‘ADLIN MINKUM WE ‘EKIMU SHEHADETE LIL-LAHI DHALIKUM JU’ADHU BIHI MEN KANE JU’UMINU BIL-LAHI WEL-JEWMIL-’AHIRI WE MEN JETTEKI LLAHE JEXH’AL LEHU MEHRAXHË
65.3: WE JERZUKHU MIN HEJTHU LA JEHTESIBU WE MEN JETEWEKKEL ‘ALA ALLAHI FEHUWE HESBUHU ‘INNALL-LLAHE BELIGU ‘EMRIHI KAD XHE’ALEL-LAHU LIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADRA
65.4: WEL-LA’I JE’ISNE MINEL-MEHIDI MIN NISA’IKUM ‘INI ERTEBTUM FE’IDDETUHUNNE THALATHETU ‘ESH/HURIN WEL-LA’I LEM JEHIDNE WE ‘ULËTUL-’EHMALI ‘EXHELUHUNNE ‘EN JEDA’NE HEMLEHUNNE WE MEN JETTEKI LLAHE JEXH’AL LEHU MIN ‘EMRIHI JUSRA
65.5: DHALIKE ‘EMRU LLAHI ‘ENZELEHU ‘ILEJKUM WE MEN JETTEKI LLAHE JUKEFFIR ‘ANHU SEJJI’ATIHI WE JU’DHIM LEHU ‘EXHRA
65.6: ‘ESKINUHUNNE MIN HEJTHU SEKENTUM MIN WUXHDIKUM WE LA TUDARRUHUNNE LITUDEJJIKU ‘ALEJHINNE WE ‘IN KUNNE ‘ULËTI HEMLIN FE’ENFIKU ‘ALEJHINNE HATTE JEDA’NE HEMLEHUNNE FE’IN ‘ERDA’NE LEKUM FE’ATUHUNNE ‘UXHURAHUNNE WE ‘TEMIRU BEJNEKUM BIMA’RUFIN WE ‘IN TA’ASERTUM FESETURDI’U LEHU ‘UHR
65.7: LIJUNFIK DHU SE’ATIN MIN SE’ATIHI WE MEN KUDIRA ‘ALEJHI RIZKUHU FELJUNFIK MIMMA ‘ATAHU ALLAHU LA JUKELLIFU ALLAHU NEFSËN ‘IL-LA MA ‘ATAHA SEJEXH’ALU ALLAHU BE’DE ‘USRIN JUSRA
65.8: WE KE’EJJIN MIN KARJETIN ‘ATET ‘AN ‘EMRI RABBIHA WE RUSULIHI FEHASEBNAHA HISABËN SHEDIDËN WE ‘ADHDHEBNAHA ‘ADHABËN NUKRA
65.10: ‘E’ADDAL-LAHU LEHUM ‘ADHABËN SHEDIDËN FE ETTEKU LLAHE JA ‘ULIL-’ELBEBIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KAD ‘ENZEL-ALLAHU ‘ILEJKUM DHIKRA
65.11: RASULËN JETLU ‘ALEJKUM ‘AJATI LEHI MUBEJJINETIN LIJUHRIXHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU WE ‘AMILU SALIHATI MINE EDH-DHULUMATI ‘ILA NURI WE MEN JU’UMIN BIL-LAHI WE JA’MEL SALIHËN JUDHILHU XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDËN KAD ‘EHSENAL-LAHU LEHU RIZKË
65.12: ALLAHUL-LEDHI HALEKA SEB’A SEMAWETIN WE MINEL-’ARDI MITHLEHUNNE JETENEZZELUL-’EMRU BEJNEHUNNE LITA’LEMU ‘ENNA-LLAHE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRUN WE ‘ENNA-LLAHE KAD ‘EHATE BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN ‘ILMË

66.1: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU LIME TUHERRIMU MA ‘EHELLAL-LAHU LEKE TEBTEGI MERDËTE ‘EZWEXHIKE WA-LLAHU GAFURUN RAHIMU
66.2: KAD FERADAL-LAHU LEKUM TEHIL-LETE ‘EJMANIKUM WA-LLAHU MEWLAKUM WE HUWEL-’ALIMUL-HEKIM
66.3: WE ‘IDH ‘ESERRA NEBIJU ‘ILA BE’DI ‘EZWEXHIHI HEDITHËN FELAMMA NEBBE’ET BIHI WE ‘EDHHERAHU ALLAHU ‘ALEJHI ‘ARRAFE BE’DEHU WE ‘A’RADE ‘AN BE’DIN FELAMMA NEBBE’EHA BIHI KALET MEN ‘ENBE’EKE HADHA KALE NEBBE’ENIJAL-’ALIMUL-HABIR
66.4: ‘IN TETUBE ‘ILA LLAHI FEKAD SEGAT KULUBUKUMA WE ‘IN TEDHAHERA ‘ALEJHI FE’INNALL-LLAHE HUWE MEWLAHU WE XHIBRILU WE SALIHUL-MU’UMININE WEL-MELE’IKETU BE’DE DHALIKE DHEHIRU
66.5: ‘ASA RABBUHU ‘IN TELLEKAKUNNE ‘EN JUBDILEHU ‘EZWEXHËN HAJRAN MINKUNNE MUSLIMATIN MU’UMINATIN KANITATIN TA’IBETIN ‘ABIDATIN SA’IHATIN THEJJIBETIN WE ‘EBKARA
66.6: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU KU ‘ENFUSEKUM WE ‘EHLIKUM NËRAN WEKUDUHA NASU WEL-HIXHARATU ‘ALEJHA MELE’IKETUN GILADHUN SHIDADUN LA JA’SUNA-LLAHE MA ‘EMERAHUM WE JEF’ALUNE MA JU’UMERUN
66.7: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE KEFERU LA TA’TEDHIRUL-JEWME ‘INNAMA TUXHZEWNE MA KUNTUM TA’MELUN
66.8: JA ‘EJJUHEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU TUBU ‘ILA LLAHI TEWBETEN NESUHËN ‘ASA RABBUKUM ‘EN JUKEFFIRA ‘ANKUM SEJJI’ATIKUM WE JUDHILEKUM XHENNATIN TEXHRI MIN TEHTIHAL-’ENHARU JEWME LA JUHZI ALLAHU NEBIJE WEL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU ME’AHU NURUHUM JES’A BEJNE ‘EJDIHIM WE BI’EJMANIHIM JAKULUNE RABBENA ‘ETMIM LENA NURANA WE EGFIR LENA ‘INNEKE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIRU
66.9: JA ‘EJJUHA NEBIJU XHAHIDIL-KUFFERA WEL-MUNAFIKINE WE EGLUDH ‘ALEJHIM WE ME’WEHUM XHEHENNEMU WE BI’SAL-MESIR
66.10: DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU EIMRA’ETE NUHIN WE EIMRA’ETE LUTIN KANETA TEHTE ‘ABDEJNI MIN ‘IBEDINA SALIHEJNI FEHANETAHUMA FELEM JUGNIJA ‘ANHUMA MINELLAHI SHEJ’ËN WE KILA EDHULË NARA ME’A DAHILIN
66.11: WE DERABEL-LAHU METHELËN LIL-LEDHINE ‘AMENU EIMRA’ETE FIR’AWNE ‘IDH KALET RABBI EBNI LI ‘INDEKE BEJTËN FIL-XHENNETI WE NEXHXHINI MIN FIR’AWNE WE ‘AMELIHI WE NEXHXHINI MINEL-KAWMI EDH-DHALIMIN
66.12: WE MERJEME EBNETE ‘IMRANAL-LETI ‘EHSENET FERXHEHA FENEFEHNA FIHI MIN RUHINA WE SEDDEKAT BIKELIMATI RABBIHA WE KUTUBIHI WE KANET MINEL-KANITIN

67.1: TEBERAKEL-LEDHI BIJEDIHIL-MULKU WE HUWE ‘ALA KUL-LI SHEJ’IN KADIR
67.2: EL-LEDHI HALEKAL-MEWTE WEL-HEJËTE LIJEBLUWEKUM ‘EJJUKUM ‘EHSENU ‘AMELËN WE HUWEL-’AZIZUL-GAFUR
67.3: EL-LEDHI HALEKA SEB’A SEMAWETIN TIBEKA MA TERA FI HALKI RAHMANI MIN TEFEWUT FERXHI’IL-BESARA HEL TERA MIN FUTUR
67.4: THUMME ERXHI’IL-BESARA KERRATEJNI JENKALIB ‘ILEJKAL-BESARU HASI’ËN WE HUWE HESIR
67.5: WE LEKAD ZEJJENNA SEMA’E DUN'JA BIMESABIHE WE XHE’ALNAHA RUXHUMËN LILSHSHEJATINI WE ‘A’TEDNA LEHUM ‘ADHABE SA’IR
67.6: WE LIL-LEDHINE KEFERU BIRABBIHIM ‘ADHABU XHEHENNEME WE BI’SAL-MESIR
67.7: ‘IDHA ‘ULKU FIHË SEMI’U LEHA SHEHIKËN WE HIJE TEFUR
67.8: TEKADU TEMEJJEZU MINEL-GAJDHI KUL-LEMA ‘ULKIJE FIHË FEWXHUN SE’ELEHUM HAZENETUHA ‘ELEM JE’TIKUM NEDHIRU
67.9: KALU BELA KAD XHA’ENA NEDHIRUN FEKEDHDHEBNA WE KULNA MA NEZZALEL-LAHU MIN SHEJ’IN ‘IN ‘ENTUM ‘IL-LA FI DALELIN KEBIRI
67.10: WE KALU LEW KUNNA NESMA’U ‘EW NA’KILU MA KUNNA FI ‘ES'HABI SA’IR
67.12: ‘INNEL-LEDHINE JEHSHEWNE RABBEHUM BIL-GAJBI LEHUM MEGFIRATUN WE ‘EXHRUN KEBIR
67.13: WE ‘ESIRRU KAWLEKUM ‘EW EXHHERU BIHI ‘INNEHU ‘ALIMUN BIDHATI SUDUR
67.15: HUWEL-LEDHI XHE’ALE LEKUMUL-’ERDA DHELULËN FEMSHU FI MENAKIBIHA WE KULU MIN RIZKIHI WE ‘ILEJHI NUSHUR
67.16: ‘E’EMINTUM MEN FI SEMA’I ‘EN JEHSIFE BIKUMUL-’ERDA FE’IDHA HIJE TEMUR
67.17: ‘EM ‘EMINTUM MEN FI SEMA’I ‘EN JURSILE ‘ALEJKUM HASIBËN FESETA’LEMUNE KEJFE NEDHIR
67.18: WE LEKAD KEDHDHEBEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM FEKEJFE KANE NEKIR
67.19: ‘EWELEM JERAW ‘ILAT-TAJRI FEWKAHUM SAFFETIN WE JEKBIDNE MA JUMSIKUHUNNE ‘IL-LA RAHMANU ‘INNEHU BIKUL-LI SHEJ’IN BESIR
67.20: ‘EMMEN HADHEL-LEDHI HUWE XHUNDUN LEKUM JENSURUKUM MIN DUNI RAHMANI ‘INIL-KAFIRUNE ‘IL-LA FI GURUR
67.21: ‘EMMEN HADHEL-LEDHI JERZUKUKUM ‘IN ‘EMSEKE RIZKAHU BEL LEXHXHU FI ‘UTUWIN WE NUFUR
67.22: ‘EFEMEN JEMSHI MUKIBBËN ‘ALA WEXHHIHI ‘EHDA ‘EMMEN JEMSHI SEWIJËN ‘ALA SIRATIN MUSTEKIM
67.23: KUL HUWEL-LEDHI ‘ENSHE’EKUM WE XHE’ALE LEKUMU SEM’A WEL-’EBSARA WEL-’EF’IDETE KALILËN MA TESHKURUN
67.24: KUL HUWEL-LEDHI DHERA’EKUM FIL-’ËRDI WE ‘ILEJHI TUHSHERUN
67.25: WE JAKULUNE META HADHAL-WE’DU ‘IN KUNTUM SADIKIN
67.27: FELAMMA RA’EWHU ZULFETEN SI’ET WUXHUHUL-LEDHINE KEFERU WE KILA HADHEL-LEDHI KUNTUM BIHI TEDDA’UN
67.28: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘EHLEKENIJ-ALLAHU WE MEN MA’I ‘EW RAHIMENA FEMEN JUXHIRUL-KEFIRINE MIN ‘ADHABIN ‘ELIM
67.29: KUL HUWE RAHMANU ‘AMANNA BIHI WE ‘ALEJHI TEWEKKELNA FESETA’LEMUNE MEN HUWE FI DALELIN MUBIN
67.30: KUL ‘ERA’EJTUM ‘IN ‘ESBEHE MA’UUKUM GAWRAN FEMEN JE’TIKUM BIMA’IN MA’IN

68.7: ‘INNE RABBEKE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIMEN DAL-LE ‘AN SEBILIHI WE HUWE ‘A’LEMU BIL-MUHTADIN
68.10: WE LA TUTI’ KUL-LE HEL-LAFIN MEHINI
68.19: FETAFE ‘ALEJHA TA’IFUN MIN RABBIKE WE HUM NA’IMUN
68.32: ‘ASA RABBUNA ‘EN JUBDILENA HAJRAN MINHA ‘INNA ‘ILA RABBINA RAGIBUN
68.33: KEDHELIKEL-’ADHABU WE LE’ADHABUL-’AHIRATI ‘EKBERU LEW KENU JA’LEMUN
68.39: ‘EM LEKUM ‘EJMANUN ‘ALEJNA BELIGATUN ‘ILA JEWMIL-KIJAMETI ‘INNE LEKUM LEMA TEHKUMUN
68.41: ‘EM LEHUM SHURAKA’U FELJE’TU BISHURAKA’IHIM ‘IN KENU SADIKIN
68.42: JEWME JUKSHEFU ‘AN SAKIN WE JUD’AWNE ‘ILA SUXHUDI FELA JESTETI’UN
68.43: HASHI’ATEN ‘EBSARUHUM TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN WE KAD KENU JUD’AWNE ‘ILA SUXHUDI WE HUM SALIMUN
68.44: FEDHERNI WE MEN JUKEDHDHIBU BIHEDHAL-HADITHI SENESTEDRIXHUHUM MIN HEJTHU LA JA’LEMUN
68.48: FESBIR LIHUKMI RABBIKE WE LA TEKUN KESAHIBIL-HUTI ‘IDH NADA WE HUWE MEKDHUMU
68.49: LEWLA ‘EN TEDARAKEHU NI’METUN MIN RABBIHI LENUBIDHE BIL-’ARA’I WE HUWE MEDHMUMU
68.51: WE ‘IN JEKEDUL-LEDHINE KEFERU LEJUZLIKUNEKE BI’EB'SARIHIM LEMMA SEMI’U EDH-DHIKRA WE JAKULUNE ‘INNEHU LEMEXHNUNU

69.7: SEHHARAHA ‘ALEJHIM SEB’A LEJALIN WE THEMANIJETE ‘EJJAMIN HUSUMËN FETERAL-KAWME FIHË SER’A KE’ENNEHUM ‘A’XHAZU NEHLIN HAWIJETI
69.9: WE XHA’E FIR’AWNU WE MEN KABLEHU WEL-MU’UTEFIKATU BIL-HATI’ET
69.12: LINEXH’ALEHA LEKUM TEDHKIRATEN WE TA’IJEHA ‘UDHUNUN WE’IJETU
69.13: FE’IDHA NUFIHË FI SURI NEFHATUN WEHIDETU
69.14: WE HUMILETIL-’ERDU WEL-XHIBELU FEDUKKETA DEKKETEN WEHIDETE
69.16: WE ENSHAKKATI SEMA’U FEHIJE JEWME’IDHIN WE EHIJETU
69.17: WEL-MELEKU ‘ALA ‘ERXHA’IHA WE JEHMILU ‘ARSHE RABBIKE FEWKAHUM JEWME’IDHIN THEMANIJETU
69.18: JEWME’IDHIN TU’RADUNE LA TEHFE MINKUM HAFIJETU
69.19: FE’EMMA MEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BIJEMINIHI FEJAKULU HA’UUM EKRA’U KITAB
69.24: KULU WE ESHRABU HENI’ËN BIMA ‘ESLEFTUM FIL-’EJJAMIL-HALIJET
69.25: WE ‘EMMA MEN ‘UTIJE KITABEHU BISHIMALIHI FEJAKULU JA LEJTENI LEM ‘UTE KITABI
69.32: THUMME FI SILSILETIN DHER’UHA SEB’UNE DHIRA’ËN FESLUKUH
69.41: WE MA HUWE BIKAWLI SHA’IRIN KALILËN MA TU’UMINUN
69.42: WE LA BIKAWLI KAHININ KALILËN MA TEDHEKKERUN

70.4: TA’RUXHUL-MELE’IKETU WE RUHU ‘ILEJHI FI JEWMIN KANE MIKDARUHU HAMSINE ‘ELFE SENETI
70.11: JUBESSERUNEHUM JEWEDDUL-MUXHRIMU LEW JEFTEDI MIN ‘ADHABI JEWMI’IDHIN BIBENIH
70.14: WE MEN FIL-’ËRDI XHEMI’ËN THUMME JUNXHIH
70.31: FEMENI EBTEGA WERA’E DHALIKE FE’ULË’IKE HUMUL-’ADUN
70.38: ‘EJETMA’U KUL-LU EMRI’IN MINHUM ‘EN JUDHALE XHENNETE NA’IMI
70.41: ‘ALA ‘EN NUBEDDILE HAJRAN MINHUM WE MA NAHNU BIMESBUKIN
70.42: FEDHERHUM JEHUDU WE JEL’ABU HATTE JULËKU JEWMEHUMUL-LEDHI JU’ADUN
70.43: JEWME JEHRUXHUNE MINEL-’EXHDATHI SIRA’ËN KE’ENNEHUM ‘ILA NUSUBIN JUFIDUN
70.44: HASHI’ATEN ‘EBSARUHUM TERHEKUHUM DHIL-LETUN DHELIKEL-JEWMUL-LEDHI KENU JU’ADUN

71.1: ‘INNA ‘ERSELNA NUHËN ‘ILA KAWMIHI ‘EN ‘ENDHIR KAWMEKE MIN KABLI ‘EN JE’TIJEHUM ‘ADHABUN ‘ELIMU
71.2: KALE JA KAWMI ‘INNI LEKUM NEDHIRUN MUBINU
71.4: JEGFIR LEKUM MIN DHUNUBIKUM WE JU’UEHHIRKUM ‘ILA ‘EXHELIN MUSEMMEN ‘INNE ‘EXHALELLAHI ‘IDHË XHË’E LA JU’UEHHARU LEW KUNTUM TA’LEMUN
71.5: KALE RABBI ‘INNI DE’AWTU KAWMI LEJLËN WE NEHARA
71.7: WE ‘INNI KUL-LEMA DE’AWTUHUM LITEGFIRA LEHUM XHE’ALU ‘ESABI’AHUM FI ‘ADHANIHIM WE ESTEGSHEW THIJABEHUM WE ‘ESERRU WE ESTEKBERU ESTIKBERA
71.12: WE JUMDIDKUM BI’EMWELIN WE BENINE WE JEXH’AL LEKUM XHENNATIN WE JEXH’AL LEKUM ‘ENHARA
71.13: MA LEKUM LA TERXHUNE LIL-LAHI WEKARA
71.15: ‘ELEM TERAW KEJFE HALEKEL-LEHU SEB’A SEMAWETIN TIBEKË
71.16: WE XHE’ALEL-KAMERA FIHINNE NURAN WE XHE’ALE SHEMSE SIRAXHË
71.21: KALE NUHUN RABBI ‘INNAHUM ‘ASEWNI WE ETTEBE’U MEN LEM JEZID/HU MALUHU WE WELEDUHU ‘IL-LA HASARA
71.23: WE KALU LA TEDHERUNNE ‘ALIHETEKUM WE LA TEDHERUNNE WEDDËN WE LA SUWE’ËN WE LA JEGUTHE WE JA’UKA WE NESRA
71.24: WE KAD ‘EDELLU KETHIRAN WE LA TEZIDI EDH-DHALIMINE ‘IL-LA DALELË
71.25: MIMMA HATI’ATIHIM ‘UGRIKU FE’UDHILU NËRAN FELEM JEXHIDU LEHUM MIN DUNI LEHI ‘ENSARA
71.26: WE KALE NUHUN RABBI LA TEDHER ‘ALEL-’ARDI MINEL-KEFIRINE DEJJARA
71.27: ‘INNEKE ‘IN TEDHERHUM JUDIL-LU ‘IBEDEKE WE LA JELIDU ‘IL-LA FEXHIRAN KEFFERA
71.28: RABBI EGFIR LI WE LIWELIDEJJE WE LIMEN DEHALE BEJTIJE MU’UMINËN WE LILMU’UMININE WEL-MU’UMINATI WE LA TEZIDI EDH-DHALIMINE ‘IL-LA TEBERA

72.1: KUL ‘UHIJE ‘ILEJJE ‘ENNEHU ESTEME’A NEFERUN MINEL-XHINNI FEKALU ‘INNA SEMI’NA KUR’ANËN ‘AXHEBË
72.2: JEHDI ‘ILA RUSHDI FE’AMANNA BIHI WE LEN NUSHRIKE BIRABBINA ‘EHEDË
72.3: WE ‘ENNEHU TA’ALA XHEDDU RABBINA MA ETTEHADHE SAHIBETEN WE LA WELEDË
72.4: WE ‘ENNEHU KANE JAKULU SEFIHUNA ‘ALA ALLAHI SHETETË
72.5: WE ‘ENNA DHENENNA ‘EN LEN TEKULËL-’INSU WEL-XHINNU ‘ALA ALLAHI KEDHIBË
72.6: WE ‘ENNEHU KANE RIXHALUN MINEL-’INSI JA’UDHUNE BIRIXHALIN MINEL-XHINNI FEZADUHUM RAHEKË
72.7: WE ‘ENNEHUM DHENNU KAMA DHENENTUM ‘EN LEN JEB’ATHAL-LAHU ‘EHEDË
72.8: WE ‘ENNA LEMESNA SEMA’E FEWEXHEDNAHA MULI’ET HERASËN SHEDIDËN WE SHUHUBË
72.9: WE ‘ENNA KUNNA NEK’UDU MINHA MEKA’IDE LILSSEM’I FEMEN JESTEMI’IL-’ANE JEXHID LEHU SHIHABËN RASEDË
72.10: WE ‘ENNA LA NEDRI ‘ESHERRUN ‘URIDE BIMEN FIL-’ËRDI ‘EM ‘ERADE BIHIM RABBUHUM RASHEDË
72.11: WE ‘ENNA MINNA SALIHUNE WE MINNA DUNE DHALIKE KUNNA TERA’IKA KIDEDË
72.12: WE ‘ENNA DHENENNA ‘EN LEN NU’XHIZA-LLAHE FIL-’ËRDI WE LEN NU’XHIZEHU HERABË
72.13: WE ‘ENNA LEMMA SEMI’NAL-HUDA ‘AMANNA BIHI FEMEN JU’UMIN BIRABBIHI FELA JEHAFU BEHSËN WE LA RAHEKË
72.14: WE ‘ENNA MINNEL-MUSLIMUNE WE MINNEL-KASITUNE FEMEN ‘ESLEME FE’ULË’IKE TEHERRAW RASHEDË
72.17: LINEFTINEHUM FIHI WE MEN JU’RID ‘AN DHIKRI RABBIHI JESLUK/HU ‘ADHABËN SE’ADË
72.18: WE ‘ENNAL-MESAXHIDE LIL-LAHI FELA TED’U ME’A ALLAHI ‘EHEDË
72.19: WE ‘ENNEHU LEMMA KAME ‘ABDU LLAHI JED’UHU KADU JEKUNUNE ‘ALEJHI LIBEDË
72.21: KUL ‘INNI LA ‘EMLIKU LEKUM DERRAN WE LA RASHEDË
72.22: KUL ‘INNI LEN JUXHIRANI MINELLAHI ‘EHEDUN WE LEN ‘EXHIDE MIN DUNIHI MULTEHEDË
72.23: ‘IL-LA BELAGËN MINELLAHI WE RISALATIHI WE MEN JA’SI LLAHE WE RASULEHU FE’INNE LEHU NARA XHEHENNEME HALIDINE FIHË ‘EBEDË
72.24: HATTE ‘IDHA RA’EW MA JU’ADUNE FESEJA’LEMUNE MEN ‘ED’AFU NASIRAN WE ‘EKALLU ‘ADEDË
72.25: KUL ‘IN ‘EDRI ‘EKARIBUN MA TU’ADUNE ‘EM JEXH’ALU LEHU RABBI ‘EMEDË
72.27: ‘IL-LA MENI ERTEDA MIN RASULIN FE’INNEHU JESLUKU MIN BEJNI JEDEJHI WE MIN HALFIHI RASEDË
72.28: LIJA’LEME ‘EN KAD ‘EBLEGU RISALATI RABBIHIM WE ‘EHATE BIMA LEDEJHIM WE ‘EHSA KUL-LE SHEJ’IN ‘ADEDË

73.8: WE EDHKUR ESME RABBIKE WE TEBETTEL ‘ILEJHI TEBTILË
73.9: RABBUL-MESHRIKI WEL-MEGRIBI LA ‘ILAHE ‘IL-LA HUWE FE ETTEHIDH/HU WE KILË
73.10: WE ESBIR ‘ALA MA JAKULUNE WE EHXHURHUM HEXHRAN XHEMILË
73.11: WE DHERNI WEL-MUKEDHDHIBINE ‘ULI NA’METI WE MEHHILHUM KALILË
73.14: JEWME TERXHUFUL-’ERDU WEL-XHIBELU WE KANETIL-XHIBELU KETHIBËN MEHILË
